tika-vin01t2:6_0: 24. Anupadavaṇṇananti padaṃ padaṃ paṭivaṇṇanaṃ, padānukkamena vaṇṇanaṃ vā. Bhaṇḍappayojanauddhārasāraṇādinā
tika-vin01t2:6_1: kiccenāti ettha vikkāyikabhaṇḍassa vikkiṇanaṃ bhaṇḍappayojanaṃ, dātuṃ saṅketite divase
tika-vin01t2:6_2: gantvā gahaṇaṃ uddhāro, “asukasmiṃ divase dātabba”nti satuppādanaṃ sāraṇaṃ. Catubbidhāyāti
tika-vin01t2:6_4: vasena vā. Disvānassa etadahosīti hetuattho ayaṃ disvāna-saddo asamānakattuko yathā
tika-vin01t2:6_5: “ghataṃ pivitvā balaṃ hoti, sīhaṃ disvā bhayaṃ hotī”ti. Dassanakāraṇā hi evaṃ parivitakkanaṃ
tika-vin01t2:6_6: ahosi. Kiñcāpi ettha “bhabbakulaputtassā”ti vuttaṃ, tathāpi upanissayasampannassapi
tika-vin01t2:6_7: ajātasattuno viya antarāyo bhavissatīti imassa therassapi katapāpakammamūlavippaṭisāravasena
tika-vin01t2:7_0: Kiṃ pana yesaṃ maggaphalānaṃ upanissayo atthi, buddhānaṃ sammukhībhāvepi tesaṃ antarāyo
tika-vin01t2:7_1: hotīti? Āma hoti, na pana buddhe paṭicca. Buddhā hi paresaṃ maggaphalādhigamāya ussāhajātā
tika-vin01t2:7_2: tattha nirantaraṃ yuttapayuttā eva honti, tasmā te paṭicca tesaṃ antarāyo na hoti,
tika-vin01t2:7_3: atha kho kiriyāparihāniyā vā pāpamittatāya vā hoti, kiriyāparihāni ca desakassa tasseva
tika-vin01t2:7_4: vā puggalassa tajjapayogābhāvato veditabbā, desakavasena panettha parihāni sāvakānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:7_5: vaseneva veditabbā, na buddhānaṃ vasena. Tathā hi sace dhammasenāpati dhanañjāniyassa
tika-vin01t2:7_6: brāhmaṇassa āsayaṃ ñatvā dhammaṃ desayissa, brāhmaṇo sotāpanno abhavissa. Evaṃ tāva
tika-vin01t2:7_7: desakassa vasena kiriyāparihāniyā antarāyo hoti. Sace pesso hatthārohaputto bhagavato
tika-vin01t2:7_8: sammukhā dhammaṃ suṇanto muhuttaṃ nisīdeyya, yāva tassa bhagavā attantapādike cattāro
tika-vin01t2:7_9: puggale vitthārena vibhajitvā deseti, sotāpattiphalena saṃyutto abhavissa. Evaṃ puggalassa
tika-vin01t2:7_10: vasena kiriyāparihāniyā antarāyo hoti nāma. Imassa hi upāsakassa kiriyāparihāni jātā
tika-vin01t2:7_11: apariniṭṭhitāya desanāya uṭṭhahitvā pakkantattā. Sace ajātasattu devadattassa vacanaṃ
tika-vin01t2:7_12: gahetvā pitughātakammaṃ nākarissa, sāmaññaphalasuttakathitadivase sotāpanno abhavissa,
tika-vin01t2:7_13: tassa vacanaṃ gahetvā pitughātakammassa katattā pana nāhosi. Evaṃ pāpamittatāya antarāyo
tika-vin01t2:7_14: hoti. Sudinnassapi pāpamittavasena antarāyo ahosīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Yadi hi tena mātāpitūnaṃ
tika-vin01t2:7_15: vacanaṃ gahetvā purāṇadutiyikāya methunadhammo paṭisevito nābhavissa, na taṃmūlavippaṭisāravasena
tika-vin01t2:8_1: kiriyāpadena vuccamāno eva hi attho “yannūnā”ti nipātapadena jotīyati. Ahaṃ yannūna
tika-vin01t2:8_2: dhammaṃ suṇeyyanti yojanā. Yannūnāti ca yadi panāti attho. Yadi panāti idampi hi
tika-vin01t2:8_3: tena samānatthameva. Yaṃ dhammaṃ suṇātīti sambandho. Uḷāruḷārajanāti khattiyamahāsālādiuḷāruḷārajanākiṇṇā.
tika-vin01t2:8_4: Sace ayampi paṭhamaṃ āgaccheyya, bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā nisīdituṃ araharūpoti
tika-vin01t2:8_6: Thokaṃ dhammakathaṃ sutvā ahosīti sambandho. Idhāpi sutvā-saddo hetuatthoti daṭṭhabbo,
tika-vin01t2:8_7: savanakāraṇā etadahosīti vuttaṃ hoti. Yadi evaṃ atha kasmā “ekamantaṃ nisinnassa…pe…
tika-vin01t2:8_8: etadahosī”ti vuttanti āha “taṃ panassa yasmā”tiādi. Tattha tanti parivitakkanaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:9_0: Saṅkhepakathāti visuṃ visuṃ paduddhāraṃ akatvā samāsato atthavaṇṇanā. Yena yena ākārenāti
tika-vin01t2:9_1: yena yena pakārena. Tena tena me upaparikkhatoti “kāmā nāmete aniccā dukkhā vipariṇāmadhammā
tika-vin01t2:9_2: aṭṭhikaṅkalūpamā”ti ca ādinā yena yena ākārena kāmesu ādīnavaṃ okāraṃ saṃkilesaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:9_3: tabbipariyāyato nekkhamme ānisaṃsaṃ guṇaṃ pakāsentaṃ bhagavatā dhammaṃ desitaṃ ājānāmi
tika-vin01t2:9_4: avabujjhāmi, tena tena pakārena upaparikkhato vīmaṃsantassa mayhaṃ evaṃ hoti evaṃ
tika-vin01t2:9_6: Ekampi divasanti ekadivasamattampi. Akhaṇḍaṃ katvāti dukkaṭamattassapi anāpajjanena
tika-vin01t2:9_8: Carimakacittanti cuticittaṃ. Kiñcipi ekadesaṃ asesetvā ekanteneva paripūretabbatāya
tika-vin01t2:9_9: ekantaparipuṇṇaṃ. Kilesamalena amalīnaṃ katvāti taṇhāsaṃkilesādinā asaṃkiliṭṭhaṃ
tika-vin01t2:9_10: katvā, cittuppādamattampi saṃkilesamalaṃ anuppādetvā. Accantameva visuddhaṃ katvā
tika-vin01t2:9_11: pariharitabbatāya ekantaparisuddhaṃ. Tato eva saṅkhaṃ viya likhitanti saṅkhalikhitaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:9_12: Tenāha “likhitasaṅkhasadisa”nti. Pariyodātaṭṭhena nimmalabhāvena saṅkhaṃ viya likhitaṃ
tika-vin01t2:9_14: agāranti bhummatthe upayogavacananti āha “agāramajjhe”ti. Dāṭhikāpi massuggahaṇeneva
tika-vin01t2:9_15: gahetvā “massu”tveva vuttaṃ, uttarādharamassunti attho. Kasāyena rattānīti kāsāyānīti
tika-vin01t2:9_16: āha “kasāyarasapītatāyā”ti. Paridahitvāti nivāsetvā ceva pārupitvā ca. Agārassa hitanti
tika-vin01t2:9_17: agāravāso agāraṃ uttarapadalopena, tassa vaḍḍhiāvahaṃ agārassa hitaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:10_0: 25. Ñātisālohitātiādīsu “ayaṃ ajjhattiko”ti jānanti, ñāyanti vāti ñātī, lohitena
tika-vin01t2:10_1: sambandhāti sālohitā. Pitupakkhikā ñātī, mātupakkhikā sālohitā. Mātupakkhikā pitupakkhikā
tika-vin01t2:10_2: vā ñātī, sassusasurapakkhikā sālohitā. Mittāyantīti mittā, minanti vā sabbaguyhesu
tika-vin01t2:10_3: anto pakkhipantīti mittā. Kiccakaraṇīyesu sahabhāvaṭṭhena amā hontīti amaccā. Mamāyatīti
tika-vin01t2:10_4: mātā, piyāyatīti pitā. Sarīrakiccalesenāti uccārapassāvādisarīrakiccalesena. Ananuññātaṃ
tika-vin01t2:10_5: puttaṃ na pabbājetīti “mātāpitūnaṃ lokiyamahājanassa ca cittaññathattaṃ mā hotū”ti
tika-vin01t2:10_6: na pabbājeti. Tatoyeva ca suddhodanamahārājassa tathā varo dinno.
tika-vin01t2:11_0: 26. Dhuranikkhepenāti bhaṇḍappayojanādīsu dhuranikkhepena. Tenāha “na hī”tiādi. Piyāyitabboti
tika-vin01t2:11_1: piyoti āha “pītijananako”ti. Manassa appāyanato manāpoti āha “manavaḍḍhanako”ti.
tika-vin01t2:11_4: ca uḷārapaṇītasukhapaccayūpahārehi ca sukhedhito, akiccheneva dukkhapaccayavinodanena
tika-vin01t2:11_5: sukhaparihato. Ajjhattikaṅgasampattiyā vā sukhedhito, bāhiraṅgasampattiyā sukhaparihato.
tika-vin01t2:12_0: Kiñcīti etassa vivaraṇaṃ “appamattakampi kalabhāga”nti. Yadā jānāti-saddo bodhanattho
tika-vin01t2:12_1: na hoti, tadā tassa payoge “sappino jānāti, madhuno jānātī”tiādīsu viya karaṇatthe
tika-vin01t2:12_2: sāmivacanaṃ saddatthavidū icchantīti āha “kiñci dukkhena nānubhosī”ti. Tenāha “karaṇatthe
tika-vin01t2:12_3: sāmivacanaṃ, anubhavanatthe ca jānanā”ti. Ettha ca kiñci dukkhena nānubhosīti kenaci
tika-vin01t2:12_4: dukkhena karaṇabhūtena visayaṃ nānubhosīti evamattho veditabbo. “Kiñcī”ti etthāpi
tika-vin01t2:12_5: hi karaṇatthe sāmivacanassa lopo kato. Teneva ca vakkhati “vikappadvayepi purimapadassa
tika-vin01t2:12_6: uttarapadena samānavibhattilopo daṭṭhabbo”ti. Yadā pana jānāti-saddo saraṇattho hoti,
tika-vin01t2:12_7: tadā saraṇatthānaṃ dhātusaddānaṃ payoge “mātu sarati, pitu sarati, bhātu jānātī”tiādīsu
tika-vin01t2:12_8: viya upayogatthe sāmivacanaṃ saddasatthavidū vadantīti āha “atha vā kiñci dukkhaṃ
tika-vin01t2:12_9: nassarasīti attho”ti, kassaci dukkhassa ananubhūtattā attanā anubhūtaṃ appamattakampi
tika-vin01t2:12_10: dukkhaṃ pariyesamānopi abhāvatoyeva nassarasīti attho. Vikappadvayepīti anubhavanasaraṇatthavasena
tika-vin01t2:12_12: “dukkhassā”ti padena. Samānavibhattilopoti uttarapadena samānassa sāmivacanassa lopo.
tika-vin01t2:12_13: “Kassaci dukkhassā”ti vattabbe vikappadvayepi purimapade sāmivacanassa lopaṃ katvā
tika-vin01t2:12_14: “kiñci dukkhassā”ti niddeso kato. Anicchakāti anicchantā. Evaṃ santeti nanu mayaṃ
tika-vin01t2:12_15: sudinna sāmādīsu kenacipi upāyena appaṭisādhanena appaṭikārena maraṇenapi tayā akāmakāpi
tika-vin01t2:12_16: vinā bhavissāma, evaṃ sati. Yenāti yena kāraṇena. Kiṃ panāti ettha kinti karaṇatthe
tika-vin01t2:13_0: 28. Gandhabbanaṭanāṭakādīnīti ettha gandhabbā nāma gāyanakā, naṭā nāma raṅganaṭā,
tika-vin01t2:13_1: nāṭakā laṅghanakādayo. Paricārehīti ettha parito tattha tattha yathāsakaṃ visayesu
tika-vin01t2:13_2: cārehīti atthoti āha “indriyāni cārehī”tiādi. Paricārehīti vā sukhūpakaraṇehi attānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:13_3: paricārehi attano paricaraṇaṃ kārehi. Tathābhūto ca yasmā laḷanto kīḷanto nāma hoti,
tika-vin01t2:13_4: tasmā “laḷā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Bhuñjitabbato paribhuñjitabbato visesato pañca kāmaguṇā
tika-vin01t2:13_5: bhogā nāmāti āha “bhoge bhuñjanto”ti. Dānappadānānīti ettha niccadānaṃ dānaṃ nāma,
tika-vin01t2:13_6: uposathadivasādīsu dātabbaṃ atirekadānaṃ padānaṃ nāma. Paveṇīrakkhaṇavasena vā dīyamānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:13_7: dānaṃ nāma, attanāva paṭṭhapetvā dīyamānaṃ padānaṃ nāma. Pacurajanasādhāraṇaṃ vā
tika-vin01t2:13_8: nātiuḷāraṃ dānaṃ nāma, anaññasādhāraṇaṃ atiuḷāraṃ padānaṃ nāma. Ādi-saddena sīlādīni
tika-vin01t2:13_9: saṅgaṇhāti. Natthi etassa vacanappaṭivacanasaṅkhāto ālāpasallāpoti nirālāpasallāpo.
tika-vin01t2:14_0: 30. Balaṃ gāhetvāti ettha balaggahaṇaṃ nāma kāyabalassa uppādanamevāti āha “kāyabalaṃ
tika-vin01t2:14_1: janetvā”ti. Assumukhanti assūni mukhe etassāti assumukho, taṃ assumukhaṃ, assukilinnamukhanti
tika-vin01t2:14_2: attho. Gāmoyeva gāmantasenāsanaṃ gāmapariyāpannattā gāmantasenāsanassa. Atirekalābhapaṭikkhepenāti
tika-vin01t2:14_4: tassa paṭikkhepenāti attho. Tenāha “cuddasa bhattāni paṭikkhipitvā”ti. Saṅghabhattaṃ
tika-vin01t2:14_5: uddesabhattaṃ nimantanabhattaṃ salākabhattaṃ pakkhikaṃ uposathikaṃ pāṭipadikaṃ āgantukabhattaṃ
tika-vin01t2:14_6: gamikabhattaṃ gilānabhattaṃ gilānupaṭṭhākabhattaṃ vihārabhattaṃ dhurabhattaṃ vārabhattanti
tika-vin01t2:14_7: imāni cuddasa bhattāni. Tattha sakalassa saṅghassa dātabbaṃ bhattaṃ saṅghabhattaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:14_8: Katipaye bhikkhū uddisitvā dātabbaṃ bhattaṃ uddesabhattaṃ. Ekasmiṃ pakkhe ekadivasaṃ
tika-vin01t2:14_9: dātabbaṃ bhattaṃ pakkhikaṃ. Uposathe dātabbaṃ bhattaṃ uposathikaṃ. Pāṭipadadivase
tika-vin01t2:14_10: dātabbaṃ bhattaṃ pāṭipadikaṃ. Vihāraṃ uddissa dātabbaṃ bhattaṃ vihārabhattaṃ. Dhurageheyeva
tika-vin01t2:14_11: ṭhapetvā dātabbaṃ bhattaṃ dhurabhattaṃ. Gāmavāsīādīhi vārena dātabbaṃ bhattaṃ vārabhattaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:15_0: Atha “gahapaticīvaraṃ paṭikkhipitvā”ti kasmā vuttaṃ. Gahaṇe hi sati paṭikkhepo yujjeyya,
tika-vin01t2:15_1: na ca paṭhamabodhiyaṃ gahapaticīvarassa paṭiggahaṇaṃ anuññātaṃ parato jīvakavatthusmiṃ
tika-vin01t2:15_2: anuññātattā. Teneva vakkhati jīvakavatthusmiṃ “bhagavato hi buddhabhāvappattito paṭṭhāya
tika-vin01t2:15_3: yāva idaṃ vatthaṃ, etthantare vīsati vassāni na koci gahapaticīvaraṃ sādiyi, sabbe
tika-vin01t2:15_4: paṃsukūlikāva ahesu”nti. Sudinno ca paṭhamabodhiyaṃyeva pabbajito. Teneva vakkhati
tika-vin01t2:15_5: “sudinno hi bhagavato dvādasame vasse pabbajito, vīsatime vasse ñātikulaṃ piṇḍāya
tika-vin01t2:15_6: paviṭṭho, sayaṃ pabbajjāya aṭṭhavassiko hutvā”ti. Tasmā “gahapaticīvaraṃ paṭikkhipitvā”ti
tika-vin01t2:15_7: kasmā vuttanti? Vuccate – ananuññātepi gahapaticīvare paṃsukūlikaṅgasamādānavasena
tika-vin01t2:15_8: gahapaticīvaraṃ paṭikkhittaṃ nāma hotīti katvā vuttaṃ “gahapaticīvaraṃ paṭikkhipitvā”ti.
tika-vin01t2:16_0: Loluppacāraṃ paṭikkhipitvāti kusalabhaṇḍassa bhusaṃ vilumpanaṭṭhena loluppaṃ vuccati
tika-vin01t2:16_1: taṇhā, loluppena caraṇaṃ loluppacāro, taṇhāvasena gharapaṭipāṭiṃ atikkamitvā bhikkhāya
tika-vin01t2:16_2: caraṇaṃ, taṃ paṭikkhipitvāti attho. Tenāha “gharapaṭipāṭiyā bhikkhāya pavisatī”ti.
tika-vin01t2:16_3: Ettha ca āraññikaṅgādipadhānaṅgavasena sesadhutaṅgānipi gahitāneva hontīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:16_4: Vajjīnanti rājāno apekkhitvā sāmivacanaṃ kataṃ, vajjīrājūnanti attho. Janapada-saddassa
tika-vin01t2:16_5: taṃnivāsīsupi pavattanato “vajjīsū”ti janapadāpekkhaṃ bhummavacanaṃ, vajjināmake janapadeti attho.
tika-vin01t2:17_1: mahantatāya. Upabhogūpakaraṇāneva hi idha paribhogūpakaraṇasaddena vuttāni. Tenevāha
tika-vin01t2:17_2: “ye hi tesaṃ upabhogā, yāni ca upabhogūpakaraṇāni, tāni mahantānī”ti. “Upabhogā hatthiassarathaitthīādayo,
tika-vin01t2:17_3: upabhogūpakaraṇāni tesameva suvaṇṇādiupakaraṇānī”tipi vadanti. Sārakānīti sārabhūtāni.
tika-vin01t2:17_4: Nidhetvāti nidahitvā, nidhānaṃ katvāti attho. Divasaparibbayasaṅkhātabhogamahantatāyāti
tika-vin01t2:17_5: divase divase paribhuñjitabbasaṅkhātabhogānaṃ mahantatāya. Jātarūparajatasseva pahūtatāyāti
tika-vin01t2:17_6: piṇḍapiṇḍavasena ceva suvaṇṇamāsakarajatamāsakādivasena ca jātarūparajatasseva pahūtatāya.
tika-vin01t2:17_7: Vittīti tuṭṭhi, vittiyā upakaraṇaṃ vittūpakaraṇaṃ, pahūtaṃ nānāvidhālaṅkārabhūtaṃ
tika-vin01t2:17_10: dhanassa sabbapubbaṇṇāparaṇṇasaṅgahitassa dhaññassa ca pahūtatāyāti attho. Tattha
tika-vin01t2:17_12: pubbaṇṇaṃ purakkhataṃ sassaphalanti katvā, tabbipariyāyato muggamāsādi aparaṇṇanti
tika-vin01t2:18_0: 31. Antojātatāya vā ñātisadisī dāsīti ñātidāsī. Pūtibhāveneva lakkhitabbadoso vā
tika-vin01t2:18_1: ābhidosiko, abhidosaṃ vā paccūsakālaṃ gato patto atikkantoti ābhidosiko. Tenāha “ekarattātikkantassa
tika-vin01t2:18_2: vā”tiādi. Pūtibhūtabhāvena paribhogaṃ nārahatīti aparibhogāraho. Chaḍḍanīyasabhāve
tika-vin01t2:18_3: nicchitepi pucchākāle sandehavohāravaseneva pucchituṃ yuttanti āha “sace”ti. Ariyavohārenāti
tika-vin01t2:18_4: ariyasamudācārena. Ariyā hi mātugāmaṃ bhaginivādena samudācaranti. Nissaṭṭhapariggahanti pariccattālayaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:19_0: “Ākirā”ti vuttattā “viññatti vā”ti vuttaṃ, “sace taṃ chaḍḍanīyadhamma”nti pariyāyaṃ
tika-vin01t2:19_1: amuñcitvā vuttattā “payuttavācā vā”ti vuttaṃ, paccayapaṭisaṃyuttā vācā payuttavācā.
tika-vin01t2:19_2: Vattuṃ vaṭṭatīti nirapekkhabhāvato vuttaṃ, idha pana visesato aparibhogārahattāva
tika-vin01t2:19_3: vatthuno. Aggaariyavaṃsikoti ariyavaṃsapaṭipattipūrakānaṃ aggo uttamo. Nimīyati saññāyatīti
tika-vin01t2:19_4: nimittaṃ, yathāsallakkhito ākāroti āha “gihikāle sallakkhitapubbaṃ ākāra”nti. Hatthapiṭṭhiādīni
tika-vin01t2:19_5: olokayamānā “sāmiputtassa me sudinnassa viya suvaṇṇakacchapapiṭṭhisadisā imā hatthapādapiṭṭhiyo,
tika-vin01t2:19_6: haritālavaṭṭiyo viya suvaṭṭitā aṅguliyo, madhuro saro”ti gihikāle sallakkhitapubbaṃ
tika-vin01t2:19_7: ākāraṃ aggahesi sañjāni sallakkhesi. Kasmā pana sā ñātidāsī disvāva na sañjānīti
tika-vin01t2:19_8: āha “sudinno hī”tiādi. Pabbajjupagatenāti pabbajjaṃ upagatena, pabbajitenāti attho.
tika-vin01t2:19_9: Gharaṃ pavisitvāti gehasāminiyā nisīditabbaṭṭhānabhūtaṃ antogehaṃ pavisitvā. Yaggheti
tika-vin01t2:19_10: imassa ārocayāmīti ayamatthoti āha “ārocanatthe nipāto”ti. “Yagghe jāneyyāsīti suṭṭhu
tika-vin01t2:19_11: jāneyyāsī”tipi atthaṃ vadanti. Ālapaneti dāsijanassa ālapane. Tenāha “evañhī”tiādi.
tika-vin01t2:20_0: 32. Gharesu sālā hontīti gharesu ekamante bhojanasālā honti pākāraparikkhittā susaṃvihitadvārabandhā
tika-vin01t2:20_1: susammaṭṭhavālikaṅgaṇā. Udakakañjiyanti udakañca kañjiyañca. Kasmā pana īdisāyameva
tika-vin01t2:20_2: sālāya aññataraṃ kuṭṭamūlanti ayamattho vuttoti āha “na hi pabbajitā”tiādi. Asāruppe
tika-vin01t2:20_3: ṭhāneti bhikkhūnaṃ ananucchavike padese. Atthi nu khoti nu-saddo pucchanatthe, kho-saddo
tika-vin01t2:20_4: vacanasiliṭṭhatāya vutto. Nukhoti vā nipātasamudāyo pucchanattho. Tena nāma-saddassa
tika-vin01t2:20_5: pucchanatthataṃ dasseti. Yesaṃ no tvanti yesaṃ no putto tvaṃ. Īdise ṭhāneti kiñcāpi
tika-vin01t2:20_6: taṃ ṭhānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ ananurūpaṃ na hoti, tathāpi mādisānaṃ mahābhogakulānaṃ puttassa
tika-vin01t2:20_7: parakule āsanasālāyaṃ nisīditvā bhojanaṃ nāma ayuttarūpanti maññamāno āha. Tenevāha
tika-vin01t2:20_8: “nanu nāma, tāta sudinna, sakaṃ gehaṃ gantabba”nti. Aññenapi pakārena nāmasaddassa
tika-vin01t2:20_9: pucchanatthatameva dassento āha “tathā atthi nu kho tātā”tiādi. Tathāti samuccayattho.
tika-vin01t2:20_10: Idāni nāmasaddassa maññanatthataṃ dassento āha “tathā atthi maññe”tiādi.
tika-vin01t2:21_0: Dukkhābhitunnatāyāti mānasikena dukkhena abhipīḷitattā. Etamatthanti “atthi nu kho,
tika-vin01t2:21_1: tāta sudinna, amhākaṃ dhana”ntiādinā yathāvuttamatthaṃ. Anokappanāmarisanatthavasenāti
tika-vin01t2:21_2: ettha anokappanaṃ asaddahanaṃ. Amarisanaṃ asahanaṃ. Anāgatavacanaṃ anāgatasaddappayogo,
tika-vin01t2:21_3: attho pana vattamānakālikova. Tenāha “paccakkhampī”ti. Na marisayāmīti na visahāmi.
tika-vin01t2:21_4: Taṃ na sundaranti “tadāya”nti pāṭhaṃ sandhāyāha. Alaṃ, gahapati, kataṃ me ajja bhattakiccanti
tika-vin01t2:21_5: thero ukkaṭṭhaekāsanikatāya paṭikkhipanto evamāha. Ukkaṭṭhaekāsanikatāyāti ca idaṃ
tika-vin01t2:21_6: bhūtakathanavasena vuttaṃ therassa tathābhāvadīpanatthaṃ. Mudukassapi hi ekāsanikassa
tika-vin01t2:21_7: yāya nisajjāya kiñcimattampi bhojanaṃ bhuttaṃ, vattasīsenapi tato vuṭṭhitassa puna
tika-vin01t2:21_8: bhuñjituṃ na vaṭṭati. Tenāha tipiṭakacūḷābhayatthero “āsanaṃ vā rakkheyya bhojanaṃ
tika-vin01t2:21_9: vā”ti. Ukkaṭṭhapiṇḍapātikopi samānoti nidassanamattamidaṃ, thero sapadānacārikesupi
tika-vin01t2:21_10: ukkaṭṭhoyeva. Ukkaṭṭhasapadānacārikopi hi purato ca pacchato ca āhaṭabhikkhampi aggahetvāva
tika-vin01t2:21_11: gharadvāre ṭhatvā pattavissajjanameva karoti, tasmā thero ukkaṭṭhasapadānacārikattāpi
tika-vin01t2:21_12: svātanāya bhikkhaṃ nādhivāseti. Atha kasmā “adhivāsesī”ti āha “sace ekabhattampi
tika-vin01t2:21_13: na gahessāmī”tiādi. Paṇḍitā hi mātāpitūnaṃ ācariyupajjhāyānaṃ vā kātabbaṃ anuggahaṃ
tika-vin01t2:22_0: 33. Majjhimappamāṇoti catuhattho puriso majjhimappamāṇo. “Chahattho”tipi keci. Tiro
tika-vin01t2:22_1: karonti etāyāti tirokaraṇīti sāṇipākāravacano ayaṃ tirokaraṇī-saddoti āha “tirokaraṇiyanti
tika-vin01t2:22_3: vuttaṃ. Tirokaraṇīya-saddo vā ayaṃ sāṇipākārapariyāyoti dassento āha “atha vā”tiādi.
tika-vin01t2:22_4: Taṃ parikkhipitvāti taṃ samantato khipitvā, parito bandhitvāti vuttaṃ hoti. Tenāha
tika-vin01t2:22_5: “samantato katvā”ti. Vibhattipatirūpakopi nipāto hotīti āha “tenāti ayampi vā”tiādi.
tika-vin01t2:23_0: 34. “Atha kho āyasmato sudinnassa pitā sake nivesane paṇītaṃ khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ
tika-vin01t2:23_1: paṭiyādāpetvā āyasmato sudinnassa kālaṃ ārocesi – ‘kālo, tāta sudinna, niṭṭhitaṃ
tika-vin01t2:23_2: bhatta’nti” evaṃ kālārocanassa pāḷiyaṃ anāruḷhattā āha – “kiñcāpi pāḷiyaṃ kālārocanaṃ
tika-vin01t2:23_3: na vutta”nti. Ārociteyeva kāleti “kālo, tāta sudinna, niṭṭhitaṃ bhatta”nti kāle ārociteyeva.
tika-vin01t2:24_0: Pettikanti pitito āgataṃ pettikaṃ. Nihitanti bhūmigataṃ. Payuttanti vaḍḍhivasena
tika-vin01t2:24_1: payojitaṃ. Taddhitalopaṃ katvā veditabbanti yathā aññatthāpi “pitāmahaṃ dhanaṃ laddhā,
tika-vin01t2:24_2: sukhaṃ jīvati sañjayo”ti vuttaṃ, evaṃ taddhitalopaṃ katvā vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Pitāmahato
tika-vin01t2:24_3: āgataṃ, pitāmahassa vā idaṃ petāmahaṃ. Pabbajitaliṅganti samaṇavesaṃ. Na rājabhītoti
tika-vin01t2:24_4: aparādhakāraṇā na rājakulā bhīto. Yesaṃ santakaṃ dhanaṃ gahitaṃ, te iṇāyikā. Palibuddho pīḷito.
tika-vin01t2:25_0: Vibhattipatirūpakoti “tenā”ti padaṃ sandhāyāha. Taṃnidānanti taṃ dhanaṃ nidānaṃ kāraṇamassāti
tika-vin01t2:25_1: taṃnidānaṃ. Assāti paccattavacanassa, padassa vā. Bhayanti cittassa utrastākārena
tika-vin01t2:25_2: pavattabhayaṃ adhippetaṃ, na ñāṇabhayaṃ, nāpi “bhāyati etasmā”ti evaṃ vuttaṃ ārammaṇabhayanti
tika-vin01t2:25_3: āha “cittutrāsoti attho”ti. Chambhitattanti teneva cittutrāsabhayena sakalasarīrassa
tika-vin01t2:25_4: chambhitabhāvo. Visesato pana hadayamaṃsacalananti āha “kāyakampo hadayamaṃsacalana”nti.
tika-vin01t2:25_5: Lomahaṃsoti tena bhayena tena chambhitattena sakalasarīralomānaṃ haṭṭhabhāvo, so
tika-vin01t2:25_6: pana nesaṃ bhittiyaṃ nāgadantānaṃ viya uddhaṃmukhatāti āha “lomānaṃ haṃsanaṃ uddhaggabhāvo”ti.
tika-vin01t2:26_0: 35. Attanāti paccatte karaṇavacanaṃ, sayanti attho. Devaccharānanti anaccantiyo sandhāyāha.
tika-vin01t2:26_1: Devanāṭakānanti naccantiyo, pariyāyavacanaṃ vā etaṃ devakaññānaṃ. Samuppannabalavasokā
tika-vin01t2:26_2: hutvāti ayaṃ loko nāma attānaṃva cinteti, tasmā sāpi “idāni ahaṃ anāthā jātā”ti attānaṃva
tika-vin01t2:26_3: cintayamānā “ayaṃ ajja āgamissati, ajja āgamissatī”ti aṭṭha vassāni bahi na nikkhantā
tika-vin01t2:26_4: etaṃ nissāya mayā dārakopi na laddho, yassa ānubhāvena jīveyyāmi, ito cāmhi parihīnā
tika-vin01t2:26_5: aññato cāti samuppannabalavasokā hutvā. Kularukkhapatiṭṭhāpane bījasadisattā kulavaṃsappatiṭṭhāpako
tika-vin01t2:26_6: putto idha bījakoti adhippetoti āha “kulavaṃsabījakaṃ ekaṃ putta”nti. Saṃ nāma dhanaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:26_7: tassa patīti saṃpati, dhanavā vibhavasampanno. Diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikahitāvahattā
tika-vin01t2:26_8: tassa hitanti sāpateyyaṃ, tadeva dhanaṃ vibhavoti āha – “imaṃ sāpateyyaṃ evaṃ mahantaṃ
tika-vin01t2:27_0: 36. Itthīnaṃ kumārībhāvappattito paṭṭhāya pacchimavayato oraṃ asati vibandhe aṭṭhame
tika-vin01t2:27_1: aṭṭhame sattāhe gabbhāsayasaññite tatiye āvatte katipayā lohitapīḷakā saṇṭhahitvā
tika-vin01t2:27_2: aggahitapubbā eva bhijjanti, tato lohitaṃ paggharati, tattha utusamaññā pupphasamaññā
tika-vin01t2:27_3: cāti āha – “pupphanti utukāle uppannalohitassa nāma”nti. Gabbhapatiṭṭhānaṭṭhāneti
tika-vin01t2:27_4: yasmiṃ okāse dārako nibbattati, tasmiṃ padese. Saṇṭhahitvāti nibbattitvā. Bhijjantīti
tika-vin01t2:27_5: aggahitapubbā eva bhijjanti. Ayañhi tāsaṃ sabhāvo. Dosenāti lohitamalena. Suddhe
tika-vin01t2:27_6: vatthumhīti paggharitalohitattā anāmayattā ca nahānato paraṃ catutthadivasato paṭṭhāya
tika-vin01t2:27_7: suddhe gabbhāsaye. Suddhe pana vatthumhi mātāpitūsu ekavāraṃ sannipatitesu yāva satta
tika-vin01t2:27_8: divasāni khettameva hoti gabbhasaṇṭhahanassa parittassa lohitalepassa vijjamānattā.
tika-vin01t2:27_9: Keci pana “aḍḍhamāsamattampi khettamevā”ti vadanti. Bāhāyanti adhikaraṇe bhummanti
tika-vin01t2:27_10: āha “purāṇadutiyikāya yā bāhā, tatra naṃ gahetvā”ti. Upayogatthe bhummavacanampi
tika-vin01t2:28_0: Pubbepi paññattasikkhāpadānaṃ sabbhāvato apaññatte sikkhāpadeti pārājikaṃ sandhāya
tika-vin01t2:28_2: āha – “bhagavato kira paṭhamabodhiya”ntiādi. Evarūpanti pārājikapaññattiyā anurūpaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:28_3: Nidassanamattañcetaṃ, saṅghādisesapaññattiyā anurūpampi ajjhācāraṃ nākaṃsuyeva. Tenevāha
tika-vin01t2:28_4: – “avasese pañca khuddakāpattikkhandhe eva paññapesī”ti. Idañca thullaccayādīnaṃ
tika-vin01t2:28_5: pañcannaṃ lahukāpattikkhandhānaṃ sabbhāvamattaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, na pañcāpattikkhandhānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:28_6: anavasesato paññattattāva. Paṭhamabodhiyaṃ pañcannaṃ lahukāpattīnaṃ sabbhāvavacaneneva
tika-vin01t2:28_8: ca hetubhūtāti daṭṭhabbā. Keci pana “tasmiṃ tasmiṃ pana vatthusmiṃ avasesapañcakhuddakāpattikkhandhe
tika-vin01t2:28_9: eva paññapesīti idaṃ dvādasame vasse verañjāyaṃ vutthavassena bhagavatā tato paṭṭhāya
tika-vin01t2:28_10: aṭṭhavassabbhantare paññattasikkhāpadaṃ sandhāya vutta”nti vadanti, taṃ na sundaraṃ
tika-vin01t2:28_11: tato pubbepi sikkhāpadapaññattiyā sabbhāvato. Teneva verañjakaṇḍe “ekabhikkhunāpi
tika-vin01t2:28_12: ratticchedo vā pacchimikāya tattha vassaṃ upagacchāmāti vassacchedo vā na kato”ti
tika-vin01t2:28_13: ca “sāmampi pacanaṃ samaṇasāruppaṃ na hoti, na ca vaṭṭatī”ti ca vuttaṃ. Ārādhayiṃsūti
tika-vin01t2:28_14: cittaṃ gaṇhiṃsu, ajjhāsayaṃ pūrayiṃsu, hadayagāhiniṃ paṭipattiṃ paṭipajjiṃsūti attho.
tika-vin01t2:28_15: Ekaṃ samayanti ekasmiṃ samaye, paṭhamabodhiyanti attho.
tika-vin01t2:29_0: Yaṃ ādīnavanti sambandho. Sikkhāpadaṃ paññapentoti paṭhamapārājikasikkhāpadaṃ paññapento.
tika-vin01t2:29_1: Ādīnavaṃ dassessatīti “varaṃ te, moghapurisa, āsīvisassa ghoravisassa mukhe aṅgajātaṃ
tika-vin01t2:29_2: pakkhittaṃ, na tveva mātugāmassa aṅgajāte aṅgajātaṃ pakkhitta”ntiādinā yaṃ ādīnavaṃ
tika-vin01t2:29_3: dassessati. Abhiviññāpesīti imassa “pavattesī”ti ayamattho kathaṃ laddhoti āha “pavattanāpi
tika-vin01t2:29_4: hī”tiādi. Kāyaviññatticopanatoti kāyaviññattivasena pavattacalanato. Kasmā panesa
tika-vin01t2:29_5: methunadhammena anatthikopi samāno tikkhattuṃ abhiviññāpesīti āha – “tikkhattuṃ abhiviññāpanañcesā”tiādi.
tika-vin01t2:29_6: Tattha tikkhattuṃ abhiviññāpananti muttipāpanavasena tīsu vāresu methunadhammassa pavattanaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:30: Sabbesampi padānaṃ avadhāraṇaphalattā vināpi evakāraṃ avadhāraṇattho viññāyatīti āha “teneva ajjhācārenā”ti. Aṭṭha hi gabbhakāraṇāni. Vuttañhetaṃ –
tika-vin01t2:33_0: Idāni avadhāraṇena nivattitamatthaṃ dassetukāmo āha – “kiṃ pana aññathāpi gabbhaggahaṇaṃ
tika-vin01t2:33_1: hotī”tiādi. Nanu ca nābhiparāmasanampi kāyasaṃsaggoyeva, kasmā naṃ visuṃ vuttanti?
tika-vin01t2:33_2: Ubhayesaṃ chandarāgavasena kāyasaṃsaggo vutto, itthiyā chandarāgavasena nābhiparāmasanaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:33_3: vatthuvasena vā taṃ visuṃ vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Kathaṃ pana kāyasaṃsaggena gabbhaggahaṇaṃ
tika-vin01t2:33_4: hoti, kathañca tattha sukkasoṇitassa sambhavoti āha “itthiyo hī”tiādi. Chandarāguppattivasena
tika-vin01t2:33_5: itthiyā sukkakoṭṭhāso calito hoti, sopi gabbhasaṇṭhānassa paccayo hotīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin01t2:33_7: sādiyantiyopi gabbhaṃ gaṇhantī”ti. Gaṇṭhipadesu pana “kāyasaṃsaggādinā sattappakārena
tika-vin01t2:33_8: gabbhaggahaṇe pitu sukkakoṭṭhāsaṃ vinā chandarāgavasena mātu vikārappattaṃ lohitameva
tika-vin01t2:33_9: gabbhasaṇṭhānassa paccayo hotī”ti vuttaṃ. “Yassa aṅgapaccaṅgaparāmasanaṃ sādiyitvā
tika-vin01t2:33_10: mātā puttaṃ paṭilabhati, sace so aparena samayena paripuṇṇindriyo hutvā tādisaṃ pitaraṃ
tika-vin01t2:33_11: manussajātikaṃ jīvitā voropeti, pitughātakova hotī”ti vadanti.
tika-vin01t2:34_0: Taṃ asuciṃ ekadesaṃ mukhena aggahesīti purāṇacīvaraṃ dhovantī tattha yaṃ asuciṃ addasa,
tika-vin01t2:34_1: taṃ asuciṃ ekadesaṃ pivi. “Vaṭṭati tumhākaṃ methunadhammo”ti puṭṭho “kappatu vā mā
tika-vin01t2:34_2: vā kappatu, mayaṃ tena anatthikā”ti dassento āha “anatthikā mayaṃ etenā”ti. Kiñcāpi
tika-vin01t2:34_3: nābhiparāmasane methunarāgo natthi, tathāpi nābhiparāmasanakāle phassasādiyanavasena
tika-vin01t2:34_4: assādamattaṃ tassā ahosīti gahetabbaṃ, aññathā gabbhasaṇṭhahanaṃ na siyā. Diṭṭhamaṅgalikāya
tika-vin01t2:34_5: nābhiparāmasanena maṇḍabyassa nibbatti ahosi, caṇḍapajjotamātu nābhiyaṃ vicchikā
tika-vin01t2:34_6: pharitvā gatā, tena caṇḍapajjotassa nibbatti ahosīti āha “eteneva nayenā”tiādi. Purisaṃ
tika-vin01t2:34_7: upanijjhāyatīti vātapānādinā disvā vā diṭṭhapubbaṃ vā purisaṃ upanijjhāyati. Rājorodhā
tika-vin01t2:34_8: viyāti sīhaḷadīpe kira ekissā itthiyā tathā ahosi, tasmā evaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:35_0: Idhāti imasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ. Ayanti sudinnassa purāṇadutiyikā. Yaṃ sandhāyāti yaṃ ajjhācāraṃ
tika-vin01t2:35_1: sandhāya. Sukkaṃ sandhāya “mātāpitaro ca sannipatitā hontī”ti vuttaṃ, mātā ca utunī
tika-vin01t2:35_2: hotīti lohitaṃ sandhāya. Tattha sannipatitā hontīti asaddhammavasena ekasmiṃ ṭhāne
tika-vin01t2:35_3: samāgatā saṅgatā honti. Mātā ca utunī hotīti idaṃ utusamayaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, na
tika-vin01t2:35_5: vuttaṃ hoti. Ta-kārassa dha-kāro katoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Atha vā gandhanato uppajjanagatiyā
tika-vin01t2:35_6: nimittupaṭṭhānena sūcanato dīpanato gandhoti laddhanāmena bhavagāmikammunā abbati
tika-vin01t2:35_7: pavattatīti gandhabbo, tattha uppajjanakasatto. Paccupaṭṭhito hotīti upagato hoti.
tika-vin01t2:35_8: Ettha ca na mātāpitūnaṃ sannipātaṃ olokayamāno samīpe ṭhito nāma hoti, kammayantayantito
tika-vin01t2:35_9: pana eko satto tasmiṃ okāse nibbattanako purimajātiyaṃ ṭhitoyeva gatinimittādiārammaṇakaraṇavasena
tika-vin01t2:36_0: Sannipātāti samodhānena samāgamena. Gabbhassāti gabbhe nibbattanakasattassa. Gabbhe
tika-vin01t2:36_1: nibbattanakasattopi hi gabbhoti vuccati. Yathāha – “yathā kho panānanda, aññā itthikā
tika-vin01t2:36_2: nava vā dasa vā māse gabbhaṃ kucchinā pariharitvā vijāyantī”ti. Katthaci pana gabbhoti
tika-vin01t2:38: Abbhuṭṭhitova so yāti, sa gacchaṃ na nivattatī”ti. ; –
tika-vin01t2:39_0: Ettha ca gabbhati attabhāvabhāvena pavattatīti gabbho, kalalādiavattho dhammappabandho,
tika-vin01t2:39_1: taṃnissitattā pana sattasantāno “gabbho”ti vutto yathā “mañcā ukkuṭṭhiṃ karontī”ti.
tika-vin01t2:39_2: Taṃnissayabhāvato mātukucchi “gabbho”ti veditabbo. Gabbho viyāti vā. Yathā hi nivāsaṭṭhānatāya
tika-vin01t2:39_3: sattānaṃ ovarako “gabbho”ti vuccati, evaṃ gabbhaseyyakānaṃ sattānaṃ yāva abhijāti
tika-vin01t2:39_4: nivāsaṭṭhānatāya mātukucchi “gabbho”ti vuttoti veditabbo. Avakkanti hotīti nibbatti hoti.
tika-vin01t2:40_0: Ārakkhadevatāti tassa ārakkhatthāya ṭhitā devatā. Assa taṃ ajjhācāranti sambandho.
tika-vin01t2:40_1: Tathā nicchāresunti tathā mahantaṃ saddaṃ katvā nicchāresuṃ. Kiñcāpi idha pāḷiyaṃ
tika-vin01t2:40_2: ākāsaṭṭhadevatā visuṃ na āgatā, tathāpi saddassa anussāvane ayamanukkamoti dassetuṃ
tika-vin01t2:40_3: cātumahārājikadevatāyo dvidhā katvā ākāsaṭṭhadevatā visuṃ vuttā. Tenettha ākāsaṭṭhakānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:40_4: visuṃ gahitattā cātumahārājikāti paribhaṇḍapabbataṭṭhakā veditabbā. Itihāti nipātasamudāyo
tika-vin01t2:40_5: evaṃsaddassa atthe daṭṭhabboti āha “eva”nti. Khaṇena muhuttenāti padadvayaṃ vevacanabhāvato
tika-vin01t2:40_7: Kiñcāpi hi so saddo yāva brahmalokā abbhuggacchi, tathāpi na so manussānaṃ visayo
tika-vin01t2:40_8: tesaṃ rūpaṃ viya, teneva bhikkhū pucchiṃsu – “kacci no tvaṃ, āvuso sudinna, anabhirato”ti.
tika-vin01t2:41_0: 37. “Evaṃ mātāputtānaṃ pabbajjā saphalā ahosi, pitā pana vippaṭisārābhibhūto vihāsī”ti
tika-vin01t2:41_1: vacanato sudinnassa tasmiṃ attabhāve arahattādhigamo nāhosīti viññāyati. Keci pana
tika-vin01t2:41_2: “pubbekatapuññatāya codiyamānassa bhabbakulaputtassāti vuttattā sudinno taṃ kukkuccaṃ
tika-vin01t2:41_3: vinodetvā arahattaṃ sacchākāsi, teneva pabbajjā anuññātā”ti vadanti. Taṃ pāḷiyā aṭṭhakathāya
tika-vin01t2:41_4: ca na sameti. Pubbekatapuññatā ca appamāṇaṃ tādisassapi antarākatapāpakammassa vasena
tika-vin01t2:41_5: ajātasattuno viya adhigamantarāyadassanato. Katākatānusocanalakkhaṇaṃ kukkuccaṃ idhādhippetanti
tika-vin01t2:41_6: āha “ajjhācārahetuko pacchānutāpo”ti. Kataṃ ajjhācāraṃ paṭicca anusocanavasena virūpaṃ
tika-vin01t2:41_7: saraṇaṃ cintanaṃ vippaṭisāroti āha “vippaṭisārotipi tasseva nāma”nti. Kucchitaṃ kataṃ
tika-vin01t2:41_8: kiriyāti kukataṃ, kukatameva kukkuccanti āha “kucchitakiriyābhāvato kukkucca”nti.
tika-vin01t2:41_10: abyāvaṭoti attho. Vahacchinnoti chinnavaho, bhāravahanena chinnakkhandhoti vuttaṃ
tika-vin01t2:41_11: hoti. Taṃ taṃ cintayīti “yadi ahaṃ taṃ pāpaṃ na karissaṃ, ime bhikkhū viya paripuṇṇasīlo
tika-vin01t2:42_1: sannipatanaṃ gaṇasaṅgaṇikā, gaṇasaṅgaṇikāyeva papañco gaṇasaṅgaṇikāpapañco, tena.
tika-vin01t2:42_2: Yassāti ye assa. Kathāphāsukāti vissāsikabhāveneva kathākaraṇe phāsukā, sukhena vattuṃ
tika-vin01t2:42_3: sakkuṇeyyā, sukhasambhāsāti attho. Pasādassa pamāṇato ūnādhikattaṃ sabbadā sabbesaṃ
tika-vin01t2:42_4: natthīti āha “pasādapatiṭṭhānokāsassa sampuṇṇattā”ti. Dānīti imasmiṃ atthe etarahi-saddo
tika-vin01t2:42_5: atthīti āha “dānīti nipāto”ti. No-saddopi nu-saddo viya pucchanatthoti āha “kacci
tika-vin01t2:42_6: nu tva”nti. Tameva anabhiratinti tehi bhikkhūhi pucchitaṃ tameva gihibhāvapatthanākāraṃ
tika-vin01t2:42_8: Adhikusalā dhammā samathavipassanādayo. Atthīti visayabhāvena citte parivattanaṃ
tika-vin01t2:42_9: sandhāya vuttaṃ, na pāpassa vattamānataṃ sandhāya, atthi visayabhāvena citte parivattatīti
tika-vin01t2:42_10: vuttaṃ hoti. Tenāha – “niccakālaṃ abhimukhaṃ viya me tiṭṭhatī”ti.
tika-vin01t2:43_0: Yaṃ tvanti ettha yanti hetuatthe nipāto, karaṇatthe vā paccattavacananti āha “yena
tika-vin01t2:43_1: pāpenā”ti. Anekapariyāyenāti ettha pariyāya-saddo kāraṇavacanoti āha “anekakāraṇenā”ti.
tika-vin01t2:43_2: Virāgatthāyāti bhavabhogesu virajjanatthāya. No rāgena rajjanatthāyāti bhavabhogesuyeva
tika-vin01t2:43_3: rāgena arañjanatthāya. Tenāha “bhagavatā hī”tiādi. Esa nayo sabbapadesūti adhippāyikamattaṃ
tika-vin01t2:43_6: sandhāya vadati. Na saṃyujjanatthāyāti kilesehi na saṃyujjanatthāya. Aggahaṇatthāyāti
tika-vin01t2:43_7: kilese aggahaṇatthāya, bhavabhoge vā taṇhādiṭṭhivasena aggahaṇatthāya. Na saṅgahaṇatthāyāti
tika-vin01t2:44_0: Nibbattitalokuttaranibbānamevāti saṅkhārehi nikkhantaṃ vivittaṃ, tatoyeva lokato
tika-vin01t2:44_1: uttiṇṇattā lokuttaraṃ nibbānaṃ. Madanimmadanāyāti vāti ettha avuttasamuccayatthena
tika-vin01t2:44_2: vā-saddena ādiatthena iti-saddena vā “pipāsavinayāyā”tiādi sabbaṃ saṅgahitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:44_3: Nibbānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā pavattamānena ariyamaggena pahīyamānā rāgamānamadādayo taṃ
tika-vin01t2:44_4: patvā pahīyanti nāmāti āha “yasmā pana taṃ āgammā”tiādi. Tattha taṃ āgammāti nibbānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:44_5: āgamma paṭicca ariyamaggassa ārammaṇapaccayabhāvahetu. Mānamadapurisamadādayoti ettha
tika-vin01t2:44_7: madoti mānamado. Purisamado vuccati purisamāno, “ahaṃ puriso”ti uppajjanakamāno.
tika-vin01t2:44_8: “Asaddhammasevanasamatthataṃ nissāya pavatto māno, rāgo eva vā purisamado”ti keci.
tika-vin01t2:44_9: Ādi-saddena balamadayobbanamadādiṃ saṅgaṇhāti. Mahāgaṇṭhipade pana majjhimagaṇṭhipade
tika-vin01t2:44_10: ca “purisamado nāma sambhavo”ti vuttaṃ, taṃ idha yuttaṃ viya na dissati. Na hi “bhagavatā
tika-vin01t2:44_11: sambhavassa vināsāya dhammo desito”ti vattuṃ vaṭṭati. Nimmadāti vigatamadabhāvā.
tika-vin01t2:44_12: Imameva hi atthaṃ dassetuṃ “amadā”ti vuttaṃ. Madā nimmadīyanti ettha amadabhāvaṃ
tika-vin01t2:44_13: vināsaṃ gacchantīti madanimmadano. Esa nayo sesapadesupi.
tika-vin01t2:45_0: Kāmapipāsāti kāmānaṃ pātukamyatā, kāmataṇhāti attho. Ālīyanti abhiramitabbaṭṭhena
tika-vin01t2:45_1: sevīyantīti ālayā, pañca kāmaguṇāti āha “pañca kāmaguṇālayā”ti. Pañcasu hi kāmaguṇesu
tika-vin01t2:45_2: chandarāgappahāneneva pañca kāmaguṇāpi pahīnā nāma honti, teneva “yo, bhikkhave,
tika-vin01t2:45_3: rūpesu chandarāgo”tiādi vuttaṃ. Pañcakāmaguṇesu vā ālayā pañcakāmaguṇālayā. Ālīyanti
tika-vin01t2:45_4: allīyanti abhiramanavasena sevantīti ālayāti hi taṇhāvicaritānaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Tebhūmakavaṭṭanti
tika-vin01t2:45_5: tīsu bhūmīsu kammakilesavipākā vaṭṭanaṭṭhena vaṭṭaṃ. Virajjatīti palujjati. “Virajjatīti
tika-vin01t2:45_6: kāmavināso vutto, nirujjhatīti ekappahārena vināso”ti gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ. Virāgo
tika-vin01t2:45_7: nirodhoti sāmaññacodanāyapi “taṇhākkhayo”ti adhikatattā taṇhāya eva virajjanaṃ nirujjhanañca vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:46_0: Catasso yoniyoti ettha yonīti khandhakoṭṭhāsassapi kāraṇassapi passāvamaggassapi
tika-vin01t2:46_1: nāmaṃ. “Catasso nāgayoniyo catasso supaṇṇayoniyo”ti ettha hi khandhakoṭṭhāso yoni
tika-vin01t2:46_2: nāma. “Yoni hesā bhūmija phalassa adhigamāyā”ti ettha kāraṇaṃ. “Na cāhaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ
tika-vin01t2:46_3: brūmi, yonijaṃ mattisambhava”nti ettha passāvamaggo. Idha pana khandhakoṭṭhāso “yonī”ti
tika-vin01t2:46_4: adhippeto. Yavanti tāya sattā amissitāpi samānajātitāya missitā hontīti yoni. Sā
tika-vin01t2:46_5: pana atthato aṇḍādiuppattiṭṭhānavisiṭṭho khandhānaṃ bhāgaso pavattiviseso, sā ca
tika-vin01t2:46_7: sāriputta, yoniyo. Katamā catasso? Aṇḍajā yoni jalābujā yoni saṃsedajā yoni opapātikā yonī”ti.
tika-vin01t2:47_0: Tattha aṇḍe jātā aṇḍajā. Jalābumhi jātā jalābujā. Saṃsede jātā saṃsedajā. Vinā etehi
tika-vin01t2:47_1: kāraṇehi uppatitvā viya nibbattāti opapātikā. Ettha ca petaloke tiracchāne manussesu
tika-vin01t2:47_2: ca aṇḍajādayo catassopi yoniyo sambhavanti, manussesu panettha kecideva opapātikā
tika-vin01t2:47_3: honti mahāpadumakumārādayo viya. Aṇḍajāpi kontaputtā dvebhātiyatherā viya, saṃsedajāpi
tika-vin01t2:47_5: yebhuyyena pana manussā jalābujāva. Petesupi nijjhāmataṇhikapetānaṃ niccadukkhāturatāya
tika-vin01t2:47_6: kāmasevanā natthi, tasmā te gabbhaseyyakā na honti. Jālāvantatāya na tāsaṃ kucchiyaṃ
tika-vin01t2:47_7: gabbho saṇṭhāti, tasmā te opapātikāyeva saṃsedajatāyapi asambhavato, avasesapetā
tika-vin01t2:47_8: pana catuyonikāpi honti. Yathā ca te, evaṃ yakkhāpi sabbacatuppadapakkhijātidīghajātiādayopi
tika-vin01t2:47_9: sabbe catuyonikāyeva. Sabbe nerayikā ca catumahārājikato paṭṭhāya uparidevā ca opapātikāyeva,
tika-vin01t2:47_10: bhummadevā pana catuyonikāva honti. Tattha devamanussesu saṃsedajaopapātikānaṃ ayaṃ
tika-vin01t2:47_11: viseso – saṃsedajā mandā daharā hutvā nibbattanti, opapātikā soḷasavassuddesikā hutvā.
tika-vin01t2:48_0: Pañca gatiyoti ettha sukatadukkaṭakammavasena gantabbā upapajjitabbāti gatiyo. Yathā
tika-vin01t2:48_1: hi kammabhavo paramatthato asatipi kārake paccayasāmaggiyā siddho, taṃsamaṅginā santānalakkhaṇena
tika-vin01t2:48_2: sattena katoti voharīyati, evaṃ upapattibhavalakkhaṇagatiyo paramatthato asatipi
tika-vin01t2:48_3: gamake taṃtaṃkammavasena yesaṃ tāni kammāni tehi gantabbāti voharīyanti. Apica gatigati
tika-vin01t2:48_4: nibbattigati ajjhāsayagati vibhavagati nipphattigatīti bahuvidhā gati nāma. Tattha
tika-vin01t2:48_5: “taṃ gatiṃ pecca gacchāmī”ti ca “yassa gatiṃ na jānanti, devā gandhabbamānusā”ti
tika-vin01t2:48_6: ca ayaṃ gatigati nāma. “Imesaṃ kho panāhaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ sīlavantānaṃ neva jānāmi āgatiṃ
tika-vin01t2:48_7: vā gatiṃ vā”ti ayaṃ nibbattigati nāma. “Evampi kho te ahaṃ brahme gatiñca pajānāmi
tika-vin01t2:48_8: cutiñca pajānāmī”ti ayaṃ ajjhāsayagati nāma. “Vibhavo gati dhammānaṃ, nibbānaṃ arahato
tika-vin01t2:48_9: gatī”ti ayaṃ vibhavagati nāma. “Dveyeva gatiyo sambhavanti anaññā”ti ayaṃ nipphattigati
tika-vin01t2:48_10: nāma. Tāsu idha gatigati adhippetā, sā pana nirayatiracchānayonipettivisayamanaussadevānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:48_11: vasena pañcavidhā hoti. Vuttañhetaṃ – “pañca kho imā, sāriputta, gatiyo. Katamā pañca?
tika-vin01t2:49_0: Tattha yassa uppajjati, taṃ brūhentoyeva uppajjatīti ayo, sukhaṃ. Natthi ettha ayoti
tika-vin01t2:49_1: nirayo, tato eva ramitabbaṃ assādetabbaṃ tattha natthīti niratiatthena nirassādaṭṭhena
tika-vin01t2:49_2: ca nirayoti vuccati. Tiriyaṃ añcitāti tiracchānā, devamanussādayo viya uddhaṃ dīghā
tika-vin01t2:49_3: ahutvā tiriyaṃ dīghāti attho. Pakaṭṭhato sukhato ayanaṃ apagamo peccabhāvo, taṃ peccabhāvaṃ
tika-vin01t2:49_4: pattānaṃ visayoti pettivisayo, petayoni. Manassa ussannatāya manussā, satisūrabhāvabrahmacariyayogyatādiguṇavasena
tika-vin01t2:49_5: upacitamānasatāya ukkaṭṭhaguṇacittatāya manussāti vuttaṃ hoti, ayaṃ panattho nippariyāyato
tika-vin01t2:49_6: jambudīpavāsīvasena veditabbo. Yathāha – “tīhi, bhikkhave, ṭhānehi jambudīpakā manussā
tika-vin01t2:49_7: uttarakuruke ca manusse adhiggaṇhanti deve ca tāvatiṃse. Katamehi tīhi? Sūrā satimanto
tika-vin01t2:49_8: idha brahmacariyavāso”ti. Tathā hi buddhā ca bhagavanto paccekabuddhā aggasāvakā
tika-vin01t2:49_9: mahāsāvakā cakkavattino aññe ca mahānubhāvā sattā tattheva uppajjanti, tehi samānarūpāditāya
tika-vin01t2:49_10: pana saddhiṃ parittadīpavāsīhi itaramahādīpavāsinopi manussātveva paññāyiṃsu.
tika-vin01t2:50_0: Apare pana bhaṇanti “lobhādīhi alobhādīhi ca sahitassa manassa ussannatāya manussā.
tika-vin01t2:50_1: Ye hi sattā manussajātikā, tesu visesato lobhādayo alobhādayo ca ussannā. Te lobhādiussannatāya
tika-vin01t2:50_2: apāyamaggaṃ, alobhādiussannatāya sugatimaggaṃ nibbānagāmimaggañca paripūrenti, tasmā
tika-vin01t2:50_3: lobhādīhi alobhādīhi ca sahitassa manassa ussannatāya parittadīpavāsīhi saddhiṃ catumahādīpavāsino
tika-vin01t2:50_4: sattavisesā manussāti vuccantī”ti. Lokiyā pana “manuno apaccabhāvena manussā”ti vadanti.
tika-vin01t2:50_5: Manu nāma paṭhamakappiko lokamariyādāya ādibhūto sattānaṃ hitāhitavidhāyako kattabbākattabbatāvasena
tika-vin01t2:50_6: pituṭṭhāniyo, yo sāsane mahāsammatoti vuccati amhākaṃ bodhisatto, paccakkhato paramparāya
tika-vin01t2:50_7: ca tassa ovādānusāsaniyaṃ ṭhitā sattā puttasadisatāya “manussā, mānusā”ti ca vuccanti.
tika-vin01t2:50_8: Tato eva hi te “mānavā manujā”ti ca voharīyanti.
tika-vin01t2:51_0: Pañcahi kāmaguṇehi attano attano devānubhāvasaṅkhātehi iddhivisesehi ca dibbanti
tika-vin01t2:51_1: kīḷanti laḷanti jotantīti devā. Tattha kāmadevā kāmaguṇehi ceva iddhivisesehi ca,
tika-vin01t2:51_2: itare iddhiviseseheva dibbantīti veditabbā. Saraṇanti vā gamiyanti abhitthavīyantīti
tika-vin01t2:51_3: vā devā. Ettha ca nirayagatidevagatimanussagatīhi saddhiṃ okāsena khandhā vuttā.
tika-vin01t2:51_4: Tiracchānayonipettivisayaggahaṇena khandhānaṃ eva gahaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ tesaṃ tādisassa
tika-vin01t2:51_5: paricchinnassa okāsassa abhāvato. Yattha yattha vā te araññasamuddapabbatapādādike
tika-vin01t2:51_6: nibaddhavāsaṃ vasanti, tādisassa ṭhānassa vasena okāsopi gahetabbo. Satta viññāṇaṭṭhitiyo
tika-vin01t2:51_7: nava sattāvāsā ca heṭṭhā saṃvaṇṇitanayā eva. Aparāparabhāvāyāti aparāparaṃ yoniādito
tika-vin01t2:51_8: yoniādibhāvāya. Ābandhanaṃ gaṇṭhikaraṇaṃ, saṃsibbanaṃ tunnakaraṇaṃ. Taṇhāya nikkhantaṃ
tika-vin01t2:51_9: tattha tassā sabbaso abhāvato, nikkhamanañcassa taṇhāya visaṃyogo evāti āha “visaṃyutta”nti.
tika-vin01t2:52_0: Kāmānaṃ pahānanti ettha kāmaggahaṇena kāmīyatīti kāmo, kāmetīti kāmoti duvidhassapi
tika-vin01t2:52_1: kāmassa saṅgaho katoti āha “vatthukāmānaṃ kilesakāmānañca pahāna”nti. Vatthukāmappahānañcettha
tika-vin01t2:52_2: tesu chandarāgappahānenāti veditabbaṃ. Kāmasaññānanti kāmesu, kāmasahagatānaṃ vā
tika-vin01t2:52_3: saññānaṃ. Pariññāti tividhāpi pariññā idhādhippetāti āha “ñātatīraṇapahānavasena
tika-vin01t2:52_4: tividhā pariññā”ti. Tattha katamā ñātapariññā? Sabbaṃ tebhūmakaṃ nāmarūpaṃ “idaṃ
tika-vin01t2:52_5: rūpaṃ, ettakaṃ rūpaṃ, na ito bhiyyo, idaṃ nāmaṃ, ettakaṃ nāmaṃ, na ito bhiyyo”ti
tika-vin01t2:52_7: vavatthapeti, kammāvijjādikañcassa paccayaṃ pariggaṇhāti, ayaṃ ñātapariññā.
tika-vin01t2:53_0: Katamā tīraṇapariññā? Evaṃ ñātaṃ katvā taṃ sabbaṃ tīreti aniccato dukkhato rogatoti
tika-vin01t2:53_1: dvācattālīsāya ākārehi, ayaṃ tīraṇapariññā nāma. Katamā pahānapariññā? Evaṃ tīrayitvā
tika-vin01t2:53_2: aggamaggena sabbasmiṃ chandarāgaṃ pajahati, ayaṃ pahānapariññā. Diṭṭhivisuddhikaṅkhāvitaraṇavisuddhiyo
tika-vin01t2:53_4: vā paññā tīraṇapariññā, ariyamagge ñāṇaṃ nippariyāyena pahānapariññā. Idha pana kāmasaññānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:53_6: kiccanipphattiyā maggeneva ijjhanato maggakkhaṇaṃyeva sandhāya tividhāpi pariññā
tika-vin01t2:53_7: vuttā. Teneva “imesu pañcasu ṭhānesu kilesakkhayakaro lokuttaramaggova kathito”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:54_0: Kāmesu, kāme vā pātumicchā kāmapipāsāti āha – “kāmesu pātabyatānaṃ, kāme vā pātumicchāna”nti.
tika-vin01t2:54_1: Imesu pañcasu ṭhānesūti “kāmānaṃ pahānaṃ akkhāta”ntiādinā vuttesu pañcasu ṭhānesu.
tika-vin01t2:54_2: Tīsu ṭhānesūti “virāgāya dhammo desito, no sarāgāya, visaṃyogāya dhammo desito, no
tika-vin01t2:54_3: saṃyogāya, anupādānāya dhammo desito, no saupādānāyā”ti evaṃ vuttesu ṭhānesu. Vippaṭisāraṃ
tika-vin01t2:54_4: karotīti evaṃ taṃ pāpaṃ vippaṭisāraṃ uppādeti. Kīdisaṃ vippaṭisāraṃ karotīti āha
tika-vin01t2:55_0: 39. Neva piyakamyatāyāti attani satthu neva piyabhāvakāmatāya. Na bhedapurekkhāratāyāti
tika-vin01t2:55_1: na satthu tena bhikkhunā bhedanādhippāyapurekkhāratāya. Na kalisāsanāropanatthāyāti
tika-vin01t2:55_2: na dosāropanatthāya. Kalīti kodhassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ, tassa sāsanaṃ kalisāsanaṃ, kodhavasena
tika-vin01t2:55_3: vuccamāno garahadoso. Velanti sikkhāpadavelaṃ. Mariyādanti tasseva vevacanaṃ. Sikkhāpadañhi
tika-vin01t2:56_1: ettha pa-saddo ārambhavacanoti āha “kattuṃ ārabhatī”ti. Katthaci upasaggo dhātuatthameva
tika-vin01t2:56_2: vadati, na visesatthajotakoti āha “karotiyeva vā”ti. Jātiyāti khattiyādijātiyā. Gottenāti
tika-vin01t2:56_4: puttabhāvena. Yasassīti mahāparivāro. Pesalanti piyasīlaṃ. Avikampamānenāti paṭighānunayehi
tika-vin01t2:56_5: akampamānena. Yassa tasmiṃ attabhāve uppajjanārahānaṃ maggaphalānaṃ upanissayo natthi,
tika-vin01t2:56_6: taṃ buddhā “moghapurisā”ti vadanti ariṭṭhalāḷudāyīādike viya. Upanissaye satipi tasmiṃ
tika-vin01t2:56_7: khaṇe magge vā phale vā asati “moghapurisā”ti vadantiyeva dhaniyaupasenattherādike
tika-vin01t2:56_8: viya. Sudinnassa pana tasmiṃ attabhāve maggaphalānaṃ upanissayo samucchinnoyeva,
tika-vin01t2:57_1: gahitattā sāsanānanti paṭipattipariyattisāsanānaṃ gahaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ. Chavinti tesaṃ
tika-vin01t2:57_2: pabhassarakaraṇaṃ chaviṃ. Kiṃ tanti āha “chāya”nti, tesaṃ pakāsakaṃ obhāsanti attho.
tika-vin01t2:57_3: Kiṃ tanti āha “sundarabhāva”nti. Chavimanugataṃ anucchavikaṃ. Patirūpantiādīsupi
tika-vin01t2:57_4: “tesa”nti ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ. Samaṇānaṃ kammaṃ sāmaṇakaṃ, na sāmaṇakaṃ assāmaṇakaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:57_5: Kathaṃ-saddayogena “na sakkhissasī”ti anāgatavacanaṃ kataṃ. “Nāma-saddayogenā”ti ca vadanti.
tika-vin01t2:58_0: Dayālukenāti anukampāya sahitena. Paribhāsantoti garahanto. Niruttinayena āsīvisa-saddassa
tika-vin01t2:58_1: atthaṃ dassento āha “āsu sīgha”ntiādi. Etassāti āsīvisassa. Āgacchatīti yo tena daṭṭho,
tika-vin01t2:58_2: taṃ patiāgacchati. Āsittavisotipi āsīviso, sakalakāye āsiñcitvā viya ṭhapitaviso
tika-vin01t2:58_3: parassa ca sarīre āsiñcanavisoti attho. Asitavisotipi āsīviso. Yaṃ yañhi etena asitaṃ
tika-vin01t2:58_4: hoti paribhuttaṃ, taṃ visameva sampajjati, tasmā asitaṃ visaṃ etassāti asitavisoti
tika-vin01t2:58_5: vattabbe “āsīviso”ti niruttinayena vuttaṃ. Asisadisavisotipi āsīviso, asi viya tikhiṇaṃ
tika-vin01t2:58_6: parassa mammacchedanasamatthaṃ visaṃ etassāti āsīvisoti vuttaṃ hoti. Āsīti vā dāṭhā
tika-vin01t2:58_7: vuccati, tattha sannihitavisoti āsīviso. Sesasappehi kaṇhasappassa mahāvisattā āsīvisassānantaraṃ
tika-vin01t2:58_8: kaṇhasappo vutto. Sappamukhampi aṅgārakāsu viya bhayāvahattā akusaluppattiyā ṭhānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:58_9: na hotīti akusalakammato nivāraṇādhippāyena sīlabhedatopi suddhasīle ṭhitassa maraṇameva
tika-vin01t2:58_10: varataranti dassetuṃ “āsīvisassa kaṇhasappassa mukhe aṅgajātaṃ pakkhittaṃ vara”nti
tika-vin01t2:58_11: vuttaṃ. Pabbajitena hi katapāpakammaṃ bhagavato āṇātikkamanato vatthumahantatāya
tika-vin01t2:60: Puṭṭho me samma akkhāhi, kiṃ kāsuyā karissasī”ti. –
tika-vin01t2:63_0: Ettha rāsi. Idha pana ubhayampi adhippetanti āha “aṅgārapuṇṇakūpe aṅgārarāsimhi vā”ti.
tika-vin01t2:63_1: Kassati khaṇīyatīti kāsu, āvāṭo. Kasīyati cīyatīti kāsu, rāsi. Padittāyāti dippamānāya.
tika-vin01t2:64_0: Idaṃ mātugāmassa aṅgajāte aṅgajātapakkhipanaṃ nidānaṃ kāraṇamassa nirayupapajjanassāti
tika-vin01t2:64_1: itonidānaṃ, bhāvanapuṃsakañcetaṃ. Paccattavacanassa to-ādeso kato, tassa ca samāsepi
tika-vin01t2:64_2: alopo. Tattha nāma tvanti ettha tvaṃ-saddo “samāpajjissasī”ti iminā sambandhamupagacchamāno
tika-vin01t2:64_3: atthīti āha “tvanti taṃsaddassa vevacana”nti. “Yaṃ tanti pana pāṭho yuttarūpo”ti
tika-vin01t2:64_4: gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ. Yaṃ tanti nāyaṃ uddesaniddeso, yathā loke yaṃ vā taṃ vāti avaññātavacanaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:64_5: evaṃ daṭṭhabbanti āha – “yaṃ vā taṃ vā hīḷitaṃ avaññātanti vuttaṃ hotī”ti. Nīcajanānanti
tika-vin01t2:64_6: nihīnaguṇānaṃ sattānaṃ. Gāmadhammanti ettha gāma-saddena gāmavāsino vuttā abhedūpacārenāti
tika-vin01t2:64_8: Methunadhammo hi rāgaṃ paggharati. Methunadhammassa mahāsāvajjatāya oḷārikattā vuttaṃ
tika-vin01t2:64_9: “asukhuma”nti. Anipuṇanti tasseva vevacanaṃ. Udake bhavaṃ odakaṃ. Kiṃ taṃ? Udakakiccanti
tika-vin01t2:64_10: āha – “udakakiccaṃ antikaṃ avasānaṃ assā”ti. Samāpajjissatīti anāgatavacanaṃ nāma-saddayogena
tika-vin01t2:64_11: katanti āha – “samāpajjissatīti…pe… nāma-saddena yojetabba”nti. Loke methunadhammassa
tika-vin01t2:64_12: ādikattā koci paṭhamakappiko, na panāyanti āha – “sāsanaṃ sandhāya vadatī”ti. Bahūnanti
tika-vin01t2:64_13: puggalāpekkhaṃ, na pana akusalāpekkhanti āha “bahūnaṃ puggalāna”nti.
tika-vin01t2:65_0: Yaṃ asaṃvaraṃ paṭicca dubbharatādupposatādi hoti, so asaṃvaro dubbharatādi-saddena
tika-vin01t2:65_1: vutto kāraṇe phalūpacārenāti āha – “dubbharatādīnaṃ vatthubhūtassa asaṃvarassā”ti.
tika-vin01t2:65_2: Vatthubhūtassāti kāraṇabhūtassa. Vasati ettha phalaṃ tadāyattavuttitāyāti hi kāraṇaṃ
tika-vin01t2:65_3: vatthu. Attāti cittaṃ sarīrañca, cittameva vā. Dubbharatañceva dupposatañca āpajjatīti
tika-vin01t2:65_4: attanā paccayadāyakehi ca dukkhena bharitabbataṃ posetabbatañca āpajjati. Asaṃvare
tika-vin01t2:65_5: ṭhito hi ekacco attanopi dubbharo hoti dupposo, ekacco upaṭṭhākānampi. Kathaṃ? Yo
tika-vin01t2:65_6: hi ambilādīni laddhā anambilādīni pariyesati, aññassa ghare laddhaṃ aññassa ghare
tika-vin01t2:65_7: chaḍḍento sabbaṃ gāmaṃ caritvā rittapattova vihāraṃ pavisitvā nipajjati, ayaṃ attano
tika-vin01t2:65_8: dubbharo. Yo pana sālimaṃsodanādīnaṃ patte pūretvā dinnepi dummukhabhāvaṃ anattamanabhāvameva
tika-vin01t2:65_9: dasseti, tesaṃ vā sammukhāva taṃ piṇḍapātaṃ “kiṃ tumhehi dinna”nti apasādento sāmaṇeragahaṭṭhādīnaṃ
tika-vin01t2:65_10: deti, ayaṃ upaṭṭhākānaṃ dubbharo. Etaṃ disvā manussā dūratova parivajjenti “dubbharo
tika-vin01t2:66_0: Mahicchatanti ettha mahantāni vatthūni icchati, mahatī vā panassa icchāti mahiccho,
tika-vin01t2:66_1: tassa bhāvo mahicchatā, santaguṇavibhāvanatā paṭiggahaṇe amattaññutā ca. Mahiccho
tika-vin01t2:66_2: hi icchācāre ṭhatvā attani vijjamānasīladhutadhammādiguṇe vibhāveti, tādisassa paṭiggahaṇe
tika-vin01t2:66_3: amattaññutāpi hoti. Yaṃ sandhāya vadanti “santaguṇasambhāvanatā paṭiggahaṇe ca amattaññutā,
tika-vin01t2:66_4: etaṃ mahicchatālakkhaṇa”nti. Sā panesā mahicchatā “idhekacco saddho samāno ‘saddhoti
tika-vin01t2:66_5: maṃ jano jānātū’ti icchati, sīlavā samāno ‘sīlavāti maṃ jano jānātū’ti” iminā nayena
tika-vin01t2:66_6: āgatāyeva, tāya samannāgato puggalo dussantappiyo hoti, vijātamātāpissa cittaṃ gahetuṃ
tika-vin01t2:69_0: Sattehi kilesehi ca saṅgaṇanaṃ samodhānaṃ saṅgaṇikāti āha – “gaṇasaṅgaṇikāya ceva
tika-vin01t2:69_1: kilesasaṅgaṇikāya cā”ti. Kosajjānugato ca hotīti kusītabhāvena anugato hoti, kusītassa
tika-vin01t2:69_2: bhāvo kosajjaṃ. Aṭṭhakusītavatthupāripūriyāti ettha kucchitaṃ sīdatīti kusīto da-kārassa
tika-vin01t2:69_3: ta-kāraṃ katvā. Yassa dhammassa vasena puggalo “kusīto”ti vuccati, so kusītabhāvo
tika-vin01t2:69_4: idha kusīta-saddena vutto. Vināpi hi bhāvajotanasaddaṃ bhāvattho viññāyati yathā
tika-vin01t2:69_5: “paṭassa sukka”nti, tasmā kusītabhāvavatthūnīti attho, kosajjakāraṇānīti vuttaṃ hoti. Tathā hi –
tika-vin01t2:70_0: “Kammaṃ kho me kattabbaṃ bhavissati, kammaṃ kho pana me karontassa kāyo kilamissati,
tika-vin01t2:70_1: handāhaṃ nipajjāmīti so nipajjati, na vīriyaṃ ārabhati appattassa pattiyā anadhigatassa
tika-vin01t2:70_2: adhigamāya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyāya, idaṃ paṭhamaṃ kusītavatthu. Ahaṃ kho kammaṃ
tika-vin01t2:70_3: akāsiṃ, kammaṃ kho pana me karontassa kāyo kilanto, handāhaṃ nipajjāmi…pe… maggo
tika-vin01t2:70_4: kho me gantabbo bhavissati, maggaṃ kho pana me gacchantassa kāyo kilamissati, handāhaṃ
tika-vin01t2:70_5: nipajjāmi…pe… ahaṃ kho maggaṃ agamāsiṃ, maggaṃ kho pana me gacchantassa kāyo kilanto,
tika-vin01t2:70_6: handāhaṃ nipajjāmi…pe… ahaṃ kho gāmaṃ vā nigamaṃ vā piṇḍāya caranto nālatthaṃ lūkhassa
tika-vin01t2:70_7: vā paṇītassa vā bhojanassa yāvadatthaṃ pāripūriṃ, tassa me kāyo kilanto akammañño,
tika-vin01t2:70_8: handāhaṃ nipajjāmi…pe… ahaṃ kho gāmaṃ vā nigamaṃ vā piṇḍāya caranto alatthaṃ lūkhassa
tika-vin01t2:70_9: vā paṇītassa vā bhojanassa yāvadatthaṃ pāripūriṃ, tassa me kāyo garuko akammañño
tika-vin01t2:70_10: māsācitaṃ maññe, handāhaṃ nipajjāmi…pe… uppanno kho me ayaṃ appamattako ābādho, atthi
tika-vin01t2:70_11: kappo nipajjituṃ, handāhaṃ nipajjāmi…pe… ahaṃ kho gilānā vuṭṭhito aciravuṭṭhito gelaññā,
tika-vin01t2:70_12: tassa me kāyo dubbalo akammañño, handāhaṃ nipajjāmīti so nipajjati, na vīriyaṃ ārabhati
tika-vin01t2:70_13: appattassa pattiyā anadhigatassa adhigamāya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyāya. Idaṃ aṭṭhamaṃ kusītavatthu”nti –
tika-vin01t2:71: Evamāgatāni “handāhaṃ nipajjāmī”ti evaṃ pavattaosīdanāni uparūpari kosajjakāraṇattā aṭṭha kusītavatthūni nāma, tesaṃ pāripūriyā saṃvattatīti attho.
tika-vin01t2:72_0: Subharo hoti suposoti attano upaṭṭhākehi ca sukhena bharitabbo posetabboti attho.
tika-vin01t2:72_1: Saṃvare ṭhito hi ekacco attanopi subharo hoti suposo, ekacco upaṭṭhākānampi. Kathaṃ?
tika-vin01t2:72_2: Yo hi yaṃ kiñci lūkhaṃ vā paṇītaṃ vā laddhā tuṭṭhacittova bhuñjitvā vihāraṃ gantvā
tika-vin01t2:72_3: attano kammaṃ karoti, ayaṃ attano subharo. Yo pana paresampi appaṃ vā bahuṃ vā lūkhaṃ
tika-vin01t2:72_4: vā paṇītaṃ vā dānaṃ ahīḷetvā attamano vippasannamukho hutvā etesaṃ sammukhāva paribhuñjitvā
tika-vin01t2:72_5: yāti, ayaṃ upaṭṭhākānaṃ subharo. Etaṃ disvā manussā ativiya vissatthā honti, “amhākaṃ
tika-vin01t2:72_6: bhadanto subharo, thokathokenapi tussati, mayameva naṃ posessāmā”ti paṭiññaṃ katvā
tika-vin01t2:72_7: posenti. Appicchatanti icchāvirahitattaṃ. Ettha hi byañjanaṃ sāvasesaṃ viya, attho
tika-vin01t2:72_8: pana niravaseso. Appa-saddo hettha abhāvatthoti sakkā viññātuṃ “appābādhatañca sañjānāmī”tiādīsu
tika-vin01t2:73_0: Tippabhedāya santuṭṭhiyāti yathālābhādisantosasāmaññena vuttaṃ, catūsu pana paccayesu
tika-vin01t2:73_1: tayo tayo santosāti dvādasavidho hoti santoso. Kathaṃ? Cīvare yathālābhasantoso yathābalasantoso
tika-vin01t2:73_2: yathāsāruppasantosoti tividho hoti santoso. Evaṃ piṇḍapātādīsu. Tassāyaṃ pabhedasaṃvaṇṇanā
tika-vin01t2:73_3: – idha bhikkhu cīvaraṃ labhati sundaraṃ vā asundaraṃ vā, so teneva yāpeti aññaṃ na
tika-vin01t2:73_4: pattheti, labhantopi na gaṇhāti. Ayamassa cīvare yathālābhasantoso. Atha pana pakatidubbalo
tika-vin01t2:73_5: vā hoti ābādhajarābhibhūto vā, garucīvaraṃ pārupanto kilamati, so sabhāgena bhikkhunā
tika-vin01t2:73_6: saddhiṃ taṃ parivattetvā lahukena yāpentopi santuṭṭhoyeva hoti. Ayamassa cīvare yathābalasantoso.
tika-vin01t2:73_7: Pakatidubbalādīnañhi garucīvarāni na phāsubhāvāvahāni sarīrakhedāvahāni ca hontīti
tika-vin01t2:73_8: payojanavasena anatricchatādivasena tāni parivattetvā lahukacīvaraparibhogo na santosavirodhīti.
tika-vin01t2:73_9: Aparo paṇītapaccayalābhī hoti, so paṭṭacīvarādīnaṃ aññataraṃ mahagghacīvaraṃ bahūni
tika-vin01t2:73_10: vā pana cīvarāni labhitvā “idaṃ therānaṃ cirapabbajitānaṃ, idaṃ bahussutānaṃ anurūpaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:73_11: idaṃ gilānānaṃ, idaṃ appalābhānaṃ hotū”ti datvā tesaṃ purāṇacīvaraṃ vā saṅkārakūṭādito
tika-vin01t2:73_12: vā nantakāni uccinitvā tehi saṅghāṭiṃ katvā dhārentopi santuṭṭhova hoti. Ayamassa
tika-vin01t2:73_13: cīvare yathāsāruppasantoso. Mahagghañhi cīvaraṃ bahūni vā cīvarāni labhitvāpi tāni
tika-vin01t2:73_14: vissajjetvā tadaññassa gahaṇaṃ yathāsāruppanaye ṭhitattā na santosavirodhīti.
tika-vin01t2:74_0: Idha pana bhikkhu piṇḍapātaṃ labhati lūkhaṃ vā paṇītaṃ vā, so teneva yāpeti aññaṃ
tika-vin01t2:74_1: na pattheti, labhantopi na gaṇhāti. Ayamassa piṇḍapāte yathālābhasantoso. Yo pana
tika-vin01t2:74_2: attano pakativiruddhaṃ vā byādhiviruddhaṃ vā piṇḍapātaṃ labhati, yenassa paribhuttena
tika-vin01t2:74_3: aphāsu hoti, so sabhāgassa bhikkhuno taṃ datvā tassa hatthato sappāyabhojanaṃ bhuñjitvā
tika-vin01t2:74_4: samaṇadhammaṃ karontopi santuṭṭhova hoti. Ayamassa piṇḍapāte yathābalasantoso. Aparo
tika-vin01t2:74_5: bahuṃ paṇītaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ labhati, so taṃ cīvaraṃ viya cirapabbajitabahussutaappalābhagilānānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:74_6: datvā tesaṃ vā sesakaṃ piṇḍāya vā caritvā missakāhāraṃ bhuñjantopi santuṭṭhova hoti.
tika-vin01t2:75_0: Idha pana bhikkhu senāsanaṃ labhati manāpaṃ vā amanāpaṃ vā, so tena neva somanassaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:75_1: na paṭighaṃ uppādeti, antamaso tiṇasantharakenapi yathāladdheneva tussati. Ayamassa
tika-vin01t2:75_2: senāsane yathālābhasantoso. Yo pana attano pakativiruddhaṃ vā byādhiviruddhaṃ vā
tika-vin01t2:75_3: senāsanaṃ labhati, yatthassa vasato aphāsu hoti, so taṃ sabhāgassa bhikkhuno datvā
tika-vin01t2:75_4: tassa santake sappāyasenāsane vasantopi santuṭṭhova hoti. Ayamassa senāsane yathābalasantoso.
tika-vin01t2:75_5: Aparo mahāpuñño leṇamaṇḍapakūṭāgārādīni bahūni paṇītasenāsanāni labhati, so tāni
tika-vin01t2:75_6: cīvarādīni viya cirapabbajitabahussutaappalābhagilānānaṃ datvā yattha katthaci vasantopi
tika-vin01t2:75_7: santuṭṭhova hoti. Ayamassa senāsane yathāsāruppasantoso. Yopi “uttamasenāsanaṃ nāma
tika-vin01t2:75_8: pamādaṭṭhānaṃ, tattha nisinnassa thinamiddhaṃ okkamati, niddābhibhūtassa puna paṭibujjhato
tika-vin01t2:75_9: pāpavitakkā pātubhavantī”ti paṭisañcikkhitvā tādisaṃ senāsanaṃ pattampi na sampaṭicchati,
tika-vin01t2:75_10: so taṃ paṭikkhipitvā abbhokāsarukkhamūlādīsu vasantopi santuṭṭhova hoti. Ayampissa
tika-vin01t2:76_0: Idha pana bhikkhu bhesajjaṃ labhati lūkhaṃ vā paṇītaṃ vā, so yaṃ labhati, teneva
tika-vin01t2:76_1: tussati aññaṃ na pattheti, labhantopi na gaṇhāti. Ayamassa gilānapaccaye yathālābhasantoso.
tika-vin01t2:76_2: Yo pana telena atthiko phāṇitaṃ labhati, so taṃ sabhāgassa bhikkhuno datvā tassa
tika-vin01t2:76_3: hatthato telaṃ gahetvā aññadeva vā pariyesitvā bhesajjaṃ karontopi santuṭṭhova hoti.
tika-vin01t2:76_4: Ayamassa gilānapaccaye yathābalasantoso. Aparo mahāpuñño bahuṃ telamadhuphāṇitādipaṇītabhesajjaṃ
tika-vin01t2:76_5: labhati, so taṃ cīvaraṃ viya cirapabbajitabahussutaappalābhagilānānaṃ datvā tesaṃ
tika-vin01t2:76_6: ābhatena yena kenaci yāpentopi santuṭṭhova hoti. Yo pana ekasmiṃ bhājane muttaharītakaṃ
tika-vin01t2:76_7: ṭhapetvā ekasmiṃ catumadhuraṃ “gaṇha, bhante, yadicchasī”ti vuccamāno sacassa tesu
tika-vin01t2:76_8: aññatarenapi rogo vūpasammati, atha “muttaharītakaṃ nāma buddhādīhi vaṇṇita”nti catumadhuraṃ
tika-vin01t2:76_9: paṭikkhipitvā muttaharītakeneva bhesajjaṃ karonto paramasantuṭṭhova hoti. Ayamassa
tika-vin01t2:76_10: gilānapaccaye yathāsāruppasantoso. Evaṃ yathālābhādivasena tippabhedo santoso catunnaṃ
tika-vin01t2:77_1: sāvitakkānaṃ vasena kusalavitakkattayaṃ. Sabbakilesāpacayabhūtāya vivaṭṭāyāti rāgādisabbakilesānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:77_3: vīriyārambhakāraṇānaṃ pāripūriyā. Yathā tathā paṭhamaṃ pavattaabbhussahanañhi upari
tika-vin01t2:77_4: vīriyārambhassa kāraṇaṃ hoti. Anurūpapaccavekkhaṇāsahitāni hi abbhussahanāni tammūlakāni
tika-vin01t2:77_5: vā paccavekkhaṇāni aṭṭha vīriyārambhavatthūnīti veditabbāni. Tathā hi –
tika-vin01t2:78_0: “Kammaṃ kho me kattabbaṃ bhavissati, kammaṃ kho pana me karontena na sukaraṃ buddhānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:78_1: sāsanaṃ manasi kātuṃ, handāhaṃ vīriyaṃ ārabhāmi appattassa pattiyā anadhigatassa
tika-vin01t2:78_2: adhigamāya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyāya. Ahaṃ kho kammaṃ akāsiṃ, kammaṃ kho panāhaṃ
tika-vin01t2:78_3: karonto nāsakkhiṃ buddhānaṃ sāsanaṃ manasi kātuṃ, handāhaṃ vīriyaṃ ārabhāmi…pe… maggo
tika-vin01t2:78_4: kho me gantabbo bhavissati, maggaṃ kho pana me gacchantena na sukaraṃ buddhānaṃ sāsanaṃ
tika-vin01t2:78_5: manasi kātuṃ, handāhaṃ vīriyaṃ ārabhāmi…pe… ahaṃ kho maggaṃ agamāsiṃ, maggaṃ kho
tika-vin01t2:78_6: panāhaṃ gacchanto nāsakkhiṃ buddhānaṃ sāsanaṃ manasi kātuṃ, handāhaṃ vīriyaṃ ārabhāmi…pe…
tika-vin01t2:78_7: ahaṃ kho gāmaṃ vā nigamaṃ vā piṇḍāya caranto nālatthaṃ lūkhassa vā paṇītassa vā bhojanassa
tika-vin01t2:78_8: yāvadatthaṃ pāripūriṃ, tassa me kāyo lahuko kammañño, handāhaṃ vīriyaṃ ārabhāmi…pe…
tika-vin01t2:78_9: ahaṃ kho gāmaṃ vā nigamaṃ vā piṇḍāya caranto alatthaṃ lūkhassa vā paṇītassa vā bhojanassa
tika-vin01t2:78_10: yāvadatthaṃ pāripūriṃ, tassa me kāyo balavā kammañño, handāhaṃ vīriyaṃ ārabhāmi…pe…
tika-vin01t2:78_11: uppanno kho me ayaṃ appamattako ābādho, ṭhānaṃ kho panetaṃ vijjati, yaṃ me ābādho
tika-vin01t2:78_12: pavaḍḍheyya, handāhaṃ vīriyaṃ ārabhāmi…pe… ahaṃ kho gilānā vuṭṭhito aciravuṭṭhito
tika-vin01t2:78_13: gelaññā, ṭhānaṃ kho panetaṃ vijjati, yaṃ me ābādho paccudāvatteyya, handāhaṃ vīriyaṃ
tika-vin01t2:78_14: ārabhāmi appattassa pattiyā anadhigatassa adhigamāya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyāyā”ti –
tika-vin01t2:79: Evaṃ pavattaanurūpapaccavekkhaṇāsahitāni abbhussahanāni tammūlakāni vā paccavekkhaṇāni aṭṭha vīriyārambhavatthūni nāma.
tika-vin01t2:80_0: Tadanucchavikaṃ tadanulomikanti ettha ta-saddo vakkhamānāpekkho ca atītāpekkho ca
tika-vin01t2:80_1: hotīti āha “yaṃ idāni sikkhāpadaṃ paññapessatī”tiādi. Sabbanāmāni hi vakkhamānavacanānipi
tika-vin01t2:80_2: honti pakkantavacanānipi. Saṃvarappahānapaṭisaṃyuttanti pañcasaṃvarehi ceva pañcapahānehi
tika-vin01t2:80_3: ca paṭisaṃyuttaṃ. Pañcavidho hi saṃvaro sīlasaṃvaro satisaṃvaro ñāṇasaṃvaro khantisaṃvaro
tika-vin01t2:80_4: vīriyasaṃvaroti. Pahānampi pañcavidhaṃ tadaṅgappahānaṃ vikkhambhanappahānaṃ samucchedappahānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:81_0: Tattha “iminā pātimokkhasaṃvarena upeto hoti samupeto”ti evamāgato pātimokkhasaṃvaro
tika-vin01t2:81_1: sīlasaṃvaro nāma, so ca atthato kāyikavācasiko avītikkamo. “Rakkhati cakkhundriyaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:81_2: cakkhundriye saṃvaraṃ āpajjatī”ti evamāgatā indriyārakkhā satisaṃvaro, sā ca atthato
tika-vin01t2:81_3: tathāpavattā sati eva. “Sotānaṃ saṃvaraṃ brūmi, paññāyete pidhīyare”ti evamāgato
tika-vin01t2:81_4: ñāṇasaṃvaro. Ettha hi “sotānaṃ saṃvaraṃ brūmī”ti vatvā “paññāyete pidhīyare”ti vacanato
tika-vin01t2:81_6: saṃvaroti vuttaṃ. “Khamo hoti sītassa uṇhassā”tievamāgatā adhivāsanā khantisaṃvaro,
tika-vin01t2:81_7: sā ca atthato tathāpavattā khandhā adoso vā. Paññāti eke, taṃ na gahetabbaṃ. “Uppannaṃ
tika-vin01t2:81_8: kāmavitakkaṃ nādhivāsetī”ti evamāgataṃ kāmavitakkādīnaṃ vinodanavasena pavattaṃ vīriyameva
tika-vin01t2:81_9: vīriyasaṃvaro. Sabbo cāyaṃ saṃvaro yathāsakaṃ saṃvaritabbānaṃ dussīlyasaṅkhātānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:81_10: kāyavacīduccaritānaṃ muṭṭhassaccasaṅkhātassa pamādassa abhijjhādīnaṃ vā akkhanti
tika-vin01t2:81_11: aññāṇakosajjānañca saṃvaraṇato pidahanato chādanato “saṃvaro”ti vuccati. Saṃvaratīti
tika-vin01t2:81_12: saṃvaro, pidahati nivāreti pavattituṃ na detīti attho. Paccayasamavāye uppajjanārahānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:81_13: kāyaduccaritādīnaṃ tathā tathā anuppādanameva hi idha saṃvaraṇaṃ nāma. Evaṃ tāva
tika-vin01t2:82_0: Tena tena guṇaṅgena tassa tassa aguṇaṅgassa pahānaṃ tadaṅgappahānaṃ. Nāmarūpaparicchedādīsu
tika-vin01t2:82_1: hi vipassanāñāṇesu paṭipakkhabhāvato dīpālokeneva tamassa nāmarūpavavatthānena sakkāyadiṭṭhiyā,
tika-vin01t2:82_2: paccayapariggahena ahetuvisamahetudiṭṭhīnaṃ, tasseva aparabhāge uppannena kaṅkhāvitaraṇena
tika-vin01t2:82_4: amagge maggasaññāya, udayadassanena ucchedadiṭṭhiyā, vayadassanena sassatadiṭṭhiyā,
tika-vin01t2:82_5: bhayadassanena sabhaye abhayasaññāyātiādinā nayena tena tena vipassanāñāṇena tassa
tika-vin01t2:82_6: tassa aguṇaṅgassa pahānaṃ tadaṅgappahānanti veditabbaṃ. Yaṃ pana upacārappanābhedena
tika-vin01t2:82_7: samādhinā pavattinivāraṇato ghaṭappahāreneva udakapiṭṭhe sevālassa tesaṃ tesaṃ nīvaraṇādidhammānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:82_8: pahānaṃ, etaṃ vikkhambhanappahānaṃ nāma. Vikkhambhanameva pahānaṃ vikkhambhanappahānaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:82_9: Yaṃ catunnaṃ ariyamaggānaṃ bhāvitattā taṃtaṃmaggavato attano santāne “diṭṭhigatānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:82_10: pahānāyā”tiādinā nayena vuttassa samudayapakkhiyassa kilesagaṇassa accantaṃ appavattibhāvena
tika-vin01t2:82_11: pahānaṃ, idaṃ samucchedappahānaṃ nāma. Yaṃ pana phalakkhaṇe paṭippassaddhattaṃ vūpasantatā
tika-vin01t2:82_12: kilesānaṃ, etaṃ paṭippassaddhippahānaṃ nāma. Yaṃ sabbasaṅkhatanissaṭattā pahīnasabbasaṅkhataṃ
tika-vin01t2:82_13: nibbānaṃ, etaṃ nissaraṇappahānaṃ nāma. Sabbampi cetaṃ cāgaṭṭhena pahānanti vuccati.
tika-vin01t2:82_14: Evamimehi yathāvuttasaṃvarehi ceva pahānehi ca paṭisaṃyuttā dhammadesanā “saṃvarappahānapaṭisaṃyuttā”ti veditabbā.
tika-vin01t2:83_0: Asuttantavinibaddhanti suttantesu anibaddhaṃ, pāḷianāruḷhanti attho. Pakiṇṇakadhammadesanā
tika-vin01t2:83_1: hi saṅgahaṃ na ārohati. Vuttamevatthaṃ pakāsento āha “pāḷivinimutta”nti. Atha vā
tika-vin01t2:83_2: asuttantavinibaddhanti suttābhidhammapāḷiṃ anāruḷhabhāvaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, pāḷivinimuttanti
tika-vin01t2:83_3: vinayapāḷiṃ anāruḷhabhāvaṃ sandhāya. Okkantikadhammadesanā nāma ñāṇena anupavisitvā
tika-vin01t2:83_4: antarā kathiyamānā dhammadesanā, paṭikkhipanādhippāyā bhaddālittherasadisā. Samparetabbato
tika-vin01t2:83_5: pecca gantabbato samparāyo, paraloko. Tattha bhavaṃ samparāyikaṃ. Vaṭṭabhayena tajjentoti
tika-vin01t2:83_6: “evaṃ dussīlā nirayādīsu dukkhaṃ pāpuṇantī”ti tajjento. Dīghanikāyappamāṇampi majjhimanikāyappamāṇampi
tika-vin01t2:83_7: dhammadesanaṃ karotīti “tena khaṇena tena muhuttena kathaṃ bhagavā tāvamahantaṃ dhammadesanaṃ
tika-vin01t2:83_8: karotī”ti na vattabbaṃ. Yāvatā hi lokiyamahājanā ekaṃ padaṃ kathenti, tāva ānandatthero
tika-vin01t2:83_9: aṭṭha padāni katheti. Ānandatthere pana ekaṃ padaṃ kathenteyeva bhagavā soḷasa padāni
tika-vin01t2:83_10: katheti. Iminā nayena lokiyajanassa ekapaduccāraṇakkhaṇe bhagavā aṭṭhavīsasataṃ padāni
tika-vin01t2:83_11: katheti. Kasmā? Bhagavato hi jivhā mudu, dantāvaraṇaṃ suphusitaṃ, vacanaṃ agaḷitaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:83_12: bhavaṅgaparivāso lahuko, tasmā sace eko bhikkhu kāyānupassanaṃ pucchati, añño vedanānupassanaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:83_13: añño cittānupassanaṃ, añño dhammānupassanaṃ, “iminā puṭṭhe ahaṃ pucchissāmī”ti eko
tika-vin01t2:83_14: ekaṃ na oloketi, evaṃ santepi tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ “ayaṃ paṭhamaṃ pucchi, ayaṃ dutiya”ntiādinā
tika-vin01t2:83_15: pucchanavāro tādisassa paññavato paññāyati sukhumassa antarassa labbhanato. Buddhānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:83_16: pana desanāvāro aññesaṃ na paññāyateva accharāsaṅghātamatte khaṇe anekakoṭisahassacittappavattisambhavato.
tika-vin01t2:83_17: Daḷhadhammena dhanuggahena khittasarassa vidatthicaturaṅgulaṃ tālacchāyaṃ atikkamanato
tika-vin01t2:83_18: puretaraṃyeva bhagavā cuddasavidhena kāyānupassanaṃ, navavidhena vedanānupassanaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:83_19: soḷasavidhena cittānupassanaṃ, pañcavidhena dhammānupassanaṃ katheti. Tiṭṭhantu vā
tika-vin01t2:83_20: ete cattāro, sace hi aññe cattāro sammappadhānesu, aññe iddhipādesu, aññe pañcindriyesu,
tika-vin01t2:83_21: aññe pañcabalesu, aññe sattabojjhaṅgesu, aññe aṭṭhamaggaṅgesu pañhe puccheyyuṃ, tampi
tika-vin01t2:83_22: bhagavā katheyya. Tiṭṭhantu vā ete aṭṭha, sace aññe sattatiṃsa janā bodhipakkhiyesu
tika-vin01t2:83_23: pañhe puccheyyuṃ, tampi bhagavā tāvadeva katheyya.
tika-vin01t2:84_0: Mūlaṃ nissayo patiṭṭhāti pacchimaṃ pacchimaṃ paṭhamassa paṭhamassa vevacananti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:84_1: Tattha patiṭṭhāti sampayogavasena upanissayavasena ca okāsabhāvo. Sikkhāsaṅkhātānañhi
tika-vin01t2:84_2: avasesakusaladhammānaṃ methunaviratisampayogavasena vā patiṭṭhā siyā upanissayabhāvena
tika-vin01t2:84_4: Sikkhāpadavibhaṅge niddiṭṭhaviraticetanā taṃsampayuttadhammā ca sikkhāpadanti dassetukāmo
tika-vin01t2:84_5: āha – “ayañca attho sikkhāpadavibhaṅge vuttanayena veditabbo”ti. Sikkhāpadavibhaṅge
tika-vin01t2:84_6: hi viratiādayo dhammā nippariyāyato pariyāyato ca “sikkhāpada”nti vuttā. Vuttañhetaṃ –
tika-vin01t2:85_0: “Tattha katamaṃ kāmesumicchācārā veramaṇī sikkhāpadaṃ? Yasmiṃ samaye kāmāvacaraṃ
tika-vin01t2:85_1: kusalaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ hoti somanassasahagataṃ ñāṇasampayuttaṃ kāmesumicchācārā
tika-vin01t2:85_2: viramantassa, yā tasmiṃ samaye kāmesumicchācārā ārati virati paṭivirati veramaṇī
tika-vin01t2:85_3: akiriyā akaraṇaṃ anajjhāpatti velānatikkamo setughāto, idaṃ vuccati kāmesumicchācārā
tika-vin01t2:85_4: veramaṇī sikkhāpadaṃ. Avasesā dhammā veramaṇiyā sampayuttā.
tika-vin01t2:86_0: “Tattha katamaṃ kāmesumicchācārā veramaṇī sikkhāpadaṃ? Yasmiṃ samaye kāmāvacaraṃ
tika-vin01t2:86_1: kusalaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ hoti somanassasahagataṃ ñāṇasampayuttaṃ kāmesumicchācārā
tika-vin01t2:86_2: viramantassa, yā tasmiṃ samaye cetanā sañcetanā cetayitattaṃ, idaṃ vuccati kāmesumicchācārā
tika-vin01t2:86_3: veramaṇī sikkhāpadaṃ. Avasesā dhammā cetanāya sampayuttā.
tika-vin01t2:87_0: “Tattha katamaṃ kāmesumicchācārā veramaṇī sikkhāpadaṃ? Yasmiṃ samaye kāmāvacaraṃ
tika-vin01t2:87_1: kusalaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ hoti somanassasahagataṃ ñāṇasampayuttaṃ kāmesumicchācārā
tika-vin01t2:87_2: viramantassa, yo tasmiṃ samaye phasso…pe… paggāho avikkhepo, idaṃ vuccati kāmesumicchācārā
tika-vin01t2:88_0: Ettha hi yasmā na kevalaṃ viratiyeva sikkhāpadaṃ, cetanāpi sikkhāpadameva, tasmā
tika-vin01t2:88_1: taṃ dassetuṃ dutiyanayo vutto. Yasmā ca na kevalaṃ eteyeva dve dhammā sikkhāpadaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:88_2: cetanāsampayuttā pana paropaṇṇāsa dhammāpi sikkhitabbakoṭṭhāsato sikkhāpadameva,
tika-vin01t2:88_3: tasmā tatiyanayo dassito. Duvidhañhi sikkhāpadaṃ nippariyāyasikkhāpadaṃ pariyāyasikkhāpadanti.
tika-vin01t2:88_4: Tattha virati nippariyāyasikkhāpadaṃ. Sā hi “pāṇātipātā veramaṇī”ti pāḷiyaṃ āgatā,
tika-vin01t2:88_5: no cetanā. Viramanto ca tāya eva tato tato viramati, na cetanāya, cetanampi pana
tika-vin01t2:88_6: āharitvā dasseti, tathā sesacetanāsampayuttadhamme. Tasmā cetanā ceva avasesasampayuttadhammā
tika-vin01t2:89_0: Idāni na kevalaṃ idha viratiādayo dhammāva sikkhāpadaṃ, atha kho tadatthajotikā paññattipīti
tika-vin01t2:89_1: dassento āha “apicā”tiādi. “Yo tattha nāmakāyo padakāyoti idaṃ mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-vin01t2:89_2: vutta”nti vadanti. Nāmakāyoti nāmasamūho nāmapaṇṇattiyeva. Padaniruttibyañjanāni
tika-vin01t2:89_3: nāmavevacanāneva “nāmaṃ nāmakammaṃ nāmaniruttī”tiādīsu viya. Sikkhākoṭṭhāsoti viratiādayova
tika-vin01t2:89_4: vuttā, tadatthajotakaṃ vacanampi sikkhāpadanti idampi ettha labbhateva.
tika-vin01t2:90_0: Atthavaseti vuddhivisese ānisaṃsavisese. Tesaṃ pana sikkhāpadapaññattikāraṇattā āha
tika-vin01t2:90_1: “dasa kāraṇavase”ti, dasa kāraṇaviseseti attho. Tenāha “hitavisese”ti. Atthoyeva
tika-vin01t2:90_2: vā atthavaso, dasa atthe dasa kāraṇānīti vuttaṃ hoti. Atha vā attho phalaṃ tadadhīnavuttitāya
tika-vin01t2:90_3: vaso etassāti atthavaso, hetūti evampettha attho daṭṭhabbo. Suṭṭhu devāti idaṃ rājantepurappavesanasikkhāpade
tika-vin01t2:90_4: vuttaṃ. “Ye mama sotabbaṃ saddahātabbaṃ maññissanti, tesaṃ taṃ assa dīgharattaṃ hitāya
tika-vin01t2:90_5: sukhāyā”ti vuttattā “yo ca tathāgatassa vacanaṃ sampaṭicchati, tassa taṃ dīgharattaṃ
tika-vin01t2:90_6: hitāya sukhāya hotī”ti vuttaṃ. Asampaṭicchane ādīnavanti bhaddālisutte viya asampaṭicchane
tika-vin01t2:90_7: ādīnavaṃ dassetvā. Sukhavihārābhāve sahajīvamānassa abhāvato sahajīvitāpi sukhavihārova
tika-vin01t2:90_8: vutto. Sukhavihāro nāma catunnaṃ iriyāpathavihārānaṃ phāsutā.
tika-vin01t2:91_0: Maṅkutanti nittejabhāvaṃ. Dhammenātiādīsu dhammoti bhūtaṃ vatthu. Vinayoti codanā
tika-vin01t2:91_1: ceva sāraṇā ca. Satthusāsananti ñattisampadā ceva anussāvanasampadā ca. Piyasīlānanti
tika-vin01t2:91_2: sikkhākāmānaṃ. Tesañhi sīlaṃ piyaṃ hoti. Tenevāha “sikkhattayapāripūriyā ghaṭamānā”ti.
tika-vin01t2:91_3: Sandiṭṭhamānāti saṃsayaṃ āpajjamānā. Ubbāḷhā hontīti pīḷitā honti. Saṅghakammānīti
tika-vin01t2:91_4: satipi uposathapavāraṇānaṃ saṅghakammabhāve gobalibaddañāyena uposathaṃ pavāraṇañca
tika-vin01t2:91_5: ṭhapetvā upasampadādisesasaṅghakammānaṃ gahaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ. Samaggānaṃ bhāvo sāmaggī.
tika-vin01t2:92: “Na vo ahaṃ, cunda, diṭṭhadhammikānaṃyeva āsavānaṃ saṃvarāya dhammaṃ desemī”ti ettha vivādamūlabhūtā kilesā āsavāti āgatā.
tika-vin01t2:95: Te mayhaṃ āsavā khīṇā, viddhastā vinaḷīkatā”ti. –
tika-vin01t2:96_0: Ettha tebhūmakaṃ kammaṃ avasesā ca akusalā dhammā. Idha pana parūpavādavippaṭisāravadhabandhādayo
tika-vin01t2:96_1: ceva apāyadukkhabhūtā ca nānappakārā upaddavā āsavāti āha – “asaṃvare ṭhitena tasmiṃyeva
tika-vin01t2:96_2: attabhāve pattabbā”tiādi. Yadi hi bhagavā sikkhāpadaṃ na paññapeyya, tato asaddhammapaṭisevanaadinnādānapāṇātipātādihetu
tika-vin01t2:96_3: ye uppajjeyyuṃ parūpavādādayo diṭṭhadhammikā nānappakārā anatthā, ye ca taṃnimittameva
tika-vin01t2:96_5: anatthā, te sandhāya idaṃ vuttaṃ “diṭṭhadhammikānaṃ āsavānaṃ saṃvarāya samparāyikānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:96_6: āsavānaṃ paṭighātāyā”ti. Diṭṭhadhammo vuccati paccakkho attabhāvo, tattha bhavā diṭṭhadhammikā.
tika-vin01t2:96_7: Tena vuttaṃ “tasmiṃyeva attabhāve pattabbā”ti. Sammukhā garahaṇaṃ akitti, parammukhā
tika-vin01t2:96_8: garahaṇaṃ ayaso. Atha vā sammukhā parammukhā ca garahaṇaṃ akitti, parivārahāni ayasoti
tika-vin01t2:96_10: gantabbato samparāyo, paralokoti āha “samparāye narakādīsū”ti. Methunādīni rajjanaṭṭhānāni,
tika-vin01t2:97_0: Cuddasa khandhakavattāni nāma vattakkhandhake vuttāni āgantukavattaṃ āvāsikagamikaanumodanabhattaggapiṇḍacārikaāraññikasenāsanajantāgharavaccakuṭiupajjhāyasaddhivihārikaācariyaantevāsikavattanti
tika-vin01t2:97_1: imāni cuddasa vattāni. Tato aññāni pana kadāci tajjanīyakammakatādikāleyeva caritabbāni
tika-vin01t2:97_2: dveasīti mahāvattāni, na sabbāsu avatthāsu caritabbāni, tasmā cuddasakhandhakavattesu
tika-vin01t2:97_3: agaṇitāni, tāni pana “pārivāsikānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ vattaṃ paññapessāmī”ti ārabhitvā “na
tika-vin01t2:97_4: upasampādetabbaṃ…pe… na chamāyaṃ caṅkamante caṅkame caṅkamitabba”nti vuttāvasānāni
tika-vin01t2:97_5: chasaṭṭhi, tato paraṃ “na, bhikkhave, pārivāsikena bhikkhunā pārivāsikavuḍḍhatarena
tika-vin01t2:97_6: bhikkhunā saddhiṃ, mūlāyapaṭikassanārahena, mānattārahena, mānattacārikena, abbhānārahena
tika-vin01t2:97_7: bhikkhunā saddhiṃ ekacchanne āvāse vatthabba”ntiādinā vuttavattāni pakatattacaritabbehi
tika-vin01t2:97_8: anaññattā visuṃ agaṇetvā pārivāsikavuḍḍhatarādīsu puggalantaresu caritabbattā tesaṃ
tika-vin01t2:97_9: vasena sampiṇḍetvā ekekaṃ katvā gaṇitāni pañcāti ekasattati vattāni, ukkhepanīyakammakatavattesu
tika-vin01t2:97_10: vuttaṃ “na pakatattassa bhikkhuno abhivādanaṃ paccuṭṭhānaṃ…pe… nahāne piṭṭhiparikammaṃ
tika-vin01t2:97_11: sāditabba”nti idaṃ abhivādanādīnaṃ asādiyanaṃ ekaṃ, “na pakatatto bhikkhu sīlavipattiyā
tika-vin01t2:97_12: anuddhaṃsetabbo”tiādīni dasāti evametāni dvāsīti vattāni. Etesveva pana kānici tajjanīyakammādivattāāni,
tika-vin01t2:97_13: kānici pārivāsikādivattānīti aggahitaggahaṇena dvāsīti eva, aññattha pana aṭṭhakathāpadese
tika-vin01t2:97_14: appakaṃ ūnamadhikaṃ vā gaṇanūpagaṃ na hotīti “asīti khandhakavattānī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:98_0: Saṃvaravinayoti sīlasaṃvaro satisaṃvaro ñāṇasaṃvaro khantisaṃvaro vīriyasaṃvaroti
tika-vin01t2:98_1: pañcavidhopi saṃvaro yathāsakaṃ saṃvaritabbānaṃ vinetabbānañca kāyaduccaritādīnaṃ
tika-vin01t2:98_2: saṃvaraṇato saṃvaro, vinayanato vinayoti vuccati. Pahānavinayoti tadaṅgappahānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:98_4: pañcavidhampi pahānaṃ yasmā cāgaṭṭhena pahānaṃ, vinayanaṭṭhena vinayo, tasmā pahānavinayoti
tika-vin01t2:98_5: vuccati. Samathavinayoti satta adhikaraṇasamathā. Paññattivinayoti sikkhāpadameva.
tika-vin01t2:98_6: Sikkhāpadapaññattiyā hi vijjamānāya eva sikkhāpadasambhavato paññattivinayopi sikkhāpadapaññattiyā anuggahito hoti.
tika-vin01t2:100_0: “Yaṃ saṅghasuṭṭhu, taṃ saṅghaphāsu, yaṃ saṅghaphāsu, taṃ dummaṅkūnaṃ puggalānaṃ niggahāya,
tika-vin01t2:100_1: yaṃ dummaṅkūnaṃ puggalānaṃ niggahāya, taṃ pesalānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ phāsuvihārāya, yaṃ
tika-vin01t2:100_2: pesalānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ phāsuvihārāya, taṃ diṭṭhadhammikānaṃ āsavānaṃ saṃvarāya, yaṃ
tika-vin01t2:100_3: diṭṭhadhammikānaṃ āsavānaṃ saṃvarāya, taṃ samparāyikānaṃ āsavānaṃ paṭighātāya, yaṃ
tika-vin01t2:100_4: samparāyikānaṃ āsavānaṃ paṭighātāya, taṃ appasannānaṃ pasādāya, yaṃ appasannānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:100_5: pasādāya, taṃ pasannānaṃ bhiyyobhāvāya, yaṃ pasannānaṃ bhiyyobhāvāya, taṃ saddhammaṭṭhitiyā,
tika-vin01t2:101_0: “Yaṃ saṅghasuṭṭhu, taṃ saṅghaphāsu, yaṃ saṅghasuṭṭhu, taṃ dummaṅkūnaṃ puggalānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:101_1: niggahāya, yaṃ saṅghasuṭṭhu, taṃ pesalānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ phāsuvihārāya, yaṃ saṅghasuṭṭhu,
tika-vin01t2:101_2: taṃ diṭṭhadhammikānaṃ āsavānaṃ saṃvarāya, yaṃ saṅghasuṭṭhu, taṃ samparāyikānaṃ āsavānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:101_3: paṭighātāya, yaṃ saṅghasuṭṭhu, taṃ appasannānaṃ pasādāya, yaṃ saṅghasuṭṭhu, taṃ pasannānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:101_4: bhiyyobhāvāya, yaṃ saṅghasuṭṭhu, taṃ saddhammaṭṭhitiyā, yaṃ saṅghasuṭṭhu, taṃ vinayānuggahāya.
tika-vin01t2:102_0: “Yaṃ saṅghaphāsu, taṃ dummaṅkūnaṃ puggalānaṃ niggahāya, yaṃ saṅghaphāsu, taṃ pesalānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:102_1: bhikkhūnaṃ phāsuvihārāya, yaṃ saṅghaphāsu, taṃ diṭṭhadhammikānaṃ āsavānaṃ saṃvarāya,
tika-vin01t2:102_2: yaṃ saṅghaphāsu, taṃ samparāyikānaṃ āsavānaṃ paṭighātāya, yaṃ saṅghaphāsu, taṃ appasannānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:102_3: pasādāya, yaṃ saṅghaphāsu, taṃ pasannānaṃ bhiyyobhāvāya, yaṃ saṅghaphāsu, taṃ saddhammaṭṭhitiyā,
tika-vin01t2:102_4: yaṃ saṅghaphāsu, taṃ vinayānuggahāya, yaṃ saṅghaphāsu, taṃ saṅghasuṭṭhutāya.
tika-vin01t2:103_0: “Yaṃ dummaṅkūnaṃ puggalānaṃ niggahāya…pe… yaṃ pesalānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ phāsuvihārāya…pe…
tika-vin01t2:103_1: yaṃ diṭṭhadhammikānaṃ āsavānaṃ saṃvarāya…pe… yaṃ samparāyikānaṃ āsavānaṃ paṭighātāya…pe…
tika-vin01t2:103_2: yaṃ appasannānaṃ pasādāya…pe… yaṃ pasannānaṃ bhiyyobhāvāya…pe… yaṃ saddhammaṭṭhitiyā…pe…
tika-vin01t2:103_3: yaṃ vinayānuggahāya, taṃ saṅghasuṭṭhutāya, yaṃ vinayānuggahāya, taṃ saṅghaphāsutāya,
tika-vin01t2:103_4: yaṃ vinayānuggahāya, taṃ dummaṅkūnaṃ puggalānaṃ niggahāya, yaṃ vinayānuggahāya, taṃ
tika-vin01t2:103_5: pesalānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ phāsuvihārāya, yaṃ vinayānuggahāya, taṃ diṭṭhadhammikānaṃ āsavānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:103_6: saṃvarāya, yaṃ vinayānuggahāya, taṃ samparāyikānaṃ āsavānaṃ paṭighātāya, yaṃ vinayānuggahāya,
tika-vin01t2:103_7: taṃ appasannānaṃ pasādāya, yaṃ vinayānuggahāya, taṃ pasannānaṃ bhiyyobhāvāya, yaṃ
tika-vin01t2:107_0: Tattha “yaṃ saṅghasuṭṭhu, taṃ saṅghaphāsu, yaṃ saṅghaphāsu, taṃ dummaṅkūnaṃ puggalānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:107_1: niggahāyā”ti iminā anukkamena yaṃ vuttaṃ, taṃ sandhāya āsannāsannapadānaṃ uparūparipadehi
tika-vin01t2:107_3: katvāti sambandho. “Yaṃ saṅghasuṭṭhu, taṃ saṅghaphāsu, yaṃ saṅghasuṭṭhu, taṃ dummaṅkūnaṃ
tika-vin01t2:107_4: puggalānaṃ niggahāyā”ti evamādinā dasasu padesu ekamekaṃ padaṃ tadavasesehi navanavapadehi
tika-vin01t2:107_5: yojetvā yaṃ vuttaṃ, taṃ sandhāya “ekekapadamūlikaṃ dasakkhattuṃ yojanaṃ katvā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:108_0: Atthasatantiādīsu saṅkhalikanaye tāva purimapurimapadānaṃ vasena dhammasataṃ veditabbaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:108_1: pacchimapacchimānaṃ vasena atthasataṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Kathaṃ? Kiñcāpi parivāre “yaṃ saṅghasuṭṭhu,
tika-vin01t2:108_2: taṃ saṅghaphāsū”tiādinā saṅkhalikanaye khaṇḍacakkameva vuttaṃ, tathāpi teneva nayena
tika-vin01t2:108_3: baddhacakkassapi nayo dinno, tasmā “yaṃ saṅghasuṭṭhu, taṃ saṅghaphāsū”tiādiṃ vatvā
tika-vin01t2:108_4: “yaṃ vinayānuggahāya, taṃ saṅghasuṭṭhū”ti yojetvā baddhacakkaṃ kātabbaṃ. Evaṃ “yaṃ
tika-vin01t2:108_5: saṅghaphāsu, taṃ dummaṅkūnaṃ puggalānaṃ niggahāyā”tiādiṃ vatvāpi “yaṃ vinayānuggahāya,
tika-vin01t2:108_6: taṃ saṅghasuṭṭhu, yaṃ saṅghasuṭṭhu, taṃ saṅghaphāsū”ti yojetvā baddhacakkaṃ kātabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:108_7: Iminā anukkamena sesapadesupi yojitesu saṅkhalikanayena dasa baddhacakkāni honti.
tika-vin01t2:108_8: Tesu ekekasmiṃ cakke purimapurimapadānaṃ vasena dasa dasa dhammā, pacchimapacchimapadānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:108_9: vasena dasa dasa atthāti saṅkhalikanaye atthasataṃ dhammasatañca sampajjati. Ekamūlakanaye
tika-vin01t2:108_10: pana “yaṃ saṅghasuṭṭhu, taṃ saṅghaphāsu, yaṃ saṅghasuṭṭhu, taṃ dummaṅkūnaṃ puggalānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:108_11: niggahāyā”ti evamādinā ekameva padaṃ sesehi navahi padehi yojitanti purimapadassa
tika-vin01t2:108_12: ekattā ekameva dhammapadaṃ naveva atthapadāni honti, tasmā ekamūlakanaye dasasu padesu
tika-vin01t2:108_13: ekamekaṃ mūlaṃ katvā dasakkhattuṃ yojanāya katāya dhammapadānaṃ vasena dhammapadāni
tika-vin01t2:108_14: dasa, atthapadāni navutīti atthasataṃ dhammasatañca na sampajjati, tasmā ekamūlakanaye
tika-vin01t2:108_15: saṅkhalikanaye vuttanayena atthasataṃ dhammasatañca aggahetvā yaṃ tattha dasadhammapadānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:108_16: navutiatthapadānañca vasena padasataṃ vuttaṃ, taṃ sabbaṃ dhammasatanti gahetvā tadatthajotanavasena
tika-vin01t2:108_17: aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttāni saṅghasuṭṭhubhāvādīni atthapadāni atthasatanti evaṃ gahite
tika-vin01t2:108_18: atthasataṃ dhammasatañca sampajjati. Evaṃ tāva atthasataṃ dhammasatañca veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:108_19: Dve ca niruttisatānīti ettha pana atthajotikānaṃ niruttīnaṃ vasena niruttisataṃ,
tika-vin01t2:108_20: dhammabhūtānaṃ niruttīnaṃ vasena niruttisatanti dve niruttisatāni ca veditabbāni.
tika-vin01t2:108_21: Cattāri ñāṇasatānīti atthasate ñāṇasataṃ, dhammasate ñāṇasataṃ, dvīsu niruttisatesu
tika-vin01t2:109_0: Evañca pana, bhikkhaveti ettha ca-saddo bhinnakkamena yojetabboti āha “uddiseyyātha
tika-vin01t2:109_1: cā”ti. Kathaṃ panettha “uddiseyyāthā”ti vutte pariyāpuṇeyyāthātiādi atthasambhavoti
tika-vin01t2:109_2: āha “atirekānayanattho hi ettha ca-saddo”ti. Vuttatthato atirekassa atthassa ānayanaṃ
tika-vin01t2:109_3: atirekānayanaṃ, so attho etassāti atirekānayanattho, avuttasamuccayatthoti vuttaṃ
tika-vin01t2:114_0: 40. Anuttānapadavaṇṇanāti uttānaṃ vuccati pākaṭaṃ, tappaṭipakkhena anuttānaṃ apākaṭaṃ
tika-vin01t2:114_1: appacuraṃ duviññeyyañca, anuttānānaṃ padānaṃ vaṇṇanā anuttānapadavaṇṇanā. Uttānapadavaṇṇanāya
tika-vin01t2:114_2: payojanābhāvato anuttānaggahaṇaṃ. Pacurapaṭisevano hotīti bahulapaṭisevano hoti,
tika-vin01t2:114_3: divase divase nirantaraṃ paṭisevatīti attho. Pacuratthe hi vattamānavacananti sabbadā
tika-vin01t2:114_4: paṭisevanābhāvepi “iha mallā yujjhantī”tiādīsu viya bāhullavuttiṃ upādāya vattamānavacanaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:115_0: 41. Sahoḍḍhaggahitoti saha bhaṇḍena gahito. Attano micchāgāhena lesaoḍḍanena vā paripuṇṇatthampi
tika-vin01t2:115_1: paṭhamapaññattiṃ aññathā karonto “tañca kho manussitthiyā, no tiracchānagatāyā”ti
tika-vin01t2:115_2: āha. Dassananti sānurāgadassanaṃ. Gahaṇanti anurāgavaseneva hatthena gahaṇaṃ. Āmasanaṃ
tika-vin01t2:115_3: attano sarīrena tassā sarīrassa upari āmasanamattaṃ, phusanaṃ tato daḷhataraṃ katvā
tika-vin01t2:115_4: saṃphusanaṃ, ghaṭṭanaṃ tatopi daḷhataraṃ katvā sarīrena sarīrassa ghaṭṭanaṃ. Taṃ
tika-vin01t2:116_0: 42. Daḷhataraṃ sikkhāpadamakāsīti imasmiṃ adhikāre anupaññattiyā sikkhāpadassa daḷhīkaraṇaṃ
tika-vin01t2:116_1: sithilakaraṇañca pasaṅgato āpannaṃ vibhajitvā dassetukāmo “duvidhañhi sikkhāpada”ntiādimāha.
tika-vin01t2:116_2: Tattha yassa sacittakassa sikkhāpadassa cittaṃ akusalameva hoti, taṃ lokavajjaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:116_3: Yassa sacittakācittakapakkhasahitassa acittakassa ca sacittakapakkhe cittaṃ akusalameva
tika-vin01t2:116_4: hoti, tampi surāpānādi lokavajjanti imamatthaṃ sampiṇḍetvā dassetuṃ “yassa sacittakapakkhe
tika-vin01t2:116_5: cittaṃ akusalameva hoti, taṃ lokavajjaṃ nāmā”ti vuttaṃ. “Sacittakapakkhe”ti hi idaṃ
tika-vin01t2:116_6: vacanaṃ acittakaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Na hi ekaṃsato sacittakassa “sacittakapakkhe”ti
