tika-vin01t2:116_7: visesane payojanaṃ atthi. Sacittakapakkheti ca vatthuvītikkamavijānanacittena “sacittakapakkhe”ti
tika-vin01t2:116_8: gahetabbaṃ, na paṇṇattivijānanacittena. Yadi hi “na vaṭṭatī”ti paṇṇattivijānanacittenapi
tika-vin01t2:116_9: yassa sikkhāpadassa sacittakapakkhe cittaṃ akusalameva, tampi lokavajjanti vadeyya,
tika-vin01t2:116_11: vaṭṭatī”ti jānitvā vītikkame akusalacittasseva sambhavato. Na hi bhagavato āṇaṃ jānitvā
tika-vin01t2:116_12: maddantassa kusalacittaṃ uppajjati anādariyavasena paṭighacittasseva uppajjanato.
tika-vin01t2:117_0: Apicettha “sacittakapakkhe cittaṃ akusalamevā”ti vacanato acittakassa vatthuajānanavasena
tika-vin01t2:117_1: acittakapakkhe cittaṃ akusalamevāti ayaṃ niyamo natthīti viññāyati. Yadi hi acittakassa
tika-vin01t2:117_2: acittakapakkhepi cittaṃ akusalameva siyā, “sacittakapakkhe”ti idaṃ visesanaṃ niratthakaṃ
tika-vin01t2:117_3: siyā. “Yassa cittaṃ akusalameva hoti, taṃ lokavajja”nti ettake vutte surāti ajānitvā
tika-vin01t2:117_4: pivantassa gandhavaṇṇakādibhāvaṃ ajānitvā tāni limpantīnaṃ bhikkhunīnañca vināpi
tika-vin01t2:117_5: akusalacittena āpattisambhavato ekantākusalaṃ sacittakasikkhāpadaṃ ṭhapetvā surāpānādiacittakasikkhāpadānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:117_6: lokavajjatā na siyāti tesampi saṅgaṇhatthaṃ “yassa sacittakapakkhe cittaṃ akusalameva
tika-vin01t2:117_7: hoti, taṃ lokavajja”nti vuttaṃ. Teneva cūḷagaṇṭhipade majjhimagaṇṭhipade ca vuttaṃ
tika-vin01t2:117_8: “etaṃ sattaṃ māressāmīti tasmiṃyeva padese nipannaṃ aññaṃ mārentassa pāṇasāmaññassa
tika-vin01t2:117_9: atthitāya yathā pāṇātipāto hoti, evaṃ etaṃ majjaṃ pivissāmīti aññaṃ majjaṃ pivantassa
tika-vin01t2:117_10: majjasāmaññassa atthitāya akusalameva hoti. Yathā pana kaṭṭhasaññāya sappaṃ ghātentassa
tika-vin01t2:117_11: pāṇātipāto na hoti, evaṃ nāḷikerapānasaññāya majjaṃ pivantassa akusalaṃ na hotī”ti.
tika-vin01t2:118_0: Keci pana vadanti “sāmaṇerassa surāti ajānitvā pivantassa pārājiko natthi, akusalaṃ
tika-vin01t2:118_1: pana hotī”ti, taṃ tesaṃ matimattaṃ. “Bhikkhuno ajānitvāpi bījato paṭṭhāya majjaṃ
tika-vin01t2:118_2: pivantassa pācittiyaṃ, sāmaṇero jānitvā pivanto sīlabhedaṃ āpajjati, na ajānitvā”ti
tika-vin01t2:118_3: ettakameva hi aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ, “akusalaṃ pana hotī”ti na vuttanti. Aparampi
tika-vin01t2:118_4: vadanti “ajānitvā pivantassapi sotāpannassa mukhaṃ surā na pavisati kammapathappattaakusalacitteneva
tika-vin01t2:118_5: pātabbato”ti, tampi na sundaraṃ. Bodhisatte kucchigate bodhisattamātu sīlaṃ viya
tika-vin01t2:118_6: hi idampi ariyasāvakānaṃ dhammatāsiddhanti veditabbaṃ. Teneva dīghanikāye kūṭadantasuttaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ –
tika-vin01t2:119_0: “Bhavantarepi hi ariyasāvako jīvitahetupi neva pāṇaṃ hanati, na suraṃ pivati. Sacepissa
tika-vin01t2:119_1: surañca khīrañca missetvā mukhe pakkhipanti, khīrameva pavisati, na surā. Yathā kiṃ?
tika-vin01t2:119_2: Yathā koñcasakuṇānaṃ khīramissake udake khīrameva pavisati, na udakaṃ. Idaṃ yonisiddhanti
tika-vin01t2:120_0: Yadi evaṃ surāpānasikkhāpadaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “vatthuajānanatāya cettha acittakatā veditabbā,
tika-vin01t2:120_1: akusaleneva pātabbatāya lokavajjatā”ti kasmā vuttaṃ? Nāyaṃ doso. Ayañhettha adhippāyo
tika-vin01t2:120_2: – sacittakapakkhe akusalacitteneva pātabbatāya lokavajjatāti. Imināyeva hi adhippāyena
tika-vin01t2:120_3: aññesupi lokavajjesu acittakasikkhāpadesu akusalacittatāyeva vuttā, na pana sacittakatā.
tika-vin01t2:121_1: bhikkhunīādīhi ummaddanaparimaddanāti imāni dasa sikkhāpadāni acittakāni lokavajjāni akusalacittānī”ti,
tika-vin01t2:122_0: Ayaṃ panettha adhippāyo – vināpi cittena āpajjitabbattā acittakāni, citte pana sati
tika-vin01t2:122_1: akusaleneva āpajjitabbattā lokavajjāni ceva akusalacittāni cāti. Tasmā bhikkhuvibhaṅge
tika-vin01t2:122_2: āgatāni surāpānauyyuttauyyodhikasikkhāpadāni tīṇi, bhikkhunīvibhaṅge āgatāni giraggasamajjādīni
tika-vin01t2:122_4: idaṃ visesanaṃ katanti niṭṭhamettha gantabbaṃ. Yasmā pana paṇṇattivajjassa vatthuvītikkamavijānanacittena
tika-vin01t2:122_5: sacittakapakkhe cittaṃ siyā kusalaṃ, siyā akusalaṃ, siyā abyākataṃ, tasmā tassa sacittakapakkhe
tika-vin01t2:122_6: cittaṃ akusalamevāti ayaṃ niyamo natthīti sesaṃ paṇṇattivajjanti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:123_0: Rundhantīti vītikkamaṃ rundhantī. Dvāraṃ pidahantīti vītikkamalesassa dvāraṃ pidahantī.
tika-vin01t2:123_1: Sotaṃ pacchindamānāti uparūpari vītikkamasotaṃ pacchindamānā. Atha vā rundhantīti
tika-vin01t2:123_2: anāpattilesaṃ rundhantī. Dvāraṃ pidahantīti anāpattilesassa dvāraṃ pidahantī. Sotaṃ
tika-vin01t2:123_3: pacchindamānāti anāpattisotaṃ pacchindamānā, āpattimeva kurumānāti vuttaṃ hoti. Nanu
tika-vin01t2:123_4: ca lokavajje kāci anupaññatti uppajjamānā sithilaṃ karontī uppajjati, tasmā “lokavajje
tika-vin01t2:123_5: anupaññatti uppajjamānā…pe… gāḷhataraṃ karontī uppajjatī”ti idaṃ kasmā vuttanti āha
tika-vin01t2:123_6: “aññatra adhimānā aññatra supinantā”tiādi. “Aññatra adhimānā”ti imissā anupaññattiyā
tika-vin01t2:123_8: kāraṇaṃ vuttaṃ. Tattha vītikkamābhāvāti pāpiccho icchāpakatotiādivītikkamābhāvā.
tika-vin01t2:123_9: Uttarimanussadhamme hi “pāpiccho icchāpakato uttarimanussadhammaṃ ullapatī”ti vacanato
tika-vin01t2:123_10: visaṃvādanādhippāyena musā bhaṇanto pārājiko hoti. Ayaṃ pana adhimānena adhigatasaññī
tika-vin01t2:123_11: hutvā ullapati, na sikkhāpadaṃ vītikkamitukāmo, tasmā “aññatra adhimānā”ti ayaṃ anupaññatti
tika-vin01t2:123_12: uppajjamānā vītikkamābhāvā anāpattikarā jātā. Abbohārikattāti supinante vijjamānāyapi
tika-vin01t2:123_13: cetanāya vītikkamicchāya ca abbohārikattā. Kiñcāpi hi supinante mocanassādacetanā
tika-vin01t2:123_14: saṃvijjati, kadāci upakkamanampi hoti, tathāpi thinamiddhena abhibhūtattā taṃ cittaṃ
tika-vin01t2:123_15: abbohārikaṃ, cittassa abbohārikattā upakkamakiriyāsaṃvattanikāpi cetanā abbohārikā.
tika-vin01t2:123_16: Teneva “atthesā bhikkhave cetanā, sā ca kho abbohārikā”ti bhagavatā vuttā, tasmā
tika-vin01t2:123_17: “aññatra supinantā”ti ayaṃ anupaññatti abbohārikattā anāpattikarā jātā.
tika-vin01t2:124_0: Akate vītikkameti “kukkuccāyantā na bhuñjiṃsū”tiādīsu viya vītikkame akate. Sithilaṃ
tika-vin01t2:124_1: karontīti paṭhamaṃ sāmaññato baddhasikkhāpadaṃ mocetvā attano attano visaye anāpattikaraṇavasena
tika-vin01t2:124_2: sithilaṃ karontī. Dvāraṃ dadamānāti anāpattiyā dvāraṃ dadamānā. Tenevāha “aparāparampi
tika-vin01t2:124_3: anāpattiṃ kurumānā”ti. Nanu ca sañcarittasikkhāpade “antamaso taṅkhaṇikāyapī”ti anupaññatti
tika-vin01t2:124_4: uppajjamānā āpattimeva karontī uppannā, atha kasmā “anāpattiṃ kurumānā uppajjatī”ti
tika-vin01t2:124_5: vuttanti āha “antamaso taṅkhaṇikāyapī”tiādi. Udāyinā bhikkhunā taṅkhaṇikāya sañcarittaṃ
tika-vin01t2:124_6: āpannavatthusmiṃ paññattattā “kate vītikkame”ti vuttaṃ. Paññattigatikāva hotīti mūlapaññattiyaṃyeva antogadhā hoti.
tika-vin01t2:128_0: 43. Vesālī nivāso etesanti vesālikāti āha “vesālivāsino”ti. Vajjīsu janapade vasantā
tika-vin01t2:128_1: vajjino, vajjīnaṃ puttakā vajjiputtakāti āha “vajjiraṭṭhe vesāliyaṃ kulānaṃ puttā”ti.
tika-vin01t2:128_2: Ñātīnaṃ byasananti ñātīnaṃ vināso. So pana ñātīnaṃ vināso rājadaṇḍādikāraṇena hotīti
tika-vin01t2:128_5: āha “esa nayo dutiyapadepī”ti. Na buddhaṃ garahāmāti “asabbaññu buddho”tiādinā buddhaṃ
tika-vin01t2:128_6: na garahāma. Na dhammagarahinoti “aniyyāniko dhammo”tiādinā dhammaṃ na garahāma.
tika-vin01t2:128_7: Na saṅghagarahinoti “duppaṭipanno saṅgho”tiādinā saṅghaṃ na garahāma. Aṭṭhatiṃsārammaṇesūti
tika-vin01t2:128_8: dasa kasiṇā dasa asubhā dasānussatiyo cattāro brahmavihārā cattāro āruppā catudhātuvavatthānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:128_9: āhāre paṭikūlasaññāti imesu cattālīsakammaṭṭhānesu pāḷiyaṃ anāgatattā ālokākāsakasiṇadvayaṃ
tika-vin01t2:128_10: ṭhapetvā avasesāni gahetvā vuttaṃ. Vibhattā kusalā dhammāti “imasmiṃ ārammaṇe idaṃ
tika-vin01t2:128_11: hotī”ti evaṃ vibhattā upacārajjhānena saddhiṃ paṭhamajjhānādayo mahaggatakusalā dhammā.
tika-vin01t2:128_12: Teva dhammeti te eva kusale dhamme. Majjhimayāmo bhikkhūnaṃ niddākilamathavinodanokāsattā
tika-vin01t2:128_13: na gahitoti āha “paṭhamayāmañca pacchimayāmañcā”ti. Saccāni bujjhati paṭivijjhatīti
tika-vin01t2:128_14: bodhi, arahattamaggañāṇaṃ. Upakārakattena tassa pakkhe bhavā bodhipakkhiyāti āha
tika-vin01t2:128_15: “bodhissa pakkhe bhavānaṃ, arahattamaggañāṇassa upakārakāna”nti. Cattāro satipaṭṭhānā,
tika-vin01t2:128_16: cattāro sammappadhānā, cattāro iddhipādā, pañcindriyāni, pañca balāni, satta bojjhaṅgā,
tika-vin01t2:128_17: ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggoti ime sattatiṃsa bodhipakkhiyadhammā. “Gihipalibodhaṃ āvāsapalibodhañca
tika-vin01t2:128_18: pahāyā”ti imesaṃyeva dvinnaṃ palibodhānaṃ upacchedassa sudukkarabhāvato vuttaṃ. Yuttapayuttāti sammadeva yuttā.
tika-vin01t2:129_0: Āsayanti ajjhāsayaṃ. Sikkhaṃ appaccakkhāya bhikkhubhāve ṭhatvā paṭisevitamethunānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:129_1: tesaṃ vajjiputtakānaṃ upasampadaṃ anujānanto bhagavā “pārājiko hoti asaṃvāso”ti evaṃ
tika-vin01t2:129_2: paññattasikkhāpadaṃ samūhanati nāmāti āha – “yadi hi bhagavā…pe… paññattaṃ samūhaneyyā”ti.
tika-vin01t2:129_3: “Yo pana bhikkhū”ti vuttattā pana sikkhaṃ paccakkhāya paṭisevitamethunassa upasampadaṃ
tika-vin01t2:129_4: anujānanto na samūhanati nāma. Na hi so bhikkhu hutvā paṭisevati. “So āgato na upasampādetabbo”ti
tika-vin01t2:129_5: vacanato sāmaṇerabhūmi anuññātāti āha “sāmaṇerabhūmiyaṃ pana ṭhito”tiādi. Uttamatthanti
tika-vin01t2:132_0: 45. Nīharitvāti sāsanato nīharitvā. Tathā hi “pañcahupāli aṅgehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā
tika-vin01t2:132_1: nānuyuñjitabbaṃ. Katamehi pañcahi? Suttaṃ na jānāti, suttānulomaṃ na jānātī”ti evamādipariyattisāsanato
tika-vin01t2:132_2: suttaṃ suttānulomañca nīharitvā pakāsesuṃ, “anāpatti evaṃ amhākaṃ ācariyānaṃ uggaho
tika-vin01t2:132_3: paripucchāti gaṇhātī”ti evamādipariyattisāsanato ācariyavādaṃ nīharitvā pakāsesuṃ,
tika-vin01t2:132_4: bhārukacchakavatthusmiṃ “āyasmā upāli evamāha anāpatti āvuso supinantenā”ti evamādipariyattisāsanato
tika-vin01t2:132_5: eva attanomatiṃ nīharitvā pakāsesuṃ. Tāya hi attanomatiyā thero etadaggaṭṭhānaṃ labhi.
tika-vin01t2:133_0: Vuttanti nāgasenattherena vuttaṃ. Pajjate anena atthoti padaṃ, bhagavatā kaṇṭhādivaṇṇappavattiṭṭhānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:133_1: āhacca visesetvā bhāsitaṃ padaṃ āhaccapadaṃ, bhagavatoyeva vacanaṃ. Tenāha “āhaccapadanti
tika-vin01t2:133_2: suttaṃ adhippeta”nti. “Idaṃ kappati, idaṃ na kappatī”ti evaṃ avisesetvā “yaṃ, bhikkhave,
tika-vin01t2:133_3: mayā ‘idaṃ na kappatī’ti appaṭikkhittaṃ, tañce akappiyaṃ anulometi, kappiyaṃ paṭibāhati,
tika-vin01t2:133_4: taṃ vo na kappatī”tiādinā vuttaṃ sāmaññalakkhaṇaṃ idha “raso”ti adhippetanti āha
tika-vin01t2:134_0: Idha vinayavinicchayassa adhikatattā tadanucchavikameva suttaṃ dassento āha – “suttaṃ
tika-vin01t2:134_1: nāma sakale vinayapiṭake pāḷī”ti. Mahāpadesāti mahāokāsā, mahantāni vinayassa patiṭṭhāpanaṭṭhānāni
tika-vin01t2:134_2: yesu patiṭṭhāpito vinayo vinicchayati asandehato. Mahantāni vā kāraṇāni mahāpadesā,
tika-vin01t2:134_3: mahantāni vinayavinicchayakāraṇānīti vuttaṃ hoti. “Atthato pana ‘yaṃ, bhikkhave’tiādinā
tika-vin01t2:134_4: vuttā sādhippāyā pāḷiyeva mahāpadesā”ti vadanti. Tenevāha “ye bhagavatā evaṃ vuttā”tiādi.
tika-vin01t2:134_5: Ime ca mahāpadesā khandhake āgatā, tasmā tesaṃ vinicchayakathā tattheva āvi bhavissatīti
tika-vin01t2:134_6: idha na vuccati. Yadipi tattha tattha bhagavatā pavattitā pakiṇṇakadesanāva aṭṭhakathā,
tika-vin01t2:134_7: sā pana dhammasaṅgāhakehi paṭhamaṃ tīṇi piṭakāni saṅgāyitvā tassa atthavaṇṇanānurūpeneva
tika-vin01t2:134_8: vācanāmaggaṃ āropitattā “ācariyavādo”ti vuccati ācariyā vadanti saṃvaṇṇenti pāḷiṃ
tika-vin01t2:134_9: etenāti katvā. Tenāha – “ācariyavādo nāma…pe… aṭṭhakathātantī”ti. Tisso saṅgītiyo
tika-vin01t2:134_10: āruḷhoyeva ca buddhavacanassa atthasaṃvaṇṇanābhūto kathāmaggo mahāmahindattherena
tika-vin01t2:134_11: tambapaṇṇidīpaṃ ābhato, pacchā tambapaṇṇiyehi mahātherehi sīhaḷabhāsāya ṭhapito nikāyantaraladdhisaṅkarapariharaṇatthaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:134_12: Kiñcāpi attanomati suttādīhi saṃsanditvāva parikappīyati, tathāpi sā na suttādīsu
tika-vin01t2:135_0: Attanomatiṃ sāmaññato paṭhamaṃ dassetvā idāni tameva visesetvā dassento “apicā”tiādimāha.
tika-vin01t2:135_1: Idāni tattha paṭipajjitabbākāraṃ dassento āha – “taṃ pana attanomatiṃ gahetvā kathentenā”tiādi.
tika-vin01t2:135_2: Atthenāti attanā sallakkhitena atthena. Ācariyavāde otāretabbāti ācariyavāde ñāṇena
tika-vin01t2:135_3: anuppavesetabbā. Sabbadubbalāti puggalassa sayaṃ paṭibhānabhāvato. Pamādapāṭhavasena
tika-vin01t2:135_4: ācariyavādassa kadāci suttānulomena asaṃsandanāpi siyā, so na gahetabboti dassento
tika-vin01t2:135_5: āha – “ācariyavādopi…pe… samento eva gahetabbo”ti. Samentameva gahetabbanti yathā
tika-vin01t2:135_6: suttena saṃsandati, evaṃ mahāpadesato atthā uddharitabbāti dasseti. Suttānulomassa
tika-vin01t2:135_7: suttekadesattepi sutte viya “idaṃ kappati, idaṃ na kappatī”ti paricchinditvā āhaccabhāsitaṃ
tika-vin01t2:135_8: kiñci natthīti āha – “suttānulomato hi suttameva balavatara”nti. Appaṭivattiyanti
tika-vin01t2:135_10: ṭhitakālasadisanti iminā buddheheva kathitattā dharamānabuddhasadisanti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin01t2:135_11: Sutte hi paṭibāhite buddhova paṭibāhito hoti. Sakavādī suttaṃ gahetvā kathetīti sakavādī
tika-vin01t2:135_12: attano suttaṃ gahetvā voharati. Paravādī suttānulomanti aññanikāyavādī attano nikāye
tika-vin01t2:135_13: suttānulomaṃ gahetvā katheti. Khepaṃ vā garahaṃ vā akatvāti “kiṃ iminā”ti khepaṃ
tika-vin01t2:135_14: vā “kimesa bālo vadatī”ti garahaṃ vā akatvā. Suttānulomanti paravādinā vuttaṃ aññanikāye
tika-vin01t2:135_15: suttānulomaṃ. Sutte otāretabbanti sakavādinā attano sutte otāretabbaṃ. Suttasmiṃyeva
tika-vin01t2:135_16: ṭhātabbanti attano sutteyeva ṭhātabbaṃ. Evaṃ sesavāresupi atthayojanā kātabbā. Ayanti
tika-vin01t2:136_0: Nanu ca “suttānulomato suttameva balavatara”nti heṭṭhā vuttaṃ, idha pana “suttānulome
tika-vin01t2:136_1: suttaṃ otāretabba”ntiādi kasmā vuttanti? Nāyaṃ virodho. “Suttānulomato suttameva
tika-vin01t2:136_2: balavatara”nti hi idaṃ sakamateyeva suttaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Tattha hi sakamatipariyāpannameva
tika-vin01t2:136_3: suttādiṃ sandhāya “attanomati sabbadubbalā, attanomatito ācariyavādo balavataro,
tika-vin01t2:136_4: ācariyavādato suttānulomaṃ balavataraṃ, suttānulomato suttameva balavatara”nti ca
tika-vin01t2:136_5: vuttaṃ. Idha pana paravādinā ānītaṃ aññanikāye suttaṃ sandhāya “suttānulome suttaṃ
tika-vin01t2:136_6: otāretabba”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Tasmā paravādinā ānītaṃ suttādiṃ attano suttānulomaācariyavādaattanomatīsu
tika-vin01t2:136_7: otāretvā samentaṃyeva gahetabbaṃ, itaraṃ na gahetabbanti ayaṃ nayo idha vuccatīti
tika-vin01t2:137_1: suttāni. Vedallādīnanti ādi-saddena guḷhaummaggādiggahaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ, itaraṃ gārayhasuttaṃ
tika-vin01t2:137_2: na gahetabbaṃ. Attanomatiyameva ṭhātabbanti iminā aññanikāyato ānītasuttatopi sakanikāye
tika-vin01t2:137_3: attanomatiyeva balavatarāti dasseti. Sakavādī suttaṃ gahetvā katheti, paravādīpi
tika-vin01t2:137_4: suttamevātievamādinā samānajātikānaṃ vasena vāro na vutto, suttassa sutteyeva otāraṇaṃ
tika-vin01t2:137_5: bhinnaṃ viya hutvā na paññāyati, vuttanayeneva ca sakkā yojetunti.
tika-vin01t2:138_0: Idāni sakavādīparavādīnaṃ kappiyākappiyādibhāvaṃ sandhāya vivāde uppanne tattha paṭipajjitabbavidhiṃ
tika-vin01t2:138_1: dassento āha – “atha panāyaṃ kappiyanti gahetvā kathetī”tiādi. Tattha sutte ca suttānulome
tika-vin01t2:138_2: ca otāretabbanti sakavādinā attanoyeva sutte ca suttānulome ca otāretabbaṃ. Paro
tika-vin01t2:138_3: kāraṇaṃ na vindatīti paravādī kāraṇaṃ na labhati. Suttato bahuṃ kāraṇañca vinicchayañca
tika-vin01t2:138_4: dassetīti paravādī attano suttato bahuṃ kāraṇaṃ vinicchayañca āharitvā dasseti. Sādhūti
tika-vin01t2:138_5: sampaṭicchitvā akappiyeva ṭhātabbanti iminā attano nikāye suttādīni alabhantena sakavādinā
tika-vin01t2:138_6: paravādīvacaneyeva ṭhātabbanti vadati. Dvinnampi kāraṇacchāyā dissatīti sakavādīparavādīnaṃ
tika-vin01t2:138_7: ubhinnampi kappiyākappiyabhāvasādhakaṃ kāraṇapatirūpakaṃ dissati. Yadi dvinnampi
tika-vin01t2:138_8: kāraṇacchāyā dissati, kasmā “akappiyeva ṭhātabba”nti āha “vinayañhi patvā”tiādi.
tika-vin01t2:138_9: “Vinayaṃ patvā”ti vuttamevatthaṃ pākaṭataraṃ katvā dassento āha “kappiyākappiyavicāraṇamāgammā”ti.
tika-vin01t2:138_10: Rundhitabbantiādīsu dubbiññeyyavinicchaye kappiyākappiyabhāve sati kappiyanti gahaṇaṃ
tika-vin01t2:138_11: rundhitabbaṃ, akappiyanti gahaṇaṃ gāḷhaṃ kātabbaṃ. Aparāparaṃ pavattakappiyagahaṇasotaṃ
tika-vin01t2:139_0: Bahūhi suttavinicchayakāraṇehīti bahūhi suttehi ceva tato ānītavinicchayakāraṇehi
tika-vin01t2:139_1: ca. Attano gahaṇaṃ na vissajjetabbanti sakavādinā attano akappiyanti gahaṇaṃ na vissajjetabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:139_2: Idāni vuttamevatthaṃ nigamento “eva”ntiādimāha. Tattha yoti sakavādīparavādīsu yo
tika-vin01t2:139_3: koci. Keci pana “sakavādīsuyeva yo koci idhādhippeto”ti vadanti, evaṃ sante “atha
tika-vin01t2:139_4: panāyaṃ kappiyanti gahetvā kathetī”tiādīsu sabbattha ubhopi sakavādinoyeva siyuṃ
tika-vin01t2:139_5: heṭṭhā vuttasseva nigamanavasena “eva”ntiādīnaṃ vuttattā, tasmā taṃ na gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:139_6: Atirekakāraṇaṃ labhatīti ettha suttādīsu purimaṃ purimaṃ atirekakāraṇaṃ nāma, yo
tika-vin01t2:139_7: vā suttādīsu catūsu bahutaraṃ kāraṇaṃ labhati, so atirekakāraṇaṃ labhati nāma.
tika-vin01t2:140_0: Suṭṭhu pavatti etassāti suppavatti, suṭṭhu pavattati sīlenāti vā suppavatti. Tenāha
tika-vin01t2:140_1: “suppavattīti suṭṭhu pavatta”nti. Vācāya uggataṃ vācuggataṃ, vacasā suggahitanti
tika-vin01t2:140_2: vuttaṃ hoti. Suttatoti imassa vivaraṇaṃ “pāḷito”ti. Ettha ca “suttaṃ nāma sakalaṃ
tika-vin01t2:140_3: vinayapiṭaka”nti vuttattā pāḷitoti tadatthadīpikā aññāyeva pāḷi veditabbā. Anubyañjanasoti
tika-vin01t2:140_4: imassa vivaraṇaṃ “paripucchato ca aṭṭhakathāto cā”ti. Pāḷiṃ anugantvā atthassa byañjanato
tika-vin01t2:140_5: pakāsanato anubyañjananti hi paripucchā aṭṭhakathā ca vuccati. Ettha ca aṭṭhakathāya
tika-vin01t2:140_6: visuṃ gahitattā paripucchāti theravādo vutto. Saṅghabhedassa pubbabhāge pavattakalahassetaṃ
tika-vin01t2:140_7: adhivacanaṃ saṅgharājīti. Kukkuccakoti aṇumattesupi vajjesu bhayadassanavasena kukkuccaṃ
tika-vin01t2:140_8: uppādento. Tantiṃ avisaṃvādetvāti pāḷiṃ aññathā akatvā. Avokkamantoti anatikkamanto.
tika-vin01t2:141_0: Vitthunatīti atthaṃ adisvā nitthunati. Vipphandatīti kampati. Santiṭṭhituṃ na sakkotīti
tika-vin01t2:141_1: ekasmiṃyeva atthe patiṭṭhātuṃ na sakkoti. Tenāha “yaṃ yaṃ parena vuccati, taṃ taṃ
tika-vin01t2:141_2: anujānātī”ti. Paravādaṃ gaṇhātīti “ucchumhi kasaṭaṃ yāvajīvikaṃ, raso sattāhakāliko,
tika-vin01t2:141_3: tadubhayavinimutto ca ucchu nāma visuṃ natthi, tasmā ucchupi vikāle vaṭṭatī”ti paravādinā
tika-vin01t2:141_4: vutte tampi gaṇhāti. Ekekalomanti palitaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Yamhīti yasmiṃ puggale.
tika-vin01t2:142_0: Ācariyaparamparā kho panassa suggahitā hotīti ettha ācariyaparamparāti ācariyānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:142_1: vinicchayaparamparā. Teneva vakkhati “yathā ācariyo ca ācariyācariyo ca pāḷiñca paripucchañca
tika-vin01t2:142_2: vadanti, tathā ñātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti. Pubbāparānusandhitoti “idaṃ pubbavacanaṃ, idaṃ paravacanaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:142_3: ayamanusandhī”ti evaṃ pubbāparānusandhito. Ācariyaparamparanti imasseva vevacanaṃ
tika-vin01t2:142_4: theravādaṅganti, therapaṭipāṭinti attho. Dve tayo parivaṭṭāti dve tisso paramparā.
tika-vin01t2:143_0: Imehi ca pana tīhi lakkhaṇehīti “suttamassa svāgataṃ hotī”tiādinā heṭṭhā vuttehi
tika-vin01t2:143_1: tīhi lakkhaṇehi. Ettha ca paṭhamena lakkhaṇena vinayassa suṭṭhu uggahitabhāvo vutto,
tika-vin01t2:143_2: dutiyena uggahitena acalatā suppatiṭṭhitatā vuttā, tatiyena yaṃ pāḷiyā aṭṭhakathāya
tika-vin01t2:143_3: ca natthi, tampi ācariyavacanena vinicchinituṃ samatthatā vuttā. Otiṇṇe vatthusminti
tika-vin01t2:143_4: codanāsaṅkhāte vītikkamasaṅkhāte vā vatthusmiṃ saṅghamajjhe otiṇṇe, osaṭeti attho.
tika-vin01t2:143_5: Vuttameva vibhāvento “codakena ca cuditakena ca vutte vattabbe”ti āha. Keci pana
tika-vin01t2:143_6: “codakena otiṇṇe vatthusmiṃ cuditakena ca vutte vattabbe”ti evaṃ yojenti. Apare pana
tika-vin01t2:143_7: “codakena ca cuditakena ca vutte vinayadharena ca vattabbe”ti evampi yojenti. “Codakena
tika-vin01t2:143_8: ca cuditakena ca vutte vattabbe”ti ayameva pana yojanā sundaratarāti veditabbā. Vatthu
tika-vin01t2:143_9: oloketabbanti tassa tassa sikkhāpadassa vatthu oloketabbaṃ. “Tiṇena vā paṇṇena vā…pe…
tika-vin01t2:143_10: yo āgaccheyya, āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti hi idaṃ nissaggiye aññātakaviññattisikkhāpadassa
tika-vin01t2:143_12: āpattīnaṃ aññatara”nti vuttaṃ. Aññataraṃ vā āpattinti “kāle vikālasaññī āpatti dukkaṭassa,
tika-vin01t2:143_13: kāle vematiko āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti evamādinā āgataṃ dukkaṭaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Sikkhāpadantaresūti
tika-vin01t2:144_0: Sukhumāti attanopi duviññeyyasabhāvassa lahuparivattino cittassa sīghaparivattitāya
tika-vin01t2:144_1: vuttaṃ. Tenāha “cittalahukā”ti. Cittaṃ lahu sīghaparivatti etesanti cittalahukā.
tika-vin01t2:144_2: Teti te vītikkame. Taṃvatthukanti te adinnādānamanussaviggahavītikkamā vatthu adhiṭṭhānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:144_3: kāraṇametassāti taṃvatthukaṃ. Sīlāni sodhetvāti yaṃvatthukaṃ kukkuccaṃ uppannaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:144_4: taṃ amanasikaritvā avasesasīlāni sodhetvā. Pākaṭabhāvato sukhavaḷañjanatāya ca “dvattiṃsākāraṃ
tika-vin01t2:144_5: tāva manasi karohī”ti vuttaṃ. Aññasmiṃ pana kammaṭṭhāne kataparicayena tadeva manasi
tika-vin01t2:144_6: kātabbaṃ. Kammaṭṭhānaṃ ghaṭayatīti antarantarā khaṇḍaṃ adassetvā cittena saddhiṃ
tika-vin01t2:144_7: ālambanabhāvena cirakālaṃ ghaṭayati. Saṅkhārā pākaṭā hutvā upaṭṭhahantīti vipassanākammaṭṭhāniko
tika-vin01t2:144_8: ce, tassa saṅkhārā pākaṭā hutvā upaṭṭhahanti. Sace katapārājikavītikkamo bhaveyya,
tika-vin01t2:144_9: tassa satipi asaritukāmatāya vippaṭisāravatthuvasena punappunaṃ taṃ upaṭṭhahatīti
tika-vin01t2:144_10: cittekaggataṃ na vindati. Tena vuttaṃ “kammaṭṭhānaṃ na ghaṭayatī”tiādi. Attanā jānātīti
tika-vin01t2:144_11: sayameva jānāti. Paccatte cetaṃ karaṇavacanaṃ, attā jānātīti vuttaṃ hoti. Aññā ca
tika-vin01t2:144_12: devatā jānantīti ārakkhadevatāhi aññā paracittaviduniyo devatā ca jānanti.
tika-vin01t2:148_0: Tasmāti yasmā pana-saddaṃ apanetvā aniyamena puggaladīpakaṃ yo-saddameva āha, tasmā.
tika-vin01t2:148_1: Etthāti imasmiṃ yo-sadde. Pana-saddassa nipātamattattā yo-saddasseva atthaṃ pakāsento
tika-vin01t2:148_2: “yo kocīti vuttaṃ hotī”ti āha. Yo koci nāmāti yo vā so vā yo kocīti vutto. Vāsadhurayutto
tika-vin01t2:149_0: Bhikkhatīti yācati. Labhanto vā alabhanto vāti yo koci bhikkhati bhikkhaṃ esati gavesati,
tika-vin01t2:149_1: so taṃ labhatu vā mā vā, tathāpi bhikkhatīti bhikkhūti ayamettha adhippāyo. Ariyāya
tika-vin01t2:149_2: yācanāyāti “uddissa ariyā tiṭṭhanti, esā ariyāna yācanā”ti evaṃ vuttāya ariyayācanāya,
tika-vin01t2:149_3: na kapaṇaddhikavaṇibbakayācakānaṃ viya “dehi dehī”ti evaṃ pavattayācanāya. Bhikkhācariyanti
tika-vin01t2:149_4: uñchācariyaṃ. Ajjhupagatattāti anuṭṭhitattā. Kājabhattanti kājehi ānītaṃ bhattaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:149_6: bhedoti adhippetaṃ. Dhovitvā apanetuṃ asakkuṇeyyasabhāvaṃ malaṃ, tathā apanetuṃ sakkuṇeyyasabhāvā
tika-vin01t2:149_7: jallikā. Bhinnapaṭadharoti nibbacanaṃ bhinnapaṭadhare bhikkhu-saddassa niruḷhattā kataṃ.
tika-vin01t2:150_0: Upanissayasampannanti pubbe aṭṭhaparikkhāradānūpanissayasampannaṃ. Yo hi cīvarādike
tika-vin01t2:150_1: aṭṭha parikkhāre pattacīvarameva vā sotāpannādiariyassa puthujjanasseva vā sīlasampannassa
tika-vin01t2:150_2: datvā “idaṃ parikkhāradānaṃ anāgate ehibhikkhubhāvāya paccayo hotū”ti patthanaṃ paṭṭhapesi,
tika-vin01t2:150_3: tassa taṃ sati adhikārasampattiyaṃ buddhānaṃ sammukhībhāve iddhimayaparikkhāralābhāya
tika-vin01t2:150_4: saṃvattatīti veditabbaṃ. Brahmaghosanti uttamaghosaṃ, brahmuno ghosasadisaṃ vā ghosaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:150_5: Brahmacariyanti sāsanabrahmacariyaṃ maggabrahmacariyañca. Dukkhassa sammā antakiriyāyāti
tika-vin01t2:150_6: yojetabbaṃ. Bhaṇḍūti muṇḍo. Vāsīti dantakaṭṭhacchedanavāsi. Bandhananti kāyabandhanaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:150_7: Yutto bhāvanānuyogo assāti yuttayogo, tassa yuttayogassa, bhāvanānuyogamanuyuttassāti
tika-vin01t2:150_9: Buddhova pabbajjācariyo upasampadācariyo ca assāti buddhācariyako. Paṭhamabodhiyampi
tika-vin01t2:150_10: paṭhamakāleyeva sesaupasampadānaṃ abhāvoti āha “paṭhamabodhiyaṃ ekasmiṃ kāle”ti.
tika-vin01t2:150_11: Pañca pañcavaggiyattherāti pañcavaggiyattherā pañca. Tīṇi satanti tīṇi satāni, gāthābandhasukhatthaṃ
tika-vin01t2:150_12: vacanavipallāso kato. Eko ca theroti aṅgulimālattheraṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Na vuttāti
tika-vin01t2:151_0: Veḷuvanamahāvihāre gandhakuṭiyaṃ nisinnoyeva bhagavā mahākassapattherassa attānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:151_1: uddissa pabbajitabhāvaṃ viditvā tassa paccuggamanaṃ karonto tigāvutaṃ maggaṃ ekakova
tika-vin01t2:151_2: gantvā bahuputtanigrodhamūle pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā nisinno attano santikaṃ āgantvā
tika-vin01t2:151_3: paramanipaccakāraṃ dassetvā “satthā me bhante bhagavā, sāvakohamasmi, satthā me bhante
tika-vin01t2:151_4: bhagavā, sāvakohamasmī”ti tikkhattuṃ attano sāvakattaṃ sāvetvā ṭhitassa mahākassapattherassa
tika-vin01t2:151_5: nipaccakāramahattataṃ attano ca mahānubhāvataṃ dīpetuṃ yassa aññassa ajānaṃyeva “jānāmī”ti
tika-vin01t2:151_6: paṭiññassa bāhirakassa satthuno evaṃ sabbacetasā samannāgato pasannacitto sāvako
tika-vin01t2:151_7: evarūpaṃ paramanipaccakāraṃ kareyya, tassa vaṇṭacchinnatālapakkaṃ viya gīvato muddhāpi
tika-vin01t2:151_8: vipateyya, sattadhā vā phaleyyāti dassento “yo kho, kassapa, evaṃ sabbacetasā samannāgataṃ
tika-vin01t2:151_9: sāvakaṃ ajānaṃyeva vadeyya ‘jānāmī’ti, apassaṃyeva vadeyya ‘passāmī’ti, muddhāpi
tika-vin01t2:151_10: tassa vipateyya, sattadhā vā phaleyya, ahaṃ kho, kassapa, jānaṃyeva vadāmi ‘jānāmī’ti,
tika-vin01t2:151_11: passaṃyeva vadāmi ‘passāmī”’ ti vatvā jātimadamānamadarūpamadappahānatthaṃ tīhi ovādehi
tika-vin01t2:152_0: Tattha tasmātihāti tasmā icceva vuttaṃ hoti, yasmā ahaṃ jānantova “jānāmī”ti passanto
tika-vin01t2:152_1: eva ca “passāmī”ti vadāmi, tasmāti attho. Ti-kāra ha-kārā nipātā. Ihāti vā imasmiṃ
tika-vin01t2:152_2: sāsane, ta-kāro padasandhivasena āgato. Evaṃ sikkhitabbanti idāni vuccamānākārena
tika-vin01t2:152_3: sikkhitabbaṃ. Tibbanti bahalaṃ mahantaṃ. Hirottappañcāti hirī ca ottappañca. Paccupaṭṭhitaṃ
tika-vin01t2:152_4: bhavissatīti upasaṅkamanato paṭhamatarameva upaṭṭhitaṃ bhavissati. Tathā hi sati
tika-vin01t2:152_5: tesaṃ purato assa sagāravasappatissavatā saṇṭhāti. Yo ca therādīsu hirottappaṃ upaṭṭhapetvā
tika-vin01t2:152_6: upasaṅkamati, therādayopi taṃ sahirikā saottappā ca hutvā upasaṅkamantīti ayamettha
tika-vin01t2:152_7: ānisaṃso. Kusalūpasaṃhitanti kusalanissitaṃ, anavajjadhammanissitanti attho. Aṭṭhiṃ
tika-vin01t2:152_8: katvāti attānaṃ tena dhammena aṭṭhikaṃ katvā, taṃ vā dhammaṃ “esa mayhaṃ dhammo”ti
tika-vin01t2:152_9: aṭṭhiṃ katvā. Manasi katvāti citte ṭhapetvā. Sabbacetasā samannāharitvāti cittassa
tika-vin01t2:152_10: thokampi bahi gantuṃ adento sabbena samannāhāracittena samannāharitvā. Ohitasototi
tika-vin01t2:152_11: ṭhapitasoto, dhamme nihitasototi attho. Evañhi te sikkhitabbanti ñāṇasotañca pasādasotañca
tika-vin01t2:152_12: odahitvā “mayā desitaṃ dhammaṃ sakkaccameva suṇissāmī”ti evañhi te sikkhitabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:152_13: Sātasahagatā ca me kāyagatāsatīti asubhesu ceva ānāpāne ca paṭhamajjhānavasena sukhasampayuttā
tika-vin01t2:152_14: kāyagatāsati. Yo ca panāyaṃ tividho ovādo, therassa ayameva pabbajjā ca upasampadā ca ahosi.
tika-vin01t2:153_0: Kasiṇārammaṇaṃ rūpāvacarajjhānaṃ rūpasaññā. Saññāsīsena hettha jhānaṃ vuttaṃ, tadeva
tika-vin01t2:153_2: puṭṭho “ete dve rūpāvacarabhāvena ekatthā, byañjanameva nāna”nti āha. Āraddhacittoti
tika-vin01t2:153_3: ārādhitacitto. Garudhammapaṭiggahaṇādiupasampadā upari vitthārato sayameva āvi bhavissati.
tika-vin01t2:154_0: Kalyāṇaputhujjanādayoti ettha bahūnaṃ nānappakārānaṃ sakkāyadiṭṭhiādīnaṃ avihatattā
tika-vin01t2:154_1: janeti, tāhi vā janitoti puthujjano, kalyāṇo ca so puthujjano cāti kalyāṇaputhujjano,
tika-vin01t2:154_2: so ādi yesaṃ sotāpannādīnaṃ te kalyāṇaputhujjanādayo. Kalyāṇaggahaṇena cettha andhaputhujjanaṃ
tika-vin01t2:154_3: nivatteti. Dvidhā hi puthujjanā andhaputhujjano kalyāṇaputhujjanoti. Vuttañhetaṃ –
tika-vin01t2:157_0: Bhadrāya paññāya bhadrāya vimuttiyāti yojetabbaṃ. Sīlenātiādīsu sīlanti catupārisuddhisīlaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:157_1: Samādhīti vipassanāpādakā aṭṭha samāpattiyo. Paññāti lokiyalokuttarañāṇaṃ. Vimuttīti
tika-vin01t2:157_3: cettha yojanā veditabbā. Kalyāṇaputhujjanassa hi sīlādayo tayo eva sambhavanti, ariyānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:157_4: pana sabbepi sīlādayo. Sāro bhikkhūtipi kalyāṇaputhujjanādayova vuttāti āha “tehiyeva
tika-vin01t2:157_5: sīlasārādīhī”tiādi. Atha vā nippariyāyato khīṇāsavova sāro bhikkhu nāmāti āha “vigatakilesapheggubhāvato vā”tiādi.
tika-vin01t2:158_0: Yopi kalyāṇaputhujjano anulomapaṭipadāya paripūrakārī sīlasampanno indriyesu guttadvāro
tika-vin01t2:158_1: bhojane mattaññū jāgariyānuyogamanuyutto pubbarattāpararattaṃ bodhipakkhiyānaṃ dhammānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:158_2: bhāvanānuyogamanuyutto viharati “ajja vā sve vā aññataraṃ sāmaññaphalaṃ adhigamissāmī”ti,
tika-vin01t2:158_3: sopi vuccati sikkhatīti sekhoti āha “puthujjanakalyāṇakena saddhi”nti. Satta ariyāti
tika-vin01t2:158_4: cattāro maggaṭṭhā, heṭṭhimā ca tayo phalaṭṭhāti ime satta ariyā. Tisso sikkhāti adhisīlādikā
tika-vin01t2:158_5: tisso sikkhā. Sikkhāsu jātoti vā sekho. Ariyapuggalo hi ariyāya jātiyā jāyamāno sikkhāsu
tika-vin01t2:158_6: jāyati, na yoniyaṃ. Sikkhanasīloti vā sekho, puggalādhiṭṭhānāya vā kathāya sekhassa
tika-vin01t2:158_7: ayanti anaññasādhāraṇā maggaphalattayadhammā sekhapariyāyena vuttā. Asekhoti ca yattha
tika-vin01t2:158_8: sekhabhāvāsaṅkā atthi, tatthāyaṃ paṭisedhoti lokiyanibbānesu asekhabhāvānāpatti daṭṭhabbā.
tika-vin01t2:158_9: Sīlasamādhipaññāsaṅkhātā hi sikkhā attano paṭipakkhakilesehi vimuttattā parisuddhā,
tika-vin01t2:158_10: upakkilesānaṃ ārammaṇabhāvampi anupagamanato etā sikkhāti vattuṃ yuttā, aṭṭhasupi
tika-vin01t2:158_11: maggaphalesu vijjanti, tasmā catumaggaheṭṭhimaphalattayasamaṅgino viya arahattaphalasamaṅgīpi
tika-vin01t2:158_12: tāsu sikkhāsu jātoti taṃsamaṅgino arahato itaresaṃ viya sekhatte sati sekhassa ayanti,
tika-vin01t2:158_13: sikkhā sīlaṃ etassāti ca sekhoti vattabbo siyāti taṃ nivattanatthaṃ “asekho”ti yathāvuttasekhabhāvapaṭisedho
tika-vin01t2:158_14: kato. Arahattaphalehi pavattamānā sikkhā pariniṭṭhitasikkhākiccattā na sikkhākiccaṃ
tika-vin01t2:158_15: karonti, kevalaṃ sikkhāphalabhāveneva pavattanti, tasmā tā na sikkhāvacanaṃ arahanti,
tika-vin01t2:158_16: nāpi taṃsamaṅgī sekhavacanaṃ, na ca sikkhanasīlo, sikkhāsu jātoti ca vattabbataṃ
tika-vin01t2:158_17: arahati, heṭṭhimaphalesu pana sikkhā sakadāgāmimaggavipassanādīnaṃ upanissayabhāvato
tika-vin01t2:158_18: sikkhākiccaṃ karontīti sikkhāvacanaṃ arahanti, taṃsamaṅgino ca sekhavacanaṃ sikkhanasīlā,
tika-vin01t2:158_19: sikkhāsu jātāti ca vattabbataṃ arahanti “sikkhantīti sekhā”ti apariyositasikkhānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:158_20: dassitattā, “na sikkhatīti asekho”ti iminā pariyositasikkho dassito, na sikkhāya
tika-vin01t2:158_21: rahitoti āha – “sekkhadhamme atikkamma …pe… khīṇāsavo asekhoti vuccatī”ti. Vuddhippattasikkho
tika-vin01t2:158_22: vā asekhoti etasmiṃ atthe sekhadhammesu eva ṭhitassa kassaci ariyassa asekhabhāvāpattīti
tika-vin01t2:158_23: arahattamaggadhammā vuddhippattā ca yathāvuttehi atthehi sekhāti katvā taṃsamaṅgino
tika-vin01t2:158_24: aggamaggaṭṭhassa asekhabhāvo āpannoti? Na, taṃsadisesu tabbohārato. Arahattamaggato
tika-vin01t2:158_25: hi ninnānākaraṇaṃ arahattaphalaṃ ṭhapetvā pariññākiccakaraṇaṃ vipākabhāvañca, tasmā
tika-vin01t2:158_26: te eva sekhā aggaphaladhammabhāvaṃ āpannāti sakkā vattuṃ. Kusalasukhato ca vipākasukhaṃ
tika-vin01t2:158_27: santataratāya paṇītataranti vuddhippattā ca te dhammā hontīti taṃsamaṅgī asekhoti vuccatīti.
tika-vin01t2:159_0: Sabbantimena pariyāyenāti sabbantimena paricchedena. Upasampadākammassa adhikārattā
tika-vin01t2:159_1: “pañcavaggakaraṇīye”ti vuttaṃ. Pañcannaṃ vaggo samūhoti pañcavaggo, pañcaparimāṇayutto
tika-vin01t2:159_2: vā vaggo pañcavaggo, tena kattabbaṃ kammaṃ pañcavaggakaraṇīyaṃ. Yāvatikā bhikkhūti
tika-vin01t2:159_3: yattakā bhikkhū. Kammappattāti kammārahā pārājikaṃ anāpannā anukkhittā ca. Upasampadākammassa
tika-vin01t2:159_4: pañcavaggakaraṇīyattā pañceva bhikkhū kammappattā ettakehipi kammasiddhito, itare
tika-vin01t2:159_5: chandārahā. Ñatticatutthenāti ettha kiñcāpi ñatti sabbapaṭhamaṃ vuccati, tissannaṃ
tika-vin01t2:159_6: pana anussāvanānaṃ atthabyañjanabhedābhāvato atthabyañjanabhinnā ñatti tāsaṃ catutthāti
tika-vin01t2:159_8: ekāya ca ñattiyā”ti vuttaṃ, atthappavattikkamena pana “ekāya ñattiyā tīhi anussāvanāhī”ti
tika-vin01t2:159_10: puggalo, so ṭhapetvā ūnavīsativassaṃ antimavatthuṃ ajjhāpannapubbaṃ paṇḍakādayo ca
tika-vin01t2:159_11: ekādasa abhabbapuggale veditabbo. Ūnavīsativassādayo hi terasa puggalā upasampadāya
tika-vin01t2:159_12: avatthu, ime pana ṭhapetvā aññasmiṃ upasampadāpekkhe sati upasampadākammaṃ vatthusampattisampannaṃ nāma hoti.
tika-vin01t2:160_0: Vatthusaṅghapuggalañattīnaṃ aparāmasanāni pacchā ñattiṭṭhapanañcāti ime tāva pañca
tika-vin01t2:160_1: ñattidosā. Tattha “ayaṃ itthannāmo”ti upasampadāpekkhassa akittanaṃ vatthuaparāmasanaṃ
tika-vin01t2:160_2: nāma. “Suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho”ti ettha “suṇātu me, bhante”ti vatvā “saṅgho”ti
tika-vin01t2:160_4: akittanaṃ puggalaaparāmasanaṃ nāma. Sabbena sabbaṃ ñattiyā anuccāraṇaṃ ñattiaparāmasanaṃ
tika-vin01t2:160_5: nāma. Paṭhamaṃ kammavācaṃ niṭṭhāpetvā “esā ñattī”ti vatvā “khamati saṅghassā”ti evaṃ
tika-vin01t2:160_6: ñattikittanaṃ pacchā ñattiṭṭhapanaṃ nāma. Iti imehi dosehi vimuttāya ñattiyā sampannaṃ
tika-vin01t2:161_0: Vatthusaṅghapuggalānaṃ aparāmasanāni sāvanāya hāpanaṃ akāle sāvananti ime pañca anussāvanadosā.
tika-vin01t2:161_1: Tattha vatthādīnaṃ aparāmasanāni ñattiyaṃ vuttasadisāneva. Tīsu pana anussāvanāsu
tika-vin01t2:161_2: yattha katthaci etesaṃ aparāmasanaṃ aparāmasanameva, sabbena sabbaṃ pana kammavācaṃ
tika-vin01t2:161_3: avatvā catukkhattuṃ ñattikittanameva. Atha vā pana kammavācabbhantare akkharassa
tika-vin01t2:161_4: vā padassa vā anuccāraṇaṃ vā duruccāraṇaṃ vā sāvanāya hāpanaṃ nāma. Sāvanāya anokāse
tika-vin01t2:161_5: paṭhamaṃ ñattiṃ aṭṭhapetvā anussāvanakaraṇaṃ akāle sāvanaṃ nāma. Iti imehi dosehi
tika-vin01t2:162_0: Vipattisīmālakkhaṇaṃ samatikkantāya pana sīmāya kataṃ sīmāsampattisampannaṃ nāma.
tika-vin01t2:162_1: Yāvatikā bhikkhū kammappattā, tesaṃ anāgamanaṃ, chandārahānaṃ chandassa anāharaṇaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:162_2: sammukhībhūtānaṃ paṭikkosananti ime pana tayo parisadosā, tehi vimuttāya parisāya
tika-vin01t2:163_1: ṭhānaṃ, yathā ca taṃ kattabbanti bhagavatā anusiṭṭhaṃ, tathā katattā tadanucchavikaṃ
tika-vin01t2:163_2: yathāvuttaṃ anūnaṃ ñattianussāvanaṃ uppaṭipāṭiyā ca avuttaṃ ṭhānārahaṃ. Yathā kattabbanti
tika-vin01t2:163_3: hi bhagavatā vuttaṃ, tathā akate upasampadākammassa kāraṇaṃ na hotīti na taṃ ṭhānārahaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:163_5: veditabbā. “Samaggena saṅghenā”ti iminā pana parisasampatti kathitāva. “Akuppenā”ti
tika-vin01t2:163_6: iminā pārisesato vatthusīmāsampattiyo kathitāti veditabbā. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana akuppalakkhaṇaṃ
tika-vin01t2:163_8: akopetabbataṃ appaṭikkositabbataṃ upagatenā”ti attho vutto. Keci pana “ṭhānārahenātiettha
tika-vin01t2:164_0: “Ñatticatutthena kammenā”ti imasmiṃ adhikāre pasaṅgato āharitvā yaṃ kammalakkhaṇaṃ
tika-vin01t2:164_1: sabbaaṭṭhakathāsu papañcitaṃ, taṃ yathāāgataṭṭhāneyeva dassetukāmo idha tassa avacane
tika-vin01t2:164_2: tattha vacane ca payojanaṃ dassetuṃ “imasmiṃ pana ṭhāne ṭhatvā”tiādimāha.
tika-vin01t2:165_3: imāsañca tissannaṃ upasampadānaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃyeva anuññātattā ñatticatuttheneva kammena
tika-vin01t2:165_4: upasampanno gahitoti veditabbo. Tathā hi ehibhikkhūpasampadā antimabhavikānaṃyeva,
tika-vin01t2:165_6: na ca te bhabbā pārājikādilokavajjaṃ āpajjituṃ, garudhammapaṭiggahaṇādayo ca bhikkhunīnaṃyeva
tika-vin01t2:165_7: anuññātā, ayañca bhikkhu, tasmā ettha ñatticatutthena upasampannova gahitoti veditabbo.
tika-vin01t2:166_0: Paṇṇattivajjesu pana sikkhāpadesu aññepi ehibhikkhūpasampadāya upasampannādayo saṅgahaṃ
tika-vin01t2:166_1: gacchanti. Tepi hi sahaseyyādipaṇṇattivajjaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjantiyeva. Yadi evaṃ paṇṇattivajjesupi
tika-vin01t2:166_2: sikkhāpadesu “ayaṃ imasmiṃ atthe adhippeto bhikkhū”ti ñatticatuttheneva kammena upasampanno
tika-vin01t2:166_3: kasmā vuttoti? Sabbasikkhāpadavītikkamārahattā sabbakālikattā ca. Ehibhikkhūpasampadādayo
tika-vin01t2:166_4: hi na sabbasikkhāpadavītikkamārahā asabbakālikā ca. Tathā hi aṭṭhasu upasampadāsu
tika-vin01t2:166_6: thāvarā, sesā buddhe dharamāneyeva ahesuṃ. Teneva ca bhikkhunīvibhaṅgepi “tatra yāyaṃ
tika-vin01t2:166_7: bhikkhunī samaggena ubhatosaṅghena ñatticatutthena kammena akuppena ṭhānārahena upasampannā,
tika-vin01t2:166_8: ayaṃ imasmiṃ atthe adhippetā bhikkhunī”ti dūtenūpasampadāya aṭṭhavācikūpasampadāya
tika-vin01t2:166_9: ca upasampannaṃ antokatvā ubhatosaṅghena ñatticatuttheneva kammena upasampannā bhikkhunī
tika-vin01t2:166_10: vuttā, na garudhammapaṭiggahaṇūpasampadāya upasampannā tassā upasampadāya pāṭipuggalikabhāvato
tika-vin01t2:166_11: asabbakālikattā. Garudhammapaṭiggahaṇūpasampadā hi mahāpajāpatiyā eva anuññātattā
tika-vin01t2:166_13: upasampannameva gahetvā sabbasikkhāpadāni paññattānīti gahetabbaṃ. Yadi evaṃ paṇṇattivajjesu
tika-vin01t2:166_14: sikkhāpadesu ca ehibhikkhūpasampannādīnampi saṅgaho kathaṃ viññāyatīti? Atthato āpannattā.
tika-vin01t2:166_15: Tathā hi “dve puggalā abhabbā āpattiṃ āpajjituṃ buddhā ca paccekabuddhā ca, dve puggalā
tika-vin01t2:166_16: bhabbā āpattiṃ āpajjituṃ bhikkhū ca bhikkhuniyo cā”ti sāmaññato vuttattā ehibhikkhūpasampannādayopi
tika-vin01t2:166_17: asañcicca assatiyā acittakaṃ paṇṇattivajjaṃ sahaseyyādiāpattiṃ āpajjantīti atthato
tika-vin01t2:166_18: āpannanti ayamettha sāro. Yaṃ panettha ito aññathā kenaci papañcitaṃ, na taṃ sārato paccetabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:167_0: Niruttivasenāti nibbacanavasena. Abhilāpavasenāti vohāravasena. Anuppannāya kammavācāyāti
tika-vin01t2:167_2: ca bhindati pāpake akusale dhammeti bhikkhūti nibbacanaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:170_0: Sikkhitabbāti āsevitabbā. Uttamanti visiṭṭhaṃ. Adhisīlādīsu vijjamānesu sīlādīhipi
tika-vin01t2:170_1: bhavitabbaṃ. Yathā hi omakatarappamāṇaṃ chattaṃ vā dhajaṃ vā upādāya atirekappamāṇaṃ
tika-vin01t2:170_2: “atichattaṃ atidhajo”ti vuccati, evamihāpi “anukkaṭṭhasīlaṃ upādāya adhisīlena bhavitabbaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:170_3: tathā anukkaṭṭhaṃ cittaṃ paññañca upādāya adhicittena adhipaññāya ca bhavitabba”nti
tika-vin01t2:170_4: manasi katvā sīlādiṃ sarūpato vibhāvetukāmo “katamaṃ panettha sīla”ntiādimāha. Aṭṭhaṅgasīlaṃ
tika-vin01t2:170_7: sikkhāpadasīlaṃ. Tañhi yo naṃ pāti rakkhati, taṃ mokkheti moceti āpāyikādīhi dukkhehīti
tika-vin01t2:170_8: pātimokkhanti vuccati. Saṃvaraṇaṃ saṃvaro, kāyavācāhi avītikkamo. Pātimokkhameva
tika-vin01t2:170_9: saṃvaro pātimokkhasaṃvaro. So eva sīlanaṭṭhena sīlanti pātimokkhasaṃvarasīlaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:171_0: Aparo nayo – kilesānaṃ balavabhāvato pāpakiriyāya sukarabhāvato puññakiriyāya ca
tika-vin01t2:171_1: dukkarabhāvato bahukkhattuṃ apāyesu patanasīloti pātī, puthujjano. Aniccatāya vā
tika-vin01t2:171_2: bhavābhavādīsu kammavegakkhitto ghaṭiyantaṃ viya anavaṭṭhānena paribbhamanato gamanasīloti
tika-vin01t2:171_3: pātī, maraṇavasena vā tamhi tamhi sattanikāye attabhāvassa patanasīloti pātī, sattasantāno,
tika-vin01t2:171_4: cittameva vā. Taṃ pātinaṃ saṃsāradukkhato mokkhetīti pātimokkhaṃ. Cittassa hi vimokkhena
tika-vin01t2:171_5: satto vimuttoti vuccati. Vuttañhi “cittavodānā visujjhantī”ti, “anupādāya āsavehi
tika-vin01t2:172_0: Atha vā avijjādinā hetunā saṃsāre patati gacchati pavattatīti pāti. “Avijjānīvaraṇānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:172_1: sattānaṃ taṇhāsaṃyojanānaṃ sandhāvataṃ saṃsarata”nti hi vuttaṃ. Tassa pātino sattassa
tika-vin01t2:172_2: taṇhādisaṃkilesattayato mokkho etenāti pātimokkho. “Kaṇṭhekāḷo”tiādīnaṃ viyassa samāsasiddhi veditabbā.
tika-vin01t2:173_0: Atha vā pāteti vinipāteti dukkhehīti pāti, cittaṃ. Vuttañhi “cittena nīyati loko,
tika-vin01t2:173_1: cittena parikassatī”ti. Tassa pātino mokkho etenāti pātimokkho. Patati vā etena apāyadukkhe
tika-vin01t2:173_2: saṃsāradukkhe cāti pāti, taṇhāsaṃkileso. Vuttañhi “taṇhā janeti purisaṃ, taṇhādutiyo
tika-vin01t2:173_3: puriso”ti ca ādi. Tato pātito mokkhoti pātimokkho.
tika-vin01t2:174_0: Atha vā patati etthāti pāti, cha ajjhattikabāhirāni āyatanāni. Vuttañhi “chasu loko
tika-vin01t2:174_1: samuppanno, chasu kubbati santhava”nti. Tato chaajjhattikabāhirāyatanasaṅkhātato
tika-vin01t2:175: Atha vā pāto vinipāto assa atthīti pātī, saṃsāro. Tato mokkhoti pātimokkho.
tika-vin01t2:176_0: Atha vā sabbalokādhipatibhāvato dhammissaro bhagavā patīti vuccati, muccati etenāti
tika-vin01t2:176_1: mokkho, patino mokkho tena paññattattāti patimokkho, patimokkho eva pātimokkho. Sabbaguṇānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:176_2: vā mūlabhāvato uttamaṭṭhena pati ca so yathāvuttena atthena mokkho cāti patimokkho,
tika-vin01t2:176_3: patimokkho eva pātimokkho. Tathā hi vuttaṃ “pātimokkhanti mukhametaṃ pamukhameta”nti vitthāro.
tika-vin01t2:177_0: Atha vā pa-iti pakāre, atīti accantatthe nipāto, tasmā pakārehi accantaṃ mokkhetīti
tika-vin01t2:177_1: pātimokkho. Idañhi sīlaṃ sayaṃ tadaṅgavasena samādhisahitaṃ paññāsahitañca vikkhambhanavasena
tika-vin01t2:177_2: samucchedavasena ca accantaṃ mokkheti mocetīti pātimokkho.
tika-vin01t2:178_0: Pati pati mokkhoti vā patimokkho, tamhā tamhā vītikkamadosato paccekaṃ mokkhetīti
tika-vin01t2:178_1: attho, patimokkho eva pātimokkho. Mokkho vā nibbānaṃ, tassa mokkhassa paṭibimbabhūtoti
tika-vin01t2:178_2: patimokkho. Sīlasaṃvaro hi sūriyassa aruṇuggamanaṃ viya nibbānassa udayabhūto tappaṭibhāgo
tika-vin01t2:178_3: ca yathārahaṃ kilesanibbāpanato, patimokkhoyeva pātimokkho. Pativattati mokkhābhimukhanti
tika-vin01t2:178_4: vā patimokkhaṃ, patimokkhameva pātimokkhanti evaṃ tāvettha pātimokkhasaddassa attho veditabbo.
tika-vin01t2:179: Saṃvarati pidahati etenāti saṃvaro, pātimokkhameva saṃvaro pātimokkhasaṃvaro. So eva sīlaṃ pātimokkhasaṃvarasīlaṃ, atthato pana tato tato vītikkamitabbato viratiyo ceva cetanā ca.
tika-vin01t2:180_0: Adhisīlanti vuccatīti anavasesato kāyikavācasikasaṃvarabhāvato ca maggasīlassa padaṭṭhānabhāvato
tika-vin01t2:180_1: ca pātimokkhasaṃvarasīlaṃ adhikaṃ visiṭṭhaṃ sīlaṃ adhisīlanti vuccati. Pajjotānanti
tika-vin01t2:180_2: ālokānaṃ. Nanu ca paccekabuddhāpi dhammatāvasena pātimokkhasaṃvarasīlena samannāgatāva
tika-vin01t2:180_3: honti, evaṃ sati kasmā “buddhuppādeyeva pavattati, na vinā buddhuppādā”ti niyametvā
tika-vin01t2:180_4: vuttanti āha – “na hi taṃ paññattiṃ uddharitvā”tiādi. Kiñcāpi paccekabuddhā pātimokkhasaṃvarasampannāgatā
tika-vin01t2:180_5: honti, na pana tesaṃ vasena vitthāritaṃ hutvā pavattatīti adhippāyo. “Imasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ
tika-vin01t2:180_6: imasmiṃ vītikkame idaṃ nāma hotī”ti paññapanaṃ aññesaṃ avisayo, buddhānaṃyeva esa
tika-vin01t2:180_7: visayo, buddhānaṃ balanti āha – “buddhāyeva panā”tiādi. Lokiyasīlassa adhisīlabhāvo
tika-vin01t2:180_8: pariyāyenāti nippariyāyameva taṃ dassetuṃ “pātimokkhasaṃvaratopi ca maggaphalasampayuttameva
tika-vin01t2:180_9: sīlaṃ adhisīla”nti vuttaṃ. Na hi taṃ samāpanno bhikkhūti gahaṭṭhesu sotāpannānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:180_10: sadāravītikkamasambhavato vuttaṃ. Tathā hi te saputtadārā agāraṃ ajjhāvasanti.
tika-vin01t2:181_0: Samādāpanaṃ samādānañcāti aññesaṃ samādāpanaṃ sayaṃ samādānañca. Adhicittanti vuccatīti
tika-vin01t2:181_1: maggasamādhissa adhiṭṭhānabhāvato adhicittanti vuccati. Na vinā buddhuppādāti kiñcāpi
tika-vin01t2:181_2: paccekabuddhānaṃ vipassanāpādakaṃ aṭṭhasamāpatticittaṃ hotiyeva, na pana te tattha
tika-vin01t2:181_3: aññe samādāpetuṃ sakkontīti na tesaṃ vasena vitthāritaṃ hutvā pavattatīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin01t2:181_4: Vipassanāpaññāyapi adhipaññatāsādhane “na vinā buddhuppādā”ti vacanaṃ imināva adhippāyena
tika-vin01t2:181_5: vuttanti veditabbaṃ. Lokiyacittassa adhicittatā pariyāyenāti nippariyāyameva taṃ
tika-vin01t2:181_6: dassetuṃ “tatopi ca maggaphalacittameva adhicitta”nti āha. Taṃ pana idha anadhippetanti
tika-vin01t2:181_7: iminā aṭṭhakathāvacanena lokiyacittassa vasena adhicittasikkhāpi idha adhippetāti
tika-vin01t2:181_8: viññāyati. Na hi taṃ samāpanno bhikkhu methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevatīti ca iminā lokiyaadhicittaṃ
tika-vin01t2:181_9: samāpanno methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevatīti āpannaṃ. Adhipaññāniddese ca “tatopi ca maggaphalapaññāva
tika-vin01t2:181_10: adhipaññā”ti vatvā “sā pana idha anadhippetā. Na hi taṃ samāpanno bhikkhu methunaṃ
tika-vin01t2:181_11: dhammaṃ paṭisevatī”ti vuttattā lokiyapaññāvasena adhipaññāsikkhāyapi idhādhippetabhāvo
tika-vin01t2:181_12: taṃ samāpannassa methunadhammapaṭisevanañca aṭṭhakathāyaṃ anuññātanti viññāyati.
tika-vin01t2:181_13: Idañca sabbaṃ “tatra yāyaṃ adhisīlasikkhā, ayaṃ imasmiṃ atthe adhippetā sikkhā”ti
tika-vin01t2:181_14: imāya pāḷiyā na sameti. Ayañhi pāḷi adhisīlasikkhāva idha adhippetā, na itarāti dīpeti,
tika-vin01t2:181_15: tasmā pāḷiyā aṭṭhakathāya ca evamadhippāyo veditabbo – lokiyaadhicittaadhipaññāsamāpannassa
tika-vin01t2:181_16: tathārūpapaccayaṃ paṭicca “methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevissāmī”ti citte uppanne tato adhicittato
tika-vin01t2:181_17: adhipaññato ca parihāni sambhavatīti taṃ dvayaṃ samāpannena na sakkā methunaṃ dhammaṃ
tika-vin01t2:181_18: paṭisevitunti pāḷiyaṃ adhisīlasikkhāva vuttā. Adhisīlasikkhañhi yāva vītikkamaṃ na
tika-vin01t2:181_19: karoti, tāva samāpannova hoti. Na hi cittuppādamattena pātimokkhasaṃvarasīlaṃ bhinnaṃ
tika-vin01t2:181_20: nāma hotīti. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana lokiyaadhicittato adhipaññato ca parihāyitvāpi bhikkhuno
tika-vin01t2:181_21: methunadhammapaṭisevanaṃ kadāci bhaveyyāti taṃ dvayaṃ appaṭikkhipitvā maggaphaladhammānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:181_22: akuppasabhāvattā taṃ samāpannassa bhikkhuno tato parihāyitvā methunadhammapaṭisevanaṃ
tika-vin01t2:181_23: nāma na kadāci sambhavatīti lokuttarādhicittaadhipaññānaṃyeva paṭikkhepo katoti veditabbo.
tika-vin01t2:183_0: “Tattha katamaṃ kammassakataññāṇaṃ? ‘Atthi dinnaṃ, atthi yiṭṭhaṃ, atthi hutaṃ, atthi
tika-vin01t2:183_1: sukatadukkaṭānaṃ kammānaṃ phalaṃ vipāko, atthi ayaṃ loko, atthi paro loko, atthi
tika-vin01t2:183_2: mātā, atthi pitā, atthi sattā opapātikā, atthi loke samaṇabrāhmaṇā sammaggatā sammā
tika-vin01t2:183_3: paṭipannā, ye imañca lokaṃ parañca lokaṃ sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā pavedentī’ti yā
tika-vin01t2:183_4: evarūpā paññā pajānanā…pe… amoho dhammavicayo sammādiṭṭhi, idaṃ vuccati kammassakataññāṇaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:183_5: Ṭhapetvā saccānulomikaṃ ñāṇaṃ sabbāpi sāsavā kusalā paññā kammassakataññāṇa”nti –
tika-vin01t2:185_0: Tattha atthi dinnantiādīsu dinnapaccayā phalaṃ atthīti iminā upāyena attho veditabbo.
tika-vin01t2:185_1: Dinnanti ca deyyadhammasīsena dānaṃ vuttaṃ. Yiṭṭhanti mahāyāgo, sabbasādhāraṇaṃ mahādānanti
tika-vin01t2:185_2: attho. Hutanti pahonakasakkāro adhippeto. Atthi mātā, atthi pitāti mātāpitūsu sammāpaṭipattimicchāpaṭipattiādīnaṃ
tika-vin01t2:185_3: phalasambhavo vutto. Idaṃ vuccatīti yaṃ ñāṇaṃ “idaṃ kammaṃ sakaṃ, idaṃ no saka”nti
tika-vin01t2:185_4: jānāti, idaṃ kammassakataññāṇaṃ nāma vuccatīti attho. Tattha tividhaṃ kāyaduccaritaṃ
tika-vin01t2:185_5: catubbidhaṃ vacīduccaritaṃ tividhaṃ manoduccaritanti idaṃ na sakakammaṃ nāma, tīsu
tika-vin01t2:185_6: dvāresu dasavidhampi sucaritaṃ sakakammaṃ nāma. Attano vāpi hotu parassa vā, sabbampi
tika-vin01t2:185_7: akusalaṃ na sakakammaṃ nāma. Kasmā? Atthabhañjanato anatthajananato ca. Attano vā
tika-vin01t2:185_8: hotu parassa vā, sabbampi kusalaṃ sakakammaṃ nāma. Kasmā? Anatthabhañjanato atthajananato
tika-vin01t2:185_9: ca. Evaṃ jānanasamatthe imasmiṃ kammassakataññāṇe ṭhatvā bahuṃ dānaṃ datvā sīlaṃ
tika-vin01t2:185_10: pūretvā uposathaṃ samādiyitvā sukhena sukhaṃ sampattiyā sampattiṃ anubhavitvā nibbānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:185_11: pattānaṃ sattānaṃ gaṇanaparicchedo natthi. Ṭhapetvā saccānulomikaṃ ñāṇanti maggasaccassa
tika-vin01t2:185_12: paramatthasaccassa ca anulomanato saccānulomikanti laddhanāmaṃ vipassanāñāṇaṃ ṭhapetvā
tika-vin01t2:185_13: avasesā sabbāpi sāsavā kusalā paññā kammassakataññāṇamevāti attho.
tika-vin01t2:186: Tilakkhaṇākāraparicchedakanti aniccādilakkhaṇattayassa hutvā abhāvādiākārapaacchindanakaṃ. Adhipaññāti vuccatīti maggapaññāya adhiṭṭhānabhāvato vipassanāñāṇaṃ adhipaññāti vuccati.
tika-vin01t2:189_0: Evaṃ atīte anāgate ca vaṭṭamūlakadukkhasallakkhaṇavasena saṃvegavatthutāya vimuttiākaṅkhāya
tika-vin01t2:189_1: paccayabhūtā kammassakatapaññā adhipaññātipi vadanti. Lokiyapaññāya adhipaññābhāvo
tika-vin01t2:189_2: pariyāyenāti nippariyāyameva taṃ dassetuṃ “tatopi ca maggaphalapaññāva adhipaññā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:190_0: Saha ājīvanti etthāti sājīvoti sabbasikkhāpadaṃ vuttanti āha – “sabbampi…pe… tasmā
tika-vin01t2:190_1: sājīvanti vuccatī”ti. Tattha sikkhāpadanti “nāmakāyo padakāyo niruttikāyo byañjanakāyo”ti
tika-vin01t2:190_2: vuttaṃ bhagavato vacanasaṅkhātaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ. Sabhāgavuttinoti samānavuttikā, sadisappavattikāti
tika-vin01t2:190_3: attho. Tasmiṃ sikkhatīti ettha ādheyyāpekkhattā adhikaraṇassa kimādheyyamapekkhitvā
tika-vin01t2:190_4: “tasmi”nti adhikaraṇaṃ niddiṭṭhanti āha – “taṃ sikkhāpadaṃ cittassa adhikaraṇaṃ katvā”ti,
tika-vin01t2:190_5: taṃ sājīvasaṅkhātaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ “yathāsikkhāpadaṃ nu kho sikkhāmi, na sikkhāmī”ti
tika-vin01t2:190_6: evaṃ pavattivasena sikkhāpadavisayattā tadādheyyabhūtassa cittassa adhikaraṇaṃ katvāti
tika-vin01t2:190_7: attho. Nanu ca “sikkhāsājīvasamāpanno”ti imassa padabhājanaṃ karontena “yaṃ sikkhaṃ
tika-vin01t2:190_8: sājīvañca samāpanno, tadubhayaṃ dassetvā tesu sikkhati, tena vuccati sikkhāsājīvasamāpanno”ti
tika-vin01t2:190_9: vattabbaṃ siyā, evamavatvā “tasmiṃ sikkhati, tena vuccati sājīvasamāpanno”ti ettakameva
tika-vin01t2:191: Tassā ca sikkhāyāti tassā adhisīlasaṅkhātāya sikkhāya. Sikkhaṃ paripūrentoti
tika-vin01t2:192_0: Sīlasaṃvaraṃ paripūrento, vārittasīlavasena viratisampayuttaṃ cetanaṃ cārittasīlavasena
tika-vin01t2:192_1: virativippayuttaṃ cetanañca attani pavattentoti attho. Tasmiñca sikkhāpade avītikkamanto
tika-vin01t2:192_2: sikkhatīti “nāmakāyo padakāyo niruttikāyo byañjanakāyo”ti evaṃ vuttaṃ bhagavato vacanasaṅkhātaṃ
tika-vin01t2:192_3: sikkhāpadaṃ avītikkamanto hutvā tasmiṃ yathāvuttasikkhāpade sikkhatīti attho. Sīlasaṃvarapūraṇaṃ
tika-vin01t2:192_4: sājīvānatikkamanañcāti idameva ca dvayaṃ idha sikkhanaṃ nāmāti adhippāyo. Tattha
tika-vin01t2:192_5: sājīvānatikkamo sikkhāpāripūriyā paccayo. Sājīvānatikkamato hi yāva maggā sikkhāpāripūrī
tika-vin01t2:192_6: hoti. Apicettha “sikkhaṃ paripūrento sikkhatī”ti iminā viraticetanāsaṅkhātassa sīlasaṃvarassa
tika-vin01t2:192_7: visesato santāne pavattanakālova gahito, “avītikkamanto sikkhatī”ti iminā pana appavattanakālopi.
tika-vin01t2:192_8: Sikkhañhi paripūraṇavasena attani pavattentopi niddādivasena appavattentopi vītikkamābhāvā
tika-vin01t2:195_0: “Appaccakkhāya appaccakkhātāyā”ti ubhayathāpi pāṭho tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu vutto. Dubbalye
tika-vin01t2:195_1: āvikatepīti “yaṃnūnāhaṃ buddhaṃ paccakkheyya”ntiādinā dubbalabhāve pakāsitepi. Sikkhāya
tika-vin01t2:195_2: pana paccakkhātāyāti “buddhaṃ paccakkhāmī”tiādinā sikkhāya paccakkhātāya. Yasmā dirattavacane
tika-vin01t2:195_3: gahite tena purimapacchimapadāni saṃsiliṭṭhāni honti, na tasmiṃ aggahite, tasmā dirattavacanena
tika-vin01t2:195_5: yasmā evarūpaṃ vacanaṃ lokassa mukhamāruḷhaṃ, tasmāti attho.
tika-vin01t2:196_0: Byañjanaṃ sampādetīti tassa visuṃ atthābhāvato vuttamevatthaṃ aññapadena dīpento
tika-vin01t2:196_1: byañjanaṃ sampādeti. Vuttamevatthaṃ kāraṇena vibhāvento āha “parivārakapadavirahitañhī”tiādi.
tika-vin01t2:197_1: paccakkhāmī”tiādīsu “evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, dubbalyāvikammañceva hoti sikkhā ca paccakkhātā”ti
tika-vin01t2:197_2: vuttattā ubhayampi hotīti āha – “ekaccaṃ dubbalyāvikammaṃ attho hotī”ti. Kiñcāpi
tika-vin01t2:197_4: tathāpi “buddhaṃ paccakkhāmī”ti vutte sikkhāparipūraṇe dubbalyāvibhāvassapi gamyamānattā
tika-vin01t2:197_5: “sikkhāpaccakkhānassa ekaccaṃ dubbalyāvikammaṃ attho hotī”ti vuttaṃ. Naṃ sandhāyāti
tika-vin01t2:198_0: Visesāvisesanti ettha yena dubbalyāvikammameva hoti, na sikkhāpaccakkhānaṃ, tattha
tika-vin01t2:198_1: sikkhāpaccakkhānadubbalyāvikammānaṃ atthi viseso. Yena pana sikkhāpaccakkhānañceva
tika-vin01t2:198_2: dubbalyāvikammañca hoti, tattha nevatthi visesoti veditabbaṃ. Kaṭhakicchajīvaneti
tika-vin01t2:198_3: dhātūsu paṭhitattā vuttaṃ “kicchajīvikappatto”ti. Ukkaṇṭhanaṃ ukkaṇṭhā, kicchajīvikā,
tika-vin01t2:198_4: taṃ ito pattoti ukkaṇṭhito. Itoti ito ṭhānato, ito vihārato vā. Etthāti gantumicchitaṃ
tika-vin01t2:198_5: padesaṃ vadati. Anabhiratiyā pīḷito vikkhittacitto hutvā sīsaṃ ukkhipitvā uddhaṃmukho
tika-vin01t2:198_6: ito cito ca olokento āhiṇḍatīti āha “uddhaṃ kaṇṭhaṃ katvā viharamāno”ti.
tika-vin01t2:199_0: Aṭṭīyamānoti ettha aṭṭamiva attānamācarati aṭṭīyatīti aṭṭīyasaddassa antogadhaupamānabhūtakammattā
tika-vin01t2:199_1: upameyyabhūtena attanāva sakammakattaṃ, na bhikkhubhāvenāti āha “bhikkhubhāvanti
tika-vin01t2:199_2: bhikkhubhāvenā”ti. Na hi so bhikkhubhāvaṃ aṭṭamiva ācarati, kiñcarahi attānaṃ tasmā
tika-vin01t2:199_3: bhikkhubhāvena karaṇabhūtena attānaṃ aṭṭīyamānoti evamettha attho daṭṭhabboti āha
tika-vin01t2:199_4: “karaṇatthe upayogavacana”nti. Kaṇṭhe āsattena aṭṭīyeyyāti ettha pana karaṇattheyeva
tika-vin01t2:199_5: karaṇavacananti āha – “yathālakkhaṇaṃ karaṇavacaneneva vutta”nti. Kattuatthe vā upayogavacanaṃ
tika-vin01t2:199_6: daṭṭhabbanti āha – “tena vā bhikkhubhāvenā”tiādi, tena kattubhūtena bhikkhubhāvenāti
tika-vin01t2:199_7: attho. Imasmiṃ panatthe aṭṭaṃ karotīti aṭṭīyatīti aṭṭīya-saddaṃ nipphādetvā tato
tika-vin01t2:199_8: kammani māna-sadde kate “aṭṭīyamāno”ti padasiddhi veditabbā. Tenevāha – “aṭṭo kariyamāno
tika-vin01t2:199_9: pīḷiyamāno”ti. Jigucchamānoti iminā pana sambandhe kariyamāne bhikkhubhāvanti upayogatthe
tika-vin01t2:199_10: eva upayogavacananti āha – “asuciṃ viya taṃ jigucchanto”ti, taṃ bhikkhubhāvaṃ jigucchantoti
tika-vin01t2:200_1: vuttāni. Bhāvavikappākārenāti “assaṃ assa”nti āgatattā yaṃ yaṃ bhavitukāmo, tassa
tika-vin01t2:200_2: tassa bhāvassa vikappākārena, bhikkhubhāvato aññabhāvavikappākārenāti adhippāyo.
tika-vin01t2:201_0: 50. Na ussahāmīti attano tattha tattha ussahābhāvaṃ dasseti. Na visahāmīti ekabhattādīnaṃ
tika-vin01t2:201_1: asayhabhāvaṃ dasseti. Na ramāmīti “pabbajjāmūlakaṃ natthi me sukha”nti dasseti. Nābhiramāmīti
tika-vin01t2:202_0: Idāni sikkhāpaccakkhānavāre ṭhatvā ayaṃ vinicchayo veditabbo – tattha “sāmaññā cavitukāmo”tiādīhi
tika-vin01t2:202_1: padehi cittaniyamaṃ dasseti. “Buddhaṃ dhamma”ntiādīhi padehi khettaniyamaṃ dasseti.
tika-vin01t2:202_2: Yathā hi loke sassānaṃ ruhanaṭṭhānaṃ “khetta”nti vuccati, evamidampi sikkhāpaccakkhānassa
tika-vin01t2:202_3: ruhanaṭṭhānattā “khetta”nti vuccati. “Paccakkhāmi dhārehī”ti etena kālaniyamaṃ dasseti.
tika-vin01t2:202_4: “Vadatī”ti iminā payoganiyamaṃ dasseti. “Alaṃ me buddhena, kinnu me buddhena, na
tika-vin01t2:202_5: mamattho buddhena, sumuttāhaṃ buddhenā”tiādīhi anāmaṭṭhakālavasenapi paccakkhānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:202_6: hotīti dasseti. “Viññāpetī”ti iminā vijānananiyamaṃ dasseti. “Ummattako sikkhaṃ paccakkhāti,
tika-vin01t2:202_7: ummattakassa santike sikkhaṃ paccakkhātī”tiādīhi puggalaniyamaṃ dasseti. “Ariyakena
tika-vin01t2:202_8: milakkhassa santike sikkhaṃ paccakkhāti, so ca nappaṭivijānāti, appaccakkhātā hoti
tika-vin01t2:202_9: sikkhā”tiādīhi puggalādiniyame satipi vijānananiyamāsambhavaṃ dasseti. “Davāya sikkhaṃ
tika-vin01t2:202_10: paccakkhāti, appaccakkhātā hoti sikkhā”tiādīhi khettādiniyame satipi cittaniyamābhāvena
tika-vin01t2:202_11: na ruhatīti dasseti. “Sāvetukāmo na sāveti, apaccakkhātā hoti sikkhā”ti iminā cittaniyamepi
tika-vin01t2:202_12: sati payoganiyamābhāvena na ruhatīti dasseti. “Aviññussa sāveti, viññussa na sāvetī”ti
tika-vin01t2:202_13: etehi cittakhettakālapayogapuggalavijānananiyamepi sati yaṃ puggalaṃ uddissa sāveti,
tika-vin01t2:202_14: tasseva savanena ruhati, na aññassāti dasseti. “Sabbaso vā pana na sāveti, appaccakkhātā
tika-vin01t2:202_15: hoti sikkhā”ti idaṃ pana cittādiniyameneva sikkhā paccakkhātā hoti, na aññathāti
tika-vin01t2:203: Kathaṃ? Upasampannabhāvato cavitukāmatācitteneva hi sikkhāpaccakkhānaṃ hoti, na davā vā ravā vā bhaṇantassa. Evaṃ cittavasena sikkhāpaccakkhānaṃ hoti, na tadabhāvena.
tika-vin01t2:204_0: Tathā “buddhaṃ paccakkhāmi, dhammaṃ paccakkhāmi, saṅghaṃ paccakkhāmi, sikkhaṃ, vinayaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:204_1: pātimokkhaṃ, uddesaṃ, upajjhāyaṃ, ācariyaṃ, saddhivihārikaṃ, antevāsikaṃ, samānupajjhāyakaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:204_2: samānācariyakaṃ, sabrahmacāriṃ paccakkhāmī”ti evaṃ vuttānaṃ buddhādīnaṃ catuddasannaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:204_3: “gihīti maṃ dhārehi, upāsako, ārāmiko, sāmaṇero, titthiyo, titthiyasāvako, assamaṇo,
tika-vin01t2:204_4: asakyaputtiyoti maṃ dhārehī”ti evaṃ vuttānaṃ gihiādīnaṃ aṭṭhannañcāti imesaṃ dvāvīsatiyā
tika-vin01t2:204_5: khettapadānaṃ yassa kassaci savevacanassa vasena tesu ca yaṃkiñci vattukāmassa yaṃkiñci
tika-vin01t2:204_6: vadatopi sikkhāpaccakkhānaṃ hoti, na rukkhādīnaṃ aññatarassa nāmaṃ gahetvā sikkhaṃ
tika-vin01t2:204_7: paccakkhantassa. Evaṃ khettavasena sikkhāpaccakkhānaṃ hoti, na tadabhāvena.
tika-vin01t2:205_0: Tattha yadetaṃ “paccakkhāmī”ti ca “maṃ dhārehī”ti ca vuttaṃ vattamānakālavacanaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:205_1: yāni ca “alaṃ me buddhena, kinnu me buddhena, na mamattho buddhena, sumuttāhaṃ buddhenā”tiādinā
tika-vin01t2:205_2: nayena ākhyātavasena kālaṃ anāmasitvā purimehi cuddasahi padehi saddhiṃ yojetvā vuttāni
tika-vin01t2:205_3: “alaṃ me”tiādīni cattāri padāni, tesaṃyeva ca savevacanānaṃ vasena paccakkhānaṃ hoti,
tika-vin01t2:205_4: na “paccakkhāsi”nti vā “paccakkhissa”nti vā “maṃ dhāresī”ti vā “dhāressasī”ti vā
tika-vin01t2:205_6: vattamānakālavasena ceva anāmaṭṭhakālavasena ca paccakkhānaṃ hoti, na tadabhāvena.
tika-vin01t2:206_0: Payogo pana duvidho kāyiko vācasiko. Tattha “buddhaṃ paccakkhāmī”tiādinā nayena yāya
tika-vin01t2:206_1: kāyaci bhāsāya vacībhedaṃ katvā vācasikapayogeneva paccakkhānaṃ hoti, na akkharalikhanaṃ
tika-vin01t2:206_2: vā hatthamuddādidassanaṃ vā kāyapayogaṃ karontassa. Evaṃ vācasikapayogeneva paccakkhānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:207_0: Puggalo pana duvidho yo ca paccakkhāti, yassa ca paccakkhāti. Tattha yo paccakkhāti,
tika-vin01t2:207_1: so sace ummattakakhittacittavedanāṭṭānaṃ aññataro na hoti. Yassa pana paccakkhāti,
tika-vin01t2:207_2: so sace manussajātiko hoti, na ca ummattakādīnaṃ aññataro, sammukhībhūto ca sikkhāpaccakkhānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:207_3: hoti. Na hi asammukhībhūtassa dūtena vā paṇṇena vā ārocanaṃ ruhati. Evaṃ yathāvuttapuggalavasena
tika-vin01t2:208_0: Vijānanampi niyamitāniyamitavasena duvidhaṃ. Tattha yassa yesaṃ vā niyametvā “imassa
tika-vin01t2:208_1: imesaṃ vā ārocemī”ti vadati, sace te yathā pakatiyā loke manussā vacanaṃ sutvā āvajjanasamaye
tika-vin01t2:208_2: jānanti, evaṃ tassa vacanānantarameva tassa “ayaṃ ukkaṇṭhito”ti vā “gihibhāvaṃ patthayatī”ti
tika-vin01t2:208_3: vā yena kenaci ākārena sikkhāpaccakkhānabhāvaṃ jānanti, paccakkhātā hoti sikkhā.
tika-vin01t2:208_4: Atha aparabhāge “kiṃ iminā vutta”nti cintetvā jānanti, aññe vā jānanti, appaccakkhātāva
tika-vin01t2:208_5: hoti sikkhā. Aniyametvā ārocentassa pana sace vuttanayena yo koci manussajātiko vacanatthaṃ
tika-vin01t2:208_6: jānāti, paccakkhātāva hoti sikkhā. Evaṃ vijānanavasena paccakkhānaṃ hoti, na tadabhāvena.
tika-vin01t2:208_7: Iti imesaṃ vuttappakārānaṃ cittādīnaṃ vaseneva sikkhāpaccakkhānaṃ hoti, na aññathāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:209_1: vacībhedena adhippāyaviññāpanaṃ idhādhippetaṃ, na yena kenaci upāyenāti āha “teneva
tika-vin01t2:209_2: vacībhedenā”ti. Padapaccābhaṭṭhaṃ katvāti padaviparāvuttiṃ katvā. Idañca padappayogassa
tika-vin01t2:209_3: aniyamitattā vuttaṃ. Yathā hi loke “āhara pattaṃ, pattaṃ āharā”ti aniyamitena padappayogena
tika-vin01t2:209_4: tadatthaviññāpanaṃ diṭṭhaṃ, evamidhāpi “buddhaṃ paccakkhāmi, paccakkhāmi buddha”nti
tika-vin01t2:209_5: aniyamitena padappayogena tadatthaviññāpanaṃ hotiyevāti adhippāyo. Buddhaṃ paccakkhāmīti
tika-vin01t2:209_6: atthappadhāno ayaṃ niddeso, na saddappadhānoti āha “milakkhabhāsāsu vā aññatarabhāsāya
tika-vin01t2:209_7: tamatthaṃ vadeyyā”ti. Māgadhabhāsato avasiṭṭhā sabbāpi andhadamiḷādibhāsā milakkhabhāsāti
tika-vin01t2:209_8: veditabbā. Khettapadesu ekaṃ vattukāmo sacepi aññaṃ vadeyya, khettapadantogadhattā
tika-vin01t2:209_9: paccakkhātāva hoti sikkhāti dassento āha “buddhaṃ paccakkhāmīti vattukāmo”tiādi.
tika-vin01t2:209_10: Yadipi “buddhaṃ paccakkhāmī”ti vattuṃ anicchanto cittena taṃ paṭikkhipitvā aññaṃ
tika-vin01t2:209_11: vattukāmo puna virajjhitvā tameva vadeyya, tathāpi sāsanato cavitukāmatācitte sati
tika-vin01t2:209_12: khettapadasseva vuttattā aṅgapāripūrisambhavato hotveva sikkhāpaccakkhānanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:209_13: Khettameva otiṇṇanti sikkhāpaccakkhānassa ruhanaṭṭhānabhūtaṃ khettameva otiṇṇaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:210_1: nevatthi sikkhāpaccakkhānanti dassento āha “sace pana buddhaṃ paccakkhinti vā”tiādi.
tika-vin01t2:210_2: Vadati viññāpetīti ettha vadatīti iminā payogassa niyamitattā ekassa santike attano
tika-vin01t2:210_3: vacībhedappayogeneva sikkhāpaccakkhānaṃ hoti, na dūtasāsanādippayogenāti dassento
tika-vin01t2:210_4: āha “dūtaṃ vā pahiṇātī”tiādi. Tattha “mama sikkhāpaccakkhānabhāvaṃ kathehī”ti mukhasāsanavasena
tika-vin01t2:210_5: “dūtaṃ vā pahiṇātī”ti vuttaṃ. Paṇṇe likhitvā pahiṇanavasena “sāsanaṃ vā pesetī”ti
tika-vin01t2:210_6: vuttaṃ. Rukkhādīsu akkharāni likhitvā dassanavasena “akkharaṃ vā chindatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:210_7: Hatthamuddāya vā tamatthaṃ ārocetīti hatthena adhippāyaviññāpanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:210_8: Adhippāyaviññāpako hi hatthavikāro hatthamuddā. Hattha-saddo cettha tadekadesesu
tika-vin01t2:210_9: aṅgulīsu daṭṭhabbo “na sabbaṃ hatthaṃ mukhe pakkhipissāmī”tiādīsu viya. Tasmā adhippāyaviññāpakena
tika-vin01t2:210_10: aṅgulisaṅkocādinā hatthavikārena tamatthaṃ ārocetīti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin01t2:211_1: niyamitāniyamitavasena dvidhā veditabbanti dassento āha – “yadi ayameva jānātū”tiādi.
tika-vin01t2:211_2: Ayañca vibhāgo “vadati viññāpetīti ekavisayattā yassa vadati, tasseva vijānanaṃ adhippetaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:211_3: na aññassā”ti iminā nayena laddhoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Na hi yassa vadati, tato aññaṃ viññāpetīti
tika-vin01t2:211_4: ayamattho sambhavati. Soyeva jānātīti avadhāraṇena tasmiṃ avijānanteyeva aññassa
tika-vin01t2:211_5: jānanaṃ paṭikkhipati. Tenevāha – “atha so na jānāti, añño samīpe ṭhito jānāti, apaccakkhātā
tika-vin01t2:211_6: hoti sikkhā”ti. Tasmā “ayameva jānātū”ti ekaṃ niyametvā ārocite yadipi sopi jānāti
tika-vin01t2:211_7: aññopi, niyamitassa pana niyamitavasena vijānanasambhavato sikkhāpaccakkhānaṃ hotiyevāti
tika-vin01t2:211_8: daṭṭhabbaṃ “añño mā jānātū”ti aniyamitattā. Dvinnampi niyametvāti idaṃ “dve vā jānantu
tika-vin01t2:211_9: eko vā, imesaṃyeva dvinnaṃ ārocemī”ti evaṃ niyametvā ārocanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Tenevāha
tika-vin01t2:211_10: – “ekasmiṃ jānantepi dvīsu jānantesupī”ti. Tasmā “dveyeva jānantu, eko mā jānātū”ti
tika-vin01t2:211_11: evaṃ dvinnaṃ niyametvā ārocite dvīsuyeva jānantesu sikkhāpaccakkhānaṃ hoti, na ekasmiṃ jānanteti vadanti.
tika-vin01t2:212_0: Sabhāgeti vissāsike. Parisaṅkamānoti “sace te jāneyyuṃ, maṃ te vāressantī”ti āsaṅkamāno.
tika-vin01t2:212_1: Samayaññūti sāsanācārakusalo, idha pana tadadhippāyajānanamattenapi samayaññū nāma
tika-vin01t2:212_2: hoti. Teneva āha – “ukkaṇṭhito ayaṃ…pe… sāsanato cutoti jānātī”ti. Tasmā “buddhaṃ
tika-vin01t2:212_3: paccakkhāmī”ti imassa atthaṃ ñatvāpi sace “ayaṃ bhikkhubhāvato cavitukāmo, gihī vā
tika-vin01t2:212_4: hotukāmo”ti na jānāti, appaccakkhātāva hoti sikkhā. Sace pana “buddhaṃ paccakkhāmī”ti
tika-vin01t2:212_5: vacanassa atthaṃ ajānitvāpi “ukkaṇṭhito gihī hotukāmo”ti adhippāyaṃ jānāti, paccakkhātāva
tika-vin01t2:212_6: hoti sikkhā. Aññasmiṃ khaṇe sotaviññāṇavīthiyā saddaggahaṇaṃ, aññasmiṃyeva ca manoviññāṇavīthiyā
tika-vin01t2:212_7: tadatthavijānananti āha – “taṅkhaṇaññeva pana apubbaṃ acarimaṃ dujjāna”nti. Na hi
tika-vin01t2:212_8: ekasmiṃyeva khaṇe saddasavanaṃ tadatthavijānanañca sambhavati. Tathā hi “ghaṭo”ti
tika-vin01t2:212_9: vā “paṭo”ti vā kenaci vutte tattha gha-saddaṃ paccuppannaṃ gahetvā ekā sotaviññāṇavīthi
tika-vin01t2:212_10: uppajjitvā nirujjhati, tadanantaraṃ ekā manoviññāṇavīthi tameva atītaṃ gahetvā uppajjati.
tika-vin01t2:212_11: Evaṃ tena vuttavacane yattakāni akkharāni honti, tesu ekamekaṃ akkharaṃ paccuppannamatītañca
tika-vin01t2:212_12: gahetvā sotaviññāṇavīthiyā manoviññāṇavīthiyā ca uppajjitvā niruddhāya avasāne tāni
tika-vin01t2:212_13: akkharāni sampiṇḍetvā akkharasamūhaṃ gahetvā ekā manoviññāṇavīthi uppajjitvā nirujjhati.
tika-vin01t2:212_15: manoviññāṇavīthiyā uppajjitvā niruddhāya tadanantaraṃ uppannāya manoviññāṇavīthiyā
tika-vin01t2:213_0: Āvajjanasamayenāti bhummatthe karaṇavacanaṃ, atthābhogasamayeti attho. Idāni tameva
tika-vin01t2:213_1: āvajjanasamayaṃ vibhāvento āha – “yathā pakatiyā…pe… jānantī”ti. Teneva vacībhedena
tika-vin01t2:213_2: adhippāyaviññāpanassa idhādhippetattā aparabhāge “kiṃ iminā vutta”nti taṃ kaṅkhantassa
tika-vin01t2:213_3: cirena adhippāyavijānanaṃ aññenapi kenaci upāyantarena sambhavati, na kevalaṃ vacībhedamattenāti
tika-vin01t2:213_4: āha – “atha aparabhāge…pe… appaccakkhātā hoti sikkhā”ti. “Gihī bhavissāmī”ti vutte
tika-vin01t2:213_5: atthabhedo kālabhedo ca hotīti appaccakkhātā hoti sikkhā. “Dhārehī”ti hi imassa yo
tika-vin01t2:213_6: attho kālo ca, na so “bhavissāmī”ti etassa. “Gihī homī”ti vutte pana atthabhedoyeva,
tika-vin01t2:213_7: na kālabhedo “homī”ti vattamānakālasseva vuttattā. “Gihī jātomhi, gihīmhī”ti etthāpi
tika-vin01t2:213_8: atthassa ceva kālassa ca bhinnattā appaccakkhātā hoti sikkhā. “Ajja paṭṭhāyā”ti idaṃ
tika-vin01t2:213_9: tathā vuttepi dosabhāvato paripuṇṇaṃ katvā vuttaṃ. “Dhārehī”ti atthappadhānattā niddesassa
tika-vin01t2:213_10: pariyāyavacanehipi sikkhāpaccakkhānaṃ hotiyevāti dassento āha “jānāhī”tiādi. Dhārehi
tika-vin01t2:213_11: jānāhi sañjānāhi manasi karohīti hi etāni padāni atthato kālato ca abhinnāni.
tika-vin01t2:214: 52. Purimāneva cuddasāti buddhādisabrahmacārīpariyantāni. Hotu bhavatūti idampi paṭikkhepamattamevāti āha “hotu, pariyattanti attho”ti.
tika-vin01t2:215: 53. Vaṇṇapaṭṭhānanti mahāsaṅghikānaṃ buddhaguṇaparidīpakaṃ ekaṃ suttanti vadanti. Upāligāthāsūti –
tika-vin01t2:277_0: Yathārutamevāti yathāvuttameva, pāḷiyaṃ āgatamevāti adhippāyo. Yasmā “sammāsambuddhaṃ
tika-vin01t2:277_1: anantabuddhiṃ anomabuddhiṃ bodhipaññāṇa”nti imāni vaṇṇapaṭṭhāne āgatanāmāni, “dhīra”ntiādīni
tika-vin01t2:277_2: pana upāligāthāsu āgatanāmāni. Tattha bodhi vuccati sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ, taṃ sañjānanahetuttā
tika-vin01t2:277_3: paññāṇaṃ etassāti bodhipaññāṇo, bhagavā. Dhiyā paññāya rāti gaṇhāti, sevatīti vā
tika-vin01t2:277_4: dhīro. Samucchinnasabbacetokhīlattā pabhinnakhīlo. Sabbaputhujjane vijiniṃsu vijayanti
tika-vin01t2:277_5: vijinissanti cāti vijayā. Ke te? Maccumārakilesamāradevaputtamārā. Te vijitā vijayā
tika-vin01t2:277_6: etenāti vijitavijayo, bhagavā. Kilesamāramaccumāravijayeneva panettha abhisaṅkhārakkhandhamārāpi
tika-vin01t2:278_1: svākkhāto dhammo, atthavipallāsābhāvato vā suṭṭhu akkhātoti svākkhāto. Yathā hi aññatitthiyānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:278_2: dhammassa attho vipallāsaṃ āpajjati “antarāyikā”ti vuttadhammānaṃ antarāyikattābhāvato,
tika-vin01t2:278_3: “niyyānikā”ti ca vuttadhammānaṃ niyyānikattābhāvato, tena te aññatitthiyā durakkhātadhammāyeva
tika-vin01t2:278_4: honti, na tathā bhagavato dhammassa attho vipallāsaṃ āpajjati “ime dhammā antarāyikā
tika-vin01t2:278_5: niyyānikā”ti evaṃ vuttadhammānaṃ tathābhāvānatikkamanatoti. Evaṃ tāva pariyattidhammo svākkhāto dhammo.
tika-vin01t2:279: Lokuttaradhammo pana nibbānānurūpāya paṭipattiyā paṭipadānurūpassa ca nibbānassa akkhātattā svākkhāto. Yathāha –
tika-vin01t2:280_0: “Supaññattā kho pana tena bhagavatā sāvakānaṃ nibbānagāminī paṭipadā saṃsandati nibbānañca
tika-vin01t2:280_1: paṭipadā ca. Seyyathāpi nāma gaṅgodakaṃ yamunodakena saṃsandati sameti, evameva supaññattā
tika-vin01t2:280_2: tena bhagavatā sāvakānaṃ nibbānagāminī paṭipadā saṃsandati nibbānañca paṭipadā cā”ti.
tika-vin01t2:281_0: Ariyamaggo cettha antadvayaṃ anupagamma majjhimāpaṭipadābhūtova “majjhimā paṭipadā”ti
tika-vin01t2:282_0: Ariyamaggo attano santāne rāgādīnaṃ abhāvaṃ karontena ariyapuggalena sāmaṃ daṭṭhabbo
tika-vin01t2:282_1: “ariyamaggena mama rāgādayo pahīnā”ti sayaṃ attanā anaññaneyyena passitabboti sandiṭṭhi,
tika-vin01t2:282_2: sandiṭṭhi eva sandiṭṭhiko. Apica navavidho lokuttaradhammo yena yena adhigato hoti,
tika-vin01t2:282_3: tena tena ariyasāvakena parasaddhāya gantabbataṃ hitvā paccakkhañāṇena sayaṃ daṭṭhabboti
tika-vin01t2:282_4: sandiṭṭhiko. Atha vā pasatthā diṭṭhi sandiṭṭhi, sandiṭṭhiyā jayatīti sandiṭṭhiko.
tika-vin01t2:282_5: Tathā hettha ariyamaggo sampayuttāya, ariyaphalaṃ kāraṇabhūtāya, nibbānaṃ visayibhūtāya
tika-vin01t2:282_6: sandiṭṭhiyā kilese jayati, tasmā yathā rathena jayatīti rathiko, evaṃ navavidhopi
tika-vin01t2:282_7: lokuttaradhammo sandiṭṭhiyā jayatīti sandiṭṭhiko. Atha vā diṭṭhanti dassanaṃ vuccati,
tika-vin01t2:282_8: diṭṭhameva sandiṭṭhaṃ, sandassananti attho. Sandiṭṭhaṃ arahatīti sandiṭṭhiko. Lokuttaradhammo
tika-vin01t2:282_9: hi bhāvanābhisamayavasena sacchikiriyābhisamayavasena ca dissamānoyeva vaṭṭabhayaṃ
tika-vin01t2:282_10: nivatteti, tasmā yathā vatthamarahatīti vatthiko, evaṃ sandiṭṭhaṃ arahatīti sandiṭṭhiko.
tika-vin01t2:283_0: Attano phaladānaṃ sandhāya nāssa āgametabbo kālo atthīti akālo. Yathā hi lokiyakusalassa
tika-vin01t2:283_1: upapajjaaparāpariyāyetiādinā phaladānaṃ pati āgametabbo kālo atthi, na evametassāti
tika-vin01t2:283_2: attho. Akāloyeva akāliko, na pañcāhasattāhādibhedaṃ kālaṃ khepetvā phalaṃ deti, attano
tika-vin01t2:283_3: pana pavattisamanantarameva phaladoti vuttaṃ hoti. Atha vā attano phalappadāne vippakaṭṭho
tika-vin01t2:283_4: dūro kālo patto upanīto assāti kāliko, kālantaraphaladāyī. Ko so? Lokiyo kusaladhammo.
tika-vin01t2:283_5: Ayaṃ pana samanantaraphaladāyakattā na kālikoti akāliko. Maggameva hi sandhāya “akāliko”ti idaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:284_0: “Ehi passa imaṃ dhamma”nti evaṃ pavattaṃ ehipassavidhiṃ arahatīti ehipassiko. Kasmā
tika-vin01t2:284_1: panesa taṃ vidhiṃ arahatīti? Paramatthato vijjamānattā parisuddhattā ca. Rittamuṭṭhiyañhi
tika-vin01t2:284_2: hiraññaṃ vā suvaṇṇaṃ vā atthīti vatvāpi “ehi passa ima”nti na sakkā vattuṃ. Kasmā?
tika-vin01t2:284_3: Avijjamānattā. Vijjamānampi ca gūthaṃ vā muttaṃ vā manuññabhāvappakāsanena cittasampahaṃsanatthaṃ
tika-vin01t2:284_4: “ehi passa ima”nti na sakkā vattuṃ, apica kho naṃ tiṇehi vā paṇṇehi vā paṭicchādetabbameva
tika-vin01t2:284_5: hoti. Kasmā? Aparisuddhattā. Ayaṃ pana navavidhopi lokuttaradhammo sabhāvato ca vijjamāno
tika-vin01t2:284_6: vigatavalāhake ca ākāse sampuṇṇacandamaṇḍalaṃ viya paṇḍukambale nikkhittajātimaṇi
tika-vin01t2:284_7: viya ca parisuddho, tasmā vijjamānattā parisuddhattā ca ehipassavidhiṃ arahatīti ehipassiko.
tika-vin01t2:285_0: Upanetabboti opaneyyiko. Ayaṃ panettha vinicchayo – upanayanaṃ upanayo, ādittaṃ celaṃ
tika-vin01t2:285_1: vā sīsaṃ vā ajjhupekkhitvāpi bhāvanāvasena attano citte upanayanaṃ uppādanaṃ arahatīti
tika-vin01t2:285_2: opaneyyiko. Idaṃ saṅkhate lokuttaradhamme yujjati, asaṅkhato pana attano citte ārammaṇabhāvena
tika-vin01t2:285_3: upanayanaṃ arahatīti opaneyyiko, sacchikiriyāvasena allīyanaṃ arahatīti attho. Atha
tika-vin01t2:285_4: vā nibbānaṃ upaneti ariyapuggalanti ariyamaggo upaneyyo, sacchikātabbataṃ upanetabboti
tika-vin01t2:286_0: Sabbehi ugghaṭitaññūādīhi viññūhi “bhāvito me maggo, adhigataṃ phalaṃ, sacchikato
tika-vin01t2:286_1: nirodho”ti attani attani veditabboti paccattaṃ veditabbo viññūhi. Na hi upajjhāyena
tika-vin01t2:286_2: bhāvitena maggena saddhivihārikassa kilesā pahīyanti, na so tassa phalasamāpattiyā
tika-vin01t2:286_3: phāsu viharati, na tena sacchikataṃ nibbānaṃ sacchikaroti, tasmā na esa parassa sīse
tika-vin01t2:286_4: ābharaṇaṃ viya daṭṭhabbo, attano pana citteyeva daṭṭhabbo, anubhavitabbo viññūhīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin01t2:287_0: Asaṅkhatanti saṅgamma samāgamma paccayasamodhānalakkhaṇena saṅgamena sannipatitvā
tika-vin01t2:287_1: anurūpehi paccayehi akataṃ anibbattitanti asaṅkhataṃ. Natthi ettha matanti amataṃ,
tika-vin01t2:287_2: etasmiṃ vā adhigate natthi puggalassa mataṃ maraṇanti amataṃ. Kiñcāpi ettha “svākkhātaṃ
tika-vin01t2:287_3: dhammaṃ paccakkhāmī”tiādinā sabbattha dhamma-saddappayogo dassito, tathāpi dhamma-saddena
tika-vin01t2:287_4: ayojetvā vutte vevacane na paccakkhānaṃ nāma na hotīti “svākkhātaṃ paccakkhāmī”tiādinā
tika-vin01t2:287_5: vuttepi sikkhāpaccakkhānaṃ hotiyevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. “Svākkhātaṃ dhamma”ntiādinā pana
tika-vin01t2:288_0: Suppaṭipannanti svākkhāte dhammavinaye yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipannattā suppaṭipannaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:288_1: Majjhimāya paṭipadāya antadvayaṃ anupagamma paṭipannattā kāyavacīmanovaṅkakuṭilajimhadosappahānāya
tika-vin01t2:288_2: paṭipannattā ca ujuppaṭipannaṃ. Ñāyo vuccati nibbānaṃ ariyamaggādīhi ñāyati paṭivijjhīyati
tika-vin01t2:288_3: sacchikarīyatīti katvā, tadatthāya paṭipannattā ñāyappaṭipannaṃ. Yathā paṭipannā
tika-vin01t2:288_4: guṇasambhāvanāya parehi kariyamānaṃ paccuṭṭhānādisāmīcikammaṃ arahanti, tathā paṭipannattā sāmīcippaṭipannaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:289_0: Yugaḷavasena paṭhamamaggaṭṭho phalaṭṭhoti idamekaṃ yugaḷanti evaṃ cattāri purisayugāni
tika-vin01t2:289_1: honti. Ettha pana “catupurisayugaṃ saṅgha”nti vattabbe “cattārī”ti vibhattilopaṃ
tika-vin01t2:289_2: akatvā niddeso katoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Cattāri purisayugāni etthāti catupurisayugoti hi
tika-vin01t2:289_3: saṅgho vuccati. Aṭṭhapurisapuggalanti purisapuggalavasena eko paṭhamamaggaṭṭho, eko
tika-vin01t2:289_4: phalaṭṭhoti iminā nayena aṭṭheva purisapuggalā honti. Aṭṭha purisapuggalā etthāti
tika-vin01t2:289_5: aṭṭhapurisapuggalo, saṅgho. Ettha ca purisoti vā puggaloti vā ekatthānetāni padāni,
tika-vin01t2:290_0: Āhuneyyantiādīsu ānetvā hunitabbanti āhunaṃ, dūratopi ānetvā sīlavantesu dātabbānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:290_1: catunnaṃ paccayānametaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Taṃ āhunaṃ paṭiggahetuṃ yutto tassa mahapphalabhāvakaraṇatoti
tika-vin01t2:290_2: āhuneyyo, saṅgho. Atha vā dūratopi āgantvā sabbasāpateyyampi ettha hunitabbanti āhavanīyo,
tika-vin01t2:290_3: sakkādīnampi vā āhavanaṃ arahatīti āhavanīyo. Yo cāyaṃ brāhmaṇānaṃ āhavanīyo aggi,
tika-vin01t2:290_4: yattha hutaṃ mahapphalanti tesaṃ laddhi. Sace hutassa mahapphalatāya āhavanīyo, saṅghova
tika-vin01t2:290_5: āhavanīyo. Saṅghe hutañhi mahapphalaṃ hoti. Yathāha –
tika-vin01t2:291: “Yo ca vassasataṃ jantu, aggiṃ paricare vane;
tika-vin01t2:293: Sāyeva pūjanā seyyo, yañce vassasataṃ huta”nti. ;
tika-vin01t2:294: Tadetaṃ nikāyantare “āhavanīyo”ti padaṃ idha “āhuneyyo”ti iminā padena atthato ekaṃ, byañjanato panettha kiñcimattameva nānaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:295_0: Pāhuneyyanti ettha pana pāhunaṃ vuccati disāvidisato āgatānaṃ piyamanāpānaṃ ñātimittānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:295_1: atthāya sakkārena paṭiyattaṃ āgantukadānaṃ. Tampi ṭhapetvā te tathārūpe piyamittādike
tika-vin01t2:295_2: pāhunake saṅghasseva dātuṃ yuttaṃ, saṅghova taṃ paṭiggahetuṃ yutto. Saṅghasadiso
tika-vin01t2:295_3: hi pāhunako natthi. Tathā hesa ekabuddhantare vītivatteyeva dissati, abbokiṇṇañca
tika-vin01t2:295_4: piyamanāpattakarehi sīlādidhammehi samannāgatoti evaṃ pāhunamassa dātuṃ yuttaṃ, pāhunañca
tika-vin01t2:296_0: Dakkhanti etāya sattā yathādhippetāhi sampattīhi vaḍḍhantīti dakkhiṇā, paralokaṃ
tika-vin01t2:296_1: saddahitvā dātabbadānaṃ. Taṃ dakkhiṇaṃ arahati, dakkhiṇāya vā hito yasmā naṃ mahapphalakaratāya
tika-vin01t2:296_2: visodhetīti dakkhiṇeyyo. Ubho hatthe sirasi patiṭṭhāpetvā sabbalokena kariyamānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:296_3: añjalikammaṃ arahatīti añjalikaraṇīyo. Anuttaraṃ puññakkhettanti sabbalokassa asadisaṃ
tika-vin01t2:296_4: puññaviruhanaṭṭhānaṃ. Yathā hi rañño vā amaccassa vā sālīnaṃ vā yavānaṃ vā viruhanaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:296_5: rañño sālikkhettaṃ yavakkhettanti vuccati, evaṃ saṅgho sabbalokassa puññānaṃ viruhanaṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:296_6: Saṅghaṃ nissāya hi lokassa nānappakārahitasukhasaṃvattanikāni puññāni viruhanti,
tika-vin01t2:296_7: tasmā saṅgho anuttaraṃ puññakkhettaṃ lokassa. Etthāpi “suppaṭipannaṃ saṅgha”ntiādinā
tika-vin01t2:296_9: kato, tasmā “suppaṭipannaṃ paccakkhāmī”tiādinā vuttepi sikkhāpaccakkhānaṃ hotiyevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:297_0: Sikkhāvevacanesu pana sikkhā-saddaṃ vinā kevalaṃ bhikkhu-saddo bhikkhunī-saddo ca
tika-vin01t2:297_1: sikkhāya adhivacanaṃ na hotīti “bhikkhusikkhaṃ bhikkhunīsikkha”nti vutteyeva sīsaṃ
tika-vin01t2:297_2: eti, adhisīlādayo pana sikkhā evāti “adhisīlaṃ paccakkhāmī”tiādinā vuttepi sīsaṃ
tika-vin01t2:297_3: eti. Paṭhamaṃ pārājikantiādinā sikkhāpadānaṃyeva gahaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ, na āpattīnaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:298_0: Upajjhāyavevacanesu upajjhāyo hutvā yo pabbājesi ceva upasampādesi ca, taṃ sandhāya
tika-vin01t2:298_1: “yo maṃ pabbājesī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Yassa mūlenāti yassa padhānabhāvena kāraṇabhāvena
tika-vin01t2:298_2: vā. Yassa mūlaṃ padhānabhāvo kāraṇabhāvo vā etissāti yassamūlikā, pabbajjā upasampadā
tika-vin01t2:298_3: ca. Mūla-saddassa sāpekkhabhāvepi niccasāpekkhatāya gamakattā taddhitavutti daṭṭhabbā.
tika-vin01t2:299_0: Ācariyavevacanesu pana yo upajjhaṃ adatvā ācariyova hutvā pabbājesi, kammavācācariyo
tika-vin01t2:299_1: hutvā upasampādesi ca, taṃ sandhāya “yo maṃ pabbājesi, yo maṃ anusāvesī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:299_2: Imehi dvīhi vacanehi pabbajjācariyo ca upasampadācariyo ca dassito. Yāhaṃ nissāya
tika-vin01t2:299_3: vasāmīti nissayācariyaṃ dasseti. Yāhaṃ uddisāpemītiādinā pana dhammācariyo vutto.
tika-vin01t2:299_4: Tattha uddisāpemīti pāṭhaṃ uddisāpemi. Paripucchāmīti uggahitapāṭhassa atthaṃ paripucchāmi.
tika-vin01t2:299_5: Saddhivihārikavevacanādīsu ca vuttānusāreneva attho veditabbo. Tassa mūleti ettha
tika-vin01t2:300_1: kapaṇamanussānametaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Moḷibaddhoti sikhābaddho omukkamakuṭo vā. Kiñcāpi
tika-vin01t2:300_2: dvevāciko upāsako paṭhamabodhiyaṃyeva sambhavati, tathāpi tadā labbhamānanāmaṃ gahetvā
tika-vin01t2:300_3: vuttepi sikkhāpaccakkhānaṃ hotiyevāti dassanatthaṃ “dvevāciko upāsako”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:300_4: “Dvevāciko”ti idameva panettha vevacananti daṭṭhabbaṃ, tasmā “dvevācikoti maṃ dhārehī”ti
tika-vin01t2:300_5: ettakepi vutte sīsaṃ eti. Evaṃ sesesupi.
tika-vin01t2:301_0: Kumārakoti kumārāvattho ativiya daharasāmaṇero. Cellakoti tato mahantataro khuddakasāmaṇero.
tika-vin01t2:301_1: Ceṭakoti majjhimo. Moḷigalloti mahāsāmaṇero. Samaṇuddesoti pana avisesato sāmaṇerādhivacanaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:302_0: Dussīloti nissīlo sīlavirahito. Pāpadhammoti dussīlattā eva hīnajjhāsayatāya lāmakasabhāvo.
tika-vin01t2:302_1: Asucisaṅkassarasamācāroti aparisuddhakāyakammāditāya asuci hutvā saṅkāya saritabbasamācāro.
tika-vin01t2:302_2: Dussīlo hi kiñcideva asāruppaṃ disvā “idaṃ asukena kataṃ bhavissatī”ti paresaṃ āsaṅkanīyo
tika-vin01t2:302_3: hoti. Kenacideva karaṇīyena mantayante bhikkhū disvā “kacci nu kho ime mayā katakammaṃ
tika-vin01t2:302_4: jānitvā mantentī”ti attanoyeva saṅkāya saritabbasamācāro. Paṭicchannakammantoti lajjitabbatāya
tika-vin01t2:302_5: paṭicchādetabbakammanto. Assamaṇoti na samaṇo. Salākaggahaṇādīsu “ahampi samaṇo”ti
tika-vin01t2:302_7: brahmacārī”ti micchāpaṭiññāya brahmacāripaṭiñño, pūtinā kammena sīlavipattiyā anto
tika-vin01t2:302_8: anupaviṭṭhattā antopūti, chahi dvārehi rāgādikilesānussavanena tintattā avassuto,
tika-vin01t2:302_9: sañjātarāgādikacavarattā sīlavantehi chaḍḍetabbattā ca kasambujāto. Koṇṭhoti dussīlādhivacanametaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:303_0: “Yāni vā panaññānipi atthi buddhavevacanāni vā”tiādinā yaṃ-saddaparāmaṭṭhānaṃ buddhādivevacanānaṃyeva
tika-vin01t2:303_1: taṃ-saddena parāmasanaṃ hotīti āha – “tehi ākārehi…pe… buddhādīnaṃ vevacanehī”ti.
tika-vin01t2:303_2: Kathaṃ pana tāni ākārādisaddehi voharīyantīti āha “vevacanāni hī”tiādi. Saṇṭhānavantānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:303_3: buddhādīnaṃ saṇṭhānadīpanaṃ tāva hotu, saṇṭhānarahitānaṃ pana dhammasikkhādīnaṃ kathanti
tika-vin01t2:303_4: āha “sikkhāpaccakkhānasaṇṭhānattā eva vā”ti. Sikkhāpaccakkhānarūpāni hi vevacanāni
tika-vin01t2:303_5: “sikkhāpaccakkhānasaṇṭhānānī”ti vuccanti. Evaṃ khoti ettha khoti avadhāraṇatthe nipātoti āha “evamevā”ti.
tika-vin01t2:304_2: Na hi sabbāpi devatā tihetukapaṭisandhikāva honti dvihetukānampi sambhavato. Atikhippaṃ
tika-vin01t2:304_3: jānantīti devatānaṃ bhavaṅgaparivāsassa manussānaṃ viya adandhabhāvato vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:305_0: Sabhāgassāti purisassa. Visabhāgassāti mātugāmassa. Anariyakoti māgadhavohārato añño.
tika-vin01t2:305_1: Davāti sahasā. Ravāti virajjhitvā. Aññaṃ bhaṇissāmīti aññaṃ bhaṇanto buddhaṃ paccakkhāmīti
tika-vin01t2:305_2: bhaṇatīti yojetabbaṃ. Akkharasamayānabhiññatāya vā karaṇasampattiyā abhāvato vā kathetabbaṃ
tika-vin01t2:305_3: kathetuṃ asakkonto hutvā aññaṃ kathento ravā bhaṇati nāma. Ubhayathāpi aññaṃ bhaṇitukāmassa
