tika-vin01t2:306_0: Vācetīti pāḷiṃ kathento aññaṃ uggaṇhāpento vā vāceti. Paripucchatīti pāḷiyā atthaṃ
tika-vin01t2:306_1: paripucchanto pāḷiṃ paripucchati. Uggaṇhātīti aññassa santike pāḷiṃ uggaṇhāti. Sajjhāyaṃ
tika-vin01t2:306_2: karotīti uggahitapāḷiṃ sajjhāyati. Vaṇṇetīti pāḷiyā atthaṃ saṃvaṇṇento pāḷiṃ vaṇṇeti.
tika-vin01t2:306_3: Mahallakassa kiñci ajānanato aviditindriyatāya vā “potthakarūpasadisassā”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:306_4: mattikāya katarūpasadisassāti attho. Garumedhassāti ārammaṇesu lahuppavattiyā abhāvato
tika-vin01t2:306_5: dandhagatikatāya garupaññassa, mandapaññassāti vuttaṃ hoti. Sabbaso vāti iminā “idaṃ
tika-vin01t2:306_6: padaṃ sāvessāmi ‘sikkhaṃ paccakkhāmī”’ti evaṃ pavattacittuppādassa abhāvaṃ dasseti.
tika-vin01t2:306_7: Yasmā pana asati evarūpe cittuppāde kenaci pariyāyena tathāvidhaṃ vacībhedaṃ katvā
tika-vin01t2:306_8: sāvanaṃ nāma neva sambhavati, tasmā vuttaṃ “buddhaṃ paccakkhāmītiādīsu…pe… vacībhedaṃ katvā na sāvetī”ti.
tika-vin01t2:309_0: 55. Niddisitabbassāti vivaritabbassa pakāsetabbassa. Kilesehīti ahirikādīhi kilesehi.
tika-vin01t2:309_1: Ito paṭṭhāyāti duṭṭhulla-padato paṭṭhāya. Tassa kammassāti methunadhammapaṭisevanasaṅkhātassa
tika-vin01t2:310_0: Dvīhi dvīhi samāpajjitabbā dvayaṃdvayasamāpattīti āha “dvayena dvayena samāpajjitabbato”ti.
tika-vin01t2:310_1: Rāgapariyuṭṭhānena sadisabhāvappattiyā mithunānaṃ idaṃ methunaṃ, methunameva dhammo
tika-vin01t2:310_2: methunadhammoti āha “ubhinnaṃ rattāna”ntiādi. Tattha rattānanti methunarāgena rattānaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:310_3: Sārattānanti teneva rāgena ativiya rattānaṃ. Avassutānanti lokassādamittasanthavavasena
tika-vin01t2:311_0: Yasmā “paṭisevati nāmā”ti padaṃ mātikāya natthi, tasmā “paṭisevati nāmāti kasmā uddhaṭa”nti
tika-vin01t2:311_1: yo maññati, tassa kāraṇaṃ dassento “paṭiseveyyāti ettha…pe… mātikāpada”nti āha. Itthiyā
tika-vin01t2:311_2: nimittenāti idaṃ “maggena gacchatī”tiādi viya daṭṭhabbaṃ. Yathā hi “maggena gacchatī”ti
tika-vin01t2:311_3: vutte “maggaṃ gacchati, magge vā gacchatī”ti ayamattho labbhati, evaṃ “itthiyā nimittena
tika-vin01t2:311_4: pavesetī”ti vutte “itthiyā nimittaṃ paveseti, nimitte vā pavesetī”ti ayamattho labbhati.
tika-vin01t2:311_5: Idañca yebhuyyena purisapayogadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Nimittaṃ aṅgajātanti atthato ekaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:311_6: Pavesanaṃ nāma na bahi chupanamattanti āha “vātena asamphuṭṭhe allokāse”ti. Abbhantarañhi
tika-vin01t2:311_7: pavesento “pavesetī”ti vuccati, na bahi chupanto. Abbhantaranti ca pakatiyā sabbaso
tika-vin01t2:312_0: Idāni sabbathā lesokāsapidahanatthaṃ itthinimitte purisanimitte ca labbhamānaṃ pavesakāle
tika-vin01t2:312_1: aññamaññaṃ phassārahaṃ padesavisesaṃ vibhajitvā dassento “itthinimitte cattāri passānī”tiādimāha.
tika-vin01t2:312_2: Vātena hi asamphuṭṭhe allokāse yattha katthaci ekenapi padesena chupitvā pavesento
tika-vin01t2:312_3: “pavesetī”ti vuccati. Vemajjhanti yathā cattāri passāni asamphusanto paveseti, evaṃ
tika-vin01t2:312_4: katavivarassa itthinimittassa heṭṭhimatalaṃ vuccati, purisanimitte pana majjhanti
tika-vin01t2:312_5: aggakoṭiṃ sandhāya vadati. Uparīti aggakoṭito uparibhāgappadeso. Idañca majjhena
tika-vin01t2:312_6: samiñjitvā pavesentassa majjhimapabbasamiñjitaṅguliṃ katthaci pavesentassa aṅguliyā
tika-vin01t2:312_7: majjhimapabbapiṭṭhisadisaṃ aṅgajātassa uparibhāgavemajjhaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Heṭṭhā
tika-vin01t2:312_8: pavesentoti itthinimittassa heṭṭhimabhāgena chupantaṃ pavesento. Majjhena pavesentoti
tika-vin01t2:312_9: abbhantaratalaṃ chupitvā majjhena pavesento. Katthaci acchupantaṃ pavesetvā nīharantassa
tika-vin01t2:312_10: hi natthi pārājikaṃ, dukkaṭaṃ pana hoti chinnasīsavatthusmiṃ vaṭṭakate mukhe acchupantaṃ
tika-vin01t2:312_11: pavesetvā nīharantassa viya. Majjheneva chupantaṃ pavesentoti aggakoṭiyā chupantaṃ
tika-vin01t2:312_12: pavesento. Majjhimapabbapiṭṭhiyā samiñjitaṅgulinti sambandho. Atha vā samiñjitaṅguliṃ
tika-vin01t2:312_13: majjhimapabbapiṭṭhiyā pavesento viyāti yojetabbaṃ. Saṅkocetvāti nimittamajjhena bhinditvā.
tika-vin01t2:312_14: Uparibhāgenāti saṅkocitassa uparibhāgakoṭiyā. Idāni purisanimittassa heṭṭhā vuttesu
tika-vin01t2:312_15: chasu ṭhānesu uparīti vuttaṭṭhānantarassa vasena visuṃ cattāri passāni gahetvā purisanimitte
tika-vin01t2:312_16: dasadhā ṭhānabhedaṃ dassento “tatthā”tiādimāha. Heṭṭhā pana visuṃ tāni aggahetvā
tika-vin01t2:312_17: “cattāri passānī”ti vacanasāmaññatopi visuṃ visuṃ labbhamānāni ekaccaṃ gahetvā cha
tika-vin01t2:312_18: ṭhānāni vuttāni. Tulādaṇḍasadisaṃ pavesentassāti ujukaṃ pavesentassa.
tika-vin01t2:313_0: Nimitte jātanti attano nimitte jātaṃ. Cammakhīlanti nimitte uṭṭhitaṃ cammameva. “Uṇṇigaṇḍo”tipi
tika-vin01t2:313_1: vadanti. Nimitte jātampi cammakhīlādi nimittamevāti āha “āpatti pārājikassā”ti. “Upahatakāyappasāda”nti
tika-vin01t2:313_3: – “matacammaṃ vā sukkhapīḷakaṃ vā”ti. Sati hi upādinnabhāve upahatepi kāyappasāde
tika-vin01t2:313_4: upahatindriyavatthusmiṃ viya pārājikāpattiyeva siyā, matacammaṃ pana sukkhapīḷakañca
tika-vin01t2:313_5: anupādinnakaṃ upādinnakeyeva ca pārājikāpatti. Tenevāha “āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti. Na
tika-vin01t2:313_6: ca evaṃ karontassa anāpatti sakkā vattunti dukkaṭaṃ vuttaṃ, itthinimittassa pana
tika-vin01t2:313_7: naṭṭhepi upādinnabhāve pārājikāpattiyeva. Mate akkhāyite yebhuyyena akkhāyite pārājikāpattivacanato
tika-vin01t2:313_8: methunassādenāti iminā kāyasaṃsaggarāgaṃ nivatteti. Sati hi kāyasaṃsaggarāge saṅghādisesova
tika-vin01t2:313_9: siyā, bījānipi nimittasaṅkhyaṃ na gacchantīti dukkaṭameva vuttaṃ. “Nimittena nimittaṃ
tika-vin01t2:314_0: Idāni imissā methunakathāya asabbhirūpattā “īdisaṃ ṭhānaṃ kathentehi suṇantehi ca
tika-vin01t2:314_1: evaṃ paṭipajjitabba”nti anusāsanto “ayañca methunakathā nāmā”tiādimāha. Methunakathāya
tika-vin01t2:314_3: niyojeti. Paṭikūlamanasikārena hi rāgo nivattati, samaṇasaññādīsu paccupaṭṭhitesu
tika-vin01t2:314_4: hāso nivattati. Sattānuddayāyāti sattānaṃ apāyadukkhādīhi anurakkhaṇatthaṃ. Lokānukampāyāti
tika-vin01t2:315_0: Mukhaṃ apidhāyāti mukhaṃ apidahitvā, yena kenaci pamādena kadāci mandahāso bhaveyya,
tika-vin01t2:315_1: tadā garuttaṃ kuppeyya, tasmā tādise kāle garubhāvassa avikopanatthaṃ bījakena mukhaṃ
tika-vin01t2:315_2: paṭicchādetvā nisīditabbanti adhippāyo. Atha vā mukhaṃ apidhāyāti mukhaṃ pidahitvāti
tika-vin01t2:315_3: attho. Bījakena mukhaṃ paṭicchādetvā hasamānena na nisīditabbanti ayamettha adhippāyo.
tika-vin01t2:315_4: Dantavidaṃsakanti dante dassetvā vivaritvā cāti attho. Gabbhitenāti saṅkocaṃ anāpajjantena,
tika-vin01t2:315_5: ussāhajātenāti attho. Yadi hi “īdisaṃ nāma asabbhiṃ kathemī”ti saṅkocaṃ āpajjeyya,
tika-vin01t2:315_6: atthavibhāvanaṃ na siyā, tasmā “tādisena sammāsambuddhenapi tāva īdisaṃ kathitaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:315_7: kimaṅgaṃ panāhaṃ kathemī”ti evaṃ ussāhajātena kathetabbanti adhippāyo. Satthupaṭibhāgenāti
tika-vin01t2:318_0: Tiracchānesu gatāyāti tiracchānesu uppannāya. Yasmā tiracchānagatā nāma atikhuddakāpi
tika-vin01t2:318_1: honti, yesaṃ maggesu tilaphalamattampi pavesanaṃ nappahoti, tasmā na sabbāva tiracchānagatitthiyo
tika-vin01t2:318_4: pārājikavatthūnaṃ heṭṭhimaparicchedadassanatthaṃ porāṇehi ṭhapitā. Tattha ahīti jātiniddesena
tika-vin01t2:318_5: sabbāpi sappajāti saṅgahitāti āha – “ahiggahaṇena…pe… dīghajāti saṅgahitā”ti. Tattha
tika-vin01t2:318_6: gonasāti sappavisesā, yesaṃ piṭṭhīsu mahantāni maṇḍalāni sandissanti. Macchaggahaṇaṃ
tika-vin01t2:318_8: Teneva maṇḍūkakacchapānaṃ sapādakattepi odakajātikattā saṅgaho kato.
tika-vin01t2:319_0: Mukhasaṇṭhānanti oṭṭhacammasaṇṭhānaṃ. Vaṇasaṅkhepaṃ gacchatīti vaṇasaṅgahaṃ gacchati
tika-vin01t2:319_1: navasu vaṇamukhesu saṅgahitattāti adhippāyo. Vaṇe thullaccayañca “amaggena amaggaṃ
tika-vin01t2:319_2: paveseti, āpatti thullaccayassā”ti imassa vasena veditabbaṃ. Tasmiñhi sutte dvīsu
tika-vin01t2:319_3: sambhinnavaṇesu ekena vaṇena pavesetvā dutiyena nīharantassa thullaccayaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:319_4: Vakkhati ca “imassa suttassa anulomavasena sabbattha vaṇasaṅkhepe thullaccayaṃ veditabba”nti.
tika-vin01t2:319_6: pakkhijāti saṅgahitā”ti. Majjāriggahaṇampi catuppadajātiyā upalakkhaṇapadanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:319_7: Tenāha – “majjāriggahaṇena…pe… catuppadajāti saṅgahitā”ti. Rukkhasunakhā nāma kalandakātipi
tika-vin01t2:320_0: Parājita-saddo upasaggassa vuddhiṃ katvā ta-kārassa ca ka-kāraṃ katvā pārājikoti
tika-vin01t2:320_2: anuddhaṃseyyā’tiādīsu, katthaci sikkhāpadanti idaṃ pana disvā jānitabba”nti gaṇṭhipadesu
tika-vin01t2:320_3: vuttaṃ. Parājayatīti pārājikaṃ, pārājikāti ca kattusādhanena pārājika-saddena sikkhāpadaṃ
tika-vin01t2:320_4: āpatti ca vuccatīti dassento āha “yo taṃ atikkamatī”tiādi. Puggalo pana kammasādhanena
tika-vin01t2:320_5: pārājika-saddena vuccatīti dassento āha “puggalo yasmā parājito”tiādi.
tika-vin01t2:321_0: Etameva hi atthaṃ sandhāyāti “taṃ āpattiṃ āpanno puggalo parājito hoti parājayamāpanno”ti
tika-vin01t2:321_1: etamatthaṃ sandhāya. Cuto paraddhotiādinā hi taṃ āpattiṃ āpannapuggalo cuto hoti
tika-vin01t2:321_2: parājito parājayaṃ āpannoti ayamattho viññāyati, na pana puggalo pārājiko nāma hotīti
tika-vin01t2:321_3: etamatthaṃ sandhāyāti evamattho gahetabbo. Na hi parivārepi gāthā puggalavuttipārājikasaddanibbacanadassanatthaṃ
tika-vin01t2:321_4: vuttā āpattivuttīnaṃ pārājikā-disaddānaṃ nibbacanavibhāgappasaṅge vuttattā. Ayañhi
tika-vin01t2:321_6: nāma vuttaṃ, taṃ āpajjanto puggalo yasmā parājito parājayamāpanno saddhamā cuto paraddho
tika-vin01t2:321_7: bhaṭṭho niraṅkato ca hoti, anīhaṭe tasmiṃ puggale puna uposathapavāraṇādibhedo saṃvāso
tika-vin01t2:321_8: natthi, tenetaṃ iti vuccati tena kāraṇena etaṃ āpattipārājikaṃ iti vuccatīti. Ayaṃ
tika-vin01t2:321_9: panettha saṅkhepattho – yasmā parājito hoti etena, tasmā etaṃ pārājikanti vuccatīti.
tika-vin01t2:321_10: Paribhaṭṭhoti sāsanato bhaṭṭho, parihīnoti attho. Chinnoti antarā khaṇḍito.
tika-vin01t2:322_0: Saddhiṃ yojanāyāti padayojanāya saddhiṃ. Catubbidhaṃ saṅghakammanti apalokanādivasena
tika-vin01t2:322_1: catubbidhaṃ kammaṃ. Sīmāparicchinnehīti ekasīmāpariyāpannehi. Pakatattā nāma pārājikaṃ
tika-vin01t2:322_2: anāpannā anukkhittā ca. Pañcavidhopīti nidānuddesādivasena pañcavidhopi. Nahāpitapubbakānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:322_3: viya odhisaanuññātaṃ ṭhapetvā avasesaṃ sabbampi sikkhāpadaṃ sabbehipi lajjīpuggalehi
tika-vin01t2:322_4: anatikkamanīyattā vuttaṃ “sabbehipi lajjīpuggalehi samaṃ sikkhitabbabhāvato”ti. Samanti
tika-vin01t2:322_5: saddhiṃ, ekappahārena vā. Sikkhitabbabhāvatoti anatikkamanavasena uggahaparipucchādinā
tika-vin01t2:322_6: ca sikkhitabbabhāvato. Sāmaññasikkhāpadesu “idaṃ tayā na sikkhitabba”nti evaṃ abahikātabbato
tika-vin01t2:322_7: “na ekopi tato bahiddhā sandissatī”ti vuttaṃ. Yaṃ taṃ vuttanti sambandho.
tika-vin01t2:323_0: 56. Na kevalaṃ itthiyā eva nimittaṃ pārājikavatthūti iminā kevalaṃ itthiyā eva nimittaṃ
tika-vin01t2:323_1: pārājikavatthu na hoti, atha kho ubhatobyañjanakapaṇḍakapurisānampi nimittaṃ pārājikavatthūti
tika-vin01t2:323_2: dasseti. Na ca manussitthiyā evāti iminā pana manussitthiyā eva nimittaṃ pārājikavatthu
tika-vin01t2:323_4: dasseti. “Vatthumeva na hotīti amanussitthipasaṅgena āgataṃ suvaṇṇarajatādimayaṃ
tika-vin01t2:323_5: paṭikkhipatī”ti tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ, taṃ yuttaṃ viya na dissati. Na hi ito
tika-vin01t2:323_6: pubbe amanussitthiggahaṇaṃ kataṃ atthi, yena tappasaṅgo siyā. Idāneva hi “tisso itthiyo”tiādinā
tika-vin01t2:323_7: amanussitthiggahaṇaṃ kataṃ, na ca amanussitthiggahaṇena suvaṇṇarajatādimayānaṃ pasaṅgo
tika-vin01t2:323_9: niddesena suvaṇṇarajatādimayānaṃ pasaṅgassa nivattitattā. Tathā hi itthipurisādīsu
tika-vin01t2:323_10: manussāmanussādīsu vā kañci anāmasitvā avisesena “methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭiseveyyā”ti
tika-vin01t2:323_11: ettakameva mātikāyaṃ vuttaṃ. Tassa padabhājane ca “paṭisevati nāmā”ti mātikaṃ padaṃ
tika-vin01t2:323_12: uddharitvā “yo nimittena nimittaṃ aṅgajātena aṅgajātaṃ antamaso tilaphalamattampi
tika-vin01t2:323_13: paveseti, eso paṭisevati nāmā”ti paṭisevanākārova dassito, na pana pārājikavatthubhūtanimittanissayā
tika-vin01t2:323_15: tasmā “itthiyā eva nu kho nimittaṃ pārājikavatthu, udāhu aññesampī”ti evamādi sandeho
tika-vin01t2:323_16: siyā, nimittavohāro ca suvaṇṇarajatādimayarūpakesu ca labbhatiyeva. Teneva vinītavatthūsu
tika-vin01t2:323_17: “lepacittassa nimittaṃ aṅgajātena chupi, dārudhītalikāya nimittaṃ aṅgajātena chupī”ti
tika-vin01t2:323_19: hoti, na hotī”ti kassaci āsaṅkā siyā. Teneva “lepacittādivatthūsu tassa kukkuccaṃ
tika-vin01t2:323_21: jātivasena manussāmanussādito tidhā katvā pārājikavatthubhūte satte bhagavā vibhajitvā
tika-vin01t2:323_22: dasseti, tasmā “vatthumeva na hotī”ti nimittasāmaññato pasaṅgāgataṃ suvaṇṇarajatādimayānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:324: Tayo maggeti bhummatthe upayogavacananti āha “tīsu maggesūti attho veditabbo”ti. Evaṃ sabbatthāti iminā “dve magge”ti etthāpi dvīsu maggesūti attho veditabboti atidissati.
tika-vin01t2:327_0: 57. Assāti ākhyātikapadanti tassa atthaṃ dassento “hotī”ti āha. Gaṇṭhipadesu pana
tika-vin01t2:327_1: “assāti puggalaṃ parāmasitvā hotīti vacanaseso dassito”tipi atthavikappo dassito,
tika-vin01t2:327_2: na so sundarataro. Yadi hi vacanaseso adhippeto siyā, “hotī”ti vattabbaṃ, teneva
tika-vin01t2:328_0: 58. Sādiyantassevāti ettha sādiyanaṃ nāma sevetukāmatācittassa upaṭṭhāpananti āha
tika-vin01t2:328_2: paṭipakkhaṃ dussīlabhāvaṃ atthayantī”ti gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ. Attano veripuggalassa
tika-vin01t2:328_3: pana paṭipakkhabhūtaṃ kañci amittaṃ atthayanti gavesantīti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin01t2:328_4: Paccatthikā hi attano veriṃ nāsetukāmā tassa paṭipakkhabhūtaṃ kañci amittaṃ attano
tika-vin01t2:328_5: sahāyabhāvamupagacchantaṃ icchanti. Rājapaccatthikādīnaṃ upari vakkhamānattā tadanurūpavasena
tika-vin01t2:328_6: atthaṃ dassento “bhikkhū eva paccatthikā bhikkhupaccatthikā”ti āha. “Bhikkhussa paccatthikā
tika-vin01t2:328_7: bhikkhupaccatthikā”ti evaṃ pana vuccamāne bhikkhussa paccatthikā rājādayopi ettheva
tika-vin01t2:328_8: saṅgayhantīti rājapaccatthikādayo visuṃ na vattabbā siyuṃ, aññattha pana bhikkhussa
tika-vin01t2:328_10: Issāpakatāti paresaṃ lābhasakkārādiasahanalakkhaṇāya issāya abhibhūtā. Nipparipphandanti
tika-vin01t2:328_11: paripphandavirahitaṃ, yathā calituṃ parivattituṃ na sakkoti, tathā gahetvāti attho.
tika-vin01t2:329_0: Tasmiṃ khaṇeti tasmiṃ pavesanakkhaṇe, aggato yāva mūlā pavesanakālo “pavesanakkhaṇo”ti
tika-vin01t2:329_1: vuccati. Sādiyanaṃ nāma sevanacittassa uppādananti āha “sevanacittaṃ upaṭṭhāpetī”ti.
tika-vin01t2:329_2: Paviṭṭhakāleti aṅgajātassa yattakaṃ ṭhānaṃ pavesanārahaṃ, tattakaṃ anavasesato paviṭṭhakāle.
tika-vin01t2:329_3: Evaṃ paviṭṭhassa uddharaṇārambhato antarā ṭhitakālo ṭhitaṃ nāma. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana
tika-vin01t2:329_4: mātugāmassa sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ patvā sabbathā vāyamato oramitvā ṭhitakālaṃ sandhāya
tika-vin01t2:329_5: “sukkavissaṭṭhisamaye”ti vuttaṃ. Uddharaṇaṃ nāma yāva aggā nīharaṇakāloti āha – “nīharaṇakāle
tika-vin01t2:329_6: paṭisevanacittaṃ upaṭṭhāpetī”ti. Aṅgārakāsunti aṅgārarāsiṃ. Evarūpe kāle asādiyanaṃ
tika-vin01t2:329_7: nāma na sabbesaṃ visayoti āha “imañhi evarūpaṃ āraddhavipassaka”ntiādi. Ekādasahi
tika-vin01t2:329_9: aggīhi. Rāgādayo hi anuḍahanaṭṭhena “aggī”ti vuccanti. Te hi yassa santi, taṃ niḍahanti,
tika-vin01t2:329_10: mahāpariḷāhā ca honti dunnibbāpayā ca. Bhagavatā ca dummaṅkūnaṃ puggalānaṃ niggaho
tika-vin01t2:329_11: icchitoyevāti āha – “paccatthikānañcassa manorathavighātaṃ karonto”ti. Assāti asādiyantassa
tika-vin01t2:332_1: akkhāyitanimitta”nti. Akkhāyitaṃ nimittaṃ yassā sā akkhāyitanimittā. “Jāgaranti”ntiādi
tika-vin01t2:333_0: Samānācariyakā therāti ekācariyassa pāṭhakantevāsikā. Mahābhayeti brāhmaṇatissabhaye.
tika-vin01t2:333_1: Gaṅgāya aparabhāgo aparagaṅgaṃ. Vata reti garahatthe nipāto. Avissajjantena kiṃ kattabbanti
tika-vin01t2:333_2: āha “niccakālaṃ sotabba”ntiādi. Evaṃ vinayagarukānanti iminā upari tehi vuccamānavinicchayassa
tika-vin01t2:333_3: garukaraṇīyatāya kāraṇaṃ vuttaṃ. Sabbaṃ pariyādiyitvāti sabbaṃ pārājikakkhettaṃ anavasesato
tika-vin01t2:333_4: gahetvā. Sotaṃ chinditvāti pārājikakkhette vītikkamasotaṃ chinditvā. Apaññattabhāvato
tika-vin01t2:333_5: yuttiabhāvato ca “pārājikacchāyā panettha na dissatī”ti vuttaṃ. Keci pana “upaḍḍhakkhāyitabhāvassa
tika-vin01t2:333_6: dubbinicchayattā tattha pārājikaṃ na paññapesī”ti vadanti, taṃ akāraṇaṃ, na ca dubbinicchayatā
tika-vin01t2:333_8: hi kiñcideva adhikaṃ ūnaṃ vā yadi khāyitaṃ siyā, tampi yebhuyyena khāyitaṃ akkhāyitanti
tika-vin01t2:333_10: Apica upaḍḍhakkhāyitaṃ yadi sabhāvato pārājikakkhettaṃ siyā, na tattha bhagavā dubbinicchayanti
tika-vin01t2:334_0: Idāni therena katavinicchayameva upatthambhetvā aparampi tattha kāraṇaṃ dassento
tika-vin01t2:334_1: “apicā”tiādimāha. Nimitte appamattikāpi maṃsarāji sace avasiṭṭhā hoti, taṃ yebhuyyakkhāyitameva
tika-vin01t2:334_2: hoti, tato paraṃ pana sabbaso khāyite nimitte dukkaṭamevāti dassento āha “tato paraṃ
tika-vin01t2:334_3: thullaccayaṃ natthī”ti. Atha vā yebhuyyena khāyitaṃ nāma vaccamaggapassāvamaggamukhānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:334_4: catūsu koṭṭhāsesu dve koṭṭhāse atikkamma yāva tatiyakoṭṭhāsassa pariyosānā khāditaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:334_5: tato paraṃ pana tatiyakoṭṭhāsaṃ atikkamma yāva catutthakoṭṭhāsassa pariyosānā khāditaṃ
tika-vin01t2:334_6: dukkaṭavatthūti veditabbaṃ. Matasarīrasmiṃyeva veditabbanti “mataṃ yebhuyyena akkhāyita”ntiādivacanato.
tika-vin01t2:334_7: “Yadipi nimittaṃ sabbaso khāyitantiādi sabbaṃ jīvamānakasarīrameva sandhāya vutta”nti
tika-vin01t2:334_8: mahāgaṇṭhipade vuttaṃ. Kenaci pana “taṃ vīmaṃsitvā gahetabba”nti likhitaṃ. Kimettha
tika-vin01t2:334_9: vīmaṃsitabbaṃ jīvamānakasarīrasseva adhikatattā matasarīre labbhamānassa vinicchayassa
tika-vin01t2:335_0: “Jīvamānakasarīrassa vuttappakāre magge sacepi tacādīni anavasesetvā sabbaso chinne
tika-vin01t2:335_1: nimittasaṇṭhānamattaṃ paññāyati, tattha antamaso aṅgajāte uṭṭhikaṃ anaṭṭhakāyappasādaṃ
tika-vin01t2:335_2: pīḷakaṃ vā cammakhīlaṃ vā pavesentassapi sevanacitte sati pārājikaṃ, naṭṭhakāyappasādaṃ
tika-vin01t2:335_3: sukkhapīḷakaṃ vā matacammaṃ vā lomaṃ vā pavesentassa dukkaṭaṃ. Sace nimittasaṇṭhānamattampi
tika-vin01t2:335_4: anavasesetvā sabbaso maggo uppāṭito, tattha upakkamato vaṇasaṅkhepavasena thullaccaya”nti –
tika-vin01t2:337_0: Sabbaso khāyitanti nimittappadese bahiṭṭhitaṃ chavicammaṃ sabbaso chinditvā soṇasiṅgālādīhi
tika-vin01t2:337_1: khāyitasadisaṃ kataṃ. Tenevāha “chavicammaṃ natthī”ti. Nimittamaṃsassa pana abbhantare
tika-vin01t2:337_2: chavicammassa ca vijjamānattā “nimittasaṇṭhānaṃ paññāyatī”ti vuttaṃ. Tenevāha “pavesanaṃ
tika-vin01t2:337_3: jāyatī”ti. Nimittasaṇṭhānaṃ pana anavasesetvāti nimittākārena ṭhitaṃ chavicammamaṃsādiṃ
tika-vin01t2:337_4: anavasesetvā. Jīvamānakasarīre labbhamānavisesaṃ dassetvā idāni matasarīre labbhamānavisesaṃ
tika-vin01t2:338_0: Manussānaṃ jīvamānakasarīretiādinā pana akkhiādayopi vaṇasaṅgahaṃ gacchantīti vaṇena
tika-vin01t2:338_1: ekaparicchedaṃ katvā akkhiādīsupi thullaccayaṃ vuttaṃ. Tesañca vaṇasaṅgaho “navadvāro
tika-vin01t2:338_2: mahāvaṇo”ti evamādisuttānusārena veditabbo. Tiracchānagatānaṃ akkhikaṇṇavaṇesu dukkaṭaṃ
tika-vin01t2:338_3: pana aṭṭhakathāppamāṇena gahetabbaṃ. Yathā hi manussāmanussatiracchānagatesu vaccamaggapassāvamaggamukhānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:338_4: pārājikavatthubhāve nānākaraṇaṃ natthi, evaṃ akkhiādīnampi thullaccayādivatthubhāve
tika-vin01t2:338_5: ninnānākaraṇena bhavitabbaṃ. Vaṇe thullaccayañca “amaggena amaggaṃ paveseti, āpatti
tika-vin01t2:338_6: thullaccayassā”ti sāmaññato vuttaṃ, na pana “manussāna”nti visesanaṃ atthi. Yadi
tika-vin01t2:338_7: ca tiracchānagatānaṃ vaṇesu thullaccayena na bhavitabbaṃ, pataṅgamukhamaṇḍūkassa
tika-vin01t2:338_8: mukhasaṇṭhāne vaṇasaṅkhepato thullaccayaṃ na vattabbaṃ, vuttañca, tasmā aṭṭhakathācariyā
tika-vin01t2:338_9: evettha pamāṇaṃ. Bhagavato adhippāyaññuno hi aṭṭhakathācariyā. Teneva vuttaṃ “buddhena
tika-vin01t2:338_10: dhammo vinayo ca vutto, yo tassa puttehi tatheva ñāto”tiādi. Manussānanti itthipurisapaṇḍakaubhatobyañjanakānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:338_11: sāmaññato vuttaṃ. Vatthikosesūti vatthipuṭesu purisānaṃ aṅgajātakosesu. Matasarīraṃ
tika-vin01t2:338_12: yāva uddhumātakādibhāvena kuthitaṃ na hoti, tāva allasarīranti veditabbaṃ. Tenāha
tika-vin01t2:338_13: – “yadā pana sarīraṃ uddhumātakaṃ hotī”tiādi. Pārājikavatthuñca thullaccayavatthuñca
tika-vin01t2:338_14: vijahatīti ettha pārājikavatthubhāvaṃ thullaccayavatthubhāvañca vijahatīti attho
tika-vin01t2:339_0: Methunarāgena vatthikosaṃ pavesentassa thullaccayaṃ vuttanti āha “patthikosaṃ appavesento”ti.
tika-vin01t2:339_1: Itthiyā appavesentoti itthiyā nimittaṃ appavesento. Appavesentoti ca pavesanādhippāyassa
tika-vin01t2:339_2: abhāvaṃ dasseti. Pavesanādhippāyena bahi chupantassa pana methunassa pubbapayogattā
tika-vin01t2:339_3: dukkaṭeneva bhavitabbaṃ. Nimittena nimittaṃ chupati, thullaccayanti idaṃ “na ca,
tika-vin01t2:339_4: bhikkhave, rattacittena aṅgajātaṃ chupitabbaṃ, yo chupeyya, āpatti thullaccayassā”ti
tika-vin01t2:339_5: imassa suttassa vasena vuttaṃ. Tattha ca kesañci aññathāpi atthavikappassa vidhiṃ
tika-vin01t2:339_7: sarīra”nti vuttaṃ, tathāpi sesaaṭṭhakathāsu “methunarāgena mukhenā”ti vacanassa abhāvaṃ
tika-vin01t2:340_0: Idāni mahāaṭṭhakathaṃ pāḷiyā saṃsanditvā dassento “yaṃ tāva mahāaṭṭhakathāya”ntiādimāha.
tika-vin01t2:340_1: Itarathā hi dukkaṭaṃ siyāti pakatimukhena chupantassa visāṇādiggahaṇe viya dukkaṭaṃ
tika-vin01t2:340_2: siyā. Evaṃ mahāaṭṭhakathaṃ pāḷiyā saṃsanditvā idāni tattha kesañci aññathā atthavikappaṃ
tika-vin01t2:340_5: passāvamaggaṃ methunarāgena pakatimukhena chupantassa dukkaṭanti veditabbaṃ. Kāyasaṃsaggarāgena
tika-vin01t2:340_6: dukkaṭanti nimittamukhena vā pakatimukhena vā kāyasaṃsaggarāgena chupantassa dukkaṭameva.
tika-vin01t2:343_0: 61-2. Paṭipannakassāti āraddhavipassakassa. Upādinnakanti kāyindriyaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:343_1: Upādinnakena phusatīti upādinnakena phusīyati ghaṭṭīyatīti evaṃ kammani ya-kāralopena
tika-vin01t2:343_2: attho veditabbo. Atha vā evaṃ karonto kiñci upādinnakaṃ upādinnakena na phusati na
tika-vin01t2:343_3: ghaṭṭetīti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo. Lesaṃ oḍḍessantīti lesaṃ samuṭṭhāpessanti,
tika-vin01t2:343_4: parikappessantīti vuttaṃ hoti. Santhatādibhedehi bhinditvāti santhatādivisesanehi
tika-vin01t2:343_5: visesetvā, santhatādīhi catūhi yojetvāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin01t2:344_0: Santhatāyāti ekadese samudāyavohāro “paṭo daḍḍho”tiādīsu viya. Tathā hi paṭassa ekadesepi
tika-vin01t2:344_1: daḍḍhe “paṭo daḍḍho”ti voharanti, evaṃ itthiyā vaccamaggādīsu kismiñci magge santhate
tika-vin01t2:344_2: itthī “santhatā”ti vuccati. Tenāha “santhatā nāmā”tiādi. Vatthādīni anto appavesetvā
tika-vin01t2:344_3: bahi ṭhapetvā bandhanaṃ sandhāya “paliveṭhetvā”ti vuttaṃ. Ekadese samudāyavohāravaseneva
tika-vin01t2:344_4: bhikkhupi “santhato”ti vuccatīti āha “santhato nāmā”tiādi. Yattake paviṭṭheti tilaphalamatte
tika-vin01t2:344_5: paviṭṭhe. Akkhiādimhi santhatepi yathāvatthukamevāti āha “thullaccayakkhette thullaccayaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:345_0: Khāṇuṃ ghaṭṭentassa dukkaṭanti itthinimittassa anto khāṇuṃ pavesetvā samatalaṃ atirittaṃ
tika-vin01t2:345_1: vā khāṇuṃ ghaṭṭentassa dukkaṭaṃ pavesābhāvato. Sace pana īsakaṃ anto pavisitvā ṭhitaṃ
tika-vin01t2:345_2: khāṇukameva aṅgajātena chupati, pārājikameva. Tassa talanti veḷunaḷādikassa antotalaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:345_3: Vinītavatthūsu “tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhu sīvathikaṃ gantvā chinnasīsaṃ
tika-vin01t2:345_4: passitvā vaṭṭakate mukhe acchupantaṃ aṅgajātaṃ pavesesi. Tassa kukkuccaṃ ahosi…pe…
tika-vin01t2:345_5: anāpatti bhikkhu pārājikassa, āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti vuttattā tassa suttassa anulomato
tika-vin01t2:345_6: “ākāsagatameva katvā pavesetvā nīharati, dukkaṭa”nti vuttaṃ. Bahiddhā khāṇuketi antopavesitaveṇupabbādikassa
tika-vin01t2:345_8: katthaci upakkamantassa na sakkā anāpattiyā bhavitunti “dukkaṭamevā”ti vuttaṃ. Teneva
tika-vin01t2:348_1: Idāni sāmaññatopi atthasambhavaṃ dassento “itthidhuttasurādhuttādayo vā”ti āha. Hadayanti hadayamaṃsaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:351_0: 66. Paṭiññākaraṇaṃ natthīti pucchitabbābhāvato. Na hi dūsako “kena cittena vītikkamaṃ
tika-vin01t2:351_1: akāsi, jānitvā akāsi, udāhu ajānitvā”ti evaṃ pucchāya arahati. Tatthevāti vesāliyaṃ
tika-vin01t2:351_2: mahāvane eva. Sabbaṅgagatanti ṭhapetvā kesalomadantanakhānaṃ maṃsavinimuttaṭṭhānañceva
tika-vin01t2:351_3: thaddhasukkhacammañca udakamiva telabindu avasesasabbasarīraṃ byāpetvā ṭhitaṃ. Sarīrakampādīnīti
tika-vin01t2:351_4: ādi-saddena akkhīnaṃ pītavaṇṇādiṃ saṅgaṇhāti. Pittakosake ṭhitanti hadayapapphāsānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:351_5: antare yakanamaṃsaṃ nissāya patiṭṭhite mahākosātakīkosasadise pittakose ṭhitaṃ. Kupiteti
tika-vin01t2:352_0: Vissaṭṭhacittoti vissaṭṭhapakaticitto. Yakkhummattakoti yakkhā kira yassa cittaṃ
tika-vin01t2:352_1: khipitukāmā honti, tassa setamukhaṃ nīlodaraṃ surattahatthapādaṃ mahāsīsaṃ pajjalitanettaṃ
tika-vin01t2:352_2: bheravaṃ vā attabhāvaṃ nimminitvā dassenti, bheravaṃ vā saddaṃ sāventi, kathentasseva
tika-vin01t2:352_3: vā mukhena hatthaṃ pakkhipitvā hadayamaṃsaṃ maddanti, tena so satto ummattako hoti
tika-vin01t2:352_4: khittacitto. Tenevāha “bheravāni vā ārammaṇāni dassetvā”tiādi. Tattha bheravānīti
tika-vin01t2:352_5: dassanamatteneva sattānaṃ bhayaṃ chambhitattaṃ lomahaṃsaṃ uppādetuṃ samatthāni. Niccameva
tika-vin01t2:352_6: ummattako hotīti yassa pittakosato pittaṃ calitvā bahi nikkhantaṃ hoti, taṃ sandhāya
tika-vin01t2:352_7: vuttaṃ. Yassa pana pittaṃ calitvā pittakoseyeva ṭhitaṃ hoti bahi anikkhantaṃ, so
tika-vin01t2:352_8: antarantarā saññaṃ paṭilabhati, na niccameva ummattako hotīti veditabbaṃ. Ñatvāti
tika-vin01t2:356_0: Pakiṇṇakanti vomissakanayaṃ. Samuṭṭhānanti uppattikāraṇaṃ. Kiriyātiādi nidassanamattaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:356_1: akiriyādīnampi saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. Vedanāyāti sahayoge karaṇavacanaṃ, vedanāya saha
tika-vin01t2:356_2: kusalañcāti vuttaṃ hoti. Sabbasaṅgāhakavasenāti sabbesaṃ sikkhāpadānaṃ saṅgāhakavasena.
tika-vin01t2:356_3: Cha sikkhāpadasamuṭṭhānānīti kāyo vācā kāyavācā kāyacittaṃ vācācittaṃ kāyavācācittanti
tika-vin01t2:356_4: evaṃ vuttāni cha āpattisamuṭṭhānāni. Āpattiyeva hi sikkhāpadasīsena vuttā. Samuṭṭhānādayo
tika-vin01t2:356_5: hi āpattiyā honti, na sikkhāpadassa, imesu pana chasu samuṭṭhānesu purimāni tīṇi
tika-vin01t2:356_6: acittakāni, pacchimāni sacittakāni. Tesu ekena vā dvīhi vā tīhi vā catūhi vā chahi
tika-vin01t2:356_7: vā samuṭṭhānehi āpattiyo samuṭṭhahanti, pañcasamuṭṭhānā āpatti nāma natthi. Tattha
tika-vin01t2:356_8: ekasamuṭṭhānā catutthena ca pañcamena ca chaṭṭhena ca samuṭṭhānena samuṭṭhāti, na
tika-vin01t2:356_9: aññena. Dvisamuṭṭhānā paṭhamacatutthehi ca dutiyapañcamehi ca tatiyachaṭṭhehi ca
tika-vin01t2:356_10: catutthachaṭṭhehi ca pañcamachaṭṭhehi ca samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti, na aññehi. Tisamuṭṭhānā
tika-vin01t2:356_11: paṭhamehi ca tīhi, pacchimehi ca tīhi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti, na aññehi. Catusamuṭṭhānā
tika-vin01t2:356_12: paṭhamatatiyacatutthachaṭṭhehi ca dutiyatatiyapañcamachaṭṭhehi ca samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti,
tika-vin01t2:357_0: Sikkhāpadaṃ nāma atthi chasamuṭṭhānanti etthāpi sikkhāpadasīsena āpatti vuttāti veditabbā.
tika-vin01t2:357_1: Teneva vakkhati “sabbañcetaṃ āpattiyaṃ yujjati, sikkhāpadasīsena pana sabbaaṭṭhakathāsu
tika-vin01t2:357_2: desanā āruḷhā”ti. Kāyādīhi chahi samuṭṭhānaṃ uppatti, cha vā samuṭṭhānāni etassāti
tika-vin01t2:357_3: chasamuṭṭhānaṃ. Atthi catusamuṭṭhānanti kāyo kāyavācā kāyacittaṃ kāyavācācittanti
tika-vin01t2:357_4: imāni cattāri, vācā kāyavācā vācācittaṃ kāyavācācittanti imāni vā cattāri samuṭṭhānāni
tika-vin01t2:357_5: etassāti catusamuṭṭhānaṃ. Atthi tisamuṭṭhānanti kāyo vācā kāyavācāti imāni tīṇi,
tika-vin01t2:357_6: kāyacittaṃ vācācittaṃ kāyavācācittanti imāni vā tīṇi samuṭṭhānāni etassāti tisamuṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:357_8: Terasa hi samuṭṭhānasīsāni paṭhamapārājikasamuṭṭhānaṃ adinnādānasamuṭṭhānaṃ sañcarittasamuṭṭhānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:358_0: Tattha “atthi chasamuṭṭhāna”nti iminā sañcarittasamuṭṭhānaṃ vuttaṃ. “Atthi catusamuṭṭhāna”nti
tika-vin01t2:358_1: iminā pana addhānasamuṭṭhānaṃ ananuññātasamuṭṭhānañca saṅgahitaṃ. Yañhi paṭhamatatiyacatutthachaṭṭhehi
tika-vin01t2:358_2: samuṭṭhāti, idaṃ addhānasamuṭṭhānaṃ. Yaṃ pana dutiyatatiyapañcamachaṭṭhehi samuṭṭhāti,
tika-vin01t2:358_3: idaṃ ananuññātasamuṭṭhānaṃ. “Atthi tisamuṭṭhāna”nti iminā adinnādānasamuṭṭhānaṃ bhūtārocanasamuṭṭhānañca
tika-vin01t2:358_4: saṅgahitaṃ. Yañhi sacittakehi tīhi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti, idaṃ adinnādānasamuṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:358_5: Yaṃ pana acittakehi tīhi samuṭṭhāti, idaṃ bhūtārocanasamuṭṭhānaṃ. “Atthi kathinasamuṭṭhāna”ntiādinā
tika-vin01t2:358_6: pana avasesasamuṭṭhānasīsena dvisamuṭṭhānaṃ ekasamuṭṭhānañca saṅgaṇhāti. Tathā hi
tika-vin01t2:358_7: yaṃ tatiyachaṭṭhehi samuṭṭhāti, idaṃ kathinasamuṭṭhānanti vuccati. Yaṃ paṭhamacatutthehi
tika-vin01t2:358_8: samuṭṭhāti, idaṃ eḷakalomasamuṭṭhānaṃ. Yaṃ chaṭṭheneva samuṭṭhāti, idaṃ dhuranikkhepasamuṭṭhānaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:358_10: yaṃ kāyacittato samuṭṭhāti, idaṃ paṭhamapārājikasamuṭṭhānaṃ. Yaṃ dutiyapañcamehi
tika-vin01t2:358_11: samuṭṭhāti, idaṃ padasodhammasamuṭṭhānaṃ. Yaṃ catutthachaṭṭhehi samuṭṭhāti, idaṃ
tika-vin01t2:358_12: theyyasatthasamuṭṭhānaṃ. Yaṃ pañcameneva samuṭṭhāti, idaṃ dhammadesanāsamuṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:358_13: Yaṃ pañcamachaṭṭhehi samuṭṭhāti, idaṃ corivuṭṭhāpanasamuṭṭhānanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:359_0: Evaṃ samuṭṭhānasīsena sabbasikkhāpadāni terasadhā dassetvā idāni kiriyāvasena pañcadhā
tika-vin01t2:359_1: dassento “tatrāpi kiñci kiriyato samuṭṭhātī”tiādimāha. Tattha kiñcīti sikkhāpadasīsena
tika-vin01t2:359_2: āpattiṃ vadati. Tasmā yā kāyena vā vācāya vā pathavīkhaṇanādīsu viya vītikkamaṃ karontassa
tika-vin01t2:359_3: hoti, ayaṃ kiriyato samuṭṭhāti nāma. Yā kāyavācāya kattabbaṃ akarontassa hoti paṭhamakathināpatti
tika-vin01t2:359_4: viya, ayaṃ akiriyato samuṭṭhāti nāma. Yā karontassa ca akarontassa ca hoti aññātikāya
tika-vin01t2:359_5: bhikkhuniyā hatthato cīvarapaṭiggahaṇāpatti viya, ayaṃ kiriyākiriyato samuṭṭhāti
tika-vin01t2:359_6: nāma. Yā siyā karontassa ca siyā akarontassa ca hoti rūpiyapaṭiggahaṇāpatti viya,
tika-vin01t2:359_7: ayaṃ siyā kiriyato siyā akiriyato samuṭṭhāti nāma. Yā siyā karontassa ca siyā karontassa
tika-vin01t2:359_8: ca akarontassa ca hoti kuṭikārāpatti viya, ayaṃ siyā kiriyato siyā kiriyākiriyato samuṭṭhāti nāma.
tika-vin01t2:360_0: Idāni sabbasikkhāpadāni saññāvasena dvidhā katvā dassento “tatrāpi atthi saññāvimokkha”ntiādimāha.
tika-vin01t2:360_1: Saññāya abhāvena vimokkho assāti saññāvimokkhanti majjhepadalopasamāso daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin01t2:360_2: Yato hi vītikkamasaññāabhāvena muccati, idaṃ saññāvimokkhanti vuccati. Cittaṅgaṃ
tika-vin01t2:360_4: avadhāraṇena no na labhatīti dasseti. Tasmā yaṃ cittaṅgaṃ labhati, na labhati ca,
tika-vin01t2:361_0: Puna sabbasikkhāpadāni cittavasena dvidhā dassento “puna atthi sacittaka”ntiādimāha.
tika-vin01t2:361_1: Yaṃ saheva cittena āpajjatīti yaṃ sacittakeneva samuṭṭhānena āpajjati, no acittakena.
tika-vin01t2:361_2: Vināpīti api-saddena sahāpi cittena āpajjatīti dasseti. Yañhi kadāci acittakena,
tika-vin01t2:361_3: kadāci sacittakena samuṭṭhānena samuṭṭhāti, taṃ acittakanti vuccati. Ettha ca saññādukaṃ
tika-vin01t2:361_4: anāpattimukhena, sacittakadukaṃ āpattimukhena vuttanti idametesaṃ nānākaraṇanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:362_0: Lokavajjadukassa heṭṭhā vuttalakkhaṇattā taṃ avibhajitvā idāni sabbasikkhāpadāni
tika-vin01t2:362_1: kammavasena duvidhāni, kusalādivasena vedanāvasena ca tividhāni hontīti dassento
tika-vin01t2:362_2: “kammakusalavedanāvasenā”tiādimāha. Ettha pana kiñcāpi aṭṭhakathāsu āgatanayena kāyakammaṃ
tika-vin01t2:362_3: vacīkammanti kammavasena dukaṃ vuttaṃ, tikameva pana dassetuṃ vaṭṭati. Sabbameva
tika-vin01t2:362_4: hi sikkhāpadaṃ kāyadvāre āpajjitabbato vacīdvāre āpajjitabbato kāyavacīdvāre āpajjitabbato
tika-vin01t2:362_5: ca tividhaṃ hoti. Teneva mātikāṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ “sabbāva kāyakammavacīkammatadubhayavasena
tika-vin01t2:362_6: tividhā honti. Tattha kāyadvāre āpajjitabbā kāyakammanti vuccati, vacīdvāre āpajjitabbā
tika-vin01t2:362_7: vacīkammanti vuccati, ubhayattha āpajjitabbā kāyakammavacīkamma”nti. Tatoyeva ca
tika-vin01t2:363_0: Atthi pana sikkhāpadaṃ kusalantiādinā āpattiṃ āpajjanto kusalacittasamaṅgī vā āpajjati
tika-vin01t2:363_1: akusalacittasamaṅgī vā abyākatacittasamaṅgī vāti dasseti, na pana kusalāpi āpatti
tika-vin01t2:363_2: atthīti. Na hi kusalā āpatti nāma atthi “āpattādhikaraṇaṃ siyā akusalaṃ siyā abyākataṃ,
tika-vin01t2:363_3: natthi āpattādhikaraṇaṃ kusala”nti vacanato. Dasa kāmāvacarakiriyacittānīti hasituppādavoṭṭhabbanehi
tika-vin01t2:363_4: saddhiṃ aṭṭha mahākiriyacittāni. Dvinnaṃ abhiññācittānaṃ āpattisamuṭṭhāpakattaṃ paññattiṃ
tika-vin01t2:363_5: ajānantassa iddhivikubbanādīsu daṭṭhabbaṃ. Yaṃ kusalacittena āpajjatīti yaṃ sikkhāpadasīsena
tika-vin01t2:363_6: gahitaṃ āpattiṃ kusalacittasamaṅgī āpajjati. Iminā pana vacanena taṃ kusalanti āpattiyā
tika-vin01t2:363_7: vuccamāno kusalabhāvo pariyāyatova, na paramatthatoti dasseti. Kusalacittena hi āpattiṃ
tika-vin01t2:363_8: āpajjanto saviññattikaṃ aviññattikaṃ vā sikkhāpadavītikkamākārappavattaṃ rūpakkhandhasaṅkhātaṃ
tika-vin01t2:363_9: abyākatāpattiṃ āpajjati. Itarehi itaranti itarehi akusalābyākatacittehi yaṃ āpajjati,
tika-vin01t2:363_10: taṃ itaraṃ, akusalaṃ abyākatañcāti attho. Idañca āpattiṃ āpajjanto akusalacittasamaṅgī
tika-vin01t2:363_11: vā āpajjati kusalābyākatacittasamaṅgī vāti dassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Evaṃ santepi sabbasikkhāpadesu
tika-vin01t2:363_12: kiñci akusalacittameva kiñci kusalābyākatavasena dvicittaṃ, kiñci sabbesaṃ vasena
tika-vin01t2:363_13: ticittanti ayameva pabhedo labbhati, na aññoti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:364_0: Tivedanaṃ dvivedanaṃ ekavedananti idañca yathāvuttavedanāvaseneva labbhati, nāññathāti
tika-vin01t2:364_1: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Nipajjitvā nirodhaṃ samāpannassa sahaseyyavasena tadākārappavattarūpakkhandhasseva
tika-vin01t2:364_2: āpattibhāvato “atthi avedana”ntipi vattabbametaṃ, kadāci karahaci yadicchakaṃ sambhavatīti
tika-vin01t2:364_3: aggahetvā yebhuyyavasena labbhamānaṃyeva gahetvā vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:365_0: Idāni yathāvuttasamuṭṭhānādīni imasmiṃ saṃvaṇṇiyamānasikkhāpade vibhajitvā dassento
tika-vin01t2:365_1: “imaṃ pakiṇṇakaṃ viditvā”tiādimāha. Tattha viditvāti imassa “veditabba”nti iminā
tika-vin01t2:365_2: aparakālakiriyāvacanena sambandho veditabbo. Kiriyasamuṭṭhānanti idaṃ yebhuyyavasena
tika-vin01t2:365_3: vuttaṃ parūpakkame sati sādiyantassa akiriyasamuṭṭhānabhāvato. “Manodvāre āpatti
tika-vin01t2:365_4: nāma natthīti idampi bāhullavaseneva vutta”nti vadanti. Cittaṃ panettha aṅgamattaṃ
tika-vin01t2:365_5: hotīti paṭhamapārājikaṃ kāyacittato samuṭṭhātīti cittamettha āpattiyā aṅgameva hoti.
tika-vin01t2:365_6: Na tassa vasena kammabhāvo labbhatīti viññattijanakavasena kāyadvāre pavattattā tassa
tika-vin01t2:365_7: cittassa vasena imassa sikkhāpadassa manokammabhāvo na labbhatīti attho. Sikkhāpadassa
tika-vin01t2:365_8: heṭṭhā vuttanayena paññattibhāvato “sabbañcetaṃ āpattiyaṃ yujjatī”ti vuttaṃ. Na hi
tika-vin01t2:368_0: Idaṃ kinti kathetukamyatāya pucchati. Vinītāni vinicchitāni vatthūni vinītavatthūni.
tika-vin01t2:368_1: Tāni hi “āpattiṃ tvaṃ bhikkhu āpanno pārājikaṃ. Anāpatti bhikkhu pārājikassa, āpatti
tika-vin01t2:368_2: saṅghādisesassa. Anāpatti bhikkhu asādiyantassā”tiādinā bhagavatāyeva vinicchitāni.
tika-vin01t2:368_3: Tenāha “bhagavatā sayaṃ vinicchitāna”nti. Uddānagāthāti uddesagāthā, saṅgahagāthāti
tika-vin01t2:368_4: vuttaṃ hoti. Vatthugāthāti “tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhū”tiādikā nidānavatthudīpikā
tika-vin01t2:368_5: vinītavatthupāḷiyeva tesaṃ tesaṃ vatthūnaṃ ganthanato “vatthugāthā”ti vuttā, na chandovicitilakkhaṇena.
tika-vin01t2:368_6: Gāthānaṃ vatthu vatthugāthāti evaṃ vā ettha attho daṭṭhabbo. Etthāti vinītavatthūsu.
tika-vin01t2:368_7: Dutiyādīnanti dutiyapārājikādīnaṃ. Dutiyādīni vinicchinitabbānīti yojetabbaṃ. Sippikānanti
tika-vin01t2:368_8: cittakārādisippikānaṃ. Yaṃ passitvā passitvā cittakārādayo cittakammādīni uggaṇhantā
tika-vin01t2:369_0: 67. Purimāni dve vatthūnīti makkaṭivatthuṃ vajjiputtakavatthuñca. Tāni pana kiñcāpi
tika-vin01t2:369_1: anupaññattiyaṃ āgatāneva, tathāpi bhagavatā sayaṃ vinicchitavatthubhāvato adinnādānādīsu
tika-vin01t2:369_2: anupaññattiyaṃ āgatāni rajakādivatthūni viya puna vinītavatthūsu pakkhittāni. Yadi
tika-vin01t2:369_3: evaṃ “tassa kukkuccaṃ ahosī”ti idaṃ virujjheyya, anupaññattiyañhi aññe bhikkhū disvā
tika-vin01t2:369_4: taṃ bhikkhuṃ codesunti? Saccametaṃ, tehi pana bhikkhūhi anupaññattiyaṃ vuttanayena
tika-vin01t2:369_5: codetvā “nanu, āvuso, tatheva taṃ hotī”ti vutte tassa kukkuccaṃ ahosīti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:369_6: “Bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesī”ti idañca tehi bhikkhūhi anupaññattiyaṃ vuttanayena
tika-vin01t2:369_7: bhagavato ārocite “saccaṃ kira tvaṃ bhikkhu makkaṭiyā methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevī”ti
tika-vin01t2:369_8: bhagavatā puṭṭho samāno “saccaṃ bhagavā”ti bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesīti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:370_0: Vajjiputtakavatthumhi pana sikkhaṃ appaccakkhāya dubbalyaṃ anāvikatvā methunaṃ dhammaṃ
tika-vin01t2:370_1: paṭisevitvā vibbhamitvā ye ānandattheraṃ upasaṅkamitvā puna pabbajjaṃ upasampadañca
tika-vin01t2:370_2: yāciṃsu, te sandhāya “aṭṭhānametaṃ, ānanda, anavakāso, yaṃ tathāgato vajjīnaṃ vā
tika-vin01t2:370_3: vajjiputtakānaṃ vā kāraṇā sāvakānaṃ pārājikaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ samūhaneyyā”tiādi
tika-vin01t2:370_4: anupaññattiyaṃ vuttaṃ. Ye pana avibbhamitvā saliṅge ṭhitāyeva uppannakukkuccā bhagavato
tika-vin01t2:370_5: etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ, te sandhāya “āpattiṃ tumhe, bhikkhave, āpannā pārājika”nti idha
tika-vin01t2:370_6: vuttaṃ. Keci pana imaṃ adhippāyaṃ ajānantāva “aññameva makkaṭivatthu vajjiputtakavatthu
tika-vin01t2:371_0: Kuse ganthetvāti kusatiṇāni ganthetvā. Kesehīti manussakesehi. Taṃ rāganti kāyasaṃsaggarāgaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:371_1: Ñatvāti sayameva jānitvā. Yadi kāyasaṃsaggarāgena kataṃ, kāyasaṃsaggarāgasikkhāpadassa
tika-vin01t2:371_2: vinītavatthūsu avatvā idha kasmā vuttanti? Vuccate – kiñcāpi taṃ kāyasaṃsaggarāgena
tika-vin01t2:371_3: kataṃ, tassa pana bhikkhuno pārājikakkhette katupakkamattā “pārājikaṃ nu kho ahaṃ
tika-vin01t2:371_4: āpanno”ti pārājikavisayaṃ kukkuccaṃ ahosīti idha vuttaṃ. Tenevāha – “anāpatti bhikkhu
tika-vin01t2:372_0: 68. Atidassanīyāti divasampi passantānaṃ atittikaraṇato ativiya dassanayoggā. Vaṇṇapokkharatāyāti
tika-vin01t2:372_1: ettha pokkharatā vuccati sundarabhāvo, vaṇṇassa pokkharatā vaṇṇapokkharatā, tāya
tika-vin01t2:372_2: vaṇṇapokkharatāya, vaṇṇasampattiyāti attho. Porāṇā pana pokkharanti sarīraṃ vadanti,
tika-vin01t2:372_3: vaṇṇaṃ vaṇṇameva. Tesaṃ matena vaṇṇañca pokkharañca vaṇṇapokkharāni, tesaṃ bhāvo
tika-vin01t2:372_4: vaṇṇapokkharatā, tasmā vaṇṇapokkharatāyāti parisuddhena vaṇṇena ceva sarīrasaṇṭhānasampattiyā
tika-vin01t2:372_5: cāti attho. Atha vā vaṇṇasampannaṃ pokkharaṃ vaṇṇapokkharanti uttarapadalopo pubbapadassa
tika-vin01t2:372_6: daṭṭhabbo, tassa bhāvo vaṇṇapokkharatā, tāya vaṇṇapokkharatāya, vaṇṇasampannasarīratāyāti
tika-vin01t2:372_7: attho. Padhaṃsesīti abhibhavīti attho. Kathaṃ pana asādiyantī nisīdīti āha – “asaddhammādhippāyena…pe… khāṇukā viyā”ti.
tika-vin01t2:373_0: Na limpatīti na allīyati. Kāmesūti vatthukāmakilesakāmesu. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yathā
tika-vin01t2:373_1: paduminipaṇṇe udakabindu na saṇṭhāti, yathā ca sūcimukhe sāsapo na santiṭṭhati, evameva
tika-vin01t2:373_2: yo abbhantare duvidhenapi kāmena na limpati, tasmiṃ kāmo na saṇṭhāti, tamahaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ vadāmīti.
tika-vin01t2:374_0: 69. Purisasaṇṭhānaṃ antarahitaṃ, itthisaṇṭhānaṃ uppannanti phalassa vināsuppādadassanena
tika-vin01t2:374_1: kāraṇassapi vināsuppādā vuttāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Purisindriye hi naṭṭhe purisasaṇṭhānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:374_2: antaradhāyati, itthindriye samuppanne itthisaṇṭhānaṃ pātubhavati. Tathā hi “yassa
tika-vin01t2:374_3: itthindriyaṃ uppajjati, tassa purisindriyaṃ uppajjatīti? No. Yassa vā pana purisindriyaṃ
tika-vin01t2:374_4: uppajjati, tassa itthindriyaṃ uppajjatīti? No”ti yamakapakaraṇe vuttattā indriyadvayassa
tika-vin01t2:374_5: ekasmiṃ santāne sahapavattiyā asambhavato yasmiṃ khaṇe itthindriyaṃ pātubhavati,
tika-vin01t2:374_6: tato pubbe sattarasamacittato paṭṭhāya purisindriyaṃ nuppajjati. Tato pubbe uppannesu
tika-vin01t2:374_7: ca purisindriyesu sahajarūpehi saddhiṃ kamena niruddhesu tasmiṃ santāne itthindriyaṃ
tika-vin01t2:374_8: uppajjati. Tato purisasaṇṭhānākārena pavattesu kammajarūpesu sesarūpesu ca kañci
tika-vin01t2:374_9: kālaṃ pavattitvā niruddhesu itthisaṇṭhānākārena ca catujarūpasantatiyā pavattāya
tika-vin01t2:374_10: purisasaṇṭhānaṃ antarahitaṃ, itthisaṇṭhānaṃ pātubhūtanti vuccati. Itthiyā purisaliṅgapātubhāvepi
tika-vin01t2:375_0: Purisaliṅgaṃ uttamaṃ, itthiliṅgaṃ hīnanti iminā ca purisindriyassa uttamabhāvo, itthindriyassa
tika-vin01t2:375_1: ca hīnabhāvo vuttoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Na hi indriyassa hīnukkaṭṭhabhāvaṃ vinā tannissayassa
tika-vin01t2:375_2: liṅgassa hīnukkaṭṭhatā sambhavati. Purisaliṅgaṃ balavaakusalena antaradhāyatītiādināpi
tika-vin01t2:375_3: indriyasseva vināsuppādā vuttāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Indriye hi vinaṭṭhe uppanne ca tannissayassa
tika-vin01t2:375_4: liṅgassapi antaradhānaṃ patiṭṭhānañca sambhavati. Kathaṃ panettha purisaliṅgaṃ balavaakausalena
tika-vin01t2:375_5: antaradhāyati, itthiliṅgaṃ dubbalakusalena patiṭṭhātīti? Vuccate – paṭisandhiyaṃ
tika-vin01t2:375_6: tāva purisindriyuppādakaṃ anupahatasāmatthiyaṃ balavakusalakammaṃ yāvatāyukaṃ purisindriyameva
tika-vin01t2:375_7: uppādeti, antarā pana kenaci laddhapaccayena pāradārikattādinā balavaakusalakammena
tika-vin01t2:375_8: upahatasāmatthiyaṃ tadeva paṭisandhidāyakaṃ kusalakammaṃ dubbalībhūtaṃ purisindriyaṃ
tika-vin01t2:375_9: anuppādetvā attano sāmatthiyānurūpaṃ itthindriyaṃ pavatte uppādeti. Yadā pana paṭisandhidānakāleyeva
tika-vin01t2:375_11: upahataṃ hoti, tadā dubbalībhūtaṃ kusalakammaṃ purisindriyaṃ anuppādetvā paṭisandhiyaṃyeva
tika-vin01t2:375_12: itthindriyaṃ uppādeti. Tasmā “purisaliṅgaṃ balavaakusalena antaradhāyati, itthiliṅgaṃ
tika-vin01t2:376_1: dubbalabhāve sati antaradhāyantaṃ itthiliṅgaṃ dubbalaakusalena antaradhāyatīti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:376_2: Tathā hi pāradārikattādinā balavaakusalakammena bāhitattā purisindriyuppādane asamatthaṃ
tika-vin01t2:376_3: paṭisandhiyaṃ itthiyā itthindriyuppādakaṃ dubbalakusalakammaṃ yadā pavattiyaṃ brahmacariyavāsamicchācārapaṭivirativasena
tika-vin01t2:376_5: samatthaṃ itthindriyaṃ anuppādetvā attano sāmatthiyānurūpaṃ purisindriyaṃ uppādeti,
tika-vin01t2:376_6: tadā purisindriyuppādanavibandhakassa balavaakusalakammassa dubbalabhāve sati taṃ
tika-vin01t2:376_8: vuccati. Yathāvuttanayeneva balavatā kusalakammena purisindriyassa uppāditattā “purisaliṅgaṃ
tika-vin01t2:376_9: balavakusalena patiṭṭhātī”ti vuccati. Pubbe itthibhūtassa paṭisandhiyaṃ purisindriyuppādepi
tika-vin01t2:376_10: ayaṃ nayo veditabbo. Ubhayampi akusalena antaradhāyati, kusalena paṭilabbhatīti idaṃ
tika-vin01t2:376_11: sugatibhavaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, duggatiyaṃ pana ubhinnaṃ uppatti vināso ca akusalakammenevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:377_0: Ubhinnampi sahaseyyāpatti hotīti “yo pana bhikkhu mātugāmena sahaseyyaṃ kappeyya,
tika-vin01t2:377_1: pācittiyaṃ. Yā pana bhikkhunī purisena sahaseyyaṃ kappeyya, pācittiya”nti vuttattā
tika-vin01t2:377_2: ubhinnampi sahaseyyavasena pācittiyāpatti hoti. Dukkhīti cetodukkhasamaṅgitāya dukkhī.
tika-vin01t2:377_3: Dummanoti dosena duṭṭhamano, virūpamano vā domanassābhibhūtatāya. “Samassāsetabbo”ti
tika-vin01t2:377_4: vatvā samassāsetabbavidhiṃ dassento “hotu mā cintayitthā”tiādimāha. Anāvaṭoti avārito.
tika-vin01t2:377_5: Dhammoti pariyattipaṭipattipaṭivedhasaṅkhāto tividhopi saddhammo. Saggo ca maggo
tika-vin01t2:377_6: ca saggamaggo, saggassa vā maggo saggamaggo, saggūpapattisādhikā paṭipatti. Bhikkhuniyā
tika-vin01t2:377_7: saddhiṃ saṃvidhāya addhānagamane āpatti pariharitabbāti dassento “saṃvidahanaṃ parimocetvā”ti
tika-vin01t2:377_8: āha. “Mayaṃ asukaṃ nāma ṭhānaṃ gacchāmā”ti vatvā “ehi saddhiṃ gamissāmā”tiādinā asaṃvidahitattā anāpatti.
tika-vin01t2:378_1: anāpattīti “dutiyikā bhikkhunī pakkantā vā hotī”tiādinā vuttaanāpattilakkhaṇehi saṃsandanato
tika-vin01t2:378_2: vuttaṃ. Ārādhikāti cittārādhane samatthā. Tā kopetvāti tā pariccajitvā. Lajjiniyo…pe…
tika-vin01t2:378_3: labbhatīti “saṅgahe asati ukkaṇṭhitvā vibbhameyyāpī”ti saṅgahavaseneva vuttaṃ. Alajjiniyo…pe…
tika-vin01t2:378_4: labbhatīti alajjibhāvato asantapakkhaṃ bhajantīti vuttaṃ. Aññātikā…pe… vaṭṭatīti
tika-vin01t2:378_5: idaṃ pana imissā āveṇikaṃ katvā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ anuññātanti vadanti. Bhikkhubhāvepīti
tika-vin01t2:378_6: bhikkhukālepi. Parisāvacaroti upajjhāyo ca ācariyo ca hutvā parisupaṭṭhāko. Aññassa
tika-vin01t2:378_7: santike nissayo gahetabboti tassa santike upasampannehi saddhivihārikehi aññassa
tika-vin01t2:378_8: ācariyassa santike nissayo gahetabbo. Taṃ nissāya vasantehipīti antevāsike sandhāya
tika-vin01t2:378_9: vadati. Upajjhā gahetabbāti upasampadatthaṃ upajjhā gahetabbā, aññassa santike upasampajjitabbanti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin01t2:379_0: Vinayakammanti vikappanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Puna kātabbanti puna vikappetabbaṃ. Puna
tika-vin01t2:379_1: paṭiggahetvā sattāhaṃ vaṭṭatīti “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, bhikkhunīnaṃ sannidhi bhikkhūhi,
tika-vin01t2:379_2: bhikkhūnaṃ sannidhi bhikkhunīhi paṭiggāhāpetvā paribhuñjitu”nti vacanato puna paṭiggahitaṃ
tika-vin01t2:379_3: tadahu sāmisampi vaṭṭatīti dassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Sattame divaseti idaṃ tañca nissaggiyaṃ
tika-vin01t2:379_4: anāpajjitvāva punapi sattāhaṃ paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭatīti dassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Yasmā
tika-vin01t2:379_5: pana bhikkhuniyā nissaggiyaṃ bhikkhussa vaṭṭati, bhikkhussa nissaggiyaṃ bhikkhuniyā
tika-vin01t2:379_6: vaṭṭati, tasmā aṭṭhamepi divase liṅgaparivatte sati anissajjitvāva antosattāhe paribhuñjituṃ
tika-vin01t2:379_7: vaṭṭatīti vadanti. Taṃ pakatatto rakkhatīti aparivattaliṅgo taṃ paṭiggahaṇavijahanato
tika-vin01t2:379_8: rakkhati, avibhattatāya paṭiggahaṇaṃ na vijahatīti adhippāyo. Sāmaṃ gahetvāna nikkhipeyyāti
tika-vin01t2:379_9: paṭiggahetvā sayaṃ nikkhipeyya. Paribhuñjantassa āpattīti liṅgaparivatte sati paṭiggahaṇavijahanato
tika-vin01t2:380_1: vuttaṃ, taṃ suvuttaṃ. Na hi pārājikaṃ anāpannassa sikkhaṃ appaccakkhāya “vibbhamissāmī”ti
tika-vin01t2:380_2: gihiliṅgaggahaṇamattena bhikkhubhāvo vinassati. Pārājikaṃ āpanno ca bhikkhuliṅge
tika-vin01t2:380_3: ṭhito yāva na paṭijānāti, tāva attheva tassa bhikkhubhāvo, na so anupasampannasaṅkhyaṃ
tika-vin01t2:380_4: gacchati. Tathā hi so saṃvāsaṃ sādiyantopi theyyasaṃvāsako na hoti, sahaseyyādiāpattiṃ
tika-vin01t2:380_5: na janeti, omasavāde pācittiyañca janeti. Teneva “asuddho hoti puggalo aññataraṃ
tika-vin01t2:380_6: pārājikaṃ dhammaṃ ajjhāpanno, tañce suddhadiṭṭhi samāno okāsaṃ kārāpetvā akkosādhippāyo
tika-vin01t2:380_7: vadeti, āpatti omasavādassā”ti omasavāde pācittiyaṃ vuttaṃ. Asati hi bhikkhubhāve
tika-vin01t2:380_8: dukkaṭaṃ bhaveyya, sati ca bhikkhubhāve paṭiggahitassa paṭiggahaṇavijahanaṃ nāma
tika-vin01t2:380_9: ayuttaṃ, tasmā sabbaso bhikkhubhāvassa abhāvato pārājikaṃ āpajjitvā gihiliṅgaggahaṇena
tika-vin01t2:380_10: gihibhāvūpagamanaṃ idha “hīnāyāvattana”nti adhippetaṃ, na pana pakatattassa gihiliṅgaggahaṇamattaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:380_11: Teneva katthaci sikkhāpaccakkhānena samānagatikattā hīnāyāvattanaṃ visuṃ na gaṇhanti.
tika-vin01t2:380_12: Sikkhāpaccakkhānena paṭiggahaṇavijahane vutte pārājikaṃ āpannassa gihibhāvūpagamanena
tika-vin01t2:380_13: sabbaso bhikkhubhāvassa abhāvato vattabbameva natthīti. Tathā hi buddhadattācariyena
tika-vin01t2:388_0: Vuttaṃ. Yadi ca pakatattassa gihiliṅgaggahaṇamattenapi paṭiggahaṇaṃ vijaheyya, tepi
tika-vin01t2:388_1: ācariyā visuṃ tampi vadeyyuṃ, na vuttañca, tato viññāyati “pakatattassa gihiliṅgaggahaṇamattaṃ
tika-vin01t2:388_2: idha hīnāyāvattananti nādhippeta”nti. Bhikkhuniyā pana sikkhāpaccakkhānassa abhāvato
tika-vin01t2:389_0: Anapekkhavissajjanenāti aññassa adatvāva anatthikatāya “natthi iminā kammaṃ, na idāni
tika-vin01t2:389_1: naṃ paribhuñjissāmī”ti vatthūsu vā “puna paṭiggahetvā paribhuñjissāmī”ti paṭiggahaṇe
tika-vin01t2:389_2: vā anapekkhavissajjanena. Acchinditvā gāhenāti corādīhi acchinditvā gahaṇena.
tika-vin01t2:390_0: Etthāti bhikkhuvihāre. Uparopakāti tena ropitā rukkhagacchā. Terasasu sammutīsūti
tika-vin01t2:390_2: terasasu sammutīsu. Kāmaṃ purimikāya pacchimikāya ca senāsanaggāho paṭippassambhatiyeva,
tika-vin01t2:390_3: purimikāya pana senāsanaggāhe paṭippassaddhe pacchimikāya aññattha upagantuṃ sakkāti
tika-vin01t2:390_4: purimikāya senāsanaggāhapaṭippassaddhiṃ visuṃ dassetvā pacchimikāya senāsanaggāhe
tika-vin01t2:390_5: paṭippassaddhe na sakkā aññattha upagantunti tattha bhikkhūhi kattabbasaṅgahaṃ dassento
tika-vin01t2:391_0: Pakkhamānattameva dātabbanti bhikkhunīnaṃ paṭicchannāyapi āpattiyā mānattacārasseva
tika-vin01t2:391_1: anuññātattā. Puna pakkhamānattameva dātabbanti bhikkhukāle ciṇṇamānattābhāvato. Bhikkhunīhi
tika-vin01t2:391_2: abbhānakammaṃ kātabbanti bhikkhukāle ciṇṇamānattatāya bhikkhunīkālepi ciṇṇamānattā
tika-vin01t2:391_3: icceva saṅkhyaṃ gacchatīti katvā vuttaṃ. Sace akusalavipāke…pe… chārattaṃ mānattameva
tika-vin01t2:391_4: dātabbanti mānattaṃ carantassa liṅgaparivattādhikārattā vuttaṃ. Sace pana bhikkhukāle
tika-vin01t2:391_5: paṭicchannāya sādhāraṇāpattiyā parivasantassa asamādiṇṇaparivāsassa vā liṅgaṃ parivattati,
tika-vin01t2:391_6: tassa bhikkhunīkāle pakkhamānattaṃ carantassa akusalavipāke parikkhīṇe puna liṅge
tika-vin01t2:391_7: parivattite parivāsaṃ datvā parivutthaparivāsassa chārattaṃ mānattaṃ dātabbanti vadanti.
tika-vin01t2:392_0: Sañcarittāpattīti sādhāraṇāpattidassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Parivāsadānaṃ natthīti bhikkhukāle
tika-vin01t2:392_1: appaṭicchannabhāvato. Bhikkhunīkāle pana ārocitāpi sādhāraṇāpatti sace bhikkhukāle
tika-vin01t2:392_2: anārocitā, paṭicchannāva hotīti vadanti. Bhikkhūhi mānatte adinneti aciṇṇamānattāya
tika-vin01t2:392_3: liṅgaparivatte sati. Bhikkhunībhāve ṭhitāyapi tā suppaṭippassaddhā evāti sambandho.
tika-vin01t2:392_4: Yā āpattiyo pubbe paṭippassaddhāti yā asādhāraṇāpattiyo pubbe bhikkhubhāve paṭippassaddhā.
tika-vin01t2:392_5: “Pārājikaṃ āpannassa liṅgaparivatte sati santānassa ekattā na puna so upasampadaṃ
tika-vin01t2:392_6: labhati, tathā vibbhantāpi bhikkhunī liṅgaparivatte sati puna upasampadaṃ na labhatī”ti vadanti.
tika-vin01t2:393_0: 71. “Anupādinnakesūti adhikārattā upādinnakepi eseva nayoti vutta”nti cūḷagaṇṭhipade
tika-vin01t2:393_1: majjhimagaṇṭhipade ca vuttaṃ, taṃ duvuttaṃ. Na hi upādinnakesu nimitte upakkamantassa
tika-vin01t2:393_2: dukkaṭaṃ dissati. Tathā hi upādinnakesu nimitte appavesetvā bahi upakkamantassa thullaccayaṃ
tika-vin01t2:393_3: vuttaṃ “na ca, bhikkhave, rattacittena aṅgajātaṃ chupitabbaṃ, yo chupeyya, āpatti
tika-vin01t2:393_4: thullaccayassā”ti vuttattā. Ettha ca yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ sabbaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pubbe
tika-vin01t2:393_5: vicāritameva. Dukkaṭamevāti mocanarāgassa abhāvato. Tathevāti muccatu vā mā vāti
tika-vin01t2:394_0: Avisayoti asādiyanaṃ nāma evarūpe ṭhāne dukkaranti katvā vuttaṃ. Mātugāmassa vacanaṃ
tika-vin01t2:394_1: gahetvāti “ahaṃ vāyamissāmi, tvaṃ mā vāyamī”tiādinā vuttavacanaṃ gahetvā. Ubhayavāyāmeneva
tika-vin01t2:395_0: 73. Vaṭṭakateti imassa atthaṃ dassento “vivaṭe”ti āha. “Pārājikabhayena ākāsagatameva
tika-vin01t2:395_1: katvā pavesanādīni karontassa sahasā tālukaṃ vā passaṃ vā aṅgajātaṃ phusati ce, dukkaṭameva
tika-vin01t2:395_2: methunarāgassa abhāvato”ti vadanti, upaparikkhitvā gahetabbo. Suphusitāti suṭṭhu
tika-vin01t2:395_3: pihitā. Antomukhe okāso natthīti dantānaṃ supihitabhāvato antomukhe pavesetuṃ okāso
tika-vin01t2:395_4: natthi. Uppāṭite pana oṭṭhamaṃse dantesuyeva upakkamantassa thullaccayanti pataṅgamukhamaṇḍūkassa
tika-vin01t2:395_5: mukhasaṇṭhāne viya vaṇasaṅkhepavasena thullaccayaṃ. “Methunarāgena itthiyā appavesento
tika-vin01t2:395_6: nimittena nimittaṃ chupati, thullaccaya”nti iminā vā lakkhaṇena samānattā idha thullaccayaṃ
tika-vin01t2:396_0: Amuccante thullaccayanti “ceteti upakkamati na muccati, āpatti thullaccayassā”ti
tika-vin01t2:396_1: vacanato. Nijjhāmataṇhikādīti ādi-saddena khuppipāsikādipetīnaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin01t2:396_2: Allīyitumpi na sakkāti nijjhāmataṇhikānaṃ lomakūpehi samuṭṭhitaaggijālāhi niccaṃ
tika-vin01t2:396_4: āmasitumpi na sakkā. Devatā viya sampattiṃ anubhontīti ettha yāsanti sāmivacanaṃ
tika-vin01t2:396_5: yāti paccattavacanena vipariṇāmetvā yojetabbaṃ “yā devatā viya sampattiṃ anubhontī”ti.
tika-vin01t2:396_6: Dassanādīsu dassanaṃ nāma bhikkhunā tāsaṃ dassanaṃ, gahaṇampi bhikkhunāva tāsaṃ aṅgapaccaṅgagahaṇaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:396_7: Āmasanādīni pana tāsaṃ kiccāni. Tattha āmasanaṃ nāma attano sarīrena bhikkhuno sarīrassa
tika-vin01t2:396_8: upari āmasanamattaṃ, phusanaṃ tato daḷhataraṃ katvā samphusanaṃ, ghaṭṭanaṃ tatopi
tika-vin01t2:396_9: daḷhataraṃ katvā sarīrena sarīrassa ghaṭṭanaṃ. Visaññaṃ katvāti yathā so katampi
tika-vin01t2:396_10: upakkamanaṃ na jānāti, evaṃ katvā. Yadipi āmasanādi tassā kiccaṃ, tathāpi teneva
tika-vin01t2:396_11: anāpattiṃ avatvā “taṃ puggalaṃ visaññaṃ katvā”ti vacanato akatavisañño jānitvā sādiyati
tika-vin01t2:396_12: ce, pārājikameva. Bhikkhuno pana dassanagahaṇesu sati asādiyanaṃ nāma na hotīti dassanagahaṇesu
tika-vin01t2:396_13: paññāyamānesu anāpatti na vuttā. Yadi pana paṭhamaṃ dassanagahaṇesu sati pacchā taṃ
tika-vin01t2:396_14: puggalaṃ visaññaṃ katvā āmasanādīni karontī attano manorathaṃ pūretvā gacchati, natthi pārājikaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:397_1: vātapittādīhi upahatakāyappasādo. Sevanacittavasena āpattīti yathā santhatanimittavasena
tika-vin01t2:397_2: upādinnaphassaṃ avindantassapi sevanacittavasena āpatti, evamidhāpi pittavātādinā
tika-vin01t2:398_0: Nanu ca chupitamattavatthusmiṃ “methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevissāmīti chupitamatte vippaṭisārī
tika-vin01t2:398_1: ahosī”ti vuttattā methunassa pubbapayoge dukkaṭena bhavitabbaṃ, atha kasmā “āpatti
tika-vin01t2:398_2: saṅghādisesassā”ti vuttanti imaṃ antolīnacodanaṃ manasikatvā taṃ pariharituṃ “yo
tika-vin01t2:398_3: methuna”ntiādi āraddhaṃ. Tattha sīsanti maggena maggapaṭipādanaṃ. Tañhi payogānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:398_4: matthakasadisattā “sīsa”nti vuttaṃ tato paraṃ payogābhāvato. Dukkaṭe tiṭṭhantīti
tika-vin01t2:398_5: dukkaṭaṃ janenti. Dukkaṭañhi janentā hatthaggāhādayo payogā “dukkaṭe tiṭṭhantī”ti
tika-vin01t2:399_1: āsannappadese. Tena vātupatthambhenāti “aṅgamaṅgāni vātupatthaddhāni hontī”ti evaṃ
tika-vin01t2:399_2: vuttavātupatthambhena. Iminā niddokkamanassa kāraṇaṃ vuttaṃ. Ekarasanti āvajjanādivīthicittehi abbokiṇṇaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:400: 76. Saṅgāmasīsayodho bhikkhūti yasmā kilesārīhi anabhibhūto hutvā te parājesi, tasmā saṅgāmamukhe yodhasadiso bhikkhu.
tika-vin01t2:401_0: 77. Uppanne vatthusminti methunavatthusmiṃ uppanne. Parivattakadvāramevāti saṃvaraṇavivaraṇavasena
tika-vin01t2:401_1: ito cito ca parivattanayoggadvārameva. Rukkhasūcikaṇṭakadvāranti rukkhasūcidvāraṃ
tika-vin01t2:401_2: kaṇṭakadvārañca. “Rukkhasūcidvāraṃ kaṇṭakadvāra”micceva vā pāṭho. Yaṃ ubhosu passesu
tika-vin01t2:401_3: rukkhathambhe nikhaṇitvā tattha vijjhitvā majjhe dve tisso rukkhasūciyo pavesetvā
tika-vin01t2:401_4: karonti, taṃ rukkhasūcidvāraṃ. Yaṃ pavesananikkhamanakāle apanetvā thakanayoggaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:401_5: ekāya bahūhi vā kaṇṭakasākhāhi kataṃ, taṃ kaṇṭakadvāraṃ. Cakkalakayuttadvāranti heṭṭhā
tika-vin01t2:401_6: etaṃ cakkaṃ yojetvā kataṃ mahādvāraṃ, yaṃ na sakkā ekena saṃvarituṃ vivarituñca.
tika-vin01t2:401_7: Gopphetvāti rajjūhi ganthetvā. Ekaṃ dussasāṇidvāramevāti ettha kilañjasāṇidvārampi saṅgahaṃ gacchati.
tika-vin01t2:402_0: Yattha dvāraṃ saṃvaritvā nipajjituṃ na sakkā hoti, tattha kattabbavidhiṃ dassetuṃ
tika-vin01t2:402_1: “sace bahūnaṃ vaḷañjanaṭṭhānaṃ hotī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Bahūnaṃ avaḷañjanaṭṭhānepi ekaṃ
tika-vin01t2:402_2: āpucchitvā nipajjituṃ vaṭṭatiyeva. Atha bhikkhū…pe… nisinnā hontīti idaṃ tattha bhikkhūnaṃ
tika-vin01t2:402_3: sannihitabhāvasandassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. “Nisinno vā pana hotu nipanno vā, yena kenaci
tika-vin01t2:402_4: iriyāpathena samannāgato sace tattha sannihito hoti, ābhogaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti tīsupi
tika-vin01t2:402_5: gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ. Keci pana “nisinnā hontīti vacanato sace nipannā honti, ābhogaṃ
tika-vin01t2:402_6: kātuṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti vadanti, taṃ na sundaraṃ. Yadi hi “nisinnā hontī”ti vacanato
tika-vin01t2:402_7: nipanne ābhogaṃ kātuṃ na vaṭṭati, ṭhitepi caṅkamantepi ābhogaṃ kātuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin01t2:402_8: Na hi nisinnavacanaṃ nipannaṃyeva nivatteti, tasmā “nisinnā hontī”ti idaṃ tattha
tika-vin01t2:402_10: santepi nipajjitvā niddāyanto asantapakkhe ṭhitattā ābhogāraho na hotīti amhākaṃ
tika-vin01t2:402_11: khanti. Asantapakkhe ṭhitattāyeva hi raho nisajjāya nipajjitvā niddāyanto anāpattiṃ
tika-vin01t2:402_12: na karotīti vuttaṃ. Dvārasaṃvaraṇaṃ nāma bhikkhunīādīnaṃ pavesananivāraṇatthanti
tika-vin01t2:402_13: āha – “bhikkhuniṃ vā mātugāmaṃ vā āpucchituṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti. “Itthiubhatobyañjanakaṃ
tika-vin01t2:402_14: itthipaṇḍakañca āpucchituṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti vadanti. Mātugāmassa antogabbhe ṭhitabhāvaṃ
tika-vin01t2:402_15: jānitvāpi dvāre yathāvuttavidhiṃ katvā nipajjantassa anāpatti. Nisseṇiṃ āropetvāti
tika-vin01t2:402_16: uparitalaṃ āropetvā visaṅkharitvā bhūmiyaṃ pātetvā chinditvā vā nipajjitumpi vaṭṭati.
tika-vin01t2:402_17: Dvepi dvārāni jaggitabbānīti ettha sace ekasmiṃ dvāre kavāṭaṃ vā natthi, heṭṭhā vuttanayena
tika-vin01t2:402_18: saṃvarituṃ vā na sakkā, itaraṃ dvāraṃ asaṃvaritvāpi nipajjituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin01t2:403_0: Bhikkhācārā paṭikkammāti bhikkhācārato nivattitvā. Dvārapālassāti dvārakoṭṭhake mahādvāre
tika-vin01t2:403_1: nisseṇimūle vā ṭhatvā dvārarakkhaṇakassa. Pacchimānaṃ bhāroti ekānubandhavasena āgacchante
tika-vin01t2:403_2: sandhāya vuttaṃ. Asaṃvutadvāre antogabbhe vāti yojetabbaṃ. Bahi vāti gabbhato bahi.
tika-vin01t2:403_3: Nipajjanakālepi…pe… vaṭṭatiyevāti ettha “dvārajagganakassa tadadhīnattā tadā tassa
tika-vin01t2:403_4: tattha sannihitāsannihitabhāvaṃ anupadhāretvāpi ābhogaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatiyevā”ti vadanti.
tika-vin01t2:404_0: Yena kenaci parikkhitteti pākārena vā vatiyā vā yena kenaci parikkhitte. “Parikkhepassa
tika-vin01t2:404_1: uccato pamāṇaṃ sahaseyyappahonake vuttanayena veditabba”nti vadanti. Yadi pana ekasmiṃ
tika-vin01t2:404_2: padese parikkhepo vuttappamāṇato nīcataro hoti, vaṭṭati. Mahāpariveṇaṃ hotīti mahantaṃ
tika-vin01t2:404_4: vuttaṃ, na mahāparicchedadassanatthaṃ. Aruṇe uggate uṭṭhahati, anāpattīti suddhacittena
tika-vin01t2:404_5: nipannassa niddāyantasseva aruṇe uggateyeva niddāvaseneva anāpatti. Pabujjhitvā puna
tika-vin01t2:404_6: supati, āpattīti aruṇe uggate pabujjhitvā aruṇuggamanaṃ ajānitvāpi anuṭṭhahitvāva
tika-vin01t2:404_7: sayitasantānena sayantassa āpatti, purāruṇe pabujjhitvāpi ajānitvā sayitasantānena
tika-vin01t2:404_8: sayantassapi aruṇe uggate āpattiyeva. Yathāparicchedameva vuṭṭhātīti aruṇe uggateyeva
tika-vin01t2:404_9: uṭṭhahati. Tassa āpattīti asuddhacitteneva nipannattā niddāyantassapi aruṇe uggate
tika-vin01t2:404_10: divāpaṭisallānamūlikā āpatti. “Evaṃ nipajjanto anādariyadukkaṭāpi na muccatī”ti vuttattā
tika-vin01t2:404_11: asuddhacittena nipajjanto aruṇuggamanato puretaraṃ uṭṭhahantopi anuṭṭhahantopi nipajjanakāleyeva
tika-vin01t2:404_12: anādariyadukkaṭaṃ āpajjati, divāpaṭisallānamūlikaṃ pana dukkaṭaṃ aruṇe uggateyeva āpajjati.
tika-vin01t2:405_0: Yaṃ panettha tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ “rattiṃ dvāraṃ saṃvaritvā nipanno sace aruṇuggamanavelāyaṃ
tika-vin01t2:405_1: dvāre vivaṭepi nipajjati, tassa āpatti akhette saṃvaritvā nipannattā. Aruṇuggamanavelāyaṃ
tika-vin01t2:405_2: vivaṭepi dvāre “nipajjissāmī”ti rattiṃ dvāraṃ saṃvaritvāpi nipannassa akhette pihitattā
tika-vin01t2:405_3: nipajjanakāle anādariyadukkaṭaṃ, aruṇe uggate nipajjanamūladukkaṭañca hoti. Rattiṃ
tika-vin01t2:405_4: pihitepi apihitepi dvāre nipannassa aruṇuggamanakkhaṇeyeva apihitadvāre pihite pihitadvāre
tika-vin01t2:405_5: ca puna vivaritvā pihite khette pihitattā anāpattī”ti, taṃ aṭṭhakathāya na sameti.
tika-vin01t2:405_6: Rattiṃ dvāraṃ asaṃvaritvā nipannasseva hi aruṇuggamane āpatti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ dassitā,
tika-vin01t2:405_7: tasmā khette vā pihitaṃ hotu akhette vā, saṃvaraṇamevettha pamāṇanti amhākaṃ khanti.
tika-vin01t2:406_0: Niddāvasena nipajjatīti niddābhibhūtatāya ekapassena nipajjati, evaṃ pana nipanno
tika-vin01t2:406_1: nipanno nāma na hotīti anāpatti vuttā. Apassāya supantassāti kaṭiyā piṭṭhivemajjhassa
tika-vin01t2:406_2: ca antare appamattakampi padesaṃ bhūmiṃ aphusāpetvā thambhādiṃ apassāya supantassa.
tika-vin01t2:406_3: Sahasāva vuṭṭhātīti pakkhalitvā patito viya sahasā vuṭṭhāti. Tattheva sayati na vuṭṭhātīti
tika-vin01t2:406_4: niddābhibhūtatāya supanto na vuṭṭhāti, na mucchāpareto. Teneva “avisayattā āpatti
tika-vin01t2:407_0: Ekabhaṅgenāti ekassa passassa bhañjanena, heṭṭhā vuttanayena pāde bhūmito amocetvāva
tika-vin01t2:407_1: ekaṃ passaṃ bhañjitvā nāmetvā nipannoti vuttaṃ hoti. Mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana mahāpadumattherena
tika-vin01t2:407_2: vuttanti sambandho. Mucchitvā patitattā therena “avisayattā āpatti na dissatī”ti
tika-vin01t2:407_3: vuttaṃ. Ācariyā pana yathā yakkhagahitako bandhitvā nipajjāpito ca paravaso hoti,
tika-vin01t2:407_4: evaṃ aparavasattā mucchitvā patito kañci kālaṃ jānitvāpi nipajjatīti anāpattiṃ na
tika-vin01t2:407_5: vadanti. Yo ca yakkhagahitako, yo ca bandhitvā nipajjāpitoti imassa mahāaṭṭhakathāvādassa
tika-vin01t2:407_6: pacchimattā soyeva pamāṇato gahetabbo. Tathā ca vakkhati “sabbattha yo yo aṭṭhakathāvādo
tika-vin01t2:407_7: vā theravādo vā pacchā vuccati, sova pamāṇato daṭṭhabbo”ti. Yakkhagahitaggahaṇeneva
tika-vin01t2:407_8: cettha visaññībhūtopi saṅgahitoti veditabbaṃ. Ekabhaṅgena nipanno pana atthato anipannattā
tika-vin01t2:407_9: muccatiyevāti mahāaṭṭhakathāvādena so appaṭikkhittova hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Divā saṃvaritvā
tika-vin01t2:407_10: nipannassa kenaci vivaṭepi dvāre anāpatti nipajjanakāle saṃvaritvā nipannattā. Sace
tika-vin01t2:407_11: divā saṃvaritvā dvārasamīpe nipanno pacchā sayameva dvāraṃ vivarati, evampi vaṭṭati.
tika-vin01t2:407_12: Acittakā cāyaṃ āpatti kiriyā ca akiriyā ca.
tika-vin01t2:408: 78. “Apade padaṃ karonto viyā”ti vatvā puna tamevatthaṃ āvikaronto “ākāse padaṃ dassento viyā”ti āha. Etadagganti eso aggo. Yadidanti yo ayaṃ. Sesamettha uttānatthameva.
tika-vin01t2:414_0: Adutiyena jinena yaṃ dutiyaṃ pārājikaṃ pakāsitaṃ, tassa idāni yasmā saṃvaṇṇanākkamo
tika-vin01t2:414_1: patto, tasmā yaṃ suviññeyyaṃ, yañca pubbe pakāsitaṃ, taṃ sabbaṃ vajjayitvā assa dutiyassa
tika-vin01t2:416_1: gahitaṃ pariggahitanti rājagahanti āha “mandhātu…pe… vuccatī”ti. Tattha mahāgovindena
tika-vin01t2:416_2: mahāsattena pariggahitaṃ reṇunā pariggahitameva hotīti mahāgovindaggahaṇaṃ. Mahāgovindapaaggahitatākittanañhi
tika-vin01t2:416_3: tadā reṇunā magadharājena pariggahitabhāvūpalakkhaṇaṃ. Tassa hi so purohito. “Mahāgovindoti
tika-vin01t2:416_4: mahānubhāvo purātano eko magadharājā”ti keci. Pariggahitattāti rājadhānībhāvena pariggahitattā.
tika-vin01t2:416_5: Gayhatīti gaho, rājūnaṃ gahoti rājagahaṃ, nagarasaddāpekkhāya napuṃsakaniddeso. Aññepettha
tika-vin01t2:416_6: pakāreti “nagaramāpanena raññā kāritasabbagahattā rājagahaṃ, gijjhakūṭādīhi parikkhittattā
tika-vin01t2:416_8: gehantipi rājagahaṃ, suvihitārakkhatāya anatthāvahabhāvena upagatānaṃ paṭirājūnaṃ
tika-vin01t2:416_9: gahaṃ gehabhūtantipi rājagahaṃ, rājūhi disvā sammā patiṭṭhāpitattā tesaṃ gahaṃ gehabhūtantipi
tika-vin01t2:416_10: rājagahaṃ. Ārāmarāmaṇeyyakādīhi rājate, nivāsasukhatādinā sattehi mamattavasena gayhati
tika-vin01t2:416_11: pariggayhatīti vā rājagaha”nti edise pakāre. So padeso ṭhānavisesabhāvena uḷārasattaparibhogoti
tika-vin01t2:416_12: āha “taṃ paneta”ntiādi. Tattha buddhakāle cakkavattikāle cāti idaṃ yebhuyyavasena
tika-vin01t2:416_13: vuttaṃ. Tesanti yakkhānaṃ. Vasanavananti āpānabhūmibhūtaṃ upavanaṃ. Gijjhā ettha
tika-vin01t2:416_14: santīti gijjhaṃ, kūṭaṃ. Taṃ etassāti gijjhakūṭo. Gijjho viyāti vā gijjhaṃ, kūṭaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:416_15: Taṃ etassāti gijjhakūṭo, pabbato. Gijjhasadisakūṭoti gijjhakūṭoti vā majjhepadalopīsamāso
tika-vin01t2:417_0: Tato paraṃ saṅghoti tiṇṇaṃ janānaṃ upari saṅgho catuvaggakaraṇīyādikammappattattā.
tika-vin01t2:417_1: Tasmiṃ pabbate sannipatitvā samāpattiyā vītināmentīti yathāphāsukaṭṭhāne piṇḍāya
tika-vin01t2:417_2: caritvā katabhattakiccā āgantvā cetiyagabbhe yamakamahādvāraṃ vivarantā viya taṃ
tika-vin01t2:417_3: pabbataṃ dvidhā katvā anto pavisitvā rattiṭṭhānadivāṭṭhānāni māpetvā tattha samāpattiyā vītināmenti.
tika-vin01t2:418_0: Kadā panete tattha vasiṃsu? Atīte kira anuppanne tathāgate bārāṇasiṃ upanissāya ekasmiṃ
tika-vin01t2:418_1: gāmake ekā kuladhītā khettaṃ rakkhati, tassā khettakuṭiyā vīhayo bhajjantiyā tattha
tika-vin01t2:418_2: mahākarañjapupphappamāṇā mahantamahantā manoharā pañcasatamattā lājā jāyiṃsu. Sā
tika-vin01t2:418_3: te gahetvā mahati paduminipatte ṭhapesi. Tasmiñca samaye eko paccekasambuddho tassā
tika-vin01t2:418_4: anuggahatthaṃ avidūre khettapāḷiyā gacchati. Sā taṃ disvā pasannamānasā supupphitaṃ
tika-vin01t2:418_5: mahantaṃ ekaṃ padumaṃ gahetvā tattha lāje pakkhipitvā paccekabuddhaṃ upasaṅkamitvā
tika-vin01t2:418_6: pañcahi lājasatehi saddhiṃ taṃ padumapupphaṃ datvā pañcapatiṭṭhitena vanditvā “imassa,
tika-vin01t2:418_7: bhante, puññassa ānubhāvena ānubhāvasampanne pañcasataputte labheyya”nti pañca puttasatāni
tika-vin01t2:418_8: patthesi. Tasmiṃyeva khaṇe pañcasatā migaluddakā sambhatasambhārā paripakkapaccekabodhiñāṇā
tika-vin01t2:418_9: tasseva paccekabuddhassa madhuramaṃsaṃ datvā “etissā puttā bhaveyyāmā”ti patthayiṃsu.
tika-vin01t2:418_10: Atītāsu anekāsu jātīsu tassā puttabhāvena āgatattā tathā tesaṃ ahosi. Sā yāvatāyukaṃ
tika-vin01t2:418_11: ṭhatvā devaloke nibbatti, tato cutā jātassare padumagabbhe nibbatti. Tameko tāpaso
tika-vin01t2:418_12: disvā paṭijaggi. Tassā padasā vicarantiyā paduddhāre paduddhāre bhūmito padumāni
tika-vin01t2:418_13: uṭṭhahanti. Eko vanacarako disvā bārāṇasirañño ārocesi. Rājā taṃ ānetvā aggamahesiṃ
tika-vin01t2:418_14: akāsi, tassā gabbho saṇṭhāti. Mahāpadumakumāro mātukucchiyaṃ vasi, sesā bahi nikkhantaṃ
tika-vin01t2:418_15: gabbhamalaṃ nissāya saṃsedajabhāvena nibbattā. “Opapātikabhāvenā”ti keci. Te vayappattā
tika-vin01t2:418_16: uyyāne padumassare kīḷantā ekekasmiṃ padume nisīditvā khayavayaṃ paṭṭhapetvā paccekabodhiñāṇaṃ
tika-vin01t2:420: Aniccatāyaṃ vayataṃ viditvā, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo”ti. –
tika-vin01t2:421: Tasmiṃ kāle te tattha vasiṃsu. Tadā cassa pabbatassa “isigilī”ti samaññā udapādi. Ime isayoti ime paccekabuddhaisī. Samā ñāyati etāyāti samaññā, nāmanti attho.
tika-vin01t2:422_0: Tiṇacchadanā kuṭiyo majjhepadalopīsamāsaṃ katvā, ekadese vā samudāyavohāravasena
tika-vin01t2:422_2: eva veditabbāti āha “tiṇacchadanā sadvārabandhā kuṭiyo”ti. Vassaṃ upagacchantenāti
tika-vin01t2:422_3: vassāvāsaṃ upagacchantena. Nālakapaṭipadanti “moneyyaṃ te upaññissa”ntiādinā satthārā
tika-vin01t2:422_4: nālakattherassa desitaṃ puthujjanakālato pabhuti kilesacittaṃ anuppādetvā paṭipajjitabbaṃ
tika-vin01t2:422_5: moneyyapaṭipadaṃ. Taṃ pana paṭipadaṃ sutvā nālakatthero tīsu ṭhānesu appiccho ahosi
tika-vin01t2:422_6: dassane savane pucchāyāti. So hi desanāpariyosāne pasannacitto bhagavantaṃ vanditvā
tika-vin01t2:422_7: vanaṃ paviṭṭho. Puna “aho vatāhaṃ bhagavantaṃ passeyya”nti lolabhāvaṃ na janesi,
tika-vin01t2:422_8: ayamassa dassane appicchatā. Tathā “aho vatāhaṃ puna dhammadesanaṃ suṇeyya”nti lolabhāvaṃ
tika-vin01t2:422_9: na janesi, ayamassa savane appicchatā. Tathā “aho vatāhaṃ puna moneyyapaṭipadaṃ puccheyya”nti
tika-vin01t2:422_10: lolabhāvaṃ na janesi, ayamassa pucchāya appicchatā.
tika-vin01t2:423_0: So evaṃ appiccho samāno pabbatapādaṃ pavisitvā ekavanasaṇḍe dve divasāni na vasi,
tika-vin01t2:423_1: ekarukkhamūle dve divasāni na nisīdi, ekasmiṃ gāme dve divasāni piṇḍāya na pāvisi.
tika-vin01t2:423_2: Iti vanato vanaṃ, rukkhato rukkhaṃ, gāmato gāmaṃ āhiṇḍanto anurūpapaṭipadaṃ paṭipajjitvā
tika-vin01t2:423_3: aggaphale patiṭṭhāsi. Ekassa bhagavato kāle ekoyeva naṃ pūreti. Imañhi moneyyapaṭipadaṃ
tika-vin01t2:423_4: ukkaṭṭhaṃ katvā pūrento bhikkhu satteva māsāni jīvati, majjhimaṃ katvā pūrento satta
tika-vin01t2:423_5: vassāni, mudukaṃ katvā pūrento soḷasa vassāni. Ayaṃ pana thero ukkaṭṭhaṃ katvā pūresi,
tika-vin01t2:423_6: tasmā satta māse ṭhatvā attano āyusaṅkhārassa parikkhayaṃ ñatvā nahāyitvā nivāsetvā
tika-vin01t2:423_7: kāyabandhanaṃ bandhitvā diguṇaṃ saṅghāṭiṃ pārupitvā dasabalābhimukho pañcapatiṭṭhitena
tika-vin01t2:423_8: taṃ vanditvā añjaliṃ paggahetvā hiṅgulakapabbataṃ nissāya ṭhitakova anupādisesāya
tika-vin01t2:423_9: nibbānadhātuyā parinibbāyi. Tassa parinibbutabhāvaṃ ñatvā bhagavā bhikkhusaṅghena
tika-vin01t2:423_10: saddhiṃ tattha gantvā sarīrakiccaṃ katvā dhātuyo gāhāpetvā cetiyaṃ patiṭṭhāpetvā
tika-vin01t2:423_11: agamāsi. Evarūpaṃ paṭipadaṃ paṭipannenapi vassaṃ upagacchantena channe sadvārabandheyeva
tika-vin01t2:423_12: ṭhāne upagantabbaṃ. Appicchataṃ nissāyapi sikkhāpadassa anatikkamanīyattaṃ dassetuṃ
tika-vin01t2:424_1: “Na, bhikkhave, asenāsanikena vassaṃ upagantabbanti vacībhedaṃ katvā vassūpagamanaṃ
tika-vin01t2:424_2: sandhāyeva paṭikkhepo, na ālayakaraṇavasena upagamanaṃ sandhāyā”ti vadanti. Pāḷiyaṃ
tika-vin01t2:424_4: daḷhaṃ katvā vuttattā asenāsanikassa nāvādiṃ vinā aññattha ālayo na vaṭṭatīti amhākaṃ
tika-vin01t2:424_5: khanti. Nāvāsatthavajesuyeva hi “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, nāvāyaṃ vassaṃ upagantu”ntiādinā
tika-vin01t2:424_6: sati asati vā senāsane vassūpagamanassa visuṃ anuññātattā “na, bhikkhave, asenāsanikena
tika-vin01t2:424_7: vassaṃ upagantabba”nti ayaṃ paṭikkhepo tattha na labbhatīti asati senāsane ālayavasenapi
tika-vin01t2:424_8: nāvādīsu upagamanaṃ vuttaṃ. Anudhammatāti vattaṃ. Rattiṭṭhānadivāṭṭhānādīnīti ādi-saddena
tika-vin01t2:425_0: Katikavattāni ca khandhakavattāni ca adhiṭṭhāyāti pariyattidhammo nāma tividhampi
tika-vin01t2:425_1: saddhammaṃ patiṭṭhāpeti, tasmā sakkaccaṃ uddisatha uddisāpetha, sajjhāyaṃ karotha,
tika-vin01t2:425_2: padhānaghare vasantānaṃ saṅghaṭṭanaṃ akatvā antovihāre nisīditvā uddisatha uddisāpetha,
tika-vin01t2:425_3: sajjhāyaṃ karotha, dhammassavanaṃ samiddhaṃ karotha, pabbājentā sodhetvā pabbājetha,
tika-vin01t2:425_4: sodhetvā upasampādetha, sodhetvā nissayaṃ detha. Ekopi hi kulaputto pabbajjañca upasampadañca
tika-vin01t2:425_5: labhitvā sakalaṃ sāsanaṃ patiṭṭhāpeti. Attano thāmena yattakāni sakkotha, tattakāni
tika-vin01t2:425_6: dhutaṅgāni samādiyatha, antovassaṃ nāmetaṃ sakaladivasaṃ rattiyā ca paṭhamapacchimayāmesu
tika-vin01t2:425_7: appamattehi bhavitabbaṃ, vīriyaṃ ārabhitabbaṃ. Porāṇakamahaātherāpi sabbapalibodhe
tika-vin01t2:425_8: chinditvā antovasse ekacariyavattaṃ pūrayiṃsu. Bhasse mattaṃ jānitvā dasavatthukakathaṃ
tika-vin01t2:425_10: sattāhakaraṇīyena gatānaṃ apaloketvā dātuṃ vaṭṭati. Viggāhikapisuṇapharusavacanāni
tika-vin01t2:425_11: mā vadatha, divase divase sīlāni āvajjentā caturārakkhaṃ ahāpentā manasikārabahulā
tika-vin01t2:425_12: viharatha, cetiyaṃ vā bodhiṃ vā vandantena gandhamālaṃ vā pūjentena pattaṃ vā thavikāya
tika-vin01t2:425_13: pakkhipantena na kathetabbaṃ, antogāme manussehi saddhiṃ paccayasaṃyuttakathā vā
tika-vin01t2:425_14: visabhāgakathā vā na kathetabbā, rakkhitindriyehi bhavitabbaṃ, khandhakavattañca
tika-vin01t2:425_15: sekhiyavattañca pūretabbanti evamādinā katikavattāni khandhakavattāni ca adhiṭṭhahitvā.
tika-vin01t2:426_0: “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, vassaṃvuṭṭhānaṃ tīhi ṭhānehi pavāretu”nti vuṭṭhavassānaṃ pavāraṇāya
tika-vin01t2:426_1: anuññātattā imassa suttassa vasena pavāraṇādivasassa aruṇuggamanato paṭṭhāya appavāritāpi
tika-vin01t2:426_2: “vuṭṭhavassā”ti vuccanti. Kiñcāpi “imaṃ temāsaṃ vassaṃ upemī”ti vacanato pavāraṇādivasassa
tika-vin01t2:426_3: temāsantogadhattā taṃ divasaṃ yāva na pavārenti, tāva vassaṃ vasantā nāma honti,
tika-vin01t2:426_4: tathāpi ekadesena avuṭṭhampi taṃ divasaṃ vuṭṭhabhāgāpekkhāya vuṭṭhameva hotīti katvā
tika-vin01t2:426_5: evaṃ vuttaṃ katākatabhāgāpekkhāya samudāye pavattakatākatavohāro viya. Vippakatañhi
tika-vin01t2:426_6: yaṃ kiñci “katākata”nti vuccati. “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, vassaṃvuṭṭhānaṃ kathinaṃ
tika-vin01t2:426_7: attharitu”nti imassa pana suttassa vasena nippariyāyato mahāpavāraṇāya pavāritā pāṭipadadivasato
tika-vin01t2:426_9: Pāṭipadadivasato paṭṭhāya hi vassānassa pacchime māse kathinatthāro anuññāto parivāre
tika-vin01t2:426_10: “kathinassa atthāramāso jānitabboti vassānassa pacchimo māso jānitabbo”ti vuttattā.
tika-vin01t2:427_0: “Āpucchitabbā”ti vatvā idāni āpucchanavidhiṃ dassento “sace imaṃ kuṭi”ntiādimāha.
tika-vin01t2:427_1: Paṭijagganakaṃ vā na labhatīti vihārapaccante kate paṭijagganakaṃ na labhati. Te
tika-vin01t2:427_2: pana bhikkhū janapadacārikaṃ pakkamiṃsūti sambandho. Addhānagamane cārikāvohāro sāsane
tika-vin01t2:427_3: niruḷho. Kiñcāpi ayaṃ cārikā nāma mahājanasaṅgahatthaṃ buddhānaṃyeva labbhati, buddhe
tika-vin01t2:427_4: upādāya pana ruḷhīsaddavasena sāvakānampi vuccati kilañjādīhi katabījanīnampi tālavaṇṭavohāro
tika-vin01t2:427_5: viya. Saṅgopetvāti ekasmiṃ padese rāsiṃ katvā. Idāni tameva saṅgopanavidhiṃ dassento
tika-vin01t2:427_6: “yathā ca ṭhapita”ntiādimāha. Na ovassīyatīti anovassakaṃ, kammani aka-saddo daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin01t2:427_7: Yathā ca ṭhapitaṃ na ovassīyati na temīyatīti attho.
tika-vin01t2:428_0: Anavayoti ettha vayoti hāni “āyavayo”tiādīsu viya. Natthi etassa attano sippe vayo
tika-vin01t2:428_1: ūnatāti avayoti āha “anūno paripuṇṇasippo”ti. Ācariyassa kammaṃ ācariyakanti āha
tika-vin01t2:429_0: 85. Kuṭikāya karaṇabhāvanti kuṭiyā katabhāvaṃ. Saddasatthavidūhi kiṃ-saddayoge anāgatavacanassa
tika-vin01t2:429_1: icchitattā vuttaṃ “tassa lakkhaṇaṃ saddasatthato pariyesitabba”nti. Mettāpubbabhāganti
tika-vin01t2:429_2: mettājhānassa pubbabhāgabhūtaṃ sabbasattesu hitapharaṇamattaṃ. Kasmā panetaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:429_3: nanu anuddayā-saddo karuṇāya pavattatīti? Saccametaṃ, ayaṃ pana anuddayāsaddo anurakkhaṇamatthaṃ
tika-vin01t2:429_4: antonītaṃ katvā pavattamāno mettāya karuṇāya ca pavattatīti idha mettāya pavattamāno
tika-vin01t2:429_5: vutto, tasmā suvuttametaṃ “etena mettāpubbabhāgaṃ dassetī”ti. Karuṇāpubbabhāganti
tika-vin01t2:429_6: karuṇājhānassa pubbabhāgabhūtaṃ sattesu anukampamattaṃ. Cikkhallaṃ mattikā, tassa
tika-vin01t2:429_7: maddanaṃ udakaṃ āsiñcitvā hatthādīhi parimaddanaṃ. Mettākaruṇānanti appanāppattamettākaruṇānaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:429_8: Kiñcāpi therena sañcicca khuddānukhuddakā pāṇā maraṇādhippāyena na byābādhitā, tathāpi
tika-vin01t2:429_9: karuṇāya abhāvena “evaṃ kate ime pāṇā vinassissantī”ti anupaparikkhitvā katattā theraṃ
tika-vin01t2:429_10: vigarahi. Janānaṃ samūho janatāti āha “pacchimo janasamūho”ti. Pātabyabhāvanti vināsetabbataṃ.
tika-vin01t2:429_11: Pāṇātipātaṃ karontānanti therena akatepi pāṇātipāte parehi sallakkhaṇākāraṃ dasseti.
tika-vin01t2:429_12: Imassa diṭṭhānugatinti imassa diṭṭhiyā anugamanaṃ. Ghaṃsitabbeti ghaṭṭayitabbe, vināsitabbeti
tika-vin01t2:429_13: attho. Evaṃ maññīti yathā therena kataṃ, evaṃ mā maññi. “Mā pacchimā janatā pāṇesu
tika-vin01t2:429_15: yattha “khuddānukhuddakānaṃ pāṇānaṃ vihiṃsā bhavissatī”ti jānāti, tena tādise padese
tika-vin01t2:429_16: kappiyavacanaṃ vatvāpi na taṃ kammaṃ kāretabbanti dasseti.
tika-vin01t2:430_0: Tattha tattha vuttameva āpattinti pathavīkhaṇanabhūtagāmapātabyatādīsu vuttapācittiyādiāpattiṃ.
tika-vin01t2:430_1: Ādikammikattā anāpattīti kuṭikaraṇapaccayā anāpatti. Sikkhāpadaṃ atikkamitvāti “na
tika-vin01t2:430_2: ca, bhikkhave, sabbamattikāmayā kuṭikā kātabbā, yo kareyya, āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti
tika-vin01t2:430_3: vuttasikkhāpadaṃ atikkamitvā. Yadi aññena kataṃ labhitvā vasantassa anāpatti siyā,
tika-vin01t2:430_4: na bhagavā taṃ kuṭikaṃ bhindāpeyyāti āha – “kataṃ labhitvā tattha vasantānampi dukkaṭamevā”ti.
tika-vin01t2:430_5: Yathā vā tathā vā missā hotūti heṭṭhā mattikā upari dabbasambhārātiādinā yena kenaci
tika-vin01t2:430_6: ākārena missā hotu. Giñjakāvasathasaṅkhepenāti ettha giñjakā vuccanti iṭṭhakā, giñjakāhi
tika-vin01t2:430_7: eva kato āvasatho giñjakāvasatho. Iṭṭhakāmayassa āvasathassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Taṃ
tika-vin01t2:430_8: kira āvasathaṃ yathā sudhāparikammena payojanaṃ natthi, evaṃ iṭṭhakāhi eva cinitvā
tika-vin01t2:430_9: chādetvā karonti, tulādaṇḍakavāṭaphalakāni pana dārumayāneva. Vikirantāti cuṇṇavicuṇṇaṃ karontā.
tika-vin01t2:431_0: Kissāti kena kāraṇena. Vayakammampi atthīti dvārakavāṭādiabhisaṅkharaṇādīsu katavayakammampi
tika-vin01t2:431_1: atthi. Bhikkhūnaṃ akappiyattā eva titthiyavatānurūpattā titthiyadhajo. Mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-vin01t2:431_2: vuttakāraṇesu attano adhippetakāraṇadvayaṃ patiṭṭhāpetvā aparānipi tattha vuttakāraṇāni
tika-vin01t2:431_3: dassento āha – “aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana aññānipi kāraṇāni vuttānī”tiādi. Tattha sattānuddayāyāti
tika-vin01t2:431_4: tādisāya kuṭikāya karaṇapaccayā vinassamānasattesu anuddayāya. Yasmā sabbamattikāmayā
tika-vin01t2:431_5: kuṭi sukarā bhindituṃ, tasmā tattha ṭhapitaṃ pattacīvarādi aguttaṃ hoti, corādīhi
tika-vin01t2:431_7: senāsanānaṃ bahubhāvanisedhanatthāya, tādisassa vā senāsanassa abhisaṅkharaṇe bhikkhūnaṃ
tika-vin01t2:433_0: Pāḷimuttakavinicchayesu tañca kho…pe… na vaṇṇamaṭṭhatthāyāti idaṃ chattadaṇḍaggāhakasalākapañjaravinandhanaṃ
tika-vin01t2:433_1: sandhāyāti vadanti. Sabbatthāti chattadaṇḍe sabbattha. Āraggenāti nikhādanamukhena.
tika-vin01t2:433_2: Ghaṭakampi vāḷarūpampi bhinditvā dhāretabbanti sace tādisaṃ akappiyachattaṃ labhati,
tika-vin01t2:433_3: ghaṭakampi vāḷarūpampi bhinditvā tacchetvā dhāretabbaṃ. Suttakena vā daṇḍo veṭhetabboti
tika-vin01t2:433_4: yathā chattadaṇḍe lekhā na paññāyati, tathā veṭhetabbo. Daṇḍabundeti daṇḍamūle, chattadaṇḍassa
tika-vin01t2:433_5: heṭṭhimataleti attho. Chattamaṇḍalikanti chattassa anto khuddakamaṇḍalaṃ. Ukkiritvāti
tika-vin01t2:433_6: uṭṭhapetvā. Sā vaṭṭatīti yadipi rajjukehi na bandhanti, bandhituṃ pana yuttaṭṭhānattā vaṭṭati.
tika-vin01t2:434_0: Nānāsuttakehīti nānāvaṇṇehi suttehi. Idañca tathā karontānaṃ karaṇappakāradassanatthaṃ
tika-vin01t2:434_1: vuttaṃ, ekavaṇṇasuttakenapi vuttappakārena sibbituṃ na vaṭṭatiyeva. Paṭṭamukheti
tika-vin01t2:434_2: paṭṭakoṭiyaṃ. Dvinnaṃ paṭṭānaṃ saṅghaṭṭitaṭṭhānaṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ. Pariyanteti
tika-vin01t2:434_3: cīvarapariyante. Cīvaraanuvātaṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ. Veṇinti varakasīsākārena sibbanaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:434_4: Saṅkhalikanti biḷālabandhanākārena sibbanaṃ. “Veṇiṃ saṅkhalika”nti cettha upayogavacanaṃ
tika-vin01t2:434_5: “karontī”ti karaṇakiriyāpekkhaṃ. Agghiyagayamuggarādīnīti ettha agghiyaṃ nāma cetiyasaṇṭhānena
tika-vin01t2:434_6: sibbanaṃ, mūle tanukaṃ agge mahantaṃ katvā gadākārena sibbanaṃ gayā, mūle ca agge
tika-vin01t2:434_7: ca ekasadisaṃ katvā muggarākārena sibbanaṃ muggaro. Kakkaṭakkhīni ukkirantīti gaṇṭhikapaṭṭapāsakapaṭṭānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:434_8: ante pāḷibaddhaṃ katvā kakkaṭakānaṃ akkhisaṇṭhānaṃ uṭṭhapenti, karontīti attho. “Koṇasuttapiḷakāti
tika-vin01t2:434_9: gaṇṭhikapāsakapaṭṭānaṃ koṇehi nīhaṭasuttānaṃ koṭiyo”ti tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:434_10: Kathaṃ pana tā piḷakā duviññeyyarūpā kātabbāti? Koṇehi nīhaṭasuttānaṃ antesu ekavāraṃ
tika-vin01t2:434_11: gaṇṭhikakaraṇena vā puna nivattetvā sibbanena vā duviññeyyasabhāvaṃ katvā suttakoṭiyo
tika-vin01t2:438: Vuttaṃ. Tasmā tesaṃ matena koṇasuttā ca piḷakā ca koṇasuttapiḷakāti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin01t2:439_0: Maṇināti masāragallādipāsāṇena. Na ghaṭṭetabbanti na ghaṃsitabbaṃ, aṃsabaddhakakāyabandhanāni
tika-vin01t2:439_1: pana saṅkhādīhi ghaṃsituṃ vaṭṭati. Pāsakaṃ katvā bandhitabbanti rajanakāle bandhitabbaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:439_2: sesakāle mocetvā ṭhapetabbaṃ. Gaṇṭhiketi dantamayādigaṇṭhike. Piḷakāti binduṃ binduṃ
tika-vin01t2:440_0: “Telavaṇṇoti samaṇasāruppavaṇṇaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, maṇivaṇṇaṃ pana pattaṃ aññena kataṃ
tika-vin01t2:440_1: labhitvā paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vadanti. Pattamaṇḍaleti tipusīsādimaye pattamaṇḍale.
tika-vin01t2:440_2: “Na, bhikkhave, citrāni pattamaṇḍalāni dhāretabbāni rūpakākiṇṇāni bhittikammakatānī”ti
tika-vin01t2:440_3: vuttattā “bhittikammaṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti vuttaṃ. “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, makaradantakaṃ
tika-vin01t2:441_1: kuñjaracchisaṇṭhānāni. Rajjukakāyabandhanaṃ ekameva vaṭṭatīti rajjukaṃ bandhantena
tika-vin01t2:441_2: ekaguṇameva katvā bandhituṃ vaṭṭati, majjhe bhinditvā diguṇaṃ katvā bandhituṃ na
tika-vin01t2:441_3: vaṭṭati, diguṇaṃ pana akatvā ekarajjukameva satavārampi punappunaṃ āvijjitvā bandhituṃ
tika-vin01t2:441_4: vaṭṭati. Ekampi na vaṭṭatīti ekaguṇampi katvā bandhituṃ na vaṭṭati. Bahurajjuke…pe...
tika-vin01t2:441_5: vaṭṭatīti idaṃ kāyabandhanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, na dasā sandhāya. Īdisañhi kāyabandhanaṃ
tika-vin01t2:446_0: Murajaṃ pana kāyabandhanaṃ na vaṭṭati “na, bhikkhave, uccāvacāni kāyabandhanāni dhāretabbāni
tika-vin01t2:446_1: kalābukaṃ deḍḍhubhakaṃ murajaṃ maddavīṇaṃ, yo dhāreyya, āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti vuttattā.
tika-vin01t2:446_2: Kiṃ pana bahurajjuke ekato katvā ekena nirantaraṃ veṭhetvā kataṃ murajasaṅkhyaṃ na
