tika-vin01t2:446_3: gacchatīti? Āma na gacchati. Murajañhi nāma nānāvaṇṇehi suttehi murajavaṭṭisaṇṭhānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:446_4: veṭhetvā kataṃ. Keci pana “murajanti bahurajjuke ekato saṅkaḍḍhitvā ekāya rajjuyā
tika-vin01t2:446_5: paliveṭhetvā katarajjū”ti vadanti, taṃ na gahetabbaṃ. Yadi cetaṃ murajaṃ siyā, “bahurajjuke
tika-vin01t2:446_6: ekato katvā ekena nirantaraṃ veṭhetvā kataṃ bahurajjuka”nti na vattabbaṃ, “taṃ vaṭṭatī”ti
tika-vin01t2:446_7: idaṃ virujjheyya. Murajaṃ pana pāmaṅgasaṇṭhānañca dasāsu vaṭṭati “kāyabandhanassa
tika-vin01t2:446_8: dasā jīranti. Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, murajaṃ maddavīṇa”nti vuttattā. Teneva vakkhati
tika-vin01t2:446_9: “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, murajaṃ maddavīṇanti idaṃ dasāsuyeva anuññāta”nti.
tika-vin01t2:447_0: Kāyabandhanavidheti “kāyabandhanassa pavananto jīrati. Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, vidha”nti
tika-vin01t2:447_1: vuttattā kāyabandhanassa pāsante dasāmūle tassa thirabhāvatthaṃ kattabbe dantavisāṇādimaye
tika-vin01t2:447_2: vidhe. “Aṭṭha maṅgalāni nāma saṅkho cakkaṃ puṇṇakumbho gayā sirīvaccho aṅkuso dhajaṃ
tika-vin01t2:447_3: sovatthika”nti vadanti. Paricchedalekhāmattanti ubhosu koṭīsu kātabbaparicchedarājimattaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:448_1: vaṭṭaṃ katvā aggakoṭiyaṃ uṭṭhāpetabbapubbuḷaṃ. Aññaṃ vā vaṇṇamaṭṭhanti iminā piḷakādiṃ
tika-vin01t2:448_2: saṅgaṇhāti. Maṇikanti ekāvaṭṭamaṇi. Piḷakanti sāsapamattikā muttarājisadisā bahuvaṭṭalekhā.
tika-vin01t2:448_3: “Imasmiṃ adhikāre avuttattā lekhaniyaṃ yaṃ kiñci vaṇṇamaṭṭhaṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vadanti.
tika-vin01t2:448_4: Valitakanti majjhe valiṃ uṭṭhāpetvā. Maṇḍalaṃ hotīti uttarāraṇiyā pavesanatthaṃ āhaṭamaṇḍalaṃ hoti.
tika-vin01t2:449_0: Kiñcāpi ettha dantakaṭṭhacchedanavāsiyeva vuttā, mahāvāsiyampi pana na vaṭṭatiyeva.
tika-vin01t2:449_1: Ujukameva bandhitunti sambandho. “Ubhosu vā passesu ekapassevā”ti vacanaseso. Kattarayaṭṭhikoṭiyaṃ
tika-vin01t2:449_2: kataayovalayānipi vaṭṭanti, yesaṃ aññamaññasaṅghaṭṭanena saddo niccharati.
tika-vin01t2:450_1: parikammakatāya bhūmiyā attharitabbaattharaṇe. Pānīyaghaṭeti iminā kuṇḍikasarakepi
tika-vin01t2:450_2: saṅgaṇhāti. Bījaneti caturassabījane. Sabbaṃ…pe… vaṭṭatīti yathāvuttesu mañcapīṭhādīsu
tika-vin01t2:450_3: itthirūpaṃ vinā sabbaṃ mālākammalatākammādi vaṇṇamaṭṭhaṃ bhikkhuno vaṭṭati. Senāsane
tika-vin01t2:450_4: kiñci paṭisedhetabbaṃ natthi aññatra viruddhasenāsanāti etthāyamadhippāyo – senāsanaparikkhāresu
tika-vin01t2:450_5: paṭisedhetabbaṃ nāma kiñci natthi, viruddhasenāsanaṃ pana sayameva paṭikkhipitabbanti.
tika-vin01t2:450_6: Aññesanti sīmasāmino vuttā. Rājavallabhā paranikāyikāpi ekanikāyikāpi uposathapavāraṇānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:450_7: antarāyakarā alajjino rājakulūpagā vuccanti. Tesaṃ lajjiparisāti tesaṃ sīmasāmikānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:450_8: pakkhā hutvā anubalaṃ dātuṃ samatthā lajjiparisā. Sukatamevāti aññesaṃ santakepi
tika-vin01t2:452: 86. Devena gahitadārūnīti raññā pariggahitadārūni, rañño santakānīti vuttaṃ hoti. Khaṇḍākhaṇḍaṃ karontoti khuddakaṃ mahantañca khaṇḍaṃ karonto.
tika-vin01t2:453: 87. Kulabhogaissariyādīhi mahatī mattā pamāṇaṃ etassāti mahāmatto. Tenāha – “mahatiyā issariyamattāya samannāgato”ti.
tika-vin01t2:454_0: 88. Avajjhāyantīti heṭṭhā katvā olokenti, cintenti vā. Tenāha “avajānantā”tiādi.
tika-vin01t2:454_1: Lāmakato vā cintentīti nihīnato cintenti. Kathentīti “kiṃ nāmetaṃ kiṃ nāmeta”nti
tika-vin01t2:455_0: Kathaṃ panettha “dārūnī”ti bahuvacanaṃ “adinna”nti ekavacanena saddhiṃ sambandhamupagacchatīti
tika-vin01t2:455_1: āha – “adinnaṃ ādiyissatīti ayaṃ ujjhāyanattho”tiādi. Ujjhāyanassa adinnādānavisayattā
tika-vin01t2:455_2: adinnādānaṃ ujjhāyanatthoti vuttaṃ. Satipi panettha gopakena dinnadārūnaṃ gahaṇe
tika-vin01t2:455_3: ujukaṃ avatvā lesena gahitattā thero “adinnaṃ ādiyī”ti veditabbo. Vacanabhedeti ekavacanabahuvacanānaṃ bhede.
tika-vin01t2:456_0: Sabbāvantaṃ parisanti bhikkhubhikkhunīādisabbāvayavavantaṃ parisaṃ. Sabbā catuparisasaṅkhaātā
tika-vin01t2:456_1: pajā ettha atthīti sabbāvantā, parisā. Senā etassa atthīti seniko, seniko eva seniyo.
tika-vin01t2:456_2: Bimbisāroti tassa nāmanti ettha bimbīti suvaṇṇaṃ, tasmā sārasuvaṇṇasadisavaṇṇatāya
tika-vin01t2:456_3: bimbisāroti vuccatīti veditabbo. Catuttho bhāgo pādoti veditabboti imināva sabbajanapadesu
tika-vin01t2:456_4: kahāpaṇassa vīsatimo bhāgo māsakoti idañca vuttameva hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Porāṇasatthānurūpaṃ
tika-vin01t2:456_5: lakkhaṇasampannā uppāditā nīlakahāpaṇāti veditabbā. Rudradāmena uppādito rudradāmako.
tika-vin01t2:456_6: So kira nīlakahāpaṇassa tibhāgaṃ agghati. Yasmiṃ padese nīlakahāpaṇā na santi, tatthāpi
tika-vin01t2:456_7: nīlakahāpaṇānaṃ vaḷañjanaṭṭhāne ca avaḷañjanaṭṭhāne ca samānaagghavasena pavattamānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:456_8: bhaṇḍaṃ gahetvā nīlakahāpaṇavaseneva paricchedo kātabboti vadanti.
tika-vin01t2:458_0: Tassattho…pe… vuttanayeneva veditabboti iminā “bhagavatā bhikkhūnaṃ idaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ
tika-vin01t2:458_1: evaṃ paññattaṃ hoti ca, idañca aññaṃ vatthu udapādī”ti evaṃ paṭhamapārājikavaṇṇanāyaṃ
tika-vin01t2:458_2: vuttanayena tassattho veditabbo. “Idāni yaṃ taṃ aññaṃ vatthu uppannaṃ, taṃ dassetuṃ
tika-vin01t2:458_3: ‘tena kho pana samayenā’tiādimāhā”ti evaṃ anupaññattisambandho ca tattha vuttanayeneva
tika-vin01t2:459: 90-91. Rajakā attharanti etthāti rajakattharaṇaṃ, rajakattharaṇanti rajakatitthaṃ vuccatīti āha “rajakatitthaṃ gantvā”ti. Vuttamevatthaṃ vibhāvento āha “tañhī”tiādi.
tika-vin01t2:461_0: 92. “Abhinavaniviṭṭho ekakuṭikādigāmo yāva manussā pavisitvā vāsaṃ na kappenti, tāva
tika-vin01t2:461_1: gāmasaṅkhyaṃ na gacchatī”ti vadanti, tasmā tattha gāmappavesanāpucchādikiccampi natthi.
tika-vin01t2:461_2: Yakkhapariggahabhūtoti saupaddavavasena vuttaṃ, yakkhanagarādiṃ vā saṅgaṇhāti. Yakkhanagarampi
tika-vin01t2:461_3: āpaṇādīsu dissamānesu gāmasaṅkhyaṃ gacchati, adissamānesu na gacchati, tasmā yakkhanagarampi
tika-vin01t2:461_4: pavisantena āpaṇādīsu dissamānesu sabbaṃ gāmappavesanavattaṃ kātabbaṃ, adissamānesu
tika-vin01t2:461_5: na kātabbanti vadanti. Punapi āgantukāmāti iminā tesaṃ tattha sāpekkhabhāvaṃ dasseti.
tika-vin01t2:461_6: Yato pana nirapekkhāva hutvā pakkamanti, so gāmasaṅkhyaṃ na gacchati, tasmā tattha
tika-vin01t2:462_0: Nanu ca “gāmā vā araññā vā”ti ettakameva mātikāyaṃ vuttaṃ, tasmā gāmalakkhaṇaṃ dassetvā
tika-vin01t2:462_1: araññameva dassetabbaṃ siyā, gāmūpacāro nāmātiādi pana kasmā vuttanti āha – “gāmūpacārotiādi
tika-vin01t2:462_2: araññaparicchedadassanatthaṃ vutta”nti. Gāmūpacāre hi dassite ṭhapetvā gāmañca gāmūpacārañca
tika-vin01t2:462_3: avasesaṃ araññaṃ nāmāti araññaparicchedo sakkā dassetuṃ, idañca gāmagāmūpacāre asaṅkarato
tika-vin01t2:462_4: dassetuṃ vuttaṃ. Mātikāyaṃ pana gāmaggahaṇeneva gāmūpacāropi saṅgahitoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:462_5: Gāmūpacāro hi loke gāmasaṅkhyameva gacchati. Evañca katvā mātikāya anavasesaavaharaṇaṭṭhānapariggaho
tika-vin01t2:462_6: siddho hoti. Indakhīleti ummāre. Araññasaṅkhepaṃ gacchatīti “nikkhamitvā bahi indakhīlā
tika-vin01t2:462_7: sabbametaṃ arañña”nti abhidhamme vuttattā. Vemajjhameva indakhīloti vuccatīti indakhīlaṭṭhāniyattā
tika-vin01t2:462_8: asatipi indakhīle vemajjhameva tathā vuccati. Yattha pana dvārabāhāpi natthi, tattha
tika-vin01t2:462_9: ubhosu passesu vatiyā vā pākārassa vā koṭivemajjhameva indakhīlaṭṭhāniyattā “indakhīlo”ti
tika-vin01t2:463_0: Majjhimassa purisassāti thāmamajjhimassa purisassa. Iminā pana vacanena suppamusalapātopi
tika-vin01t2:463_1: baladassanavaseneva katoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Kurundaṭṭhakathāyaṃ mahāpaccariyañca gharūpacāro
tika-vin01t2:463_2: gāmoti adhippāyena “gharūpacāre ṭhitassa leḍḍupāto gāmūpacāro”ti vuttaṃ. Dvāreti
tika-vin01t2:463_3: nibbakosassa udakapatanaṭṭhānato abbhantaraṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Antogeheti ca pamukhassa
tika-vin01t2:463_4: abbhantarameva sandhāya vuttaṃ. Kataparikkhepoti imināva gharassa samantato tattako
tika-vin01t2:463_5: paricchedo gharūpacāro nāmāti vuttaṃ hoti. Yassa pana gharassa samantato gorūpānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:463_6: pavesananivāraṇatthaṃ pākāravatiādīhi parikkhepo kato hoti, tattha sova parikkhepo
tika-vin01t2:463_7: gharūpacāro, suppapātādiparicchedo pana aparikkhittagharaṃ sandhāya vuttoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:463_8: Idamettha pamāṇanti vikālagāmappavesanādīsu gāmagāmūpacārānaṃ asaṅkarato vinicchayassa
tika-vin01t2:463_9: veditabbattā. Kurundīādīsu vuttanayena hi gharūpacārassa gāmoti āpannattā gharagharūpacāragāmagāmūpacārānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:463_10: saṅkaro siyā. Evaṃ sabbatthāti iminā ito pubbepi pacchimasseva vādassa pamāṇabhāvaṃ
tika-vin01t2:463_11: dasseti. Keci pana “ito paṭṭhāya vakkhamānavādaṃ sandhāya vutta”nti vadanti, taṃ na gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:464_0: Sesampīti gāmūpacāralakkhaṇaṃ sandhāya vadati. Tatrāti tasmiṃ gāmūpacāraggahaṇe.
tika-vin01t2:464_1: Tassa gāmaparicchedadassanatthanti tassa aparicchedassa gāmassa gāmaparicchedaṃ dassetunti
tika-vin01t2:464_2: attho. Yadi evaṃ “gāmo nāmā”ti padaṃ uddharitvā “aparikkhittassa gāmassa gharūpacāre
tika-vin01t2:464_3: ṭhitassa majjhimassa purisassa leḍḍupāto”ti kasmā na vuttanti? “Gāmo nāmāti idha
tika-vin01t2:464_4: avuttampi adhikāravasena labbhatiyevā”ti vadanti. Apare pana bhaṇanti “gāmūpacāro
tika-vin01t2:464_5: nāmāti imināva gāmassa ca gāmūpacārassa ca saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. Kathaṃ? ‘Gāmassa upacāro
tika-vin01t2:464_6: gāmūpacāro’ti evaṃ viggahe kariyamāne ‘parikkhittassa gāmassa indakhīle ṭhitassa
tika-vin01t2:464_7: majjhimassa purisassa leḍḍupāto’ti iminā parikkhittassa gāmassa gāmūpacāralakkhaṇaṃ
tika-vin01t2:464_8: dassitaṃ hoti, ‘gāmasaṅkhāto upacāro gāmūpacāro’ti evaṃ pana gayhamāne ‘aparikkhittassa
tika-vin01t2:464_9: gāmassa gharūpacāre ṭhitassa majjhimassa purisassa leḍḍupāto’ti iminā aparikkhittassa
tika-vin01t2:464_10: gāmassa gāmaparicchedo dassitoti sakkā viññātu”nti. “Gharūpacāre ṭhitassa majjhimassa
tika-vin01t2:464_11: purisassa leḍḍupāto”ti iminā parikkhittassapi gāmassa sace leḍḍupātato dūre parikkhepo
tika-vin01t2:464_12: hoti, leḍḍupātoyeva gāmaparicchedoti gahetabbanti vadanti. Pubbe vuttanayenevāti
tika-vin01t2:465_1: parikkhittassa gāmassa parikkhepaṃ atikkamantassa āpatti pācittiyassa, aparikkhittassa
tika-vin01t2:465_2: gāmassa upacāraṃ okkamantassa āpatti pācittiyassā”ti vuttattā gāmagāmūpacārānaṃ asaṅkaratā
tika-vin01t2:465_3: icchitabbāti āha – “asaṅkarato cettha vinicchayo veditabbo vikāle gāmappavesanādīsū”ti.
tika-vin01t2:465_4: Ettha ca “parikkhittassa gāmassa parikkhepaṃ, aparikkhittassa parikkhepārahaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:465_5: atikkamantassa vikālagāmappavesanāpatti hotī”ti keci vadanti, taṃ na gahetabbaṃ padabhājaniyaṃ
tika-vin01t2:465_6: pana “parikkhittassa gāmassa parikkhepaṃ atikkamantassa āpatti pācittiyassa, aparikkhittassa
tika-vin01t2:465_7: gāmassa upacāraṃ okkamantassa āpatti pācittiyassā”ti vuttattā. Aparikkhittassa gāmassa
tika-vin01t2:465_8: gharūpacārato paṭṭhāya dutiyaleḍḍupātasaṅkhātassa gāmūpacārassa okkamane āpatti veditabbā.
tika-vin01t2:465_10: adinnādāne vuttanayeneva veditabbo”ti vuttaṃ. Mātikāṭṭhakathāyampi vuttaṃ “yvāyaṃ
tika-vin01t2:465_11: aparikkhittassa gāmassa upacāro dassito, tassa vasena vikālagāmappavesanādīsu āpatti
tika-vin01t2:465_12: paricchinditabbā”ti. Yadi evaṃ “vikāle gāmaṃ paviseyyā”ti iminā virujjhatīti? Na
tika-vin01t2:465_13: virujjhati gāmūpacārassapi gāmaggahaṇena gahitattā. Tasmā parikkhittassa gāmassa
tika-vin01t2:465_14: parikkhepaṃ atikkamantassa, aparikkhittassa upacāraṃ okkamantassa vikālagāmappavesanāpatti
tika-vin01t2:465_15: hotīti niṭṭhamettha gantabbaṃ. Vikāle gāmappavesanādīsūti ādi-saddena gharagharūpacārādīsu
tika-vin01t2:466_0: Nikkhamitvā bahi indakhīlāti indakhīlato bahi nikkhamitvāti attho. Ettha ca vinayapariyāyena
tika-vin01t2:466_1: tāva “ṭhapetvā gāmañca gāmūpacārañca avasesaṃ arañña”nti āgataṃ, suttantapariyāyena
tika-vin01t2:466_2: āraññikaṃ bhikkhuṃ sandhāya “āraññakaṃ nāma senāsanaṃ pañcadhanusatikaṃ pacchima”nti
tika-vin01t2:466_3: āgataṃ. Vinayasuttantā ubhopi pariyāyadesanā nāma, abhidhammo pana nippariyāyadesanā.
tika-vin01t2:466_4: Nippariyāyato ca gāmavinimuttaṃ ṭhānaṃ araññameva hotīti abhidhammapariyāyena araññaṃ
tika-vin01t2:466_5: dassetuṃ “nikkhamitvā bahi indakhīlā”ti vuttaṃ. “Ācariyadhanu nāma pakatihatthena
tika-vin01t2:466_6: navavidatthippamāṇaṃ, jiyāya pana āropitāya catuhatthappamāṇa”nti vadanti. Lesokāsanisedhanatthanti
tika-vin01t2:466_7: “mayā neva gāme, na araññe haṭaṃ, ghare vā gharūpacāresu vā gāmūpacāresu vā aññatarasmi”nti
tika-vin01t2:467_0: Kappiyanti anurūpavasena vuttaṃ. Akappiyampi pana appaṭiggahitañce, adinnasaṅkhyameva
tika-vin01t2:467_1: gacchati. Pariccāgādimhi akate “idaṃ mayhaṃ santaka”nti aviditampi parapariggahitameva
tika-vin01t2:467_2: mātāpitūnaṃ accayena mandānaṃ uttānaseyyakānaṃ dārakānaṃ santakamiva.
tika-vin01t2:468_0: Yassa vasena puriso thenoti vuccati, taṃ theyyanti āha “avaharaṇacittassetaṃ adhivacana”nti.
tika-vin01t2:468_2: hi ñāṇe dissati. “Papañcasaññāsaṅkhā samudācarantī”tiādīsu koṭṭhāse. “Tesaṃ tesaṃ
tika-vin01t2:468_3: dhammānaṃ saṅkhā samaññā”tiādīsu paññattiyaṃ. “Na sukaraṃ saṅkhātu”ntiādīsu gaṇanāyaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:468_4: Tattha koṭṭhāsavacanaṃ saṅkhā-saddaṃ sandhāyāha “saṅkhāsaṅkhātanti atthato eka”nti.
tika-vin01t2:468_6: “Eko cittakoṭṭhāsoti yañca pubbabhāge avaharissāmīti pavattaṃ cittaṃ, yañca gamanādisādhakaṃ
tika-vin01t2:468_7: parāmasanādisādhakaṃ vā majjhe pavattaṃ, yañca ṭhānācāvanappayogasādhakaṃ, tesu ayameveko
tika-vin01t2:468_8: pacchimo cittakoṭṭhāso idhādhippeto”ti keci vadanti. Cūḷagaṇṭhipade pana “ūnamāsakamāsakaūnapañcamāsakapañcamāsakāvaharaṇacittesu
tika-vin01t2:468_9: eko cittakoṭṭhāso”ti vuttaṃ. “Anekappabhedattā cittassa eko cittakoṭṭhāsoti vutta”nti
tika-vin01t2:468_10: mahāgaṇṭhipade majjhimagaṇṭhipade ca vuttaṃ. Idamevettha sundarataraṃ “theyyacittasaṅkhāto
tika-vin01t2:468_11: eko cittakoṭṭhāso”ti vuttattā. Theyyasaṅkhātenāti theyyacittakoṭṭhāsena karaṇabhūtena,
tika-vin01t2:469_0: Abhiyogavasenāti aḍḍakaraṇavasena. Abhiyuñjatīti codeti, aḍḍaṃ karotīti attho. Parikappitaṭṭhānanti
tika-vin01t2:469_1: okāsaparikappanavasena parikappitappadesaṃ. Suṅkaghātanti ettha rājūnaṃ deyyabhāgassa
tika-vin01t2:469_2: etaṃ adhivacanaṃ suṅkoti, so ettha haññati adatvā gacchantehīti suṅkaghāto. “Ettha
tika-vin01t2:469_3: paviṭṭhehi suṅko dātabbo”ti rukkhapabbatādisaññāṇena niyamitappadesassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:471_0: Ākulāti saṅkulā. Luḷitāti viloḷitā. Katthacīti ekissāya aṭṭhakathāyaṃ. Ekaṃ pañcakaṃ
tika-vin01t2:471_1: dassitanti “parapariggahitañca hoti, parapariggahitasaññī ca, garuko ca hoti parikkhāro
tika-vin01t2:471_2: pañcamāsako vā atirekapañcamāsako vā, theyyacittañca paccupaṭṭhitaṃ hoti, āmasati,
tika-vin01t2:471_3: āpatti dukkaṭassa. Phandāpeti, āpatti thullaccayassa. Ṭhānā cāveti, āpatti pārājikassā”ti
tika-vin01t2:471_4: evaṃ vuttapañcaavahāraṅgāni ekaṃ pañcakanti dassitaṃ. Dve pañcakāni dassitānīti “chahākārehi
tika-vin01t2:471_5: adinnaṃ ādiyantassa āpatti pārājikassa. Na ca sakasaññī, na ca vissāsaggāhī, na ca
tika-vin01t2:471_6: tāvakālikaṃ, garuko ca hoti parikkhāro pañcamāsako vā atirekapañcamāsako vā, theyyacittañca
tika-vin01t2:471_7: paccupaṭṭhitaṃ hoti, āmasati, āpatti dukkaṭassa. Phandāpeti, āpatti thullaccayassa.
tika-vin01t2:471_8: Ṭhānā cāveti, āpatti pārājikassā”ti evaṃ vuttesu chasu padesu ekaṃ apanetvā avasesāni
tika-vin01t2:471_9: pañca padāni ekaṃ pañcakanti dassetvā heṭṭhā vuttapañcakañca gahetvā dve pañcakāni
tika-vin01t2:471_10: dassitāni. Ettha panāti “pañcahākārehi adinnaṃ ādiyantassā”tiādīsu. Sabbehipi padehīti
tika-vin01t2:472_0: Pañcannaṃ avahārānaṃ samūho pañcakaṃ, sako hattho sahattho, tena nibbatto, tassa
tika-vin01t2:472_1: vā sambandhīti sāhatthiko, avahāro. Sāhatthikādi pañcakaṃ sāhatthikapañcakanti ādipadavasena
tika-vin01t2:472_2: nāmalābho daṭṭhabbo kusalādittikassa kusalattikavohāro viya. Imināva nayena pubbapayogādi
tika-vin01t2:472_3: pañcakaṃ pubbapayogapañcakaṃ, theyyāvahārādi pañcakaṃ theyyāvahārapañcakanti nāmalābho
tika-vin01t2:472_6: theyyāvahārapañcake labbhamānassa parikappāvahārapadassa ca vasena yojetabbanti attho.
tika-vin01t2:473_0: Āṇattiyā nibbatto avahāro āṇattiko. Nissajjanaṃ nissaggo, suṅkaghātaṭṭhāne parikappitokāse
tika-vin01t2:473_1: vā ṭhatvā bhaṇḍassa bahi pātanaṃ. Nissaggova nissaggiyo. Kiriyāsiddhito puretarameva
tika-vin01t2:473_2: pārājikāpattisaṅkhātaṃ atthaṃ sādhetīti atthasādhako. “Asukassa bhaṇḍaṃ yadā sakkosi,
tika-vin01t2:473_3: tadā avaharā”ti evarūpo hi āṇāpanapayogo parassa telakumbhiyā pādagghanakaṃ telaṃ
tika-vin01t2:473_4: avassaṃ pivanakānaṃ upāhanādīnaṃ nikkhepapayogo ca āṇattassa bhaṇḍaggahaṇato upāhanādīnaṃ
tika-vin01t2:473_5: telapātanato ca puretarameva pārājikāpattisaṅkhātaṃ atthaṃ sādheti. Sāhatthikapayogopi
tika-vin01t2:473_6: hi evarūpo atthasādhakoti vuccati. Vuttañhetaṃ mātikāṭṭhakathāyaṃ –
tika-vin01t2:474_0: “Atthasādhako nāma ‘asukassa bhaṇḍaṃ yadā sakkosi, tadā taṃ avaharā’ti āṇāpeti. Tattha
tika-vin01t2:474_1: sace paro anantarāyiko hutvā taṃ avaharati, āṇāpakassa āṇattikkhaṇeyeva pārājikaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:474_2: Parassa vā pana telakumbhiyā pādagghanakaṃ telaṃ avassaṃ pivanakāni upāhanādīni pakkhipati,
tika-vin01t2:475_0: Dhurassa nikkhipanaṃ dhuranikkhepo. Ārāmābhiyuñjanādīsu attano ca parassa ca dānaggahaṇesu
tika-vin01t2:475_1: nirussāhabhāvāpajjanaṃ. Sahatthā avaharatīti sahatthena gaṇhāti. “Asukassa bhaṇḍaṃ
tika-vin01t2:475_2: avaharā”ti aññaṃ āṇāpetīti etthāpi āṇāpakassa āṇattikkhaṇeyeva āpatti daṭṭhabbā.
tika-vin01t2:475_3: Yadi evaṃ imassa, atthasādhakassa ca ko visesoti? Taṅkhaṇaññeva gahaṇe niyuñjanaṃ
tika-vin01t2:475_4: āṇattikapayogo, kālantarena gahaṇatthaṃ niyogo atthasādhakoti ayametesaṃ viseso.
tika-vin01t2:475_5: Tenevāha – “asukassa bhaṇḍaṃ yadā sakkosi, tadā avaharāti āṇāpetī”ti. Ettha ca āṇāpanapayogova
tika-vin01t2:475_6: atthasādhakoti dassito, sāhatthikavasenapi atthasādhakapayogo pana upari āvi bhavissati.
tika-vin01t2:475_7: Dhuranikkhepo pana upanikkhittabhaṇḍavasena veditabboti idaṃ nidassanamattaṃ. Ārāmābhiyuñjanādīsupi
tika-vin01t2:476_1: bhaṇḍaṃ avaharā’ti āṇāpanaṃ bhaṇḍaggahaṇato pubbattā pubbapayogo, payogena saha vattamāno
tika-vin01t2:476_2: avahāro sahapayogo, “asukaṃ nāma bhaṇḍaṃ harissāmā”ti saṃvidahitvā sammantayitvā
tika-vin01t2:476_3: avaharaṇaṃ saṃvidāvahāro. Saṅketakammaṃ nāma pubbaṇhādikālaparicchedavasena sañjānanakammaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:476_5: sahapayogoti idaṃ pana nidassanamattaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ, khilasaṅkamanādīsupi asati ca
tika-vin01t2:476_7: khilādīni saṅkāmetvā khettādiggahaṇavasena ca sahapayogo veditabbo”ti.
tika-vin01t2:477_0: Theno vuccati coro, tassa bhāvo theyyaṃ, tena avaharaṇaṃ theyyāvahāro. Yo hi sandhicchedādīni
tika-vin01t2:477_1: katvā adissamāno avaharati, tulākūṭamānakūṭakūṭakahāpaṇādīhi vā vañcetvā gaṇhāti,
tika-vin01t2:477_2: tassevaṃ gaṇhato avahāro theyyāvahāro. Pasayha abhibhavitvā avaharaṇaṃ pasayhāvahāro.
tika-vin01t2:477_3: Yo hi pasayha balakkārena paresaṃ santakaṃ gaṇhāti gāmaghātakādayo viya, attano pattabalito
tika-vin01t2:477_4: vā vuttanayena adhikaṃ gaṇhāti rājabhaṭādayo viya, tassevaṃ gaṇhato avahāro pasayhāvahāro.
tika-vin01t2:477_5: Bhaṇḍavasena ca okāsavasena ca parikappetvā avaharaṇaṃ parikappāvahāro. Tiṇapaṇṇādīhi
tika-vin01t2:477_6: aṅgulimuddikādiṃ paṭicchādetvā pacchā tassa paṭicchannassa avaharaṇaṃ paṭicchannāvahāro.
tika-vin01t2:478_0: Tulayitvāti upaparikkhitvā. Sāmīcīti vattaṃ, āpatti pana natthīti adhippāyo. Mahājanasammaddoti
tika-vin01t2:478_1: mahājanasaṅkhobho. Bhaṭṭhe janakāyeti apagate janakāye. “Idañca kāsāvaṃ attano santakaṃ
tika-vin01t2:478_2: katvā etasseva bhikkhuno dehī”ti kiṃkāraṇā evamāha? Cīvarasāmikena yasmā dhuranikkhepo
tika-vin01t2:478_3: kato, tasmā tassa adinnaṃ gahetuṃ na vaṭṭati. Avahārakopi vippaṭisārassa uppannakālato
tika-vin01t2:478_4: paṭṭhāya cīvarasāmikaṃ pariyesanto vicarati “dassāmī”ti, cīvarasāmikena ca “mameta”nti
tika-vin01t2:478_5: vutte etenapi avahārakena ālayo pariccatto, tasmā evamāha. Yadi evaṃ cīvarasāmikoyeva
tika-vin01t2:478_6: “attano santakaṃ gaṇhāhī”ti kasmā na vuttoti? Ubhinnampi kukkuccavinodanatthaṃ. Kathaṃ?
tika-vin01t2:478_7: Avahārakassa “mayā sahatthena na dinnaṃ, bhaṇḍadeyyameta”nti kukkuccaṃ uppajjeyya,
tika-vin01t2:478_8: itarassa “mayā paṭhamaṃ dhuranikkhepaṃ katvā pacchā adinnaṃ gahita”nti kukkuccaṃ uppajjeyyāti.
tika-vin01t2:479: Samagghanti appagghaṃ. Dāruatthaṃ pharatīti dārūhi kattabbakiccaṃ sādheti. Mayi santetiādi sabbaṃ raññā pasādena vuttaṃ, “therena pana ananucchavikaṃ kata”nti na maññitabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:480: Ekadivasaṃ dantakaṭṭhacchedanādinā yā ayaṃ agghahāni vuttā, sā sabbā bhaṇḍasāminā
tika-vin01t2:481_0: Kiṇitvā gahitameva sandhāya vuttā, sabbaṃ panetaṃ aṭṭhakathācariyappamāṇena gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:481_1: Pāsāṇañca sakkharañca pāsāṇasakkharaṃ. Dhāreyyatthaṃ vicakkhaṇoti imasseva vivaraṇaṃ
tika-vin01t2:483_0: Akkhadassāti ettha akkha-saddena kira vinicchayasālā vuccati. Tattha nisīditvā vajjāvajjaṃ
tika-vin01t2:483_1: passantīti akkhadassā vuccanti dhammavinicchanakā. Haneyyunti ettha hananaṃ nāma
tika-vin01t2:483_2: hatthapādādīhi pothanañceva sīsādicchedanañca hotīti āha – “haneyyunti potheyyuñceva
tika-vin01t2:483_3: chindeyyuñcā”ti. Teneva padabhājaniyañca “hatthena vā pādena vā kasāya vā vettena
tika-vin01t2:483_4: vā aḍḍhadaṇḍakena vā chejjāya vā haneyyu”nti vuttaṃ. Tattha aḍḍhadaṇḍakenāti dvihatthappamāṇena
tika-vin01t2:483_5: rassamuggarena veḷupesikāya vā. Chejjāyāti hatthapādasīsādīnaṃ chedanena. Nīhareyyunti
tika-vin01t2:483_6: gāmanigamādito nīhareyyuṃ. Corosi…pe… thenosīti ettha “paribhāseyyu”nti padaṃ ajjhāharitvā
tika-vin01t2:483_7: attho veditabboti āha “corosīti evamādīni ca vatvā paribhāseyyu”nti.
tika-vin01t2:484_0: 93. Yaṃ taṃ bhaṇḍaṃ dassitanti sambandho. Yattha yattha ṭhitanti bhūmiādīsu yattha
tika-vin01t2:484_1: yattha ṭhitaṃ. Yathā yathā ādānaṃ gacchatīti bhūmiādīsu ṭhitaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ sabbaso aggahaṇepi
tika-vin01t2:486_0: 94. Phandāpeti, sabbattha dukkaṭamevāti ettha “uṭṭhahissāmī”ti phandāpetvā puna anuṭṭhahitvā
tika-vin01t2:486_1: tattheva sayantassapi aṅgapaccaṅgaṃ aphandāpetvā ekapayogena uṭṭhahantassapi dukkaṭamevāti
tika-vin01t2:486_2: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Aññasmiṃ vā gamanassa anupakāreti yathā dvārapidahane kumbhiṭṭhānagamanassa
tika-vin01t2:486_3: anupakārattā anāpatti, evaṃ aññasmiṃ vā gamanassa anupakāre kāyavacīkamme anāpatti.
tika-vin01t2:486_4: Vācāya vācāyāti ekekatthadīpikāya vācāya vācāya. Upaladdhoti ñāto. Puññāni ca karissāmāti
tika-vin01t2:486_5: ettha “musāvādaṃ katvā puññāni karissāmāti vadantassa dukkaṭamevā”ti tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu
tika-vin01t2:486_6: vuttaṃ, taṃ imasmiṃyeva padese aṭṭhakathāvacanena virujjhati. Tathā hi “yaṃ yaṃ vacanaṃ
tika-vin01t2:486_7: musā, tattha tattha pācittiya”nti ca “na hi adinnādānassa pubbapayoge pācittiyaṭṭhāne
tika-vin01t2:486_8: dukkaṭaṃ nāma atthī”ti ca vakkhati. Evaṃ pana vutte na virujjhati “musāvādaṃ katvā
tika-vin01t2:486_9: puññāni ca karissāmāti vadantassa pācittiyena saddhiṃ dukkaṭa”nti. Tathā hi “akappiyapathaviṃ
tika-vin01t2:486_10: khaṇantānaṃ dukkaṭehi saddhiṃ pācittiyānīti mahāpaccariyaṃ vutta”nti ca “yathā ca
tika-vin01t2:486_11: idha, evaṃ sabbattha pācittiyaṭṭhāne dukkaṭā na muccatī”ti ca vakkhati. Sace pana
tika-vin01t2:486_12: kusalacitto “puññāni karissāmā”ti vadati, anāpatti “buddhapūjaṃ vā dhammapūjaṃ vā
tika-vin01t2:486_13: saṅghabhattaṃ vā karissāmāti kusalaṃ uppādeti, kusalacittena gamane anāpattī”ti ca
tika-vin01t2:486_14: “yathā ca idha, evaṃ sabbattha atheyyacittassa anāpattī”ti ca vakkhamānattā.
tika-vin01t2:487_0: Pamādalikhitanti veditabbanti aparabhāge potthakāruḷhakāle pamajjitvā likhitanti
tika-vin01t2:487_1: veditabbaṃ. Pāḷiyaṃ sesaaṭṭhakathāsu ca “kudālaṃ vā piṭakaṃ vā”ti idameva dvayaṃ
tika-vin01t2:487_2: vatvā vāsipharasūnaṃ avuttattā tesampi saṅkhepaṭṭhakathādīsu āgatabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ
tika-vin01t2:487_4: saddhiṃ pācittiyānī”ti vuttaṃ. Tato paraṃ sabbakiriyāsūti bījaggahaṇato paraṃ kattabbakiriyāsu.
tika-vin01t2:487_5: Sabbaṃ purimanayenevāti yāva piṭakapariyosānā hatthavārapadavāresu dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:488_0: Therehi dassitanti pubbapayogasahapayogadukkaṭesu asammohatthaṃ samodhānetvā dhammasaṅgāhakattherehi
tika-vin01t2:488_1: dassitaṃ. “Sabbesampi dukkaṭānaṃ imesuyeva aṭṭhasu saṅgahetabbabhāvato itarehi sattahi
tika-vin01t2:488_2: dukkaṭehi vinimuttaṃ vinayadukkaṭeyeva saṅgahetabba”nti vadanti. Dasavidhaṃ ratananti
tika-vin01t2:488_3: “muttā maṇi veḷuriyo saṅkho silā pavāḷaṃ rajataṃ jātarūpaṃ lohitaṅgo masāragalla”nti
tika-vin01t2:494_0: Sattavidhaṃ dhaññanti sāli vīhi yavo kaṅgu kudrūso varako godhumoti idaṃ sattavidhaṃ
tika-vin01t2:494_1: dhaññaṃ. Āvudhabhaṇḍādinti ādi-saddena tūriyabhaṇḍaitthirūpādiṃ saṅgaṇhāti. Anāmasitabbe
tika-vin01t2:494_2: vatthumhi dukkaṭaṃ anāmāsadukkaṭaṃ. Durupaciṇṇadukkaṭanti “na kattabba”nti vāritassa
tika-vin01t2:494_3: katattā duṭṭhu āciṇṇaṃ caritanti durupaciṇṇaṃ, tasmiṃ dukkaṭaṃ durupaciṇṇadukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:494_4: Vinaye paññattaṃ dukkaṭaṃ vinayadukkaṭaṃ. “Saṅghabhedāya parakkamatī”ti sutvā taṃnivāraṇatthāya
tika-vin01t2:494_5: ñāte atthe avadantassa ñātadukkaṭaṃ. Ekādasa samanubhāsanā nāma bhikkhupātimokkhe
tika-vin01t2:494_6: cattāro yāvatatiyakā saṅghādisesā, ariṭṭhasikkhāpadanti pañca, bhikkhunīpātimokkhe
tika-vin01t2:494_7: ekaṃ yāvatatiyakaṃ pārājikaṃ, cattāro saṅghādisesā, caṇḍakāḷīsikkhāpadanti cha. Vassāvāsādiṃ
tika-vin01t2:494_8: paṭissuṇitvā na sampādentassa paṭissavanimittaṃ dukkaṭaṃ paṭissavadukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:496: Vinaye ceva ñāte ca, ñattiyā ca paṭissave;
tika-vin01t2:498_0: Sahapayogato paṭṭhāya cettha purimā purimā āpattiyo paṭippassambhantīti āha “atha
tika-vin01t2:498_1: dhuranikkhepaṃ akatvā”tiādi. Tattha “dhuranikkhepaṃ akatvā”ti vuttattā dhuranikkhepaṃ
tika-vin01t2:498_2: katvā khaṇantassa purimāpattiyo na paṭippassambhantīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Viyūhanadukkaṭaṃ
tika-vin01t2:498_3: paṭippassambhati, uddharaṇadukkaṭe patiṭṭhātīti idaṃ pāḷiyaṃ āgatānukkamena dassetuṃ
tika-vin01t2:498_4: vuttaṃ. Yadi pana paṃsuṃ uddharitvā saussāhova puna khaṇati, uddharaṇadukkaṭaṃ paṭippassambhati,
tika-vin01t2:499_0: Kataṃ karaṇaṃ kiriyāti atthato ekanti āha “virūpā sā kiriyā”ti. Idāni vuttamevatthaṃ
tika-vin01t2:499_1: parivārapāḷiyā nidassento “vuttampi ceta”ntiādimāha. Tattha aparaddhaṃ viraddhaṃ
tika-vin01t2:499_2: khalitanti sabbametaṃ yañca dukkaṭanti ettha vuttassa dukkaṭassa pariyāyavacanaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:499_3: Yañhi duṭṭhu kataṃ, virūpaṃ vā kataṃ, taṃ dukkaṭaṃ. Taṃ panetaṃ yathā satthārā vuttaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:499_4: evaṃ akatattā aparaddhaṃ, kusalaṃ virajjhitvā pavattattā viraddhaṃ, ariyavaṃsappaṭipadaṃ
tika-vin01t2:499_5: anāruḷhattā khalitaṃ. Yaṃ manusso kareti idaṃ panettha opammanidassanaṃ. Tassattho
tika-vin01t2:499_6: – yathā yaṃ loke manusso āvi vā yadi vā raho pāpaṃ karoti, taṃ dukkaṭanti pavedenti,
tika-vin01t2:499_7: evamidampi buddhapaṭikuṭṭhena lāmakabhāvena pāpaṃ, tasmā dukkaṭanti veditabbanti.
tika-vin01t2:500_0: Yathā dukkhā, kucchitā vā gati dugatīti vattabbe “duggatī”ti vuttaṃ, yathā ca kaṭukaṃ
tika-vin01t2:500_1: phalametassāti kaṭukaphalanti vattabbe “kaṭukapphala”nti vuttaṃ, evamidhāpi thūlattā
tika-vin01t2:500_2: accayattā ca thūlaccayanti vattabbe “thullaccaya”nti vuttanti dassetuṃ “samparāye
tika-vin01t2:500_3: ca duggatī”tiādimāha. Saṃyoge pana kate saṃyogaparassa rassattaṃ siddhamevāti manasi
tika-vin01t2:500_4: katvā “saṃyogabhāvo veditabbo”ti ettakameva vuttaṃ. Ekassa mūleti ekassa santike.
tika-vin01t2:500_5: Accayo tena samo natthīti desanāgāmīsu accayesu tena samo thūlo accayo natthi. Tenetaṃ
tika-vin01t2:500_6: iti vuccatīti thūlattā accayassa etaṃ thullaccayanti vuccatīti attho.
tika-vin01t2:501_0: “Sabbatthāpi āmasane dukkaṭaṃ phandāpane thullaccayañca visuṃ visuṃ theyyacittena
tika-vin01t2:501_1: āmasanaphandāpanapayogaṃ karontasseva hoti, ekapayogena gaṇhantassa pana uddhāre
tika-vin01t2:501_2: pārājikameva, na dukkaṭathullaccayānī”ti vadanti. Sahapayogaṃ pana akatvāti ettha
tika-vin01t2:501_3: “pubbapayoge āpannāpattīnaṃ paṭippassaddhiyā abhāvato sahapayogaṃ katvāpi lajjidhammaṃ
tika-vin01t2:501_4: okkantena pubbapayoge āpannāpattiyo desetabbā”ti tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ. Aṭṭhakathāvacanaṃ
tika-vin01t2:501_5: pana kate sahapayoge pubbapayoge āpannāpattīnampi paṭippassaddhiṃ dīpeti, aññathā
tika-vin01t2:501_6: “sahapayogaṃ pana akatvā”ti idaṃ visesanameva niratthakaṃ siyā. Yañca heṭṭhā vuttaṃ
tika-vin01t2:501_7: “sace panassa tatthajātake tiṇarukkhalatādimhi chinnepi lajjidhammo okkamati, saṃvaro
tika-vin01t2:501_8: uppajjati, chedanapaccayā dukkaṭaṃ desetvā muccatī”ti, tampi sahapayoge kate pubbapayoge
tika-vin01t2:501_9: āpannāpattīnaṃ paṭippassaddhimeva dīpeti sahapayoge chedanapaccayā āpannadukkaṭasseva
tika-vin01t2:501_10: desanāya vuttattā. Sahapayogato paṭṭhāyevāti ca idaṃ sahapayogaṃ pattassa tato pubbe
tika-vin01t2:501_11: āpannānaṃ pubbapayogāpattīnampi paṭippassaddhiṃ dīpeti. Tena hi ayamattho viññāyati
tika-vin01t2:501_12: “yāva sahapayogaṃ na pāpuṇāti, tāva pubbe āpannāpattīnaṃ paṭippassaddhi na hoti,
tika-vin01t2:501_13: sahapayogaṃ pattakālato pana paṭṭhāya tāsampi paṭippassaddhi hotī”ti, tasmā suṭṭhu
tika-vin01t2:502_0: Bahukāpi āpattiyo hontu, ekameva desetvā muccatīti etthāyamadhippāyo – sace khaṇanaviyūhanuddharaṇesu
tika-vin01t2:502_1: dasa dasa katvā āpattiyo āpannā, tāsu uddharaṇe dasa āpattiyo desetvā muccati visabhāgakiriyaṃ
tika-vin01t2:502_2: patvā purimāpurimāpattīnaṃ paṭippassaddhattāti. Jātivasena pana samānakiriyāya āpannāpattiyo
tika-vin01t2:502_3: ekattena gahetvā “ekameva desetvā”ti vuttaṃ, tasmā imināpi kurundaṭṭhakathāvacanena
tika-vin01t2:502_4: paṭhamaṃ mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttapurimāpattipaṭippassaddhimeva samatthayati, na pana
tika-vin01t2:502_5: ubhinnaṃ aṭṭhakathānaṃ atthato nānākaraṇaṃ atthi. Aparampettha pakāraṃ vaṇṇayanti
tika-vin01t2:502_7: patvā paṭippassambhantīti iminā adhippāyena ‘paṃsukhaṇanādīsu ca lajjidhamme uppanne
tika-vin01t2:502_8: bahukāpi āpattiyo hontu, ekameva desetvā muccatīti kurundaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vutta”’nti.
tika-vin01t2:502_9: “Evañca sati ‘bahukāpi āpattiyo hontū’ti na vattabbaṃ bhaveyya, vuttañca, tasmā visabhāgakiriyameva
tika-vin01t2:502_10: patvā purimāpattīnaṃ paṭippassaddhiṃ icchanteneva bahukāsupi āpattīsu ekameva desetvā
tika-vin01t2:502_11: muccatīti imasmiṃ ṭhāne visuṃyeveko desanākkamo dassito”tipi vadanti. Ayametesaṃ
tika-vin01t2:502_12: adhippāyo – yathā idha purimāpattīnaṃ paṭippassaddhi aṭṭhakathācariyappamāṇena gahitā,
tika-vin01t2:502_13: evaṃ bahukāsupi āpattīsu ekameva desetvā muccatīti idampi idha aṭṭhakathācariyappamāṇatoyeva
tika-vin01t2:502_14: veditabbaṃ. Yathā ca pāḷiyaṃ pācittiyaṭṭhānepi dukkaṭameva hotīti idha āveṇikaṃ katvā
tika-vin01t2:502_15: āpattiviseso dassito, evaṃ purimāpattīnaṃ paṭippassaddhiviseso ca desanāviseso ca
tika-vin01t2:503_0: Heṭṭhato osīdentoti “sāmikesu āgantvā apassitvā gatesu gaṇhissāmī”ti theyyacittena
tika-vin01t2:503_1: heṭṭhābhūmiyaṃ osīdento. Bundenāti kumbhiyā heṭṭhimatalena. Evaṃ ekaṭṭhāne ṭhitāya
tika-vin01t2:503_2: kumbhiyā ṭhānācāvanaṃ chahi ākārehi veditabbanti sambandho. Valayaṃ nīharati, pārājikanti
tika-vin01t2:503_3: ākāsagataṃ akatvā ghaṃsitvā nīharantassa chinnakoṭito nīhaṭamatte pārājikaṃ. Ito
tika-vin01t2:503_4: cito ca sāretīti ghaṃsantoyeva ākāsagataṃ akatvā sāreti.
tika-vin01t2:504_0: Chinnamatte pārājikanti avassaṃ ce patati, chinnamatte pārājikaṃ. Paricchedoti “pañcamāsakaṃ
tika-vin01t2:504_1: vā atirekapañcamāsakaṃ vā”ti vuttagaṇanaparicchedo. Apabyūhantoti “heṭṭhā ṭhitaṃ
tika-vin01t2:504_2: gaṇhissāmī”ti hatthena dvidhā karonto. Upaḍḍhakumbhiyanti upaḍḍhapuṇṇāya kumbhiyā.
tika-vin01t2:504_3: Nanu ca aṭṭhakathācariyappamāṇena saṅkhepaṭṭhakathādīsu vuttampi kasmā na gahetabbanti
tika-vin01t2:504_4: āha – “vinayavinicchaye hi āgate garuke ṭhātabba”nti. Vinayadhammatāti vinayagarukānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:504_5: dhammatā. Vinayagarukā hi vinayavinicchaye āgate garuke tiṭṭhanti. Vinayagarukatābyāpanatthañhi
tika-vin01t2:504_6: vinayagarukoyevettha vinaya-saddena vutto, vinayassa vā esā dhammatā tesaṃ garugāravaṭṭhānassa vinayavisayattā.
tika-vin01t2:505_0: Idāni saṅkhepaṭṭhakathādīsu vuttaṃ pāḷiyāpi na sametīti dassento āha “apicā”tiādi.
tika-vin01t2:505_1: Bhājananti pattādibhājanaṃ. Pattādiṃ apūretvā gaṇhantassa anuddhaṭepi mukhavaṭṭiparicchedo
tika-vin01t2:505_2: hoti, pūretvā gaṇhantassa pana uddharaṇakāle hotīti āha “mukhavaṭṭiparicchedena vā
tika-vin01t2:505_3: uddhārena vā”ti. Yadā pana telakumbhīādīsu telādīnaṃ abahubhāvato bhājanaṃ nimujjāpetvā
tika-vin01t2:505_4: gaṇhituṃ na sakkā hoti, tadā mukhavaṭṭiparicchedeneva hoti. Cikkananti thaddhaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:505_5: Ākaḍḍhanavikaḍḍhanayogganti ettha abhimukhaṃ kaḍḍhanaṃ ākaḍḍhanaṃ, parato kaḍḍhanaṃ
tika-vin01t2:505_6: vikaḍḍhanaṃ. Paṭinīharitunti attano bhājanato paṭinīharituṃ. Hatthato muttamatte
tika-vin01t2:505_8: “sacepi mariyādaṃ dubbalaṃ katvā sukkhataḷākassa udakanibbahanaṭṭhānaṃ udakaniddhamanatumbaṃ
tika-vin01t2:505_9: vā pidahati, aññato ca gamanamagge vā pāḷiṃ bandhati, sukkhamātikaṃ vā ujuṃ karoti,
tika-vin01t2:505_10: pacchā deve vuṭṭhe udakaṃ āgantvā mariyādaṃ bhindati, sabbattha bhaṇḍadeyya”nti vuttattā
tika-vin01t2:505_11: “taṃ pana tattheva sukkhataḷāke sukkhamātikāya ujukaraṇavinicchayena virujjhatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:506_0: Avahāralakkhaṇanti pañcavīsatiyā avahāresu ekampi avahāralakkhaṇaṃ, ṭhānācāvanapayogo
tika-vin01t2:506_1: eva vā. Uddhāreti kumbhiyā phuṭṭhaṭṭhānato kesaggamattepi uddhaṭe. Yuttanti ṭhānācāvanapayogasabbhāvato
tika-vin01t2:506_2: yuttaṃ. Saṅgopanatthāyāti iminā suddhacittataṃ dasseti. Palibujjhissatīti nivāressati.
tika-vin01t2:506_3: Vuttanayeneva pārājikanti hatthato muttamatteyeva pārājikaṃ. Suddhacittova uddharatīti
tika-vin01t2:506_4: kumbhiyaṃ telassa ākiraṇato puretarameva suddhacitto nikkhipitvā pacchā suddhacittova
tika-vin01t2:506_5: uddharati. Neva avahāroti theyyacittena avaharaṇapayogassa akatattā. Attano bhājanattā
tika-vin01t2:506_6: pana “na gīvā”ti vuttaṃ, anāpattimattameva vuttaṃ, na pana evaṃ vicāritanti adhippāyo.
tika-vin01t2:506_7: Atha vā anāpattimattameva vuttanti imināpi tattha “gīvā”ti vacanābhāvato “na gīvā”ti
tika-vin01t2:506_8: pubbe vuttamahāaṭṭhakathāvādameva patiṭṭhāpeti, pacchā dassitena kurundivādenapi
tika-vin01t2:506_9: mahāaṭṭhakathāvādova samatthito. Attano bhaṇḍanti telākiraṇato puretarameva attano
tika-vin01t2:506_10: kumbhiyaṃ suddhacittena ṭhapitaṃ pītatelaṃ attano parikkhāraṃ. Sammohaṭṭhānanti āpattivinicchayavasena sammohaṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:507_0: Bahigataṃ nāma hotīti tato paṭṭhāya telassa aṭṭhānabhāvato adhomukhabhāvato ca bahigataṃ
tika-vin01t2:507_1: nāma hoti. Anto paṭṭhāya chidde kariyamāne telassa nikkhamitvā gatagataṭṭhānaṃ bhājanasaṅkhyameva
tika-vin01t2:507_2: gacchatīti āha – “bāhirantato pādagghanake gaḷite pārājika”nti. Yathā tathā vā katassāti
tika-vin01t2:507_3: bāhirantato abbhantarato vā paṭṭhāya katassa. Majjhe ṭhapetvā katachiddeti majjhe
tika-vin01t2:507_4: thokaṃ kapālaṃ ṭhapetvā pacchā taṃ chindantena katachidde. “Mariyādacchedane anto
tika-vin01t2:507_5: ṭhatvā bahimukho chindanto bahi antena kāretabbo, bahi ṭhatvā antomukho chindanto
tika-vin01t2:507_6: anto antena kāretabbo, anto ca bahi ca chinditvā majjhe ṭhapetvā taṃ chindanto majjhena
tika-vin01t2:507_7: kāretabbo”ti vuttattā “taḷākassa ca mariyādabhedena sametī”ti vuttaṃ. Idamettha yuttanti
tika-vin01t2:507_8: anto ca bahi ca paṭṭhāya katachidde majjhena kāretabbo. Anto paṭṭhāya kate pana bāhirantena,
tika-vin01t2:507_9: bahi paṭṭhāya kate abbhantarena kāretabboti ayaṃ tippakāropi ettha vemaṭṭhachidde
tika-vin01t2:507_10: yutto. Udake katapayogassa abhāvato “ṭhānācāvanapayogassa abhāvā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:508_0: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ tāva vuttanti mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ. Patthinnassa khādanaṃ itarassa
tika-vin01t2:508_1: pānañca sappiādīnaṃ paribhogoti āha – “akhāditabbaṃ vā apātabbaṃ vā karotī”ti. Kathaṃ
tika-vin01t2:508_2: pana tathā karotīti āha “uccāraṃ vā passāvaṃ vā”tiādi. Kasmā panettha dukkaṭaṃ vuttanti
tika-vin01t2:508_3: āha “ṭhānācāvanassa natthitāya dukkaṭa”nti. Purimadvayanti bhedanaṃ chaḍḍanañca.
tika-vin01t2:508_4: Kasmā na sametīti āha “tañhī”tiādi. Kumbhijajjarakaraṇenāti puṇṇakumbhiyā jajjarakaraṇena.
tika-vin01t2:508_5: Mātikāujaukaraṇenāti udakapuṇṇāya mātikāya ujukaraṇena. Ekalakkhaṇanti bhedanaṃ kumbhijajjarakaraṇena
tika-vin01t2:508_6: chaḍḍanaṃ mātikāya ujukaraṇena saddhiṃ ekasabhāvaṃ ṭhānācāvanapayogasabbhāvato. Pacchimaṃ
tika-vin01t2:509_0: Ettha evaṃ vinicchayaṃ vadantīti ettha mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vutte eke ācariyā evaṃ vinicchayaṃ
tika-vin01t2:509_1: vadanti. Pacchimadvayaṃ sandhāya vuttanti ettha purimadvaye vinicchayo heṭṭhā vuttānusārena
tika-vin01t2:509_2: sakkā viññātunti tattha kiñci avatvā pacchimadvayaṃ sandhāya ṭhānācāvanassa natthitāya
tika-vin01t2:509_3: dukkaṭanti idaṃ vuttanti adhippāyo. Theyyacittenāti attano vā parassa vā kātukāmatāvasena
tika-vin01t2:509_4: uppannatheyyacittena. Vināsetukāmatāyāti hatthapādādiṃ chindanto viya kevalaṃ vināsetukāmatāya.
tika-vin01t2:509_5: Purimadvaye kiṃ hoti, kiṃ adhippāyena na kiñci vuttanti āha – “purimadvaye pana…pe…
tika-vin01t2:509_6: pārājika”nti. Tattha vuttanayena bhindantassa vā chaḍḍentassa vāti muggarena pothetvā
tika-vin01t2:509_7: bhindantassa udakaṃ vā vālikaṃ vā ākiritvā uttarāpentassāti attho. Ayuttanti ceti
tika-vin01t2:509_8: pāḷiyaṃ purimapadadvayepi dukkaṭasseva vuttattā “purimadvaye…pe… pārājikanti idaṃ
tika-vin01t2:509_9: ayutta”nti yadi tumhākaṃ siyāti attho. Nāti ayuttabhāvappasaṅgaṃ nisedhetvā tattha
tika-vin01t2:509_10: kāraṇamāha “aññathā gahetabbatthato”ti. Kathaṃ panettha attho gahetabboti āha “pāḷiyaṃ
tika-vin01t2:509_11: hī”tiādi. Nāsetukāmatāpakkhe heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva atthassa avirujjhanato “theyyacittapakkhe”ti
tika-vin01t2:509_12: vuttaṃ. “Evaṃ vinicchayaṃ vadantī”ti ito paṭṭhāya vuttassa sabbassapi ekasseva vacanattā
tika-vin01t2:510_0: Idāni yathāvuttavasena pāḷiyā atthe gayhamāne mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ catunnampi sāmaññato
tika-vin01t2:510_1: vuttassa pacchimadvayaṃ sandhāya vuttanti vacane visesābhāvato pāḷiyaṃ vuttesu catūsu
tika-vin01t2:510_2: padesu “chaḍḍeti vā aparibhogaṃ vā karotī”ti imesaṃ padānaṃ visesābhāvappasaṅgato
tika-vin01t2:510_3: ca sayaṃ aññathā pāḷiṃ aṭṭhakathañca saṃsanditvā atthaṃ dassetukāmo “ayaṃ panettha
tika-vin01t2:510_4: sāro”tiādimāha. Vinītavatthumhi “saṅghassa puñjakitaṃ tiṇaṃ theyyacitto jhāpesī”si
tika-vin01t2:510_5: vuttattā vinītavatthumhi tiṇajjhāpako viyāti imināva ṭhānā acāvetukāmovāti etthāpi
tika-vin01t2:510_6: theyyacittena ṭhānā acāvetukāmoti idaṃ vuttameva hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Achaḍḍetukāmoyevāti
tika-vin01t2:510_7: etthāpi theyyacittenāti sambandhitabbaṃ. Idañhi theyyacittapakkhaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ
tika-vin01t2:510_9: yujjatīti theyyacittābhāvā ṭhānā cāvetukāmassapi dukkaṭaṃ yujjatīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin01t2:513_1: aggena. Pasāretīti gahaṇatthaṃ pasāreti. Aggahetvā vāti leḍḍuādīhi paharitvā nayanavasena
tika-vin01t2:513_2: aggahetvā vā. Ākāsaṭṭhavinicchaye vuccamānepi tappasaṅgena ākāsaṭṭhassa vehāsaṭṭhādibhāvamupagatepi
tika-vin01t2:513_3: asammohatthaṃ “yasmiṃ aṅge nilīyatī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Antovatthumhīti parikkhittavatthussa
tika-vin01t2:513_4: anto. Antogāmeti parikkhittassa gāmassa anto. Aparikkhitte pana vatthumhi, gāme vā
tika-vin01t2:513_5: ṭhitaṭṭhānameva ṭhānaṃ. Aṭavimukhaṃ karotīti araññābhimukhaṃ karoti. Rakkhatīti tena
tika-vin01t2:513_6: payogena tassa icchitaṭṭhānaṃ agatattā rakkhati. Bhūmiyā gacchantaṃ sandhāya “dutiyapadavāre
tika-vin01t2:513_7: vā”ti vuttaṃ. Gāmato nikkhantassāti parikkhittagāmato nikkhantassa. Kapiñjaro nāma ekā pakkhijāti.
tika-vin01t2:516_0: 97. Vehāsaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana cīvaravaṃse ṭhapitassa cīvarassa ākaḍḍhane yathāvuttappadesātikkamo
tika-vin01t2:516_2: pārājika”nti. Idañca tādisaṃ nātimahantaṃ cīvaravaṃsadaṇḍakaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, mahante
tika-vin01t2:516_3: pana tato adhikamattākaḍḍhaneneva siyā. Rajjukena bandhitvāti ekāya rajjukoṭiyā cīvaraṃ
tika-vin01t2:516_4: bandhitvā aparāya koṭiyā cīvaravaṃsaṃ bandhitvā ṭhapitacīvaraṃ. Muttamatte aṭṭhatvā
tika-vin01t2:517_0: Ekamekassa phuṭṭhokāsamatte atikkante pārājikanti bhittiṃ aphusāpetvā ṭhapitattā
tika-vin01t2:517_1: vuttaṃ. Bhittiṃ nissāya ṭhapitanti paṭipāṭiyā ṭhapitesu nāgadantādīsuyeva āropetvā
tika-vin01t2:517_2: bhittiṃ phusāpetvā ṭhapitaṃ. Paṇṇantaraṃ āropetvā ṭhapitāti aññehi ṭhapitaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:520_0: 98. Udakaṭṭhakathāyaṃ sandamānaudake nikkhittaṃ na tiṭṭhatīti āha “asandanake udake”ti.
tika-vin01t2:520_1: Anāpattīti hatthavārapadavāresu dukkaṭāpattiyā abhāvaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Kaḍḍhatīti
tika-vin01t2:520_2: heṭṭhato osāreti. Uppalādīsūti ādi-saddena padumapuṇḍarīkādiṃ saṅgaṇhāti. Rattaṃ
tika-vin01t2:520_3: padumaṃ, setaṃ puṇḍarīkaṃ. Setaṃ vā padumaṃ, rattaṃ puṇḍarīkaṃ. Atha vā rattaṃ vā
tika-vin01t2:520_4: hotu setaṃ vā satapattaṃ padumaṃ, ūnasatapattaṃ puṇḍarīkaṃ. Vatthu pūratīti pārājikavatthu
tika-vin01t2:520_5: pahoti. Tasmiṃ chinnamatte pārājikanti udakato accuggatassa udakavinimuttaṭṭhānato
tika-vin01t2:520_6: chedanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Yaṃ vatthuṃ pūretīti yaṃ pupphaṃ pārājikavatthuṃ pūreti.
tika-vin01t2:520_7: Dasahi pupphehi katakalāpo hatthako, mahantaṃ kalāpaṃ katvā baddhaṃ bhārabaddhaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:520_8: Rajjukesu tiṇāni santharitvāti ettha “dve rajjukāni udakapiṭṭhe ṭhapetvā tesaṃ upari
tika-vin01t2:520_9: tiriyato tiṇāni santharitvā tesaṃ upari bandhitvā vā abandhitvā vā tiriyatoyeva pupphāni
tika-vin01t2:520_10: ṭhapetvā heṭṭhato gatāni dve rajjukāni ukkhipitvā pupphamatthake ṭhapentī”ti vadanti.
tika-vin01t2:521_0: Kesaggamattampi yathāṭhitaṭṭhānato cāvetīti pārimantena phuṭṭhokāsaṃ, orimantena
tika-vin01t2:521_1: kesaggamattaṃ cāveti. Sakalamudakanti daṇḍena phuṭṭhokāsagataṃ sakalamudakaṃ. Na
tika-vin01t2:521_2: udakaṃ ṭhānanti attanā kataṭṭhānassa aṭṭhānattā. Idaṃ ubhayanti ettha “bandhanaṃ
tika-vin01t2:521_4: idaṃ dutiyaṃ. Paduminiyanti padumagacche. Uppāṭitāyāti parehi attano atthāya uppāṭitāya.
tika-vin01t2:522: Bahi ṭhapiteti udakato bahi ṭhapite. Hatthakavasena khuddakaṃ katvā
tika-vin01t2:523_0: Baddhaṃ kalāpabaddhaṃ. Muḷālanti kandaṃ. Pattaṃ vā pupphaṃ vāti idaṃ kaddamassa anto
tika-vin01t2:523_1: pavisitvā ṭhitaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Sakalamudakanti vāpiādīsu pariyāpannaṃ sakalamudakaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:523_2: Niddhamanatumbanti vāpiyā udakassa nikkhamanamaggaṃ. Udakavāhakanti mahāmātikaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:523_3: Na avahāroti idaṃ pubbasadisaṃ na hotīti āha – “kasmā…pe… evarūpā hi tattha katikā”ti.
tika-vin01t2:523_4: Avahāro natthīti sabbasādhāraṇe apariggahaṭṭhāne gahitattā. Mātikaṃ āropetvāti khuddakamātikaṃ
tika-vin01t2:523_5: āropetvā. Maritvā…pe… tiṭṭhantīti ettha “matamacchānaṃyeva tesaṃ santakattā amate
tika-vin01t2:526_0: 99. Nāvaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana yā bandhanā muttamatte ṭhānā na cavatīti iminā caṇḍasote
tika-vin01t2:526_1: baddhanāvaṃ paṭikkhipati. Tāva dukkaṭanti “bandhanaṃ moceti, āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti
tika-vin01t2:526_2: evaṃ mocentassa paññattaṃ dukkaṭaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Thullaccayampi pārājikampi hotīti
tika-vin01t2:526_3: ettha paṭhamaṃ ṭhānā acāvetvā mutte thullaccayaṃ, paṭhamaṃ ṭhānā cāvetvā mutte pārājikanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:527_0: “Pāse baddhasūkaro viyā”tiādinā vuttaṃ sandhāyāha “tattha yutti pubbe vuttā evā”ti.
tika-vin01t2:527_1: Vippanaṭṭhā nāvāti visamavātādīhi vināsaṃ patvā udake nimujjitvā heṭṭhā bhūmitalaṃ
tika-vin01t2:527_2: appatvā majjhe ṭhitaṃ sandhāya vadati. Teneva “adho vā opilāpentassa…pe… nāvātalena
tika-vin01t2:527_3: phuṭṭhokāsaṃ mukhavaṭṭiṃ atikkantamatte pārājika”nti vuttaṃ. Opilāpentassāti osīdāpentassa.
tika-vin01t2:527_4: Atikkantamatteti phuṭṭhokāsaṃ atikkantamatte. Eseva nayoti muttamatte pārājikanti dasseti.
tika-vin01t2:529_0: Asatipi vāte yathā vātaṃ gaṇhāti, tathā ṭhapitattā “vātaṃ gaṇhāpetī”ti vuttaṃ. Balavā
tika-vin01t2:529_1: ca vāto āgammāti iminā asati vāte ayaṃ payogo katoti dasseti. Teneva “puggalassa
tika-vin01t2:529_2: natthi avahāro”ti vuttaṃ. Sati pana vāte kato payogo ṭhānācāvanapayogoyevāti mātikāujukaraṇe
tika-vin01t2:529_3: viya attheva avahāroti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Ṭhānācāvanapayogo na hotīti sukkhamātikāujukaraṇe
tika-vin01t2:529_4: viya asati vāte katapayogattā. Bhaṇḍadeyyaṃ pana hotīti nāvāsāmikassa bhaṇḍadeyyaṃ hoti.
tika-vin01t2:532_0: 100. Yānaṭṭhakathāyaṃ dukayuttassāti dvīhi goṇehi yuttassa. Ayuttakanti goṇehi ayuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:532_1: Kappakatāti yathā dvīhi bhāgehi heṭṭhā patiṭṭhāti, evaṃ katā. Tīṇi vā cattāri vā
tika-vin01t2:532_2: ṭhānānīti akappakatāya upatthambhaniyā vasena tīṇi ṭhānāni, kappakatāya vasena cattāri
tika-vin01t2:532_3: ṭhānānīti. Tathā pathaviyaṃ ṭhapitassa tīṇi ṭhānānīti sambandho. Tanti phalakassa
tika-vin01t2:532_4: vā dārukassa vā upari ṭhapitaṃ pathaviyaṃ ṭhapitañca. Dvīhi akkhasīsehīti dvīhi akkhakoṭīhi.
tika-vin01t2:532_5: Dārūnaṃ upari ṭhapitassāti dvinnaṃ dārūnaṃ upari dvīhi akkhakoṭīhi olambetvā sakaṭasālāyaṃ
tika-vin01t2:532_6: ṭhapitassa. Heṭṭhimatalassāti sakaṭabāhāya bhūmiṃ phusitvā ṭhitassa heṭṭhimabhāgassa.
tika-vin01t2:532_7: Sesaṃ nāvāyaṃ vuttasadisanti iminā “yadi pana taṃ evaṃ gacchantaṃ pakatigamanaṃ upacchinditvā
tika-vin01t2:532_8: aññaṃ disābhāgaṃ neti, pārājikaṃ. Sayameva yaṃ kañci gāmaṃ sampattaṃ ṭhānā acāventova
tika-vin01t2:532_9: vikkiṇitvā gacchati, nevatthi avahāro, bhaṇḍadeyyaṃ pana hotī”ti imaṃ nayaṃ atidissati.
tika-vin01t2:535_0: 101. Bhāraṭṭhakathāyaṃ purimagale galavāṭakoti purimagale uparimagalavāṭako. Uraparicchedamajjheti
tika-vin01t2:535_1: urapariyantassa majjhe. Anāṇattattāti “asukaṭṭhānaṃ nehī”ti anāṇattattā. Yo cāyaṃ
tika-vin01t2:535_2: sīsabhāre vuttoti yo cāyaṃ vinicchayo sīsabhāre vutto. Sīsādīhi vā gahito hotūti
tika-vin01t2:538_0: 102. Ārāmaṭṭhakathāyaṃ bandhananti pupphānaṃ vaṇṭe patiṭṭhitaṭṭhānaṃ. Abhiyuñjatīti
tika-vin01t2:538_1: codeti aḍḍaṃ karoti. Adinnādānassa payogattāti sahapayogamāha vatthumhiyeva katapayogattā.
tika-vin01t2:538_2: Sahapayogavasena hetaṃ dukkaṭaṃ. Vinicchayappasutanti vinicchaye niyuttaṃ. Kakkhaḷoti
tika-vin01t2:538_3: dāruṇo. Dhuraṃ nikkhipatīti ussāhaṃ ṭhapeti, attano santakakaraṇe nirussāho hotīti
tika-vin01t2:538_4: attho. Kūṭaḍḍakārakopi sace dhuraṃ na nikkhipati, natthi avahāroti āha “sace sayampi
tika-vin01t2:538_5: katadhuranikkhepo hotī”ti. Sayampīti abhiyuñjakopi. Katadhuranikkhepoti “na dāni
tika-vin01t2:538_6: naṃ imassa dassāmī”ti evaṃ tassa dāne katadhuranikkhepo. Kiṅkārappaṭissāvibhāveti
tika-vin01t2:538_7: “kiṃ karomi kiṃ karomī”ti evaṃ kiṅkārameva paṭissuṇanto vicaratīti kiṅkārapaṭissāvī,
tika-vin01t2:538_8: tassa bhāvo kiṅkārapaṭissāvibhāvo, tasmiṃ, attano vasavattibhāveti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin01t2:539_0: Ukkocaṃ datvāti lañjaṃ datvā. Kūṭavinicchayikānanti kūṭavinicchaye niyuttānaṃ vinayadharānaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:539_1: “Gaṇhā”ti avatvā “asāmikassa sāmiko aya”ntiādinā pariyāyena vuttepi tassa santakabhāvaṃ
tika-vin01t2:539_2: paricchinditvā pavattavacanattā kūṭavinicchayaṃ karontānaṃ kūṭasakkhīnañca pārājikameva.
tika-vin01t2:539_3: Asatipi cettha ṭhānācāvane ubhinnaṃ dhuranikkhepoyeva ṭhānācāvanaṭṭhāne tiṭṭhati.
tika-vin01t2:539_4: Imasmiṃ dhuranikkhepe pārājike sāmikassa vimatuppādanapayoge kate thullaccayaṃ, tasseva
tika-vin01t2:539_5: dhuranikkhepapayoge nipphādite pārājikaṃ. Sayaṃ parājayaṃ pāpuṇātīti kūṭaḍḍakārako parājayaṃ pāpuṇāti.
tika-vin01t2:542_0: 103. Vihāraṭṭhakathāyaṃ vihāropi pariveṇampi āvāsopi vihārotveva saṅkhaṃ gacchatīti
tika-vin01t2:542_1: āha “vihāraṃ vā”tiādi. Tattha vihāranti mahāvihāraṃ. Pariveṇanti mahāvihārassa abbhantare
tika-vin01t2:542_2: visuṃ visuṃ pākāraparicchinnaṭṭhānaṃ. Āvāsanti ekaṃ āvasathaṃ. Abhiyoge katepi avahārassa
tika-vin01t2:542_3: asijjhanato vuttaṃ “abhiyogo na ruhatī”ti. Gaṇasantake pana paricchinnasāmikattā
tika-vin01t2:542_4: sakkā dhuraṃ nikkhipāpetunti āha “dīghabhāṇakādibhedassa pana gaṇassā”ti. Idhāpi
tika-vin01t2:542_5: sace ekopi dhuraṃ na nikkhipati, rakkhatiyeva. Sabbesaṃ dhuranikkhepeneva hi pārājikaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:545_1: vasena satta dhaññāni. Nirumbhitvā vātiādīsu “gaṇhantassā”ti paccekaṃ yojetabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:545_2: Tattha nirumbhitvā gahaṇaṃ nāma vīhisīsaṃ acchinditvā yathāṭhitameva hatthena gahetvā
tika-vin01t2:545_3: ākaḍḍhitvā bījamattasseva gahaṇaṃ. Ekamekanti ekamekaṃ vīhisīsaṃ. Uppāṭetvā vāti
tika-vin01t2:545_4: muggamāsādīni uddharitvā vā. Yasmiṃ bīje vātiādi nirumbhitvā gahaṇādīsu yathākkamaṃ
tika-vin01t2:545_5: yojetabbaṃ. Sālisīsādīni nirumbhitvā gaṇhantassa yasmiṃ bīje vatthu pūrati, ekamekaṃ
tika-vin01t2:545_6: hattheneva chinditvā gaṇhantassa yasmiṃ sīse vatthu pūrati, asitena lāyitvā gaṇhantassa
tika-vin01t2:545_7: yassaṃ muṭṭhiyaṃ vatthu pūrati, bahūni ekato uppāṭetvā gaṇhantassa yasmiṃ muggamāsādiphale
tika-vin01t2:545_8: vatthu pūratīti evamettha yathākkamo veditabbo. “Tasmiṃ bandhanā mocitamatte”ti vacanato
tika-vin01t2:545_9: tasmiṃ bījādimhi bandhanā mocite sati tato anapanītepi pārājikamevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:545_10: Acchijjamānoti acchinno hutvā ṭhito. Jaṭitānīti chinditāni acchinnehi saddhiṃ jaṭitāni
tika-vin01t2:545_11: hontīti attho. Sabhusanti palālasahitaṃ. Abhusanti palālarahitaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:546_0: Khīlenāti khāṇukena. Ettha ca khīlasaṅkamanādīsu ubhayaṃ sambhavati sahapayogo dhuranikkhepo
tika-vin01t2:546_1: ca. Yadā hi parassa khettādīsu ekadesaṃ khīlasaṅkamanādivasena attano santakaṃ karoti,
tika-vin01t2:546_2: tadā satipi paṭhamataraṃ sāmikānaṃ dhuranikkhepe khīlasaṅkamanādisahapayogaṃ vinā
tika-vin01t2:546_3: na hotīti sahapayogeneva pārājikaṃ. Teneva mātikāṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ “ṭhānācāvanavasena
tika-vin01t2:546_4: khīlādīni saṅkāmetvā khettādiggahaṇavasena ca sahapayogo veditabbo”ti. Yadā pana
tika-vin01t2:546_5: asati dhuranikkhepe khīlasaṅkamanādimattaṃ kataṃ, tadā vinā dhuranikkhepena na hotīti
tika-vin01t2:546_6: dhuranikkhepeneva pārājikaṃ. Tenevettha “tañca kho sāmikānaṃ dhuranikkhepenā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:547_0: Yaṭṭhinti mānadaṇḍaṃ. Ekasmiṃ anāgate thullaccayaṃ, tasmiṃ āgate pārājikanti ettha
tika-vin01t2:547_1: sace dārūni nikhaṇitvā tattakeneva gaṇhitukāmo hoti, avasāne dārumhi pārājikaṃ. Sace
tika-vin01t2:547_2: tattha sākhāyopi katvā gahetukāmo hoti, avasānasākhāya pārājikanti veditabbaṃ. Tattakena
tika-vin01t2:547_3: asakkontoti dārūni nikhaṇitvā vatiṃ kātuṃ asakkonto. Khettamariyādanti vuttamevatthaṃ
tika-vin01t2:547_4: vibhāvetuṃ “kedārapāḷi”nti vuttaṃ. Vitthataṃ karotīti pubbe vijjamānameva mariyādaṃ
tika-vin01t2:547_5: vitthiṇṇaṃ karoti. Akataṃ vā pana patiṭṭhapetīti pubbe akataṃ vā mariyādaṃ ṭhapeti.
tika-vin01t2:550_0: 105. Vatthuṭṭhakathāyaṃ tiṇṇaṃ pākārānanti iṭṭhakasilādārūnaṃ vasena tiṇṇaṃ pākārānaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:550_1: Eteneva nayenāti iminā “kevalaṃ bhūmiṃ sodhetvā…pe… aparikkhipitvā vā”ti vuttamatthaṃ nidasseti.
tika-vin01t2:552: 106. Gāmaṭṭhakathāyaṃ gāmo nāmāti pāḷiyaṃ na vuttaṃ sabbaso gāmalakkhaṇassa pubbe vuttattā.
tika-vin01t2:554_0: 107. Araññaṭṭhakathāyaṃ araññaṃ nāmāti idaṃ pana na kevalaṃ pubbe vuttaaraññalakkhaṇappattimattena
tika-vin01t2:554_1: araññaṃ idhādhippetaṃ, kintu yaṃ attano araññalakkhaṇena araññaṃ parapariggahitañca
tika-vin01t2:554_2: hoti, taṃ araññaṃ idhādhippetanti dassetuṃ vuttaṃ. Tenāti puna araññavacanena. Na
tika-vin01t2:554_3: pariggahitabhāvo araññassa lakkhaṇanti yadi hi pariggahitabhāvo araññalakkhaṇaṃ siyā,
tika-vin01t2:554_4: “araññaṃ nāma yaṃ manussānaṃ pariggahita”nti ettakameva vadeyyāti adhippāyo. Yanti
tika-vin01t2:554_5: iminā pubbe vuttalakkhaṇameva araññaṃ parāmaṭṭhanti āha “yaṃ pana attano araññalakkhaṇena arañña”nti.
tika-vin01t2:555_0: Vinivijjhitvāti ujukameva vinivijjhitvā. Paṇṇaṃ vāti tālapaṇṇādi paṇṇaṃ vā. Addhagatopīti
tika-vin01t2:555_1: cirakālaṃ tattheva ṭhitopi. Na gahetabboti ettha pana yo parehi araññasāmikānaṃ hatthato
tika-vin01t2:555_2: kiṇitvā tacchetvā tattheva ṭhapito, so araññasāmikena anuññātopi na gahetabbo. Sāmikehi
tika-vin01t2:555_3: chaḍḍitoti gahetuṃ vaṭṭatīti paṃsukūlasaññāya gahaṇaṃ vuttaṃ. Lakkhaṇacchinnassāpīti
tika-vin01t2:555_4: araññasāmikānaṃ hatthato kiṇitvā gaṇhantehi katasaññāṇassa. Challiyā pariyonaddhaṃ
tika-vin01t2:555_5: hotīti iminā sāmikānaṃ nirapekkhataṃ dīpeti. Tena vuttaṃ “gahetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti. Yadi
tika-vin01t2:555_6: sāmikānaṃ sāpekkhatā atthi, na vaṭṭati. Tāni katāni ajjhāvutthāni ca hontīti tāni
tika-vin01t2:555_7: gehādīni katāni pariniṭṭhitāni manussehi ca ajjhāvutthāni honti. Dārūnipīti gehādīnaṃ
tika-vin01t2:555_8: katattā tato avasiṭṭhadārūnipi. Etesanti etesaṃ yathāvuttadārūnaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:556_0: Tesaṃ ārakkhaṭṭhānanti tesaṃ araññapālānaṃ ṭhitaṭṭhānaṃ. Dehīti vutte dātabbamevāti
tika-vin01t2:556_1: ettha “dehī”ti vutte “dassāmī”ti ābhogasabbhāvato “dehī”ti avutte adatvāpi gantuṃ
tika-vin01t2:556_2: vaṭṭatiyeva. Gantuṃ dethāti gamanaṃ detha. Adisvā gacchati, bhaṇḍadeyyanti parisuddhacittena
tika-vin01t2:556_3: gacchati, bhaṇḍadeyyaṃ. Yattha katthaci nītānampi dārūnaṃ araññasāmikānaṃyeva santakattā
tika-vin01t2:556_4: suddhacittena nikkhantopi puna theyyacittaṃ uppādetvā gacchati, pārājikamevāti vadanti.
tika-vin01t2:559_0: 108. Udakakathāyaṃ mahākucchikā udakacāṭi udakamaṇiko. “Samekhalā cāṭi udakamaṇiko”tipi
tika-vin01t2:559_1: vadanti. Tatthāti tesu bhājanesu. Nibbahanaudakanti “mahodakaṃ āgantvā taḷākamariyādaṃ
tika-vin01t2:559_2: mā chindī”ti taḷākarakkhaṇatthaṃ tassa ekapassena vissajjitaudakaṃ. Niddhamanatumbanti
tika-vin01t2:559_3: sassādīnaṃ atthāya udakanikkhamanamaggaṃ. Mariyādaṃ dubbalaṃ katvāti idaṃ avassaṃ
tika-vin01t2:559_5: akatvāpi yathāvuttappayoge kate mariyādaṃ chinditvā nikkhantaudakagghānurūpena avahārena kāretabbameva.
tika-vin01t2:560_0: Aniggateti anikkhamitvā taḷākasmiṃyeva udake ṭhite. Asampattevāti taḷākato nikkhamitvā
tika-vin01t2:560_1: mahāmātikāya eva ṭhite. Anikkhanteti taḷākato anikkhante udake. Subaddhāti bhaṇḍadeyyampi
tika-vin01t2:560_2: na hotīti adhippāyo. Tenāha “nikkhante baddhā bhaṇḍadeyya”nti, taḷākato nikkhamitvā
tika-vin01t2:560_3: paresaṃ khuddakamātikāmukhaṃ apāpuṇitvā mahāmātikāyaṃyeva ṭhite baddhā ce, bhaṇḍadeyyanti
tika-vin01t2:560_4: attho. “Anikkhante baddhā subaddhā, nikkhante baddhā bhaṇḍadeyya”nti hi idaṃ dvayaṃ
tika-vin01t2:560_5: heṭṭhā vuttavikappadvayassa yathākkamena vuttaṃ. Natthi avahāroti ettha “avahāro
tika-vin01t2:560_6: natthi, bhaṇḍadeyyaṃ pana hotī”ti keci vadanti, taḷākagataudakassa sabbasādhāraṇattā
tika-vin01t2:560_7: taṃ ayuttaṃ viya dissati, “anikkhante baddhā subaddhā”ti iminā ca aṭṭhakathāvacanena
tika-vin01t2:560_8: na sameti. Vatthuṃ…pe… na sametīti ettha taḷākagataudakassa sabbasādhāraṇattā apariggahitaṃ
tika-vin01t2:563_0: 109. Dantakaṭṭhakathāyaṃ tato paṭṭhāya avahāro natthīti “yathāsukhaṃ bhikkhusaṅgho
tika-vin01t2:563_1: paribhuñjatū”ti yathāsukhaṃ paribhogatthāya ṭhapitattā vassaggena abhājetabbattā
tika-vin01t2:563_2: arakkhitabbattā sabbasādhāraṇattā ca aññaṃ saṅghikaṃ viya na hotīti theyyacittena
tika-vin01t2:563_3: gaṇhantassapi natthi avahāro. Vattanti dantakaṭṭhaggahaṇe vattaṃ. Idāni tadeva vattaṃ
tika-vin01t2:563_4: dassento “yo hī”tiādimāha. “Puna sāmaṇerā āharissantī”ti keci therā vadeyyunti yojetabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:566_0: 110. Vanappatikathāyaṃ “ujukameva tiṭṭhatīti rukkhabhārena kiñcideva bhassitvā ṭhitattā
tika-vin01t2:566_1: hotiyeva ṭhānācāvananti adhippāyena vutta”nti vadanti. Vātamukhaṃ sodhetīti yathā
tika-vin01t2:566_2: vāto āgantvā rukkhaṃ pāteti, evaṃ vātassa āgamanamaggaṃ rundhitvā ṭhitāni sākhāgumbādīni
tika-vin01t2:566_3: chinditvā apanento sodheti. “Maṇḍūkakaṇṭakaṃ vā visanti maṇḍūkānaṃ naṅguṭṭhe aggakoṭiyaṃ
tika-vin01t2:569_0: 111. Haraṇakakathāyaṃ haraṇakanti hariyamānaṃ. Abhimukhaṃ katvā kaḍḍhanaṃ ākaḍḍhanaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:569_1: sesadisākaḍḍhanaṃ vikaḍḍhanaṃ. Pādaṃ agghati, pārājikamevāti ettha antaṃ na gaṇhāmīti
tika-vin01t2:569_2: asallakkhitattā antassa ca gaṇhissāmīti sallakkhitasseva paṭassa ekadesattā pārājikaṃ
tika-vin01t2:569_3: vuttaṃ. Sahabhaṇḍahārakanti bhaṇḍahārakena saddhiṃ. Santajjetvāti dhanuādīhi santajjetvā.
tika-vin01t2:570: Soti bhaṇḍahārako. Anajjhāvutthakanti apariggahitakaṃ, asāmikanti attho.
tika-vin01t2:571_0: Āharāpente dātabbanti ettha “chaḍḍetvā dhuraṃ nikkhipitvā gatānampi nirālayānaṃ puna
tika-vin01t2:571_1: āharāpanassa vuttattā bhikkhūnampi attano santake parikkhāre acchinditvā parehi gahite
tika-vin01t2:571_2: tattha dhuranikkhepaṃ katvāpi puna taṃ balakkārenapi āharāpetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti desavāsino
tika-vin01t2:571_3: ācariyā vadanti, sīhaḷadīpavāsino pana taṃ keci ācariyā na icchanti. Teneva mahāgaṇṭhipade
tika-vin01t2:571_4: majjhimagaṇṭhipade ca vuttaṃ “amhākaṃ pana taṃ na ruccatī”ti. Aññesūti mahāpaccariādīsu.
tika-vin01t2:571_5: Vicāraṇā eva natthīti tatthāpi paṭikkhepābhāvato ayamevatthoti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin01t2:574_0: 112. Upanidhikathāyaṃ “saṅgopanatthāya attano hatthe nikkhittassa bhaṇḍassa guttaṭṭhāne
tika-vin01t2:574_1: paṭisāmanapayogaṃ vinā aññasmiṃ payoge akatepi rajjasaṅkhobhādikāle ‘na dāni tassa
tika-vin01t2:574_2: dassāmi, na mayhaṃ dāni dassatī’ti ubhohipi sakasakaṭṭhāne nisīditvā dhuranikkhepe
tika-vin01t2:574_3: kate pārājikameva paṭisāmanapayogassa katattā”ti vadanti. Attano hatthe nikkhittattāti
tika-vin01t2:574_4: ettha attano hatthe saṅgopanatthāya nikkhittakālato paṭṭhāya tappaṭibaddhattā ārakkhāya
tika-vin01t2:574_5: bhaṇḍasāmikaṭṭhāne ṭhitattā ṭhānassa ca tadāyattatāya ṭhānācāvanassa alabbhanato
tika-vin01t2:575_0: Dhammaṃ vācāpetvāti dhammaṃ kathāpetvā. Eseva nayoti uddhāreyeva pārājikaṃ. Kasmā?
tika-vin01t2:575_1: Aññehi asādhāraṇassa abhiññāṇassa vuttattā. “Aññaṃ tādisameva gaṇhante yujjatīti
tika-vin01t2:575_2: idaṃ saññāṇaṃ kathenteneva ‘asukasmiṃ ṭhāne’ti okāsassa ca niyamitattā tasmiṃ ṭhāne
tika-vin01t2:575_3: ṭhitaṃ pattaṃ apanetvā tasmiṃ okāse aññaṃ tādisameva pacchā ṭhapitaṃ pattaṃ sandhāya
tika-vin01t2:575_4: kathita”nti tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ. Corena sallakkhitapattassa gahaṇābhāvepi
tika-vin01t2:575_5: “idaṃ thenetvā gaṇhissāmī”ti tasmiṃ okāse ṭhite tādise vatthumatte tassa theyyacittasabbhāvato
tika-vin01t2:575_6: aññaṃ tādisameva gaṇhante yujjatīti corassa avahāro dassito. Padavārenāti therena
tika-vin01t2:575_7: nīharitvā dinnaṃ pattaṃ gahetvā gacchato corassa padavārena. Taṃ atādisameva gaṇhante
tika-vin01t2:575_8: yujjatīti “mamāyaṃ patto na hotī”ti vā “mayā kathito ayaṃ patto na hotī”ti vā jānitvā
tika-vin01t2:575_9: theyyacittena gaṇhantassa “idaṃ thenetvā gaṇhissāmī”ti vatthumatte theyyacittaṃ uppādetvā
tika-vin01t2:576_0: Gāmadvāranti samaṇasāruppaṃ vohāramattametaṃ, antogāmaṃ icceva vuttaṃ hoti. Vuttanayeneva
tika-vin01t2:576_1: therassa pārājikanti theyyacitteneva parasantakassa gahitattā uddhāreyeva therassa
tika-vin01t2:576_2: pārājikaṃ. Corassa dukkaṭanti asuddhacittena gahitattā gahitakāle corassa dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:576_3: Vuttanayeneva ubhinnampi dukkaṭanti corassa sāmikena dinnattā pārājikaṃ natthi, asuddhacittena
tika-vin01t2:576_4: gahitattā dukkaṭaṃ, therassa pana attano santakepi asuddhacittatāya dukkaṭanti.
tika-vin01t2:577_0: Āṇattiyā gahitattāti ettha “pattacīvaraṃ gaṇha, asukaṃ nāma gāmaṃ gantvā piṇḍāya
tika-vin01t2:577_1: carissāmā”ti evaṃ therena kataāṇattiyā vihārassa parabhāge upacārato paṭṭhāya yāva
tika-vin01t2:577_2: tassa gāmassa parato upacāro, tāva sabbaṃ khettameva jātanti adhippāyo. Maggato okkammāti
tika-vin01t2:577_3: ettha ubhinnaṃ sakaṭacakkamaggānaṃ antarāḷampi maggoyevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Aṭṭhatvā anisīditvāti
tika-vin01t2:577_4: ettha vihāraṃ pavisitvā sīsādīsu bhāraṃ bhūmiyaṃ anikkhipitvāva tiṭṭhanto nisīdanto
tika-vin01t2:577_5: vā vissamitvā theyyacitte vūpasante puna theyyacittaṃ uppādetvā gacchati ce, pāduddhārena
tika-vin01t2:577_6: kāretabbo. Sace bhūmiyaṃ nikkhipitvā puna taṃ gahetvā gacchati, uddhārena kāretabbo.
tika-vin01t2:577_7: Kasmā? Āṇāpakassa āṇattiyā yaṃ kattabbaṃ, tassa tāva pariniṭṭhitattā. Keci pana “purimasmiṃ
tika-vin01t2:577_8: theyyacitte avūpasantepi vuttanayeneva vissamitvā gacchato pāduddhārena uddhārena
tika-vin01t2:577_9: vā kāretabbo”ti vadanti, “asukaṃ nāma gāmanti aniyametvā ‘antogāmaṃ pavisissāmā’ti
tika-vin01t2:577_10: avisesena vutte vihārasāmantā sabbopi gocaragāmo khettamevā”tipi vadanti. Sesanti
tika-vin01t2:577_12: sāmikassa kathetvā gahitattā heṭṭhā vuttavihārūpacārādi sabbaṃ khettamevāti katvā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:578_0: Eseva nayoti “antarāmagge theyyacittaṃ uppādetvā”tiādinā vuttanayaṃ atidisati. Nimitte
tika-vin01t2:578_1: vā kateti “cīvaraṃ me kiliṭṭhaṃ, ko nu kho rajitvā dassatī”tiādinā nimitte kate.
tika-vin01t2:578_2: Vuttanayenevāti anāṇattassa therena saddhiṃ pattacīvaraṃ gahetvā gamanavāre vuttanayeneva.
tika-vin01t2:578_3: Ekapasse vāti vihārassa mahantatāya attānaṃ adassetvā ekasmiṃ passe vasanto vā. Theyyacittena
tika-vin01t2:578_4: paribhuñjanto jīrāpetīti theyyacitte uppanne ṭhānācāvanaṃ akatvā nivatthapārutanīhāreneva
tika-vin01t2:578_5: paribhuñjanto jīrāpeti, ṭhānā cāventassa pana theyyacitte sati pārājikameva sīse
tika-vin01t2:578_6: bhāraṃ khandhe karaṇādīsu viya. Yathā tathā vā nassatīti aggiādinā vā upacikādīhi
tika-vin01t2:579_0: Añño vā kocīti iminā pana yena ṭhapitaṃ, sopi saṅgahitoti veditabbaṃ. Tava thūlasāṭako
tika-vin01t2:579_1: laddhotiādinā musāvāde dukkaṭaṃ adinnādānapayogattā. Itaraṃ gaṇhato uddhāre pārājikanti
tika-vin01t2:579_2: ettha “pavisitvā tava sāṭakaṃ gaṇhāhī”ti imināva upanidhibhāvato muttattā sāmikassa
tika-vin01t2:579_3: itaraṃ gaṇhatopi attano sāṭake ālayassa sabbhāvato ca uddhāre pārājikaṃ vuttaṃ. Na
tika-vin01t2:579_4: jānantīti tena vuttaṃ vacanaṃ asuṇantā na jānanti. Eseva nayoti ettha sace jānitvāpi
tika-vin01t2:579_5: cittena na sampaṭicchanti, eseva nayoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Paṭikkhipantīti ettha cittena
tika-vin01t2:579_6: paṭikkhepopi saṅgahitovāti veditabbaṃ. Yācitā vā ayācitā vāti ettha yācitā yadi cittenapi
tika-vin01t2:579_7: sampaṭicchanti, naṭṭhe gīvā. Ayācitā pana yadipi cittena sampaṭicchanti, natthi gīvā.
tika-vin01t2:580_0: Gahetvā ṭhapetīti ettha cāletvā tasmiṃyeva ṭhāne ṭhapitepi naṭṭhe gīvā. Upacāre vijjamāneti
tika-vin01t2:580_1: bhaṇḍāgārassa samīpe uccārapassāvaṭṭhāne vijjamāne. Mayi ca mate saṅghassa ca senāsane
tika-vin01t2:580_2: vinaṭṭheti ettha “kevalaṃ saṅghassa senāsanaṃ mā nassīti imināva adhippāyena vivaritumpi
tika-vin01t2:580_3: vaṭṭatiyevā”ti vadanti. Sahāyehi bhavitabbanti tehipi kiñci kiñci dātabbanti vuttaṃ
tika-vin01t2:580_4: hoti. Ayaṃ sāmīcīti bhaṇḍāgāre vasantānaṃ idaṃ vattaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:581_0: Lolamahātheroti mando momūho hasitakīḷitappasuto vā mahāthero. Attano attano vasanagabbhesu
tika-vin01t2:581_1: sabhāgabhikkhūnaṃ parikkhāraṃ ṭhapentīti yojetabbaṃ. Itarehīti tasmiṃyeva gabbhe
tika-vin01t2:581_2: vasantehi itarabhikkhūhi. Vihāravāre niyutto vihāravāriko, vāraṃ katvā vihārarakkhaṇako.
tika-vin01t2:581_3: Nivāpanti bhattavetanaṃ. Paṭipathaṃ gatesūti corānaṃ āgamanaṃ ñatvā “paṭhamataraṃyeva
tika-vin01t2:581_4: gantvā saddaṃ karissāmā”ti corānaṃ abhimukhaṃ gatesu. Nissitake jaggentīti attano
tika-vin01t2:581_5: attano nissitake sikkhācariyāya posentāpi nissitake vihāraṃ jaggāpenti. “Asahāyassa
tika-vin01t2:581_6: adutiyassā”ti pāṭho yutto, pacchimaṃ purimasseva vevacanaṃ. Asahāyassa vā attadutiyassa
tika-vin01t2:581_7: vāti imasmiṃ pana pāṭhe ekena ānītaṃ dvinnaṃ nappahotīti attadutiyassapi vāro nivāritoti
tika-vin01t2:581_8: vadanti, taṃ “yassa sabhāgo bhikkhu bhattaṃ ānetvā dātā natthī”ti iminā na sametīti
tika-vin01t2:581_9: vīmaṃsitabbaṃ. Upajīvantena ṭhātabbanti abbhokāsikena rukkhamūlikenapi pākavaṭṭaṃ
tika-vin01t2:581_10: upanissāya jīvantena pattacīvararakkhaṇatthāya vihāravāre sampatte ṭhātabbaṃ. Paripucchanti
tika-vin01t2:581_11: pucchitapañhavissajjanaṃ aṭṭhakathaṃ vā. Diguṇanti vassaggena pāpitaṃ vināva dve
tika-vin01t2:584_0: 113. Suṅkaghātakathāyaṃ tato hanantīti tato nīharantā hananti. Tanti suṅkaṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:584_1: Yatoti yato nīhariyamānabhaṇḍato. Rājakanti rājāyattaṃ. Tampi rājārahamevāti āha
tika-vin01t2:584_2: “ayamevattho”ti. Itoti ito bhaṇḍato. Dutiyaṃ pādaṃ atikkāmetīti ettha “paṭhamaṃ pādaṃ
tika-vin01t2:584_3: paricchedato bahi ṭhapetvā dutiye pāde uddhaṭamatte pārājika”nti vadanti uddharitvā
tika-vin01t2:584_4: bahi aṭṭhapitopi bahi ṭhitoyeva nāma hotīti katvā. Yattha yattha padavārena āpatti
tika-vin01t2:584_5: kāretabbā, tattha tattha sabbatthāpi eseva nayoti vadanti. Suṅkaghātato bahi bahisuṅkaghātaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:584_6: Avassaṃ patanakanti avassaṃ suṅkaghātato bahi patanakaṃ. Pubbe vuttanayenevāti avassaṃ
tika-vin01t2:584_7: patanake hatthato muttamatteti vuttaṃ hoti. Vaṭṭantaṃ puna anto pavisatīti mahāaṭṭhakathāvacanassa
tika-vin01t2:584_8: kurundisaṅkhepaṭṭhakathāhi adhippāyo pakāsito. Anto ṭhatvā bahi gacchantaṃ rakkhatīti
tika-vin01t2:584_9: bhikkhuno payogena gamanavegassa antoyeva vūpasantattā. Parivattetvā abbhantarimaṃ
tika-vin01t2:584_10: bahi ṭhapetīti abbhantare ṭhitaṃ puṭakaṃ parivattetvā bahi ṭhapeti. Ettha ca “abbhantarime
tika-vin01t2:585_0: “Gacchante yāne vā…pe… ṭhapetīti suṅkaghātaṃ apavisitvā bahiyeva ṭhapetī”ti tīsupi
tika-vin01t2:585_1: gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ suṅkaṭṭhānassa bahi ṭhapitanti vakkhamānattā. Ācariyā pana “suṅkaṭṭhānassa
tika-vin01t2:585_2: bahi ṭhita”nti pāṭhaṃ vikappetvā “paṭhamaṃ antosuṅkaghātaṃ paviṭṭhesuyeva yānādīsu
tika-vin01t2:585_3: ṭhapitaṃ pacchā yānena saddhiṃ nīhaṭaṃ suṅkaghātassa bahi ṭhitaṃ, na ca tena nīta”nti
tika-vin01t2:585_4: atthaṃ vadanti. Ayaṃ pana tesaṃ adhippāyo – suṅkaṭṭhānassa anto paviṭṭhayānādīsu
tika-vin01t2:585_5: ṭhapitepi bhikkhussa payogaṃ vinā aññena nīhaṭattā nevatthi pārājikaṃ, “atra paviṭṭhassa
tika-vin01t2:585_6: suṅkaṃ gaṇhantū”ti vuttattā aññena nīhaṭassa bahi ṭhite bhaṇḍadeyyampi na hotīti.
tika-vin01t2:585_7: Ayameva ca nayo “vaṭṭitvā gamissatīti vā añño naṃ vaṭṭessatīti vā anto ṭhapitaṃ pacchā
tika-vin01t2:585_8: sayaṃ vā vaṭṭamānaṃ aññena vā vaṭṭitaṃ bahi gacchati, rakkhatiyevā”ti iminā vacanena
tika-vin01t2:585_9: sametīti yuttataro viya dissati. Suṅkaṭṭhānassa anto pavisitvā puna paccāgacchatopi
tika-vin01t2:585_10: tena passena paricchedaṃ atikkamantassa yadi tatopi gacchantānaṃ hatthato suṅkaṃ
tika-vin01t2:586_0: Hatthisuttādīsūti hatthisikkhādīsu. Imasmiṃ ṭhāneti yathāvuttayānādīhi vuttappakārena
tika-vin01t2:586_1: nīharaṇe. Anāpattīti tattha “sahatthā”ti vacanato aññena nīharāpentassa anāpatti.
tika-vin01t2:586_2: Idhāti imasmiṃ adinnādānasikkhāpade. Tatrāti tasmiṃ eḷakalomasikkhāpade. Hontīti
tika-vin01t2:586_3: ettha iti-saddo hetuattho, yasmā eḷakalomāni nissaggiyāni honti, tasmā pācittiyanti
tika-vin01t2:586_4: attho. Idha anāpattīti imasmiṃ sikkhāpade avahārābhāvā anāpatti. Upacāranti suṅkaghātaparicchedato
tika-vin01t2:586_5: bahi samantā dvinnaṃ leḍḍupātānaṃ abbhantaraṃ vatiāsannappadesasaṅkhātaṃ upacāraṃ.
tika-vin01t2:586_6: Tādisaṃ upacāraṃ okkamitvā pariharaṇe sādīnavattā dukkaṭaṃ vuttaṃ. Etthāti suṅkaghāte.
tika-vin01t2:586_7: “Dvīhi leḍḍupātehīti ayaṃ niyamo ācariyaparamparābhato”ti mahāgaṇṭhipade vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:589_0: 114. Pāṇakathāyaṃ tiracchānagatassa ekantena pādagghanakatā na sambhavatīti āha –
tika-vin01t2:589_1: “ekaṃsena avahārakappahonakapāṇaṃ dassento”ti. Bhujissaṃ harantassa avahāro natthīti
tika-vin01t2:589_2: parapariggahitābhāvato. Bhujissoti adāso. Āṭhapitoti mātāpitūhi iṇaṃ gaṇhantehi “yāva
tika-vin01t2:589_3: iṇadānā ayaṃ tumhākaṃ santike hotū”ti iṇadāyakānaṃ niyyātito. Yasmā mātāpitaro dāsānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:589_4: viya puttānaṃ na sāmino. Yesañca santike āṭhapito, tepi tassa hatthakamme sāmino,
tika-vin01t2:589_5: na tassāti āha “avahāro natthī”ti. Dhanaṃ pana gataṭṭhāne vaḍḍhatīti ettha “āṭhapetvā
tika-vin01t2:589_6: gahitadhanaṃ vaḍḍhiyā saha avahārakassa gīvā”ti tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:590_0: Antojāta…pe… avahāro hotīti ettha padesacārittavasena attanāva attānaṃ niyyātetvā
tika-vin01t2:590_1: dāsabyaṃ upagataṃ avaharantassapi pārājikamevāti veditabbaṃ. Gehadāsiyā kucchimhi
tika-vin01t2:590_2: dāsassa jātoti evampi sambhavatīti sambhavantaṃ gahetvā vuttaṃ. Gehadāsiyā kucchismiṃ
tika-vin01t2:590_3: pana aññassa jātopi ettheva saṅgahito. Karamarānīto nāma bandhagāhagahito. Tenāha
tika-vin01t2:590_4: “paradesato paharitvā”tiādi. Tattha paradesato paharitvāti paradesaṃ vilumpakehi
tika-vin01t2:590_5: rājarājamahāmattādīhi mahācorehi paradesato paharitvā. Anāpatti pārājikassāti yadi
tika-vin01t2:590_6: tassa vacanena tato adhikaṃ vegaṃ na vaḍḍheti, anāpatti. Pariyāyenāti pariyāyavacanena.
tika-vin01t2:590_7: Manussaviggahe “maraṇavaṇṇaṃ vā saṃvaṇṇeyyā”ti vuttattā pariyāyakathāyapi na muccati,
tika-vin01t2:590_8: idha pana “adinnaṃ theyyasaṅkhātaṃ ādiyeyyā”ti ādānasseva vuttattā pariyāyakathāya muccati.
tika-vin01t2:593: Apadakathāyaṃ nāmenāti sappanāmena vā sāmikena katanāmena vā. Karaṇḍapuṭanti peḷāya pidhānaṃ. Āhaccāti paharitvā.
tika-vin01t2:595_1: hatthipotakaṃ. Antovatthumhīti parikkhitte antovatthumhi. Rājaṅgaṇeti parikkhitte
tika-vin01t2:595_2: nagare vatthudvārato bahirājaṅgaṇe. Hatthisālā ṭhānanti nibbakosato udakapātabbhantaraṃ
tika-vin01t2:595_3: ṭhānaṃ. Bahinagare ṭhitassāti parikkhittanagaraṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, aparikkhittanagare
tika-vin01t2:595_4: pana antonagare ṭhitassapi ṭhitaṭṭhānameva ṭhānaṃ. Khaṇḍadvāranti attanā khaṇḍitadvāraṃ.
tika-vin01t2:595_5: Sākhābhaṅganti bhañjitasākhaṃ. Nipannassa dveti bandhanena saddhiṃ dve. Ghātetīti
tika-vin01t2:595_6: ettha “theyyacittena vināsentassa sahapayogattā dukkaṭameva, na pācittiya”nti ācariyā vadanti.
tika-vin01t2:598_0: Oṇirakkhakathāyaṃ oṇinti oṇītaṃ, ānītanti attho. “Oṇirakkhassa santike ṭhapitaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ
tika-vin01t2:598_1: upanidhi viya saṅgopanatthāya anikkhipitvā muhuttaṃ olokanatthāya ṭhapitattā tassa
tika-vin01t2:600_0: Saṃvidāvahārakathāyaṃ “sambahulā saṃvidahitvā eko bhaṇḍaṃ avaharati, āpatti sabbesaṃ
tika-vin01t2:600_1: pārājikassā”ti pāḷiyaṃ avisesena vuttattā āṇāpakānaṃ āṇattikkhaṇe āpatti, avahārakassa
tika-vin01t2:600_2: uddhāreti yathāsambhavaṃ yojetvā attho gahetabbo āṇattikathāyaṃ “so taṃ bhaṇḍaṃ avaharati,
tika-vin01t2:600_3: āpatti sabbesaṃ pārājikassā”tiādīsu viya. Etthāpi hi āṇāpakassa āṇattikkhaṇeyeva
tika-vin01t2:600_4: āpatti vuttā. Tathā ca vakkhati “atha taṃ bhaṇḍaṃ avassaṃ hāriyaṃ hoti, yaṃ parato
tika-vin01t2:600_5: sabbesaṃ āpatti pārājikassāti vuttaṃ, tato imassa taṅkhaṇeyeva pārājikaṃ hotīti ayaṃ
tika-vin01t2:600_6: yutti sabbattha veditabbā”ti. Saṃvidāvahāre ca “āṇatti natthī”ti na vattabbā “antevāsikesu
tika-vin01t2:600_7: ekamekassa ekeko māsako sāhatthiko hoti, pañca āṇattikā”ti vacanato. Āṇattiyā ca
tika-vin01t2:600_8: sati āṇāpakassa āṇattikkhaṇeyeva āpatti icchitabbā, na uddhāre.
tika-vin01t2:601_0: Yadi evaṃ “tesu eko bhaṇḍaṃ avaharati, tassuddhāre sabbesaṃ pārājika”nti kasmā vuttanti?
tika-vin01t2:601_1: Nāyaṃ doso. Ettha hi sabbesaṃyeva āpattidassanatthaṃ avahārakassapi āpattisambhavaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:601_2: dassento “tassuddhāre sabbesaṃ pārājika”nti āha, na pana āṇāpakānampi uddhāreyeva
tika-vin01t2:601_3: āpattidassanatthanti evamattho gahetabbo. “Sambahulā ekaṃ āṇāpenti ‘gacchetaṃ āharā’ti,
tika-vin01t2:601_4: tassuddhāre sabbesaṃ pārājika”ntiādīsupi evameva attho gahetabbo. Atha vā saṃvidāvahāre
tika-vin01t2:601_5: āṇāpakānampi uddhāreyeva āpatti, na āṇattikkhaṇeti āveṇikamidaṃ lakkhaṇanti aṭṭhakathācariyappamāṇena
tika-vin01t2:601_6: gahetabbaṃ, ito vā aññena pakārena yathā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pubbenāparaṃ na virujjhati,
tika-vin01t2:602_0: Saṃvidhāyāti saṃvidahitvā. Tena nesaṃ dukkaṭāpattiyoti āṇattivasena pārājikāpattiyā
tika-vin01t2:602_1: asambhave sati vuttaṃ. Yadi hi te āṇattā avassaṃ taṃ haranti, pārājikāpattiyeva nesaṃ
tika-vin01t2:602_2: daṭṭhabbā, na dukkaṭāpatti. Sāhatthikaṃ vā āṇattikassa āṇattikaṃ vā sāhatthikassa
tika-vin01t2:602_3: aṅgaṃ na hotīti bhinnakālavisayattā aññamaññassa aṅgaṃ na hoti. Tathā hi sahatthā
tika-vin01t2:602_4: avaharantassa ṭhānācāvane āpatti, āṇattiyā pana āṇattikkhaṇeyevāti bhinnakālavisayā
tika-vin01t2:605_1: vuttanayena. Pāḷiyaṃ taṃ saṅketaṃ pure vā pacchā vāti ettha taṃ saṅketanti sāmiatthe
tika-vin01t2:605_2: upayogavacananti daṭṭhabbaṃ, tassa saṅketassāti attho. Atha vā taṃ saṅketaṃ asampatvā
tika-vin01t2:605_3: pure vā taṃ saṅketaṃ atikkamma pacchā vāti evamettha yojanā veditabbā. Tenevāha –
tika-vin01t2:605_4: “ajjāti niyāmitaṃ taṃ saṅketaṃ atikkammā”tiādi. Taṃ nimittaṃ pure vā pacchā vāti
tika-vin01t2:608_0: 120. Nimittakammakathāyaṃ akkhinikhaṇādinimittakammaṃ pana lahukaṃ ittarakālaṃ, tasmā
tika-vin01t2:608_1: taṅkhaṇeyeva taṃ bhaṇḍaṃ avaharituṃ na sakkā. Tathā hi kiñci bhaṇḍaṃ dūre hoti kiñci
tika-vin01t2:608_2: bhāriyaṃ, taṃ gahetuṃ yāva gacchati, yāva ukkhipituṃ vāyamati, tāva nimittakammassa
tika-vin01t2:608_3: pacchā hoti. Evaṃ santepi nimittakammato paṭṭhāya gaṇhituṃ āraddhattā teneva nimittena
tika-vin01t2:608_4: avaharatīti vuccati. Yadi evaṃ “purebhattapayogova eso”ti vādo pamāṇabhāvaṃ āpajjatīti?
tika-vin01t2:608_5: Nāpajjati. Na hi saṅketakammaṃ viya nimittakammaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tattha hi kālaparicchedo
tika-vin01t2:608_6: atthi, idha natthi. Kālavasena hi saṅketakammaṃ vuttaṃ, kiriyāvasena nimittakammanti
tika-vin01t2:608_7: ayametesaṃ viseso. “Taṃ nimittaṃ pure vā pacchā vā taṃ bhaṇḍaṃ avaharati, mūlaṭṭhassa
tika-vin01t2:608_8: anāpattī”ti idaṃ pana tena nimittakamme kate gaṇhituṃ anārabhitvā sayameva gaṇhantassa vasena vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:611_0: 121. Āṇattikathāyaṃ asammohatthanti yasmā saṅketakammanimittakammāni karonto eko
tika-vin01t2:611_1: purebhattādīsu vā akkhinikhaṇanādīni vā disvā “gaṇhā”ti vadati, eko gahetabbabhaṇḍanissitaṃ
tika-vin01t2:611_2: katvā “purebhattaṃ evaṃvaṇṇasaṇṭhānaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ gaṇhā”ti vadati, eko “tvaṃ itthannāmassa
tika-vin01t2:611_3: pāvada, so aññassa pāvadatū”tiādinā puggalapaṭipāṭiyā ca āṇāpeti, tasmā kālavasena
tika-vin01t2:611_4: kiriyāvasena bhaṇḍavasena puggalavasena ca āṇatte visaṅketāvisaṅketavasena etesu
tika-vin01t2:611_5: saṅketakammanimittakammesu asammohatthaṃ. Nimittasaññaṃ katvāti “īdisaṃ nāma bhaṇḍa”nti
tika-vin01t2:612_0: Yathādhippāyaṃ gacchatīti dutiyo tatiyassa, tatiyo catutthassāti evaṃ paṭipāṭiyā
tika-vin01t2:612_1: ce vadantīti vuttaṃ hoti. Sace pana dutiyo catutthassa āroceti, na yathādhippāyaṃ
tika-vin01t2:612_2: āṇatti gatāti nevatthi thullaccayaṃ, paṭhamaṃ vuttadukkaṭameva hoti. Tadeva hotīti
tika-vin01t2:612_3: bhaṇḍaggahaṇaṃ vinā kevalaṃ sāsanappaṭiggahaṇamattasseva siddhattā tadeva thullaccayaṃ
tika-vin01t2:612_4: hoti, na dukkaṭaṃ nāpi pārājikanti attho. Sabbatthāti īdisesu sabbaṭṭhānesu.
tika-vin01t2:613_0: Tesampi dukkaṭanti ārocanapaccayā dukkaṭaṃ. Paṭiggahitamatteti ettha avassaṃ ce paṭiggaṇhāti,
tika-vin01t2:613_1: tato pubbeva ācariyassa thullaccayaṃ, na pana paṭiggahiteti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Kasmā panassa
tika-vin01t2:613_2: thullaccayanti āha – “mahājano hi tena pāpe niyojito”ti.
tika-vin01t2:614_0: Mūlaṭṭhasseva dukkaṭanti ayaṃ tāva aṭṭhakathānayo, ācariyā pana “visaṅketattā eva
tika-vin01t2:614_1: mūlaṭṭhassāti pāḷiyaṃ avuttattā paṭiggaṇhantasseva taṃ dukkaṭaṃ vuttaṃ, imināva heṭṭhā
tika-vin01t2:614_2: āgatavāresupi paṭiggaṇhantānaṃ paṭiggahaṇe dukkaṭaṃ veditabbaṃ, taṃ pana tattha okāsābhāvato
tika-vin01t2:615_0: Evaṃ puna āṇattiyāpi dukkaṭameva hotīti paṭhamaṃ atthasādhakattābhāvato vuttaṃ. Āṇattikkhaṇeyeva
tika-vin01t2:615_1: pārājikoti maggānantaraphalaṃ viya atthasādhikāṇatticetanākkhaṇeyeva pārājiko. Badhiratāyāti
tika-vin01t2:615_2: uccaṃ bhaṇanto badhiratāya vā na sāvetīti vuttaṃ hoti. “Āṇatto ahaṃ tayā”ti imasmiṃ
tika-vin01t2:615_3: vāre puna paṭikkhipitabbābhāvena atthasādhakattābhāvato mūlaṭṭhassa natthi pārājikaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:615_4: “Paṇṇe vā silāya vā yattha katthaci ‘coriyaṃ kātabba’nti likhitvā ṭhapite pārājikamevā”ti
tika-vin01t2:615_5: tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ. Taṃ pana yasmā adinnādānato pariyāyakathāya muccati,
tika-vin01t2:615_6: tasmā vīmaṃsitvā gahetabbaṃ. Yadi pana “asukasmiṃ nāma ṭhāne asukaṃ nāma bhaṇḍaṃ
tika-vin01t2:615_7: ṭhitaṃ, taṃ avaharā”ti paṇṇe likhitvā kassaci peseti, so ce taṃ bhaṇḍaṃ avaharati,
tika-vin01t2:615_8: āṇattiyā avahaṭaṃ nāma hotīti yuttaṃ āṇāpakassa pārājikaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:618_0: 122. Tattha tatthāti bhūmaṭṭhathalaṭṭhādīsu. Aṅgañca dassentoti yojetabbaṃ. Vatthubhedenāti
tika-vin01t2:618_2: vasena āpattibhedaṃ. Manussabhūtena parena pariggahitaṃ parapariggahitaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:619_0: 125. Na ca sakasaññīti iminā pana parapariggahitaṃ vatthu kathitaṃ. Na ca vissāsaggāhī,
tika-vin01t2:619_1: na ca tāvakālikanti iminā pana parapariggahitasaññā kathitā. Na vissāsaggāhitāti
tika-vin01t2:619_2: vissāsaggāhena aggahitabhāvo. Na tāvakālikatāti pacchā dātabbataṃ katvā aggahitabhāvo.
tika-vin01t2:619_4: Chaḍḍitanti kaṭṭhahārādīhi atibhārāditāya anatthikabhāvena araññādīsu chaḍḍitaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:619_5: Chinnamūlakanti naṭṭhaṃ pariyesitvā ālayasaṅkhātassa mūlassa chinnattā chinnamūlaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:619_6: Asāmikanti anajjhāvutthakādīhi tīhi ākārehi dassitaṃ asāmikavatthu. Ubhayampīti yathāvuttalakkhaṇaṃ
tika-vin01t2:622_0: 131. Yāya seyyāya sayito kālaṃ karoti, sā anuṭṭhānaseyyā nāma. “Cittena pana adhivāsetī”ti
tika-vin01t2:622_1: vuttamatthaṃ vibhāvetuṃ “na kiñci vadatī”ti vuttaṃ. Pākatikaṃ kātunti yattakaṃ gahitaṃ
tika-vin01t2:622_2: paribhuttaṃ vā, tattakaṃ dātabbanti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin01t2:623_0: Paṭidassāmīti yaṃ gahitaṃ, tadeva vā aññaṃ vā tādisaṃ puna dassāmīti attho. Saṅghasantake
tika-vin01t2:623_1: saṅghaṃ anujānāpetumasakkuṇeyyattā kassaci vatthuno ananujānitabbato ca “saṅghasantakaṃ
tika-vin01t2:624_0: Tasmiṃyeva attabhāve nibbattāpīti tasmiṃyeva matasarīre uppannāpi. Vinītavatthūsu
tika-vin01t2:624_1: sāṭakataṇhāya tasmiṃyeva matasarīre nibbattapeto viyāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Rukkhādīsu laggitasāṭake
tika-vin01t2:624_2: vattabbameva natthīti manussehi apariggahitaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Sace pana taṃ ārakkhakehi
tika-vin01t2:628_0: Dārukhaṇḍādīsu “bhāriyamidaṃ, tvaṃ ekapassaṃ ukkhipāhi, ahaṃ ekapassaṃ ukkhipāmī”ti
tika-vin01t2:628_1: ubhayesaṃ payogena ekassa vatthuno ṭhānācāvanaṃ sandhāya “sāhatthikāṇattika”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:628_2: Idañca kāyavācānaṃ īdise ṭhāne aṅgabhāvamattadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Yāya pana cetanāya
tika-vin01t2:628_3: samuṭṭhāpito payogo sāhatthiko āṇattiko vā padhānabhāvena ṭhānācāvanaṃ sādheti, tassā
tika-vin01t2:628_4: vasena āpatti kāretabbā. Aññathā sāhatthikaṃ vā āṇattikassa aṅgaṃ na hoti, āṇattikaṃ
tika-vin01t2:631_0: 132. Vinītavatthūsu sandhāvatīti suṭṭhu dhāvati. Vidhāvatīti vividhā nānappakārena
tika-vin01t2:631_1: dhāvati. Kāyavacīdvārabhedaṃ vināpīti kāyacopanaṃ vacībhedañca vinā. Paṭisaṅkhānabalenāti
tika-vin01t2:632: 135. Pucchāsabhāgenāti pucchānurūpena. Nirutti eva patho niruttipatho, tasmiṃ niruttipathe. Tenāha “vohāravacanamatte”ti.
tika-vin01t2:633_0: 137. Yathākammaṃ gatoti iminā tassa matabhāvaṃ dasseti. Abbhuṇheti imināpi vuttameva
tika-vin01t2:633_2: Visabhāgasarīrattā accāsannena na bhavitabbanti āha “sīse vā”tiādi. Vaṭṭatīti visabhāgasarīrepi
tika-vin01t2:633_3: attanāva vuttavidhiṃ kātuṃ sāṭakañca gahetuṃ vaṭṭati. Keci pana “kiñcāpi iminā sikkhāpadena
tika-vin01t2:633_4: anāpatti, itthirūpaṃ pana āmasantassa dukkaṭa”nti vadanti.
tika-vin01t2:634_0: 138. Kusaṃ saṅkāmetvāti kusaṃ parivattetvā. Kūṭamānakūṭakahāpaṇādīhīti ādi-saddena
tika-vin01t2:634_2: tividhaṃ hoti. Tattha hadayanti nāḷiādimānabhājanānaṃ abbhantaraṃ, tassa bhedo chiddakaraṇaṃ
tika-vin01t2:634_3: hadayabhedo, so sappitelādiminanakāle labbhati. Tāni hi gaṇhanto heṭṭhāchiddena mānena
tika-vin01t2:634_4: “saṇikaṃ āsiñcā”ti vatvā antobhājane bahuṃ paggharāpetvā gaṇhāti, dadanto chiddaṃ
tika-vin01t2:634_5: pidhāya sīghaṃ pūretvā deti. Sikhābhedo tilataṇḍulādiminanakāle labbhati. Tāni hi
tika-vin01t2:634_6: gaṇhanto saṇikaṃ sikhaṃ ussāpetvā gaṇhāti, dento vegena pūretvā sikhaṃ chindanto
tika-vin01t2:634_7: deti. Rajjubhedo khettavatthuminanakāle labbhati. Khettādiṃ minantā hi amahantampi
tika-vin01t2:634_8: mahantaṃ katvā minanti, mahantampi amahantaṃ. Kūṭakahāpaṇo pākaṭoyeva.
tika-vin01t2:635_0: Tulākūṭaṃ pana rūpakūṭaṃ aṅgakūṭaṃ gahaṇakūṭaṃ paṭicchannakūṭanti catubbidhaṃ hoti.
tika-vin01t2:635_1: Tattha rūpakūṭaṃ nāma dve tulā sarūpā katvā gaṇhanto mahatiyā gaṇhāti, dadanto khuddikāya
tika-vin01t2:635_2: deti. Aṅgakūṭaṃ nāma gaṇhanto pacchābhāge hatthena tulaṃ akkamati, dadanto pubbabhāge
tika-vin01t2:635_3: akkamati. Gahaṇakūṭaṃ nāma gaṇhanto mūle rajjuṃ gaṇhāti, dadanto agge. Paṭicchannakūṭaṃ
tika-vin01t2:635_4: nāma tulaṃ susiraṃ katvā anto ayacuṇṇaṃ pakkhipitvā gaṇhanto taṃ pacchābhāge karoti, dadanto aggabhāge.
tika-vin01t2:636_0: Kaṃso vuccati suvaṇṇapāti, tāya vañcanaṃ kaṃsakūṭaṃ. Kathaṃ? Ekaṃ suvaṇṇapātiṃ katvā
tika-vin01t2:636_1: aññā dve tisso lohapātiyo suvaṇṇavaṇṇā karonti, tato janapadaṃ gantvā kiñcideva aḍḍhaṃ
tika-vin01t2:636_2: kulaṃ pavisitvā “suvaṇṇabhājanāni kiṇathā”ti vatvā agghe pucchite samagghataraṃ dātukāmā
tika-vin01t2:636_3: honti. Tato tehi “kathaṃ imesaṃ suvaṇṇabhāvo jānitabbo”ti vutte “vīmaṃsitvā gaṇhathā”ti
tika-vin01t2:636_4: suvaṇṇapātiṃ pāsāṇe ghaṃsitvā sabbapātiyo datvā gacchanti.
tika-vin01t2:637_0: Vañcanaṃ nāma tehi tehi upāyehi paresaṃ vañcanaṃ. Tatridamekaṃ vatthu – eko kira
tika-vin01t2:637_1: luddako migañca migapotakañca gahetvā āgacchati. Tameko dhutto “kiṃ, bho, migo agghati,
tika-vin01t2:637_2: kiṃ migapotako”ti āha. “Migo dve kahāpaṇe, migapotako eka”nti ca vutte ekaṃ kahāpaṇaṃ
tika-vin01t2:637_3: datvā migapotakaṃ gahetvā thokaṃ gantvā nivatto “na me, bho, migapotakena attho,
