tika-vin01t2:637_4: migaṃ me dehī”ti āha. Tena hi dve kahāpaṇe dehīti. So āha – “nanu, bho, mayā paṭhamaṃ
tika-vin01t2:637_5: eko kahāpaṇo dinno”ti? “Āma dinno”ti. “Imaṃ migapotakaṃ gaṇha, evaṃ so ca kahāpaṇo,
tika-vin01t2:637_6: ayañca kahāpaṇagghanako migapotakoti dve kahāpaṇā bhavissantī”ti. So “kāraṇaṃ vadatī”ti
tika-vin01t2:638_1: Tattha yaṃ himapātasamaye himena paṭicchannā hutvā maggappaṭipannaṃ janaṃ mūsanti,
tika-vin01t2:638_2: ayaṃ himaviparāmoso. Yaṃ gummādīhi paṭicchannā janaṃ mūsanti, ayaṃ gumbaviparāmoso.
tika-vin01t2:639_0: Uddhāreyeva pārājikanti “sace sāṭako bhavissati, gaṇhissāmī”ti parikappassa pavattattā
tika-vin01t2:639_1: sāṭakassa ca tattha sabbhāvato. Padavārena kāretabboti bhūmiyaṃ anikkhipitvāva vīmaṃsitattā
tika-vin01t2:639_2: vuttaṃ. Pariyuṭṭhitoti anubaddho. Disvā haṭattā parikappāvahāro na dissatīti iminā
tika-vin01t2:639_3: parikappāvahārassa asambhavaṃ dassento mahāpaccariādīsu vuttassa ayuttabhāvaṃ vibhāveti.
tika-vin01t2:639_5: vibhāvento mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttameva suvuttanti dīpeti. Teneva mātikāṭṭhakathāyampi
tika-vin01t2:640_0: Kecīti mahāaṭṭhakathāyameva ekacce ācariyā. Mahāpaccariyaṃ panāti pana-saddo kecivādato
tika-vin01t2:640_1: mahāpaccarivādassa visesasandassanattho. Tena kecivādo mahāpaccarivādenapi na sametīti
tika-vin01t2:640_2: dasseti. Mahāaṭṭhakathānayo eva ca mahāpaccarivādenapi saṃsandanato yuttataroti vibhāveti.
tika-vin01t2:641_0: Alaṅkārabhaṇḍanti aṅgulimuddikādi alaṅkārabhaṇḍaṃ. Kusaṃ pātetvāti vilīvamayaṃ vā
tika-vin01t2:641_1: tālapaṇṇamayaṃ vā katasaññāṇaṃ yaṃ kiñci kusaṃ pātetvā. Samagghataranti appagghataraṃ.
tika-vin01t2:641_2: Parakoṭṭhāsato kuse uddhaṭepi na tāva kusassa parivattanaṃ jātanti vuttaṃ “uddhāre
tika-vin01t2:642_0: 139. Jantāgharavatthusmiṃ yasmā ānandatthero tattha anāpattibhāvaṃ jānāti, tasmā
tika-vin01t2:642_1: “tassa kukkuccaṃ ahosī”ti na vuttaṃ. Yasmā ca sayaṃ bhagavato nārocesi, tasmā “ārocesī”ti
tika-vin01t2:643_0: 140. Vighāsanti khāditāvasesaṃ ucchiṭṭhaṃ vā. Kappiyaṃ kārāpetvāti pacāpetvā. Attaguttatthāyāti
tika-vin01t2:643_1: taṃnimittaupaddavato attānaṃ rakkhaṇatthāya. Jighacchābhibhūtā hi sīhādayo attanā
tika-vin01t2:643_2: khādiyamānaṃ gaṇhantānaṃ anatthampi kareyyuṃ. Parānuddayatāyāti sīhādīsu parasattesu
tika-vin01t2:643_3: anukampāya. Jighacchāvinodanatthañhi tehi khādiyamānaṃ te palāpetvā gaṇhato tesu
tika-vin01t2:644_0: 141. Tekaṭulayāguvatthumhi viyāti musāvādasāmaññato vuttaṃ. Āṇattehīti sammatena
tika-vin01t2:644_1: āṇattehi. Āṇattenāti sāmikehi āṇattena. Aparassa bhāgaṃ dehīti asantaṃ puggalaṃ dassetvā
tika-vin01t2:644_2: gahitattā “bhaṇḍadeyya”nti vuttaṃ. Aññenāti yathāvuttehi sammatādīhi catūhi aññena.
tika-vin01t2:644_3: “Aparampi bhāgaṃ dehī”ti vuttepi saṅghasantakattā amūlakameva gahitanti “uddhāreyeva
tika-vin01t2:644_4: bhaṇḍagghena kāretabbo”ti vuttaṃ. Itarehi dīyamānanti sammatena, tena āṇattena vā
tika-vin01t2:644_5: dīyamānaṃ. Evaṃ gaṇhatoti “aparampi bhāgaṃ dehī”ti vatvā vā kūṭavassāni gaṇetvā vā
tika-vin01t2:644_6: gaṇhato. Sudinnanti heṭṭhā sāmikena, tena āṇattena vā dīyamānaṃ gihisantakaṃ “aparassa
tika-vin01t2:644_7: bhāgaṃ dehī”ti vatvā gaṇhato aparassa abhāvato sāmisantakameva hotīti bhaṇḍadeyyaṃ
tika-vin01t2:644_8: jātaṃ. Idha pana tehi evaṃ dīyamānaṃ “aparampi bhāgaṃ dehīti vatvā vā kūṭavassāni
tika-vin01t2:644_9: gaṇetvā vā gaṇhato dehī”ti vuttattā aññātakaviññattimattaṃ ṭhapetvā neva pārājikaṃ
tika-vin01t2:645_0: 142-3. Parikkhāravatthūsu vuttaparikkhārassa heṭṭhā vuttabhaṇḍassa ca ko viseso?
tika-vin01t2:645_1: Yaṃ paribhogayoggaṃ ābharaṇādirūpaṃ akatvā yathāsabhāvato ṭhapitaṃ, taṃ bhaṇḍaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:645_2: Yaṃ pana tathā katvā paribhuñjituṃ anucchavikākārena ṭhapitaṃ ābharaṇādikaṃ, taṃ
tika-vin01t2:646_0: 144-146. Saṅkāmetvāti ṭhitaṭṭhānato apanetvā. Thavikanti upāhanatthavikādi yaṃkiñci
tika-vin01t2:646_1: thavikaṃ. Āharāpentesu bhaṇḍadeyyanti “gahite attamano hotī”ti vacanato anattamanassa
tika-vin01t2:646_2: santakaṃ gahitampi puna dātabbamevāti vuttaṃ. “Sammukhībhūtehi bhājetabba”nti vacanato
tika-vin01t2:646_3: bhājanīyabhaṇḍaṃ upacārasīmaṭṭhānaṃyeva pāpuṇātīti āha “upacārasīmāyaṃ ṭhitasseva gahetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti.
tika-vin01t2:647_0: 148-9. “Bhaṇḍadeyyanti ubhinnaṃ sālayabhāve sati corassa vā sāmikassa vā sampattassa
tika-vin01t2:647_1: kassaci dātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vadanti. Eseva nayoti paṃsukūlasaññāya gahite bhaṇḍadeyyaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:647_2: theyyacittena pārājikanti attho. Gāmesūti gāmikesu manussesu. Gāma-ggahaṇena hettha
tika-vin01t2:647_3: gāmaṭṭhā vuttā. Vuṭṭhahantesūti gāmaṃ chaḍḍetvā palāyantesu. Puna āvasante janapadeti
tika-vin01t2:648_0: Avisesena vuttanti “saussāhā vā nirussāhā vā”ti visesaṃ aparāmasitvā sāmaññato vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:648_1: Na hi katipayānaṃ anussāhe sati saṅghikaṃ asaṅghikaṃ hotīti ayamettha adhippāyo.
tika-vin01t2:648_2: Saussāhamattameva pamāṇanti sāmikānaṃ paricchinnabhāvato vuttaṃ. Tatoti gaṇasantakato
tika-vin01t2:648_3: puggalasantakato vā. Senāsanatthāya niyamitanti idaṃ nidassanamattaṃ, catūsu paccayesu
tika-vin01t2:648_4: yassa kassaci atthāya niyamitepi vuttanayameva. Issaravatāyāti paraṃ āpucchitvā vā
tika-vin01t2:648_5: anāpucchitvā vā dātabbakiccaṃ natthi, ayamevettha pamāṇanti evaṃ attano issarabhāvena.
tika-vin01t2:648_6: Agghena kāretabboti agghānurūpaṃ dukkaṭena thullaccayena vā kāretabbo. Issaravatāya
tika-vin01t2:648_7: paribhuñjato gīvāti na kevalaṃ ettheva gīvā, heṭṭhā kulasaṅgahatthāya issaravatāya
tika-vin01t2:648_8: vā dinnepi gīvāyeva. Sukhāditamevāti antovihāre nisīditvā ghaṇṭippaharaṇādivuttavidhānassa
tika-vin01t2:648_9: katattā sukhāditaṃ. Saṅghikañhi vebhaṅgiyabhaṇḍaṃ antovihāre vā bahisīmāya vā hotu,
tika-vin01t2:648_10: bahisīmāyaṃ ṭhitehi apaloketvā bhājetuṃ na vaṭṭati, ubhayattha ṭhitampi pana antosīmāyaṃ
tika-vin01t2:648_11: ṭhitehi apaloketvā bhājetuṃ vaṭṭatiyeva. Teneva tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ “vihāreyeva
tika-vin01t2:648_12: nisīditvā evaṃ katattā sukhāditanti āhā”ti. Ayañca attho vassūpanāyikakkhandhakaṭṭhakathāyaṃ āvi bhavissati.
tika-vin01t2:649_0: 150. Vuttavādakavatthūsu pāḷiyaṃ yugasāṭakanti sāṭakayugaṃ. Tulanti palasataṃ. Doṇanti
tika-vin01t2:649_1: soḷasanāḷimattaṃ. Paricchedaṃ pana katvāti yattakaṃ icchitaṃ, tattakaṃ agghavasena
tika-vin01t2:649_2: vā cīvarādipaccayavasena vā paricchedaṃ katvā. Upārambhāti “bhadantā aparicchedaṃ
tika-vin01t2:650_1: Baddho hotīti tiriyaṃ baddho hoti. Sunakhadaṭṭhanti sāmikehi vissajjitasunakhena
tika-vin01t2:650_2: gahitaṃ. Yaṭṭhiyā saha pātetīti sūkarassa āgamanato puretarameva tattha abajjhanatthāya
tika-vin01t2:650_3: pāteti. Maddanto gacchati, bhaṇḍadeyyanti ekasūkaragghanakaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ dātabbaṃ. Na
tika-vin01t2:650_4: hi tena maggena gacchantā sabbeva sūkarā tena pāsena bajjhanti, ekoyeva paṭhamataraṃ
tika-vin01t2:650_5: gacchanto bajjhati, tasmā ekasūkaragghanakaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ dātabbaṃ. Pacchā gacchatīti
tika-vin01t2:650_6: tena katapayogena agantvā pacchā sayameva gacchati. Heṭṭhā vuttesupi īdisesu ṭhānesu
tika-vin01t2:650_7: eseva nayo. Uddharitvā chaḍḍetīti puretarameva uddharitvā chaḍḍeti. Vihārabhūmiyanti
tika-vin01t2:650_8: vihārasāmantā araññappadese. Rakkhaṃ yācitvāti rājarājamahāmattādīnaṃ santikaṃ gantvā
tika-vin01t2:651: Kumīnamukhanti kumīnassa anto macchānaṃ pavisanamukhaṃ. Gumbe khipati, bhaṇḍadeyyamevāti kumīnassa anto pavisitabbānaṃ macchānaṃ agghena bhaṇḍadeyyaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:652_0: 156. Vīsatiṃsādivasena paricchinnā bhikkhū etthāti paricchinnabhikkhukaṃ. Therānanti
tika-vin01t2:652_2: paribhuñjanatthāya. Gahaṇeti pāṭhaseso daṭṭhabbo. Yatthāti yasmiṃ āvāse. Aññesaṃ
tika-vin01t2:652_3: atthibhāvanti aññesaṃ āgantukabhikkhūnaṃ atthibhāvaṃ. Tatthāti tādise āvāse. Bhājetvā
tika-vin01t2:652_4: khādantīti āgantukānampi sampattānaṃ bhājetvā khādantīti adhippāyo. Catūsu paccayesu
tika-vin01t2:652_5: sammā upanentīti ambaphalādīni vikkiṇitvā cīvarādīsu catūsu paccayesu sammā upanenti.
tika-vin01t2:652_6: Cīvaratthāya niyametvā dinnāti “imesaṃ rukkhānaṃ phalāni vikkiṇitvā cīvaresuyeva
tika-vin01t2:652_7: upanetabbāni, na bhājetvā khāditabbānī”ti evaṃ niyametvā dinnā. Tesupi āgantukā anissarāti
tika-vin01t2:652_8: paccayaparibhogatthāya niyametvā dinnattā bhājetvā khādituṃ anissarā.
tika-vin01t2:653_0: Na tesu…pe… ṭhātabbanti ettha āgantukehi heṭṭhā vuttanayena bhājetvā khāditabbanti
tika-vin01t2:653_1: adhippāyo. Tesaṃ katikāya ṭhātabbanti “bhājetvā na khāditabba”nti vā “ettakesu rukkhesu
tika-vin01t2:653_2: phalāni gaṇhissāmā”ti vā “ettakāni phalāni gaṇhissāmā”ti vā “ettakānaṃ divasānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:653_3: abbhantare gaṇhissāmā”ti vā “na kiñci gaṇhissāmā”ti vā evaṃ katāya āvāsikānaṃ katikāya
tika-vin01t2:653_4: āgantukehi ṭhātabbaṃ. Mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “anissarā”ti vacanena dīpitoyeva attho mahāpaccariyaṃ
tika-vin01t2:653_5: “catunnaṃ paccayāna”ntiādinā vitthāretvā dassito. Paribhogavasenevāti ettha eva-saddo
tika-vin01t2:653_6: aṭṭhānappayutto. Paribhogavasena tameva bhājetvāti yojetabbaṃ. Etthāti etasmiṃ vihāre
tika-vin01t2:653_7: raṭṭhe vā. Senāsanapaccayanti senāsanañca tadatthāya niyametvā ṭhapitañca.
tika-vin01t2:654_0: Lāmakakoṭiyāti lāmakaṃ ādiṃ katvā, lāmakasenāsanato paṭṭhāyāti vuttaṃ hoti. Senāsanepi
tika-vin01t2:654_1: tiṇādīni lāmakakoṭiyāva vissajjetabbāni, senāsanaparikkhārāpi lāmakakoṭiyāva vissajjetabbā.
tika-vin01t2:654_2: Mūlavatthucchedaṃ pana katvā na upanetabbanti iminā kiṃ vuttaṃ hotīti? Tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu
tika-vin01t2:654_3: tāva idaṃ vuttaṃ “sabbāni senāsanāni na vissajjetabbānīti vuttaṃ hotī”ti. Lāmakakoṭiyā
tika-vin01t2:654_4: vissajjentehipi senāsanabhūmiyo na vissajjetabbāti ayamattho vutto hotīti no khanti,
tika-vin01t2:655_0: Dhammasantakena buddhapūjaṃ kātuṃ, buddhasantakena vā dhammapūjaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin01t2:655_1: na vaṭṭatīti? “Tathāgatassa kho etaṃ vāseṭṭha adhivacanaṃ dhammakāyo itipīti ca yo
tika-vin01t2:655_2: kho, vakkali, dhammaṃ passati, so maṃ passatī”ti ca vacanato vaṭṭatīti vadanti. Keci
tika-vin01t2:655_3: pana “evaṃ sante ‘yo, bhikkhave, maṃ upaṭṭhaheyya, so gilānaṃ upaṭṭhaheyyā’ti vacanato
tika-vin01t2:655_4: buddhasantakena gilānassapi bhesajjaṃ kātuṃ yuttanti āpajjeyya, tasmā na vaṭṭatī”ti
tika-vin01t2:655_5: vadanti, taṃ akāraṇaṃ. Na hi “yo, bhikkhave, maṃ upaṭṭhaheyya, so gilānaṃ upaṭṭhaheyyā”ti
tika-vin01t2:655_6: iminā attano ca gilānassa ca ekasadisatā tadupaṭṭhānassa vā samaphalatā vuttā. Ayañhettha
tika-vin01t2:655_7: attho “yo maṃ ovādānusāsanīkaraṇena upaṭṭhaheyya, so gilānaṃ upaṭṭhaheyya, mama ovādakaraṇena
tika-vin01t2:655_8: gilāno upaṭṭhātabbo”ti. Bhagavato ca gilānassa ca upaṭṭhānaṃ ekasadisanti evaṃ panettha
tika-vin01t2:655_9: attho na gahetabbo. Tasmā “yo vo, ānanda, mayā dhammo ca vinayo ca desito paññatto,
tika-vin01t2:655_10: so vo mamaccayena satthā”ti vacanato “ahañca panidāni eko ovadāmi anusāsāmi, mayi
tika-vin01t2:655_11: parinibbute imāni caturāsīti buddhasahassāni tumhe ovadissanti anusāsissantī”ti vuttattā
tika-vin01t2:655_12: ca bahussutaṃ bhikkhuṃ pasaṃsantena ca “yo bahussuto, na so tumhākaṃ sāvako nāma,
tika-vin01t2:655_13: buddho nāma esa cundā”ti vuttattā dhammagarukattā ca tathāgatassa pubbanayo eva pasatthataroti amhākaṃ khanti.
tika-vin01t2:656_0: Paṇṇaṃ āropetvāti “ettakeheva rukkhehi ettakameva gahetabba”nti paṇṇaṃ āropetvā,
tika-vin01t2:656_1: likhitvāti vuttaṃ hoti. Nimittasaññaṃ katvāti saṅketaṃ katvā. Dārakāti tesaṃ puttanattādayo
tika-vin01t2:656_2: dārakā. Aññepi ye keci gopakā honti, te sabbepi vuttā. Sabbatthāpi gihīnaṃ gopakadāne
tika-vin01t2:656_3: yattakaṃ gopakā denti, tattakaṃ gahetabbaṃ. Saṅghike pana yathāparicchedameva gahetabbanti
tika-vin01t2:657_1: āpucchitvā. Taṃ sabbampi āharitvāti anāpucchitvāpi tāvakālikaṃ āharitvā. Āharāpentoti
tika-vin01t2:657_2: ettha anāharāpentepi dātabbameva. Ayameva bhikkhu issaroti ekassa bhikkhuno pāpuṇanaṭṭhānaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:657_3: tatoyeva senāsanato tassa dātabbaṃ, na ca so tato uṭṭhāpetabboti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin01t2:658_0: “Udakapūjanti cetiyaṭṭhānesu siñcana”nti gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ. Vattasīsenāti kevalaṃ
tika-vin01t2:658_1: saddhāya, na vetanādiatthāya. Savatthukanti saha bhūmiyā. Tiṇamattaṃ pana dātabbanti
tika-vin01t2:658_2: kasmā vuttaṃ, kiṃ taṃ garubhaṇḍaṃ na hotīti? Na hoti. Arakkhitaagopitaṭṭhāne hi vinassakabhāvena
tika-vin01t2:658_3: ṭhitaṃ garubhaṇḍaṃ na hoti, tasmā tādisaṃ sandhāya “tiṇamattaṃ pana dātabba”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:659_0: Kuṭṭanti gehabhittiṃ. Pākāranti parikkhepapākāraṃ. Tatoti chaḍḍitavihārato. Tato
tika-vin01t2:659_1: āharitvā senāsanaṃ kataṃ hotīti sāmantagāmavāsīhi bhikkhūhi chaḍḍitavihārato dārusambhārādiṃ
tika-vin01t2:660: 157. Catubhāgaudakasambhinneti catutthabhāgena udakena sambhinne. Odanabhājanīyavatthusminti “dehi aparassa bhāga”nti āgatavatthusmiṃ.
tika-vin01t2:661_0: 159. Ayyā attanā kātuṃ yuttampi na karonti, ativiya thaddhāti pasādaṃ bhinditvā cittena
tika-vin01t2:661_1: kuppanti, tasmā “pasādānurakkhaṇatthāyā”ti vuttaṃ. Iddhiṃ paṭisaṃharīti iddhiṃ vissajjesi.
tika-vin01t2:661_2: Sakaṭṭhāneyeva aṭṭhāsīti iddhiyā vissajjitattā eva “pāsādo puna āgacchatū”ti anadhiṭṭhitepi
tika-vin01t2:661_3: sayameva āgantvā sakaṭṭhāneyeva aṭṭhāsi. “Yāva dārakā pāsādaṃ ārohanti, tāva pāsādo
tika-vin01t2:661_4: tesaṃ santike hotū”ti pubbe adhiṭṭhitattā eva ca kālaparicchedaṃ katvā adhiṭṭhitena
tika-vin01t2:661_5: tato paraṃ iddhi vissajjitā nāma hotīti katvā vuttaṃ “thero iddhiṃ paṭisaṃharī”ti.
tika-vin01t2:661_6: Yasmā te dārakā evaṃ gahetvā gatānaṃ santakā na honti, yasmā ca īdisena payogena
tika-vin01t2:661_7: therena te ānītā nāma na honti, tasmā thero evamakāsīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tenevāha “vohāravasenā”tiādi.
tika-vin01t2:661_8: Attano pakativaṇṇaṃ avijahitvā bahiddhā hatthiādidassanaṃ “ekopi hutvā bahudhā hotī”ti
tika-vin01t2:661_9: āgatañca adhiṭṭhānavasena nipphannattā adhiṭṭhāniddhi nāma. “So pakativaṇṇaṃ vijahitvā
tika-vin01t2:661_10: kumārakavaṇṇaṃ vā dasseti nāgavaṇṇaṃ vā…pe… vividhampi senābyūhaṃ dassetī”ti evaṃ
tika-vin01t2:661_11: āgatā iddhi pakativaṇṇavijahanavikāravasena pavattattā vikubbaniddhi nāma. Attānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:661_12: adassetvā bahiddhā hatthiādidassanampi ettheva saṅgahitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Pakativaṇṇavijahanañhi
tika-vin01t2:661_13: nāma attano pakatirūpassa aññesaṃ adassanaṃ, na sabbena sabbaṃ tassa nirodhanaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:661_14: Evañca katvā “attānaṃ adassetvā bahiddhā hatthiādidassanampi ettheva saṅgahita”nti
tika-vin01t2:666_0: Parājitakilesenāti santāne puna anuppattidhammatāpādanena catūhi maggañāṇehi saha
tika-vin01t2:666_1: vāsanāya samucchinnasabbakilesena. Idhāti imasmiṃ sāsane. Tena sikkhāpadena samaṃ
tika-vin01t2:666_2: aññaṃ anekanayavokiṇṇaṃ gambhīratthavinicchayaṃ kiñci sikkhāpadaṃ na vijjatīti yojetabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:666_3: Attho ca vinicchayo ca atthavinicchayā, gambhīrā atthavinicchayā assāti gambhīratthavinicchayaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:666_4: Vatthumhi otiṇṇeti codanāvatthumhi saṅghamajjhaṃ otiṇṇe, ekena ekasmiṃ codite, sayameva
tika-vin01t2:666_5: vā āgantvā attano katavītikkame ārociteti vuttaṃ hoti. Etthāti otiṇṇe vatthumhi.
tika-vin01t2:667_0: Vinicchayaṃ karontena sahasā “pārājika”nti avatvā yaṃ kattabbaṃ, taṃ dassetuṃ “pāḷi”ntiādimāha.
tika-vin01t2:667_1: Vinicchayoti pārājikāpattivinicchayo. Avatvāvāti “tvaṃ pārājikaṃ āpanno”ti avatvāva.
tika-vin01t2:667_2: Kappiyepi ca vatthusminti avatvāpi gaṇhituṃ kappiye mātupitusantakepi vatthusmiṃ.
tika-vin01t2:667_3: Lahuvattinoti theyyacittuppādena lahuparivattino. Āsīvisanti sīghameva sakalasarīre
tika-vin01t2:671: Tīhīti kāyavacīmanodvārehi. Vibhāvitanti pakāsitaṃ, desitaṃ paññattanti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin01t2:673_1: vaḍḍhanena. Visālībhūtattāti gāvutantaraṃ gāvutantaraṃ puthubhūtattā. Bārāṇasirañño
tika-vin01t2:673_2: kira aggamahesiyā kucchimhi gabbho saṇṭhāsi, sā ñatvā rañño nivedesi, rājā gabbhaparihāraṃ
tika-vin01t2:673_3: adāsi. Sā sammā parihariyamānā gabbhaparipākakāle vijāyanagharaṃ pāvisi. Puññavantīnaṃ
tika-vin01t2:673_4: paccūsasamaye gabbhavuṭṭhānaṃ hoti, sā ca tāsaṃ aññatarā, tena paccūsasamaye alattakapaṭalabandhujīvakapupphasadisaṃ
tika-vin01t2:673_5: maṃsapesiṃ vijāyi. Tato “aññā deviyo suvaṇṇabimbasadise putte vijāyanti, aggamahesī
tika-vin01t2:673_6: maṃsapesinti rañño purato mama avaṇṇo uppajjeyyā”ti cintetvā tena avaṇṇabhayena taṃ
tika-vin01t2:673_7: maṃsapesiṃ ekasmiṃ bhājane pakkhipitvā paṭikujjitvā rājamuddikāya lañchetvā gaṅgāya
tika-vin01t2:673_8: sote pakkhipāpesi. Manussehi chaḍḍitamatte devatā ārakkhaṃ saṃvidahiṃsu. Suvaṇṇapaṭṭikañcettha
tika-vin01t2:673_9: jātihiṅgulakena “bārāṇasirañño aggamahesiyā pajā”ti likhitvā bandhiṃsu. Tato taṃ
tika-vin01t2:674_0: Tena ca samayena aññataro tāpaso gopālakakulaṃ nissāya gaṅgātīre viharati. So pātova
tika-vin01t2:674_1: gaṅgaṃ otiṇṇo taṃ bhājanaṃ āgacchantaṃ disvā paṃsukūlasaññāya aggahesi. Athettha
tika-vin01t2:674_2: taṃ akkharapaṭṭikaṃ rājamuddikālañchanañca disvā muñcitvā taṃ maṃsapesiṃ addasa.
tika-vin01t2:674_3: Disvānassa etadahosi “siyā gabbho, tathā hissa duggandhapūtibhāvo natthī”ti. Udakappavāhenāgatassapi
tika-vin01t2:674_4: hi usmā na vigacchati, usmā ca nāma īdisāya saviññāṇakatāya bhaveyyāti “siyā gabbho”ti
tika-vin01t2:674_5: cintesi. Puññavantatāya pana duggandhaṃ nāhosi sausumagatāya pūtibhāvo ca. Evaṃ pana
tika-vin01t2:674_6: cintetvā assamaṃ netvā naṃ suddhe okāse ṭhapesi. Atha aḍḍhamāsaccayena dve maṃsapesiyo
tika-vin01t2:674_7: ahesuṃ. Tāpaso disvā sādhukataraṃ ṭhapesi. Tato puna aḍḍhamāsaccayena ekamekissā
tika-vin01t2:674_8: pesiyā hatthapādasīsānamatthāya pañca pañca piḷakā uṭṭhahiṃsu. Atha tato aḍḍhamāsaccayena
tika-vin01t2:674_9: ekā maṃsapesi suvaṇṇabimbasadiso dārako, ekā dārikā ahosi. Tesu tāpasassa puttasineho
tika-vin01t2:674_10: uppajji, dārakānaṃ puññupanissayato aṅguṭṭhakato cassa khīraṃ nibbatti. Tato pabhuti
tika-vin01t2:674_11: ca khīrabhattaṃ alabhittha. Tāpaso bhattaṃ bhuñjitvā khīraṃ dārakānaṃ mukhe āsiñcati.
tika-vin01t2:674_12: Tesaṃ pana yaṃ yaṃ udaraṃ pavisati, taṃ sabbaṃ maṇibhājanagataṃ viya dissati. Carimabhave
tika-vin01t2:674_13: bodhisatte kucchigate bodhisattamātu viya udaracchaviyā acchavippasannatāya evaṃ
tika-vin01t2:674_14: te nicchavī ahesuṃ. Apare āhu “sibbitvā ṭhapitā viya nesaṃ aññamaññaṃ līnā chavi
tika-vin01t2:674_15: ahosī”ti. Evaṃ te nicchavitāya vā līnacchavitāya vā “licchavī”ti paññāyiṃsu.
tika-vin01t2:675_0: Tāpaso dārake posento ussūre gāmaṃ bhikkhāya pavisati, atidivā paṭikkamati. Tassa
tika-vin01t2:675_1: taṃ byāpāraṃ ñatvā gopālakā āhaṃsu – “bhante, pabbajitānaṃ dārakaposanaṃ palibodho,
tika-vin01t2:675_2: amhākaṃ dārake detha, mayaṃ posessāma, tumhe attano kammaṃ karothā”ti. Tāpaso “sādhū”ti
tika-vin01t2:675_3: paṭissuṇi. Gopālakā dutiyadivase maggaṃ samaṃ katvā pupphehi okiritvā dhajapaṭākā
tika-vin01t2:675_4: ussāpetvā tūriyehi vajjamānehi assamaṃ āgatā. Tāpaso “mahāpuññā dārakā, appamādeneva
tika-vin01t2:675_5: vaḍḍhetha, vaḍḍhetvā aññamaññaṃ āvāhaṃ karotha, pañcagorasena rājānaṃ tosetvā bhūmibhāgaṃ
tika-vin01t2:675_6: gahetvā nagaraṃ māpetha, tattha kumāraṃ abhisiñcathā”ti vatvā dārake adāsi. Te “sādhū”ti
tika-vin01t2:675_7: paṭissuṇitvā dārake netvā posesuṃ. Dārakā vuḍḍhimanvāya kīḷantā vivādaṭṭhānesu aññe
tika-vin01t2:675_8: gopālakadārake hatthenapi pādenapi paharanti, te rodanti. “Kissa rodathā”ti ca mātāpitūhi
tika-vin01t2:675_9: vuttā “ime nimmātāpitikā tāpasapositā amhe atīva paharantī”ti vadanti. Tato nesaṃ
tika-vin01t2:675_10: posakamātāpitaropi “ime dārakā aññe dārake vihesenti dukkhāpenti, na ime saṅgahetabbā,
tika-vin01t2:675_11: vajjetabbā ime”ti āhaṃsu. Tato pabhuti kira so padeso “vajjī”ti vuccati yojanasataparimāṇena.
tika-vin01t2:676_0: Atha taṃ padesaṃ gopālakā rājānaṃ tosetvā aggahesuṃ. Tattha ca nagaraṃ māpetvā soḷasavassuddesikaṃ
tika-vin01t2:676_1: kumāraṃ abhisiñcitvā rājānaṃ akaṃsu. Rajjasampattidāyakassa kammassa katattā asambhinne
tika-vin01t2:676_2: eva rājakule uppannattā ca rājakumārassa puññānubhāvasañcoditā devatādhiggahitā akaṃsūti
tika-vin01t2:676_3: keci. Dārakassa dārikāya saddhiṃ vāreyyaṃ katvā katikaṃ akaṃsu “bāhirato dārikā na
tika-vin01t2:676_4: ānetabbā, ito dārikā na kassaci dātabbā”ti. Tesaṃ paṭhamasaṃvāsena dve dārakā jātā
tika-vin01t2:676_5: dhītā ca putto ca. Evaṃ soḷasakkhattuṃ dve dve jātā. Tato tesaṃ dārakānaṃ yathākkamaṃ
tika-vin01t2:676_6: vaḍḍhantānaṃ ārāmuyyānanivāsaṭṭhānaparivārasampattiṃ gahetuṃ appahontaṃ nagaraṃ tikkhattuṃ
tika-vin01t2:676_7: gāvutantarena gāvutantarena parikkhipiṃsu. Tassa punappunaṃ visālīkatattā “vesālī”tveva
tika-vin01t2:676_8: nāmaṃ jātaṃ. Tena vuttaṃ – “tikkhattuṃ pākāraparikkhepavaḍḍhanena visālībhūtattā
tika-vin01t2:677_0: Idampi ca nagaranti na kevalaṃ rājagahasāvatthiyo yevāti dasseti. Tattha mahāvanaṃ
tika-vin01t2:677_2: saṃyuttaṭṭhakathāyañca imināva nayena vuttaṃ. Dīghanikāyaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “mahāvaneti
tika-vin01t2:677_3: bahinagare himavantena saddhiṃ ekābaddhaṃ hutvā ṭhitaṃ sayaṃjātaṃ vanaṃ atthi, yaṃ
tika-vin01t2:677_4: mahantabhāveneva mahāvananti vuccati, tasmiṃ mahāvane. Kūṭāgārasālāyanti tasmiṃ vanasaṇḍe
tika-vin01t2:677_5: saṅghārāmaṃ patiṭṭhāpesuṃ. Tattha kaṇṇikaṃ yojetvā thambhānaṃ upari kūṭāgārasālāsaṅkhepena
tika-vin01t2:677_6: devavimānasadisaṃ pāsādaṃ akaṃsu, taṃ upādāya sakalopi saṅghārāmo kūṭāgārasālāti
tika-vin01t2:677_7: paññāyitthā”ti vuttaṃ. Vanamajjhe katattā “vanaṃ nissāyā”ti vuttaṃ. Ārāmeti saṅghārāme.
tika-vin01t2:678_0: Anekapariyāyenāti ettha pariyāya-saddo kāraṇavacanoti āha “anekehi kāraṇehī”ti, ayaṃ
tika-vin01t2:678_1: kāyo aviññāṇakopi saviññāṇakopi evampi asubho evampi asubhoti nānāvidhehi kāraṇehīti
tika-vin01t2:678_2: attho. Asubhākārasandassanappavattanti kesādivasena tatthāpi vaṇṇādito asubhākārassa
tika-vin01t2:678_3: sabbaso dassanavasena pavattaṃ. Kāyavicchandaniyakathanti attano parassa ca karajakāye
tika-vin01t2:678_4: vicchandanuppādanakathaṃ. Muttaṃ vātiādinā byatirekamukhena kāyassa amanuññataṃ dasseti.
tika-vin01t2:678_5: Tattha ādito tīhi padehi adassanīyatāya asārakatāya majjhe catūhi duggandhatāya,
tika-vin01t2:678_6: ante ekena lesamattenapi manuññatābhāvamassa dasseti. Atha khotiādinā anvayato sarūpeneva
tika-vin01t2:678_7: amanuññatāya dassanaṃ. Chandoti dubbalarāgo. Rāgoti balavarāgo. “Kesā lomādī”ti saṅkhepato
tika-vin01t2:678_8: vuttamatthaṃ vibhāgena dassetuṃ “yepi hī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Asubhāti āgantukena subhākārena
tika-vin01t2:678_9: virahitattā asubhā. Asucinoti attano sabhāveneva asucino. Paṭikūlāti nāgarikassa
tika-vin01t2:679_0: Kesā nāmete vaṇṇatopi paṭikūlā, saṇṭhānatopi gandhatopi āsayatopi okāsatopi paṭikūlāti
tika-vin01t2:679_1: dassento “so ca nesaṃ…pe… pañcahi kāraṇehi veditabbo”ti āha. Manuññepi hi yāgupatte
tika-vin01t2:679_2: vā bhattapatte vā kesavaṇṇaṃ kiñci disvā “kesamissakamidaṃ, haratha na”nti jigucchanti,
tika-vin01t2:679_3: evaṃ kesā vaṇṇato paṭikūlā. Rattiṃ paribhuñjantāpi kesasaṇṭhānaṃ akkavākaṃ vā makacivākaṃ
tika-vin01t2:679_4: vā chupitvā tatheva jigucchanti, evaṃ saṇṭhānatopi paṭikūlā. Telamakkhanapupphadhūpādisaṅkhāravirahitānañca
tika-vin01t2:679_5: kesānaṃ gandho paramajeguccho hoti, tato jegucchataro aggimhi pakkhittānaṃ. Kesā
tika-vin01t2:679_6: hi vaṇṇasaṇṭhānato appaṭikūlāpi siyuṃ, gandhena pana paṭikūlāyeva. Yathā hi daharassa
tika-vin01t2:679_7: kumārakassa vaccaṃ vaṇṇato haliddivaṇṇaṃ, saṇṭhānatopi haliddipiṇḍasaṇṭhānaṃ, saṅkāraṭṭhāne
tika-vin01t2:679_8: chaḍḍitañca uddhumātakakāḷasunakhasarīraṃ vaṇṇato tālapakkavaṇṇaṃ, saṇṭhānato vaṭṭetvā
tika-vin01t2:679_10: siyā appaṭikūlaṃ, gandhena pana paṭikūlameva, evaṃ kesāpi siyuṃ vaṇṇasaṇṭhānato appaṭikūlā,
tika-vin01t2:680_0: Yathā pana asuciṭṭhāne gāmanissandena jātāni sūpeyyapaṇṇāni nāgarikamanussānaṃ jegucchāni
tika-vin01t2:680_2: jegucchāti idaṃ tesaṃ āsayato pāṭikulyaṃ. Ime ca kesā nāma gūtharāsimhi uṭṭhitakaṇṇakaṃ
tika-vin01t2:680_3: viya ekatiṃsakoṭṭhāsarāsimhi jātā, te susānasaṅkāraṭṭhānādīsu jātasākaṃ viya parikhādīsu
tika-vin01t2:680_4: jātakamalakuvalayādipupphaṃ viya ca asuciṭṭhāne jātattā paramajegucchāti idaṃ tesaṃ
tika-vin01t2:680_5: okāsato pāṭikulyaṃ. Yathā ca kesānaṃ, evaṃ sabbakoṭṭhāsānañca vaṇṇasaṇṭhānagandhāsayokāsavasena
tika-vin01t2:680_6: pañcadhā paṭikūlatā veditabbāti āha “evaṃ lomādīna”nti. Pañcapañcappabhedenāti ettha
tika-vin01t2:680_7: bāhiratthasamāso daṭṭhabbo pañca pañca pabhedā etassāti pañcapañcappabhedoti.
tika-vin01t2:681_0: Saṃvaṇṇentoti vitthārento. Asubhāyāti asubhamātikāya. Phātikammanti bahulīkāro. Pañcaṅgavippahīnaṃ
tika-vin01t2:681_1: pañcaṅgasamannāgatanti ettha kāmacchando byāpādo thinamiddhaṃ uddhaccakukkuccaṃ vicikicchāti
tika-vin01t2:681_2: imesaṃ pañcannaṃ nīvaraṇānaṃ pahānavasena pañcaṅgavippahīnatā veditabbā. Na hi etesu
tika-vin01t2:681_3: appahīnesu jhānaṃ uppajjati, tenassetāni pahānaṅgānīti vuccanti. Kiñcāpi hi jhānakkhaṇe
tika-vin01t2:681_4: aññepi akusalā dhammā pahīyanti, tathāpi etāneva visesena jhānantarāyakarāni. Kāmacchandena
tika-vin01t2:681_5: hi nānāvisayapalobhitaṃ cittaṃ na ekattārammaṇe samādhiyati, kāmacchandābhibhūtaṃ
tika-vin01t2:681_6: vā cittaṃ na kāmadhātuppahānāya paṭipadaṃ paṭipajjati, byāpādena ca ārammaṇe paṭihaññamānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:681_7: na nirantaraṃ pavattati, thinamiddhābhibhūtaṃ akammaññaṃ hoti, uddhaccakukkuccaparetaṃ
tika-vin01t2:681_8: avūpasantameva hutvā paribbhamati, vicikicchāya upahataṃ jhānādhigamasādhikaṃ paṭipadaṃ
tika-vin01t2:681_9: nārohati. Iti visesena jhānantarāyakarattā etāneva pahānaṅgānīti vuttāni.
tika-vin01t2:682_0: Yasmā pana vitakko ārammaṇe cittaṃ abhiniropeti, vicāro anuppabandhati, tehi avikkhepāya
tika-vin01t2:682_1: sampāditapayogassa cetaso payogasampattisambhavā pīti pīnanaṃ, sukhañca upabrūhanaṃ
tika-vin01t2:682_2: karoti, atha naṃ sasampayuttadhammaṃ etehi abhiniropanānubandhanapīnanaupabrūhanehi
tika-vin01t2:682_3: anuggahitā ekaggatā ekattārammaṇe samaṃ sammā ādhiyati, tasmā vitakko vicāro pīti
tika-vin01t2:682_4: sukhaṃ cittekaggatāti imesaṃ pañcannaṃ uppattivasena pañcaṅgasamannāgatatā veditabbā.
tika-vin01t2:682_5: Uppannesu hi etesu pañcasu jhānaṃ uppannaṃ nāma hoti, tenassa etāni pañca samannāgataṅgānīti
tika-vin01t2:682_6: vuccanti. Tasmā na etehi samannāgataṃ aññadeva jhānaṃ nāma atthīti gahetabbaṃ. Yathā
tika-vin01t2:682_7: pana aṅgamattavaseneva caturaṅginī senā, pañcaṅgikaṃ tūriyaṃ aṭṭhaṅgiko ca maggoti
tika-vin01t2:683_0: Etāni ca pañcaṅgāni kiñcāpi upacārakkhaṇepi atthi, atha kho upacāre pakaticittato
tika-vin01t2:683_1: balavatarāni, idha pana upacāratopi balavatarāni rūpāvacarakkhaṇappattāni. Ettha
tika-vin01t2:683_2: hi vitakko suvisadena ākārena ārammaṇe cittaṃ abhiniropayamāno uppajjati, vicāro
tika-vin01t2:683_3: ativiya ārammaṇaṃ anumajjamāno, pītisukhaṃ sabbāvantampi kāyaṃ pharamānaṃ. Teneva
tika-vin01t2:683_4: vuttaṃ “nāssa kiñci sabbāvato kāyassa vivekajena pītisukhena apphuṭaṃ hotī”ti. Cittekaggatāpi
tika-vin01t2:683_5: heṭṭhimamhi samuggapaṭale uparimaṃ samuggapaṭalaṃ viya ārammaṇe suphusitā hutvā uppajjati.
tika-vin01t2:683_6: Ayametesaṃ itarehi viseso, tasmā “pañcaṅgasamannāgata”nti appanājhānameva visesetvā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:684_0: Tividhakalyāṇaṃ dasalakkhaṇasampannanti ettha pana jhānassa ādimajjhapariyosānavasena
tika-vin01t2:684_2: veditabbā. Vitthāranayaṃ panettha sayameva pakāsayissati. Kilesacorehi anabhibhavanīyattā
tika-vin01t2:685_0: Dasalakkhaṇavibhāvaneneva tividhakalyāṇatāpi vibhāvitā hotīti dasalakkhaṇaṃ tāva
tika-vin01t2:685_2: attho “tatrāyaṃ pāḷī”tiādinā vuttapāḷivaṇṇanāyameva āvi bhavissati. Tatrāti tasmiṃ
tika-vin01t2:685_3: dasalakkhaṇavibhāvane. Paṭipadāvisuddhīti paṭipajjati jhānaṃ etāyāti paṭipadā, gotrabhupariyosāno
tika-vin01t2:685_4: pubbabhāgiyo bhāvanānayo. Paripanthato visujjhanaṃ visuddhi, paṭipadāya visuddhi
tika-vin01t2:685_5: paṭipadāvisuddhi. Sā panāyaṃ yasmā jhānassa uppādakkhaṇe labbhati, tasmā vuttaṃ “paṭipadāvisuddhi
tika-vin01t2:685_6: ādī”ti. Upekkhānubrūhanāti visodhetabbatādīnaṃ abhāvato jhānapariyāpannāya tatramajjhattupekkhāya
tika-vin01t2:685_7: kiccanipphattiyā anubrūhanā. Sā panāyaṃ yasmā visesato jhānassa ṭhitikkhaṇe labbhati,
tika-vin01t2:685_8: tena vuttaṃ “upekkhānubrūhanā majjhe”ti. Sampahaṃsanāti tattha dhammānaṃ anativattanādisādhakassa
tika-vin01t2:685_9: ñāṇassa kiccanipphattivasena pariyodapanā. Sā pana yasmā jhānassa osānakkhaṇe pākaṭā
tika-vin01t2:685_10: hoti, tasmā vuttaṃ “sampahaṃsanā pariyosāna”nti. Imāni tīṇi lakkhaṇānīti paripanthato
tika-vin01t2:685_11: cittassa visujjhanākāro, majjhimassa samathanimittassa paṭipajjanākāro, tattha pakkhandanākāroti
tika-vin01t2:685_12: imāni tīṇi jhānassa ādito uppādakkhaṇe appanāppattilakkhaṇāni. Tehi ākārehi vinā
tika-vin01t2:685_13: appanāppattiyā abhāvato asati ca appanāyaṃ tadabhāvato ādikalyāṇañceva visuddhipaṭipadattā
tika-vin01t2:685_14: yathāvuttehi lakkhaṇehi samannāgatattā ca tilakkhaṇasampannañca. Iminā nayena majjhapariyosānalakkhaṇānañca yojanā veditabbā.
tika-vin01t2:686_0: Keci pana “paṭipadāvisuddhi nāma sasambhāriko upacāro, upekkhānubrūhanā nāma appanā,
tika-vin01t2:686_1: sampahaṃsanā nāma paccavekkhaṇā”ti vaṇṇayanti, taṃ na yuttaṃ. Tathā hi sati ajhānadhammehi
tika-vin01t2:686_2: jhānassa guṇasaṃkittanaṃ nāma kataṃ hoti. Na hi bhūmantaraṃ bhūmantarapariyāpannaṃ
tika-vin01t2:686_3: hoti, pāḷiyā cetaṃ virujjhati. “Ekattagataṃ cittaṃ paṭipadāvisuddhipakkhandañceva
tika-vin01t2:686_4: hoti upekkhānubrūhitañca ñāṇena ca sampahaṃsita”nti hi pāḷiyaṃ vuttaṃ. Ettha hi ekattagataṃ
tika-vin01t2:686_5: cittanti indriyānaṃ ekarasabhāvena ekaggatāya ca sikhāppattiyā tadanuguṇaṃ ekattagataṃ
tika-vin01t2:686_6: sasampayuttaṃ appanāppattaṃ cittaṃ vuttaṃ, tasseva ca paṭipadāvisuddhipakkhandatādi
tika-vin01t2:686_7: anantaraṃ vuccate. Tasmā pāḷiyaṃ ekasmiṃyeva appanācittakkhaṇe paṭipadāvisuddhiādīnaṃ
tika-vin01t2:687_0: Kathaṃ? Yasmiṃ vāre appanā uppajjati, tasmiṃ yo nīvaraṇasaṅkhāto kilesagaṇo tassa
tika-vin01t2:687_1: jhānassa paripantho, tato cittaṃ visujjhati, visuddhattā āvaraṇavirahitaṃ hutvā majjhimaṃ
tika-vin01t2:687_2: samathanimittaṃ paṭipajjati. Majjhimaṃ samathanimittaṃ nāma samappavatto appanāsamādhiyeva,
tika-vin01t2:687_3: līnuddhaccasaṅkhātānaṃ ubhinnaṃ antānaṃ anupagamanena majjhimo, savisesaṃ paccanīkadhammānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:687_4: vūpasamanato samatho, yogino sukhavisesānaṃ kāraṇabhāvato nimittanti katvā. Tassa
tika-vin01t2:687_5: pana appanācittassa anantarapaccayabhūtaṃ gotrabhucittaṃ satipi parittamahaggatabhāvabhede
tika-vin01t2:687_6: paccayapaccayuppannabhāvabhede ca ekissāyeva santatiyā pariṇāmūpagamanato ekasantatipariṇāmanayena
tika-vin01t2:687_7: tathattaṃ appanāsamādhivasena samāhitabhāvaṃ upagacchamānaṃ majjhimaṃ samathanimittaṃ
tika-vin01t2:687_8: paṭipajjati nāma. Evaṃ paṭipannattā tathattupagamanena tattha pakkhandati nāma. Yasmiñhi
tika-vin01t2:687_9: khaṇe tathattaṃ majjhimaṃ samathanimittaṃ paṭipajjati, tasmiṃyeva khaṇe tathattupagamanena
tika-vin01t2:687_10: appanāsamādhinā samāhitabhāvūpagamanena tattha pakkhandati nāma. Evaṃ tāva purimasmiṃ
tika-vin01t2:687_12: āgamanavasena nipphajjamānā paṭhamassa jhānassa uppādakkhaṇeyeva paṭipadāvisuddhīti
tika-vin01t2:687_13: veditabbā. Teyeva hi ākārā paccayavisesato jhānakkhaṇe nipphajjamānā paṭipadāvisuddhīti vuttā.
tika-vin01t2:688_0: Evaṃ visuddhassa pana tassa cittassa puna sodhetabbābhāvato visodhane byāpāraṃ akaronto
tika-vin01t2:688_1: visuddhaṃ cittaṃ ajjhupekkhati nāma. Samathabhāvūpagamanena samathappaṭipannassa
tika-vin01t2:688_2: puna samādhāne byāpāraṃ akaronto samathappaṭipannaṃ ajjhupekkhati nāma. Samathappaṭipannabhāvato
tika-vin01t2:688_3: eva cassa kilesasaṃsaggaṃ pahāya ekattena upaṭṭhitassa puna ekattupaṭṭhāne byāpāraṃ
tika-vin01t2:688_4: akaronto ekattupaṭṭhānaṃ ajjhupekkhati nāma. Evaṃ tatramajjhattupekkhāya kiccavasena
tika-vin01t2:689_0: Ye panete evaṃ upekkhānubrūhite tasmiṃ jhānacitte jātā samādhipaññāsaṅkhātā yuganaddhadhammā
tika-vin01t2:689_1: aññamaññaṃ anativattamānā hutvā pavattā, yāni ca saddhādīni indriyāni nānākilesehi
tika-vin01t2:689_2: vimuttattā vimuttirasena ekarasāni hutvā pavattāni, yañcesa tadupagaṃ tesaṃ anativattanaekarasasabhāvānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:689_3: anucchavikaṃ vīriyaṃ vāhayati, yā cassa tasmiṃ khaṇe pavattā āsevanā, sabbepi te
tika-vin01t2:689_4: ākārā yasmā ñāṇena saṃkilesavodānesu taṃ taṃ ādīnavañca ānisaṃsañca disvā tathā tathā
tika-vin01t2:689_5: sampahaṃsitattā visodhitattā pariyodāpitattā nipphannā, tasmā dhammānaṃ anativattanādibhāvasādhanena
tika-vin01t2:689_6: pariyodāpakassa ñāṇassa kiccanipphattivasena sampahaṃsanā veditabbāti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:690_0: Atha kasmā sampahaṃsanāva “pariyosāna”nti vuttā, na upekkhānubrūhanāti? Yasmā tasmiṃ
tika-vin01t2:690_1: bhāvanācitte upekkhāvasena ñāṇaṃ pākaṭaṃ hoti, tasmā ñāṇakiccabhūtā sampahaṃsanā
tika-vin01t2:690_2: “pariyosāna”nti vuttā. Tathā hi appanākāle bhāvanāya samappavattiyā paṭipakkhassa
tika-vin01t2:690_3: ca suppahānato paggahādīsu byāpārassa akātabbato ajjhupekkhanāva hoti. Yaṃ sandhāya
tika-vin01t2:690_4: vuttaṃ “samaye cittassa ajjhupekkhanā visuddhaṃ cittaṃ ajjhupekkhatī”ti ca ādi. Sā
tika-vin01t2:690_5: panāyaṃ ajjhupekkhanā ñāṇassa kiccasiddhiyā hoti visesato ñāṇasādhanattā appanābyāpārassa,
tika-vin01t2:690_6: tasmā ñāṇakiccabhūtā sampahaṃsanā “pariyosāna”nti vuttā. Evaṃ tividhāya paṭipadāvisuddhiyā
tika-vin01t2:690_7: laddhavisesāya tividhāya upekkhānubrūhanāya sātisayaṃ paññindriyassa adhimattabhāvena
tika-vin01t2:690_8: catubbidhāpi sampahaṃsanā sijjhatīti āgamanupekkhāñāṇakiccavasena dasapi ākārā jhāne eva veditabbā.
tika-vin01t2:691_0: Evaṃ tividhattagataṃ cittantiādīni tasseva cittassa thomanavacanāni. Tattha evaṃ
tika-vin01t2:691_2: tividhabhāvaṃ gataṃ. Vitakkasampannanti kilesakkhobhavirahitattā vitakkena sundarabhāvamupagataṃ.
tika-vin01t2:691_3: Cittassa adhiṭṭhānasampannanti tasmiṃyeva ārammaṇe cittassa nirantarappavattisaṅkhātena
tika-vin01t2:691_4: adhiṭṭhānena sampannaṃ anūnaṃ. Yathā adhiṭṭhānavasiyaṃ adhiṭṭhānanti jhānappavatti,
tika-vin01t2:691_5: tathā idhāpi cittassa adhiṭṭhānanti cittekaggatāpi yujjati. Tena hi ekasmiṃyeva ārammaṇe
tika-vin01t2:691_6: cittaṃ adhiṭṭhāti, na ettha vikkhipatīti. Samādhisampannanti visuṃ vuttattā pana
tika-vin01t2:691_7: vuttanayeneva gahetabbo. Atha vā samādhisseva jhānaṅgasaṅgahitattā “cittassa adhiṭṭhānasampanna”nti
tika-vin01t2:692_0: Asubhasaññāparicitenāti sakalaṃ kāyaṃ asubhanti pavattāya saññāya sahagatattā jhānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:692_1: asubhasaññā, tena paricitena paribhāvitena. Cetasāti cittena. Bahulanti abhiṇhaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:692_3: methunadhammena samaṅgibhāvato. Paṭilīyatīti ekapassena nilīyati nilīnaṃ viya hoti.
tika-vin01t2:692_4: Paṭikuṭatīti saṅkucati. Paṭivattatīti nivattati. Na sampasārīyatīti na visarati,
tika-vin01t2:692_5: abhirativasena na pakkhandatīti attho. Atha vā paṭilīyatīti saṅkucati tattha paṭikūlatāya
tika-vin01t2:692_6: saṇṭhitattā. Paṭikuṭatīti apasakkati na upasakkati. Paṭivattatīti nivattati, tato
tika-vin01t2:692_7: eva na sampasārīyatīti. Nhārudaddulanti nhārukhaṇḍaṃ nhāruvilekhanaṃ vā.
tika-vin01t2:693_0: Addhamāsanti accantasaṃyoge upayogavacanaṃ. Paṭisallīyitunti yathāvuttakālaṃ paṭi
tika-vin01t2:693_1: paṭi divase divase samāpattiyaṃ dhammacintāya cittaṃ nilīyituṃ. Payuttavācanti paccayapaṭisaṃyuttavācaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:693_2: buddhā imesu divasesu piṇḍāya na caranti, vihāreyeva nisīdanti, tesaṃ dinnaṃ mahapphalaṃ hotīti ādivacanaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:694_0: Kalyāṇūpanissayavasenāti pabbajjāya upanissayavasena. Pare kirāti kira-saddo arucisūcanattho.
tika-vin01t2:694_1: Tenāha “idaṃ pana icchāmatta”nti, pavattiajānanaṃ ārocayitābhāvo ñāte nivāraṇañcāti
tika-vin01t2:694_2: idaṃ tesaṃ icchāmattaṃ, na pana kāraṇanti attho. Apare pana vadanti “etasmiṃ kira
tika-vin01t2:694_3: aḍḍhamāse na koci buddhaveneyyo ahosi, atha satthā imaṃ aḍḍhamāsaṃ phalasamāpattisukhena
tika-vin01t2:694_4: vītināmessāmi, iti mayhañceva sukhavihāro bhavissati, anāgate ca pacchimā janatā
tika-vin01t2:694_5: ‘satthāpi gaṇaṃ pahāya ekako vihāsi, kimaṅgaṃ pana maya’nti diṭṭhānugatiṃ āpajjissati,
tika-vin01t2:694_6: tadassa bhavissati dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāyāti iminā kāraṇena evamāhā”ti. Neva koci
tika-vin01t2:694_7: bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamatīti ṭhapetvā piṇḍapātanīhārakaṃ añño koci neva bhagavantaṃ
tika-vin01t2:694_8: upasaṅkamati, bhikkhusaṅgho pana satthu vacanaṃ sampaṭicchitvā ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ adāsi.
tika-vin01t2:695_1: Maṇḍanakapakatikoti alaṅkārakasabhāvo. Koci taruṇopi yuvā na hoti, koci yuvāpi maṇḍanakajātiko
tika-vin01t2:695_2: na hoti yathā upasantasabhāvo ālasiyabyasanādīhi vā abhibhūto, idha pana daharo ceva
tika-vin01t2:695_3: yuvā ca maṇḍanakajātiko ca adhippeto. Paṭhamayobbanaṃ nāma pannarasavassato yāva
tika-vin01t2:695_4: dvattiṃsa saṃvaccharāni, soḷasavassato vā yāva tettiṃsa vassāni. Kuṇapanti matakaḷevaraṃ,
tika-vin01t2:695_5: ahissa kuṇapaṃ ahikuṇapaṃ. Evaṃ itarānipi. Atipaṭikūlajigucchanīyasabhāvato cettha
tika-vin01t2:695_6: imāneva tīṇi vuttānīti veditabbāni. Aññesañhi sasasūkarādīnaṃ kuṇapaṃ manussā kaṭukabhaṇḍādīhi
tika-vin01t2:695_7: abhisaṅkharitvā paribhuñjantipi, imesaṃ pana kuṇapaṃ abhinavampi jigucchantiyeva,
tika-vin01t2:695_8: ko pana vādo kālātikkamena pūtibhūte. Atipaṭikūlajigucchanīyatā ca nesaṃ ativiya
tika-vin01t2:695_9: duggandhatāya, sā ca ahīnaṃ tikhiṇakopatāya kukkuramanussānaṃ odanakummāsūpacayatāya
tika-vin01t2:696_0: Samaṇakuttakoti samaṇakiccako, kāsāvanivāsanādivasena samaṇakiccakārīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin01t2:696_1: Tenāha “samaṇavesadhārako”ti. Sabbamakaṃsūti puthujjanā sāvajjepi tattha anavajjasaññino
tika-vin01t2:696_3: paṭhanti. Vaggūti matā vaggumatā. Puññasammatāti pujjabhavaphalanibbattanena sattānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:696_4: punanena visodhanena puññanti sammatā. Pavāhessāmīti gamayissāmi, visodhessāmīti attho.
tika-vin01t2:697_0: 163. Māradheyyaṃ vuccati tebhūmakā dhammā. Vacanatthato pana mārassa dheyyaṃ māradheyyaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:697_1: Dheyyanti ṭhānaṃ vatthu nivāso gocaro. Māro vā ettha dhiyati tiṭṭhati pavattatīti
tika-vin01t2:697_2: māradheyyaṃ, māroti cettha kilesamāro adhippeto, kilesamāravaseneva ca devaputtamārassa
tika-vin01t2:697_3: kāmabhave ādhipaccanti. Māravisayaṃ nātikkamissatīti cintetvāti evamayaṃ saṃvegaṃ
tika-vin01t2:697_4: paṭilabhitvā māravisayaṃ atikkameyyāpi, mayā pana evaṃ vutte uppannaṃ saṃvegaṃ paṭippassambhetvā
tika-vin01t2:697_5: māravisayaṃ nātikkamissatīti evaṃ cintetvā. Dvivacananti dvikkhattuṃ vacanaṃ, āmeḍitavacananti
tika-vin01t2:697_6: vuttaṃ hoti. Niyojentīti ettha ayaṃ andhabālā devatā evaṃ uppannasaṃvegamūlakaṃ samaṇadhammaṃ
tika-vin01t2:697_7: katvā “ayaṃ māravisayaṃ atikkameyyāpī”ti cintetvā attano aññāṇatāya “matā saṃsārato
tika-vin01t2:697_8: muccantī”ti evaṃladdhikāpi samānā attano laddhivasena matā bhikkhū saṃsārato muccantīti
tika-vin01t2:697_9: imamatthaṃ anupaparikkhitvā taṃ tattha niyojesīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:698_0: Kiñcāpi asubhakathaṃ kathentena bhagavatā yathā tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ maraṇabhayaṃ na
tika-vin01t2:698_1: bhavissati, tathā desitattā bhikkhūnañca taṃ dhammakathaṃ sutvā asubhabhāvanānuyogena
tika-vin01t2:698_2: kāye vigatachandarāgatāya maraṇassa abhipatthitabhāvato bhayaṃ natthi, taṃ pana asihatthaṃ
tika-vin01t2:698_3: tathā vicarantaṃ disvā tadaññesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ uppajjanakabhayaṃ sandhāya “hotiyeva
tika-vin01t2:698_4: bhaya”ntiādi vuttanti vadanti. “Attanāpi attānaṃ jīvitā voropenti, aññamaññampi jīvitā
tika-vin01t2:698_5: voropentī”ti vuttattā “sabbānipi tāni pañca bhikkhusatāni jīvitā voropesī”ti idaṃ
tika-vin01t2:698_6: yebhuyyavasena vuttanti gahetabbaṃ. Appakañhi ūnamadhikaṃ vā gaṇanūpagaṃ na hotīti
tika-vin01t2:698_7: “pañcasatānī”ti vuttaṃ. Tasmā ye ca attanāva attānaṃ aññamaññañca jīvitā voropesuṃ,
tika-vin01t2:698_8: te ṭhapetvā avasese puthujjanabhikkhū sabbe ca ariye ayaṃ jīvitā voropesīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:699_0: 164. Paṭisallānā vuṭṭhitoti ettha paṭisallānanti tehi tehi sattasaṅkhārehi paṭinivattitvā
tika-vin01t2:699_1: apasakkitvā sallānaṃ nilīyanaṃ vivecanaṃ, kāyacittehi tato vivittatā ekībhāvoti vuttaṃ
tika-vin01t2:699_2: hoti. Tenāha “ekībhāvato”ti, pavivekatoti attho. Ekībhāvoti hi kāyacittaviveko vutto.
tika-vin01t2:699_4: gahaṭṭhapabbajitādisattasamāgamena ca apeto. Uddesaṃ paripucchaṃ gaṇhantīti attano
tika-vin01t2:699_5: attano ācariyānaṃ santike gaṇhanti. Kāmaṃ dasānussatiggahaṇeneva ānāpānassatipi gahitā,
tika-vin01t2:699_6: sā pana tattha sannipatitabhikkhūsu bahūnaṃ sappāyā sātthikā ca, tasmā puna gahitā.
tika-vin01t2:699_7: Tathā hi bhagavā tameva kammaṭṭhānaṃ tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ kathesi. Āhāre paṭikūlasaññā
tika-vin01t2:699_8: asubhakammaṭṭhānasadisā, cattāro pana āruppā ādikammikānaṃ ananurūpāti tesaṃ idha
tika-vin01t2:700_0: Vesāliṃ upanissāyāti vesālīnagaraṃ gocaragāmaṃ katvā. Upaṭṭhānasālāyanti dhammasabhāyaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:700_1: Muhuttenevāti satthari saddhamme ca gāravena upagatabhikkhūnaṃ vacanasamanantarameva
tika-vin01t2:700_2: uṭṭhahiṃsūti katvā vuttaṃ. Buddhakāle kira bhikkhū bhagavato sandesaṃ sirasā sampaṭicchituṃ
tika-vin01t2:700_3: ohitasotā viharanti. Yassāti yassa kattabbassa. Kālanti desanākālaṃ sandhāya vadati.
tika-vin01t2:703_1: aññampi kāraṇaṃ. Ācikkhantoti pasaṃsāpubbakaṃ desento, pasaṃsā ca tattha abhirucijananena
tika-vin01t2:703_2: ussāhanatthā. Tañhi sutvā bhikkhū “bhagavā imaṃ samādhiṃ anekehi ākārehi pasaṃsati,
tika-vin01t2:703_3: santo kirāyaṃ samādhi paṇīto ca asecanako ca sukho ca vihāro, pāpadhamme ca ṭhānaso
tika-vin01t2:703_4: antaradhāpetī”ti sañjātābhirucino ussāhajātā sakkaccaṃ anuyuñjitabbaṃ paṭipajjitabbaṃ maññanti.
tika-vin01t2:704_0: Atthayojanakkamanti atthañca yojanakkamañca. Bhagavā attano paccakkhabhūtaṃ samādhiṃ
tika-vin01t2:704_1: desanānubhāvena tesampi bhikkhūnaṃ āsannaṃ paccakkhañca karonto sampiṇḍanavasena
tika-vin01t2:704_3: paricchijja gāhikā, te ārabbha pavattāti attho.
tika-vin01t2:705_0: Idāni yathāvuttamatthaṃ pāḷiyā vibhāvento āha “vuttañheta”ntiādi. Tattha no passāso
tika-vin01t2:705_1: no assāsoti so soyeva attho paṭisedhena visesetvā vutto. Assāsavasenāti assāsaṃ ārammaṇaṃ
tika-vin01t2:705_2: katvāti vuttaṃ hoti. Passāsavasenāti etthāpi eseva nayo. Upaṭṭhānaṃ satīti asammussanatāya
tika-vin01t2:705_3: tameva assāsaṃ passāsañca upagantvā ṭhānaṃ sati nāmāti attho. Ettāvatā ānāpānesu
tika-vin01t2:705_4: sati ānāpānassatīti ayamattho vutto hoti. Idāni sativaseneva puggalaṃ niddisitukāmena
tika-vin01t2:705_5: “yo assasati, tassupaṭṭhāti, yo passasati, tassupaṭṭhātī”ti vuttaṃ. Yo assasati,
tika-vin01t2:705_6: tassa sati assāsaṃ upagantvā tiṭṭhati. Yo passasati, tassa sati passāsaṃ upagantvā tiṭṭhatīti attho.
tika-vin01t2:706_0: Yuttoti sampayutto. Ānāpānassatiyanti ānāpānassatiyaṃ paccayabhūtāyanti attho. Purimasmiñhi
tika-vin01t2:706_1: atthe samādhissa satiyā sahajātādipaccayabhāvo vutto sampayuttavacanato, dutiyasmiṃ
tika-vin01t2:706_2: pana upanissayabhāvopi. Upacārajjhānasahagatā hi sati appanāsamādhissa upanissayo
tika-vin01t2:706_3: hotīti ubhayathāpi sahajātādīnaṃ sattannampi paccayānaṃ vasena paccayabhāvaṃ dasseti.
tika-vin01t2:706_4: “Puna caparaṃ, udāyi, akkhātā mayā sāvakānaṃ paṭipadā, yathāpaṭipannā me sāvakā cattāro
tika-vin01t2:706_5: satipaṭṭhāne bhāventī”tiādīsu uppādanavaḍḍhanaṭṭhena bhāvanāti vuccatīti tadubhayavasena
tika-vin01t2:706_6: atthaṃ dassento “bhāvitoti uppādito vaḍḍhito cā”ti āha. Tattha bhāvaṃ vijjamānataṃ
tika-vin01t2:706_7: ito gatoti bhāvito, uppādito paṭiladdhamattoti attho. Uppanno pana laddhāsevano bhāvito,
tika-vin01t2:706_8: paguṇabhāvaṃ āpādito vaḍḍhitoti attho. Bahulīkatoti bahulaṃ pavattito. Tena āvajjanādivasībhāvappattimāha.
tika-vin01t2:706_9: Yo hi vasībhāvaṃ āpādito, so icchiticchitakkhaṇe samāpajjitabbato punappunaṃ pavattissati.
tika-vin01t2:706_10: Tena vuttaṃ “punappunaṃ kato”ti. Yathā “idheva, bhikkhave, samaṇo vivicceva kāmehī”ti
tika-vin01t2:706_11: ca evamādīsu paṭhamapade vutto eva-saddo dutiyādīsupi vuttoyeva hoti, evamidhāpīti
tika-vin01t2:707_0: Ubhayapadaniyamena laddhaguṇaṃ dassetuṃ “ayaṃ hī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Asubhakammaṭṭhānanti
tika-vin01t2:707_1: asubhārammaṇaṃ jhānamāha. Tañhi asubhesu yogakammabhāvato yogino sukhavisesānaṃ kāraṇabhāvato
tika-vin01t2:707_2: ca “asubhakammaṭṭhāna”nti vuccati. Kevalanti iminā ārammaṇaṃ nivatteti. Paṭivedhavasenāti
tika-vin01t2:707_3: jhānapaṭivedhavasena. Jhānañhi bhāvanāvisesena ijjhantaṃ attano visayaṃ paṭivijjhantameva
tika-vin01t2:707_4: pavattati yathāsabhāvato paṭivijjhīyati cāti paṭivedhoti vuccati. Oḷārikārammaṇattāti
tika-vin01t2:707_6: lesantarena vā. Ārammaṇasantatāyapīti anukkamena vicetabbataṃ pattārammaṇassa paramasukhumataṃ
tika-vin01t2:707_7: sandhāyāha. Sante hi sannisinne ārammaṇe pavattamāno dhammo sayampi sannisinnova
tika-vin01t2:707_8: hoti. Tenāha – “santo vūpasanto nibbuto”ti, nibbutasabbapariḷāhoti attho. Ārammaṇasantatāya
tika-vin01t2:707_9: tadārammaṇānaṃ dhammānaṃ santatā lokuttaradhammārammaṇāhi paccavekkhaṇāhi dīpetabbā.
tika-vin01t2:708_0: Nāssa santapaṇītabhāvāvahaṃ kiñci secananti asecanako, asecanakattā anāsittako, anāsittakattā
tika-vin01t2:708_1: eva abbokiṇṇo asammisso parikammādinā, tatoyeva pāṭiyekko, visuṃyeveko āveṇiko asādhāraṇo.
tika-vin01t2:708_2: Sabbametaṃ sarasato eva santabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ vuttaṃ, parikammaṃ vā santabhāvanimittaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:708_3: Parikammanti ca kasiṇakaraṇādinimittuppādapariyosānaṃ, tādisaṃ idha natthīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin01t2:708_4: Tadā hi kammaṭṭhānaṃ nirassādattā asantaṃ appaṇītaṃ siyā. Upacārena vā natthi ettha
tika-vin01t2:708_5: santatāti yojanā. Yathā upacārakkhaṇe nīvaraṇavigamena aṅgapātubhāvena ca paresaṃ
tika-vin01t2:708_6: santatā hoti, na evamimassa. Ayaṃ pana ādimanasi…pe… paṇīto cāti yojanā. Kecīti uttaravihāravāsike
tika-vin01t2:708_7: sandhāyāha. Anāsittakoti upasecanena anāsittako. Tenāha “ojavanto”ti, ojavantasadisoti
tika-vin01t2:708_9: upekkhāya vā santabhāvena sukhagatikattā sabbesampi vasena veditabbaṃ. Jhānasamuṭṭhānapaṇītarūpaphuṭasarīratāvasena
tika-vin01t2:708_10: pana kāyikasukhappaṭilābhasaṃvattanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ, tañca kho jhānato vuṭṭhitakāle.
tika-vin01t2:708_11: Imasmiṃ pakkhe appitappitakkhaṇeti idaṃ hetumhi bhummavacanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:709_0: Avikkhambhiteti jhānena sakasantānato anīhaṭe appahīne. Akosallasambhūteti akosallaṃ
tika-vin01t2:709_1: vuccati avijjā, tato sambhūte. Avijjāpubbaṅgamā hi sabbe pāpadhammā. Khaṇenevāti
tika-vin01t2:709_2: attano pavattikkhaṇeneva. Antaradhāpetīti ettha antaradhāpanaṃ vināsanaṃ. Taṃ pana
tika-vin01t2:709_4: Vūpasametīti visesena upasameti. Visesena upasamanaṃ pana sammadeva upasamanaṃ hotīti
tika-vin01t2:710_0: Nanu ca aññopi samādhi attano pavattikkhaṇeneva paṭipakkhadhamme antaradhāpeti vūpasameti,
tika-vin01t2:710_1: atha kasmā ayameva samādhi evaṃ visesetvā vuttoti? Pubbabhāgato paṭṭhāya nānāvitakkavūpasamanasabbhāvato.
tika-vin01t2:710_2: Vuttañhetaṃ “ānāpānassati bhāvetabbā vitakkupacchedāyā”ti. Apica tikkhapaññassa ñāṇuttarassetaṃ
tika-vin01t2:710_3: kammaṭṭhānaṃ, ñāṇuttarassa ca kilesappahānaṃ itarehi sātisayaṃ yathā saddhādhimuttehi
tika-vin01t2:710_4: diṭṭhippattassa, tasmā imaṃ visesaṃ sandhāya “ṭhānaso antaradhāpeti vūpasametī”ti
tika-vin01t2:710_5: vuttaṃ. Atha vā nimittapātubhāve sati khaṇeneva aṅgapātubhāvasabbhāvato ayameva samādhi
tika-vin01t2:710_6: “ṭhānaso antaradhāpeti vūpasametī”ti vutto yathā taṃ mahato akālameghassa uṭṭhitassa
tika-vin01t2:710_7: dhārānipāte khaṇeneva pathaviyaṃ rajojallassa vūpasamo. Tenevāha “seyyathāpi, bhikkhave,
tika-vin01t2:710_8: mahā akālamegho uṭṭhito”tiādi. Sāsanikassa jhānabhāvanā yebhuyyena nibbedhabhāgiyāva
tika-vin01t2:710_9: hotīti āha “nibbedhabhāgiyattā”ti. Buddhānaṃ pana ekaṃsena nibbedhabhāgiyāva hoti.
tika-vin01t2:710_10: Imameva hi kammaṭṭhānaṃ bhāvetvā sabbepi sammāsambuddhā sammāsambodhiṃ adhigacchanti,
tika-vin01t2:710_11: ariyamaggassa pādakabhūto ayaṃ samādhi anukkamena vaḍḍhitvā ariyamaggabhāvaṃ upagato
tika-vin01t2:710_12: viya hotīti āha “anupubbena ariyamaggavuḍḍhippatto”ti. Ayaṃ panattho virāganirodhapaṭinissaggānupassanānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:711_0: Kathanti idaṃ pucchanākāravibhāvanapadaṃ, pucchā cettha kathetukamyatāvasena aññesaṃ
tika-vin01t2:711_1: asambhavato, sā ca upari desanaṃ āruḷhānaṃ sabbesaṃ pakāravisesānaṃ āmasanavasenāti
tika-vin01t2:711_2: imamatthaṃ dassento “kathanti…pe… vitthāretukamyatāpucchā”ti āha. Kathaṃ bahulīkatoti
tika-vin01t2:711_3: etthāpi ānāpānassatisamādhīti padaṃ ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ. Tattha kathanti ānāpānassatisamādhibahulīkāraṃ
tika-vin01t2:711_4: nānappakārato vitthāretukamyatāpucchā. Bahulīkato ānāpānassatisamādhīti tathā puṭṭhadhammanidassananti
tika-vin01t2:711_5: imamatthaṃ “eseva nayo”ti imināyeva atidissati. Heṭṭhā papañcavasena vuttamatthaṃ
tika-vin01t2:711_6: sukhaggahaṇatthaṃ saṅgahetvā dassento “ayaṃ panettha saṅkhepattho”ti āha, piṇḍatthoti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin01t2:712_0: Tamatthanti taṃ “kathaṃ bhāvito”tiādinā pucchāvasena saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṃ. “Idha
tika-vin01t2:712_1: tathāgato loke uppajjatī”tiādīsu idha-saddo lokaṃ upādāya vutto. “Idheva tiṭṭhamānassā”tiādīsu
tika-vin01t2:712_2: okāsaṃ. “Idhāhaṃ, bhikkhave, bhuttāvī assaṃ pavārito”tiādīsu padapūraṇamattaṃ. “Idha
tika-vin01t2:712_3: bhikkhu dhammaṃ pariyāpuṇātī”tiādīsu pana sāsanaṃ. “Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhū”ti idhāpi
tika-vin01t2:712_4: sāsanamevāti dassento “bhikkhave, imasmiṃ sāsane bhikkhū”ti vatvā tamevatthaṃ pākaṭaṃ
tika-vin01t2:712_6: sabbappakāraggahaṇaṃ soḷasa pakāre sandhāya. Te hi imasmiṃyeva sāsane. Bāhirakā hi
tika-vin01t2:712_7: jānantā ādito catuppakārameva jānanti. Tenāha “aññasāsanassa tathābhāvappaṭisedhano”ti,
tika-vin01t2:712_8: yathāvuttassa puggalassa nissayabhāvappaṭisedhanoti attho. Etena “idha, bhikkhave”ti
tika-vin01t2:712_9: idaṃ antogadhaeva-saddanti dasseti. Santi hi ekapadānipi avadhāraṇāni yathā vāyubhakkhoti.
tika-vin01t2:712_10: Tenevāha “idheva, bhikkhave, samaṇo”tiādi. Paripuṇṇasamaṇakaraṇadhammo hi yo, so
tika-vin01t2:713_0: Araññādikasseva bhāvanānurūpasenāsanataṃ dassetuṃ “imassa hī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Duddamo
tika-vin01t2:713_1: damathaṃ anupagato goṇo kūṭagoṇo. Yathā thanehi sabbaso khīraṃ na paggharati, evaṃ
tika-vin01t2:713_2: dohapaṭibandhinī kūṭadhenu. Assāti gopassa. Rūpasaddādike paṭicca uppajjanakaassādo
tika-vin01t2:713_3: rūpārammaṇādiraso. Pubbe āciṇṇārammaṇanti pabbajitato pubbe, anādimati vā saṃsāre
tika-vin01t2:713_4: paricitārammaṇaṃ. Upacāravasena upanisīdati, appanāvasena upanipajjatīti yojetabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:714_0: Idhāti imasmiṃ sāsane. Nibandheyyāti bandheyya. Satiyāti sammadeva kammaṭṭhānasallakkhaṇavasappavattāya
tika-vin01t2:714_1: satiyā. Ārammaṇeti kammaṭṭhānārammaṇe. Daḷhanti thiraṃ, yathā satokārissa upacārappanābhedo
tika-vin01t2:714_2: samādhi ijjhati, tathā thāmagataṃ katvāti attho.
tika-vin01t2:715_2: sabbesaṃ buddhānaṃ ekaccānaṃ paccekabuddhānaṃ buddhasāvakānañca visesādhigamassa
tika-vin01t2:715_3: ceva aññakammaṭṭhānena adhigatavisesānaṃ diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārassa ca padaṭṭhānabhūtaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:715_4: Vatthuvijjācariyo viya bhagavā yogīnaṃ anurūpanivāsaṭṭhānupadissanato. Bhikkhu dīpisadiso
tika-vin01t2:715_5: araññe ekako viharitvā paṭipakkhanimmathanena icchitatthasādhanato. Phalamuttamanti
tika-vin01t2:716_0: Evaṃ vuttalakkhaṇesūti abhidhammapariyāyena suttantapariyāyena vuttalakkhaṇesu. Rukkhasamīpanti
tika-vin01t2:716_1: “yāvatā majjhanhike kāle samantā chāyā pharati, nivāte paṇṇāni patanti, ettāvatā
tika-vin01t2:716_2: rukkhamūlanti vuccatī”ti evaṃ vuttaṃ rukkhassa samīpaṭṭhānaṃ. Avasesasattavidhasenāsananti
tika-vin01t2:716_3: pabbataṃ kandaraṃ giriguhaṃ susānaṃ vanappatthaṃ abbhokāsaṃ palālapuñjanti evaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:716_5: ca anukūlaṃ. Tathā hi gimhakāle araññaṃ anukūlaṃ sommasītalabhāvato, hemante rukkhamūlaṃ
tika-vin01t2:716_7: semhapakatikassa araññaṃ anukūlaṃ dūraṃ gantvā bhikkhācaraṇena semhassa vūpasamanato,
tika-vin01t2:716_9: suññāgāraṃ anukūlaṃ vātanivāraṇato. Mohacaritassa araññaṃ anukūlaṃ. Mahāaraññe hi
tika-vin01t2:716_10: cittaṃ na saṅkucati vivaṭaṅgaṇabhāvato, dosacaritassa rukkhamūlaṃ anukūlaṃ pasādanīyabhāvato,
tika-vin01t2:716_11: rāgacaritassa suññāgāraṃ anukūlaṃ visabhāgārammaṇānaṃ pavesanivāraṇato. Alīnānuddhaccapakkhikanti
tika-vin01t2:716_13: na evaṃ nisajjā. Tato eva tassā santatā. Nisajjāya daḷhabhāvaṃ pallaṅkābhujanena,
tika-vin01t2:717_0: Ūrubaddhāsananti ūrūnamadhobandhanavasena nisajjā. Heṭṭhimakāyassa anujukaṃ ṭhapanaṃ
tika-vin01t2:717_1: nisajjāvacaneneva bodhitanti. Ujuṃ kāyanti ettha kāya-saddo uparimakāyavisayoti āha
tika-vin01t2:717_2: – “uparimaṃ sarīraṃ ujukaṃ ṭhapetvā”ti. Taṃ pana ujukaṭṭhapanaṃ sarūpato payojanato
tika-vin01t2:717_3: ca dassetuṃ “aṭṭhārasā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Na paṇamantīti na oṇamanti. Na paripatatīti
tika-vin01t2:717_4: na vigacchati vīthiṃ na vilaṅgheti, tato eva pubbenāparaṃ visesuppattiyā vuḍḍhiṃ
tika-vin01t2:717_5: phātiṃ upagacchati. Idha pari-saddo abhi-saddena samānatthoti āha “kammaṭṭhānābhimukha”nti,
tika-vin01t2:717_6: bahiddhā puthuttārammaṇato nivāretvā kammaṭṭhānaṃyeva purakkhatvāti attho. Parīti
tika-vin01t2:717_7: pariggahaṭṭho “pariṇāyikā”tiādīsu viya. Niyyānaṭṭho paṭipakkhato niggamanaṭṭho, tasmā
tika-vin01t2:717_8: pariggahitaniyyānanti sabbathā gahitāsammosaṃ pariccattasammosaṃ satiṃ katvā, paramaṃ
tika-vin01t2:717_9: satinepakkaṃ upaṭṭhapetvāti attho. Satovāti satiyā samannāgato eva saranto eva assasati,
tika-vin01t2:717_10: nāssa kāci sativirahitā assāsappavatti hotīti attho. Sato passasatīti etthāpi satova
tika-vin01t2:717_11: passasatīti eva-saddo ānetvā vattabbo. Satokārīti sato eva hutvā satiyā eva vā kātabbassa
tika-vin01t2:718_0: Bāttiṃsāya ākārehīti catūsu catukkesu āgatāni dīgharassādīni soḷasa padāni assāsapassāsavasena
tika-vin01t2:718_1: dvidhā vibhajitvā vuttehi dīghamassāsaṃ ādiṃ katvā paṭinissaggānupassipassāsapariyantehi
tika-vin01t2:718_2: bāttiṃsākārehi. Yadi “satova assasati, sato passasatī”ti etassa vibhaṅge vuttaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:718_3: atha kasmā “assasati passasati”cceva avatvā “satokārī”ti vuttaṃ? Ekarasaṃ desanaṃ
tika-vin01t2:718_4: kātukāmatāya. Paṭhamacatukke padadvayameva hi vattamānakālavasena āgataṃ, itarāni
tika-vin01t2:718_5: anāgatakālavasena, tasmā ekarasaṃ desanaṃ kātukāmatāya sabbattha “satokāri”cceva
tika-vin01t2:718_6: vuttaṃ. Dīghaṃassāsavasenāti dīghaassāsavasena, vibhattialopaṃ katvā niddeso. Dīghanti
tika-vin01t2:718_7: vā bhagavatā vuttaassāsavasena. Cittassa ekaggataṃ avikkhepanti vikkhepassa paṭipakkhabhāvato
tika-vin01t2:718_8: avikkhepoti laddhanāmaṃ cittassa ekaggabhāvaṃ pajānato sati upaṭṭhitā ārammaṇaṃ upagantvā
tika-vin01t2:718_9: ṭhitā hoti. Tāya satiyā tena ñāṇenāti yathāvuttāya satiyā yathāvuttena ca ñāṇena.
tika-vin01t2:718_10: Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – dīghaṃ assāsaṃ ārammaṇabhūtaṃ avikkhittacittassa asammohato vā
tika-vin01t2:718_11: sampajānantassa tattha sati upaṭṭhitāva hoti, taṃ sampajānantassa ārammaṇakaraṇavasena
tika-vin01t2:718_12: asammohavasena vā sampajaññaṃ, tadadhīnasatisampajaññena taṃsamaṅgī yogāvacaro satokārī
tika-vin01t2:718_13: nāma hotīti. Paṭinissaggānupassī assāsavasenāti paṭinissaggānupassī hutvā assasanassa
tika-vin01t2:719_0: Anto uṭṭhitasasanaṃ assāso, bahi uṭṭhitasasanaṃ passāsoti āha – “assāsoti bahinikkhamanavāto”tiādi.
tika-vin01t2:719_1: Suttantaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana bahi uṭṭhahitvāpi anto sasanato assāso, anto uṭṭhahitvāpi
tika-vin01t2:719_2: bahi sasanato passāsoti katvā uppaṭipāṭiyā vuttaṃ. Atha vā mātukucchiyaṃ bahi nikkhamituṃ
tika-vin01t2:719_3: aladdhokāso nāsikāvāto mātukucchito nikkhantamatte paṭhamaṃ bahi nikkhamatīti vinayaṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-vin01t2:719_4: uppattikkamena “ādimhi sāso assāso”ti bahinikkhamanavāto vutto. Tenevāha “sabbesampi
tika-vin01t2:719_6: paṭhamaṃ nāsikāvātassa anto ākaḍḍhitvā pacchā bahi vissajjanato pavattikkamena “ādimhi
tika-vin01t2:719_7: sāso assāso”ti antopavisanavāto vutto. Suttantanayoyeva cettha “assāsādimajjhapariyosānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:719_8: satiyā anugacchato ajjhattaṃ vikkhepagatena cittena kāyopi cittampi sāraddhā ca honti
tika-vin01t2:719_9: iñjitā ca phanditā ca, passāsādimajjhapariyosānaṃ satiyā anugacchato bahiddhā vikkhepagatena
tika-vin01t2:719_10: cittena kāyopi cittampi sāraddhā ca honti iñjitā ca phanditā cā”ti imāya pāḷiyā sameti.
tika-vin01t2:719_11: “Bhāvanārambhe pavattikkamasseva icchitattā sundarataro”ti vadanti. Tāluṃ āhacca
tika-vin01t2:719_12: nibbāyatīti tāluṃ āhacca nirujjhati. Tena kira sampatijāto bāladārako khipitaṃ karoti.
tika-vin01t2:719_13: Evaṃ tāvātiādi yathāvuttassa atthassa nigamanaṃ. Keci “evaṃ tāvāti anena pavattikkamena
tika-vin01t2:720_0: Addhānavasenāti kāladdhānavasena. Ayañhi addhāna-saddo kālassa desassa ca vācakoti.
tika-vin01t2:720_1: Tattha desaddhānaṃ udāharaṇabhāvena dassetvā kāladdhānassa vasena assāsapassāsānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:720_2: dīgharassataṃ vibhāvetuṃ “yathā hī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha okāsaddhānanti okāsabhūtaṃ
tika-vin01t2:720_3: addhānaṃ. Pharitvāti byāpetvā. Cuṇṇavicuṇṇāpi anekakalāpabhāvena, dīghamaddhānanti
tika-vin01t2:720_4: dīghaṃ padesaṃ. Tasmāti saṇikaṃ pavattiyā dīghasantānatāya dīghāti vuccanti. Ettha
tika-vin01t2:720_5: ca hatthiādisarīre sunakhādisarīre ca assāsapassāsānaṃ desaddhānavisiṭṭhena kāladdhānavaseneva
tika-vin01t2:720_6: dīgharassatā vuttāti veditabbā “saṇikaṃ pūretvā saṇikameva nikkhamanti, sīghaṃ pūretvā
tika-vin01t2:720_7: sīghameva nikkhamantī”ti vacanato. Manussesūti samānappamāṇesupi manussasarīresu.
tika-vin01t2:720_8: Dīghaṃ assasantīti dīghaṃ assāsappabandhaṃ pavattentīti attho. Passasantīti etthāpi
tika-vin01t2:720_9: eseva nayo. Sunakhasasādayo viya rassaṃ assasanti passasanti cāti yojanā. Idaṃ pana
tika-vin01t2:720_10: dīghaṃ rassañca assasanaṃ passasanañca tesaṃ sattānaṃ sarīrassa sabhāvoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:720_11: Tesanti tesaṃ sattānaṃ. Teti assāsapassāsā. Ittaramaddhānanti appakaṃ kālaṃ. Navahākārehīti
tika-vin01t2:720_12: bhāvanamanuyuñjantassa pubbenāparaṃ aladdhavisesassa kevalaṃ addhānavasena ādito
tika-vin01t2:720_13: vuttā tayo ākārā, te ca kho ekacco assāsaṃ suṭṭhu sallakkheti, ekacco passāsaṃ, ekacco
tika-vin01t2:720_14: tadubhayanti imesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ puggalānaṃ vasena. Keci pana “assasatipi passasatipīti
tika-vin01t2:720_15: ekajjhaṃ vacanaṃ bhāvanāya nirantaraṃ pavattidassanattha”nti vadanti. Chandavasena
tika-vin01t2:720_16: pubbe viya tayo, tathā pāmojjavasenāti imehi navahi ākārehi.
tika-vin01t2:721_0: Kāmañcettha ekassa puggalassa tayo eva ākārā labbhanti, tantivasena pana sabbesaṃ
tika-vin01t2:721_1: pāḷiāruḷhattā tesaṃ vasena parikammassa kātabbattā ca “tatrāyaṃ bhikkhu navahākārehī”ti
tika-vin01t2:721_2: vuttaṃ. Evaṃ pajānatoti evaṃ yathāvuttehi ākārehi assāsapassāse pajānato, tattha
tika-vin01t2:721_3: manasikāraṃ pavattentassa. Ekenākārenāti dīghaṃassāsādīsu catūsu ākāresu ekena ākārena,
tika-vin01t2:721_4: navasu tīsu vā ekena. Tathā hi vakkhati –
tika-vin01t2:726: Ayaṃ bhāvanā assāsapassāsakāyānupassanāti katvā vuttaṃ “kāyānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānabhāvanā sampajjatī”ti.
tika-vin01t2:727_0: Idāni pāḷivaseneva te nava ākāre bhāvanāvidhiñca dassetuṃ “yathāhā”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:727_1: Tattha “kathaṃ pajānātī”ti pajānanavidhiṃ kathetukamyatāya pucchati. Dīghaṃ assāsanti
tika-vin01t2:727_2: vuttalakkhaṇaṃ dīghaṃ assāsaṃ. Addhānasaṅkhāteti addhānanti saṅkhaṃ gate dīghe kāle,
tika-vin01t2:727_3: dīghaṃ khaṇanti attho. Koṭṭhāsapariyāyo vā saṅkhāta-saddo “theyyasaṅkhāta”ntiādīsu
tika-vin01t2:727_4: viya, tasmā addhānasaṅkhāteti addhānakoṭṭhāse desabhāgeti attho. Chando uppajjatīti
tika-vin01t2:727_5: bhāvanāya pubbenāparaṃ visesaṃ āvahantiyā laddhassādattā tattha sātisayo kattukāmatālakkhaṇo
tika-vin01t2:727_6: kusalacchando uppajjati. Chandavasenāti tathāpavattachandassa vasena visesabhāvanamanuyuñjantassa
tika-vin01t2:727_7: kammaṭṭhānaṃ vuḍḍhiṃ phātiṃ gamentassa. Tato sukhumataranti yathāvuttachandappavattiyā
tika-vin01t2:727_8: purimakato sukhumataraṃ. Bhāvanābalena hi paṭippassaddhadarathapariḷāhatāya kāyassa
tika-vin01t2:727_9: assāsapassāsā sukhumatarā hutvā pavattanti. Pāmojjaṃ uppajjatīti assāsapassāsānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:727_10: sukhumatarabhāvena ārammaṇassa santataratāya kammaṭṭhānassa ca vīthippaṭipannatāya
tika-vin01t2:727_11: bhāvanācittasahagato pamodo khuddikādibhedā taruṇapīti uppajjati. Cittaṃ vivattatīti
tika-vin01t2:727_12: anukkamena assāsapassāsānaṃ ativiya sukhumatarabhāvappattiyā anupaṭṭhahane vicetabbākārappattehi
tika-vin01t2:727_13: tehi cittaṃ vinivattatīti keci. Bhāvanābalena pana sukhumatarabhāvappattesu assāsapassāsesu
tika-vin01t2:727_14: tattha paṭibhāganimitte uppanne pakatiassāsapassāsato cittaṃ nivattati. Upekkhā saṇṭhātīti
tika-vin01t2:727_15: tasmiṃ paṭibhāganimitte upacārappanābhede samādhimhi uppanne puna jhānanibbattanatthaṃ
tika-vin01t2:727_16: byāpārābhāvato ajjhupekkhanaṃ hoti, sā panāyaṃ upekkhā tatramajjhattupekkhāti veditabbā.
tika-vin01t2:728_0: Imehi navahi ākārehīti imehi yathāvuttehi navahi pakārehi pavattā. Dīghaṃ assāsapassāsā
tika-vin01t2:728_1: kāyoti dīghākārā assāsapassāsā cuṇṇavicuṇṇāpi samūhaṭṭhena kāyo. Assāsapassāse nissāya
tika-vin01t2:728_2: uppannanimittampi ettha assāsapassāsasāmaññavasena vuttaṃ. Upaṭṭhānaṃ satīti taṃ
tika-vin01t2:728_3: ārammaṇaṃ upagantvā tiṭṭhatīti sati upaṭṭhānaṃ nāma. Anupassanā ñāṇanti samathavasena
tika-vin01t2:728_4: nimittassa anupassanā vipassanāvasena assāsapassāse tannissayañca kāyaṃ “rūpa”nti,
tika-vin01t2:728_5: cittaṃ taṃsampayuttadhamme ca “arūpa”nti vavatthapetvā nāmarūpassa anupassanā ca
tika-vin01t2:728_6: ñāṇaṃ tattha yathābhūtāvabodho. Kāyo upaṭṭhānanti so kāyo ārammaṇakaraṇavasena upagantvā
tika-vin01t2:728_7: sati ettha tiṭṭhatīti upaṭṭhānaṃ nāma. Ettha ca “kāyo upaṭṭhāna”nti iminā itarakāyassapi
tika-vin01t2:728_8: saṅgahoti tathā vuttaṃ sammasanacārassapi idha icchitattā. No satīti so kāyo sati
tika-vin01t2:728_9: nāma na hoti. Sati upaṭṭhānañceva sati ca saraṇaṭṭhena upaṭṭhānaṭṭhena ca. Tāya satiyāti
tika-vin01t2:728_10: yathāvuttāya satiyā. Tena ñāṇenāti yathāvutteneva ñāṇena. Taṃ kāyanti taṃ assāsapassāsakāyañceva
tika-vin01t2:728_11: tannissayarūpakāyañca. Anupassatīti jhānasampayuttañāṇena ceva vipassanāñāṇena ca
tika-vin01t2:728_12: anu anu passati. Tena vuccati kāye kāyānupassanā satipaṭṭhānabhāvanāti tena anupassanena
tika-vin01t2:728_13: yathāvutte kāye ayaṃ kāyānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānabhāvanāti vuccati. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti
tika-vin01t2:728_14: – yā ayaṃ yathāvutte assāsapassāsakāye tassa nissayabhūte karajakāye ca kāyasseva
tika-vin01t2:728_15: anupassanā anudakabhūtāya marīciyā udakānupassanā viya na aniccādisabhāve kāye niccādibhāvānupassanā,
tika-vin01t2:728_16: atha kho yathārahaṃ aniccadukkhānattā subhabhāvasseva anupassanā. Atha vā kāye “ahanti
tika-vin01t2:728_17: vā, mamanti vā, itthīti vā, puriso”ti vā gahetabbassa kassaci abhāvato tādisaṃ ananupassitvā
tika-vin01t2:728_18: kāyamattasseva anupassanā kāyānupassanā, tāya kāyānupassanāya sampayuttā satiyeva
tika-vin01t2:728_19: upaṭṭhānaṃ satipaṭṭhānaṃ, tassa bhāvanā vaḍḍhanā kāyānupassanā satipaṭṭhānabhāvanāti.
tika-vin01t2:729_0: Eseva nayoti “navahi ākārehī”tiādinā vuttavidhiṃ rassa-pade atidissati. Etthāti etasmiṃ
tika-vin01t2:729_1: yathādassite “kathaṃ dīghaṃ assasanto”tiādinā āgate pāḷinaye. Idhāti imasmiṃ rassapadavasena
tika-vin01t2:729_2: āgate pāḷinaye. Ayanti yogāvacaro. Addhānavasenāti dīghakālavasena. Ittaravasenāti
tika-vin01t2:729_3: parittakālavasena. Imehi ākārehīti imehi navahi ākārehi.
tika-vin01t2:730_0: Tādisoti dīgho rasso ca. Cattāro vaṇṇāti cattāro ākārā te ca dīghādayo eva. Nāsikaggeva
tika-vin01t2:730_1: bhikkhunoti gāthāsukhatthaṃ rassaṃ katvā vuttaṃ. Nāsikagge vāti vā-saddo aniyamattho,
tika-vin01t2:731_0: Sabbakāyappaṭisaṃvedīti sabbassa kāyassa paṭi paṭi paccekaṃ sammadeva vedanasīlo
tika-vin01t2:731_1: jānanasīlo, tassa vā paṭi paṭi sammadeva vedo etassa atthi, taṃ vā paṭi paṭi sammadeva
tika-vin01t2:731_2: vedamānoti attho. Tattha tattha sabba-ggahaṇena assāsādikāyassa anavasesapariyādāne
tika-vin01t2:731_3: siddhepi anekakalāpasamudāyabhāvato tassa sabbesampi bhāgānaṃ saṃvedanadassanatthaṃ
tika-vin01t2:731_5: dassento “sakalassā”tiādimāha. Tattha yathā samānesupi assāsapassāsesu yogino paṭipattividhāne
tika-vin01t2:731_6: paccekaṃ sakkaccaṃyeva paṭipajjitabbanti dassetuṃ visuṃ desanā katā, evaṃ tamevatthaṃ
tika-vin01t2:731_7: dīpetuṃ satipi atthassa samānatāya “sakalassā”tiādinā padadvayassa visuṃ visuṃ atthavaṇṇanā
tika-vin01t2:731_8: katāti veditabbā. Pākaṭaṃ karontoti vibhūtaṃ karonto, sabbaso vibhāventoti attho.
tika-vin01t2:731_9: Pākaṭīkaraṇaṃ vibhāvanaṃ tattha asammuyhanañāṇeneva nesaṃ pavattanena hotīti dassento
tika-vin01t2:731_10: “evaṃ viditaṃ karonto”tiādimāha. Tattha tasmāti yasmā ñāṇasampayuttacitteneva assāsapassāse
tika-vin01t2:731_11: pavatteti, na vippayuttacittena, tasmā evaṃbhūto sabbakāyappaṭisaṃvedī assasissāmi
tika-vin01t2:731_12: passasissāmīti sikkhatīti vuccati buddhādīhīti yojanā. Cuṇṇavicuṇṇavisaṭeti anekakalāpatāya
tika-vin01t2:731_13: cuṇṇavicuṇṇabhāvena visaṭe. Ādi pākaṭo hoti satiyā ñāṇassa ca vasena katapubbābhisaṅkhārassa
tika-vin01t2:731_14: pavattattā. Tādisena bhavitabbanti catutthapuggalasadisena bhavitabbaṃ, pageva satiṃ
tika-vin01t2:731_15: ñāṇañca paccupaṭṭhapetvā tīsupi ṭhānesu ñāṇasampayuttameva cittaṃ pavattetabbanti adhippāyo.
tika-vin01t2:732_0: Evanti vuttappakārena sabbakāyappaṭisaṃvedanavaseneva. Ghaṭatīti ussahati. Vāyamatīti
tika-vin01t2:732_1: vāyāmaṃ karoti, manasikāraṃ pavattetīti attho. Tathābhūtassāti ānāpānassatiṃ bhāventassa.
tika-vin01t2:732_2: Saṃvaroti sati vīriyampi vā. Tāya satiyāti yā sā ānāpāne ārabbha pavattā sati, tāya.
tika-vin01t2:732_3: Tena manasikārenāti yo so tattha satipubbaṅgamo bhāvanāmanasikāro, tena saddhinti
tika-vin01t2:732_4: adhippāyo. Āsevatīti “tisso sikkhāyo”ti vutte adhikusaladhamme āsevati. Tadāsevanañhettha
tika-vin01t2:732_5: sikkhananti adhippetaṃ. Purimanayeti purimasmiṃ bhāvanānaye, paṭhamavatthudvayeti
tika-vin01t2:732_6: adhippāyo. Tatthāpi kāmaṃ ñāṇuppādanaṃ labbhateva assāsapassāsānaṃ yāthāvato dīgharassabhāvāvabodhasabbhāvato,
tika-vin01t2:732_7: tathāpi taṃ na dukkaraṃ yathāpavattānaṃ tesaṃ gahaṇamattabhāvatoti tattha vattamānakālappayogo
tika-vin01t2:732_8: kato. Idaṃ pana dukkaraṃ purisassa khuradhārāyaṃ gamanasadisaṃ, tasmā sātisayenettha
tika-vin01t2:732_9: pubbābhisaṅkhārena bhavitabbanti dīpetuṃ anāgatakālappayogo katoti imamatthaṃ dassetuṃ
tika-vin01t2:733_0: Kāyasaṅkhāranti assāsapassāsaṃ. So hi cittasamuṭṭhānopi samāno karajakāyapaṭibaddhavuttitāya
tika-vin01t2:733_1: tena saṅkharīyatīti kāyasaṅkhāroti vuccati. Yo pana “kāyasaṅkhāro vacīsaṅkhāro”ti
tika-vin01t2:733_2: evamāgato kāyasaṅkhāro cetanālakkhaṇo satipi dvārantaruppattiyaṃ yebhuyyavuttiyā
tika-vin01t2:733_3: tabbahulavuttiyā ca kāyadvārena lakkhito, so idha nādhippeto. Passambhentotiādīsu
tika-vin01t2:733_4: pacchimaṃ pacchimaṃ padaṃ purimassa purimassa atthavacanaṃ. Tasmā passambhanaṃ nāma
tika-vin01t2:733_5: vūpasamanaṃ, tañca tathāpayoge asati uppajjanārahassa oḷārikassa kāyasaṅkhārassa
tika-vin01t2:733_6: payogasampattiyā anuppādananti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tatrāti “oḷārikaṃ kāyasaṅkhāraṃ passambhento”ti
tika-vin01t2:733_7: ettha. Apariggahitakāleti kammaṭṭhānassa anāraddhakāle, tato eva kāyacittānampi apariggahitakāle.
tika-vin01t2:733_8: “Nisīdati pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā ujuṃ kāyaṃ paṇidhāyā”ti hi iminā kāyapariggaho, “parimukhaṃ
tika-vin01t2:733_9: satiṃ upaṭṭhapetvā”ti iminā cittapariggaho vutto. Tenevāha – “kāyopi cittampi pariggahitā
tika-vin01t2:733_10: hontī”ti. Kāyoti karajakāyo. Sadarathāti sapariḷāhā. Sā ca nesaṃ sadarathatā garubhāvena
tika-vin01t2:733_11: viya oḷārikatāya avinābhāvinīti āha “oḷārikā”ti. Balavatarāti sabalā thūlā. Santā
tika-vin01t2:733_12: hontīti cittaṃ tāva bahiddhā vikkhepābhāvena ekaggaṃ hutvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ pariggahetvā
tika-vin01t2:733_13: pavattamānaṃ santaṃ hoti vūpasantaṃ, tato eva taṃsamuṭṭhānā rūpadhammā lahumudukammaññabhāvappattā,
tika-vin01t2:733_14: tadanuguṇatāya sesaṃ tisantatirūpanti evaṃ citte kāye ca vūpasante pavattamāne tannissitā
tika-vin01t2:733_15: assāsapassāsā santasabhāvā anukkamena sukhumasukhumatarasukhumatamā hutvā pavattanti.
tika-vin01t2:733_16: Tena vuttaṃ “yadā panassa kāyopī”tiādi. Passambhemīti paṭhamāvajjanā. Ābhujanaṃ ābhogo,
tika-vin01t2:733_17: sammā anu anu āharaṇaṃ samannāhāro, tasmiṃyeva atthe aparāparaṃ pavattaāvajjanā tasseva
tika-vin01t2:733_18: atthassa manasikaraṇaṃ citte ṭhapanaṃ manasikāro, vīmaṃsā paccavekkhaṇā.
tika-vin01t2:734_0: Sāraddheti sadarathe sapariḷāhe. Adhimattanti balavaṃ oḷārikaṃ, liṅgavipallāsena
tika-vin01t2:734_1: vuttaṃ. Kāyasaṅkhāro hi adhippeto. “Adhimattaṃ hutvā pavattatī”ti kiriyāvisesanaṃ
tika-vin01t2:734_2: vā etaṃ. Sukhumanti etthāpi eseva nayo. Kāyamhīti ettha citte cāti ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:735_0: Paṭhamajjhānato vuṭṭhāya kariyamānaṃ dutiyajjhānassa nānāvajjanaṃ parikammaṃ paṭhamajjhānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:735_1: viya dūrasamussāritapaṭipakkhanti katvā taṃsamuṭṭhāno kāyasaṅkhāro paṭhamajjhāne
tika-vin01t2:735_2: ca dutiyajjhānūpacāre ca oḷārikoti sadiso vutto. Esa nayo sesupacāradvayepi. Atha
tika-vin01t2:735_3: vā dutiyajjhānādīnaṃ adhigamāya paṭipajjato dukkhāpaṭipadādivasena kilamato yogino
tika-vin01t2:735_5: dutiyajjhānādiupacāresu kāyasaṅkhārassa oḷārikatā veditabbā. Atisukhumoti aññattha
tika-vin01t2:735_6: labbhamāno kāyasaṅkhāro catutthajjhāne atikkantasukhumo. Sukhumabhāvopissa tattha
tika-vin01t2:735_7: natthi kuto oḷārikatā appavattanato. Tenāha “appavattimeva pāpuṇātī”ti.
tika-vin01t2:736_0: Lābhissa sato anupubbasamāpattisamāpajjanavelaṃ ekāsaneneva vā sabbesaṃ jhānānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:736_2: sukhumataraṃ icchanti. Tattha hi sopacārānaṃ jhānānaṃ uparūpari visesavantatā santatā
tika-vin01t2:736_3: ca sambhaveyya, ekāvajjanūpacāraṃ vā sandhāya evaṃ vuttaṃ. Evañhi heṭṭhā vuttavādena
tika-vin01t2:736_4: imassa vādassa avirodho siddho bhinnavisayattā. Sabbesaṃyevāti ubhayesampi. Yasmā
tika-vin01t2:736_5: te sabbepi vuccamānena vidhinā passaddhimicchantiyeva. Apariggahitakāle pavattakāyasaṅkhāro
tika-vin01t2:736_6: pariggahitakāle paṭippassambhatīti idaṃ sadisasantānatāya vuttaṃ. Na hi te eva oḷārikā
tika-vin01t2:736_7: assāsādayo sukhumā honti. Passambhanākāro pana tesaṃ heṭṭhā vuttoyeva.
tika-vin01t2:737_0: Mahābhūtapariggahe sukhumoti catudhātumukhena vipassanābhinivesaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:737_1: Sakalarūpapariggahe sukhumo bhāvanāya uparūpari paṇītabhāvato. Tenevāha “rūpārūpapariggahe
tika-vin01t2:737_3: paṭṭhāya balavavipassanā, tato oraṃ dubbalavipassanā. Pubbe vuttanayenāti “apariggahitakāle”tiādinā
tika-vin01t2:737_4: samathanaye vuttanayena. “Apariggahe pavatto kāyasaṅkhāro mahābhūtapariggahe paṭippassambhatī”tiādinā
tika-vin01t2:738_0: Assāti imassa “passambhayaṃ kāyasaṅkhāra”nti padassa. Codanāsodhanāhīti anuyogaparihārehi.
tika-vin01t2:738_1: Evanti idāni vuccamānākārena. Kathanti yaṃ idaṃ “passambhayaṃ…pe… sikkhatī”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:738_2: taṃ kathaṃ kena pakārena kāyasaṅkhārassa passambhanaṃ yogino ca sikkhanaṃ hotīti
tika-vin01t2:738_3: kathetukāmatāya pucchitvā kāyasaṅkhāre sarūpato oḷārikasukhumato vūpasamato anuyogaparihārato
tika-vin01t2:738_4: ca dassetuṃ “katame kāyasaṅkhārā”tiādi āraddhaṃ. Tattha kāyikāti rūpakāye bhavā.
tika-vin01t2:738_5: Kāyappaṭibaddhāti kāyasannissitā. Kāye sati honti, asati na honti, tato eva te akāyasamuṭṭhānāpi
tika-vin01t2:738_6: kāyena saṅkharīyantīti kāyasaṅkhārā. Passambhentoti oḷārikoḷārikaṃ passambhento.
tika-vin01t2:739_0: Sesapadadvayaṃ tasseva vevacanaṃ. Oḷārikañhi kāyasaṅkhāraṃ avūpasantasabhāvaṃ sannisīdāpento
tika-vin01t2:740_0: Yathārūpehīti yādisehi. Kāyasaṅkhārehīti oḷārikehi kāyasaṅkhārehi. Ānamanāti abhimukhena
tika-vin01t2:740_1: kāyassa namanā. Vinamanāti visuṃ visuṃ passato namanā. Sannamanāti sabbato, suṭṭhu
tika-vin01t2:740_2: vā namanā. Paṇamanāti pacchato namanā. Iñjanādīni ānamanādīnaṃ vevacanāni, adhimattāni
tika-vin01t2:740_3: vā abhimukhacalanādīni ānamanādayo, mandāni iñjanādayo. Passambhayaṃ kāyasaṅkhāranti
tika-vin01t2:740_4: tathārūpaṃ ānamanādīnaṃ kāraṇabhūtaṃ oḷārikaṃ kāyasaṅkhāraṃ paṭippassambhento. Tasmiñhi
tika-vin01t2:741_0: Santaṃ sukhumanti yathārūpehi kāyasaṅkhārehi kāyassa aparipphandanahetūhi ānamanādayo
tika-vin01t2:741_1: na honti, tathārūpaṃ darathābhāvato santaṃ, anoḷārikatāya sukhumaṃ. Passambhayaṃ
tika-vin01t2:741_2: kāyasaṅkhāranti sāmaññato ekaṃ katvā vadati. Atha vā pubbe oḷārikoḷārikaṃ kāyasaṅkhāraṃ
tika-vin01t2:741_3: paṭippassambhento anukkamena kāyassa aparipphandanahetubhūte sukhumasukhumatare uppādetvā
tika-vin01t2:741_4: tepi paṭippassambhetvā paramasukhumatāya koṭippattaṃ yaṃ kāyasaṅkhāraṃ paṭippassambheti,
tika-vin01t2:741_5: taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “santaṃ sukhumaṃ passambhayaṃ kāyasaṅkhāra”nti.
tika-vin01t2:742_0: Itītiādi codakavacanaṃ. Tattha itīti pakāratthe nipāto, kirāti arucisūcane, evañceti
tika-vin01t2:742_1: attho. Ayañhettha adhippāyo “vuttappakārena yadi atisukhumampi kāyasaṅkhāraṃ passambhetī”ti.
tika-vin01t2:742_2: Evaṃ santeti evaṃ sati tayā vuttākāre labbhamāne. Vātūpaladdhiyāti vātassa upaladdhiyā.
tika-vin01t2:742_3: Ca-saddo samuccayattho, assāsādivātārammaṇassa cittassa pabhāvanā uppādanā pavattanā
tika-vin01t2:742_4: na hoti, te ca tena passambhetabbāti adhippāyo. Assāsapassāsānañca pabhāvanāti oḷārike
tika-vin01t2:742_5: assāsapassāse bhāvanāya paṭippassambhetvā sukhumānaṃ tesaṃ pabhāvanā ca na hoti ubhayesaṃ
tika-vin01t2:742_6: tesaṃ tena paṭippassambhetabbato. Ānāpānassatiyāti ānāpānārammaṇāya satiyā ca pavattanaṃ
tika-vin01t2:742_7: na hoti ānāpānānaṃ abhāvato. Tato eva taṃsampayuttassa ānāpānassatisamādhissa ca
tika-vin01t2:742_8: pabhāvanā uppādanāpi na hoti. Na hi kadāci ārammaṇena vinā sārammaṇā dhammā sambhavanti.
tika-vin01t2:742_9: Na ca naṃ tanti ettha nanti nipātamattaṃ. Taṃ vuttavidhānaṃ samāpattiṃ paṇḍitā paññavanto
tika-vin01t2:742_10: na ceva samāpajjantipi tato na vuṭṭhahantipīti yojanā. Evaṃ codako sabbena sabbaṃ
tika-vin01t2:743_0: Puna iti kirātiādi yathāvuttāya codanāya vissajjanā. Tattha kirāti yadīti etassa
tika-vin01t2:743_1: atthe nipāto. Iti kira sikkhati, mayā vuttākārena yadi sikkhatīti attho. Evaṃ santeti
tika-vin01t2:743_2: evaṃ passambhane sati. Pabhāvanā hotīti yadipi oḷārikā kāyasaṅkhārā paṭippassambhanti,
tika-vin01t2:743_3: sukhumā pana atthevāti anukkamena paramasukhumabhāvappattassa vasena nimittuppattiyā
tika-vin01t2:743_4: ānāpānassatiyā ānāpānassatisamādhissa ca pabhāvanā ijjhatevāti adhippāyo.
tika-vin01t2:744_0: Yathā kathaṃ viyāti yathāvuttavidhānaṃ taṃ kathaṃ viya daṭṭhabbaṃ, atthi kiñci tadatthasampaṭipādane
tika-vin01t2:744_1: opammanti adhippāyo. Idāni opammaṃ dassetuṃ “seyyathāpī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha seyyathāpīti
tika-vin01t2:744_2: opammatthe nipāto. Kaṃseti kaṃsabhājane. Nimittanti nimittassa, tesaṃ saddānaṃ pavattākārassāti
tika-vin01t2:744_3: attho. Sāmiatthe hi idaṃ upayogavacanaṃ. Suggahitattāti suṭṭhu gahitattā. Sumanasikatattāti
tika-vin01t2:744_4: suṭṭhu citte ṭhapitattā. Sūpadhāritattāti sammadeva upadhāritattā sallakkhitattā.
tika-vin01t2:744_5: Sukhumakā saddāti anurave āha, ye appakā. Appattho hi ayaṃ ka-saddo. Sukhumasaddanimittārammaṇatāpīti
tika-vin01t2:744_6: sukhumo saddova nimittaṃ sukhumasaddanimittaṃ, tadārammaṇatāyapīti vuttaṃ hoti. Kāmaṃ
tika-vin01t2:744_7: tadā sukhumāpi saddā niruddhā, saddanimittassa pana suggahitattā sukhumatarasaddanimittārammaṇabhāvenapi
tika-vin01t2:744_8: cittaṃ pavattati. Ādito paṭṭhāya hi tassa tassa niruddhassa saddassa nimittaṃ avikkhittena
tika-vin01t2:744_9: cittena upadhārentassa anukkamena pariyosāne atisukhumasaddanimittampi ārammaṇaṃ
tika-vin01t2:744_10: katvā cittaṃ pavattateva. Cittaṃ na vikkhepaṃ gacchati tasmiṃ yathāupaṭṭhite nimitte
tika-vin01t2:745_0: Evaṃ santetiādi vuttassevatthassa nigamanavasena vuttaṃ. Tattha yassa suttapadassa
tika-vin01t2:745_1: saddhiṃ codanāsodhanāhi attho vutto, taṃ uddharitvā kāyānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānāni vibhāgato
tika-vin01t2:745_2: dassetuṃ “passambhaya”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha passambhayaṃ kāyasaṅkhāranti vuttaassāsapassāsā
tika-vin01t2:745_3: kāyoti yojanā veditabbā. Atha vā passambhayaṃ kāyasaṅkhāranti ettha assāsapassāsā
tika-vin01t2:745_4: kāyoti evamattho daṭṭhabbo. Mahāsatipaṭṭhānasutte kāyānupassanaṃ kathentena paṭhamacatukkasseva
tika-vin01t2:745_5: vuttattā, ānāpānassatisuttepi “yasmiṃ samaye, bhikkhave, bhikkhu dīghaṃ vā assasanto
tika-vin01t2:745_6: dīghaṃ assasāmīti pajānāti…pe… passambhayaṃ kāyasaṅkhāraṃ passasissāmīti sikkhati.
tika-vin01t2:745_7: Kāye kāyānupassī, bhikkhave, tasmiṃ samaye bhikkhu viharatī”ti vuttattā ca “kāyānupassanāvasena
tika-vin01t2:746_0: Ādikammikassa kammaṭṭhānavasenāti samathakammaṭṭhānaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, vipassanākammaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:746_1: pana itaracatukkesupi labbhateva. Etthāti paṭhamacatukke. Saha paṭisambhidāhīti nidassanamattametaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:746_2: puññavantānaṃ pana upanissayasampannānaṃ abhiññāpi sijjhatiyeva. Catubbidhanti pātimokkhasaṃvarādivasena
tika-vin01t2:746_3: catubbidhaṃ. Anāpajjananti sattannaṃ āpattikkhandhānaṃ aññatarassa anāpajjanaṃ. Āpannavuṭṭhānanti
tika-vin01t2:746_5: desanāya, vuṭṭhānagāminito parivāsādivinayakammakaraṇena vuṭṭhānanti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin01t2:746_6: Desanāyapi hi āpannāpattito vuṭṭhānaṃ hotīti sāpi vuṭṭhāneneva saṅgahitā. Kilesehi
tika-vin01t2:746_7: ca appaṭipīḷananti kodho upanāho makkho palāso issā macchariyaṃ māyā sāṭheyyaṃ thambho
tika-vin01t2:746_8: sārambho māno atimāno mado pamādoti evamādīhi pāpadhammehi appaṭipīḷanaṃ, tesaṃ anuppādananti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin01t2:747_0: Yamidaṃ ābhisamācārikasīlaṃ vuccatīti sambandho. Dveasīti khandhakavattāni cuddasavidhaṃ
tika-vin01t2:747_1: mahāvattanti ettha mahāvattaṃ nāma vattakkhandhake vuttāni āgantukavattaṃ āvāsikagamikaanumodanabhattaggapiṇḍacārikaāraññikasenāsanajantāgharavaccakuṭiupajjhāyasaddhivihārikaācariyaantevāsikavattanti
tika-vin01t2:747_2: cuddasa vattāni. Tato aññāni pana kadāci tajjanīyakammakatādikāleyeva caritabbāni
tika-vin01t2:747_3: dvāsīti khandhakavattāni, na sabbāsu avatthāsu caritabbāni, tasmā mahāvattesu agaṇitāni.
tika-vin01t2:747_4: Tattha “pārivāsikānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ vattaṃ paññapessāmī”ti ārabhitvā “na upasampādetabbaṃ…pe…
tika-vin01t2:747_5: na chamāyaṃ caṅkamante caṅkame caṅkamitabba”nti vuttavattāni chasaṭṭhi, tato paraṃ
tika-vin01t2:747_6: “na, bhikkhave, pārivāsikena bhikkhunā pārivāsikavuḍḍhatarena bhikkhunā saddhiṃ mūlāyapaṭikassanārahena,
tika-vin01t2:747_7: mānattārahena, mānattacārikena, abbhānārahena bhikkhunā saddhiṃ ekacchanne āvāse
tika-vin01t2:747_8: vatthabba”ntiādinā vuttāni pakatatte caritabbehi anaññattā visuṃ tāni agaṇetvā pārivāsikavuḍḍhatarādīsu
tika-vin01t2:747_9: puggalantaresu caritabbattā tesaṃ vasena sampiṇḍetvā ekekaṃ katvā gaṇitāni pañcāti
tika-vin01t2:747_10: ekasattati vattāni, ukkhepanīyakammakatavattesu vattapaññāpanavasena vuttaṃ “na pakatattassa
tika-vin01t2:747_11: bhikkhuno abhivādanaṃ…pe… nahāne piṭṭhiparikammaṃ sāditabba”nti idaṃ abhivādanādīnaṃ
tika-vin01t2:747_12: asādiyanaṃ ekaṃ, “na pakatatto bhikkhu sīlavipattiyā anuddhaṃsetabbo”tiādīni ca dasāti
tika-vin01t2:747_13: evametāni dvāsīti. Etesveva pana kānici tajjanīyakammādivattāni kānici pārivāsikādivattānīti
tika-vin01t2:747_14: aggahitaggahaṇena dvāsīti eva. Aññattha pana aṭṭhakathāpadese appakaṃ ūnamadhikaṃ
tika-vin01t2:747_15: vā gaṇanūpagaṃ na hotīti asīti khandhakavattānīti vuccati. Ābhisamācārikasīlanti
tika-vin01t2:747_16: ettha abhisamācāroti uttamasamācāro, abhisamācārova ābhisamācārikaṃ, abhisamācāraṃ
tika-vin01t2:747_17: vā ārabbha paññattaṃ ābhisamācārikaṃ, tadeva sīlanti ābhisamācārikasīlaṃ. Khandhakavattapariyāpannassa
tika-vin01t2:747_18: sīlassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Ahaṃ sīlaṃ rakkhāmi, kiṃ ābhisamācārikenātiādīsu sīlanti
tika-vin01t2:747_20: gahitattā. Paripūreti paripuṇṇe, paripūriteti vā attho.
tika-vin01t2:748_0: Tatoti yathāvuttasīlavisodhanato paraṃ. Āvāsoti āvāsapalibodho. Kulantiādīsupi eseva
tika-vin01t2:748_1: nayo. Tattha āvāsoti ekopi ovarako vuccati ekampi pariveṇaṃ sakalopi saṅghārāmo.
tika-vin01t2:748_2: Svāyaṃ na sabbasseva palibodho hoti, yo panettha navakammādiussukkaṃ vā āpajjati,
tika-vin01t2:748_3: bahubhaṇḍasannicayo vā hoti, yena kenaci vā kāraṇena apekkhavā paṭibaddhacitto, tasseva
tika-vin01t2:749_0: Kulanti ñātikulaṃ vā upaṭṭhākakulaṃ vā. Ekaccassa hi upaṭṭhākakulampi “sukhite sukhito”tiādinā
tika-vin01t2:749_1: nayena saṃsaṭṭhassa viharato palibodho hoti, so kulamānusakehi vinā dhammassavanāya
tika-vin01t2:749_2: sāmantavihārampi na gacchati. Ekaccassa mātāpitaropi palibodhā na honti koraṇḍakavihāravāsittherassa
tika-vin01t2:750_0: Lābhoti cattāro paccayā. Te kathaṃ palibodhā honti? Puññavantassa hi bhikkhuno gatagataṭṭhāne
tika-vin01t2:750_1: manussā mahāparivāre paccaye denti, so tesaṃ anumodento dhammaṃ desento samaṇadhammaṃ
tika-vin01t2:750_2: kātuṃ okāsaṃ na labhati, aruṇuggamanato yāva paṭhamayāmo, tāva manussasaṃsaggo na
tika-vin01t2:750_3: upacchijjati, puna balavapaccūseyeva bāhullikapiṇḍapātikā āgantvā “bhante, asuko
tika-vin01t2:750_4: upaṭṭhāko upāsako upāsikā amacco amaccadhītā tumhākaṃ dassanakāmā”ti vadanti, so
tika-vin01t2:750_5: “gaṇhāvuso pattacīvara”nti gamanasajjova hoti niccabyāvaṭo, tasseva te paccayā palibodhā
tika-vin01t2:750_6: honti. Tena gaṇaṃ pahāya yattha naṃ na jānanti, tattha ekakena caritabbaṃ. Evaṃ so
tika-vin01t2:751_0: Gaṇoti suttantikagaṇo vā ābhidhammikagaṇo vā. Yo tassa uddesaṃ vā paripucchaṃ vā
