tika-vin01t2:751_1: dento samaṇadhammassa okāsaṃ na labhati, tassa gaṇo palibodho hoti. Tena so evaṃ
tika-vin01t2:751_2: upacchinditabbo – sace tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ bahu kataṃ hoti, appaṃ avasiṭṭhaṃ, taṃ niṭṭhapetvā
tika-vin01t2:751_3: araññaṃ pavisitabbaṃ. Sace appaṃ kataṃ, bahu avasiṭṭhaṃ, yojanato paraṃ agantvā antoyojanaparicchede
tika-vin01t2:751_4: aññaṃ gaṇavācakaṃ upasaṅkamitvā “ime āyasmā uddesādīhi saṅgaṇhatū”ti vattabbaṃ. Evampi
tika-vin01t2:751_5: alabhamānena “mayhaṃ, āvuso, ekaṃ kiccaṃ atthi, tumhe yathāphāsukaṭṭhānāni gacchathā”ti
tika-vin01t2:752_0: Kammenāti kammapalibodhena. “Kammañca pañcama”ntipi pāṭho. Tattha kammanti navakammaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:752_1: Taṃ karontena vaḍḍhakīādīhi laddhāladdhaṃ jānitabbaṃ, katākate ussukkaṃ āpajjitabbanti
tika-vin01t2:752_2: sabbathāpi palibodho hoti. Sopi evaṃ upacchinditabbo – sace appaṃ avasiṭṭhaṃ hoti,
tika-vin01t2:752_3: niṭṭhapetabbaṃ. Sace bahu, saṅghikaṃ ce, navakammaṃ saṅghassa vā bhārahārakabhikkhūnaṃ
tika-vin01t2:752_4: vā niyyātetabbaṃ. Attano santakaṃ ce, attano bhārahārakānaṃ niyyātetabbaṃ. Tādisaṃ
tika-vin01t2:753_0: Addhānanti maggagamanaṃ. Yassa hi katthaci pabbajjāpekkho vā hoti, paccayajātaṃ vā
tika-vin01t2:753_1: kiñci laddhabbaṃ hoti. Sace taṃ alabhanto na sakkoti adhivāsetuṃ, araññaṃ pavisitvā
tika-vin01t2:753_2: samaṇadhammaṃ karontassapi gamikacittaṃ nāma duppaṭivinodayaṃ hoti, tasmā gantvā
tika-vin01t2:753_3: taṃ kiccaṃ tīretvāva samaṇadhamme ussukkaṃ kātabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:754_1: ghare mātā pitā bhātāti evamādikā. Te gilānā imassa palibodhā honti. Tasmā so palibodho
tika-vin01t2:754_2: te upaṭṭhahitvā tesaṃ pākatikakaraṇena upacchinditabbo. Tattha upajjhāyo tāva gilāno
tika-vin01t2:754_3: sace lahuṃ na vuṭṭhāti, yāvajīvaṃ paṭijaggitabbo, tathā pabbajjācariyo upasampadācariyo
tika-vin01t2:754_5: pana yāva nissayauddesā anupacchinnā, tāva paṭijaggitabbā. Pahontena tato uddhampi
tika-vin01t2:754_6: paṭijaggitabbā eva. Mātāpitūsu upajjhāye viya paṭijaggitabbaṃ. Sacepi hi te rajje
tika-vin01t2:754_7: ṭhitā honti, puttato ca upaṭṭhānaṃ paccāsīsanti, kātabbameva. Atha tesaṃ bhesajjaṃ
tika-vin01t2:754_8: natthi, attano santakaṃ dātabbaṃ. Asati, bhikkhācariyāya pariyesitvāpi dātabbameva.
tika-vin01t2:754_9: Bhātubhaginīnaṃ pana tesaṃ santakameva yojetvā dātabbaṃ. Sace natthi, attano santakaṃ
tika-vin01t2:754_10: tāvakālikaṃ datvā pacchā labhantena gaṇhitabbaṃ, alabhantena na codetabbā. Aññātakassa
tika-vin01t2:754_11: bhaginiyā sāmikassa bhesajjaṃ neva kātuṃ, na dātuṃ vaṭṭati, “tuyhaṃ sāmikassa dehī”ti
tika-vin01t2:754_12: vatvā pana bhaginiyā dātabbaṃ. Bhātu jāyāyapi eseva nayo, tesaṃ pana puttā imassa
tika-vin01t2:755_0: Ābādhoti yo koci rogo. So bādhayamāno palibodho hoti, tasmā bhesajjakaraṇena upacchinditabbo.
tika-vin01t2:755_1: Sace pana katipāhaṃ bhesajjaṃ karontassapi na vūpasammati, “nāhaṃ tuyhaṃ dāso, na
tika-vin01t2:755_2: bhatako, taṃyevamhi posento anamatagge saṃsāravaṭṭe dukkhappatto”ti attabhāvaṃ garahitvā
tika-vin01t2:756: Ganthoti pariyattipariharaṇaṃ. Taṃ sajjhāyādīhi niccabyāvaṭasseva palibodho hoti, na itarassa.
tika-vin01t2:757_0: Iddhiyāti iddhipalibodhena. “Iddhīti te dasā”tipi pāṭho. Tattha iddhīti pothujjanikā
tika-vin01t2:757_1: iddhi. Sā hi uttānaseyyakadārako viya taruṇasassaṃ viya ca dupparihārā hoti, appamattakena
tika-vin01t2:757_2: ca bhijjati. Sā pana vipassanāya palibodho hoti, na samādhissa samādhiṃ patvā pattabbato,
tika-vin01t2:757_3: tasmā vipassanātthikena iddhipalibodho upacchinditabbo, itarena avasesāti. Kammaṭṭhānabhāvanaṃ
tika-vin01t2:757_4: paribundheti uparodheti pavattituṃ na detīti palibodho, ra-kārassa la-kāraṃ katvā
tika-vin01t2:757_5: vutto, paripanthoti attho. Upacchinditabboti samāpanena saṅgahaṇena uparundhitabbo,
tika-vin01t2:758_0: Kammaṭṭhāne niyutto kammaṭṭhāniko, bhāvanamanuyuñjanto. Tena kammaṭṭhānikena. Paricchinditvāti
tika-vin01t2:758_1: “imasmiṃ vihāre sabbepi bhikkhū”ti evaṃ paricchinditvā. Sahavāsīnanti sahavāsīnaṃ
tika-vin01t2:758_2: bhikkhūnaṃ. Muducittataṃ janetīti attani muducittataṃ uppādeti. Ayañca sahavāsīnaṃ
tika-vin01t2:759_0: Anolīnavuttiko hotīti sammāpaṭipattiyaṃ olīnavuttiko hīnavīriyo na hoti, āraddhavīriyo
tika-vin01t2:759_1: hotīti attho. Dibbesupi ārammaṇesu, pageva itaresūti adhippāyo. Sabbatthāti sabbasmiṃ
tika-vin01t2:759_2: samaṇakaraṇīye, sabbasmiṃ vā kammaṭṭhānānuyoge. Atthayitabbanti pubbāsevanavasena
tika-vin01t2:759_3: atthayitabbaṃ. Yogassa bhāvanāya anuyuñjanaṃ yogānuyogo, tadeva karaṇīyaṭṭhena kammaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:760_1: katvā pāḷiyaṃ pathavīkasiṇādīnaṃ rūpajjhānārammaṇānaṃ aṭṭhannaṃyeva kasiṇānaṃ sarūpato
tika-vin01t2:760_2: vuttattā ākāsakasiṇaṃ ālokakasiṇañca vajjetvā “aṭṭhatiṃsārammaṇesū”ti pāḷiyaṃ āgatanayeneva
tika-vin01t2:760_3: vuttaṃ. Aṭṭhakathānayena pana ākāsakasiṇe ālokakasiṇe ca visuṃ gahite cattālīsaṃyeva
tika-vin01t2:760_4: kammaṭṭhānāni. Tatrimāni cattālīsa kammaṭṭhānāni – dasa kasiṇā, dasa asubhā, dasa
tika-vin01t2:760_5: anussatiyo, cattāro brahmavihārā, cattāro āruppā, ekā saññā, ekaṃ vavatthānanti.
tika-vin01t2:760_6: Tattha pathavīkasiṇaṃ āpokasiṇaṃ tejokasiṇaṃ vāyokasiṇaṃ nīlakasiṇaṃ pītakasiṇaṃ
tika-vin01t2:760_7: lohitakasiṇaṃ odātakasiṇaṃ ālokakasiṇaṃ paricchinnākāsakasiṇanti ime dasa kasiṇā.
tika-vin01t2:760_8: Uddhumātakaṃ vinīlakaṃ vipubbakaṃ vicchiddakaṃ vikkhāyitakaṃ vikkhittakaṃ hatavikkhittakaṃ
tika-vin01t2:760_9: lohitakaṃ puḷavakaṃ aṭṭhikanti ime dasa asubhā. Buddhānussati dhamma saṅgha sīla
tika-vin01t2:760_10: cāga devatānussati maraṇassati kāyagatāsati ānāpānassati upasamānussatīti imā dasa
tika-vin01t2:760_11: anussatiyo. Mettā karuṇā muditā upekkhāti ime cattāro brahmavihārā. Ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ
tika-vin01t2:760_12: viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ nevasaññānāsaññāyatananti ime cattāro āruppā.
tika-vin01t2:760_13: Āhāre paṭikūlasaññā ekā saññā. Catudhātuvavatthānaṃ ekaṃ vavatthānanti.
tika-vin01t2:761_0: Yaṃ yassa caritānukūlanti ettha rāgacaritassa tāva dasa asubhā kāyagatāsatīti ekādasa
tika-vin01t2:761_1: kammaṭṭhānāni anukūlāni, dosacaritassa cattāro brahmavihārā cattāri vaṇṇakasiṇānīti
tika-vin01t2:761_2: aṭṭha, mohacaritassa ca vitakkacaritassa ca ekaṃ ānāpānassatikammaṭṭhānameva, saddhācaritassa
tika-vin01t2:761_3: purimā cha anussatiyo, buddhicaritassa maraṇassati upasamānussati catudhātuvavatthānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:761_4: āhāre paṭikūlasaññāti cattāri, sesakasiṇāni cattāro ca āruppā sabbacaritānaṃ anukūlāni.
tika-vin01t2:761_5: Kasiṇesu ca yaṃ kiñci parittaṃ vitakkacaritassa, appamāṇaṃ mohacaritassa anukūlanti
tika-vin01t2:761_6: veditabbaṃ. Yathāvutteneva nayenāti “yogānuyogakammassa padaṭṭhānattā”ti imamatthaṃ atidisati.
tika-vin01t2:762_0: Yaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetukāmo hoti, tasseva vasena catukkapañcakajjhānāni nibbattetvā
tika-vin01t2:762_1: jhānapadaṭṭhānaṃ vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā āsavakkhayappattassa khīṇāsavassa santike gahetabbanti
tika-vin01t2:762_2: āha – “imināva kammaṭṭhānena…pe… uggahetabba”nti. Arahantādayo hītiādi ekaccakhīṇāsavato
tika-vin01t2:762_3: bahussutova kammaṭṭhānadāne seyyoti dassanatthaṃ āraddhaṃ. Mahāhatthipathaṃ nīharanto
tika-vin01t2:762_4: viyāti kammaṭṭhānapathaviṃ mahāhatthipathaṃ katvā dassento viya. Sappāyāsappāyaṃ
tika-vin01t2:762_5: paricchinditvāti yassa kammaṭṭhānaṃ ācikkhati, tassa upakārānupakāraṃ yuttimagganena paricchinditvā.
tika-vin01t2:763_0: Idāni kammaṭṭhānadāyakassa santikaṃ gacchantena dhotamakkhitehi pādehi upāhanā āruhitvā
tika-vin01t2:763_1: chattaṃ gahetvā telanāḷimadhuphāṇitādīni gāhāpetvā antevāsikaparivutena na gantabbaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:763_2: gamikavattaṃ pana pūretvā attano pattacīvaraṃ sayameva gahetvā antarāmagge yaṃ yaṃ
tika-vin01t2:763_3: vihāraṃ pavisati, sabbattha paviṭṭhakāle āgantukavattaṃ, nikkhamanakāle gamikavattanti
tika-vin01t2:763_4: yathārahaṃ taṃ taṃ vattaṃ pūrentena sallahukaparikkhārena paramasallekhavuttinā hutvā
tika-vin01t2:763_6: āha. Evaṃ pana gantvā taṃ vihāraṃ pavisantena antarāyeva dantakaṭṭhaṃ kappiyaṃ kārāpetvā
tika-vin01t2:763_7: gahetvā pavisitabbaṃ, na ca muhuttaṃ vissamitvā pādadhovanamakkhanādīni katvā ācariyassa
tika-vin01t2:763_8: santikaṃ gamissāmīti aññaṃ pariveṇaṃ pavisitabbaṃ. Kasmā? Sace hissa tatra ācariyassa
tika-vin01t2:763_9: visabhāgā bhikkhū bhaveyyuṃ, taṃ te āgamanakāraṇaṃ pucchitvā ācariyassa avaṇṇaṃ pakāsetvā
tika-vin01t2:763_10: “naṭṭhosi, sace tassa santikaṃ āgato”ti vippaṭisāraṃ uppādeyyuṃ, yena tatova paṭinivatteyya,
tika-vin01t2:763_11: tasmā ācariyassa vasanaṭṭhānaṃ pucchitvā ujukaṃ tattheva gantabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:766: Gambhīrañca kathaṃ kattā, no caṭṭhāne niyojako”ti. –
tika-vin01t2:767_0: Evamādinā vuttappakāraṃ saddhādiguṇasamannāgataṃ ekantahitesiṃ vuḍḍhipakkhe ṭhitaṃ
tika-vin01t2:767_1: kalyāṇamittaṃ ācariyaṃ. Vattapaṭipattiyā ārādhitacittassāti ettha sace ācariyo daharataro
tika-vin01t2:767_2: hoti, pattacīvarapaṭiggahaṇādīni na sāditabbāni. Sace vuḍḍhataro, gantvā ācariyaṃ
tika-vin01t2:767_4: pivā”ti vuttena sace icchati, pātabbaṃ. “Pāde dhovā”ti vuttena na tāva dhovitabbā.
tika-vin01t2:767_5: Sace hi ācariyena ābhatamudakaṃ bhaveyya, na sāruppaṃ siyā. “Dhovāvuso, na mayā ābhataṃ,
tika-vin01t2:767_6: aññehi ābhata”nti vuttena pana yattha ācariyo na passati, evarūpe paṭicchanne vā
tika-vin01t2:767_7: okāse abbhokāsavihārassapi vā ekamante nisīditvā pādā dhovitabbā. Sace ācariyo telanāḷiṃ
tika-vin01t2:767_8: āharati, uṭṭhahitvā ubhohi hatthehi sakkaccaṃ gahetabbā. Sace hi na gaṇheyya, “ayaṃ
tika-vin01t2:767_9: bhikkhu ito eva paṭṭhāya sambhogaṃ kopetī”ti ācariyassa aññathattaṃ bhaveyya. Gahetvā
tika-vin01t2:767_10: pana na āditova pādā makkhetabbā. Sace hi taṃ ācariyassa gattabbhañjanatelaṃ bhaveyya,
tika-vin01t2:767_11: na sāruppaṃ siyā, tasmā paṭhamaṃ sīsaṃ makkhetvā khandhādīni makkhetabbāni. “Sabbapārihāriyatelamidaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:767_12: āvuso, pādepi makkhehī”ti vuttena pana pāde makkhetvā “imaṃ telanāḷiṃ ṭhapemi, bhante”ti
tika-vin01t2:768_0: Gatadivasato paṭṭhāya “kammaṭṭhānaṃ me, bhante, kathetha”iccevaṃ na vattabbaṃ. Dutiyadivasato
tika-vin01t2:768_1: pana paṭṭhāya sace ācariyassa pakatiupaṭṭhāko atthi, taṃ yācitvā vattaṃ kātabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:768_2: Sace yācitopi na deti, okāse laddheyeva kātabbaṃ. Karontena ca khuddakamajjhimamahantāni
tika-vin01t2:768_3: tīṇi dantakaṭṭhāni upanāmetabbāni. Sītaṃ uṇhanti duvidhaṃ mukhadhovanudakañca nhānodakañca
tika-vin01t2:768_4: paṭiyādetabbaṃ. Tato yaṃ ācariyo tīṇi divasāni paribhuñjati, tādisameva niccaṃ upaṭṭhāpetabbaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:768_5: niyamaṃ akatvā yaṃ vā taṃ vā paribhuñjantassa yathāladdhaṃ upanāmetabbaṃ. Kiṃ bahunā
tika-vin01t2:768_6: vuttena, yaṃ taṃ bhagavatā “antevāsikena, bhikkhave, ācariyamhi sammā vattitabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:768_7: Tatrāyaṃ sammāvattanā – kālasseva vuṭṭhāya upāhanā omuñcitvā ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ
tika-vin01t2:768_8: karitvā dantakaṭṭhaṃ dātabbaṃ, mukhodakaṃ dātabbaṃ, āsanaṃ paññapetabbaṃ. Sace yāgu
tika-vin01t2:768_9: hoti, bhājanaṃ dhovitvā yāgu upanāmetabbā”tiādikaṃ khandhake vattaṃ paññattaṃ, taṃ
tika-vin01t2:768_10: sabbampi kātabbaṃ. Iti iminā yathāvuttena nayena paṭipajjanto vattapaṭipattiyā cittaṃ
tika-vin01t2:769_0: Pañcasandhikanti pañcapabbaṃ, pañcabhāganti attho. Kammaṭṭhānassa uggaṇhananti kammaṭṭhānaganthassa
tika-vin01t2:769_1: uggaṇhanaṃ, tadatthaparipucchā kammaṭṭhānassa paripucchanā. Atha vā ganthato atthato
tika-vin01t2:769_2: ca kammaṭṭhānassa uggaṇhanaṃ uggaho, tattha saṃsayaparipucchanā paripucchā. Kammaṭṭhānassa
tika-vin01t2:769_3: upaṭṭhānanti nimittupaṭṭhānaṃ, evaṃ bhāvanamanuyuñjantassa “evamidaṃ nimittaṃ upaṭṭhātī”ti
tika-vin01t2:769_4: upadhāraṇaṃ, tathā kammaṭṭhānappanā “evaṃ jhānamappetī”ti. Kammaṭṭhānassa lakkhaṇanti
tika-vin01t2:769_5: gaṇanānubandhanāphusanānaṃ vasena bhāvanaṃ ussukkāpetvā ṭhapanāya sampatti, tato
tika-vin01t2:769_6: parampi vā sallakkhaṇādivasena matthakappattīti kammaṭṭhānasabhāvassa sallakkhaṇaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:770_0: Attanāpi na kilamati odhiso kammaṭṭhānassa uggaṇhanato, tato eva ācariyampi na viheṭheti
tika-vin01t2:770_1: dhammādhikaraṇampi bhāvanāya matthakaṃ pāpanato. Tasmāti taṃnimittaṃ attanoakilamanaācariyāviheṭhanahetu.
tika-vin01t2:770_2: Thokanti thokaṃ thokaṃ. Tatthāti yattha ācariyo vasati, tattha. Sappāyaṃ hotīti āvāsasappāyādilābhena
tika-vin01t2:770_3: manasikāraphāsutā bhāvanānukūlatā hoti. Yojanaparamanti iminā gāvutaaḍḍhayojanānipi
tika-vin01t2:770_4: saṅgaṇhāti. Yasmā pana mandapañño gāvute aḍḍhayojane yojanamatte vā vasanto kammaṭṭhānassa
tika-vin01t2:770_5: kismiñcideva ṭhāne sandehe vā satisammose vā jāte kālasseva vihāre vattaṃ katvā antarāmagge
tika-vin01t2:770_6: piṇḍāya caritvā bhattakiccapariyosāneyeva ācariyassa vasanaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā taṃ divasaṃ
tika-vin01t2:770_7: ācariyassa santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ sodhetvā dutiyadivase ācariyaṃ vanditvā nikkhamitvā
tika-vin01t2:770_8: antarāmagge piṇḍāya caritvā akilamantoyeva attano vasanaṭṭhānaṃ āgantuṃ sakkhissati,
tika-vin01t2:770_9: tasmā vuttaṃ “mandapañño yojanaparamaṃ gantvā”ti. Sace tikkhapañño yojanaparame phāsukaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:770_10: na labhati, tena kammaṭṭhāne sabbaṃ gaṇṭhiṭṭhānaṃ chinditvā visuddhaṃ āvajjanapaṭibaddhaṃ
tika-vin01t2:770_11: kammaṭṭhānaṃ katvā yojanaparamato dūrampi gantuṃ vaṭṭatīti āha “tikkhapañño dūrampi gantvā”ti.
tika-vin01t2:771_1: soṇḍī, paṇṇaṃ, pupphaṃ, phalaṃ, patthanīyatā, nagarasannissitatā, dārusannissitatā,
tika-vin01t2:771_2: khettasannissitatā, visabhāgānaṃ puggalānaṃ atthitā, paṭṭanasannissitatā, paccantasannissitatā,
tika-vin01t2:771_3: rajjasīmasannissitatā, asappāyatā, kalyāṇamittānaṃ alābhoti imehi aṭṭhārasahi senāsanadosehi
tika-vin01t2:771_4: vivajjitaṃ. Imesañhi aṭṭhārasannaṃ dosānaṃ aññatarena samannāgataṃ senāsanaṃ bhāvanāya ananurūpaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:772_0: Kasmā? Mahāvihāre tāva bahū nānāchandā sannipatanti, te aññamaññaṃ paṭiviruddhatāya
tika-vin01t2:772_1: vattaṃ na karonti, bodhiyaṅgaṇādīni asammaṭṭhāneva honti, anupaṭṭhāpitaṃ pānīyaṃ
tika-vin01t2:772_2: paribhojanīyaṃ. Tatrāyaṃ “gocaragāme piṇḍāya carissāmī”ti pattacīvaramādāya nikkhantopi
tika-vin01t2:772_3: sace passati vattaṃ akataṃ, pānīyaghaṭaṃ vā rittaṃ, athānena vattaṃ kātabbaṃ hoti,
tika-vin01t2:772_4: pānīyaṃ upaṭṭhāpetabbaṃ, akaronto vattabhede dukkaṭaṃ āpajjati. Karontassa kālo atikkamati,
tika-vin01t2:772_5: atidivā paviṭṭho niṭṭhitāya bhikkhāya kiñci na labhati. Paṭisallānagatopi sāmaṇeradaharabhikkhūnaṃ
tika-vin01t2:772_6: uccāsaddena saṅghakammehi ca vikkhipati. Yattha pana sabbaṃ vattaṃ katameva hoti,
tika-vin01t2:772_7: avasesāpi ca ghaṭṭanā natthi, evarūpe mahāvihārepi vihātabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:773: Navavihāre bahu navakammaṃ hoti, akarontaṃ ujjhāyanti. Yattha pana bhikkhū evaṃ vadanti “āyasmā yathāsukhaṃ samaṇadhammaṃ karotu, mayaṃ navakammaṃ karissāmā”ti, evarūpe vihātabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:774: Jiṇṇavihāre pana bahu paṭijaggitabbaṃ hoti, antamaso attano senāsanamattampi appaṭijaggantaṃ ujjhāyanti, paṭijaggantassa kammaṭṭhānaṃ parihāyati.
tika-vin01t2:775_0: Panthanissite mahāpathavihāre rattindivaṃ āgantukā sannipatanti. Vikāle āgatānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:775_1: attano senāsanaṃ datvā rukkhamūle vā pāsāṇapiṭṭhe vā vasitabbaṃ hoti, punadivasepi
tika-vin01t2:775_2: evamevāti kammaṭṭhānassa okāso na hoti. Yattha pana evarūpo āgantukasambādho na hoti, tattha vihātabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:776_0: Soṇḍī nāma pāsāṇapokkharaṇī hoti. Tattha pānīyatthaṃ mahājano samosarati, nagaravāsīnaṃ
tika-vin01t2:776_1: rājakulūpakattherānaṃ antevāsikā rajanakammatthāya āgacchanti, tesaṃ bhājanadārudoṇikādīni
tika-vin01t2:776_2: pucchantānaṃ “asuke ca asuke ca ṭhāne”ti dassetabbāni honti. Evaṃ sabbakālampi niccabyāvaṭo hoti.
tika-vin01t2:777_0: Yattha nānāvidhaṃ sākapaṇṇaṃ hoti, tatthassa kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā divāvihāraṃ nisinnassapi
tika-vin01t2:777_1: santike sākahārikā gāyamānā paṇṇaṃ uccinantiyo visabhāgasaddasaṅghaṭṭanena kammaṭṭhānantarāyaṃ karonti.
tika-vin01t2:778: Yattha pana nānāvidhā mālāgacchā supupphitā honti, tatrāpi tādisoyeva upaddavo.
tika-vin01t2:779_0: Yattha nānāvidhaṃ ambajambupanasādiphalaṃ hoti, tattha phalatthikā āgantvā yācanti,
tika-vin01t2:779_1: adentassa kujjhanti, balakkārena vā gaṇhanti, sāyanhasamaye vihāramajjhe caṅkamantena
tika-vin01t2:779_2: te disvā “kiṃ upāsakā evaṃ karothā”ti vuttā yathāruci akkosanti, avāsāyapissa parakkamanti.
tika-vin01t2:780_1: vihāre viharantaṃ “ayaṃ arahā”ti sambhāvetvā vanditukāmā manussā samantā osaranti,
tika-vin01t2:780_2: tenassa na phāsu hoti. Yassa pana taṃ sappāyaṃ hoti, tena divā aññattha gantvā rattiṃ vasitabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:781_0: Nagarasannissite visabhāgārammaṇāni āpāthamāgacchanti, kumbhadāsiyopi ghaṭehi nighaṃsantiyo
tika-vin01t2:781_1: gacchanti, okkamitvā maggaṃ na denti, issaramanussāpi vihāramajjhe sāṇiṃ parikkhipitvā nisīdanti.
tika-vin01t2:782_0: Dārusannissaye pana yattha kaṭṭhāni ca dabbupakaraṇarukkhā ca santi, tattha kaṭṭhahārikā
tika-vin01t2:782_1: pubbe vuttasākapupphahārikā viya aphāsukaṃ karonti. Vihāre rukkhā santi, te “chinditvā
tika-vin01t2:782_2: gharāni karissāmā”ti manussā āgantvā chindanti. Sace sāyanhasamaye padhānagharā nikkhamitvā
tika-vin01t2:782_3: vihāramajjhe caṅkamanto te disvā “kiṃ upāsakā evaṃ karothā”ti vadati, yathāruci akkosanti,
tika-vin01t2:783_0: Yo pana khettasannissito hoti samantā khettehi parivārito, tattha manussā vihāramajjheyeva
tika-vin01t2:783_1: khalaṃ katvā dhaññaṃ maddanti, pamukhesu sayanti, aññampi bahuṃ aphāsuṃ karonti.
tika-vin01t2:783_2: Yatrapi mahāsaṅghabhogo hoti, ārāmikakulānaṃ gāvo rundhanti, udakavāraṃ paṭisedhenti,
tika-vin01t2:783_3: manussā vīhisīsaṃ gahetvā “passatha tumhākaṃ ārāmikakulānaṃ kamma”nti saṅghassa dassenti.
tika-vin01t2:783_4: Tena tena kāraṇena rājarājamahāmattānaṃ gharadvāraṃ gantabbaṃ hoti, ayampi khettasannissiteneva saṅgahito.
tika-vin01t2:784_0: Yattha aññamaññavisabhāgā verī bhikkhū viharanti, ye kalahaṃ karontā “mā, bhante,
tika-vin01t2:784_1: evaṃ karothā”ti vāriyamānā “etassa paṃsukūlikassa āgatakālato paṭṭhāya naṭṭhāmhā”ti vattāro bhavanti.
tika-vin01t2:785: Yopi udakapaṭṭanaṃ vā thalapaṭṭanaṃ vā sannissito hoti, tattha abhiṇhaṃ nāvāhi ca satthehi ca āgatamanussā “okāsaṃ detha, pānīyaṃ detha, loṇaṃ dethā”ti ghaṭṭayantā aphāsuṃ karonti.
tika-vin01t2:786: Paccantasannissite pana manussā buddhādīsu appasannā honti.
tika-vin01t2:787_0: Rajjasīmasannissite rājabhayaṃ hoti. Tañhi padesaṃ eko rājā “na mayhaṃ vase vattatī”ti
tika-vin01t2:787_1: paharati, itaropi “na mayhaṃ vase vattatī”ti. Tatrāyaṃ bhikkhu kadāci imassa rañño
tika-vin01t2:787_2: vijite vicarati, kadāci etassa, atha naṃ “carapuriso aya”nti maññamānā anayabyasanaṃ pāpenti.
tika-vin01t2:788_0: Asappāyatāti visabhāgarūpādiārammaṇasamosaraṇena vā amanussapariggahitatāya vā asappāyatā.
tika-vin01t2:788_1: Tatridaṃ vatthu – eko kira thero araññe vasati. Athassa ekā yakkhinī paṇṇasāladvāre
tika-vin01t2:788_2: ṭhatvā gāyi. So nikkhamitvā dvāre aṭṭhāsi, sā gantvā caṅkamanasīse gāyi. Thero caṅkamanasīsaṃ
tika-vin01t2:788_3: agamāsi, sā sataporise papāte ṭhatvā gāyi. Thero paṭinivatti, atha naṃ sā vegena
tika-vin01t2:788_4: gantvā gahetvā “mayā, bhante, na eko, na dve tumhādisā khāditā”ti āha.
tika-vin01t2:789_0: Yattha na sakkā hoti ācariyaṃ vā ācariyasamaṃ vā upajjhāyaṃ vā upajjhāyasamaṃ vā
tika-vin01t2:789_1: kalyāṇamittaṃ laddhuṃ, tattha so kalyāṇamittānaṃ alābho mahādosoyeva. Tasmā imesaṃ
tika-vin01t2:789_2: aṭṭhārasannaṃ dosānaṃ aññatarena samannāgataṃ senāsanaṃ bhāvanāya ananurūpanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:791: Soṇḍiṃ paṇṇañca pupphañca, phalaṃ patthitameva ca.
tika-vin01t2:796: Pañcasenāsanaṅgasamannāgatanti gāmato nātidūranāccāsannatādīhi pañcahi senāsanaṅgehi samannāgataṃ. Vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā –
tika-vin01t2:797_0: “Kathañca, bhikkhave, senāsanaṃ pañcaṅgasamannāgataṃ hoti? Idha, bhikkhave, senāsanaṃ
tika-vin01t2:797_1: nātidūraṃ hoti nāccāsannaṃ gamanāgamanasampannaṃ, divā appākiṇṇaṃ rattiṃ appasaddaṃ
tika-vin01t2:797_4: tasmiṃ kho pana senāsane therā bhikkhū viharanti bahussutā āgatāgamā dhammadharā
tika-vin01t2:797_5: vinayadharā mātikādharā, te kālena kālaṃ upasaṅkamitvā paripucchati paripañhati ‘idaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:797_6: bhante, kathaṃ, imassa ko attho’ti. Tassa te āyasmanto avivaṭañceva vivaranti, anuttānīkatañca
tika-vin01t2:797_7: uttāniṃ karonti, anekavihitesu ca kaṅkhāṭhāniyesu dhammesu kaṅkhaṃ paṭivinodenti.
tika-vin01t2:797_8: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, senāsanaṃ pañcaṅgasamannāgataṃ hotī”ti.
tika-vin01t2:798_0: Ettha ca nātidūraṃ nāccāsannaṃ gamanāgamanasampannanti ekaṃ aṅgaṃ, divā appākiṇṇaṃ
tika-vin01t2:798_2: ekaṃ, tasmiṃ kho pana senāsane viharantassa…pe… parikkhārāti ekaṃ, tasmiṃ kho pana
tika-vin01t2:798_3: senāsane therā…pe… kaṅkhaṃ paṭivinodentīti ekaṃ. Evaṃ pañcaṅgāni veditabbāni.
tika-vin01t2:799_0: Upacchinnakhuddakapalibodhenāti ettha pana khuddakapalibodhe upacchindantena dīghāni
tika-vin01t2:799_2: vā tantucchedādīsu tunnakammaṃ vā kātabbaṃ, kiliṭṭhāni vā rajitabbāni. Sace patte
tika-vin01t2:799_3: malaṃ hoti, patto pacitabbo, mañcapīṭhādīni sodhetabbāni. Bhattasammadaṃ paṭivinodetvāti
tika-vin01t2:799_4: bhojananimittaṃ parissamaṃ vinodetvā. Āhāre hi āsayaṃ paviṭṭhamatte tassa āgantukatāya
tika-vin01t2:799_5: yebhuyyena siyā sarīrassa koci parissamo, taṃ vūpasametvā. Tasmiñhi avūpasante sarīrakhedena
tika-vin01t2:799_6: cittaṃ ekaggataṃ na labheyyāti. Uggahetabbato uggaho, sabbopi kammaṭṭhānavidhi, na
tika-vin01t2:799_7: pubbe vuttauggahamattaṃ. Ācariyato uggaho ācariyuggaho, tato. Ekapadampīti ekakoṭṭhāsampi.
tika-vin01t2:800_0: Anubandhanāti assāsapassāsānaṃ anugamanavasena satiyā nirantaraṃ anupavattanā. Phusanāti
tika-vin01t2:800_1: assāsapassāse gaṇentassa gaṇanaṃ paṭisaṃharitvā te satiyā anubandhantassa yathā appanā
tika-vin01t2:800_2: hoti, tathā cittaṃ ṭhapentassa ca nāsikaggādiṭṭhānassa nesaṃ phusanā. Yasmā pana
tika-vin01t2:800_3: gaṇanādivasena viya phusanādivasena visuṃ manasikāro natthi, phuṭṭhaphuṭṭhaṭṭhāneyeva
tika-vin01t2:800_4: gaṇanā kātabbāti dassetuṃ idha phusanāgahaṇanti dīpento “phusanāti phuṭṭhaṭṭhāna”nti
tika-vin01t2:800_5: āha. Ṭhapanāti samādhānaṃ. Tañhi sammadeva ārammaṇe cittassa ādhānaṃ ṭhapanaṃ hoti.
tika-vin01t2:800_6: Tathā hi samādhi “cittassa ṭhiti saṇṭhitī”ti niddiṭṭho. Samādhippadhānā pana appanāti
tika-vin01t2:800_7: āha “ṭhapanāti appanā”ti. Aniccatādīnaṃ saṃlakkhaṇato sallakkhaṇā vipassanā. Pavattato
tika-vin01t2:800_8: nimittato ca vinivaṭṭanato vinivaṭṭanā maggo. Sakalasaṃkilesapaṭippassaddhibhāvato
tika-vin01t2:800_9: sabbaso suddhīti pārisuddhi phalaṃ. Tesanti vivaṭṭanāpārisuddhīnaṃ. Paṭipassanāti
tika-vin01t2:801_0: Khaṇḍanti ekaṃ tīṇi pañcāti evaṃ gaṇanāya khaṇḍanaṃ. Okāseti gaṇanāvidhiṃ sandhāyāha,
tika-vin01t2:801_1: gaṇanānissitova na kammaṭṭhānanissito. Sikhāppattaṃ nu khoti idaṃ cirataraṃ gaṇanāya
tika-vin01t2:801_2: manasikarontassa vasena vuttaṃ. So hi tathā laddhaṃ avikkhepamattaṃ nissāya evaṃ
tika-vin01t2:801_3: maññeyya. Assāsapassāsesu yo upaṭṭhāti, taṃ gahetvāti idaṃ assāsapassāsesu yassa
tika-vin01t2:801_4: ekova paṭhamaṃ upaṭṭhāti, taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Yassa pana ubhopi upaṭṭhahanti, tena
tika-vin01t2:801_5: ubhayampi gahetvā gaṇetabbaṃ. Yo upaṭṭhātīti iminā ca dvīsu nāsāpuṭavātesu yo pākaṭataro
tika-vin01t2:801_6: upaṭṭhāti, so gahetabboti ayampi attho dīpitoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Pavattamānaṃ pavattamānanti
tika-vin01t2:801_7: āmeḍitavacanena nirantaraṃ assāsapassāsānaṃ upalakkhaṇaṃ dasseti. Evanti vuttappakārena
tika-vin01t2:801_8: upalakkhetvāvāti attho. Paṭhamaṃ ekekasmiṃ upaṭṭhitepi upalakkhetvāva gaṇentassa
tika-vin01t2:801_9: kamena ubhopi pākaṭā hontīti āha – “assāsapassāsā pākaṭā hontī”ti. Tena “upalakkhetvāva
tika-vin01t2:801_10: gaṇetabba”nti imassa “tassevaṃ gaṇayato…pe… pākaṭā hontī”ti idaṃ kāraṇavacanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:801_11: Tattha pākaṭā hontīti gaṇanāvasena bahiddhā vikkhepābhāvato vibhūtā honti.
tika-vin01t2:802_0: Palighāya parivattanakaṃ yattha nikkhipanti, so palighatthambho. Tiyāmarattinti accantasaṃyoge
tika-vin01t2:802_1: upayogavacanaṃ. Purimanayenāti sīghagaṇanāya, gopālakagaṇanāyāti attho. Eko dve tīṇi
tika-vin01t2:802_2: cattāri pañcāti gaṇanāvidhidassanaṃ. Tasmā aṭṭhātiādīsupi ekato paṭṭhāyeva paccekaṃ
tika-vin01t2:802_3: aṭṭhādīni pāpetabbāni. “Sīghaṃ sīghaṃ gaṇetabbamevā”ti vatvā tattha kāraṇaṃ nidassanañca
tika-vin01t2:802_4: dasseti “gaṇanāpaṭibaddhe hī”tiādinā. Tattha arīyati tena nāvāti arittaṃ, pājanadaṇḍo.
tika-vin01t2:803_0: Nippariyāyato nirantarappavatti nāma ṭhapanāyamevāti āha “nirantarappavattaṃ viyā”ti.
tika-vin01t2:803_1: Anto pavisantaṃ manasikaronto anto cittaṃ paveseti nāma. Bahi cittanīharaṇepi eseva
tika-vin01t2:803_2: nayo. Vātabbhāhatanti abbhantaragatavātaṃ bahulaṃ manasikarontassa vātena taṃ ṭhānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:803_3: abbhāhataṃ viya medena pūritaṃ viya ca hoti, tathā upaṭṭhāti. Nīharatoti phuṭṭhokāsaṃ
tika-vin01t2:803_4: muñcitvā nīharato. Tathā pana nīharato vātassa gatisamanvesanamukhena nānārammaṇesu
tika-vin01t2:804_0: Etanti etaṃ assāsapassāsajātaṃ. Anugamananti pavattapavattānaṃ assāsapassāsānaṃ ārammaṇakaraṇavasena
tika-vin01t2:804_1: satiyā anu anu pavattanaṃ anugacchanaṃ. Tenevāha – “tañca kho ādimajjhapariyosānānugamanavasenā”ti.
tika-vin01t2:804_2: Nābhi ādi tattha paṭhamaṃ uppajjanato. Paṭhamuppattivasena hi idha ādicintā, na uppattimattavasena.
tika-vin01t2:804_3: Tathā hi te nābhito paṭṭhāya yāva nāsikaggā sabbattha uppajjanteva. Yattha yattha
tika-vin01t2:804_4: ca uppajjanti, tattha tattheva bhijjanti dhammānaṃ gamanābhāvato. Yathāpaccayaṃ pana
tika-vin01t2:804_5: desantarappattiyaṃ gatisamaññā. Hadayaṃ majjhanti hadayasamīpaṃ tassa uparibhāgo
tika-vin01t2:804_6: majjhaṃ. Nāsikaggaṃ pariyosānanti nāsikaṭṭhānaṃ tassa pariyosānaṃ assāsapassāsānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:804_7: samaññāya tadavadhibhāvato. Tathā hete cittasamuṭṭhānā vuttā, na ca bahiddhā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:804_8: sambhavo atthi. Tenāha “abbhantarapavisanavātassa nāsikaggaṃ ādī”ti. Pavisananikkhamanapariyāyo
tika-vin01t2:804_9: pana taṃsadisavaseneva vuttoti veditabbo. Vikkhepagatanti vikkhepaṃ upagataṃ, vikkhittaṃ
tika-vin01t2:804_10: asamāhitanti attho. Sāraddhāyāti sadarathabhāvāya. Iñjanāyāti kammaṭṭhānamanasikārassa
tika-vin01t2:804_11: calanāya. Vikkhepagatena cittenāti hetumhi karaṇavacanaṃ, itthambhūtalakkhaṇe vā.
tika-vin01t2:804_12: Sāraddhāti sadarathā. Iñjitāti iñjanakā calanakā, tathā phanditā.
tika-vin01t2:805_1: sambandho. “Anubandhanāya manasikarontena phusanāvasena ṭhapanāvasena ca manasi kātabba”nti
tika-vin01t2:805_2: yena adhippāyena vuttaṃ, taṃ vivarituṃ “gaṇanānubandhanāvasena viyā”tiādimāha. Tattha
tika-vin01t2:805_3: visuṃ manasikāro natthīti gaṇanāya anubandhanāya ca vinā yathākkamaṃ kevalaṃ phusanāvasena
tika-vin01t2:805_4: ṭhapanāvasena ca kammaṭṭhānamanasikāro natthi. Nanu phusanāya vinā ṭhapanāya viya
tika-vin01t2:805_5: phusanāya vinā gaṇanāyapi manasikāro natthiyevāti? Yadipi natthi, gaṇanā pana yathā
tika-vin01t2:805_6: kammaṭṭhānamanasikārassa mūlabhāvato padhānabhāvena gahetabbā, evaṃ anubandhanā ṭhapanāya
tika-vin01t2:805_7: tāya vinā ṭhapanāya asambhavato. Tasmā satipi phusanāya nānantarikabhāve gaṇanānubandhanā
tika-vin01t2:805_8: eva mūlabhāvato padhānabhāvena gahetvā itarāsaṃ tadabhāvaṃ dassento āha – “gaṇanānubandhanāvasena
tika-vin01t2:805_9: viya hi phusanāṭhapanāvasena visuṃ manasikāro natthī”ti. Yadi evaṃ tā kasmā uddese
tika-vin01t2:805_11: gaṇentoti iminā gaṇanāya phusanā aṅganti dasseti. Tenāha – “gaṇanāya ca phusanāya
tika-vin01t2:805_12: ca manasi karotī”ti. Tatthevāti phuṭṭhaphuṭṭhaṭṭhāneyeva. Teti assāsapassāse. Satiyā
tika-vin01t2:805_13: anubandhantoti gaṇanāvidhiṃ anugantvā satiyā nibandhanto, phuṭṭhokāseyeva te nirantaraṃ
tika-vin01t2:805_14: upadhārentoti attho. Appanāvasena cittaṃ ṭhapentoti yathā appanā hoti, evaṃ yathāupaṭṭhite
tika-vin01t2:805_15: nimitte cittaṃ ṭhapento samādahanto. Anubandhanāya cātiādīsu anubandhanāya ca phusanāya
tika-vin01t2:805_16: ca ṭhapanāya ca manasi karotīti vuccatīti yojanā. Svāyamatthoti yvāyaṃ “phuṭṭhaphuṭṭhaṭṭhāneyeva
tika-vin01t2:805_17: gaṇento tattheva gaṇanaṃ paṭisaṃharitvā te satiyā anubandhanto”ti vutto, so ayamattho.
tika-vin01t2:805_18: Yā accantāya na minoti na vinicchinati, sā mānassa samīpeti upamā yathā goṇo viya gavayoti.
tika-vin01t2:806_0: Paṅguḷoti pīṭhasappī. Dolāti peṅkholo. Kīḷatanti kīḷantānaṃ. Mātāputtānanti attano
tika-vin01t2:806_1: bhariyāya puttassa ca. Ubho koṭiyoti āgacchantassa purimakoṭiṃ, gacchantassa pacchimakoṭinti
tika-vin01t2:806_2: dvepi koṭiyo. Majjhañcāti dolāphalakasseva majjhaṃ. Upanibandhanatthambho viyāti
tika-vin01t2:806_3: upanibandhanatthambho, nāsikaggaṃ mukhanimittaṃ vā, tassa mūle samīpe ṭhatvā. Kathaṃ
tika-vin01t2:806_4: ṭhatvā? Satiyā vasena. Satiñhi tattha sūpaṭṭhitaṃ karonto yogāvacaro tattha ṭhito
tika-vin01t2:806_5: nāma hoti avayavadhammena samudāyassa apadisitabbato. Nimitteti nāsikaggādinimitte.
tika-vin01t2:806_6: Satiyā nisinnoti sativasena nisīdanto. “Satiñhi tatthā”tiādinā ṭhāne viya vattabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:806_7: Tatthāti phuṭṭhaṭṭhāne. Teti nagarassa anto bahi ca gatā manussā tesaṃ saṅgahā ca
tika-vin01t2:807_0: Gāthāyaṃ nimittanti upanibandhananimittaṃ. Anārammaṇamekacittassāti ekassa cittassa
tika-vin01t2:807_1: na ārammaṇaṃ, ārammaṇaṃ na hontīti attho. Ajānato ca tayo dhammeti nimittaṃ assāso
tika-vin01t2:807_2: passāsoti ime nimittādayo tayo dhamme ārammaṇakaraṇavasena avindantassa. Ca-saddo
tika-vin01t2:807_3: byatireke. Bhāvanāti ānāpānassatisamādhibhāvanā. Nupalabbhatīti na upalabbhati na
tika-vin01t2:807_4: sijjhatīti ayaṃ codanāgāthāya attho. Dutiyā pana parihāragāthā suviññeyyāva.
tika-vin01t2:808_0: Kathanti tāsaṃ codanāparihāragāthānaṃ atthaṃ vivarituṃ kathetukamyatāpucchā. Ime
tika-vin01t2:808_1: tayo dhammātiādīsu padayojanāya saddhiṃ ayamatthaniddeso – ime nimittādayo tayo dhammā
tika-vin01t2:808_2: ekacittassa kathaṃ ārammaṇaṃ na honti, asatipi ārammaṇabhāve na cime na ca ime tayo
tika-vin01t2:808_3: dhammā aviditā honti, kathañca na honti aviditā, tesañhi aviditatte cittañca kathaṃ
tika-vin01t2:808_4: vikkhepaṃ na gacchati, padhānañca bhāvanāya nipphādakaṃ vīriyañca kathaṃ paññāyati,
tika-vin01t2:808_5: nīvaraṇānaṃ vikkhambhakaṃ sammadeva samādhānāvahaṃ bhāvanānuyogasaṅkhātaṃ payogañca
tika-vin01t2:808_6: yogī kathaṃ sādheti, uparūpari lokiyalokuttarañca visesaṃ kathamadhigacchatīti.
tika-vin01t2:809_0: Idāni tamatthaṃ kakacopamāya sādhetuṃ “seyyathāpī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Bhūmibhāgassa visamatāya
tika-vin01t2:809_1: cañcale rukkhe chedanakiriyā na sukarā siyā, tathā ca sati kakacadantagati duviññeyyāti
tika-vin01t2:809_2: āha – “same bhūmibhāge”ti. Kakacenāti khuddakena kharapattena. Tenāha “puriso”ti.
tika-vin01t2:809_3: Phuṭṭhakakacadantānanti phuṭṭhaphuṭṭhakakacadantānaṃ vasena. Tena kakacadantehi phuṭṭhaphuṭṭhaṭṭhāneyeva
tika-vin01t2:809_4: purisassa satiyā upaṭṭhānaṃ dasseti. Tenāha – “na āgate vā gate vā kakacadante manasi karotī”ti.
tika-vin01t2:810_0: Kakacassa ākaḍḍhanakāle purisābhimukhaṃ pavattā āgatā, pellanakāle tato vigatā gatāti
tika-vin01t2:810_1: vuttā, na ca āgatā vā gatā vā kakacadantā aviditā honti sabbattha satiyā upaṭṭhitattā
tika-vin01t2:810_2: chinditabbaṭṭhānaṃ aphusitvā gacchantānaṃ āgacchantānañca kakacadantānaṃ abhāvato.
tika-vin01t2:810_3: Padhānanti rukkhassa chedanavīriyaṃ. Payoganti tasseva chedanakiriyaṃ. Upamāyaṃ “visesamadhigacchatī”ti
tika-vin01t2:810_4: padaṃ pāḷiyaṃ natthi, yojetvā pana dassetabbaṃ. Teneva visuddhimagge upamāyampi “visesamadhigacchatī”ti
tika-vin01t2:810_5: padaṃ yojetvāva vuttaṃ. Taṃsaṃvaṇṇanāyañca “visesanti anekabhāvāpādanaṃ, tena ca
tika-vin01t2:811_0: Yathā rukkhotiādi upamāsaṃsandanaṃ. Upanibandhati ārammaṇe cittaṃ etāyāti sati upanibandhanā
tika-vin01t2:811_1: nāma, tassā assāsapassāsānaṃ sallakkhaṇassa nimittanti upanibandhanānimittaṃ, nāsikaggaṃ
tika-vin01t2:811_2: mukhanimittaṃ vā. Evamevanti yathā so puriso kakacena rukkhaṃ chindanto āgatagate
tika-vin01t2:811_3: kakacadante amanasikarontopi phuṭṭhaphuṭṭhaṭṭhāneyeva satiyā upaṭṭhapanena āgatagate
tika-vin01t2:811_4: kakacadante jānāti, suttapadañca avirajjhanto atthakiccaṃ sādheti, evamevaṃ. Nāsikagge
tika-vin01t2:811_5: mukhanimitteti dīghanāsiko nāsikagge, itaro mukhaṃ asanaṃ nimīyati chādīyati etenāti
tika-vin01t2:812_0: Idaṃ padhānanti yena vīriyārambhena āraddhavīriyassa yogino kāyopi cittampi kammaniyaṃ
tika-vin01t2:812_1: bhāvanākammakkhamaṃ bhāvanākammayoggaṃ hoti, idaṃ vīriyaṃ padhānanti phalena hetuṃ
tika-vin01t2:812_2: dasseti. Upakkilesā pahīyantīti cittassa upakkilesabhūtāni nīvaraṇāni vikkhambhanavasena
tika-vin01t2:812_3: pahīyanti. Vitakkā vūpasammantīti tato eva kāmavitakkādayo micchāvitakkā upasamaṃ
tika-vin01t2:812_4: gacchanti, nīvaraṇappahānena vā paṭhamajjhānādhigamaṃ dassetvā vitakkavūpasamāpadesena
tika-vin01t2:812_5: dutiyajjhānādīnamadhigamamāha. Ayaṃ payogoti ayaṃ jhānādhigamassa hetubhūto kammaṭṭhānānuyogo
tika-vin01t2:812_6: payogo. Saṃyojanā pahīyantīti dasapi saṃyojanāni maggappaṭipāṭiyā samucchedavasena
tika-vin01t2:812_7: pahīyanti. Anusayā byantī hontīti tathā sattapi anusayā anuppattidhammatāpādanena
tika-vin01t2:812_8: bhaṅgamattassapi anavasesato vigatantā honti. Ettha ca saṃyojanappahānaṃ nāma anusayanirodheneva
tika-vin01t2:812_9: hoti, pahīnesu ca saṃyojanesu anusayānaṃ lesopi na bhavissatīti ca dassanatthaṃ “saṃyojanā
tika-vin01t2:812_10: pahīyanti, anusayā byantī hontī”ti vuttaṃ. Ayaṃ visesoti imaṃ samādhiṃ nissāya anukkamena
tika-vin01t2:812_11: labbhamāno ayaṃ saṃyojanappahānādiko imassa samādhissa visesoti attho.
tika-vin01t2:813_0: Yassāti yena. Anupubbanti anukkamena. Paricitāti pariciṇṇā. Ayañhettha saṅkhepattho
tika-vin01t2:813_1: – ānāpānassati yathā buddhena bhagavatā desitā, tathā yena dīgharassapajaānanādividhinā
tika-vin01t2:813_2: anupubbaṃ paricitā suṭṭhu bhāvitā, tato eva paripuṇṇā soḷasannaṃ vatthūnaṃ pāripūriyā
tika-vin01t2:813_3: sabbaso puṇṇā, so bhikkhu imaṃ attano khandhādilokaṃ paññobhāsena pabhāseti. Yathā
tika-vin01t2:813_4: kiṃ? Abbhā muttova candimā abbhādiupakkilesavimutto candimā tārakarājā viyāti. “Abbhā
tika-vin01t2:813_5: muttova candimā”ti hi padassa niddese mahikādīnampi vuttattā ettha ādi-saddalopo katoti veditabbo.
tika-vin01t2:814_0: Idhāti kakacūpamāya. Assāti yogino. Idhāti vā imasmiṃ ṭhāne. Assāti upamābhūtassa
tika-vin01t2:814_1: kakacassa. Āgatagatavasena yathā tassa purisassa amanasikāro, evaṃ assāsapassāsānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:814_2: āgatagatavasena amanasikāramattameva ānayanappayojanaṃ. Na cirenevāti idaṃ katādhikāraṃ
tika-vin01t2:814_3: sandhāya vuttaṃ. Nimittanti paṭibhāganimittaṃ. Avasesajjhānaṅgapaṭimaṇḍitāti vitakkādiavasesajjhānaṅgapaṭimaṇḍitāti
tika-vin01t2:814_4: vadanti, vicārādīti pana vattabbaṃ nippariyāyena vitakkassa appanābhāvato. So hi
tika-vin01t2:814_5: pāḷiyaṃ “appanā byappanā”ti niddiṭṭho, taṃsampayogato vā yasmā jhānaṃ appanāti aṭṭhakathāvohāro,
tika-vin01t2:814_6: jhānaṅgesu ca samādhi padhānaṃ, tasmā taṃ appanāti dassento “avasesajjhānaṅgapaṭimaṇḍitā
tika-vin01t2:814_7: appanāsaṅkhātā ṭhapanā ca sampajjatī”ti āha. Kassaci pana gaṇanāvaseneva manasikārakālato
tika-vin01t2:814_8: pabhutīti ettha “anukkamato…pe… pattaṃ viya hotī”ti ettakova gantho parihīno, purāṇapotthakesu
tika-vin01t2:814_9: pana katthaci so gantho likhitoyeva tiṭṭhati.
tika-vin01t2:815_0: Sāraddhakāyassa kassaci puggalassa. Onamati vatthikādipalambanena. Vikūjatīti saddaṃ
tika-vin01t2:815_1: karoti. Valiṃ gaṇhātīti. Tattha tattha valinaṃ hoti. Kasmā? Yasmā sāraddhakāyo garuko
tika-vin01t2:815_2: hotīti. Kāyadarathavūpasamena saddhiṃ sijjhamāno oḷārikaassāsapassāsanirodho byatirekamukhena
tika-vin01t2:815_3: tassa sādhanaṃ viya vutto. Oḷārikaassāsapassāsanirodhavasenāti anvayavasena tadatthassa
tika-vin01t2:815_4: sādhanaṃ. Kāyadarathe vūpasanteti cittajarūpānaṃ lahumudukammaññabhāvena yo sesatisantatirūpānampi
tika-vin01t2:815_5: lahuādibhāvo, so idha kāyassa lahubhāvoti adhippeto. Svāyaṃ yasmā cittassa lahuādibhāvena
tika-vin01t2:815_6: vinā natthi, tasmā vuttaṃ “kāyopi cittampi lahukaṃ hotī”ti.
tika-vin01t2:816: Oḷārike assāsapassāse niruddhetiādi heṭṭhā vuttanayamhi vicetabbākārappattassa kāyasaṅkhārassa vicayanavidhiṃ dassetuṃ ānītaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:817: Uparūpari vibhūtānīti bhāvanābalena uddhaṃ uddhaṃ pākaṭāni honti. Desatoti pakatiyā phusanadesato, pubbe attano phusanavasena upadhāritaṭṭhānato.
tika-vin01t2:818_0: “Kattha natthī”ti ṭhānavasena “kassa natthī”ti puggalavasena ca vīmaṃsiyamānamatthaṃ
tika-vin01t2:818_1: ekajjhaṃ katvā vibhāvetuṃ “antomātukucchiya”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha “yathā udake nimuggassa
tika-vin01t2:818_2: niruddhokāsatāya assāsapassāsā na pavattanti, evaṃ antomātukucchiyaṃ. Yathā matānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:818_3: samuṭṭhāpakacittābhāvato, evaṃ asaññībhūtānaṃ mucchāparetānaṃ asaññīsu vā jātānaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:818_4: tathā nirodhasamāpannāna”nti ācariyadhammapālattherena vuttaṃ. Mahāgaṇṭhipade pana
tika-vin01t2:818_6: dhammatāvaseneva nesaṃ anuppajjanaṃ, tathā rūpārūpabhavasamaṅgīnaṃ. Keci pana “anupubbato
tika-vin01t2:818_7: sukhumabhāvappattiyā catutthajjhānasamāpannassa, rūpabhave rūpānaṃ bhavaṅgassa ca
tika-vin01t2:818_8: sukhumabhāvato rūpabhavasamaṅgīnaṃ natthī”ti kāraṇaṃ vadanti. Atthiyeva te assāsapassāsā
tika-vin01t2:818_10: abhāvato. Pakatiphuṭṭhavasenāti pakatiyā phusanaṭṭhānavasena. Nimittaṃ ṭhapetabbanti
tika-vin01t2:818_11: satiyā tattha sukhappavattanatthaṃ thirataraṃ saññāṇaṃ pavattetabbaṃ. Thirasaññāpadaṭṭhānā
tika-vin01t2:818_12: hi sati. Imamevāti imaṃ eva anupaṭṭhahantassa kāyasaṅkhārassa kaṇṭakuṭṭhāpanañāyena
tika-vin01t2:818_13: upaṭṭhāpanavidhimeva. Atthavasanti hetuṃ. Attho hi phalaṃ. So yassa vasena pavattati,
tika-vin01t2:818_14: so atthavasoti. Muṭṭhassatissāti vinaṭṭhassatissa. Asampajānassāti sampajaññavirahitassa,
tika-vin01t2:818_15: bhāventassa anukkamena anupaṭṭhahante assāsapassāse vīmaṃsitvā “ime te”ti upadhāretuṃ
tika-vin01t2:818_16: sammadeva jānituñca samatthāhi satipaññāhi virahitassāti adhippāyo. Ito aññaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:818_17: Garukanti bhāriyaṃ. Sā cassa garukatā bhāvanāya sudukkarabhāvenāti āha “garukabhāvana”nti.
tika-vin01t2:819_0: Uparūpari santasukhumabhāvāpattito “balavatī suvisadā sūrā ca sati paññā ca icchitabbā”ti
tika-vin01t2:819_1: vatvā sukhumassa nāma atthassa sādhanenapi sukhumeneva bhavitabbanti dassetuṃ “yathā
tika-vin01t2:819_2: hī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Idāni anupaṭṭhahantānaṃ assāsapassāsānaṃ pariyesanupāyaṃ dassento
tika-vin01t2:819_3: “tāhi ca panā”tiādimāha. Tattha anupadanti padānupadaṃ. Caritvāti gocaraṃ gahetvā.
tika-vin01t2:819_4: Tasmiṃyeva ṭhāneti upanibandhananimittasaññite ṭhāne. Yojetvāti manasikārena yojetvā.
tika-vin01t2:819_5: “Satirasmiyā bandhitvā”ti vā vuttamevatthamāha “tasmiṃyeva ṭhāne yojetvā”ti. Na hi
tika-vin01t2:819_6: upameyye bandhanayojanaṭṭhānāni visuṃ labbhanti. Nimittanti uggahanimittaṃ paṭibhāganimittaṃ
tika-vin01t2:819_7: vā. Ubhayampi hi idha ekajjhaṃ vuttaṃ. Tathā hi tūlapicuādi upamattayaṃ uggahe yujjati,
tika-vin01t2:820_0: Tārakarūpaṃ viyāti tārakāya pabhārūpaṃ viya. Maṇiguḷikādiupamā paṭibhāge vaṭṭanti.
tika-vin01t2:820_1: Kathaṃ panetaṃ ekaṃyeva kammaṭṭhānaṃ anekākārato upaṭṭhātīti āha “tañca paneta”ntiādi.
tika-vin01t2:820_2: Suttantanti ekaṃ suttaṃ. Paguṇappavattibhāvena avicchedaṃ mahāvisayatañca sandhāyāha
tika-vin01t2:820_3: “mahatī pabbateyyā nadī viyā”ti. Tattha byañjanasampattiyā samantabhaddakaṃ suttaṃ
tika-vin01t2:820_4: sabbabhāgamanoharā sabbapāliphullā vanaghaṭā viyāti āha “ekā vanarāji viyā”ti. Tenāha
tika-vin01t2:820_5: bhagavā “vanappagumbe yatha phussitagge”ti nānānusandhiyaṃ nānāpeyyālaṃ vividhanayanipuṇaṃ
tika-vin01t2:820_6: bahuvidhakammaṭṭhānamukhaṃ suttantaṃ atthikehi sakkaccaṃ samupapajjitabbanti āha
tika-vin01t2:820_7: – “sītacchāyo…pe… rukkho viyā”ti. Saññānānatāyāti nimittupaṭṭhānato pubbe pavattasaññānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:820_9: Na hi asabhāvassa kutoci samuṭṭhānaṃ atthi. Tenāha – “nānato upaṭṭhātī”ti, upaṭṭhānākāramattanti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin01t2:821_0: Ime tayo dhammāti assāso passāso nimittanti ime tayo dhammā. Natthīti kammaṭṭhānavasena
tika-vin01t2:821_1: manasikātabbabhāvena natthi na upalabbhati. Na upacāranti upacārampi na pāpuṇāti,
tika-vin01t2:821_2: pageva appananti adhippāyo. Yassa panāti vijjamānapakkho vuttanayānusāreneva veditabbo.
tika-vin01t2:822_0: Idāni vuttasseva atthassa samatthanatthaṃ kakacūpamāyaṃ āgatā “nimitta”ntiādikā gāthā
tika-vin01t2:822_1: paccānītā. Nimitteti yathāvutte paṭibhāganimitte. Evaṃ hotīti bhāvanamanuyuttassa
tika-vin01t2:822_2: evaṃ hoti, tasmā “punappunaṃ evaṃ manasi karohī”ti vattabbo. Vosānaṃ āpajjeyyāti
tika-vin01t2:822_3: “nimittaṃ nāma dukkaraṃ uppādetuṃ, tayidaṃ laddhaṃ, handāhaṃ dāni yadā vā tadā vā
tika-vin01t2:822_4: visesaṃ nibbattessāmī”ti saṅkocaṃ āpajjeyya. Visīdeyyāti “ettakaṃ kālaṃ bhāvanamanuyuttassa
tika-vin01t2:822_5: nimittampi na uppannaṃ, abhabbo maññe visesassā”ti visādaṃ āpajjeyya. “Imāya paṭipadāya
tika-vin01t2:822_6: jarāmaraṇato muccissāmīti paṭipannassa nimitta”nti vutte kathaṃ saṅkocāpatti, bhiyyoso
tika-vin01t2:822_7: mattāya ussāhameva kareyyāti “nimittamidaṃ…pe… vattabbo”ti majjhimabhāṇakā āhu. Evanti
tika-vin01t2:822_8: vuttappakārena paṭibhāganimitteyeva bhāvanācittassa ṭhapanena. Ito pabhutīti ito
tika-vin01t2:822_9: paṭibhāganimittuppattito paṭṭhāya. Pubbe yaṃ vuttaṃ “anubandhanāya phusanāya ṭhapanāya
tika-vin01t2:822_10: ca manasi karotī”ti, tattha anubandhanaṃ phusanañca vissajjetvā ṭhapanāvaseneva bhāvetabbanti
tika-vin01t2:823_0: Porāṇehi vuttovāyamatthoti dassento “nimitte”ti gāthamāha. Tattha nimitteti paṭibhāganimitte.
tika-vin01t2:823_1: Ṭhapayaṃ cittanti bhāvanācittaṃ ṭhapento, ṭhapanāvasena manasikarontoti attho. Nānākāranti
tika-vin01t2:823_2: “cattāro vaṇṇā”ti evaṃ vuttaṃ nānākāraṃ. Ākārasāmaññavasena hetaṃ ekavacanaṃ. Vibhāvayanti
tika-vin01t2:823_3: vibhāvento antaradhāpento. Nimittuppattito paṭṭhāya hi te ākārā amanasikārato antarahitā
tika-vin01t2:823_4: viya honti. Assāsapassāseti assāsapassāse yo nānākāro, taṃ vibhāvayaṃ, assāsapassāsasambhūte
tika-vin01t2:823_5: vā nimitte. Sakaṃ cittaṃ nibandhatīti tāya eva ṭhapanāya attano cittaṃ upanibandhati,
tika-vin01t2:823_6: appetīti attho. Keci pana “vibhāvayanti vibhāvento, viditaṃ pākaṭaṃ karonto”ti atthaṃ
tika-vin01t2:823_7: vadanti, taṃ pubbabhāgavasena yujjeyya. Ayañhettha attho – dhitisampannattā dhīro
tika-vin01t2:823_8: yogī assāsapassāse nānākāraṃ vibhāvento nānākārato te pajānanto vidite pākaṭe karonto
tika-vin01t2:823_9: nānākāraṃ vā oḷārikoḷārike passambhento vūpasamento tattha yaṃ laddhaṃ nimittaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:823_10: tasmiṃ cittaṃ ṭhapento anukkamena sakaṃ cittaṃ nibandhati appetīti.
tika-vin01t2:824_0: Yadā saddhādīni indriyāni suvisadāni tikkhāni pavattanti, tadā assaddhiyādīnaṃ dūrībhāvena
tika-vin01t2:824_1: sātisayaṃ thāmappattehi sattahi balehi laddhupatthambhāni vitakkādīni kāmāvacarāneva
tika-vin01t2:824_2: jhānaṅgāni bahūni hutvā pātubhavanti. Tato eva tesaṃ ujuvipaccanīkabhūtā kāmacchandādayo
tika-vin01t2:824_3: saddhiṃ tadekaṭṭhehi pāpadhammehi vidūrī bhavanti paṭibhāganimittuppattiyā saddhiṃ,
tika-vin01t2:824_4: taṃ ārabbha upacārajjhānaṃ uppajjati. Tena vuttaṃ “nimittupaṭṭhānato pabhuti nīvaraṇāni
tika-vin01t2:824_5: vikkhambhitāneva hontī”tiādi. Tattha sannisinnāvāti sammadeva nisīdiṃsu eva, upasantāyevāti
tika-vin01t2:824_6: attho. Vikkhambhitāneva sannisinnāvāti avadhāraṇena pana tadatthaṃ ussāho kātabboti
tika-vin01t2:824_7: dasseti. Dvīhākārehīti jhānadhammānaṃ paṭipakkhadūrībhāvo thirabhāvappatti cāti imehi
tika-vin01t2:824_8: dvīhi kāraṇehi. Idāni tāni kāraṇāni avatthāmukhena dassetuṃ “upacārabhūmiyaṃ vā”tiādi
tika-vin01t2:824_9: vuttaṃ. Tattha upacārabhūmiyanti upacārāvatthāyaṃ. Yadipi hi tadā jhānaṅgāni paṭutarāni
tika-vin01t2:824_10: mahaggatabhāvappattāni nuppajjanti, tesaṃ pana paṭipakkhadhammānaṃ vikkhambhanena
tika-vin01t2:824_11: cittaṃ samādhiyati. Tenāha “nīvaraṇappahānenā”ti. Paṭilābhabhūmiyanti jhānassa adhigamāvatthāyaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:824_12: Tadā hi appanāppattānaṃ jhānadhammānaṃ uppattiyā cittaṃ samādhiyati. Tenāha “aṅgapātubhāvenā”ti.
tika-vin01t2:825_0: Upacāre aṅgāni na thāmajātāni honti aṅgānaṃ athāmajātattā. Yathā nāma daharo kumārako
tika-vin01t2:825_1: ukkhipitvā ṭhapiyamāno punappunaṃ bhūmiyaṃ patati, evameva upacāre uppanne cittaṃ
tika-vin01t2:825_2: kālena nimittaṃ ārammaṇaṃ karoti, kālena bhavaṅgaṃ otarati. Tena vuttaṃ “upacārasamādhi
tika-vin01t2:825_3: kusalavīthiyaṃ javitvā bhavaṅgaṃ otaratī”ti. Appanāyaṃ pana aṅgāni thāmajātāni honti
tika-vin01t2:825_4: tesaṃ thāmajātattā. Yathā nāma balavā puriso āsanā vuṭṭhāya divasampi tiṭṭheyya,
tika-vin01t2:825_5: evameva appanāsamādhimhi uppanne cittaṃ sakiṃ bhavaṅgavāraṃ chinditvā kevalampi rattiṃ
tika-vin01t2:825_6: kevalampi divasaṃ tiṭṭhati, kusalajavanapaṭipāṭivaseneva pavattati. Tenāha – “appanāsamādhi…pe…
tika-vin01t2:825_7: na bhavaṅgaṃ otaratī”ti. Vaṇṇatoti picupiṇḍatārakarūpādīsu viya upaṭṭhitavaṇṇato.
tika-vin01t2:825_8: Lakkhaṇatoti kharabhāvādisabhāvato aniccādisabhāvato vā. Rakkhitabbaṃ taṃ nimittanti sambandho.
tika-vin01t2:826_0: Laddhaparihānīti laddhaupacārajjhānaparihāni. Nimitte avinassante tadārammaṇaṃ jhānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:826_1: aparihīnameva hoti, nimitte pana ārakkhābhāvena vinaṭṭhe laddhaṃ laddhaṃ jhānampi
tika-vin01t2:831: Na cireneva kālena, hoti kassaci appanā”ti. –
tika-vin01t2:832_0: Evaṃ vuttaṃ rakkhaṇavidhiṃ saṅkhepato vibhāveti. Tatrāyaṃ vitthāro – yasmiṃ āvāse
tika-vin01t2:832_1: vasantassa anuppannaṃ vā nimittaṃ nuppajjati, uppannaṃ vā vinassati, anupaṭṭhitā
tika-vin01t2:832_2: ca sati na upaṭṭhāti, asamāhitañca cittaṃ na samādhiyati, ayaṃ asappāyo. Yattha nimittaṃ
tika-vin01t2:832_3: uppajjati ceva thāvarañca hoti, sati upaṭṭhāti, cittaṃ samādhiyati, ayaṃ sappāyo.
tika-vin01t2:832_4: Tasmā yasmiṃ vihāre bahū āvāsā honti, tattha ekamekasmiṃ tīṇi tīṇi divasāni vasitvā
tika-vin01t2:832_5: yatthassa cittaṃ ekaggaṃ hoti, tattha vasitabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:833: Gocaragāmo pana yo senāsanato uttarena vā dakkhiṇena vā nātidūre diyaḍḍhakosabbhantare hoti sulabhasampannabhikkho, so sappāyo, viparīto asappāyo.
tika-vin01t2:834: Bhassanti dvattiṃsatiracchānakathāpariyāpannaṃ asappāyaṃ. Tañhissa nimittantaradhānāya saṃvattati. Dasakathāvatthunissitaṃ sappāyaṃ, tampimattāya bhāsitabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:835_0: Puggalopi atiracchānakathiko sīlādiguṇasampanno, yaṃ nissāya asamāhitaṃ vā cittaṃ
tika-vin01t2:835_1: samādhiyati, samāhitaṃ vā cittaṃ thirataraṃ hoti, evarūpo sappāyo. Kāyadaḷhībahulo
tika-vin01t2:835_2: pana tiracchānakathiko asappāyo. So hi taṃ kaddamodakamiva acchaṃ udakaṃ malīnameva
tika-vin01t2:835_3: karoti, tādisañca āgamma koṭapabbatavāsīdaharasseva samāpatti vinassati, pageva nimittaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:836_0: Bhojanaṃ pana kassaci madhuraṃ, kassaci ambilaṃ sappāyaṃ hoti. Utupi kassaci sīto,
tika-vin01t2:836_1: kassaci uṇho sappāyo hoti. Tasmā yaṃ bhojanaṃ vā utuṃ vā sevantassa phāsu hoti, asamāhitaṃ
tika-vin01t2:836_2: vā cittaṃ samādhiyati, samāhitaṃ vā thirataraṃ hoti. Taṃ bhojanaṃ, so ca utu sappāyo.
tika-vin01t2:836_3: Itaraṃ bhojanaṃ, itaro ca utu asappāyo.
tika-vin01t2:837_0: Iriyāpathesupi kassaci caṅkamo sappāyo hoti, kassaci sayanaṭṭhānanisajjānaṃ aññataro.
tika-vin01t2:837_1: Tasmā taṃ āvāsaṃ viya tīṇi divasāni upaparikkhitvā yasmiṃ iriyāpathe asamāhitaṃ cittaṃ
tika-vin01t2:837_2: samādhiyati, samāhitaṃ vā thirataraṃ hoti, so sappāyo, itaro asappāyoti veditabbo.
tika-vin01t2:837_3: Iti imaṃ sattavidhaṃ asappāyaṃ vajjetvā sappāyaṃ sevitabbaṃ. Evaṃ paṭipannassa hi
tika-vin01t2:837_4: nimittāsevanabahulassa na cireneva kālena hoti kassaci appanā.
tika-vin01t2:838_0: Yassa pana evampi paṭipajjato na hoti, tena dasavidhaṃ appanākosallaṃ sampādetabbanti
tika-vin01t2:838_2: vatthūnaṃ visadabhāvakaraṇaṃ. Yadā hissa kesanakhalomāni dīghāni honti, sarīraṃ vā
tika-vin01t2:838_3: sedamalaggahitaṃ, tadā ajjhattikaṃ vatthu avisadaṃ hoti aparisuddhaṃ. Yadā panassa
tika-vin01t2:838_4: cīvaraṃ jiṇṇaṃ kiliṭṭhaṃ duggandhaṃ hoti, senāsanaṃ vā uklāpaṃ, tadā bāhiraṃ vatthu
tika-vin01t2:838_5: avisadaṃ hoti aparisuddhaṃ. Ajjhattikabāhire hi vatthumhi avisade uppannesu cittacetasikesu
tika-vin01t2:838_6: ñāṇampi aparisuddhaṃ hoti aparisuddhāni dīpakapallikavaṭṭitelāni nissāya uppannadīpasikhāya
tika-vin01t2:838_7: obhāso viya. Aparisuddhena ca ñāṇena saṅkhāre sammasato saṅkhārāpi avibhūtā honti,
tika-vin01t2:838_8: kammaṭṭhānamanuyuñjato kammaṭṭhānampi vuddhiṃ viruḷhiṃ vepullaṃ na gacchati. Visade
tika-vin01t2:838_9: pana ajjhattikabāhire vatthumhi uppannesu cittacetasikesu ñāṇampi visadaṃ hoti parisuddhāni
tika-vin01t2:838_10: dīpakapallikavaṭṭitelāni nissāya uppannadīpasikhāya obhāso viya. Parisuddhena ca
tika-vin01t2:838_11: ñāṇena saṅkhāre sammasato saṅkhārāpi vibhūtāhonti, kammaṭṭhānamanuyuñjato kammaṭṭhānampi
tika-vin01t2:839_0: Indriyasamattapaṭipādanatā nāma saddhādīnaṃ indriyānaṃ samabhāvakaraṇaṃ. Sace hissa
tika-vin01t2:839_1: saddhindriyaṃ balavaṃ hoti, itarāni mandāni, tato vīriyindriyaṃ paggahakiccaṃ, satindriyaṃ
tika-vin01t2:839_2: upaṭṭhānakiccaṃ, samādhindriyaṃ avikkhepakiccaṃ, paññindriyaṃ dassanakiccaṃ kātuṃ
tika-vin01t2:839_3: na sakkoti. Tasmā taṃ dhammasabhāvapaccavekkhaṇena vā yathā vā manasikaroto balavaṃ
tika-vin01t2:839_4: jātaṃ, tathā amanasikārena hāpetabbaṃ. Vakkalittheravatthu cettha nidassanaṃ. Sace
tika-vin01t2:839_5: pana vīriyindriyaṃ balavaṃ hoti, atha neva saddhindriyaṃ adhimokkhakiccaṃ kātuṃ sakkoti,
tika-vin01t2:839_6: na itarāni itarakiccabhedaṃ. Tasmā taṃ passaddhādibhāvanāya hāpetabbaṃ. Tatrāpi soṇattheravatthu
tika-vin01t2:839_7: dassetabbaṃ. Evaṃ sesesupi ekassa balavabhāve sati itaresaṃ attano kiccesu asamatthatā veditabbā.
tika-vin01t2:840_0: Visesato panettha saddhāpaññānaṃ samādhivīriyānañca samataṃ pasaṃsanti. Balavasaddho
tika-vin01t2:840_1: hi mandapañño mudhappasanno hoti, avatthusmiṃ pasīdati. Balavapañño mandasaddho kerāṭikapakkhaṃ
tika-vin01t2:840_2: bhajati, bhesajjasamuṭṭhito viya rogo atekiccho hoti. Ubhinnaṃ samatāya vatthusmiṃyeva
tika-vin01t2:840_3: pasīdati. Balavasamādhiṃ pana mandavīriyaṃ samādhissa kosajjapakkhattā kosajjaṃ abhibhavati,
tika-vin01t2:840_4: balavavīriyaṃ mandasamādhiṃvīriyassa uddhaccapakkhattā uddhaccaṃ abhibhavati. Samādhi
tika-vin01t2:840_5: pana vīriyena saṃyojito kosajje patituṃ na labhati, vīriyaṃ samādhinā saṃyojitaṃ
tika-vin01t2:840_6: uddhacce patituṃ na labhati. Tasmā tadubhayaṃ samaṃ kātabbaṃ. Ubhayasamatāya hi appanā
tika-vin01t2:840_7: hoti. Apica samādhikammikassa balavatīpi saddhā vaṭṭati. Evañhi saddahanto okappento
tika-vin01t2:840_8: appanaṃ pāpuṇissati, samādhipaññāsu pana samādhikammikassa ekaggatā balavatī vaṭṭati.
tika-vin01t2:840_9: Evañhi so appanaṃ pāpuṇāti, vipassanākammikassa paññā balavatī vaṭṭati. Evañhi so
tika-vin01t2:840_10: lakkhaṇappaṭivedhaṃ pāpuṇāti, ubhinnaṃ pana samatāyapi appanā hotiyeva. Sati pana
tika-vin01t2:840_11: sabbattha balavatī vaṭṭati. Sati hi cittaṃ uddhaccapakkhikānaṃ saddhāvīriyapaññānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:840_12: vasena uddhaccapātato kosajjapakkhena ca samādhinā kosajjapātato rakkhati. Tasmā
tika-vin01t2:840_13: sā loṇadhūpanaṃ viya sabbabyañjanesu, sabbakammikaamacco viya ca sabbarājakiccesu
tika-vin01t2:841: Nimittakusalatā nāma pathavīkasiṇādikassa cittekaggatānimittassa akatassa karaṇakosallaṃ, katassa bhāvanākosallaṃ, bhāvanāya laddhassa rakkhaṇakosallañca, taṃ idha adhippetaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:842_0: Kathaṃ yasmiṃ samaye cittaṃ niggahetabbaṃ, tasmiṃ samaye cittaṃ niggaṇhāti? Yadāssa
tika-vin01t2:842_1: accāraddhavīriyatādīhi uddhataṃ cittaṃ hoti, tadā dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgādayo tayo
tika-vin01t2:843_0: “Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, puriso mahantaṃ aggikkhandhaṃ nibbāpetukāmo assa, so tattha
tika-vin01t2:843_1: sukkhāni ceva tiṇāni pakkhipeyya, sukkhāni ca gomayāni pakkhipeyya, sukkhāni ca kaṭṭhāni
tika-vin01t2:843_2: pakkhipeyya, mukhavātañca dadeyya, na ca paṃsukena okireyya, bhabbo nu kho so puriso
tika-vin01t2:843_3: taṃ mahantaṃ aggikkhandhaṃ nibbāpetunti. No hetaṃ, bhante. Evameva kho, bhikkhave,
tika-vin01t2:843_4: yasmiṃ samaye uddhataṃ cittaṃ hoti, akālo tasmiṃ samaye dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgassa
tika-vin01t2:843_5: bhāvanāya. Akālo vīriya…pe… akālo pītisambojjhaṅgassa bhāvanāya. Taṃ kissa hetu?
tika-vin01t2:843_6: Uddhataṃ, bhikkhave, cittaṃ, taṃ etehi dhammehi duvūpasamayaṃ hoti.
tika-vin01t2:844_0: “Yasmiṃ kho, bhikkhave, samaye uddhataṃ cittaṃ hoti, kālo tasmiṃ samaye passaddhisambojjhaṅgassa
tika-vin01t2:844_1: bhāvanāya. Kālo samādhi…pe… kālo upekkhāsambojjhaṅgassa bhāvanāya. Taṃ kissa hetu?
tika-vin01t2:844_2: Uddhataṃ, bhikkhave, cittaṃ, taṃ etehi dhammehi suvūpasamayaṃ hoti. Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave,
tika-vin01t2:844_3: puriso mahantaṃ aggikkhandhaṃ nibbāpetukāmo assa, so tattha allāni ceva tiṇāni pakkhipeyya,
tika-vin01t2:844_4: allāni ca gomayāni pakkhipeyya, allāni ca kaṭṭhāni pakkhipeyya, udakavātañca dadeyya,
tika-vin01t2:844_5: paṃsukena ca okireyya, bhabbo nu kho so puriso taṃ mahantaṃ aggikkhandhaṃ nibbāpetunti. Evaṃ, bhante”ti.
tika-vin01t2:845: Ettha ca yathāsakaṃ āhāravasena passaddhisambojjhaṅgādīnaṃ bhāvanā veditabbā. Vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā –
tika-vin01t2:846_1: ayamāhāro anuppannassa vā passaddhisambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya, uppannassa vā passaddhisambojjhaṅgassa
tika-vin01t2:846_2: bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya bhāvanāya pāripūriyā saṃvattati. Tathā atthi, bhikkhave,
tika-vin01t2:846_3: samathanimittaṃ abyagganimittaṃ, tattha yonisomanasikārabahulīkāro ayamāhāro anuppannassa
tika-vin01t2:846_4: vā samādhisambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya, uppannassa vā samādhisambojjhaṅgassa bhiyyobhāvāya
tika-vin01t2:846_5: vepullāya bhāvanāya pāripūriyā saṃvattati…pe… tathā atthi, bhikkhave, upekkhāsambojjhaṅgaṭṭhānīyā
tika-vin01t2:846_6: dhammā, tattha yonisomanasikārabahulīkāro ayamāhāro anuppannassa vā upekkhāsambojjhaṅgassa
tika-vin01t2:846_7: uppādāya, uppannassa vā upekkhāsambojjhaṅgassa bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya bhāvanāya
tika-vin01t2:847_0: Tattha yathāssa passaddhiādayo uppannapubbā, taṃ ākāraṃ sallakkhetvā tesaṃ uppādanavasena
tika-vin01t2:847_1: pavattamanasikārova tīsu padesupi yonisomanasikāro nāma. Samathanimittanti ca samathassevetaṃ
tika-vin01t2:848_0: Apica satta dhammā passaddhisambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya saṃvattanti – paṇītabhojanasevanatā,
tika-vin01t2:849_0: Ekādasa dhammā samādhisambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya saṃvattanti – vatthuvisadatā, nimittakusalatā,
tika-vin01t2:849_1: indriyasamattapaṭipādanatā, samaye cittassa niggahaṇatā, samaye cittassa paggahaṇatā,
tika-vin01t2:849_2: nirassādassa cittassa saddhāsaṃvegavasena sampahaṃsanatā, samappavattassa ajjhupekkhanatā,
tika-vin01t2:850_0: Pañca dhammā upekkhāsambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya saṃvattanti – sattamajjhattatā, saṅkhāramajjhattatā,
tika-vin01t2:850_2: tadadhimuttatāti. Iti imehi ākārehi ete dhamme uppādento passaddhisambojjhaṅgādayo
tika-vin01t2:850_3: bhāveti nāma. Evaṃ yasmiṃ samaye cittaṃ niggahetabbaṃ, tasmiṃ samaye cittaṃ niggaṇhāti.
tika-vin01t2:851_0: Kathañca yasmiṃ samaye cittaṃ paggahetabbaṃ, tasmiṃ samaye cittaṃ paggaṇhāti? Yadāssa
tika-vin01t2:851_1: atisithilavīriyatādīhi cittaṃ līnaṃ hoti, tadā passaddhisambojjhaṅgādayo tayo abhāvetvā
tika-vin01t2:852_0: “Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, puriso parittaṃ aggiṃ ujjāletukāmo assa, so tattha allāni
tika-vin01t2:852_1: ceva tiṇāni pakkhipeyya…pe… paṃsukena ca okireyya, bhabbo nu kho so puriso taṃ parittaṃ
tika-vin01t2:852_2: aggiṃ ujjāletunti. No hetaṃ, bhante. Evameva kho, bhikkhave, yasmiṃ samaye līnaṃ
tika-vin01t2:852_3: cittaṃ hoti. Akālo tasmiṃ samaye passaddhisambojjhaṅgassa bhāvanāya. Akālo samādhi…pe…
tika-vin01t2:852_4: akālo upekkhāsambojjhaṅgassa bhāvanāya. Taṃ kissa hetu? Līnaṃ, bhikkhave, cittaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:853_0: “Yasmiñca kho, bhikkhave, samaye līnaṃ cittaṃ hoti, kālo tasmiṃ samaye dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgassa
tika-vin01t2:853_1: bhāvanāya, kālo vīriya…pe… kālo pītisambojjhaṅgassa bhāvanāya. Taṃ kissa hetu? Līnaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:853_2: bhikkhave, cittaṃ, taṃ etehi dhammehi susamuṭṭhāpayaṃ hoti. Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave,
tika-vin01t2:853_3: puriso parittaṃ aggiṃ ujjāletukāmo assa, so tattha sukkhāni ceva tiṇāni pakkhipeyya…pe…
tika-vin01t2:853_4: na ca paṃsukena okireyya, bhabbo nu kho so puriso taṃ parittaṃ aggiṃ ujjāletunti. Evaṃ, bhante”ti.
tika-vin01t2:854: Etthāpi yathāsakaṃ āhāravasena dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgādīnaṃ bhāvanā veditabbā. Vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā –
tika-vin01t2:855_0: “Atthi, bhikkhave, kusalākusalā dhammā sāvajjānavajjā dhammā hīnappaṇītā dhammā kaṇhasukkasappaṭibhāgā
tika-vin01t2:855_1: dhammā, tattha yonisomanasikārabahulīkāro ayamāhāro anuppannassa vā dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgassa
tika-vin01t2:855_2: uppādāya, uppannassa vā dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgassa bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya bhāvanāya
tika-vin01t2:855_3: pāripūriyā saṃvattati. Tathā atthi, bhikkhave, ārambhadhātu nikkamadhātu parakkamadhātu,
tika-vin01t2:855_4: tattha yonisomanasikārabahulīkāro ayamāhāro anuppannassa vā vīriyasambojjhaṅgassa
tika-vin01t2:855_5: uppādāya, uppannassa vā vīriyasambojjhaṅgassa bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya bhāvanāya pāripūriyā
tika-vin01t2:855_6: saṃvattati. Tathā atthi, bhikkhave, pītisambojjhaṅgaṭṭhānīyā dhammā, tattha yonisomanasikārabahulīkāro
tika-vin01t2:855_7: ayamāhāro anuppannassa vā pītisambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya, uppannassa vā pītisambojjhaṅgassa
tika-vin01t2:856_1: nāma. Ārambhadhātuādīnaṃ uppādavasena pavattamanasikāro ārambhadhātuādīsu yonisomanasikāro
tika-vin01t2:856_2: nāma. Tattha ārambhadhātūti paṭhamavīriyaṃ vuccati. Nikkamadhātūti kosajjato nikkhantattā
tika-vin01t2:856_3: tato balavataraṃ. Parakkamadhātūti paraṃ paraṃ ṭhānaṃ akkamanato tatopi balavataraṃ.
tika-vin01t2:856_4: Pītisambojjhaṅgaṭṭhānīyā dhammāti pana pītiyā evetaṃ nāmaṃ, tassāpi uppādakamanasikāro
tika-vin01t2:857_0: Apica satta dhammā dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya saṃvattanti – paripucchakatā,
tika-vin01t2:858_0: Ekādasa dhammā vīriyasambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya saṃvattanti – apāyādibhayapaccavekkhaṇatā,
tika-vin01t2:858_2: gatamaggo mayā gantabbo, so ca na sakkā kusītena gantu”nti evaṃ gamanavīthipaccavekkhaṇatā,
tika-vin01t2:858_3: dāyakānaṃ mahapphalatākaraṇena piṇḍāpacāyanatā, “vīriyārambhassa vaṇṇavādī me satthā,
tika-vin01t2:858_4: so ca anatikkamanīyasāsano, amhākañca bahūpakāro, paṭipattiyā ca pūjiyamāno pūjito
tika-vin01t2:858_5: hoti, na itarathā”ti evaṃ satthu mahattapaccavekkhaṇatā, “saddhammasaṅkhātaṃ me mahādāyajjaṃ
tika-vin01t2:858_6: gahetabbaṃ, tañca na sakkā kusītena gahetu”nti evaṃ dāyajjamahattapaccavekkhaṇatā,
tika-vin01t2:859_0: Ekādasa dhammā pītisambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya saṃvattanti – buddhānussati, dhammasaṅghasīlacāgadevatānussati,
tika-vin01t2:859_2: tadadhimuttatāti. Iti imehi ākārehi ete dhamme uppādento dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgādayo
tika-vin01t2:859_3: bhāveti nāma. Evaṃ yasmiṃ samaye cittaṃ paggahetabbaṃ, tasmiṃ samaye cittaṃ paggaṇhāti.
tika-vin01t2:860_0: Kathaṃ yasmiṃ samaye cittaṃ sampahaṃsetabbaṃ, tasmiṃ samaye cittaṃ sampahaṃseti?
tika-vin01t2:860_1: Yadāssa paññāpayogamandatāya vā upasamasukhānadhigamena vā nirassādaṃ cittaṃ hoti,
tika-vin01t2:860_2: tadā naṃ aṭṭhasaṃvegavatthupaccavekkhaṇena saṃvejeti. Aṭṭha saṃvegavatthūni nāma
tika-vin01t2:860_3: jātijarābyādhimaraṇāni cattāri, apāyadukkhaṃ pañcamaṃ, atīte vaṭṭamūlakaṃ dukkhaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:860_4: anāgate vaṭṭamūlakaṃ dukkhaṃ, paccuppanne āhārapariyeṭṭhimūlakaṃ dukkhanti. Buddhadhammasaṅghaguṇānussaraṇena
tika-vin01t2:860_5: cassa pasādaṃ janeti. Evaṃ yasmiṃ samaye cittaṃ sampahaṃsetabbaṃ, tasmiṃ samaye cittaṃ sampahaṃseti.
tika-vin01t2:861_0: Kathaṃ yasmiṃ samaye cittaṃ ajjhupekkhitabbaṃ, tasmiṃ samaye cittaṃ ajjhupekkhati?
tika-vin01t2:861_1: Yadāssa evaṃ paṭipajjato alīnaṃ anuddhataṃ anirassādaṃ ārammaṇe samappavattaṃ samathavīthippaṭipannaṃ
tika-vin01t2:861_2: cittaṃ hoti, tadā tassa paggahaniggahasampahaṃsanesu abyāpāraṃ āpajjati sārathi viya
tika-vin01t2:861_3: ca samappavattesu assesu. Evaṃ yasmiṃ samaye cittaṃ ajjhupekkhitabbaṃ, tasmiṃ samaye
tika-vin01t2:862_1: vikkhittahadayānaṃ puggalānaṃ ārakā pariccāgo. Samāhitapuggalasevanā nāma nekkhammapaṭipadaṃ
tika-vin01t2:862_2: paṭipannānaṃ samādhilābhīnaṃ puggalānaṃ kālena kālaṃ upasaṅkamanaṃ. Tadadhimuttatā
tika-vin01t2:862_4: Evametaṃ dasavidhaṃ appanākosallaṃ sampādetabbaṃ. Tenāha – “imāni dasa appanākosallāni
tika-vin01t2:862_5: avijahantenā”ti. Tattha yena vidhinā appanāya kusalo hoti, so dasavidhopi vidhi appanākosallaṃ
tika-vin01t2:862_6: tannibbattaṃ vā ñāṇaṃ, evametaṃ dasavidhaṃ appanākosallaṃ sampādentassa paṭiladdhanimittasmiṃ
tika-vin01t2:865_0: Yogo karaṇīyoti appanākosallaṃ sampādentassapi yadi appanā na hoti, tena kammaṭṭhānānuyogaṃ
tika-vin01t2:865_1: avijahitvā reṇuādīsu madhukarādīnaṃ pavatti ākāraṃ sallakkhetvā līnuddhatabhāvehi
tika-vin01t2:865_2: mānasaṃ mocetvā vīriyasamataṃ yojentena punappunaṃ yogo kātabbo. Vuttañhetaṃ –
tika-vin01t2:867: Tathāpi na jahe yogaṃ, vāyametheva paṇḍito.
tika-vin01t2:878_0: Yathā hi acheko madhukaro “asukasmiṃ rukkhe pupphaṃ pupphita”nti ñatvā tikkhena vegena
tika-vin01t2:878_1: pakkhando taṃ atikkamitvā paṭinivattento khīṇe reṇumhi sampāpuṇāti, aparo acheko
tika-vin01t2:878_2: mandena javena pakkhando khīṇeyeva sampāpuṇāti, cheko pana samena javena pakkhando
tika-vin01t2:878_3: sukhena puppharāsiṃ sampatvā yāvadicchakaṃ reṇuṃ ādāya madhuṃ sampādetvā madhuṃ anubhavati,
tika-vin01t2:878_4: yathā ca sallakattaantevāsikesu udakathālagate uppalapatte satthakammaṃ sikkhantesu
tika-vin01t2:878_5: eko acheko vegena satthaṃ pātento uppalapattaṃ dvidhā vā chindati, udake vā paveseti,
tika-vin01t2:878_6: aparo acheko chijjanapavesanabhayā satthakena phusitumpi na visahati, cheko pana
tika-vin01t2:878_7: samena payogena tattha satthapadaṃ dassetvā pariyodātasippo hutvā tathārūpesu ṭhānesu
tika-vin01t2:878_8: kammaṃ katvā lābhaṃ labhati, yathā ca “yo catubyāmappamāṇaṃ makkaṭakasuttaṃ āharati,
tika-vin01t2:878_9: so cattāri sahassāni labhatī”ti raññā vutte eko achekapuriso vegena makkaṭakasuttaṃ
tika-vin01t2:878_10: ākaḍḍhanto tahiṃ tahiṃ chindatiyeva, aparo acheko chedanabhayā hatthena phusitumpi
tika-vin01t2:878_11: na visahati, cheko pana koṭito paṭṭhāya samena payogena daṇḍake veṭhetvā āharitvā
tika-vin01t2:878_12: lābhaṃ labhati, yathā ca acheko niyāmako balavavāte laṅkāraṃ pūrento nāvaṃ videsaṃ
tika-vin01t2:878_13: pakkhandāpeti, aparo acheko mandavāte laṅkāraṃ oropento nāvaṃ tattheva ṭhapeti, cheko
tika-vin01t2:878_14: pana mandavāte pūretvā balavavāte aḍḍhalaṅkāraṃ katvā sotthinā icchitaṭṭhānaṃ pāpuṇāti,
tika-vin01t2:878_15: yathā ca “yo telena achaḍḍento nāḷiṃ pūreti, so lābhaṃ labhatī”ti ācariyena antevāsikānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:878_16: vutte eko acheko lābhaluddho vegena pūrento telaṃ chaḍḍeti, aparo acheko telachaḍḍanabhayā
tika-vin01t2:878_17: āsiñcitumpi na visahati, cheko pana samena payogena pūretvā lābhaṃ labhati, evameva
tika-vin01t2:878_18: eko bhikkhu uppanne nimitte “sīghameva appanaṃ pāpuṇissāmī”ti gāḷhaṃ vīriyaṃ karoti,
tika-vin01t2:878_19: tassa cittaṃ accāraddhavīriyattā uddhacce patati, so na sakkoti appanaṃ pāpuṇituṃ.
tika-vin01t2:878_20: Eko accāraddhavīriyatāya dosaṃ disvā “kiṃ dāni me appanāyā”ti vīriyaṃ hāpeti, tassa
tika-vin01t2:878_21: cittaṃ atilīnavīriyattā kosajje patati, sopi na sakkoti appanaṃ pāpuṇituṃ. Yo pana
tika-vin01t2:878_22: īsakampi līnaṃ līnabhāvato, uddhataṃ uddhaccato mocetvā samena payogena nimittābhimukhaṃ
tika-vin01t2:878_23: pavatteti, so appanaṃ pāpuṇāti, tādisena bhavitabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:879_0: Idāni evaṃ paṭipannassa appanāpavattiṃ dassento “tassevaṃ anuyuttassā”tiādimāha.
tika-vin01t2:879_1: Tattha paṭhamaṃ parikammantiādi aggahitaggahaṇena vuttaṃ, gahitaggahaṇena pana avisesena
tika-vin01t2:879_2: sabbesaṃ sabbā samaññā. Sabbānipi hi appanāya parikammattā paṭisaṅkhārakattā “parikammānī”tipi,
tika-vin01t2:879_3: yathā gāmādīnaṃ āsannappadeso “gāmūpacāro gharūpacāro”ti vuccati, evaṃ appanāya āsannattā
tika-vin01t2:879_4: samīpacārittā vā “upacārānī”tipi, ito pubbe parikammānaṃ upari appanāya ca anulomanato
tika-vin01t2:879_5: “anulomānī”tipi vuccanti. Yañcettha sabbantimaṃ, taṃ parittagottābhibhavanato mahaggatagottabhāvanato
tika-vin01t2:879_6: ca “gotrabhū”tipi vuccati. Gaṃ tāyatīti hi gottaṃ, parittanti pavattamānaṃ abhidhānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:879_7: buddhiñca ekaṃsikavisayatāya rakkhatīti parittagottaṃ. Yathā hi buddhi ārammaṇabhūtena
tika-vin01t2:879_8: atthena vinā na vattati, evaṃ abhidhānaṃ abhidheyyabhūtena, tasmā so tāni tāyati
tika-vin01t2:879_9: rakkhatīti vuccati. Taṃ pana mahaggatānuttaravidhuraṃ kāmataṇhāya gocarabhūtaṃ kāmāvacaradhammānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:879_10: āveṇikarūpaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Mahaggatagottepi iminā nayena attho veditabbo. Iti evarūpassa
tika-vin01t2:879_11: parittagottassa abhibhavanato mahaggatagottassa ca bhāvanato uppādanato antimaṃ “gotrabhū”tipi
tika-vin01t2:879_12: vuccati. Catutthameva hi pañcamaṃ vāti khippābhiññadandhābhiññānaṃ vasena vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:879_13: Khippābhiññassa hi catutthaṃ appeti, dandhābhiññassa pañcamaṃ. Kasmā pana catutthaṃ
tika-vin01t2:879_14: pañcamaṃ vā appeti, na chaṭṭhaṃ vā sattamaṃ vāti āha “āsannabhavaṅgapātattā”ti. Yathā
tika-vin01t2:879_15: hi puriso chinnapapātābhimukho dhāvanto ṭhātukāmopi pariyante pādaṃ katvā ṭhātuṃ
tika-vin01t2:879_16: na sakkoti, papāte eva patati, evaṃ chaṭṭhaṃ vā sattamaṃ vā appetuṃ na sakkoti bhavaṅgassa
tika-vin01t2:879_17: āsannattā. Tasmā catutthapañcamesuyeva appanā hotīti veditabbā.
tika-vin01t2:880_0: “Purimā purimā kusalā dhammā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ āsevanapaccayena
tika-vin01t2:880_1: paccayo”ti vuttattā “āsevanapaccayena kusalā dhammā balavanto hontī”ti āha. Yathā
tika-vin01t2:880_2: aladdhāsevanaṃ paṭhamaṃ javanaṃ dubbalattā gotrabhuṃ na uppādeti, laddhāsevanaṃ pana
tika-vin01t2:880_3: balavabhāvato dutiyaṃ vā tatiyaṃ vā gotrabhuṃ uppādeti, evaṃ laddhāsevanatāya balavabhāvato
tika-vin01t2:880_4: chaṭṭhampi sattamampi appetīti therassa adhippāyo. Tenāha – “tasmā chaṭṭhaṃ sattamaṃ
tika-vin01t2:880_5: vā appetī”ti. Tanti therassa vacanaṃ. Paṭikkhittanti suttasuttānulomaācariyavādehi
tika-vin01t2:880_7: kusalā dhammā”ti pana suttapadamakāraṇaṃ āsevanapaccayalābhassa balavabhāve anekantikattā.
tika-vin01t2:880_8: Tathā hi aladdhāsevanāpi paṭhamacetanā diṭṭhadhammavedanīyā hoti, laddhāsevanā dutiyacetanā
tika-vin01t2:880_9: yāva chaṭṭhacetanā aparāpariyavedanīyā. Yadi chaṭṭhaṃ sattamañca parikkhīṇajavattā
tika-vin01t2:880_10: dubbalaṃ, na āsevanapaccayena balavaṃ, kathaṃ sattamajavanacetanā upapajjavedanīyā
tika-vin01t2:880_11: ānantariyā ca hotīti? Nāyaṃ viseso āsevanapaccayalābhena balavappattiyā kiñcarahi
tika-vin01t2:880_12: kiriyāvatthāvisesato. Kiriyāvatthā hi ādimajjhapariyosānavasena tividhā. Tattha pariyosānāvatthāya
tika-vin01t2:880_13: sanniṭṭhāpakacetanābhāvena upapajjavedanīyāditā hoti, na balavabhāvenāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:880_15: abhisaṅkhatattā”ti ca vadanti, tasmā chaṭṭhasattamānaṃ papātābhimukhatāya parikkhīṇajavatā
tika-vin01t2:880_16: na sakkā nivāretuṃ. Pubbabhāgacittānīti tīṇi cattāri vā cittāni.
tika-vin01t2:881_0: Etthāti etissaṃ kāyānupassanāyaṃ. Pārisuddhiṃ pattukāmoti adhigantukāmo samāpajjitukāmo
tika-vin01t2:881_1: ca. Tattha sallakkhaṇāvivaṭṭanāvasena adhigantukāmo, sallakkhaṇavasena samāpajjitukāmoti
tika-vin01t2:881_2: yojetabbaṃ. Āvajjanasamāpajjana…pe… vasippattanti ettha evaṃ tāva pañca vasiyo veditabbā
tika-vin01t2:881_3: – paṭhamajjhānato vuṭṭhāya paṭhamaṃ vitakkaṃ āvajjayato bhavaṅgaṃ upacchinditvā uppannāvajjanānantaraṃ
tika-vin01t2:881_4: vitakkārammaṇāneva cattāri pañca javanāni javanti, tato dve bhavaṅgāni, tato pana
tika-vin01t2:881_5: vicārārammaṇaṃ āvajjanaṃ vuttanayeneva javanānīti evaṃ pañcasu jhānaṅgesu yadā nirantaraṃ
tika-vin01t2:881_6: cittaṃ pesetuṃ sakkoti, athassa āvajjanavasī siddhā hoti. Ayaṃ pana bhavaṅgadvayantaritā
tika-vin01t2:881_7: matthakappattā vasī bhagavato yamakapāṭihāriye labbhati, aññesaṃ vā dhammasenāpatiādīnaṃ
tika-vin01t2:881_8: evarūpe uṭṭhāya samuṭṭhāya lahutaraṃ āvajjanavasīnibbattanakāle. Sā ca kho ittarā
tika-vin01t2:881_9: parittakālā, na satthu yamakapāṭihāriye viya ciratarappabandhavatī. Tathā hi taṃ
tika-vin01t2:881_10: sāvakehi asādhāraṇaṃ vuttaṃ. Ito paraṃ sīghatarā āvajjanavasī nāma natthi.
tika-vin01t2:882_0: Āyasmato pana mahāmoggallānassa nandopanandanāgarājadamane viya sīghaṃ samāpajjanasamatthatā
tika-vin01t2:882_1: samāpajjanavasī nāma. Ettha ca samāpajjitukāmatānantaraṃ dvīsu bhavaṅgesu uppannesu
tika-vin01t2:882_2: bhavaṅgaṃ upacchinditvā uppannāvajjanānantaraṃ samāpajjanaṃ sīghaṃ samāpajjanasamatthatā.
tika-vin01t2:882_3: Ayañca matthakappattā samāpajjanavasī satthu dhammadesanāyaṃ labbhati, taṃ sandhāya
tika-vin01t2:882_4: vuttaṃ “so kho ahaṃ, aggivessana, tassāyeva kathāya pariyosāne tasmiṃyeva purimasmiṃ
tika-vin01t2:882_5: samādhinimitte ajjhattameva cittaṃ saṇṭhapemi sannisādemi ekodiṃ karomi samādahāmi,
tika-vin01t2:882_6: yena sudaṃ niccakappaṃ viharāmī”ti. Ito sīghatarā hi samāpajjanavasī nāma natthi.
tika-vin01t2:883_0: Accharāmattaṃ vā dasaccharāmattaṃ vā khaṇaṃ jhānaṃ ṭhapetuṃ samatthatā adhiṭṭhānavasī
tika-vin01t2:883_1: nāma. Tatheva accharāmattaṃ vā dasaccharāmattaṃ vā lahukaṃ khaṇaṃ jhānasamaṅgī hutvā
tika-vin01t2:883_2: jhānato vuṭṭhātuṃ samatthatā vuṭṭhānavasī nāma. Bhavaṅgacittappavattiyeva hettha
tika-vin01t2:883_3: jhānato vuṭṭhānaṃ nāma. Ettha ca yathā “ettakameva khaṇaṃ jhānaṃ ṭhapessāmī”ti pubbaparikammavasena
tika-vin01t2:883_4: adhiṭṭhānasamatthatā adhiṭṭhānavasī, evaṃ “ettakameva khaṇaṃ jhānasamaṅgī hutvā jhānato
tika-vin01t2:883_6: yā samāpattivuṭṭhānakusalatāti vuccati. Paccavekkhaṇavasī pana āvajjanavasiyā eva
tika-vin01t2:883_7: vuttā. Paccavekkhaṇajavanāneva hi tattha āvajjanānantarāni. Yadaggena hi āvajjanavasīsiddhi,
tika-vin01t2:884_0: Arūpapubbaṅgamaṃ vā…pe… vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetīti saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṃ vitthārato
tika-vin01t2:884_1: dassetuṃ “katha”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha jhānaṅgāni pariggahetvāti vitakkādīni jhānaṅgāni
tika-vin01t2:884_2: taṃsampayutte ca dhamme salakkhaṇarasādivasena pariggahetvā. “Jhānaṅgānī”ti hi idaṃ
tika-vin01t2:884_3: nidassanamattaṃ, jhānaṅgāni pana passanto taṃsampayutte ca dhamme passati. Tesaṃ
tika-vin01t2:884_4: nissayaṃ hadayavatthunti yathā nāma puriso antogehe sappaṃ disvā anubandhamāno tassa
tika-vin01t2:884_5: āsayaṃ passati, evameva kho ayampi yogāvacaro te arūpadhamme upaparikkhanto “ime
tika-vin01t2:884_6: dhammā kiṃ nissāya pavattantī”ti pariyesamāno tesaṃ nissayaṃ hadayavatthuṃ passati.
tika-vin01t2:884_7: Jhānaṅgāni arūpanti ettha taṃsampayuttadhammānampi gahaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:885_0: Arūpapubbaṅgamaṃ rūpapariggahaṃ dassetvā idāni rūpapubbaṅgamaṃ arūpapariggahaṃ dassento
tika-vin01t2:885_1: “atha vā”tiādimāha. Kesādīsu koṭṭhāsesu…pe… taṃnissitarūpāni ca pariggahetvāti ettha
tika-vin01t2:885_2: pana kese tāva thaddhalakkhaṇaṃ pathavīdhātūti pariggahetabbaṃ, tattheva ābandhanalakkhaṇaṃ
tika-vin01t2:885_3: āpodhātūti, paripācanalakkhaṇaṃ tejodhātūti, vitthambhanalakkhaṇaṃ vāyodhātūti evaṃ
tika-vin01t2:885_4: sabbakoṭṭhāsesu ekekasmiṃ koṭṭhāse cattāri cattāri mahābhūtāni pariggahetabbāni.
tika-vin01t2:885_5: Athānena yāthāvato sarasalakkhaṇato āvibhūtāsu dhātūsu kammasamuṭṭhānamhi tāva kese
tika-vin01t2:885_6: vuttalakkhaṇā tā catasso ca dhātuyo taṃnissito ca vaṇṇo gandho raso ojā jīvitaṃ kāyapasādoti
tika-vin01t2:885_7: evaṃ kāyadasakavasena dasa rūpāni, tattheva bhāvassa atthitāya bhāvadasakavasena
tika-vin01t2:885_8: dasa rūpāni, āhārasamuṭṭhānaṃ ojaṭṭhamakaṃ, utusamuṭṭhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānanti aparānipi
tika-vin01t2:885_9: catuvīsatīti evaṃ catusamuṭṭhānesu catuvīsatikoṭṭhāsesu catucattālīsa rūpāni pariggahetabbāni.
tika-vin01t2:885_10: Sedo assu kheḷo siṅghāṇikāti ime pana catūsu utucittasamuṭṭhānesu dvinnaṃ ojaṭṭhamakānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:885_11: vasena soḷasa soḷasa rūpāni. Udariyaṃ karīsaṃ pubbaṃ muttanti imesu catūsu utusamuṭṭhānesu
tika-vin01t2:885_12: utusamuṭṭhānasseva ojaṭṭhamakassa vasena aṭṭha aṭṭha rūpāni pariggahetabbāni. Esa
tika-vin01t2:886_0: Ye pana imasmiṃ dvattiṃsākāre āvibhūte apare cattāro tejokoṭṭhāsā, cha vāyokoṭṭhāsāti
tika-vin01t2:886_1: dasa ākārā āvi bhavanti, tattha asitādiparipācake tāva kammajatejokoṭṭhāsamhi ojaṭṭhamakañceva
tika-vin01t2:886_2: jīvitañcāti nava rūpāni, tathā cittaje assāsapassāsakoṭṭhāse ojaṭṭhamakañceva saddo
tika-vin01t2:886_3: cāti nava, sesesu catusamuṭṭhānesu aṭṭhasu jīvitanavakañceva tīṇi ca ojaṭṭhamakānīti
tika-vin01t2:886_4: tettiṃsa tettiṃsa rūpāni pariggahetabbāni. Evaṃ vitthārato dvācattālīsākāravasena
tika-vin01t2:886_5: imesu bhūtupādāyarūpesu pākaṭesu jātesu vatthudvāravasena pañca cakkhudasakādayo
tika-vin01t2:886_6: hadayavatthudasakañcāti aparānipi saṭṭhi rūpāni pariggahetabbāni. Sace panassa tena
tika-vin01t2:886_7: tena mukhena rūpaṃ pariggahetvā arūpaṃ pariggaṇhato sukhumattā arūpaṃ na upaṭṭhāti,
tika-vin01t2:886_8: tena dhuranikkhepaṃ akatvā rūpameva punappunaṃ sammasitabbaṃ manasi kātabbaṃ pariggahetabbaṃ
tika-vin01t2:886_9: vavatthapetabbaṃ. Yathā yathā hissa rūpaṃ suvikkhālitaṃ hoti nijjaṭaṃ suparisuddhaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:886_10: tathā tathā tadārammaṇā arūpadhammā sayameva pākaṭā honti.
tika-vin01t2:887_0: Yathā hi cakkhumato purisassa aparisuddhe ādāse mukhanimittaṃ olokentassa nimittaṃ
tika-vin01t2:887_1: na paññāyatīti na ādāsaṃ chaḍḍeti, atha kho naṃ punappunaṃ parimajjati, tassa parisuddhe
tika-vin01t2:887_2: ādāse nimittaṃ sayameva pākaṭaṃ hoti, evameva tena bhikkhunā dhuranikkhepaṃ akatvā
tika-vin01t2:887_3: rūpameva punappunaṃ sammasitabbaṃ manasi kātabbaṃ pariggahetabbaṃ vavatthapetabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:887_4: Yathā yathā hissa rūpaṃ suvikkhālitaṃ hoti nijjaṭaṃ suparisuddhaṃ, tathā tathā tadārammaṇā
tika-vin01t2:887_5: arūpadhammā sayameva pākaṭā honti. Evaṃ suvisuddharūpapariggahassa panassa arūpadhammā
tika-vin01t2:887_6: tīhākārehi upaṭṭhahanti phassavasena vā vedanāvasena vā viññāṇavasena vā.
tika-vin01t2:888_0: Kathaṃ? Ekassa tāva “kese pathavīdhātu kakkhaḷalakkhaṇā…pe… assāsapassāse pathavīdhātu
tika-vin01t2:888_1: kakkhaḷalakkhaṇā”tiādinā nayena dhātuyo pariggaṇhantassa paṭhamābhinipāto phasso,
tika-vin01t2:888_2: taṃsampayuttā vedanā vedanākkhandho, saññā saññākkhandho, saddhiṃ phassena cetanā
tika-vin01t2:888_3: saṅkhārakkhandho, cittaṃ viññāṇakkhandhoti upaṭṭhāti. Evaṃ arūpadhammā phassavasena
tika-vin01t2:888_4: upaṭṭhahanti. Ekassa “kese pathavīdhātu kakkhaḷalakkhaṇā…pe… assāsapassāse pathavīdhātu
tika-vin01t2:888_6: saññā saññākkhandho, taṃsampayutto phasso ca cetanā ca saṅkhārakkhandho, taṃsampayuttaṃ
tika-vin01t2:888_7: cittaṃ viññāṇakkhandhoti upaṭṭhāti. Evaṃ vedanāvasena arūpadhammā upaṭṭhahanti. Aparassa
tika-vin01t2:888_9: ārammaṇapaṭivijānanaṃ viññāṇakkhandho, taṃsampayuttā vedanā vedanākkhandho, saññā
tika-vin01t2:888_10: saññākkhandho, phasso ca cetanā ca saṅkhārakkhandhoti upaṭṭhāti. Evaṃ viññāṇavasena
tika-vin01t2:888_11: arūpadhammā upaṭṭhahanti. Etenevupāyena “kammasamuṭṭhāne kese pathavīdhātu kakkhaḷalakkhaṇā”tiādinā
tika-vin01t2:888_12: nayena dvācattālīsāya dhātukoṭṭhāsesu catunnaṃ catunnaṃ dhātūnaṃ vasena sesesupi
tika-vin01t2:888_13: vatthu cakkhādīsu dasakesu manodhātumanoviññāṇadhātūnaṃ nissayalakkhaṇaṃ hadayavatthu
tika-vin01t2:888_15: paṭhamābhinipāto phasso, taṃsampayuttā vedanā vedanākkhandhotiādinā phassādivasena
tika-vin01t2:888_16: tīhi ākārehi arūpadhammā upaṭṭhahanti. Tena vuttaṃ “yathāpariggahitarūpārammaṇaṃ
tika-vin01t2:889_0: Idāni aññathāpi rūpapubbaṅgamaṃ arūpapariggahaṃ dassento “atha vā”tiādimāha. Tattha
tika-vin01t2:889_1: yathā hītiādi kāyassa cittassa ca assāsapassāsānaṃ samudayabhāvadassanaṃ. Kammāragaggarīti
tika-vin01t2:889_2: kammārānaṃ ukkāya aggidhamanabhastā. Dhamamānāyāti dhūmāyantiyā, vātaṃ gāhāpentiyāti
tika-vin01t2:889_3: attho. Tajjanti tadanurūpaṃ. Evamevanti ettha kammāragaggarī viya karajakāyo, vāyāmo
tika-vin01t2:889_4: viya cittaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Kiñcāpi assāsapassāsā cittasamuṭṭhānā, karajakāyaṃ pana vinā
tika-vin01t2:889_5: tesaṃ appavattanato “kāyañca cittañca paṭicca assāsapassāsā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:890_0: Tassāti nāmarūpassa. Paccayaṃ pariyesatīti “avijjāsamudayā rūpasamudayo”tiādinā avijjādikaṃ
tika-vin01t2:890_1: paccayaṃ pariyesati vīmaṃsati pariggaṇhāti. Kaṅkhaṃ vitaratīti “ahosiṃ nu kho ahaṃ
tika-vin01t2:890_5: Obhāsādayoti obhāso ñāṇaṃ pīti passaddhi sukhaṃ adhimokkho paggaho upekkhā upaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:891_0: Tattha obhāsoti vipassanobhāso, so ca vipassanācittasamuṭṭhitaṃ santatipatitaṃ utusamuṭṭhānañca
tika-vin01t2:891_1: pabhassararūpaṃ. Tattha vipassanācittasamuṭṭhitaṃ yogino sarīraṭṭhameva pabhassaraṃ
tika-vin01t2:891_2: hutvā tiṭṭhati cittajarūpānaṃ sarīraṃ muñcitvā bahi appavattanato, itaraṃ sarīraṃ
tika-vin01t2:891_3: muñcitvā ñāṇānubhāvānurūpaṃ samantato pattharati, taṃ tasseva paññāyati. Tena phuṭṭhokāse
tika-vin01t2:891_4: rūpagatampi passati, passanto ca cakkhuviññāṇena passati, udāhu manoviññāṇenāti vīmaṃsitabbanti
tika-vin01t2:891_5: vadanti. Dibbacakkhulābhino viya taṃ manoviññāṇaviññeyyamevāti vattuṃ yuttaṃ viya
tika-vin01t2:891_6: dissati. So kho panāyaṃ obhāso kassaci bhikkhuno pallaṅkaṭṭhānamattameva obhāsento
tika-vin01t2:891_7: uppajjati, kassaci antogabbhaṃ, kassaci bahigabbhampi, kassaci sakalavihāraṃ, gāvutaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:891_8: aḍḍhayojanaṃ, yojanaṃ, dviyojanaṃ, tiyojanaṃ, kassaci pathavītalato yāva akaniṭṭhabrahmalokā
tika-vin01t2:891_9: ekālokaṃ kurumāno. Bhagavato pana dasasahassilokadhātuṃ obhāsento udapādi. Tasmiṃ
tika-vin01t2:891_10: pana uppanne yogāvacaro “na vata me ito pubbe evarūpo obhāso uppannapubbo, addhā
tika-vin01t2:891_11: maggappattosmi phalappattosmī”ti amaggameva “maggo”ti, aphalameva ca “phala”nti gaṇhāti.
tika-vin01t2:891_12: Tassa amaggaṃ “maggo”ti aphalaṃ vā “phala”nti gaṇhato vipassanāvīthi ukkantā nāma
tika-vin01t2:891_13: hoti. So attano mūlakammaṭṭhānaṃ vissajjetvā obhāsameva assādento nisīdati.
tika-vin01t2:892: Ñāṇanti vipassanāñāṇaṃ. Tassa kira rūpārūpadhamme tulayantassa tīrayantassa vissaṭṭhaindavajiramiva avihatavegaṃ tikhiṇaṃ sūraṃ ativisadaṃ ñāṇaṃ uppajjati.
tika-vin01t2:893: Pītīti vipassanāpīti. Tassa kira tasmiṃ samaye khuddikā pīti khaṇikā pīti okkantikā pīti ubbegā pīti pharaṇā pītīti ayaṃ pañcavidhā pīti sakalasarīraṃ pūrayamānā uppajjati.
tika-vin01t2:894_0: Passaddhīti vipassanāpassaddhi. Tassa kira tasmiṃ samaye rattiṭṭhāne vā divāṭṭhāne
tika-vin01t2:894_1: vā nisinnassa kāyacittānaṃ neva daratho, na gāravaṃ, na kakkhaḷatā, na akammaññatā,
tika-vin01t2:894_2: na gelaññaṃ, na vaṅkatā hoti, atha kho panassa kāyacittāni passaddhāni lahūni mudūni
tika-vin01t2:894_3: kammaññāni suvisadāni ujukāniyeva honti. So imehi passaddhādīhi anuggahitakāyacitto
tika-vin01t2:894_4: tasmiṃ samaye amānusiṃ nāma ratiṃ anubhavati. Yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ –
tika-vin01t2:896: Amānusī ratī hoti, sammā dhammaṃ vipassato.
tika-vin01t2:899: Evamassa imaṃ amānusiṃ ratiṃ sādhayamānā lahutādisampayuttā passaddhi uppajjati.
tika-vin01t2:900: Sukhanti vipassanāsukhaṃ. Tassa kira tasmiṃ samaye sakalasarīraṃ abhisandayamānaṃ atipaṇītaṃ sukhamuppajjati.
tika-vin01t2:901: Adhimokkhoti saddhā. Vipassanāsampayuttāyeva hissa cittacetasikānaṃ atisayappasādabhūtā balavatī saddhā uppajjati.
tika-vin01t2:902: Paggahoti vīriyaṃ. Vipassanāsampayuttameva hissa asithilamanaccāraddhaṃ supaggahitaṃ vīriyaṃ uppajjati.
tika-vin01t2:903_0: Upaṭṭhānanti sati. Vipassanāsampayuttāyeva hissa sūpaṭṭhitā suppatiṭṭhitā nikhātā
tika-vin01t2:903_1: acalā pabbatarājasadisā sati uppajjati. So yaṃ yaṃ ṭhānaṃ āvajjati samannāharati
tika-vin01t2:903_2: manasi karoti paccavekkhati, taṃ taṃ ṭhānamassa okkantitvā pakkhanditvā dibbacakkhuno
tika-vin01t2:904_0: Upekkhāti vipassanupekkhā ceva āvajjanupekkhā ca. Tasmiñhissa samaye sabbasaṅkhāresu
tika-vin01t2:904_1: majjhattabhūtā vipassanupekkhā balavatī uppajjati, manodvāre āvajjanupekkhāpi. Sā
tika-vin01t2:904_2: hissa taṃ taṃ ṭhānaṃ āvajjentassa vissaṭṭhaindavajiramiva pattapuṭe pakkhandatattanārāco
tika-vin01t2:904_3: viya ca sūrā tikhiṇā hutvā vahati.
tika-vin01t2:905: Nikantīti vipassanānikanti. Evaṃ obhāsādipaṭimaṇḍitāya hissa vipassanāya ālayaṃ kurumānā sukhumā santākārā nikanti uppajjati, yā “kileso”ti pariggahetumpi na sakkā hoti.
tika-vin01t2:906_0: Yathā ca obhāse, evaṃ etesupi aññatarasmiṃ uppanne yogāvacaro “na vata me ito pubbe
tika-vin01t2:906_1: evarūpaṃ ñāṇaṃ uppannapubbaṃ, evarūpā pīti, passaddhi, sukhaṃ, adhimokkho, paggaho,
tika-vin01t2:906_2: upaṭṭhānaṃ, upekkhā, nikanti uppannapubbā, addhā maggappattosmi phalappattosmī”ti
tika-vin01t2:906_3: amaggameva “maggo”ti aphalameva ca “phala”nti gaṇhāti, tassa amaggaṃ “maggo”ti aphalaṃ
tika-vin01t2:906_4: “phala”nti gaṇhato vipassanāvīthi ukkantā nāma hoti. So attano mūlakammaṭṭhānaṃ vissajjetvā
tika-vin01t2:907_0: Ettha ca obhāsādayo upakkilesavatthutāya “upakkilesā”ti vuttā, na akusalattā, nikanti
tika-vin01t2:907_1: pana upakkileso ceva upakkilesavatthu ca. Vatthuvaseneva cete dasa, gāhavasena pana
tika-vin01t2:907_2: samatiṃsa honti. Kathaṃ? “Mama obhāso uppanno”ti gaṇhato hi diṭṭhiggāho hoti, “manāpo
tika-vin01t2:907_3: vata obhāso uppanno”ti gaṇhato mānaggāho, obhāsaṃ assādayato taṇhāgāho. Iti obhāse
tika-vin01t2:907_4: diṭṭhimānataṇhāvasena tayo gāhā. Tathā sesesupīti evaṃ gāhavasena samatiṃsa upakkilesā
tika-vin01t2:907_5: honti. Tesaṃ vasena akusalo abyatto yogāvacaro obhāsādīsu kampati vikkhipati, obhāsādīsu
