tika-vin01t2:907_6: ekekaṃ “etaṃ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attā”ti samanupassati. Tenāhu porāṇā –
tika-vin01t2:908: “Obhāse ceva ñāṇe ca, pītiyā ca vikampati;
tika-vin01t2:909: Passaddhiyā sukhe ceva, yehi cittaṃ pavedhati.
tika-vin01t2:912_0: Kusalo paṇḍito byatto buddhisampanno yogāvacaro obhāsādīsu uppannesu “ayaṃ kho me
tika-vin01t2:912_1: obhāso uppanno, so kho panāyaṃ anicco saṅkhato paṭiccasamuppanno khayadhammo vayadhammo
tika-vin01t2:912_2: virāgadhammo nirodhadhammo”ti iti vā taṃ paññāya paricchindati upaparikkhati. Atha
tika-vin01t2:912_3: vā panassa evaṃ hoti – sace obhāso attā bhaveyya, attāti gahetuṃ vaṭṭeyya, anattāva
tika-vin01t2:912_4: panāyaṃ “attā”ti gahito. Tasmā so avasavattanaṭṭhena anattā, hutvā abhāvaṭṭhena anicco,
tika-vin01t2:912_5: uppādavayapaṭipīḷanaṭṭhena dukkhoti upaparikkhati. Yathā ca obhāse, evaṃ sesesupi.
tika-vin01t2:912_6: So evaṃ upaparikkhitvā obhāsaṃ “netaṃ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attā”ti samanupassati.
tika-vin01t2:912_7: Ñāṇaṃ…pe… nikantiṃ “netaṃ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attā”ti samanupassati. Evaṃ
tika-vin01t2:912_8: samanupassanto obhāsādīsu na kampati na vedhati. Tenāhu porāṇā –
tika-vin01t2:914: Dhammuddhaccakusalo hoti, na ca vikkhepa gacchatī”ti. ;
tika-vin01t2:915_0: So evaṃ vikkhepaṃ agacchanto taṃ samatiṃsavidhaṃ upakkilesajaṭaṃ vijaṭetvā “obhāsādayo
tika-vin01t2:915_1: dhammā na maggo, upakkilesavimuttaṃ pana vīthippaṭipannaṃ vipassanāñāṇaṃ maggo”ti
tika-vin01t2:915_2: amaggaṃ maggañca vavatthapeti. Yaṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ “obhāsādayo dasa vipassanupakkilese
tika-vin01t2:915_3: pahāya upakkilesavimuttaṃ paṭipadāñāṇaṃ maggoti vavatthapetvā”ti. Udayaṃ pahāyāti
tika-vin01t2:915_4: udayabbayānupassanāya gahitaṃ saṅkhārānaṃ udayaṃ vissajjetvā tesaṃ bhaṅgasseva anupassanato
tika-vin01t2:915_7: uppannena maggañāṇena sabbasaṅkhāresu virajjanto vimuccanto. Maggakkhaṇe hi ariyo
tika-vin01t2:915_8: virajjati vimuccatīti ca vuccati. Tenāha – “yathākkamaṃ cattāro ariyamagge pāpuṇitvā”ti.
tika-vin01t2:915_10: Arahato hi avasiṭṭhakilesābhāvena ekūnavīsati paccavekkhaṇañāṇāni. Assāti ānāpānassatikammaṭṭhānikassa.
tika-vin01t2:916_0: Visuṃ kammaṭṭhānabhāvanānayo nāma natthīti paṭhamacatukkavasena adhigatajjhānassa
tika-vin01t2:916_1: vedanācittadhammānupassanāvasena desitattā vuttaṃ. Tesanti tiṇṇaṃ catukkānaṃ. Pītippaṭisaṃvedīti
tika-vin01t2:916_2: pītiyā paṭi paṭi sammadeva vedanasīlo, tassā vā paṭi paṭi sammadeva vedo etassa atthi,
tika-vin01t2:916_3: taṃ vā paṭi paṭi sammadeva vedayamāno. Tattha kāmaṃ saṃvedanaggahaṇeneva pītiyā sakkaccaṃ
tika-vin01t2:916_4: viditabhāvo bodhito hoti, yehi pana pakārehi tassā saṃvedanaṃ icchitaṃ, taṃ dassetuṃ
tika-vin01t2:917_0: Tattha kathaṃ ārammaṇato pīti paṭisaṃviditā hotīti pucchāvacanaṃ. Sappītike dve jhāne
tika-vin01t2:917_1: samāpajjatī”ti pītisahagatāni dve paṭhamadutiyajjhānāni paṭipāṭiyā samāpajjati. Tassāti
tika-vin01t2:917_2: tena. “Paṭisaṃviditā”ti hi padaṃ apekkhitvā kattuatthe etaṃ sāmivacanaṃ. Samāpattikkhaṇeti
tika-vin01t2:917_3: samāpannakkhaṇe. Jhānapaṭilābhenāti jhānena samaṅgibhāvena. Ārammaṇatoti ārammaṇamukhena,
tika-vin01t2:917_4: tadārammaṇajjhānapariyāpannā pīti paṭisaṃviditā hoti ārammaṇassa paṭisaṃviditattā.
tika-vin01t2:917_5: Kiṃ vuttaṃ hoti? Yathā nāma sappapariyesanaṃ carantena tassa āsaye paṭisaṃvidite
tika-vin01t2:917_6: sopi paṭisaṃvidito eva hoti mantāgadabalena tassa gahaṇassa sukarattā, evaṃ pītiyā
tika-vin01t2:917_7: āsayabhūte ārammaṇe paṭisaṃvidite sā pīti paṭisaṃviditā eva hoti salakkhaṇato sāmaññalakkhaṇato
tika-vin01t2:918_0: Kathaṃ asammohato pīti paṭisaṃviditā hotīti ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ. Vipassanākkhaṇeti
tika-vin01t2:918_2: pītiyā salakkhaṇassa sāmaññalakkhaṇassa ca paṭivijjhanena. Yañhi yassa visesato sāmaññato
tika-vin01t2:918_3: ca lakkhaṇaṃ, tasmiṃ vidite so yāthāvato vidito eva hoti. Tenāha – “asammohato pīti
tika-vin01t2:919_0: Idāni tamatthaṃ pāḷiyā eva vibhāvetuṃ “vuttañheta”ntiādimāha. Tattha dīghaṃassāsavasenātiādīsu
tika-vin01t2:919_1: yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ heṭṭhā vuttameva. Tattha pana satokāritādassanavasena pāḷi āgatā,
tika-vin01t2:919_2: idha pītippaṭisaṃviditāvasena. Pītippaṭisaṃviditā ca atthato vibhattā eva. Apica
tika-vin01t2:919_3: ayamettha saṅkhepattho – dīghaṃassāsavasenāti dīghassa assāsassa ārammaṇabhūtassa
tika-vin01t2:919_4: vasena pajānato sā pīti paṭisaṃviditā hotīti sambandho. Cittassa ekaggataṃ avikkhepaṃ
tika-vin01t2:919_5: pajānatoti jhānapariyāpannaṃ avikkhepoti laddhanāmaṃ cittassekaggataṃ taṃsampayuttāya
tika-vin01t2:919_6: paññāya pajānato. Yatheva hi ārammaṇamukhena pīti paṭisaṃviditā hoti, evaṃ taṃsampayuttadhammāpi
tika-vin01t2:919_7: ārammaṇamukhena paṭisaṃviditā eva hontīti. Sati upaṭṭhitā hotīti dīghaṃassāsavasena
tika-vin01t2:919_8: jhānasampayuttā sati tassa ārammaṇe upaṭṭhitā ārammaṇamukhena jhānepi upaṭṭhitā nāma
tika-vin01t2:919_9: hoti. Tāya satiyāti evaṃ upaṭṭhitāya tāya satiyā yathāvuttena tena ñāṇena suppaṭividitattā
tika-vin01t2:919_10: ārammaṇassa tassa vasena tadārammaṇā sā pīti paṭisaṃviditā hoti. Dīghaṃpassāsavasenātiādīsupi
tika-vin01t2:920_0: Evaṃ paṭhamacatukkavasena dassitaṃ pītippaṭisaṃvedanaṃ ārammaṇato asammohato ca vibhāgaso
tika-vin01t2:920_1: dassetuṃ “āvajjato”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha āvajjatoti jhānaṃ āvajjentassa. Sā pītīti
tika-vin01t2:920_2: sā jhānapariyāpannā pīti. Jānatoti samāpannakkhaṇe ārammaṇamukhena jānato. Tassa
tika-vin01t2:920_3: sā pīti paṭisaṃviditā hotīti sambandho. Passatoti dassanabhūtena ñāṇena jhānato vuṭṭhāya
tika-vin01t2:920_4: passantassa. Paccavekkhatoti jhānaṃ paccavekkhantassa. Cittaṃ adhiṭṭhahatoti “ettakaṃ
tika-vin01t2:920_5: velaṃ jhānasamaṅgī bhavissāmī”ti jhānacittaṃ adhiṭṭhahantassa. Evaṃ pañcannaṃ vasībhāvānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:920_6: vasena jhānassa pajānanamukhena ārammaṇato pītiyā paṭisaṃvedanā dassitā.
tika-vin01t2:921_0: Idāni yehi dhammehi jhānaṃ vipassanā ca sijjhanti, tesaṃ jhānapariyāpannānaṃ vipassanāmaggapariyāpannānañca
tika-vin01t2:921_1: saddhādīnaṃ vasena pītippaṭisaṃvedanaṃ dassetuṃ “saddhāya adhimuccato”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:921_2: Tattha adhimuccatoti saddahantassa, samathavipassanāvasenāti adhippāyo. Vīriyaṃ paggaṇhatotiādīsupi
tika-vin01t2:921_3: eseva nayo. Abhiññeyyanti abhivisiṭṭhāya paññāya jānitabbaṃ. Abhijānatoti vipassanāpaññāpubbaṅgamāya
tika-vin01t2:921_4: maggapaññāya jānato. Pariññeyyanti dukkhasaccaṃ tīraṇapariññāya maggapaññāya ca parijānato.
tika-vin01t2:921_5: Pahātabbanti samudayasaccaṃ pahānapariññāya maggapaññāya ca pajahato. Bhāvayato sacchikaroto
tika-vin01t2:921_6: bhāvetabbaṃ maggasaccaṃ, sacchikātabbaṃ nirodhasaccaṃ. Keci panettha pītiyā eva vasena
tika-vin01t2:921_7: abhiññeyyādīni uddharanti, taṃ ayuttaṃ jhānādisamudāyaṃ uddharitvā tato pītiyā niddhāraṇassa adhippetattā.
tika-vin01t2:922_1: vuttaṃ, tathā “āvajjato”tiādīhi pañcahi padehi. “Abhiññeyyaṃ abhijānato”tiādīhi pana
tika-vin01t2:922_2: asammohato, “saddhāya adhimuccato”tiādīhi ubhayathāpi saṅkhepato samathavasena ārammaṇato
tika-vin01t2:922_3: vipassanāvasena asammohato pītippaṭisaṃvedanaṃ vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Kasmā panettha
tika-vin01t2:922_4: vedanānupassanāyaṃ pītisīsena vedanā gahitā, na sarūpato evāti? Bhūmivibhāgādivasena
tika-vin01t2:922_5: vedanaṃ bhinditvā catudhā vedanānupassanaṃ dassetuṃ. Apica vedanākammaṭṭhānaṃ dassento
tika-vin01t2:922_6: bhagavā pītiyā oḷārikattā taṃsampayuttasukhaṃ sukhaggahaṇatthaṃ pītisīsena dasseti.
tika-vin01t2:923_0: Eteneva nayena avasesapadānīti sukhappaṭisaṃvedī cittasaṅkhārappaṭisaṃvedīti padāni
tika-vin01t2:923_1: pītippaṭisaṃvedī-pade āgatanayeneva atthato veditabbāni. Sakkā hi “dvīhākārehi sukhappaṭisaṃviditā
tika-vin01t2:923_2: hoti, cittasaṅkhārappaṭisaṃviditā hoti ārammaṇato”tiādinā pītiṭṭhāne sukhādipadāni
tika-vin01t2:923_3: pakkhipitvā “sukhasahagatāni tīṇi jhānāni cattāri vā jhānāni samāpajjatī”tiādinā
tika-vin01t2:923_4: atthaṃ viññātuṃ. Tenāha “tiṇṇaṃ jhānānaṃ vasenā”tiādi. Vedanādayoti ādi-saddena saññā
tika-vin01t2:923_6: vipassanāya bhūmidassanatthaṃ “sukhanti dve sukhānī”tiādi vuttaṃ samathe kāyikasukhābhāvato.
tika-vin01t2:923_7: Soti so passambhanapariyāyena vutto nirodho. “Imassa hi bhikkhuno apariggahitakāle”tiādinā
tika-vin01t2:923_8: vitthārato kāyasaṅkhāre vutto, tasmā tattha vuttanayeneva veditabbo. Tattha kāyasaṅkhāravasena
tika-vin01t2:924_0: Evaṃ cittasaṅkhārassa passambhanaṃ atidesena dassetvā yadaññaṃ imasmiṃ catukke vattabbaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:924_1: taṃ dassetuṃ “apicā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha pītipadeti “pītippaṭisaṃvedī”tiādinā desitakoṭṭhāse.
tika-vin01t2:924_2: Pītisīsena vedanā vuttāti pītiapadesena taṃsampayuttā vedanā vuttā, na pītīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin01t2:924_3: Tattha kāraṇaṃ heṭṭhā vuttameva. Dvīsu cittasaṅkhārapadesūti “cittasaṅkhārappaṭisaṃvedī
tika-vin01t2:924_5: nāmarūpa”nti vacanato cittena paṭibaddhāti cittapaṭibaddhā. Tato eva kāmaṃ cittena
tika-vin01t2:924_6: saṅkharīyantīti cittasaṅkhārā, saññāvedanādayo, idha pana upalakkhaṇamattaṃ, saññāvedanāva
tika-vin01t2:925_0: Cittappaṭisaṃvedīti ettha dvīhākārehi cittapaṭisaṃviditā hoti ārammaṇato asammohato
tika-vin01t2:925_1: ca. Kathaṃ ārammaṇato? Cattāri jhānāni samāpajjati, tassa samāpattikkhaṇe jhānapaṭilābhenātiādinā
tika-vin01t2:925_2: vuttanayānusārena sabbaṃ suviññeyyanti āha – “catunnaṃ jhānānaṃ vasena cittapaṭisaṃviditā
tika-vin01t2:925_3: veditabbā”ti. Cittaṃ modentoti jhānasampayuttaṃ cittaṃ sampayuttāya pītiyā modayamāno,
tika-vin01t2:925_4: taṃ vā pītiṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā pavattaṃ vipassanācittaṃ tāya eva ārammaṇabhūtāya pītiyāmodayamāno.
tika-vin01t2:926_0: Sampayuttāya pītiyā cittaṃ āmodetīti jhānacittasampayuttāya pītisambojjhaṅgabhūtāya
tika-vin01t2:926_1: odagyalakkhaṇāya jhānapītiyā tameva jhānacittaṃ sahajātādipaccayavasena ceva jhānapaccayavasena
tika-vin01t2:926_2: ca paribrūhento haṭṭhappahaṭṭhākāraṃ pāpento āmodeti pamodeti ca. Ārammaṇaṃ katvāti
tika-vin01t2:926_3: uḷāraṃ jhānasampayuttaṃ pītiṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā pavattamānaṃ vipassanācittaṃ tāya eva
tika-vin01t2:926_4: ārammaṇabhūtāya pītiyā yogāvacaro haṭṭhappahaṭṭhākāraṃ pāpento “āmodeti pamodetī”ti vuccati.
tika-vin01t2:927_0: Samaṃ ṭhapentoti yathā īsakampi līnapakkhaṃ uddhaccapakkhañca anupaggamma anonataṃ
tika-vin01t2:927_1: anunnataṃ yathā indriyānaṃ samattapaṭipattiyā avisamaṃ, samādhissa vā ukkaṃsagamanena
tika-vin01t2:927_2: āneñjappattiyā sammadeva ṭhitaṃ hoti, evaṃ appanāvasena ṭhapento. Lakkhaṇappaṭivedhenāti
tika-vin01t2:927_3: aniccādikassa lakkhaṇassa paṭi paṭi vijjhanena khaṇe khaṇe avabodhena. Khaṇikacittekaggatāti
tika-vin01t2:927_4: khaṇamattaṭṭhitiko samādhi. Sopi hi ārammaṇe nirantaraṃ ekākārena pavattamāno paṭipakkhena
tika-vin01t2:927_5: anabhibhūto appito viya cittaṃ niccalaṃ ṭhapeti. Tena vuttaṃ “evaṃ uppannāyā”tiādi.
tika-vin01t2:928_0: Mocentoti vikkhambhanavimuttivasena vivecento visuṃ karonto, nīvaraṇāni pajahantoti
tika-vin01t2:928_1: attho. Vipassanākkhaṇeti bhaṅgānupassanākkhaṇe. Bhaṅgo hi nāma aniccatāya paramā
tika-vin01t2:928_2: koṭi, tasmā tāya bhaṅgānupassako yogāvacaro cittamukhena sabbaṃ saṅkhāragataṃ aniccato
tika-vin01t2:928_3: passati, no niccato, aniccassa dukkhattā dukkhassa ca anattattā tadeva dukkhato anupassati,
tika-vin01t2:928_4: no sukhato, anattato anupassati, no attato. Yasmā pana yaṃ aniccaṃ dukkhaṃ anattā,
tika-vin01t2:928_5: na taṃ abhinanditabbaṃ, yañca na abhinanditabbaṃ, na taṃ rañjitabbaṃ, tasmā bhaṅgadassanānusārena
tika-vin01t2:928_6: “aniccaṃ dukkhaṃ anattā”ti saṅkhāragate diṭṭhe tasmiṃ nibbindati, no nandati, virajjati,
tika-vin01t2:928_7: no rajjati, so evaṃ nibbindanto virajjanto lokiyeneva tāva ñāṇena rāgaṃ nirodheti
tika-vin01t2:928_8: no samudeti, nāssa samudayaṃ karotīti attho. Atha vā so evaṃ viratto yathā diṭṭhaṃ
tika-vin01t2:928_9: saṅkhāragataṃ, taṃ tathā diṭṭhaṃ attano ñāṇena nirodheti no samudeti, nirodhamevassa
tika-vin01t2:928_10: manasi karoti, no samudayanti attho, so evaṃ paṭipanno paṭinissajjati, no ādiyatīti
tika-vin01t2:928_11: vuttaṃ hoti. Ayañhi aniccādianupassanā saddhiṃ khandhābhisaṅkhārehi kilesānaṃ pariccajanato
tika-vin01t2:928_12: saṅkhatadosadassanena tabbiparīte nibbāne tanninnatāya pakkhandanato ca pariccāgapaṭinissaggo
tika-vin01t2:928_13: ceva pakkhandanapaṭinissaggo cāti vuccati. Tasmā tāya samannāgato yogāvacaro vuttanayena
tika-vin01t2:928_14: kilese ca pariccajati, nibbāne ca pakkhandati. Tena vuttaṃ “so vipassanākkhaṇe aniccānupassanāya
tika-vin01t2:928_15: niccasaññāto cittaṃ mocento vimocento…pe… paṭinissaggānupassanāya ādānato cittaṃ
tika-vin01t2:928_16: mocento vimocento assasati ceva passasati cā”ti.
tika-vin01t2:929_0: Tattha aniccassa, aniccanti vā anupassanā aniccānupassanā. Tebhūmakadhammānaṃ aniccataṃ
tika-vin01t2:929_1: gahetvā pavattāya vipassanāya etaṃ nāmaṃ. Niccasaññātoti saṅkhatadhamme “niccā sassatā”ti
tika-vin01t2:929_2: pavattāya micchāsaññāya. Saññāsīsena cittadiṭṭhīnampi gahaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Esa nayo
tika-vin01t2:929_3: sukhasaññādīsupi. Nibbidānupassanāyāti saṅkhāresu nibbindanākārena pavattāya anupassanāya.
tika-vin01t2:929_4: Nanditoti sappītikataṇhāto. Virāgānupassanāyāti tathā virajjanākārena pavattāya anupassanāya.
tika-vin01t2:929_5: Tena vuttaṃ “rāgato mocento”ti. Nirodhānupassanāyāti saṅkhārānaṃ nirodhassa anupassanāya.
tika-vin01t2:929_6: Yathā saṅkhārā nirujjhantiyeva āyatiṃ punabbhavavasena nuppajjanti, evaṃ vā anupassanā
tika-vin01t2:929_7: nirodhānupassanā. Muñcitukamyatā hi ayaṃ balappattā. Tenāha “samudayato mocento”ti.
tika-vin01t2:929_8: Paṭinissajjanākārena pavattā anupassanā paṭinissaggānupassanā. Ādānatoti niccādivasena
tika-vin01t2:929_9: gahaṇato, paṭisandhiggahaṇato vāti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin01t2:930_0: Aniccanti anupassī, aniccassa vā anupassanasīlo aniccānupassīti ettha kiṃ pana taṃ
tika-vin01t2:930_1: aniccaṃ, kathaṃ vā aniccaṃ, kā vā aniccānupassanā, kassa vā aniccānupassanāti catukkaṃ
tika-vin01t2:930_2: vibhāvetabbanti taṃ dassento “aniccaṃ veditabba”ntiādimāha. Tattha niccaṃ nāma dhuvaṃ
tika-vin01t2:930_3: sassataṃ yathā taṃ nibbānaṃ, na niccanti aniccaṃ, udayabbayavantaṃ, atthato saṅkhatā
tika-vin01t2:930_4: dhammāti āha aniccanti pañcakkhandhā. Kasmā? Uppādavayaññathattabhāvāti, uppādavayaññathattasabbhāvāti
tika-vin01t2:930_5: attho. Tattha saṅkhatadhammānaṃ hetupaccayehi uppajjanaṃ ahutvā sambhavo attalābho
tika-vin01t2:930_6: uppādo, uppannānaṃ tesaṃ khaṇanirodho vināso vayo, jarāya aññathābhāvo aññathattaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:930_7: Yathā hi uppādāvatthāya bhinnāya bhaṅgāvatthāyaṃ vatthubhedo natthi, evaṃ ṭhitisaṅkhātāyaṃ
tika-vin01t2:930_8: bhaṅgābhimukhāvatthāyampi vatthubhedo natthi. Yattha jarāvohāro, tasmā ekassapi dhammassa
tika-vin01t2:930_9: jarā yujjati, yā khaṇikajarāti vuccati. Ekaṃsena ca uppādabhaṅgāvatthāsu vatthuno
tika-vin01t2:930_10: abhedo icchitabbo, aññathā “añño uppajjati, añño bhijjatī”ti āpajjeyya. Tayidaṃ khaṇikajaraṃ
tika-vin01t2:931_0: Yassa lakkhaṇattayassa bhāvā khandhesu aniccasamaññā, tasmiṃ lakkhaṇattaye aniccatā
tika-vin01t2:931_1: samaññāti “aniccatāti tesaṃyeva uppādavayaññathatta”nti vatvā visesato dhammānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:931_2: khaṇikanirodhe aniccatāvohāroti dassento “hutvā abhāvo vā”tiādimāha. Tattha uppādapubbakattā
tika-vin01t2:931_3: abhāvassa hutvā-gahaṇaṃ. Tena pākaṭabhāvapubbakattaṃ vināsabhāvassa dasseti. Tenevākārenāti
tika-vin01t2:931_4: nibbattanākārena. Khaṇabhaṅgenāti khaṇikanirodhena. Tassā aniccatāyāti khaṇikabhaṅgasaṅkhātāya
tika-vin01t2:931_5: aniccatāya. Tāya anupassanāyāti yathāvuttāya aniccānupassanāya. Samannāgatoti samaṅgibhūto yogāvacaro.
tika-vin01t2:932_0: Khayoti saṅkhārānaṃ vināso. Virajjanaṃ tesaṃyeva vilujjanaṃ virāgo, khayo eva virāgo
tika-vin01t2:932_1: khayavirāgo, khaṇikanirodho. Accantamettha etasmiṃ adhigate saṅkhārā virajjanti nirujjhantīti
tika-vin01t2:932_2: accantavirāgo, nibbānaṃ. Tenāha “khayavirāgoti saṅkhārānaṃ khaṇabhaṅgo. Accantavirāgoti
tika-vin01t2:932_4: accantavirāgānupassanāvasena maggassa pavatti yojetabbā. Ārammaṇato vā vipassanāya
tika-vin01t2:932_6: maggassa pana asammohato khayavirāgānupassanāvasena, ārammaṇato accantavirāgānupassanāvasena
tika-vin01t2:932_7: pavatti veditabbā. Eseva nayoti iminā yasmā virāgānupassīpade vuttanayānusārena “dve
tika-vin01t2:932_8: nirodhā khayanirodho ca accantanirodho cā”ti evamādiatthavaṇṇanaṃ atidissati, tasmā
tika-vin01t2:932_9: virāgaṭṭhāne nirodhapadaṃ pakkhipitvā “khayo saṅkhārānaṃ vināso”tiādinā idha vuttanayena
tika-vin01t2:933_0: Paṭinissajjanaṃ pahātabbassa tadaṅgavasena vā samucchedavasena vā pariccajanaṃ pariccāgapaṭinissaggo.
tika-vin01t2:933_1: Tathā sabbupadhīnaṃ paṭinissaggabhūte visaṅkhāre attano nissajjanaṃ tanninnatāya
tika-vin01t2:933_2: vā tadārammaṇatāya vā tattha pakkhandanaṃ pakkhandanapaṭinissaggo. Tadaṅgavasenāti
tika-vin01t2:933_3: ettha aniccānupassanā tāva tadaṅgappahānavasena niccasaññaṃ pariccajati, pariccajantī
tika-vin01t2:933_4: ca tassā tathā appavattiyaṃ ye “nicca”nti gahaṇavasena kilesā tammūlakā ca abhisaṅkhārā
tika-vin01t2:933_5: tadubhayamūlakā ca vipākakkhandhā anāgate uppajjeyyuṃ, te sabbepi appavattikaraṇavasena
tika-vin01t2:933_6: pariccajati, tathā dukkhasaññādayo. Tenāha – “vipassanā hi tadaṅgavasena saddhiṃ
tika-vin01t2:933_7: khandhābhisaṅkhārehi kilese pariccajatī”ti. Saṅkhatadosadassanenāti saṅkhate tebhūmakasaṅkhāragate
tika-vin01t2:933_9: Pakkhandatīti anupavisati anupavisantaṃ viya hoti. Saddhiṃ khandhābhisaṅkhārehi kilese
tika-vin01t2:933_10: pariccajatīti maggena kilesesu pariccattesu avipākadhammatāpādanena abhisaṅkhārā
tika-vin01t2:933_11: tammūlakā ca khandhā anuppattirahabhāvena pariccattā nāma hontīti sabbepi te maggo
tika-vin01t2:933_12: pariccajatīti vuttaṃ. Ubhayanti vipassanāñāṇaṃ maggañāṇañca. Maggañāṇampi hi gotrabhuñāṇassa
tika-vin01t2:934_0: Idañca catutthacatukkaṃ suddhavipassanāvaseneva vuttaṃ, purimāni pana tīṇi samathavipassanāvasena.
tika-vin01t2:934_1: Evaṃ catunnaṃ catukkānaṃ vasena soḷasavatthukāya ānāpānassatiyā bhāvanā veditabbā.
tika-vin01t2:934_2: Evaṃ soḷasavatthuvasena ca ayaṃ ānāpānassati bhāvitā mahapphalā hoti mahānisaṃsāti
tika-vin01t2:934_3: veditabbā. “Evaṃ bhāvito kho, bhikkhave, ānāpānassatisamādhī”tiādinā pana santabhāvādivasena
tika-vin01t2:934_4: mahānisaṃsatā dassitā. Vitakkupacchedasamatthatāyapi cassa mahānisaṃsatā daṭṭhabbā.
tika-vin01t2:934_6: ito cito ca cittassa vidhāvanaṃ upacchinditvā ānāpānārammaṇābhimukhameva cittaṃ karoti.
tika-vin01t2:934_8: mūlabhāvenapi cassā mahānisaṃsatā veditabbā. Vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā –
tika-vin01t2:935_0: “Ānāpānassati, bhikkhave, bhāvitā bahulīkatā cattāro satipaṭṭhāne paripūreti, cattāro
tika-vin01t2:935_1: satipaṭṭhānā bhāvitā bahulīkatā satta bojjhaṅge paripūrenti, satta bojjhaṅgā bhāvitā
tika-vin01t2:936: Apica carimakānaṃ assāsapassāsānaṃ viditabhāvakaraṇatopissā mahānisaṃsatā veditabbā. Vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā –
tika-vin01t2:937: “Evaṃ bhāvitāya, rāhula, ānāpānassatiyā evaṃ bahulīkatāya yepi te carimakā assāsapassāsā, tepi viditāva nirujjhanti, no aviditā”ti.
tika-vin01t2:938_0: Tattha nirodhavasena tayo carimakā bhavacarimakā jhānacarimakā cuticarimakāti. Bhavesu
tika-vin01t2:938_1: hi kāmabhave assāsapassāsā pavattanti, rūpārūpabhavesu na pavattanti, tasmā te bhavacarimakā.
tika-vin01t2:938_2: Jhānesu purime jhānattaye pavattanti, catutthe nappavattanti, tasmā te jhānacarimakā.
tika-vin01t2:938_3: Ye pana cuticittassa purato soḷasamena cittena saddhiṃ uppajjitvā cuticittena saha
tika-vin01t2:938_4: nirujjhanti, ime cuticarimakā nāma. Ime idha carimakāti adhippetā.
tika-vin01t2:939_0: Ime kira imaṃ kammaṭṭhānamanuyuttassa bhikkhuno pākaṭā honti ānāpānārammaṇassa suṭṭhu
tika-vin01t2:939_1: pariggahitattā. Cuticittassa hi purato soḷasamacittassa uppādakkhaṇe uppādaṃ āvajjayato
tika-vin01t2:939_2: uppādopi nesaṃ pākaṭo hoti, ṭhitiṃ āvajjayato ṭhitipi nesaṃ pākaṭā hoti, bhaṅgaṃ
tika-vin01t2:939_3: āvajjayato bhaṅgopi nesaṃ pākaṭo hoti. Ito aññaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ bhāvetvā arahattappattassa
tika-vin01t2:939_4: bhikkhuno hi āyuantaraṃ paricchinnaṃ vā hoti aparicchinnaṃ vā, imaṃ pana soḷasavatthukaṃ
tika-vin01t2:939_5: ānāpānassatiṃ bhāvetvā arahattappattassa āyuantaraṃ paricchinnameva hoti. So “ettakaṃ
tika-vin01t2:939_6: dāni me āyusaṅkhārā pavattissanti, na ito para”nti ñatvā attano dhammatāya eva sarīrapaṭijaggananivāsanapārupanādīni
tika-vin01t2:939_7: sabbakiccāni katvā akkhīni nimīleti koṭapabbatavihāravāsitissatthero viya, mahākarañjiyavihāravāsimahātissatthero
tika-vin01t2:939_8: viya, devaputtaraṭṭhe piṇḍapātikatthero viya, cittalapabbatavihāravāsino dvebhātikattherā viya ca.
tika-vin01t2:940_0: Tatridaṃ ekavatthuparidīpanaṃ – dvebhātikattherānaṃ kireko puṇṇamuposathadivase pātimokkhaṃ
tika-vin01t2:940_1: osāretvā bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto attano vasanaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā caṅkame ṭhito juṇhapakkhe
tika-vin01t2:940_2: padosavelāyaṃ candālokena samantato āsiñcamānakhīradhāraṃ viya gaganatalaṃ rajatapaṭṭasadisaṃ
tika-vin01t2:940_3: vālikāsanthatañca bhūmibhāgaṃ disvā “ramaṇīyo vatāyaṃ kālo, deso ca mama ajjhāsayasadiso,
tika-vin01t2:940_4: kīva ciraṃ nu kho ayaṃ dukkhabhāro vahitabbo”ti attano āyusaṅkhāre upadhāretvā bhikkhusaṅghaṃ
tika-vin01t2:940_5: āha – “tumhehi kathaṃ parinibbāyantā bhikkhū diṭṭhapubbā”ti. Tatra keci āhaṃsu –
tika-vin01t2:940_6: “amhehi āsane nisinnakāva parinibbāyantā diṭṭhapubbā”ti. Keci “amhehi ākāse pallaṅkaṃ
tika-vin01t2:940_7: ābhujitvā nisinnakā”ti. Thero āha – “ahaṃ dāni vo caṅkamantameva parinibbāyamānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:940_8: dassayissāmī”ti. Tato caṅkame tiriyaṃ lekhaṃ katvā “ahaṃ ito caṅkamakoṭito parakoṭiṃ
tika-vin01t2:940_9: gantvā nivattamāno imaṃ lekhaṃ patvā parinibbāyissāmī”ti vatvā caṅkamaṃ oruyha parabhāgaṃ
tika-vin01t2:940_10: gantvā nivattamāno ekena pādena lekhaṃ akkantakkhaṇeyeva parinibbāyīti.
tika-vin01t2:943_0: 167. Yadipi ariyā neva attanāva attānaṃ jīvitā voropesuṃ, nāññamaññampi jīvitā voropesuṃ,
tika-vin01t2:943_1: nāpi migalaṇḍikaṃ samaṇakuttakaṃ upasaṅkamitvā samādapesuṃ, tathāpi yathāvuttehi
tika-vin01t2:943_2: tīhi pakārehi matānaṃ antare ariyānampi sabbhāvato “ariyapuggalamissakattā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:943_3: Na hi ariyā pāṇātipātaṃ kariṃsu na samādapesuṃ, nāpi samanuññā ahesuṃ. Atha vā puthujjanakāle
tika-vin01t2:943_4: attanāva attānaṃ ghātetvā maraṇasamaye vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā ariyamaggaṃ paṭilabhitvā
tika-vin01t2:943_5: matānampi ariyānaṃ sabbhāvato imināva nayena attanāva attānaṃ jīvitā voropanassa
tika-vin01t2:943_6: ariyānampi sabbhāvato ariyapuggalamissakattā “moghapurisā”ti na vuttaṃ. “Te bhikkhū”ti
tika-vin01t2:943_7: vuttanti “kathañhi nāma te, bhikkhave, bhikkhū attanāpi attānaṃ jīvitā voropessantī”ti
tika-vin01t2:945_0: 168. Itthīsu paṭibaddhacittatā nāma chandarāgena sārattatā sāpekkhabhāvoti āha “sārattā
tika-vin01t2:945_1: apekkhavanto”ti. Maraṇassa guṇakittanaṃ jīvite ādīnavadassanapubbaṅgamanti āha “jīvite
tika-vin01t2:945_2: ādīnavaṃ dassetvā”ti. “Kiṃ tuyhiminā pāpakena dujjīvitenā”ti idaṃ jīvite ādīnavadassanaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:945_3: “Mataṃ te jīvitā seyyo”tiādi pana maraṇaguṇakittananti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Lobhādīnaṃ ativiya
tika-vin01t2:945_4: ussannattā anupaparikkhitvā kataṃ sāhasikakammaṃ kibbisanti vuccatīti āha – “kibbisaṃ
tika-vin01t2:945_5: sāhasikakammaṃ lobhādikilesussada”nti. Kasmā idaṃ vuccatīti chabbaggiyānaṃyevedaṃ
tika-vin01t2:945_6: vacanaṃ. Mata-saddo “gata”ntiādīsu viya bhāvavacanoti āha “tava maraṇa”nti. Katakāloti
tika-vin01t2:945_7: katamaraṇakālo. Atha vā kāloti maraṇassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ, tasmā katakāloti katamaraṇoti
tika-vin01t2:945_8: attho. Tenevāha “kālaṃ katvā, maritvā”ti. Divi bhavā dibbāti āha “devaloke uppannehī”ti.
tika-vin01t2:945_9: Samappitoti yutto. Samaṅgībhūtoti sammadeva ekībhāvaṃ gato.
tika-vin01t2:947_1: pubbakālakiriyāvacanassa niruttivohāro. Sañciccāti imassa padassa “jānitvā sañjānitvā
tika-vin01t2:947_2: cecca abhivitaritvā”ti evaṃ pubbakālakiriyāvasena byañjanānurūpaṃ katvā padabhājane
tika-vin01t2:947_3: vattabbe tathā avatvā “jānanto sañjānanto”ti puggalādhiṭṭhānaṃ katvā “cecca abhivitaritvā
tika-vin01t2:947_4: vītikkamo”ti jīvitā voropanassa ca tadatthavasena niddiṭṭhattā vuttaṃ “byañjane ādaraṃ
tika-vin01t2:947_5: akatvā”ti. “Jānanto”ti avisesena vuttepi “sañcicca manussaviggahaṃ jīvitā voropeyyā”ti
tika-vin01t2:947_6: vuttattā pāṇavisayamettha jānananti āha “pāṇoti jānanto”ti, satto ayanti jānantoti
tika-vin01t2:947_7: attho. Pāṇoti hi vohārato satto, paramatthato jīvitindriyaṃ vuccati. “Manussaviggahoti
tika-vin01t2:947_8: jānanto”ti avatvā “pāṇoti jānanto”ti vacanaṃ “manusso aya”nti ajānitvā kevalaṃ sattasaññāya
tika-vin01t2:947_9: ghātentassapi pārājikabhāvadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Teneva eḷakacatukke eḷakasaññāya
tika-vin01t2:947_10: manussapāṇaṃ vadhantassa pārājikāpatti dassitā. Tasmā “manussaviggaho”ti avatvā “pāṇoti
tika-vin01t2:948_0: Sañjānantoti ettha saha-saddena samānattho saṃ-saddoti āha – “teneva pāṇajānanākārena
tika-vin01t2:948_1: saddhiṃ jānanto”ti, teneva pāṇajānanākārena saddhiṃ jīvitā voropemīti jānantoti attho.
tika-vin01t2:948_2: Yadipi ekasseva cittassa ubhayārammaṇabhāvāsambhavato pāṇoti jānanena saddhiṃ jīvitā
tika-vin01t2:948_3: voropemīti jānanaṃ ekakkhaṇe na sambhavati, pāṇotisaññaṃ pana avijahitvā māremīti
tika-vin01t2:948_4: jānanaṃ sandhāya “teneva…pe… saddhiṃ jānanto”ti vuttaṃ. Tasmā saddhinti avijahitvāti
tika-vin01t2:948_5: vuttaṃ hoti. Keci pana “ñātapariññāya diṭṭhasabhāvesu dhammesu tīraṇapariññāya tilakkhaṇaṃ
tika-vin01t2:948_6: āropetvā ‘rūpaṃ anicca’ntiādinā sabhāvena saddhiṃ ekakkhaṇe aniccādilakkhaṇajānanaṃ
tika-vin01t2:948_7: viya ‘imaṃ pāṇaṃ māremī’ti attano kiriyāya saddhiṃyeva jānātī”ti vadanti. Apare pana
tika-vin01t2:949_0: Vadhakacetanāvasena cetetvāti “imaṃ māremī”ti vadhakacetanāya cintetvā. Pakappetvāti
tika-vin01t2:949_1: “vadhāmi na”nti evaṃ cittena paricchinditvā. Abhivitaritvāti sanniṭṭhānaṃ katvā.
tika-vin01t2:949_3: Evaṃ pavattassāti evaṃ yathāvuttavidhinā pavattassa. Kiñcāpi “sañciccā”ti imassa
tika-vin01t2:949_5: pariniṭṭhitavītikkamo vutto, tathāpi “sañciccā”ti iminā vuccamānaṃ apariyositavītikkamampi
tika-vin01t2:949_6: avasānaṃ pāpetvā dassetuṃ “vītikkamo”ti padabhājanaṃ vuttaṃ. Tenevāha “ayaṃ sañciccasaddassa
tika-vin01t2:950_0: Ādito paṭṭhāyāti paṭisandhiviññāṇena saddhiṃ uppannakalalarūpato paṭṭhāya. Sayanti
tika-vin01t2:950_1: etthāti seyyā, mātukucchisaṅkhāto gabbho seyyā etesanti gabbhaseyyakā, aṇḍajā jalābujā
tika-vin01t2:950_2: ca. Tesaṃ gabbhaseyyakānaṃ vasena sabbasukhumattabhāvadassanatthaṃ “yaṃ mātukucchismi”ntiādi
tika-vin01t2:950_3: vuttaṃ, na pārājikavatthuniyamanatthaṃ. Opapātikasaṃsedajāpi hi manussā pārājikavatthumeva.
tika-vin01t2:950_4: Na cevimaṃ sabbapaṭhamaṃ manussaviggahaṃ jīvitā voropetuṃ sakkā. Paṭisandhicittena
tika-vin01t2:950_5: hi saddhiṃ tiṃsa kammajarūpāni nibbattanti, tesu pana ṭhitesuyeva soḷasa bhavaṅgacittāni
tika-vin01t2:950_6: uppajjitvā nirujjhanti. Etasmiṃ antare gahitapaṭisandhikassa dārakassa vā mātuyā
tika-vin01t2:950_7: vā panassa antarāyo natthi. Ayañhi maraṇassa anokāso nāma. Ekasmiñhi soḷasacittakkhaṇe
tika-vin01t2:950_8: kāle dārakassa maraṇaṃ natthi tadā cuticittassa asambhavato, mātuyāpi tattakaṃ kālaṃ
tika-vin01t2:950_9: anatikkamitvā tadanantareyeva cavanadhammāya gabbhaggahaṇasseva asambhavato. Cittaggahaṇeneva
tika-vin01t2:950_10: avinābhāvato sesaarūpadhammānampi gahitattā rūpakāyupatthambhitasseva ca nāmakāyassa
tika-vin01t2:950_11: pañcavokāre pavattisabbhāvato vuttaṃ “sakalāpi pañcavokārapaṭisandhi dassitā hotī”ti.
tika-vin01t2:950_12: Tattha sakalāpi pañcavokārapaṭisandhīti paripuṇṇā anūnā rūpādipañcakkhandhānaṃ paṭisandhīti
tika-vin01t2:950_13: evamattho gahetabbo, na pana sakalāpi pañcavokārabhave paṭisandhīti. Tenevāha “tasmā
tika-vin01t2:950_14: tañca paṭhamaṃ cittaṃ…pe… kalalarūpanti ayaṃ sabbapaṭhamo manussaviggaho”ti. “Tadahujātassa
tika-vin01t2:950_15: eḷakassa lomaṃ jātiuṇṇā”ti keci. “Himavantappadese jātimantaeḷakalomaṃ jātiuṇṇā”ti
tika-vin01t2:950_16: apare. Sukhumajātilomā eva kira keci eḷakā himavante vijjanti. “Gabbhaṃ phāletvā
tika-vin01t2:951_0: Ekena aṃsunāti khuddakabhāṇakānaṃ matena vuttaṃ. Tathā hi “gabbhaseyyakasattānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:951_1: paṭisandhikkhaṇe pañcakkhandhā apacchā apure ekato pātubhavanti. Tasmiṃ khaṇe pātubhūtā
tika-vin01t2:951_2: kalalasaṅkhātā rūpasantati parittā hoti khuddakamakkhikāya ekavāyāmena pātabbamattā”ti
tika-vin01t2:951_3: vatvā puna “atibahuṃ etaṃ, saṇhasūciyā tele pakkhipitvā ukkhittāya paggharitvā agge
tika-vin01t2:951_4: ṭhitabindumatta”nti vuttaṃ. Tampi paṭikkhipitvā “ekakese telato uddharitvā gahite
tika-vin01t2:951_5: tassa paggharitvā agge ṭhitabindumatta”nti vuttaṃ. Tampi paṭikkhipitvā “imasmiṃ janapade
tika-vin01t2:951_6: manussānaṃ kese aṭṭhadhā phālite tato ekakoṭṭhāsappamāṇo uttarakurukānaṃ keso, tassa
tika-vin01t2:951_7: pasannatilatelato uddhaṭassa agge ṭhitabindumatta”nti vuttaṃ. Tampi paṭikkhipitvā
tika-vin01t2:951_8: “jātiuṇṇā nāma sukhumā, tassā ekaaṃsuno pasannatilatele pakkhipitvā uddhaṭassa paggharitvā
tika-vin01t2:951_9: agge ṭhitabindumatta”nti khuddakabhāṇakehi vuttaṃ. Saṃyuttabhāṇakā pana “tīhi jātiuṇṇaṃsūhi
tika-vin01t2:951_10: katasuttagge saṇṭhitatelabinduppamāṇaṃ kalalaṃ hotī”ti vadanti. “Accha”nti vuttamatthaṃ
tika-vin01t2:952_0: Sappimaṇḍoti pasannasappi. Yathāti idaṃ ānetvā etthāpi sambandhitabbaṃ, sappimaṇḍopi
tika-vin01t2:952_2: Atha vā evaṃvaṇṇappaṭibhāganti evaṃvaṇṇaṃ evaṃsaṇṭhānañca. Paṭibhajanaṃ vā paṭibhāgo,
tika-vin01t2:952_3: sadisatābhajanaṃ sadisatāpattīti attho. Evaṃvidho vaṇṇappaṭibhāgo rūpato saṇṭhānato
tika-vin01t2:952_4: ca sadisatāpatti etassāti evaṃvaṇṇappaṭibhāgaṃ. Kalalanti pavuccatīti bhūtupādārūpasaṅkhāto
tika-vin01t2:952_5: santānavasena pavattamāno attabhāvo kalalaṃ nāmāti kathīyati. Vīsavassasatāyukassāti
tika-vin01t2:953_0: Kalalakālepīti paṭhamasattāhabbhantare yaṃ santativasena pavattamānaṃ kalalasaṅkhātaṃ
tika-vin01t2:953_1: attabhāvaṃ jīvitā voropetuṃ sakkā, taṃ sandhāya vadati. Tato vā uddhanti dutiyasattāhādīsu
tika-vin01t2:953_2: abbudādibhāvappattaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Nanu ca uppannānaṃ dhammānaṃ sarasanirodheneva
tika-vin01t2:953_3: nirujjhanato antarā upacchedo na sakkā kātuṃ, “tasmā…pe… jīvitindriyaṃ upacchindati
tika-vin01t2:953_4: uparodhetī”ti kasmā vuttanti āha – “jīvitindriyassa paveṇīghaṭanaṃ…pe… uparodhetīti
tika-vin01t2:954_0: Etthāha – khaṇe khaṇe nirujjhanasabhāvesu saṅkhāresu ko hanti, ko vā haññati, yadi
tika-vin01t2:954_1: cittacetasikasantāno, so arūpatāya na chedanabhedanādivasena vikopanasamattho, napi
tika-vin01t2:954_2: vikopanīyo. Atha rūpasantāno, so acetanatāya kaṭṭhakaliṅgarūpamoti na tattha chedanādinā
tika-vin01t2:954_3: pāṇātipāto labbhati yathā matasarīre. Payogopi pāṇātipātassa yathāvutto paharaṇappahārādiko
tika-vin01t2:954_4: atītesu vā saṅkhāresu bhaveyya anāgatesu vā paccuppannesu vā, tattha na tāva atītānāgatesu
tika-vin01t2:954_5: sambhavati tesaṃ abhāvato, paccuppannesu ca saṅkhārānaṃ khaṇikattā saraseneva nirujjhanasabhāvatāya
tika-vin01t2:954_6: vināsābhimukhesu nippayojano payogo siyā, vināsassa ca kāraṇarahitattā na paharaṇappahārādippayogahetukaṃ
tika-vin01t2:954_7: maraṇaṃ, nirīhakatāya ca saṅkhārānaṃ kassa so payogo, khaṇikattā vadhādhippāyasamakālabhijjanakassa
tika-vin01t2:955_0: Vuccate – vadhakacetanāsahito saṅkhārānaṃ puñjo sattasaṅkhāto hanti. Tena pavattitavadhappayoganimittaṃ
tika-vin01t2:955_2: uppajjanāraho rūpārūpadhammasamūho haññati, kevalo vā cittacetasikasantāno vadhappayogāvisayabhāvepi
tika-vin01t2:955_5: asambhavo, napi ahetuko pāṇātipāto, na ca payogo nippayojano paccuppannesu saṅkhāresu
tika-vin01t2:955_6: katappayogavasena tadanantaraṃ uppajjanārahassa saṅkhārakalāpassa tathā anuppattito.
tika-vin01t2:955_7: Khaṇikānaṃ saṅkhārānaṃ khaṇikamaraṇassa idha maraṇabhāvena anadhippetattā santatimaraṇassa
tika-vin01t2:955_8: ca yathāvuttanayena sahetukabhāvato na ahetukaṃ maraṇaṃ, na ca katturahito pāṇātipātappayogo
tika-vin01t2:955_9: nirīhakesupi saṅkhāresu sannihitatāmattena upakārakesu attano attano anurūpaphaluppādane
tika-vin01t2:955_10: niyatesu kāraṇesu kattuvohārasiddhito yathā “padīpo pakāseti, nisākaro candimā”ti.
tika-vin01t2:955_11: Na ca kevalassa vadhādhippāyasahabhuno cittacetasikakalāpassa pāṇātipāto icchito
tika-vin01t2:955_12: santānavasena avaṭṭhitasseva paṭijānanato, santānavasena pavattamānānañca padīpādīnaṃ
tika-vin01t2:955_13: atthakiriyāsiddhi dissatīti attheva pāṇātipātena kammunā baddho. Ayañca vicāro adinnādānādīsupi
tika-vin01t2:956_0: Voropetuṃ na sakkāti upakkamena voropetuṃ na sakkā. Sattaṭṭhajavanavāramattanti khuddakabhāṇakānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:956_1: matena vuttaṃ. Saṃyuttabhāṇakā pana “rūpasantati arūpasantatī”ti dve santatiyo vatvā
tika-vin01t2:956_2: “udakaṃ akkamitvā gatassa yāva tīre akkantaudakalekhā na vippasīdati, addhānato āgatassa
tika-vin01t2:956_3: yāva kāye usumabhāvo na vūpasammati, ātapā āgantvā gabbhaṃ paviṭṭhassa yāva andhakārabhāvo
tika-vin01t2:956_4: na vigacchati, antogabbhe kammaṭṭhānaṃ manasi karitvā divā vātapānaṃ vivaritvā olokentassa
tika-vin01t2:956_5: yāva akkhīnaṃ phandanabhāvo na vūpasammati, ayaṃ rūpasantati nāma. Dve tayo javanavārā
tika-vin01t2:956_6: arūpasantati nāmā”ti vatvā “tadubhayampi santatipaccuppannaṃ nāmā”ti vadanti. Majjhimabhāṇakā
tika-vin01t2:956_8: nisīditvā ālokaṭṭhānaṃ gatassa na ca tāva ārammaṇaṃ pākaṭaṃ hoti. Yāva pana taṃ pākaṭaṃ
tika-vin01t2:956_9: hoti, etthantare pavattā rūpasantati arūpasantati vā ekadvesantativārā nāmāti veditabbā.
tika-vin01t2:956_10: Ālokaṭṭhāne caritvā ovarakaṃ paviṭṭhassapi na tāva sahasā rūpaṃ pākaṭaṃ hoti. Yāva
tika-vin01t2:956_11: pana taṃ pākaṭaṃ hoti, etthantare pavattā rūpasantati arūpasantati vā ekadvesantativārā
tika-vin01t2:956_12: veditabbā. Dūre ṭhatvā pana rajakānaṃ hatthavikāraṃ ghaṇṭibheriākoṭanavikārañca disvāpi
tika-vin01t2:956_13: na tāva saddaṃ suṇāti. Yāva pana taṃ suṇāti, etasmimpi antare ekadvesantativārā veditabbā”ti.
tika-vin01t2:956_14: Ettha ca ālokaṭṭhānato ovarakaṃ paviṭṭhassa pageva tattha nisinnassa yāva rūpagataṃ
tika-vin01t2:956_15: pākaṭaṃ hoti, tattha upaḍḍhavelā avibhūtappāyā, upaḍḍhavelā vibhūtappāyā tadubhayaṃ
tika-vin01t2:956_16: gahetvā “dvesantativārā”ti vuttaṃ, tayidaṃ na sabbasādhāraṇaṃ, ekaccassa sīghampi
tika-vin01t2:957_1: arūpasantati dassitā. Sattaṭṭhajavanavāramattanti ca kāmāvacarajavanavaseneva veditabbaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:957_2: na itarajavanavasena. Na hi te parimitakālā, antarā pavattabhavaṅgādayopi tadantogadhāti
tika-vin01t2:957_3: daṭṭhabbā. Yāva vā uṇhato āgantvātiādinā pana rūpasantatiṃ dasseti. Andhakāraṃ hotīti
tika-vin01t2:957_4: andhakāraṃ na vigacchati. Santatipaccuppannañcettha aṭṭhakathāsu āgataṃ, addhāpaccuppannaṃ
tika-vin01t2:957_5: sutte. Tathā hi bhaddekarattasutte addhāpaccuppannaṃ sandhāya “yo cāvuso mano, ye
tika-vin01t2:957_6: ca dhammā, ubhayametaṃ paccuppannaṃ, tasmiṃ ce paccuppanne chandarāgapaṭibaddhaṃ
tika-vin01t2:957_7: hoti viññāṇaṃ, chandarāgapaṭibaddhattā viññāṇassa tadabhinandati, tadabhinandanto
tika-vin01t2:957_8: paccuppannesu dhammesu saṃhīratī”ti vuttaṃ. Ettha hi manoti sasampayuttaṃ viññāṇamāha.
tika-vin01t2:957_9: Dhammāti ārammaṇadhammā. Manoti vā manāyatanaṃ. Dhammāti vedanādayo arūpakkhandhā.
tika-vin01t2:957_10: Ubhayametaṃ paccuppannanti addhāpaccuppannaṃ etaṃ ubhayaṃ hotīti attho. Viññāṇanti
tika-vin01t2:957_11: nikantiviññāṇaṃ. Tañhi tasmiṃ paccuppanne chandarāgavasena paṭibaddhaṃ hoti. Abhinandatīti
tika-vin01t2:957_12: taṇhādiṭṭhābhinandanāhi abhinandati. Tathābhūto ca vatthupariññāya abhāvato tesu
tika-vin01t2:957_13: paccuppannesu dhammesu saṃhīrati, taṇhādiṭṭhīhi ākaḍḍhīyatīti attho. Ettha ca “dvādasāyatanāni
tika-vin01t2:957_14: ekaṃ paccuppanna”nti āgatattā tattha pavatto chandarāgo addhāpaccuppannārammaṇo,
tika-vin01t2:958_0: Sattoti khandhasantāno. Tattha hi sattapaññatti. Jīvitindriyanti rūpārūpajīvitindriyaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:958_1: Rūpajīvitindriye hi vikopite itarampi taṃsambandhatāya vinassatīti. Taṃ vuttappakāramevāti
tika-vin01t2:958_2: taṃ jīvitindriyātipātanavidhānaṃ heṭṭhā vuttappakārameva. Saraseneva patanasabhāvassa
tika-vin01t2:958_3: antarā eva atīva pātanaṃ atipāto, saṇikaṃ patituṃ adatvā sīghapātananti attho. Atikkamma
tika-vin01t2:958_4: vā satthādīhi abhibhavitvā pātanaṃ atipāto, pāṇassa atipāto pāṇātipāto. Yāya cetanāya
tika-vin01t2:958_5: pavattamānassa jīvitindriyassa nissayabhūtesu mahābhūtesu upakkamakaraṇahetu taṃmahābhūtapaccayā
tika-vin01t2:958_6: uppajjanamahābhūtā nuppajjissanti, sā tādisappayogasamuṭṭhāpikā vadhakacetanā pāṇātipāto.
tika-vin01t2:959_2: sāvetī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Upanikkhipananti asiādīnaṃ tassa upanikkhipanaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:960_0: Aṭṭhakathāsu vuttamatthaṃ saṅkhipitvā dassento “saṅkhepato”tiādimāha. Tattha vijjāparijappananti
tika-vin01t2:960_1: mantaparijappanaṃ. Idāni aṭṭhakathāsu vitthāritamatthaṃ dassento āha “aṭṭhakathāsu
tika-vin01t2:960_2: panā”tiādi. Tattha āthabbaṇikāti āthabbaṇavedavedino. Āthabbaṇaṃ payojentīti āthabbaṇavedavihitaṃ
tika-vin01t2:960_3: mantaṃ tattha vuttavidhinā payojenti. Āthabbaṇikā hi sattāhaṃ aloṇakaṃ bhuñjitvā
tika-vin01t2:960_4: dabbe attharitvā pathaviyaṃ sayamānā tapaṃ caritvā sattame divase susānabhūmiṃ sajjetvā
tika-vin01t2:960_5: sattame pade ṭhatvā hatthaṃ vaṭṭetvā vaṭṭetvā mukhena vijjaṃ parijappanti, atha nesaṃ
tika-vin01t2:960_6: kammaṃ samijjhati. Paṭisenāyāti idaṃ heṭṭhā upari vā padadvayena sambandhamupagacchati.
tika-vin01t2:960_7: Ītiṃ uppādentīti ḍaṃsitvā māraṇatthāya vicchikādīnaṃ vissajjanavasena pīḷaṃ uppādenti.
tika-vin01t2:960_8: Etīti īti. Upaddavanti tato adhikatarapīḷaṃ. Pajjarakanti visamajjaraṃ. Sūcikanti
tika-vin01t2:960_9: aṅgapaccaṅgāni sūcīhi viya vijjhitvā pavattamānaṃ sūlaṃ. Visūcikanti sasūlaṃ āmātisāraṃ.
tika-vin01t2:960_10: Pakkhandiyanti rattātisāraṃ. Vijjaṃ parivattetvāti gandhāravijjādikaṃ attano vijjaṃ
tika-vin01t2:960_11: katupacāraṃ parijappitvā mantapaṭhanakkamena paṭhitvā. Tehīti tehi vatthūhi.
tika-vin01t2:961_0: Payojananti pavattamānaṃ. Disvātiādi diṭṭhavisādīnaṃ yathākkamena vuttaṃ. Dvattibyāmasatappamāṇanāguddharaṇeti
tika-vin01t2:961_1: dvattibyāmasatappamāṇe mahākāye nimminitvā ṭhitānaṃ nāgānaṃ uddharaṇe. Kumbhaṇḍānanti
tika-vin01t2:961_2: kumbhaṇḍadevānaṃ. Te kira devā mahodarā honti, rahassaṅgampi ca nesaṃ kumbho viya
tika-vin01t2:961_3: mahantaṃ hoti, tasmā “kumbhaṇḍā”ti vuccanti. Vessavaṇassa yakkhādhipatibhāvepi nayanāvudhena
tika-vin01t2:961_4: kumbhaṇḍānaṃ maraṇassa idha vuttattā tesupi tassa āṇāpavatti veditabbā.
tika-vin01t2:962_0: Kecīti mahāsaṅghikā. “Aho vata yaṃ taṃ kucchigataṃ gabbhaṃ na sotthinā abhinikkhameyyā”ti
tika-vin01t2:962_1: pāṭho sundarataro. “Aho vatāyaṃ ta”ntipi pāṭho. “Ayaṃ itthī taṃ kucchigataṃ gabbhaṃ
tika-vin01t2:962_2: na sotthinā abhinikkhāmeyyā”ti vattabbaṃ. Kulumbassāti gabbhassa kulasseva vā, kuṭumbassāti
tika-vin01t2:962_3: vuttaṃ hoti. Bhāvanāmayiddhiyāti adhiṭṭhāniddhiṃ sandhāya vadanti. Ghaṭabhedanaṃ
tika-vin01t2:962_4: viya iddhivināso, agginibbāpanaṃ viya parūpaghātoti upamāsaṃsandanaṃ. Taṃ tesaṃ icchāmattamevāti
tika-vin01t2:962_5: etthāyaṃ vicāraṇā – tumhe iddhiyā parūpaghātaṃ vadetha, iddhi nāma cesā adhiṭṭhāniddhi
tika-vin01t2:962_6: vikubbaniddhi manomayiddhi ñāṇavipphāriddhi samādhivipphāriddhi ariyiddhi kammavipākajiddhi
tika-vin01t2:962_7: puññavatoiddhi vijjāmayiddhi tattha tattha sammāpayogapaccayā ijjhanaṭṭhena iddhīti
tika-vin01t2:962_8: dasavidhā. Tattha kataraṃ iddhiṃ vadethāti? Bhāvanāmayanti. Kiṃ pana bhāvanāmayiddhiyā
tika-vin01t2:962_9: parūpaghātakammaṃ hotīti? Āma ekavāraṃ hoti. Yathā hi ādittagharassa upari udakabharite
tika-vin01t2:962_10: ghaṭe khitte ghaṭopi bhijjati, aggipi nibbāyati, evameva bhāvanāmayiddhiyā ekavāraṃ
tika-vin01t2:962_11: parūpaghātakammaṃ hoti, tato paṭṭhāya pana sā nassatīti. Atha ne “bhāvanāmayiddhiyā
tika-vin01t2:962_12: neva ekavāraṃ, na dve vāre parūpaghātakammaṃ hotī”ti vatvā saññattiṃ āgacchantā pucchitabbā
tika-vin01t2:962_13: “bhāvanāmayiddhi kiṃ kusalā, akusalā, abyākatā, sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā, dukkhāya,
tika-vin01t2:963_0: Imaṃ pana pañhaṃ ye jānanti, te evaṃ vakkhanti “bhāvanāmayiddhi kusalā vā hoti abyākatā
tika-vin01t2:963_1: vā, adukkhamasukhavedanīyā eva, avitakkaavicārā eva, rūpāvacarā evā”ti. Te vattabbā
tika-vin01t2:963_2: “pāṇātipātacetanā kusalākusalādīsu kataraṃ koṭṭhāsaṃ bhajatī”ti. Jānantā vakkhanti
tika-vin01t2:963_4: Evaṃ sante “tumhākaṃ kathā neva kusalattikena sameti, na vedanāttikena, na vitakkattikena,
tika-vin01t2:963_5: na parittattikenā”ti. Kiṃ pana evaṃ mahantaṃ suttaṃ niratthakanti? No niratthakaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:963_6: tumhe panassa atthaṃ na jānātha. Iddhimā cetovasippattoti ettha hi na bhāvanāmayiddhi
tika-vin01t2:963_7: adhippetā, āthabbaṇiddhi pana adhippetā. Sā hi ettha labbhamānā labbhatīti.
tika-vin01t2:964_0: Haritabbaṃ upanikkhipitabbanti hāraṃ, hārameva hārakanti āha “atha vā”tiādi. Jīvitaharaṇakaṃ
tika-vin01t2:964_2: ca vattabbe satthahārakanti visesanassa paranipātaṃ katvā vuttaṃ. Yathā labhati,
tika-vin01t2:964_3: tathā kareyyāti adhippāyatthamāha. Upanikkhipeyyāti “pariyeseyyā”ti imassa sikhāppattamatthaṃ
tika-vin01t2:964_4: dasseti. Itarathāti “pariyeseyyā”ti imassa upanikkhipeyyāti evamatthaṃ aggahetvā
tika-vin01t2:964_5: yadi pariyesanamattameva adhippetaṃ siyāti attho. Pariyiṭṭhamattenāti pariyesitamattena.
tika-vin01t2:964_6: “Satthahārakaṃ vāssa pariyeseyyā”ti iminā vuccamānassa atthassa byañjanānurūpato
tika-vin01t2:964_7: paripuṇṇaṃ katvā avuttattā āha “byañjanaṃ anādiyitvā”ti. Sasati hiṃsatīti satthaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:964_8: sasanti hiṃsanti tenāti vā satthanti laguḷapāsāṇādīnampi satthasaṅgahitattā āha –
tika-vin01t2:965_0: Vuttāvasesanti vuttaasiādīhi avasiṭṭhaṃ. Laguḷanti muggarassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Satthasaṅgahoti
tika-vin01t2:965_1: mātikāyaṃ “satthahāraka”nti ettha vuttasatthasaṅgaho. Yasmā…pe… tasmā dvidhā bhinditvā
tika-vin01t2:965_2: padabhājanaṃ vuttanti īdisaṃ heṭṭhā vuttavibhaṅganayabhedadassananti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:965_3: Narake vā papatātiādīti ettha ādi-saddena “papāte vā papatā”ti parato vuttaṃ avuttañca
tika-vin01t2:965_4: “rukkhato vā papatā”tiādi sabbaṃ maraṇūpāyaṃ saṅgaṇhāti. Tenevāha “na hi sakkā sabbaṃ
tika-vin01t2:965_5: sarūpeneva vattu”nti. Parato vuttanayattāti parato nigamanavasena vuttassa dutiyapadassa
tika-vin01t2:965_6: padabhājane vuttanayattā. Atthato vuttamevāti maraṇūpāyassa bahuvidhatānidassanatthaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:965_7: tato ekadese dassite sabbaṃ vuttameva hotīti adhippāyo. Na hi sakkā…pe… vattunti
tika-vin01t2:965_8: “rukkhato vā papatā”tiādinā sarūpato sabbaṃ maraṇūpāyaṃ pariyosānaṃ pāpetvā na sakkā vattunti attho.
tika-vin01t2:966_0: Mataṃ te jīvitā seyyoti ettha vuttamaraṇaṃ yasmā iti-saddo nidasseti, tasmā tattha
tika-vin01t2:966_1: vuttamaraṇaṃ iti-saddassa atthoti tampi gahetvā atthaṃ dassento āha – “maraṇacitto
tika-vin01t2:966_2: maraṇamanoti attho”ti. Cittassa atthadīpanatthaṃ vuttoti citta-saddassa vicittādianekatthavisayattā
tika-vin01t2:966_3: nāyaṃ citta-saddo idha aññasmiṃ atthe vattamāno daṭṭhabbo, api tu viññāṇasmiṃyeva
tika-vin01t2:966_4: vattamāno veditabboti tassa atthassa niyamanatthaṃ vutto. Iminā punaruttidosassapi
tika-vin01t2:966_5: idha anavakāsoti dasseti. Na tāva attho vuttoti “iti cittamano”ti uddharitvāpi iti-saddanidassitassa
tika-vin01t2:966_6: maraṇassa aparāmaṭṭhabhāvato vuttaṃ. Tāva-saddena pana parato “cittasaṅkappo”ti imassa
tika-vin01t2:966_8: hi iti-saddanidassitaṃ maraṇasaṅkhātamatthaṃ gahetvā “maraṇasaññī maraṇacetano maraṇādhippāyo”ti
tika-vin01t2:966_9: vuttaṃ. Tenevāha – “cittasaṅkappoti imasmiṃ pade adhikāravasena itisaddo āharitabbo”ti.
tika-vin01t2:966_10: Kasmā āharitabboti āha “idañhī”tiādi. Kathaṃ panetaṃ viññāyatīti āha “tathā hissā”tiādi.
tika-vin01t2:966_12: hi maraṇaṃ iti-saddassa attho, “saññī”tiādi saṅkappasaddassa. Cittasaddassa panettha
tika-vin01t2:966_13: vicittavacanatā saṅkappasaddassa saññācetanādhippāyavasena tidhā atthaṃ dassentena
tika-vin01t2:966_14: vibhāvitāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tenevāha – “citto nānappakārako saṅkappo”tiādi. Adhippāyasaddena
tika-vin01t2:966_15: kimettha vuttanti āha – “adhippāyoti vitakko veditabbo”ti. Na idaṃ vitakkassa nāmanti
tika-vin01t2:966_16: idaṃ pana na kevalaṃ vitakkasseva nāmanti dassetuṃ vuttaṃ. Pākaṭattā oḷārikattā ca
tika-vin01t2:966_17: uccākāratā veditabbā, apākaṭattā anoḷārikattā ca avacākāratā.
tika-vin01t2:967_0: 174. Kāyekadesepi kāya-saddo vattatīti āha “hatthena vā”tiādi. Paharaṇenāti satthena.
tika-vin01t2:967_1: Satthañhi paharanti etenāti paharaṇanti vuccati. Kammunā bajjhatīti pāṇātipātakammunā
tika-vin01t2:967_2: bajjhati, pāṇātipātakammassa siddhanti vuttaṃ hoti. Yo koci maratūti ettha yassa
tika-vin01t2:967_3: kassaci ekasseva jīvitindriyavisayā vadhakacetanā pavattati, na pahārapaccayā marantasseva
tika-vin01t2:967_4: jīvitindriyavisayā, nāpi samūhassāti veditabbā. Ubhayathāpīti uddesānuddesānaṃ vasena.
tika-vin01t2:967_6: katvā pavattatīti āha “pacchā vā teneva rogenā”tiādi. Yena hi pabandho vicchijjati,
tika-vin01t2:967_7: tādisaṃ payogaṃ nibbattentaṃ tadā vadhakacittaṃ pavattantaṃ paharitamatteyeva kammunā
tika-vin01t2:967_8: bajjhati. Manussaarahantassa ca puthujjanakāleyeva satthappahāre vā vise vā dinnepi
tika-vin01t2:967_9: yadi so arahattaṃ patvā teneva marati, arahantaghātako hotiyeva. Yaṃ pana puthujjanakāle
tika-vin01t2:967_10: dinnaṃ dānaṃ arahattaṃ patvā paribhuñjati, puthujjanasseva taṃ dinnaṃ hoti.
tika-vin01t2:968_0: Nanu ca yathā arahattaṃ patvā paribhuttampi puthujjanakāle dinnaṃ puthujjanadānameva
tika-vin01t2:968_1: hoti, evaṃ maraṇādhippāyena puthujjanakāle pahāre dinne arahattaṃ patvā teneva pahārena
tika-vin01t2:968_2: mate kasmā arahantaghātakoyeva hoti, na puthujjanaghātakoti? Visesasabbhāvato. Dānañhi
tika-vin01t2:968_3: deyyadhammassa pariccāgamattena hoti. Tathā hi dānacetanā cajitabbaṃ vatthuṃ ārammaṇaṃ
tika-vin01t2:968_4: katvā cajanamattameva hoti, aññasantakakaraṇaṃva tassa cajanaṃ, tasmā yassa taṃ santakaṃ
tika-vin01t2:968_5: kataṃ, tasseva taṃ dinnaṃ hoti, na evaṃ vadho. So hi pāṇo pāṇasaññitā vadhakacetanā
tika-vin01t2:968_6: upakkamo tena maraṇanti imesaṃ pañcannaṃ aṅgānaṃ pāripūriyāva hoti, na apāripūriyā.
tika-vin01t2:968_7: Tasmā arahattaṃ pattasseva maraṇanti arahantaghātakoyeva hoti, na puthujjanaghātako.
tika-vin01t2:968_8: Yasmā pana “imaṃ māremī”ti yaṃ santānaṃ ārabbha māraṇicchā, tassa puthujjanakhīṇāsavabhāvena
tika-vin01t2:968_9: payogamaraṇakkhaṇānaṃ vasena satipi santānabhede abhedoyeva, yadā ca atthasiddhi,
tika-vin01t2:968_10: tadā khīṇāsavabhāvo, tasmā arahantaghātakoyeva hotīti niṭṭhamettha gantabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:969_0: Aññacittenāti avadhādhippāyena amāretukāmatācittena. Natthi pāṇātipātoti amāretukāmatācittena
tika-vin01t2:969_1: pahaṭattā. Kiñcāpi paṭhamappahāro na sayameva sakkoti māretuṃ, dutiyaṃ pana labhitvā
tika-vin01t2:969_2: sakkonto jīvitavināsanahetu hoti, tasmā “payogo tena ca maraṇa”nti iminā saṃsandanato
tika-vin01t2:969_3: paṭhamappahāreneva kammabaddho yutto, na dutiyena tassa aññacittena dinnattā. Tena
tika-vin01t2:970_1: ca vibhāvanatthaṃ. “Eḷakaṃ māremī”ti pavattacetanāya pubbabhāgattā “imaṃ māremī”ti
tika-vin01t2:970_2: sanniṭṭhāpakacetanāya tadā sannihitattā yathāvatthukaṃ kammabaddho hotiyevāti āha
tika-vin01t2:970_3: “imaṃ vatthuṃ māremīti cetanāya atthibhāvato”tiādi. Sabbattha hi purimaṃ abhisandhicittaṃ
tika-vin01t2:970_4: appamāṇaṃ tena atthasiddhiyā abhāvato, vadhakacittaṃ pana tadārammaṇañca jīvitindriyaṃ
tika-vin01t2:970_5: anantariyādibhāve pamāṇanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Ghātako ca hotīti pāṇaghātako hoti, pāṇātipātakammunāva
tika-vin01t2:970_6: baddho hotīti attho. Pubbe vuttanayeneva veditabbanti yathākkamaṃ pārājikathullaccayapācittiyāni
tika-vin01t2:970_9: āha – “idha pana cetanā dāruṇā hotī”ti. Iminā ca “eḷakaṃ māressāmī”ti mātāpituādīnaṃ
tika-vin01t2:970_10: māraṇepi pubbabhāgacetanāya adāruṇattā aññathā pavattaānantariyakammato evaṃ pavattānantariyassa
tika-vin01t2:971_0: Lohitakanti lohitamakkhitaṃ. Kammaṃ karonteti yuddhakammaṃ karonte. Yathādhippāyaṃ
tika-vin01t2:971_1: gateti yodhaṃ vijjhitvā pitari viddhe. Idañca yathādhippāyaṃ tena tathāviddhabhāvadassanatthaṃ
tika-vin01t2:971_2: vuttaṃ. Ayathādhippāyaṃ pana ujukameva gantvā pitari viddhepi maraṇādhippāyena attanāva
tika-vin01t2:971_3: katappayogattā nevatthi visaṅketoti vadanti. Ānantariyaṃ pana natthīti pitaraṃ uddissa katappayogābhāvato.
tika-vin01t2:973_0: Evaṃ vijjhāti evaṃ dhanuṃ kaḍḍhetvā vijjha. Evaṃ paharāti evaṃ daḷhaṃ asiṃ gahetvā
tika-vin01t2:973_1: pahara. Evaṃ ghātehīti evaṃ kammakāraṇaṃ katvā mārehi. Majjheti hatthino piṭṭhimajjhe.
tika-vin01t2:974_0: Kiñcāpi kiriyaviseso aṭṭhakathāsu anāgato, pāḷiyaṃ pana “evaṃ vijjha, evaṃ pahara,
tika-vin01t2:974_1: evaṃ ghātehī”ti kiriyāvisesassa parāmaṭṭhattā ācariyaparamparāya ābhataṃ kiriyāvisesaṃ
tika-vin01t2:974_2: pāḷiyā saṃsandanato gahetvā dassento “aparo nayo”tiādimāha. Chedananti hatthādichedanaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:974_3: Bhedananti kucchiādiphālanaṃ. Atha vā usunā vijjhanaṃ, asinā chedanaṃ, muggarādīhi
tika-vin01t2:974_4: sīsādibhedananti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo. Saṅkhamuṇḍakanti saṅkhamuṇḍakammakāraṇaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:974_6: ekato gaṇṭhiṃ katvā daṇḍakena paliveṭhetvā uppāṭenti, saha kesehi cammaṃ uṭṭhahati,
tika-vin01t2:974_7: tato sīsakaṭāhaṃ thūlasakkharāhi ghaṃsitvā dhovantā saṅkhavaṇṇaṃ karonti. Evamādīti
tika-vin01t2:974_8: ādi-saddena bilaṅgathālikaṃ rāhumukhaṃ jotimālikaṃ hatthapajjotikaṃ erakavattikaṃ
tika-vin01t2:974_9: cīrakavāsikaṃ eṇeyyakaṃ baḷisamaṃsikaṃ kahāpaṇikaṃ khārāpatacchikaṃ palighaparivattikaṃ
tika-vin01t2:975_0: Tattha bilaṅgathālikanti kañjiyaukkhalikakammakāraṇaṃ. Taṃ kammaṃ karontā sīsakapālaṃ
tika-vin01t2:975_1: uppāṭetvā tattaṃ ayoguḷaṃ saṇḍāsena gahetvā tattha pakkhipanti, tena matthaluṅgaṃ
tika-vin01t2:975_2: pakkuthitvā upari uttarati. Rāhumukhanti rāhumukhakammakāraṇaṃ. Taṃ karonto saṅkunā
tika-vin01t2:975_3: mukhaṃ vivaritvā antomukhe dīpaṃ jālenti, kaṇṇacūḷikāhi vā paṭṭhāya mukhaṃ nikhādanena
tika-vin01t2:975_4: khaṇanti, lohitaṃ paggharitvā mukhaṃ pūreti. Jotimālikanti sakalasarīraṃ telapilotikāya
tika-vin01t2:975_5: veṭhetvā ālimpenti. Hatthapajjotikanti hatthe telapilotikāya veṭhetvā dīpaṃ viya
tika-vin01t2:975_6: pajjālenti. Erakavattikanti erakavattakammakāraṇaṃ. Taṃ karontā heṭṭhāgīvato paṭṭhāya
tika-vin01t2:975_7: cammavaṭṭe kantitvā gopphake pātenti, atha naṃ yottehi bandhitvā kaḍḍhanti, so attanova
tika-vin01t2:975_8: cammavaṭṭe akkamitvā patati. Cīrakavāsikanti cīrakavāsikakammakāraṇaṃ. Taṃ karontā
tika-vin01t2:975_9: tatheva cammavaṭṭe kantitvā kaṭiyaṃ ṭhapenti, kaṭito paṭṭhāya kantitvā gopphakesu
tika-vin01t2:975_10: ṭhapenti, uparimehi heṭṭhimasarīraṃ cīrakanivāsananivatthaṃ viya hoti. Eṇeyyakanti
tika-vin01t2:975_11: eṇeyyakammakāraṇaṃ. Taṃ karontā ubhosu kapparesu ca jaṇṇukesu ca ayavalayāni datvā
tika-vin01t2:975_12: ayasūlāni koṭṭenti, so catūhi ayasūlehi bhūmiyaṃ patiṭṭhahati, atha naṃ parivāretvā
tika-vin01t2:975_13: aggiṃ karonti, taṃ kālena kālaṃ sandhito sūlāni apanetvā catūhi aṭṭhikoṭīhiyeva ṭhapenti.
tika-vin01t2:976_0: Baḷisamaṃsikanti ubhatomukhehi baḷisehi paharitvā cammamaṃsanahārūni uppāṭenti. Kahāpaṇikanti
tika-vin01t2:976_1: sakalasarīraṃ tikhiṇāhi vāsīhi koṭito paṭṭhāya kahāpaṇamattaṃ kahāpaṇamattaṃ pātentā
tika-vin01t2:976_2: koṭṭenti. Khārāpatacchikanti sarīraṃ tattha tattha āvudhehi paharitvā kocchehi khāraṃ
tika-vin01t2:976_3: ghaṃsanti, cammamaṃsanahārūni paggharitvā aṭṭhikasaṅkhalikāva tiṭṭhati. Palighaparivattikanti
tika-vin01t2:976_4: ekena passena nipajjāpetvā kaṇṇachidde ayasūlaṃ koṭṭetvā pathaviyā ekābaddhaṃ karonti,
tika-vin01t2:976_5: atha naṃ pāde gahetvā āviñchanti. Palālapīṭhakanti cheko kāraṇiko chavicammaṃ acchinditvā
tika-vin01t2:976_6: nisadapotehi aṭṭhīni bhinditvā kesesu gahetvā ukkhipati, maṃsarāsiyeva hoti, atha
tika-vin01t2:976_7: naṃ keseheva pariyonandhitvā gaṇhantā palālavaṭṭiṃ viya katvā paliveṭhenti.
tika-vin01t2:977_0: Vatthuṃ visaṃvādetvā tato aññaṃ māretīti sambandho. Purimapassādīnampi vatthusabhāgato
tika-vin01t2:977_1: vatthuggahaṇeneva gahaṇanti āha “purato paharitvā”tiādi. Cittena “purato vā”ti niyamaṃ
tika-vin01t2:977_2: katvā vā akatvā vā “purato paharitvā mārehī”ti vutte sace aññattha paharitvā māreti,
tika-vin01t2:977_3: lesaṃ oḍḍetvā avuttattā visaṅketova hoti. Cittena pana yattha katthaci paharitvā
tika-vin01t2:977_4: māraṇaṃ icchantopi sace “purato paharitvā mārehī”ti vadati, tassa lesaṃ oḍḍetvā tathā
tika-vin01t2:977_5: vuttamatthaṃ ṭhapetvā teneva cittena samuṭṭhāpitaviññattikattā manussaviggahapārājikato
tika-vin01t2:977_6: pariyāyena amuccanato “aññattha paharitvā māritepi nevatthi visaṅketo”ti vadanti,
tika-vin01t2:977_7: keci pana taṃ na icchanti. Vatthuvisesenāti mātuādivatthuvisesena. Kammavisesoti
tika-vin01t2:978_0: “Etaṃ gāme ṭhita”nti gāmo puggalaniyamanatthaṃ vutto, na okāsaniyamanatthaṃ, tasmā
tika-vin01t2:978_1: okāsaṃ aniyametvā puggalasseva niyamitattā natthi visaṅketo. “Gāmeye vā”tiādīsu pana
tika-vin01t2:978_2: okāsassa niyamitattā aññattha mārite visaṅketo vutto.
tika-vin01t2:980: “Etaṃ gacchanta”nti gamanena puggalova niyamito, na iriyāpatho. Tenāha “natthi visaṅketo”ti. “Gacchantamevā”tiādinā iriyāpatho niyamito. Tenāha “visaṅketo hotī”ti.
tika-vin01t2:981_0: “Dīghaṃ mārehī”ti vuttepi dīghasaṇṭhānānaṃ bahubhāvato itthannāmaṃ evarūpañca dīghanti
tika-vin01t2:981_1: aññesaṃ asādhāraṇalakkhaṇena aniddiṭṭhattā “aniyametvā āṇāpetī”ti vuttaṃ. Tenevāha
tika-vin01t2:981_2: “yaṃ kiñci tādisaṃ māretī”ti. Ettha ca “cittena bahūsu dīghasaṇṭhānesu ekaṃ niyametvā
tika-vin01t2:981_3: vuttepi vācāya aniyamitattā aññasmiṃ tādise mārite natthi visaṅketo”ti vadanti. Parapāṇimhi
tika-vin01t2:981_4: pāṇasaññitālakkhaṇassa aṅgassa abhāvato nevatthi pāṇātipātoti āha “āṇāpako muccatī”ti.
tika-vin01t2:981_5: Yadi evaṃ okāsaniyame sati kathaṃ pāṇātipātoti? Okāsaṃ niyamentassa tasmiṃ okāse
tika-vin01t2:981_6: nisinnassa jīvitindriyaṃ ārammaṇaṃ hotīti gahetabbaṃ. Okāsañhi niyametvā niddisanto
tika-vin01t2:981_7: tasmiṃ okāse nisinnaṃ mārāpetukāmo hoti, sayaṃ pana tadā tattha natthi, tasmā okāsena
tika-vin01t2:981_8: saha attano jīvitindriyaṃ ārammaṇaṃ na hotīti vadanti.
tika-vin01t2:984_0: Evaṃ āṇāpentassa ācariyassa tāva dukkaṭanti sace sā āṇatti yathādhippāyaṃ na gacchati,
tika-vin01t2:984_1: ācariyassa āṇattikkhaṇe dukkaṭaṃ. Sace pana sā āṇatti yathādhippāyaṃ gacchati, yaṃ
tika-vin01t2:984_2: parato thullaccayaṃ vuttaṃ, āṇattikkhaṇe tadeva hoti. Atha so taṃ avassaṃ ghāteti,
tika-vin01t2:984_3: yaṃ parato “sabbesaṃ āpatti pārājikassā”ti vuttaṃ, tato imassa taṅkhaṇeyeva pārājikaṃ
tika-vin01t2:984_4: hotīti evamettha attho gahetabbo. Ācariyena pana heṭṭhā adinnādānakathāyaṃ vuttanayeneva
tika-vin01t2:984_5: ayamattho sakkā viññātunti idha na vutto. Vuttañhi tattha “āpatti dukkaṭassāti evaṃ
tika-vin01t2:984_6: āṇāpentassa ācariyassa tāva dukkaṭaṃ. Sace pana sā āṇatti yathādhippāyaṃ gacchati,
tika-vin01t2:984_7: yaṃ parato thullaccayaṃ vuttaṃ, āṇattikkhaṇe tadeva hoti. Atha taṃ bhaṇḍaṃ avassaṃ
tika-vin01t2:984_8: hāriyaṃ hoti, yaṃ parato ‘sabbesaṃ āpatti pārājikassā’ti vuttaṃ, tato imassa taṅkhaṇeyeva
tika-vin01t2:984_9: pārājikaṃ hotīti ayaṃ yutti sabbattha veditabbā”ti. Tesampi dukkaṭanti ārocanapaccayā
tika-vin01t2:984_10: dukkaṭaṃ. Paṭiggahitamatteti ettha avassaṃ ce paṭiggaṇhāti, tato pubbeva ācariyassa
tika-vin01t2:984_11: thullaccayaṃ, na pana paṭiggahiteti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Kasmā panassa thullaccayanti āha
tika-vin01t2:985_0: Mūlaṭṭhasseva dukkaṭanti idaṃ mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ āgatanayadassanamattaṃ, na pana taṃ
tika-vin01t2:985_1: ācariyassa adhippetaṃ. Tenāha “evaṃ sante”tiādi, evaṃ mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttanayena
tika-vin01t2:985_2: atthe satīti attho. Paṭiggahaṇe āpattiyeva na siyāti vadhakassa “sādhu suṭṭhū”ti
tika-vin01t2:985_3: māraṇapaṭiggahaṇe dukkaṭāpatti na siyā, evaṃ anoḷārikavisayepi tāva dukkaṭaṃ hoti,
tika-vin01t2:985_4: kimaṅgaṃ pana māraṇapaṭiggahaṇeti dassanatthaṃ sañcarittapaṭiggahaṇādi nidassitaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:985_5: “Aho vata itthannāmo hato assā”ti evaṃ maraṇābhinandanepi dukkaṭe sati pageva māraṇapaṭiggahaṇeti
tika-vin01t2:985_6: adhippāyo. Paṭiggaṇhantassevetaṃ dukkaṭanti avadhāraṇena visaṅketattā imassa paṭiggahaṇapaccayā
tika-vin01t2:985_7: mūlaṭṭhassa nattheva āpattīti dasseti. Keci pana “idha vuttadukkaṭaṃ paṭiggaṇhantassevāti
tika-vin01t2:985_8: ettakameva avadhāraṇena dassitaṃ, na pana mūlaṭṭhassa mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttadukkaṭaṃ
tika-vin01t2:985_9: paṭikkhitta”nti vadanti. Purimanayeti samanantarātīte avisakkiyadūtaniddese. Etanti
tika-vin01t2:985_10: dukkaṭaṃ. Yadi evaṃ kasmā pāḷiyaṃ na vuttanti āha “okāsābhāvenā”ti. Tattha mūlaṭṭhassa
tika-vin01t2:985_11: thullaccayavacanato paṭiggaṇhantassa dukkaṭaṃ vattuṃ okāso natthīti okāsābhāvena
tika-vin01t2:985_12: na vuttaṃ, na pana abhāvatoti adhippāyo.
tika-vin01t2:986: Āṇattikkhaṇe puthujjanoti ettha anāgate voropetabbajīvitindriyavasena atthasādhikacetanāya pavattattā arahantaghātako jātoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:988_0: 175. Sayaṃ saṅghattherattā “upaṭṭhānakāle”ti vuttaṃ. Vācāya vācāya dukkaṭanti “yo
tika-vin01t2:988_1: koci mama vacanaṃ sutvā imaṃ dhāretū”ti iminā adhippāyena avatvā kevalaṃ maraṇābhinandanavaseneva
tika-vin01t2:988_2: vuttattā “corāpi nāma taṃ na hanantī”tiādivācāsupi dukkaṭameva vuttaṃ. Ayamattho
tika-vin01t2:988_3: etena vuttoti yathā so jānātīti sambandho. Vākyabhedanti vacībhedaṃ. Dvinnaṃ uddissāti
tika-vin01t2:988_4: dve uddissa, dvinnaṃ vā maraṇaṃ uddissa. Ubho uddissa maraṇaṃ saṃvaṇṇentassa cetanāya
tika-vin01t2:988_5: ekattepi “dve pāṇātipātā”ti vattabbabhāvato balavabhāvaṃ āpajjitvā paṭisandhivipākasamanantaraṃ
tika-vin01t2:988_6: pavattiyaṃ anekāsupi jātīsu aparāpariyacetanāvasena dukkhuppādanato mahāvipākattā
tika-vin01t2:988_7: “akusalarāsī”ti vuttaṃ. Bahū uddissa maraṇasaṃvaṇṇanepi eseva nayo.
tika-vin01t2:989_0: Evanti “sīsaṃ vā chinditvā papāte vā papatitvā”tiādinā. Ārocitamatteti vuttamatte.
tika-vin01t2:989_1: Yathā ariyamaggakkhaṇe cattāro satipaṭṭhānā cattāro sammappadhānā ca kiccavasena
tika-vin01t2:989_2: ijjhanti, evaṃ cetanāya ekattepi kiccavasena anekā pāṇātipātā ijjhantīti āha “tattakā
tika-vin01t2:989_3: pāṇātipātā”ti. Yathā hi attānaṃ sataṃ katvā dassetukāmassa “sataṃ homi sataṃ homī”ti
tika-vin01t2:989_5: vaṇṇesu ekassa vaṇṇaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvāpi sataṃ nipphādeti, yathā ca ekassa maraṇe
tika-vin01t2:989_6: pavattamānāpi vadhakacetanā sakalasarīre uppajjamānaṃ nirujjhamānañca sakalampi jīvitindriyaṃ
tika-vin01t2:989_8: ārammaṇaṃ katvā ārammaṇabhūtaṃ sakalampi jīvitindriyaṃ vināseti, evameva paccuppannaparittārammaṇāya
tika-vin01t2:989_9: vadhakacetanāya māretukāmatāya pariggahitasattesu ekasseva jīvitindriye ārammaṇe
tika-vin01t2:990_0: 176. Yesaṃ hatthatoti yesaṃ ñātakapavāritānaṃ hatthato. Tesaṃ mūlaṃ datvā muccatīti
tika-vin01t2:990_1: idaṃ tena katapayogassa puna pākatikabhāvāpādanaṃ avasānaṃ pāpetvā dassetuṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:990_2: “Mūlena kītaṃ pana potthakaṃ potthakasāmikānaṃ datvā muccatiyevā”ti tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu
tika-vin01t2:990_3: vuttaṃ. Kenaci pana “sace potthakaṃ sāmikānaṃ datvā mūlaṃ na gaṇhāti, na muccati
tika-vin01t2:990_4: attaniyabhāvato amocitattā”ti vatvā bahudhā papañcitaṃ, na taṃ sārato paccetabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:990_5: Potthakasāmikānañhi potthake dinne aññena kataṃ paṭilabhitvā attanā katapayogassa
tika-vin01t2:990_6: nāsitattā kathaṃ so na mucceyya, na ca pariccattassa attaniyabhāvo diṭṭhoti. Gaṇṭhipade
tika-vin01t2:990_7: pana “sace mūlena kīto hoti, potthakasāmikānaṃ potthakaṃ, yesaṃ hatthato mūlaṃ gahitaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:990_8: tesaṃ mūlaṃ datvā muccatīti kasmā vuttaṃ. Potthakanimittaṃ mūlassa gahitattā akappiyametaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:990_9: Yadi hi potthakasāmikassa potthakaṃ datvā sayameva mūlaṃ gaṇheyya, akappiyameva taṃ.
tika-vin01t2:990_10: Athāpi potthakasāmikassa santikā mūlaṃ aggahetvā sayameva taṃ potthakaṃ jhāpeyya,
tika-vin01t2:990_11: tathāpi aññā yena saddhādeyyavinipātane āpatti, tasmā evamāhā”ti vuttaṃ, tampi na
tika-vin01t2:990_12: sārato paccetabbaṃ. Tasmā gaṇṭhipadesu vuttanayovettha sārato daṭṭhabbo. “Maraṇavaṇṇaṃ
tika-vin01t2:990_13: likhissāmā”ti ekajjhāsayā hutvāti idaṃ tathā karonte sandhāya vuttaṃ, evaṃ pana asaṃvidahitvāpi
tika-vin01t2:990_14: maraṇādhippāyena tasmiṃ potthake vuttavidhiṃ karontassa pārājikameva.
tika-vin01t2:991_0: Pamāṇeti attanā sallakkhite pamāṇe. Tacchetvāti unnatappadesaṃ tacchetvā. Paṃsupacchinti
tika-vin01t2:991_2: cetanā sanniṭṭhāpakacetanā. Suttantikattherāti vinaye apakataññuno suttantabhāṇakā.
tika-vin01t2:991_3: Mahāaṭṭhakathācariyatthereyeva sandhāya “vinayaṃ te na jānantīti upahāsavasena suttantikattherāti
tika-vin01t2:991_4: vutta”ntipi vadanti. Ettha ca mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “āvāṭe niṭṭhite patitvā marantu,
tika-vin01t2:991_5: aniṭṭhite mā marantū”ti iminā adhippāyena karontaṃ sandhāya sabbantimā sanniṭṭhāpakacetanā
tika-vin01t2:991_6: vuttā, mahāpaccarisaṅkhepaṭṭhakathāsu pana paṭhamappahārato paṭṭhāya “imasmiṃ āvāṭe
tika-vin01t2:991_7: patitvā marantū”ti iminā adhippāyena karontassa yasmiṃ yasmiṃ payoge kate tattha
tika-vin01t2:991_8: patitā maranti, taṃtaṃpayogasādhikaṃ sanniṭṭhāpakacetanaṃ sandhāya “ekasmimpi kudālappahāre
tika-vin01t2:991_9: dinne”tiādi vuttanti tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ. Tasmā tena tena pariyāyena aṭṭhakathāvādānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:991_10: aññamaññāvirodho yutto. Atha vā mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ ekasmiṃyeva divase avūpasanteneva
tika-vin01t2:991_11: payogena khaṇitvā niṭṭhāpentaṃ sandhāya sabbantimā sanniṭṭhāpakacetanā vuttā, itarāsu
tika-vin01t2:991_12: pana “imasmiṃ patitvā marantū”ti adhippāyena ekasmiṃ divase kiñci khaṇitvā aparasmimpi
tika-vin01t2:991_13: divase tatheva kiñci kiñci khaṇitvā niṭṭhāpentaṃ sandhāya vuttanti. Evampi aṭṭhakathānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:992_0: Attano dhammatāyāti ajānitvā pakkhalitvā vā. Arahantāpi saṅgahaṃ gacchantīti aññehi
tika-vin01t2:992_1: pātiyamānānaṃ amaritukāmānampi arahantānaṃ maraṇaṃ sambhavatīti vuttaṃ. Purimanayeti
tika-vin01t2:992_2: “maritukāmā idha marissantī”ti vuttanaye. Tattha patitaṃ bahi nīharitvāti ettha “imasmiṃ
tika-vin01t2:992_3: āvāṭeyeva marantūti niyamābhāvato bahi nīharitvā māritepi pārājikaṃ vuttaṃ. Āvāṭe
tika-vin01t2:992_4: patitvā thokaṃ cirāyitvā gacchantaṃ gahetvā mārite āvāṭasmiṃyeva aggahitattā pārājikaṃ
tika-vin01t2:992_5: na hotī”ti vadanti, taṃ pana aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “patitappayogena gahitattā”ti vuttahetussa
tika-vin01t2:992_6: idhāpi sambhavato vīmaṃsitvā gahetabbaṃ. Amaritukāmā vātipi adhippāyassa sambhavato
tika-vin01t2:992_7: opapātike uttarituṃ asakkuṇitvā matepi pārājikaṃ vuttaṃ. Nibbattitvāti vuttattā patanaṃ
tika-vin01t2:992_8: na dissatīti ce? Opapātikassa tattha nibbattiyeva patananti natthi virodho. Yasmā
tika-vin01t2:992_9: mātuyā patitvā parivattitaliṅgāya matāya so mātughātako hoti, na kevalaṃ manussapurisaghātako,
tika-vin01t2:992_10: tasmā patitasseva vasena āpattīti adhippāyena “patanarūpaṃ pamāṇa”nti vuttaṃ. Idaṃ
tika-vin01t2:992_11: pana akāraṇaṃ. “Manussabhūtaṃ mātaraṃ vā pitaraṃ vā api parivattaliṅgaṃ jīvitā voropentassa
tika-vin01t2:992_12: kammaṃ ānantariyaṃ hotī”ti ettakameva hi aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:993_0: Tattha ca liṅge parivattepi so eva ekakammanibbatto bhavaṅgappabandho jīvitindriyappabandho
tika-vin01t2:993_1: ca, na aññoti “api parivattaliṅga”nti vuttaṃ. Yo hi liṅge aparivatte tasmiṃ attabhāve
tika-vin01t2:993_2: bhavaṅgajīvitindriyappabandho, so eva parivattepi liṅge taṃyeva ca upādāya ekajātisamaññā.
tika-vin01t2:993_3: Na cettha bhāvakalāpagatajīvitindriyassa vasena codanā kātabbā tadaññasseva adhippetattā.
tika-vin01t2:993_4: Tañhi tattha avicchedavuttiyā pabandhavohāraṃ labhati, itarampi vā bhāvānupālatāsāmaññenāti
tika-vin01t2:993_5: anokāsāva codanā. Tasmā parivattepi liṅge tasseva ekakammanibbattassa santānassa
tika-vin01t2:993_6: jīvitā voropanato vohārabhedato so itthighātako vā hotu purisaghātako vā, ānantariyakammato
tika-vin01t2:993_7: na muccatīti ettakameva tattha vattabbaṃ. Idha pana yaṃyaṃjātikā sattā honti, te
tika-vin01t2:993_8: maraṇasamaye attano attano jātirūpeneva maranti, nāññarūpena, jātivaseneva ca pācittiyathullaccayapārājikehi
tika-vin01t2:993_9: bhavitabbaṃ. Tasmā nāgo vā supaṇṇo vā yakkharūpena vā petarūpena vā patitvā attano
tika-vin01t2:993_10: tiracchānarūpena marati, tattha pācittiyameva yuttaṃ, na thullaccayaṃ tiracchānagatasseva
tika-vin01t2:993_11: matattā. Teneva dutiyattheravāde maraṇarūpaṃ pamāṇaṃ, tasmā pācittiyanti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:993_12: Ayameva ca vādo yuttataro, teneva so pacchā vutto.
tika-vin01t2:994_0: Imināva nayena manussaviggahe nāgasupaṇṇasadise tiracchānagate patitvā attano rūpena
tika-vin01t2:994_1: mate pācittiyena bhavitabbaṃ. Evaṃ sante pāḷiyaṃ “yakkho vā peto vā tiracchānagatamanussaviggaho
tika-vin01t2:994_2: vā tasmiṃ patati, āpatti dukkaṭassa. Patite dukkhā vedanā uppajjati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
tika-vin01t2:994_3: Marati, āpatti thullaccayassā”ti kasmā vuttanti ce? Tattha keci vadanti – yakkho
tika-vin01t2:994_4: vā peto vāti paṭhamaṃ sakarūpeneva ṭhite yakkhapete dassetvā puna aññarūpenapi ṭhite
tika-vin01t2:994_5: teyeva yakkhapete dassetuṃ “tiracchānagatamanussaviggaho vā”ti vuttaṃ, na pana tādisaṃ
tika-vin01t2:994_6: tiracchānagataṃ visuṃ dassetuṃ. Tasmā tiracchānagataviggaho vā manussaviggaho vā
tika-vin01t2:994_7: yakkho vā peto vāti evamettha yojanā kātabbāti. Gaṇṭhipadesu pana tīsupi “pāḷiyaṃ
tika-vin01t2:994_8: manussaviggahena ṭhitatiracchānagatānaṃ āveṇikaṃ katvā thullaccayaṃ vuttaṃ viya dissatī”ti
tika-vin01t2:994_9: kathitaṃ. Yakkharūpapetarūpena matepi eseva nayoti iminā maraṇarūpasseva pamāṇattā
tika-vin01t2:995_0: Mudhāti amūlena, kiñci mūlaṃ aggahetvāti vuttaṃ hoti. So niddosoti tena tattha katapayogassa
tika-vin01t2:995_1: abhāvato. Yadi pana sopi tattha kiñci kiñci karoti, na muccatiyevāti dassento āha
tika-vin01t2:995_2: “evaṃ patitā”tiādi. Tattha evanti evaṃ mayā kateti attho. Na nassissantīti adassanaṃ
tika-vin01t2:995_3: na gamissanti, na palāyissantīti adhippāyo. Vippaṭisāre uppanneti mūlaṭṭhaṃ sandhāya
tika-vin01t2:995_4: vuttaṃ. Yadi pana pacchimopi labhitvā tattha vuttappakāraṃ kiñci katvā puna vippaṭisāre
tika-vin01t2:995_5: uppanne evaṃ karoti, tassapi eseva nayo. Paṃsumhi patitvā maratīti abhinavapūrite
tika-vin01t2:995_6: paṃsumhi pāde pavesetvā uddharituṃ asakkonto tattheva patitvā marati. Jātapathavī
tika-vin01t2:995_7: jātāti idaṃ sabbathā matthakappattaṃ thirabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ vuttaṃ. Paṃsunā pūrentena
tika-vin01t2:995_8: pana pādadaṇḍādīhi maddanatāḷanādinā suṭṭhutaraṃ thirabhāvaṃ āpādetvā pakatipathaviyā
tika-vin01t2:995_9: nibbisese kate jātapathavīlakkhaṇaṃ appattepi muccatiyeva. Opātaṃ haratīti ettha
tika-vin01t2:996_0: Hatthā muttamatteti oḍḍetvā hatthato muttamatte. Vatiṃ katvāti ettha yadi so pāse
tika-vin01t2:996_1: vuttappakāraṃ kañci visesaṃ na karoti, attanā katavatiyā viddhaṃsitāya muccati. Thaddhataraṃ
tika-vin01t2:996_2: vā pāsayaṭṭhiṃ ṭhapetīti thirabhāvatthaṃ aparāya pāsayaṭṭhiyā saddhiṃ bandhitvā vā
tika-vin01t2:996_3: tameva vā sithilabhūtaṃ thaddhataraṃ bandhitvā ṭhapeti. Daḷhataraṃ vā thirataraṃ
tika-vin01t2:996_4: vāti etthāpi eseva nayo. Khāṇukanti pāsayaṭṭhibandhanakhāṇukaṃ. Sabbattheva māraṇatthāya
tika-vin01t2:996_5: katappayogattā na muccati. Vippaṭisāre uppanneti mūlaṭṭhasseva vippaṭisāre uppanne.
tika-vin01t2:997_0: Tena alātena…pe… na muccatīti ettha “pubbe katappayogaṃ vināsetvā pacchā kusalacittena
tika-vin01t2:997_1: payoge katepi na muccatīti idaṃ sandhāya gantabba”nti tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:997_2: Ayaṃ panettha adhippāyo yutto siyā – āditoyeva māraṇatthāya katappayogattā katapariyositāya
tika-vin01t2:997_3: pāsayaṭṭhiyā tappaccayā ye ye sattā marissanti, tesaṃ tesaṃ vasena paṭhamataraṃyeva
tika-vin01t2:997_4: pāṇātipātakammasiddhito pacchā kusalacittena aññathā katepi na muccatīti. Rajjuketi
tika-vin01t2:997_5: khuddakarajjuke. Sayaṃ vaṭṭitanti bahurajjuke ekato katvā attanā vaṭṭitaṃ. Ubbaṭṭetvāti
tika-vin01t2:997_6: te rajjuke visuṃ visuṃ katvā. Garukataraṃ karotīti atibhāriyaṃ karoti. Pariyesitvā
tika-vin01t2:997_7: katanti araññaṃ gantvā rukkhaṃ chinditvā tacchetvā kataṃ.
tika-vin01t2:998_0: 177. Ālambanarukkho vāti tatthajātakaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Tadatthamevāti māraṇatthameva.
tika-vin01t2:998_1: Visamaṇḍalanti mañcapīṭhādīsu ālittaṃ visamaṇḍalaṃ. Vatvā asiṃ upanikkhipatīti ettha
tika-vin01t2:998_2: mukhena avatvā vuttappakāraṃ manasā cintetvā upanikkhipanepi eseva nayo. Purimanayenāti
tika-vin01t2:998_3: “yesaṃ hatthato mūlaṃ gahita”ntiādinā. Sarīrassa virūpabhāvakaraṇato kuṭṭhādi visabhāgarogo
tika-vin01t2:998_4: nāma, jīvitappavattiyā vā asabhāgattā ananukūlattā gaṇḍapiḷakādi yo koci jīvitappavattipaccanīko visabhāgarogo.
tika-vin01t2:999_0: 178. Paraṃ vā amanāparūpanti ettha amanāpaṃ rūpaṃ etassāti amanāparūpoti bāhiratthasamāso
tika-vin01t2:999_1: daṭṭhabbo. Manāpiyepi eseva nayoti etena manāpikaṃ rūpaṃ upasaṃharatīti ettha paraṃ
tika-vin01t2:999_2: vā manāparūpaṃ tassa samīpe ṭhapeti, attanā vā manāpiyena rūpena samannāgato tiṭṭhatītiādi
tika-vin01t2:999_3: yojetabbanti dasseti. Teneva aññatarasmiṃ gaṇṭhipade vuttaṃ –
tika-vin01t2:1001: Duṭṭhacitto sace yāti, hoti so itthimārako.
tika-vin01t2:1003: Anatthiko hi so tassā, maraṇena upekkhako”ti.
tika-vin01t2:1005: “Viyogena ca me jāyā, jananī ca na jīvati;
tika-vin01t2:1006: Iti jānaṃ viyuñjanto, tadatthī hoti mārako.
tika-vin01t2:1008: Anatthiko hi so tesaṃ, maraṇena upekkhako”ti.
tika-vin01t2:1009_0: Alaṅkaritvā upasaṃharatīti “alābhakena sussitvā maratū”ti iminā adhippāyena upasaṃharati.
tika-vin01t2:1009_1: Teneva “sace uttasitvā marati, visaṅketo”ti vuttaṃ. Alābhakena sussitvā maratīti
tika-vin01t2:1009_2: ettha ca pārājikanti pāṭhaseso daṭṭhabbo. Kuṇapagandhā cāti ahiādikuṇapānaṃ gandhā.
tika-vin01t2:1010_0: 179. Asañciccāti idaṃ maraṇasaṃvattanikaupakkamassa asallakkhaṇaṃ sandhāya vuttanti
tika-vin01t2:1010_1: āha “iminā upakkamenā”tiādi. Ajānantassāti idaṃ pana maraṇasaṃvattanikaupakkamakaraṇassa
tika-vin01t2:1010_2: ajānanaṃ sandhāya vuttanti āha “iminā ayaṃ marissatī”tiādi. Namaraṇādhippāyassāti
tika-vin01t2:1010_3: idaṃ upakkamaṃ jānantassapi maraṇādhippāyassa abhāvaṃ sandhāya vuttanti āha “maraṇaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1013_0: Domanassacitteneva bhaṇatīti iminā sanniṭṭhāpakacetanā dukkhavedanāya sampayuttā
tika-vin01t2:1013_1: evāti dasseti. Sukhabahulatāya hi rājāno hasamānāpi “ghātethā”ti vadanti, hāso pana
tika-vin01t2:1013_3: eva. Sati pana domanasse kathaṃ taṃ nappakāsatīti āha “sukhavokiṇṇattā”tiādi, pubbāpariyavasena
tika-vin01t2:1013_4: ubhosu passesu uppajjanakasukhehi ākiṇṇattā uppannassa ca domanassassa anuppabandhanena
tika-vin01t2:1013_5: pavattiyā abhāvato tadā uppannampi domanassaṃ nappakāsatīti attho.
tika-vin01t2:1015_0: 180. Maraṇatthikāva hutvāti imassa kāyassa bhedena saggapāpanādhippāyattā atthato
tika-vin01t2:1015_1: maraṇatthikāva hutvā. Maraṇatthikabhāvaṃ ajānantāti evaṃ adhippāyino maraṇatthikā
tika-vin01t2:1015_2: nāma hontīti attano maraṇatthikabhāvaṃ ajānantā. Na hi te attano cittappavattiṃ na
tika-vin01t2:1015_4: karuṇāya abhāvato kāruññena pāse baddhasūkaramocanaṃ viya na hotīti adhippāyo. Yathāyunāti
tika-vin01t2:1015_5: vuttamevatthaṃ yathānusandhināti pariyāyantarena vuttaṃ, yathānusandhinā yathāyuparicchedenāti
tika-vin01t2:1015_6: vuttaṃ hoti. Atha vā yathānusandhināti yathānuppabandhena, yāva tasmiṃ bhave santānassa
tika-vin01t2:1015_7: anuppabandho avicchinnappavatti hoti, tāva ṭhatvāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin01t2:1016_0: Appaṭivekkhitvāti anupaparikkhitvā. Uddhaṃ vā adho vā saṅkamantīti pacchā āgatānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1016_1: okāsadānatthaṃ nisinnapāḷiyā uddhaṃ vā adho vā gacchanti. Paccavekkhaṇakiccaṃ natthīti
tika-vin01t2:1016_2: pacchā āgatehi upaparikkhaṇakiccaṃ natthi. Heṭṭhā kismiñci vijjamāne sāṭakaṃ vali
tika-vin01t2:1016_3: na gaṇhātīti āha “tasmiṃ vali na paññāyatī”ti. Paṭivekkhaṇañcedaṃ gihīnaṃ santakeyevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1017_0: Pāḷiyaṃ musale ussiteti aññamaññaṃ upatthambhetvā dvīsu musalesu ussitesūti attho.
tika-vin01t2:1017_1: Udukkhalabhaṇḍikanti udukkhalatthāya ānītaṃ dārubhaṇḍaṃ. Paṭibaddhanti bhojanapaṭibaddhaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:1018_0: 181. Aggakārikanti ettha kārikā-saddassa bhāvavacanattā “aggakiriya”nti atthaṃ vatvāpi
tika-vin01t2:1018_1: yasmā kiriyaṃ dātuṃ na sakkā, tasmā dānasaṅkhātāya aggakiriyāya yuttaṃ piṇḍapātameva
tika-vin01t2:1019_1: Visesādhigamoti samādhi vipassanā ca ativiya pākaṭattā “hatthappatto viya dissatī”ti
tika-vin01t2:1019_2: vuttaṃ. Upacchindatīti “visesādhigamassa vikkhepo mā hotū”ti āhāraṃ upacchindati.
tika-vin01t2:1019_4: na vaṭṭatīti yasmā sabhāgānaṃ lajjibhikkhūnaṃyeva ariyā attanā adhigatavisesaṃ tādise
tika-vin01t2:1019_5: kāraṇe sati ārocenti, te ca bhikkhū appatirūpāya anesanāya paccayaṃ na pariyesanti,
tika-vin01t2:1019_6: tasmā tehi pariyesitapaccaye kukkuccaṃ uppādetvā āhāraṃ upacchindituṃ na vaṭṭatīti
tika-vin01t2:1019_7: attho. Sabhāgānañhi byākatattā upacchindituṃ na labhati. Te hi kappiyakhettaṃ. Teneva
tika-vin01t2:1019_8: “sabhāgānañhi lajjibhikkhūnaṃ kathetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti idaṃ “upacchindati, na vaṭṭatī”ti
tika-vin01t2:1019_9: imassa kāraṇaṃ dassentena vuttanti tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1020_0: Atha vā visesādhigamaṃ byākaritvāti idaṃ visesassa adhigatabhāvadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1020_1: Adhigamantarāyaṃ asaṅkanteneva ca āhārupacchedo kātabboti anuññātattā adhigatena
tika-vin01t2:1020_2: na kātabboti dassetuṃ “visesādhigamaṃ byākaritvā āhāraṃ upacchindati, na vaṭṭatī”ti
tika-vin01t2:1020_3: vuttaṃ. Kiṃ pana ariyā attanā adhigatavisesaṃ aññesaṃ ārocentīti imissā codanāya
tika-vin01t2:1020_4: “sabhāgānañhi lajjibhikkhūnaṃ kathetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vuttaṃ. Ayamettha yuttataroti amhākaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1020_5: khanti, gaṇṭhipadepi ayamattho dassitoyevāti. Bhaṇḍakaṃ dhovantāti cīvaraṃ dhovantā.
tika-vin01t2:1021_0: 184. Ahaṃ kukkuccakoti “mama kiriyāya mareyya nu kho, no vā”ti evaṃ jātakukkuccako.
tika-vin01t2:1021_1: Sabbatthāpi panettha evarūpesu vatthūsu amate thullaccayassa vuttattā tena katappayogena
tika-vin01t2:1021_2: dukkhavedanā uppajjatu vā mā vā, pārājikāya abhāvato bhagavato vacanena thullaccayamevāti vadanti.
tika-vin01t2:1022_0: 185. Gabbho patati etenāti gabbhapātanaṃ, tādisaṃ bhesajjaṃ. Tenāha “yena paribhuttenā”tiādi.
tika-vin01t2:1022_1: “Maraṇavaṇṇaṃ vā saṃvaṇṇeyyā”ti vuttattā pariyāyato āpattimokkho na hotīti āha “pariyāyo nāma natthī”ti.
tika-vin01t2:1023_0: Gabbhaṃ na gaṇhātīti gabbhaṃ na dhāreti. Vātena pāṇakehi vā gabbho vinassanto kammaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1023_1: vinā na nassatīti adhippāyena “dvīhākārehī”ti vuttaṃ. Dīghanikāyaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana
tika-vin01t2:1023_2: “gabbho hi vātena pāṇakehi kammunā cāti tīhi kāraṇehi vinassatī”ti vatvā “kammunā
tika-vin01t2:1023_3: vinassante pana buddhāpi paṭibāhituṃ na sakkontī”ti vuttaṃ. Tattha vātena pāṇakehi
tika-vin01t2:1023_4: vā gabbhe vinassante na purimakammunā okāso kato, apica tappaccayā kammaṃ vipaccati,
tika-vin01t2:1023_5: sayameva pana kammunā okāse kate na ekantena vāto pāṇakā vā apekkhitabbāti iminā
tika-vin01t2:1023_6: adhippāyena kammassa visuṃ kāraṇabhāvo vuttoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Pāṇakā khāditvā antaradhāpentīti
tika-vin01t2:1023_7: yojetabbaṃ. Avijāyanatthāya bhesajjaṃ dentassa kucchiyaṃ uppajjitvā vinassissantīti
tika-vin01t2:1023_8: iminā adhippāyena dinne opātakkhaṇanādīsu viya kammabaddho, kucchiyaṃ na uppajjissantīti
tika-vin01t2:1023_9: iminā pana adhippāyena dinne nevatthi kammabaddho.
tika-vin01t2:1024_0: Sahadhammikānanti ekassa satthuno sāsane sahasikkhamānadhammānaṃ. Pañcannampi vivaṭṭanissitasīlattā
tika-vin01t2:1024_1: “samasīlasaddhāpaññāna”nti vuttaṃ. Ñātakapavāritaṭṭhānatoti attano tesaṃ vā ñātakapavāritaṭṭhānato.
tika-vin01t2:1024_2: Gilānassatthāya appavāritaṭṭhānatopi viññattiyā anuññātattā katāpi akatā viyāti akataviññatti,
tika-vin01t2:1024_3: “vada, bhante, paccayenā”ti evaṃ akatapavāraṇaṭṭhāne ca viññatti akataviññatti.
tika-vin01t2:1025_0: Paṭiyādiyatīti sampādeti. Akātuṃ na vaṭṭatīti ettha dukkaṭaṃ vadanti. Sahadhammikesu
tika-vin01t2:1025_1: vuttanayenevāti “imesampi pañcannaṃ akataviññattiyāpi bhesajjaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti
tika-vin01t2:1025_2: kurundaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttattā kathitaṃ. Yāva ñātakā passantīti yāva tassa ñātakā passanti.
tika-vin01t2:1025_3: Pitu bhaginī pitucchā. Mātu bhātā mātulo. Nappahontīti kātuṃ na sakkonti. Sacepi
tika-vin01t2:1025_4: na yācantīti “yācituṃ dukkha”nti adhippāyena yadi na yācanti. Ābhogaṃ katvāti idaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1025_5: kattabbatādassanavasena vuttaṃ, “ābhogaṃ pana akatvāpi dātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu
tika-vin01t2:1025_6: likhitaṃ. Ete dasa ñātake ṭhapetvāti tesaṃ puttanattādayopi tappaṭibaddhattā ñātakā
tika-vin01t2:1025_7: evāti tepi ettheva saṅgahitā. Tena aññesanti iminā aññātakānaṃ gahaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1025_8: Tenevāha “etesaṃ puttaparamparāyā”tiādi. Kulaparivaṭṭoti kulānaṃ paṭipāṭi, kulaparamparāti
tika-vin01t2:1025_9: vuttaṃ hoti. “Mayhaṃ dassanti karissantī”ti paccāsāya karontassapi yācitvāpi gahetabbaṭṭhānatāya
tika-vin01t2:1025_10: ñātakesu vejjakammaṃ vā kuladūsakāpatti vā na hotīti vadanti. Sabbapadesupi vinicchayo
tika-vin01t2:1025_11: veditabboti cūḷamātuyātiādīsu sabbapadesu “cūḷamātuyā sāmiko”tiādinā yojetvā heṭṭhā
tika-vin01t2:1026_0: Vuttanayena pariyesitvāti iminā “ñātisāmaṇerehi vā”tiādinā vuttamatthaṃ atidissati.
tika-vin01t2:1026_1: Apaccāsīsantenāti “mayhaṃ dassanti karissantī”ti evaṃ attano atthāya apaccāsīsantena.
tika-vin01t2:1026_2: Bhikkhusaṅghassa pana upakārakattaṃ paccāsīsantena kātuṃ vaṭṭati. “Bhesajjaṃ ācikkhathā”ti
tika-vin01t2:1026_3: vuttepi yathā “aññamaññaṃ pana kathā kātabbā”ti idaṃ pariyāyattā vaṭṭati, evaṃ heṭṭhā
tika-vin01t2:1026_4: vuttanayena “idañcidañca gahetvā karontī”ti iminā pariyāyena kathentassapi nevatthi dosoti ācariyā.
tika-vin01t2:1027_0: Vinayalakkhaṇaṃ ajānantassa anācariyassa tadanurūpavohārāsambhavato īdisassa lābhassa
tika-vin01t2:1027_1: uppatti nāma natthīti “ācariyabhāgo nāmāya”nti vuttaṃ, vinaye pakataññunā ācariyena
tika-vin01t2:1027_2: labhitabbabhāgo ayanti vuttaṃ hoti. Pupphapūjanatthāya dinnepi akappiyavohārena vidhānassa
tika-vin01t2:1028_0: Yadi “parittaṃ karothā”ti vutte karonti, gihiveyyāvaccakaraṇaṭṭhāne tiṭṭhatīti “parittaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1028_1: karotha, bhanteti vutte na kātabba”nti vuttaṃ, “bhaṇathā”ti vutte pana dhammakathāya
tika-vin01t2:1028_2: ajjhesanaṭṭhāne ṭhitattā “kātabba”nti vuttaṃ. Dhammañhi anajjhiṭṭhenapi kathetuṃ
tika-vin01t2:1028_3: vaṭṭati, pageva ajjhiṭṭhena. Cāletvā suttaṃ parimajjitvāti parittaṃ karontena kātabbavidhiṃ
tika-vin01t2:1028_4: dasseti. Vihārato…pe… dukkaṭanti aññātakānaṃyeva dadato dukkaṭaṃ. No ce jānantīti
tika-vin01t2:1028_5: yadi evaṃ vattuṃ na jānanti. Udakanti dakkhiṇodakaṃ. Pādesu apanītesu avamaṅgalasaññino
tika-vin01t2:1028_6: hontīti āha “na pādā apanetabbā”ti. Gantuṃ vaṭṭatīti “parivāratthāya āgacchantū”ti
tika-vin01t2:1029_0: Anāmaṭṭhapiṇḍapātoti apabbajitassa hatthato laddho attanā aññena vā pabbajitena aggahitaaggo
tika-vin01t2:1029_1: piṇḍapāto. Thālaketi iminā pattopi gahitoyevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Dāmarikacorassāti rajjaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1029_2: patthayamānassa pākaṭacorassa. Coranāgavatthūti ettha “coranāgassa kira āmaṭṭhaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1029_3: dento kujjhissati, anāmaṭṭhaṃ na vaṭṭatīti thero pattaggahaṇahattheneva aggaṃ gahetvā
tika-vin01t2:1029_4: patte bhattaṃ sabbamadāsi, so tena tussi. ‘Ettakaṃ mayha’nti bhattassa ekapasseyeva
tika-vin01t2:1029_5: thokaṃ ṭhapetvāpi puna tena saddhiṃ sabbampi dātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti cūḷagaṇṭhipade vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1030_0: Āmisassa dhammassa ca alābhena attano parassa ca antare sambhavantassa chiddassa
tika-vin01t2:1030_1: vivarassa bhedassa paṭisantharaṇaṃ pidahanaṃ gaṇhanaṃ paṭisanthāro. Ayañhi lokasannivāso
tika-vin01t2:1030_2: alabbhamānena āmisena ca dhammena cāti dvīhi chiddo, tassa taṃ chiddaṃ yathā na paññāyati,
tika-vin01t2:1030_3: evaṃ pīṭhassa viya paccattharaṇena āmisena ca dhammena ca paṭisantharaṇaṃ āmisapaṭisanthāro
tika-vin01t2:1030_4: dhammapaṭisanthāro cāti vuccati. Tattha dhammapaṭisanthāro kassaci na kātabbo natthi.
tika-vin01t2:1030_5: Yassa kassaci hi gahaṭṭhassa vā pabbajitassa vā dhammena saṅgaho kātabboyeva. “Paṭisanthāro
tika-vin01t2:1030_6: pana kassa kātabbo, kassa na kātabbo”ti idaṃ pana āmisapaṭisanthāraṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1030_7: Ubbāsetvāti samantato tiyojanaṃ vilumpanto manusse palāpetvā aññesaṃ avāsaṃ katvā.
tika-vin01t2:1030_8: Saṅghassatthāya āhaṭāti pākavaṭṭato taṃdivasassatthāya āhaṭā. Varapotthacittattharaṇanti
tika-vin01t2:1031_0: 187. Sattarasavaggiyesu pubbe ekassa aṅgulipatodena māritattā sesasoḷasajanesu udaraṃ
tika-vin01t2:1031_1: āruhitvā nisinnamekaṃ ṭhapetvā “sesāpi pannarasa janā”ti vuttaṃ. Adūhalapāsāṇā viyāti
tika-vin01t2:1031_2: adūhale āropitapāsāṇā viya. Kammādhippāyāti tajjanīyādikammakaraṇādhippāyā. Āvāhetvāti
tika-vin01t2:1032: 189. Yo rukkhena otthatopi na maratītiādīsu yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ bhūtagāmasikkhāpadaṭṭhakathāyaṃ sayameva vakkhati. Evañhi tattha vuttaṃ –
tika-vin01t2:1033_1: ajjhotthato hoti opāte vā patito, sakkā ca hoti ekena passena rukkhaṃ chinditvā bhūmiṃ
tika-vin01t2:1033_2: vā khaṇitvā nikkhamituṃ, jīvitahetupi attanā na kātabbaṃ, aññena pana bhikkhunā bhūmiṃ
tika-vin01t2:1033_3: vā khaṇitvā rukkhaṃ vā chinditvā allarukkhato vā daṇḍakaṃ chinditvā taṃ rukkhaṃ pavaṭṭetvā
