tika-vin01t2:1033_4: nikkhamāpetuṃ vaṭṭati, anāpattī’ti vuttaṃ. Tattha kāraṇaṃ na dissati, ‘anujānāmi,
tika-vin01t2:1033_5: bhikkhave, davaḍāhe ḍayhamāne paṭaggiṃ dātuṃ parittaṃ kātu’nti idaṃ pana ekameva
tika-vin01t2:1033_6: suttaṃ dissati. Sace etassa anulomaṃ, attano na vaṭṭati, aññassa vaṭṭatīti idaṃ nānākaraṇaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1033_7: na sakkā laddhuṃ. Attano atthāya karonto attasinehena akusalacitteneva karoti, paro
tika-vin01t2:1033_8: pana kāruññena. Tasmā anāpattīti ce, etampi akāraṇaṃ. Kusalacittenapi hi imaṃ āpattiṃ
tika-vin01t2:1033_9: āpajjati, sabbaṭṭhakathāsu pana vuttattā na sakkā paṭisedhetuṃ, gavesitabbā ettha
tika-vin01t2:1034: Tasmā yaṃ ettha ito aññathā kenaci papañcitaṃ, gaṇṭhipadesu ca kāraṇaṃ vuttaṃ, taṃ na sārato paccetabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1035_0: 190. Alla…pe… pācittiyanti sukkhaṭṭhānepi aggiṃ pātetvā iminā adhippāyena ālimpentassa
tika-vin01t2:1035_1: pācittiyameva. Dukkaṭanti sukkhaṭṭhāne vā sukkhaṃ “asukkha”nti avavatthapetvā vā
tika-vin01t2:1035_2: aggiṃ pātentassa dukkaṭaṃ. Kīḷādhippāyepi eseva nayo. Kīḷādhippāyo ca paṭapaṭāyamānasaddassādavaseneva
tika-vin01t2:1035_3: veditabbo. Paṭipakkhabhūto aggi paṭaggi. Parittakaraṇanti ārakkhakaraṇaṃ. Sayaṃ vā
tika-vin01t2:1035_4: uṭṭhitanti vāteritānaṃ veḷuādīnaṃ aññamaññasaṅghaṭṭanena samuṭṭhitaṃ. Nirupādānoti indhanarahito.
tika-vin01t2:1036_0: 191-192. Khettameva otiṇṇattā pārājikanti “dvīhī”ti vutte dvīhipi pahārehi maraṇassa
tika-vin01t2:1036_1: paccāsīsanato ekena vinā dvinnaṃ abhāvato ca pārājikaṃ. “Dvīhiyevāti niyamite pana
tika-vin01t2:1036_2: ekena pahārena mārite natthi pārājika”nti vadanti. Paṭhamaṃ āhitabalavegassa pubbānuciṇṇavasena
tika-vin01t2:1036_3: dhammānaṃ desantaruppattiyā gamanamattaṃ ṭhapetvā jīvitindriyassa tattha avijjamānattā
tika-vin01t2:1041_0: Catusaccavidūti cattāri saccāni samāhaṭāni catusaccaṃ, taṃ avedi paṭivijjhīti catusaccavidū.
tika-vin01t2:1041_1: Satipi sāvakānaṃ paccekabuddhānañca catusaccavidubhāve anaññapubbakattā bhagavato
tika-vin01t2:1041_2: catusaccadassanassa tattha ca sabbaññutāya balesu ca vasībhāvassa pattito parasantānesu
tika-vin01t2:1041_3: pasāritabhāvena pākaṭattā ca bhagavāva visesena “catusaccavidū”ti thomanaṃ arahati.
tika-vin01t2:1043_0: 193. Adhiṭṭhemāti saṃvidahāma. Dūtakammanti gihīnaṃ paṇṇaṃ vā sāsanaṃ vā gahetvā
tika-vin01t2:1043_1: tattha tattha gamanaṃ. Iriyāpathaṃ saṇṭhapetvāti padhānānurūpaṃ katvā. Pucchantānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1043_2: vāti “ayyā santairiyāpathā ativiya upasantā, kataraṃ visesamadhigacchiṃsū”ti pucchantānaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1043_3: Anāgatasambandhe pana asatīti “bhāsito bhavissatī”ti pāṭhasesaṃ katvā anāgatasambandhe
tika-vin01t2:1043_4: asati. “Bhāsito”ti atītavacanaṃ kathaṃ anāgatavacanena sambandhamupagacchatīti āha
tika-vin01t2:1043_5: “lakkhaṇaṃ pana saddasatthato pariyesitabba”nti. Īdise hi ṭhāne “dhātusambandhe paccayā”ti
tika-vin01t2:1043_6: iminā lakkhaṇena dhātvatthasambandhe sati ayathākālavihitāpi paccayā sādhavo bhavantīti
tika-vin01t2:1044_0: 194. Vaṇṇavāti iminā sakalasarīrānugatavaṇṇassa manāpatā vuttā. Pasannamukhavaṇṇāti
tika-vin01t2:1044_1: iminā sakalasarīravaṇṇatopi adhikataraṃ mukhavaṇṇassa manāpatā vuttā. Vippasannachavivaṇṇāti
tika-vin01t2:1044_2: iminā pana vijjamānasseva sarīravaṇṇassa ativiya pasannatā vuttā. Yasmā indriyānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1044_3: ūnattaṃ vā pūraṇattaṃ vā natthi, tasmā “abhiniviṭṭhokāsassa paripuṇṇattā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1044_4: Chaṭṭhassa abhiniviṭṭhokāso hadayavatthu, pañcapasādānaṃ abhiniviṭṭhokāsassa paripuṇṇatāvacaneneva
tika-vin01t2:1044_6: indriyāna”nti. Yathā tanti ettha tanti nipātamattaṃ. Bhantamigappaṭibhāgāti kattabbākattabbassa
tika-vin01t2:1044_7: ajānanato bhantamigasadisā. Catucakkanti catuiriyāpathaṃ. Iriyāpatho hi idha pavattanaṭṭhena
tika-vin01t2:1044_8: “cakka”nti adhippeto. Navadvāranti navahi vaṇamukhehi navadvāraṃ. Dukkhanti sīsarogādidukkhaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1045_0: 195. Santoti iminā tesaṃ vijjamānataṃ dasseti, saṃvijjamānāti iminā pana tesaṃ upalabbhamānataṃ
tika-vin01t2:1045_1: dasseti. Tenāha – “atthi ceva upalabbhanti cā”ti. Upalabbhantīti dissanti, ñāyantīti
tika-vin01t2:1045_2: attho. Panthadūhanakammanti panthaghātanakammaṃ. Hanantoti mārento. Ghātentoti mārāpento.
tika-vin01t2:1045_3: Atha vā hanantoti bandhanatāḷanādīhi hiṃsanto. Ghātentoti mārento. Chindantoti paresaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1045_4: hatthādīni chindanto. Pacantoti daṇḍena uppīḷento. Pacanañhettha dahanaṃ vibādhanaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1045_5: adhippetaṃ. Pacantoti vā tajjento tāsento. Atha vā pacantoti gāmesu aggipātanavasena
tika-vin01t2:1046_0: Ye sikkhāpadesu bahulagāravā na honti āpattivītikkamabahulā, te sikkhāpadesu atibbagāravā.
tika-vin01t2:1046_1: Uddhateti akappiye kappiyasaññitāya kappiye akappiyasaññitāya avajje vajjasaññitāya
tika-vin01t2:1046_2: vajje avajjasaññitāya ca uddhaccapakatike. Unnaḷeti uggatanaḷe, uṭṭhitatucchamāneti
tika-vin01t2:1046_3: vuttaṃ hoti. Capaleti pattacīvaramaṇḍanādinā cāpallena yutte. Mukhareti mukhakhare,
tika-vin01t2:1046_4: kharavacaneti vuttaṃ hoti. Vikiṇṇavāceti asaṃyatavacane divasampi niratthakavacanappalāpine.
tika-vin01t2:1046_5: Muṭṭhā naṭṭhā sati etesanti muṭṭhassatī, sativirahiteti vuttaṃ hoti. Asampajāneti
tika-vin01t2:1046_6: nippaññe. Pākatindriyeti saṃvarābhāvena gihikāle viya vivaṭaindriye. Ācariyupajjhāyehi
tika-vin01t2:1046_7: pariccattaketi dhammena āmisena ca asaṅgahetvā ācariyupajjhāyehi pariccatte anāthe
tika-vin01t2:1047_2: kuhakavatthu āgataṃ. Tattha pāpicchasseva sato sambhāvanādhippāyakatena iriyāpathena
tika-vin01t2:1047_3: vimhāpanaṃ iriyāpathasaṇṭhapanasaṅkhātaṃ kuhakavatthu. Tathā cīvarādīhi nimantitassa
tika-vin01t2:1047_4: tadatthikasseva sato pāpicchataṃ nissāya paṭikkhepanena te ca gahapatike attani suppatiṭṭhitasaddhe
tika-vin01t2:1047_5: ñatvā puna tesaṃ “aho ayyo appiccho, na kiñci paṭiggaṇhituṃ icchati, suladdhaṃ vata
tika-vin01t2:1047_6: no assa, sace appamattakampi kiñci paṭiggaṇheyyā”ti nānāvidhehi upāyehi paṇītāni
tika-vin01t2:1047_7: cīvarādīni upanentānaṃ tadanuggahakāmataṃyeva āvikatvā paṭiggahaṇena ca tato pabhuti
tika-vin01t2:1047_10: tathā vimhāpanaṃ sāmantajappanasaṅkhātaṃ kuhakavatthūti veditabbaṃ. Cittalapabbatādivihāro
tika-vin01t2:1047_11: lokasammatasenāsanaṃ nāma. Lokasammata …pe… upāyehi saṃvaṇṇiyamānaguṇoti sambandho.
tika-vin01t2:1047_12: Paripācetunti pariṇāmetuṃ. Suddhacittena attano ganthadhurādikammaṃ katvā vicarantānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1047_13: tammūlakapaccayaparibhoge dosābhāvaṃ dassetuṃ “ye panā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Bhikkhācāre
tika-vin01t2:1047_14: asampajjamāneti gocaragāme bhikkhāya caritvā labhitabbapiṇḍapāte asampajjante. Te
tika-vin01t2:1047_15: ca vattasīsena sabbampetaṃ karonti, na lābhanimittaṃ. Tena vuttaṃ “tantipaveṇighaṭanakā sāsanajotakā”ti.
tika-vin01t2:1048_0: Kicchenāti na dukkhāya paṭipadāya. Buddhānañhi cattāropi maggā sukhāpaṭipadāva honti,
tika-vin01t2:1048_1: pāramīpūraṇakāle pana sarāgadosamohasseva sato āgatānaṃ yācakānaṃ alaṅkatappaṭiyattaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1048_2: sīsaṃ kantitvā galalohitaṃ nīharitvā suañjitāni akkhīni uppāṭetvā kulavaṃsappatiṭṭhāpakaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1048_3: puttaṃ manāpacāriniṃ bhariyanti evamādīni dentassa aññānipi khantivādīsadisesu attabhāvesu
tika-vin01t2:1048_4: chejjabhejjādīni pāpuṇantassa āgamanīyapaṭipadaṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ. Kasirenāti tasseva vevacanaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1049_0: Ekasseva dātuṃ asakkuṇeyyatāya garubhāvato “garubhaṇḍānī”ti vuttaṃ, sabbesaṃ bhājetvāpi
tika-vin01t2:1049_2: saṅghikattā sabbabhikkhusādhāraṇaparikkhārabhāvena. Saṅgaṇhāti upalāpetīti idaṃ atheyyacittaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1049_4: thenetvāti attho. Garubhaṇḍañhi kulasaṅgahatthāya vissajjento vibhajanto ca tassa
tika-vin01t2:1049_5: avissajjiyaavaebhaṅgiyabhāvaṃ theneti. Kuladūsakadukkaṭaṃ āpajjatīti ettha “yo vissajjeyya,
tika-vin01t2:1049_6: āpatti thullaccayassā”ti vuttattā vissajjanapaccayā thullaccayenapi na muccati.
tika-vin01t2:1050_0: Asantanti avijjamānaṃ. Abhūtanti anuppannaṃ. Anuppannattā hi tassa taṃ asantanti.
tika-vin01t2:1050_1: Purimassa pacchimaṃ kāraṇavacanaṃ. Ullapatīti uggatāyuko lapati. Sīlañhi bhikkhuno
tika-vin01t2:1050_2: āyu, taṃ tassa tathālapanasamakālameva vigacchati. Asantasambhāvanāyāti attano avijjamānaguṇehi
tika-vin01t2:1050_3: sambhāvanāya. Evañhi gaṇhatā…pe… thenetvā gahitā hontīti ettha asantasambhāvanāya
tika-vin01t2:1050_4: raṭṭhapiṇḍassa thenetvā gahitattā lokuttaradhammopi thenitoyeva hoti. Kitavassevāti
tika-vin01t2:1050_5: kitavassa sakuṇaggahaṇamiva. Kerāṭikassāti saṭhassa. Gottaṃ vuccati sādhāraṇanāmaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:1050_6: matta-saddo luttaniddiṭṭho, tasmā samaṇāti gottamattaṃ anubhavanti dhārentīti gotrabhuno,
tika-vin01t2:1053_0: 196. Heṭṭhimamaggehi ñātamariyādāya eva jānanato aññā aggamaggapaññā, tassā phalabhāvato
tika-vin01t2:1053_1: aggaphalapaññā taṃsahagatā sammāsaṅkappādayo ca aññāti vuttāti āha “aññaṃ byākariṃsūti
tika-vin01t2:1053_2: arahattaṃ byākariṃsū”ti. Ariyasāvakassa tāva nuppajjatīti pahīnādhimānapaccayattā
tika-vin01t2:1053_3: nuppajjati. Sīlavatopi…pe… nuppajjati akārakabhāvato. Tilakkhaṇaṃ āropetvāti kalāpasammasanavasena
tika-vin01t2:1053_5: Suddhasamathalābhī vipassanāya kammaṃ akatvāpi kilesasamudācāraṃ apassanto kevalaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1054_0: Talaṅgaravāsī dhammadinnatthero kira nāma eko pabhinnappaṭisambhido mahākhīṇāsavo
tika-vin01t2:1054_1: mahato bhikkhusaṅghassa ovādadāyako ahosi. So ekadivasaṃ attano divāṭṭhāne nisīditvā
tika-vin01t2:1054_3: matthakappattaṃ, no”ti āvajjento puthujjanabhāvamevassa disvā “mayi agacchante puthujjanakālakiriyameva
tika-vin01t2:1054_4: karissatī”ti ca ñatvā iddhiyā vehāsaṃ uppatitvā divāṭṭhāne nisinnassa therassa samīpe
tika-vin01t2:1054_5: orohitvā vanditvā vattaṃ dassetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi. “Kiṃ, āvuso dhammadinna, akāle
tika-vin01t2:1054_6: āgatosī”ti ca vutto “pañhaṃ, bhante, pucchituṃ āgatomhī”ti āha. Tato “pucchāvuso,
tika-vin01t2:1054_7: jānamānā kathayissāmā”ti vutto pañhasahassaṃ pucchi. Thero pucchitaṃ pucchitaṃ pañhaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1054_8: asajjamānova kathesi. Tato “atitikkhaṃ vo, bhante, ñāṇaṃ, kadā tumhehi ayaṃ dhammo
tika-vin01t2:1054_9: adhigato”ti vutto “ito saṭṭhivassakāle, āvuso”ti āha. Samādhimhi, bhante, vaḷañjethāti.
tika-vin01t2:1054_10: Na idaṃ, āvuso, bhāriyanti. Tena hi, bhante, ekaṃ hatthiṃ māpethāti. Thero sabbasetaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1054_11: hatthiṃ māpesi. Idāni, bhante, yathā ayaṃ hatthī añjitakaṇṇo pasāritanaṅguṭṭho soṇḍaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1054_12: mukhe pakkhipitvā bheravaṃ koñcanādaṃ karonto tumhākaṃ abhimukhaṃ āgacchati, tathā
tika-vin01t2:1054_13: naṃ karothāti. Thero tathā katvā vegena āgacchato hatthissa bheravaṃ ākāraṃ disvā
tika-vin01t2:1054_14: uṭṭhāya palāyituṃ āraddho. Tamenaṃ khīṇāsavatthero hatthaṃ pasāretvā cīvarakaṇṇe
tika-vin01t2:1054_15: gahetvā “bhante, khīṇāsavassa sārajjaṃ nāma hotī”ti āha. So tasmiṃ kāle attano puthujjanabhāvaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1054_16: ñatvā “avassayo me, āvuso, dhammadinna hohī”ti vatvā pādamūle ukkuṭikaṃ nisīdi. “Bhante,
tika-vin01t2:1054_17: tumhākaṃ avassayo bhavissāmiccevāhaṃ āgato, mā cintayitthā”ti kammaṭṭhānaṃ kathesi.
tika-vin01t2:1054_18: Thero kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā caṅkamaṃ oruyha tatiye padavāre aggaphalaṃ arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
tika-vin01t2:1057_0: 197-198. Yasmā panātiādi “asantaṃ abhūtaṃ asaṃvijjamāna”nti etesaṃ kāraṇavacanaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1057_1: Tattha yanti yaṃ uttarimanussadhammaṃ. Anabhijānanti attani atthibhāvaṃ ajānanto.
tika-vin01t2:1057_2: Samudācaratīti “atthi mayhaṃ esa dhammo”ti katheti jānāpeti vā. “Asantaṃ abhūta”nti
tika-vin01t2:1057_3: imassa kāraṇavacanaṃ santāne anuppannoti. Ñāṇena ca asacchikatoti idaṃ pana “asaṃvijjamāna”nti
tika-vin01t2:1057_4: etassa kāraṇavacanaṃ. Pakatimanussehi uttaritarānaṃ buddhādiuttamapurisānaṃ adhigamadhammo
tika-vin01t2:1057_6: padabhājane bahuvacananiddeso kasmā katoti āha “padabhājane panā”tiādi. Kiñcāpi uttarimanussadhammo
tika-vin01t2:1057_7: abyākatopi hoti, ārogyaṭṭhena pana bāhitikasutte viya “kusale dhamme”ti vuttaṃ. Assāti
tika-vin01t2:1057_8: uttarimanussadhammassa. Khaṇalayamuhutta-saddā aññattha bhinnatthāpi honti, idha
tika-vin01t2:1057_9: pana khaṇapariyāyavaseneva “taṃ khaṇaṃ taṃ layaṃ taṃ muhutta”nti pāḷiyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1058_0: Adhigantabbato adhigamo, jhānādi, adhigamassa pucchā adhigamapucchā. Tenāha “jhānavimokkhādīsū”tiādi.
tika-vin01t2:1058_1: Upāyapucchāti adhigamupāyapucchā. Kintīti kena pakārena, kena vidhināti attho. Katamesaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1058_2: tvaṃ dhammānaṃ lābhīti idaṃ pana pubbe “kiṃ te adhigata”nti aniddhāritabhedā jhānādivisesā
tika-vin01t2:1059_0: Tasmāti yasmā yathāvuttehi chahākārehi adhigamabyākaraṇaṃ sodhetabbaṃ, tasmā. Ettāvatāvāti
tika-vin01t2:1059_1: ettakena byākaraṇamatteneva na sakkātabbo. Byākaraṇañhi ekaccassa ayāthāvatopi hotīti.
tika-vin01t2:1059_2: Imesu pana chasu ṭhānesu sodhanatthaṃ vattabboti yathā nāma jātarūpapatirūpakampi
tika-vin01t2:1059_3: jātarūpaṃ viya khāyatīti jātarūpaṃ nighaṃsanatāpanacchedanehi sodhetabbaṃ, evameva
tika-vin01t2:1059_4: imesu idāneva vuttesu chasu ṭhānesu pakkhipitvā sodhanatthaṃ vattabbo. Vimokkhādīsūti
tika-vin01t2:1059_6: Pākaṭo hotīti adhigatavisesassa satisammosābhāvato. Sesapucchāsupi pākaṭo hotīti pade eseva nayo.
tika-vin01t2:1060_0: Sabbesañhi attanā adhigatamaggena pahīnakilesā pākaṭā hontīti idaṃ yebhuyyavasena
tika-vin01t2:1060_1: vuttaṃ. Kassaci hi attanā adhigatamaggavajjhakilesesu sandeho uppajjatiyeva mahānāmassa
tika-vin01t2:1060_2: sakkassa viya. So hi sakadāgāmī samānopi “tassa mayhaṃ, bhante, evaṃ hoti ‘ko su
tika-vin01t2:1060_3: nāma me dhammo ajjhattaṃ appahīno, yena me ekadā lobhadhammāpi cittaṃ pariyādāya
tika-vin01t2:1060_4: tiṭṭhanti, dosadhammāpi cittaṃ pariyādāya tiṭṭhanti, mohadhammāpi cittaṃ pariyādāya
tika-vin01t2:1060_5: tiṭṭhantī”’ti bhagavantaṃ pucchi. Ayaṃ kira rājā sakadāgāmimaggena lobhadosamohā
tika-vin01t2:1060_6: niravasesā pahīyantīti saññī ahosi. Kiṃ ariyasāvakassa evaṃ sandeho uppajjatīti?
tika-vin01t2:1060_7: Āma uppajjati. Kasmā? Paṇṇattiyaṃ akovidattā. “Ayaṃ kileso asukamaggavajjho”ti imissā
tika-vin01t2:1060_8: paṇṇattiyā akovidassa hi ariyasāvakassa evaṃ hoti. Kiṃ tassa paccavekkhaṇā natthīti?
tika-vin01t2:1060_9: Atthi, sā pana na sabbesaṃ paripuṇṇā hoti. Eko hi pahīnakilesameva paccavekkhati,
tika-vin01t2:1060_10: eko avasiṭṭhakilesameva, eko maggameva, eko phalameva, eko nibbānameva. Imāsu pana
tika-vin01t2:1060_11: pañcasu paccavekkhaṇāsu ekaṃ vā dve vā no laddhuṃ na vaṭṭati. Iti yassa paccavekkhaṇā
tika-vin01t2:1060_12: na paripuṇṇā, tassa maggavajjhakilesapaṇṇattiyaṃ akovidattā evaṃ hoti. Uggahaparipucchākusalāti
tika-vin01t2:1061_0: Yāya paṭipadāya yassa ariyamaggo āgacchati, sā pubbabhāgapaṭipatti āgamanapaṭipadā.
tika-vin01t2:1061_1: Sodhetabbāti suddhā udāhu na suddhāti vicāraṇavasena sodhetabbā. Na sujjhatīti tattha
tika-vin01t2:1061_2: tattha pamādapaṭipattisabbhāvato. Apanetabboti attano paṭiññāya apanetabbo. “Sujjhatī”ti
tika-vin01t2:1061_3: vatvā sujjhanākāraṃ dassetuṃ “dīgharatta”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Paññāyatīti etthāpi “yadī”ti
tika-vin01t2:1061_4: padaṃ ānetvā yadi so bhikkhu tāya paṭipadāya paññāyatīti sambandho. Catūsu paccayesu
tika-vin01t2:1061_5: alaggattā “ākāse pāṇisamena cetasā”ti vuttaṃ. Vuttasadisanti tassa bhikkhuno byākaraṇaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1061_6: imasmiṃ sutte vuttena sadisaṃ, samanti attho.
tika-vin01t2:1062_0: Khīṇāsavapaṭipattisadisā paṭipadā hotīti dīgharattaṃ suvikkhambhitakilesattā. Khīṇāsavassa
tika-vin01t2:1062_1: nāma…pe… na hotīti pahīnavipallāsattā jīvitanikantiyā ca abhāvato na hoti. Puthujjanassa
tika-vin01t2:1062_2: pana appahīnavipallāsattā jīvitanikantisabbhāvato ca appamattakenapi hoti.
tika-vin01t2:1063_0: Tatrimāni vatthūni – dīghabhāṇakaabhayatthero kira ekaṃ piṇḍapātikaṃ pariggahetuṃ
tika-vin01t2:1063_1: asakkonto daharassa saññaṃ adāsi. So taṃ nahāyamānaṃ kalyāṇīnadīmukhadvāre nimujjitvā
tika-vin01t2:1063_2: pāde aggahesi. Piṇḍapātiko “kumbhīlo”ti saññāya mahāsaddaṃ akāsi, tadā naṃ “puthujjano”ti
tika-vin01t2:1063_3: jāniṃsu. Candamukhatissarājakāle pana mahāvihāre saṅghatthero khīṇāsavo dubbalacakkhuko
tika-vin01t2:1063_4: vihāreyeva acchati. Taṃ rājā “theraṃ pariggaṇhissāmī”ti bhikkhūsu bhikkhācāraṃ gatesu
tika-vin01t2:1063_5: appasaddo upasaṅkamitvā sappo viya pāde aggahesi. Thero silāthambho viya niccalo
tika-vin01t2:1063_6: hutvā “ko etthā”ti āha. Ahaṃ, bhante, tissoti. Sugandhaṃ vāyasi no tissāti. Evaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1063_7: khīṇāsavassa bhayaṃ nāma natthi. Ekacco pana puthujjanopi atisūro hoti nibbhayo,
tika-vin01t2:1063_8: so rajanīyena ārammaṇena pariggaṇhitabbo. Vasabharājāpi hi ekaṃ theraṃ pariggaṇhamāno
tika-vin01t2:1063_9: ghare nisīdāpetvā tassa santike badarasāḷavaṃ maddamāno nisīdi. Mahātherassa kheḷo
tika-vin01t2:1063_10: calito, therassa puthujjanabhāvo āvibhūto. Khīṇāsavassa hi rasataṇhā nāma suppahīnā,
tika-vin01t2:1063_11: dibbesupi rasesu nikanti nāma na hoti. Tasmā imehi upāyehi pariggahetvā sacassa bhayaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1063_12: vā chambhitattaṃ vā rasataṇhā vā uppajjati, “na tvaṃ arahā”ti apanetabbo.
tika-vin01t2:1064_0: Asantaguṇasambhāvanalakkhaṇā pāpicchāti āha – “yā sā idhekacco…pe… ādinā nayenā”ti.
tika-vin01t2:1064_1: Ādi-saddena “assaddho samāno ‘saddhoti maṃ jano jānātū’ti icchati, appassutova samāno
tika-vin01t2:1064_2: ‘bahussutoti maṃ jano jānātū’ti icchati, saṅgaṇikārāmova samāno ‘pavivittoti maṃ
tika-vin01t2:1064_3: jano jānātū’ti icchati, kusītova samāno ‘āraddhavīriyoti maṃ jano jānātū’ti icchati,
tika-vin01t2:1064_4: muṭṭhassatīva samāno ‘upaṭṭhitassatīti maṃ jano jānātū’ti icchati, asamāhitova samāno
tika-vin01t2:1064_5: ‘samāhitoti maṃ jano jānātū’ti icchati, duppaññova samāno ‘paññavāti maṃ jano jānātū’ti
tika-vin01t2:1064_6: icchati, akhīṇāsavova samāno ‘khīṇāsavoti maṃ jano jānātū’ti icchati, yā evarūpā
tika-vin01t2:1064_7: icchā icchāgatā pāpicchatā rāgo sārāgo cittassa sārāgo, ayaṃ vuccati pāpicchatā”ti
tika-vin01t2:1064_8: evaṃ vuttaṃ pāḷipadesaṃ saṅgaṇhāti. Pāpikāyāti lāmikāya icchāya. Apakatoti pāpikāya
tika-vin01t2:1064_9: icchāya sammāājīvato apeto katoti icchāya apakato. Tathābhūto ca micchājīvena abhibhūto
tika-vin01t2:1065_0: Sāmaññaṃ dupparāmaṭṭhaṃ nirayāyupakaḍḍhatīti yathā kuso yena duggahito, tassa hatthaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1065_1: anukantati phāleti, evameva samaṇadhammasaṅkhātaṃ sāmaññampi khaṇḍasīlāditāya dupparāmaṭṭhaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1065_2: nirayāya upakaḍḍhati, niraye nibbattāpetīti attho. Sithiloti olīyitvā karaṇena sithilaggāhena
tika-vin01t2:1065_3: kato. Paribbājoti khaṇḍādibhāvappatto samaṇadhammo. Bhiyyo ākirate rajanti abbhantare
tika-vin01t2:1065_4: vijjamānaṃ rāgarajādiṃ evarūpo samaṇadhammo apanetuṃ na sakkoti, atha kho tassa upari
tika-vin01t2:1065_5: aparampi rāgarajādiṃ ākiratīti attho. Bhikkhubhāvoti pārājikaṃ āpajjitvā “samaṇo
tika-vin01t2:1065_6: aha”nti paṭijānanato vohāramattasiddho bhikkhubhāvo. Ajānamevāti pāṭhe evāti avadhāraṇatthe
tika-vin01t2:1065_7: nipāto. Ajānamevanti pāṭhe pana evaṃ jānāmi evaṃ passāmīti avacanti yojetabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1067_2: hotīti veditabbaṃ. Vimokkhoti ettha vi-saddo visesattho vividhattho vāti dassento
tika-vin01t2:1067_3: āha “suṭṭhu mutto”tiādi. Vimokkhoti cattāro ariyamaggā. Tassa saguṇato suññatādināmalābhaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1067_4: dassento āha “so panāya” ntiādi. Maggo hi nāma pañcahi kāraṇehi nāmaṃ labhati sarasena
tika-vin01t2:1067_5: vā paccanīkena vā saguṇena vā ārammaṇena vā āgamanena vā. Sace hi saṅkhārupekkhā
tika-vin01t2:1067_6: aniccato saṅkhāre sammasitvā vuṭṭhāti, animittavimokkhena vimuccati, sace dukkhato
tika-vin01t2:1067_7: sammasitvā vuṭṭhāti, appaṇihitavimokkhena vimuccati, sace anattato sammasitvā vuṭṭhāti,
tika-vin01t2:1067_8: suññatavimokkhena vimuccati, idaṃ sarasato nāmaṃ nāma. Yasmā panesa aniccānupassanāya
tika-vin01t2:1067_10: āgato, tasmā animitto. Dukkhānupassanāya pana sukhasaññaṃ pahāya paṇidhiṃ patthanaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1067_11: sukkhāpetvā āgatattā appaṇihito. Anattānupassanāya attasattapuggalasaññaṃ pahāya
tika-vin01t2:1067_12: saṅkhārānaṃ suññato diṭṭhattā suññatoti idaṃ paccanīkato nāmaṃ nāma.
tika-vin01t2:1068_0: Rāgādīhi panesa suññatattā suññato. Rūpanimittādīnaṃ rāganimittādīnaṃyeva vā abhāvena
tika-vin01t2:1068_1: animitto. Rāgādipaṇidhiādīnaṃ abhāvato appaṇihitoti idamassa saguṇato nāmaṃ. Svāyaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1068_2: suññataṃ animittaṃ appaṇihitañca nibbānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ karotīti suññato animitto appaṇihitoti
tika-vin01t2:1068_3: vuccati, idamassa ārammaṇato nāmaṃ. Āgamanaṃ pana duvidhaṃ vipassanāgamanaṃ maggāgamanañca.
tika-vin01t2:1068_4: Tattha magge vipassanāgamanaṃ labbhati, phale maggāgamanaṃ. Anattānupassanā hi suññatā
tika-vin01t2:1068_5: nāma, suññatavipassanāya maggo suññato. Aniccānupassanā animittā nāma, animittavipassanāya
tika-vin01t2:1068_6: maggo animitto. Idaṃ pana nāmaṃ na abhidhammapariyāyena labbhati. Tathā hi taṃ saṅkhāranimittassa
tika-vin01t2:1068_7: avijahanato na nippariyāyena animittaṃ, suttantapariyāyena pana labbhati. Tatra hi
tika-vin01t2:1068_8: gotrabhuñāṇaṃ animittaṃ nibbānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā animittanāmakaṃ hutvā sayaṃ āgamaniyaṭṭhāne
tika-vin01t2:1068_9: ṭhatvā maggassa nāmaṃ detīti vadanti, tena maggo animittoti vutto. Maggāgamanena
tika-vin01t2:1068_10: pana phalaṃ animittanti yujjatiyeva. Dukkhānupassanā saṅkhāresu paṇidhiṃ sukkhāpetvā
tika-vin01t2:1068_11: āgatattā appaṇihitā nāma, appaṇihitavipassanāya maggo appaṇihito, appaṇihitamaggassa
tika-vin01t2:1068_12: phalaṃ appaṇihitaṃ. Evaṃ vipassanā attano nāmaṃ maggassa deti, maggo phalassāti idaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1068_13: āgamanato nāmaṃ. Suññattāti vivittattā. Na hi magge rāgādayo santi, uparūpari uppajjanakarāgādīnaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1068_14: kāraṇattā rāgādayo nimittanti āha “rāgadosamohanimittehī”ti. Saviggahānaṃ viya upaṭṭhānampettha
tika-vin01t2:1068_15: nimittanti vadanti. Rāgādayova pavattiṭṭhānaṭṭhena paṇidhīti āha “rāgadosamohapaṇidhīna”nti.
tika-vin01t2:1069_0: Vatthuvijjādiṃ sandhāya avacanato “vijjānaṃ lābhīmhī”ti vuttepi hoti. Ekekakoṭṭhāsavasenāti
tika-vin01t2:1069_2: dassitaṃ, tattha pana “lokuttarānaṃ satipaṭṭhānāna”ntiādinā paccekaṃ lokuttara-saddaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1069_3: yojetvā ekekakoṭṭhāsavaseneva vuttaṃ, idha lokuttara-saddena vināti ayamettha viseso.
tika-vin01t2:1070_0: Nanu ca “kilesappahānamevā”ti kasmā vuttaṃ. Na hi kilesānaṃ pahānamattaṃ uttarimanussadhammo
tika-vin01t2:1070_1: hotīti yo vadeyya, taṃ sandhāya kilesappahānassa maggakiccattā kiccavasena maggo
tika-vin01t2:1070_2: dīpitoti dassetuṃ “taṃ panā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Kāmarāgaṃ sandhāya “tatiyamaggena hi rāgadosānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1070_3: pahāna”nti vuttaṃ, na pana rūparāgaarūparāge sandhāya. Na hi te tena pahīyanti catutthamaggena pahātabbattā.
tika-vin01t2:1071_0: Rāgā cittaṃ vinīvaraṇatāti rāgā cittassa vinīvaraṇatāti vuttaṃ hoti. Rāgā vimuttassa
tika-vin01t2:1071_1: cittassa tasseva rāganīvaraṇassa abhāvena vigatanīvaraṇattā vinīvaraṇatāti attho
tika-vin01t2:1072_0: Yā ca pañca vijjāti yojetabbaṃ. Nibbaṭṭitalokuttarattāti visuṃyeva lokato apagatalokuttarattā.
tika-vin01t2:1072_1: Yathā vinā lokuttara-saddena “satipaṭṭhānādīnaṃ lābhīmhī”ti vuttepi pārājikaṃ hoti,
tika-vin01t2:1072_2: evamidhāpi “atthapaṭisambhidāya lābhīmhīti vuttepi hotiyevā”ti vattuṃ yujjati. Kiñcāpi
tika-vin01t2:1072_3: yujjati, atha kho mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vibhāgena vuttattā na sakkā evamidaṃ vattunti
tika-vin01t2:1072_4: dassetuṃ “mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana…pe… na sakkā aññaṃ pamāṇaṃ kātu”nti vuttaṃ. Tampi
tika-vin01t2:1074_1: āpatti thullaccayassā”tiādiāpattibhedaṃ. Puna ānetvā paṭhamajjhānādīhi na yojitanti
tika-vin01t2:1074_2: ettha “paṭhamajjhānenā”ti pāṭhoti gaṇṭhipade vuttaṃ, tadeva yuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1075_0: Kattusādhanopi bhaṇita-saddo hotīti āha “atha vā”tiādi. Yena cittena musā bhaṇati,
tika-vin01t2:1075_1: teneva cittena na sakkā “musā bhaṇāmī”ti jānituṃ, antarantarā pana aññena cittena
tika-vin01t2:1075_2: “musā bhaṇāmī”ti jānātīti vuttaṃ “bhaṇantassa hoti musā bhaṇāmī”ti. Ayamettha attho
tika-vin01t2:1075_3: dassitoti tīhi aṅgehi samannāgato musāvādoti ayamettha attho dassito. Na sakkā na
tika-vin01t2:1075_4: bhavitunti pubbabhāgato paṭṭhāya ābhogaṃ katvā bhaṇitattā na sakkā na bhavituṃ. Āpattiyā
tika-vin01t2:1075_5: na kāretabboti pubbabhāgakkhaṇe “musā bhaṇissāmī”ti ābhogaṃ vinā sahasā bhaṇantassa
tika-vin01t2:1075_6: vacanakkhaṇe “musā eta”nti upaṭṭhitepi nivattetumasakkuṇeyyatāya avisayabhāvato āpattiyā
tika-vin01t2:1075_7: na kāretabbo. Davāti sahasā. Ravāti aññaṃ vattukāmassa khalitvā aññabhaṇanaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1076_0: Taṃ jānātīti taṃñāṇaṃ, tassa bhāvo taṃñāṇatā, ñāṇassa atthasaṃvedananti attho. Ñāṇasamodhānanti
tika-vin01t2:1076_1: ñāṇassa bahubhāvo, ekacittuppāde anekañāṇatāti attho. Na hi sakkā…pe… jānitunti ārammaṇakaraṇassa
tika-vin01t2:1076_2: abhāvato vuttaṃ. Asammohāvabodho ca īdisassa ñāṇassa natthi, “bhaṇissāmī”ti pavattacittaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1076_3: “bhaṇāmī”ti pavattacittassa paccayo hutvā nirujjhati, tañca “bhaṇita”nti pavattacittassa
tika-vin01t2:1076_4: paccayo hutvāti āha – “purimaṃ purimaṃ pana…pe… nirujjhatī”ti. Tasmiṃ pubbabhāge
tika-vin01t2:1076_5: sati “sesadvayaṃ na hessatī”ti etaṃ natthi, avassaṃ hotiyevāti vuttaṃ hoti, bhaṇissāmīti
tika-vin01t2:1076_6: pubbabhāge sati “bhaṇāmi bhaṇita”nti etaṃ dvayaṃ na na hoti, hotiyevāti adhippāyo.
tika-vin01t2:1076_7: Ekaṃ viya pakāsatīti anekakkhaṇe uppannampi cittaṃ ekakkhaṇe uppannasadisaṃ hutvā
tika-vin01t2:1076_8: pakāsati. Samāpajjintiādīnīti ādi-saddena samāpajjāmi, samāpannoti imāni dve saṅgaṇhāti.
tika-vin01t2:1076_9: Tattha samāpajjiṃ, samāpannoti imesaṃ asatipi kālanānatte vacanavisesaṃ sandhāya visuṃ gahaṇaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1077_1: pubbe viya “sarāgo sadoso”ti vattabbatābhāvato cattampi keci gaṇhanti, nayidamevanti
tika-vin01t2:1077_2: dassanatthaṃ “vanto”ti vuttaṃ. Na hi yaṃ yena vantaṃ, so puna taṃ ādiyati. Tenāha
tika-vin01t2:1077_4: dassanatthaṃ “mutto”ti vuttaṃ. Tenāha “santatito vimocanavasenā”ti. Muttampi kiñci
tika-vin01t2:1077_5: muttabandhanaṃ viya phalaṃ kuhiñci tiṭṭhati, na evamidanti dassanatthaṃ “pahīno”ti
tika-vin01t2:1077_6: vuttaṃ. Tenāha “kvaci anavaṭṭhānadassanavasenā”ti. Yathā kiñci dunnissaṭṭhaṃ puna
tika-vin01t2:1077_7: ādāya sammadeva nissaṭṭhaṃ paṭinissaṭṭhanti vuccati, evaṃ vipassanāya nissaṭṭhaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1077_8: ādinnasadisaṃ maggena pahīnaṃ paṭinissaṭṭhaṃ nāma hotīti dassanatthaṃ “paṭinissaṭṭho”ti
tika-vin01t2:1077_10: uttāsetvā palāpitoti vuttaṃ hoti. Yo ca uttāsetvā palāpito, na puna so taṃ ṭhānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1077_11: āgacchatīti āha “puna anallīyanabhāvadassanavasenā”ti, puna āgantvā santāne anuppattibhāvadassanavasenāti
tika-vin01t2:1077_12: attho. Khiṭa-saddaṃ saddasatthavidū uttāsatthe paṭhantīti āha – “svāyamattho saddasatthato
tika-vin01t2:1077_13: pariyesitabbo”ti. Aṇuyeva aṇusahagataṃ, atikhuddakanti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin01t2:1080_0: 215. Kevalañhiyanti kevalañhi ayaṃ. “Vāro”ti ajjhāharitabbaṃ. Taṅkhaṇaññeva jānātīti
tika-vin01t2:1080_2: sandhāya vuttaṃ. Evaṃ pana vacībhedaṃ akatvā pakkamanādīsu aññataro bhikkhu “maṃ
tika-vin01t2:1080_3: arahāti jānātū”ti tamhā āvāsā paṭhamaṃ pakkamatīti āgatavatthumhi viya tasmiṃ khaṇe
tika-vin01t2:1080_4: aviditepi nikkhantamatte pārājikaṃ. Jānanalakkhaṇanti “taṅkhaṇe jānanaṃ nāma īdisa”nti
tika-vin01t2:1080_5: vuttalakkhaṇaṃ. Viññattipatheti kāyavacīviññattīnaṃ gahaṇayogge padese, pakaticakkhunā
tika-vin01t2:1080_6: pakatisotena ca daṭṭhuṃ sotuñca arahaṭṭhāneti vuttaṃ hoti. Tena viññattipathaṃ atikkamitvā
tika-vin01t2:1080_7: ṭhito ce koci dibbena cakkhunā dibbāya ca sotadhātuyā disvā sutvā ca jānāti, na pārājikanti
tika-vin01t2:1080_9: vuttaṃ. Paṭhamaṃ vacanamattaṃ assutapubbenapi “paṭhamajjhānaṃ samāpajji”nti vutte
tika-vin01t2:1080_10: “kimida”nti sandehaṃ anuppādetvā “jhānaṃ nāma kiresa samāpajjī”ti ettakamattepi ñāte pārājikaṃ hotiyeva.
tika-vin01t2:1082_1: asallakkhentassāti adhippāyo. Sarūpato pana “anāpatti bhikkhu anullapanādhippāyassā”ti
tika-vin01t2:1082_2: vinītavatthūsu tattha tattha āgatavatthuvasena veditabbo. “Uttarimanussadhammo aya”nti
tika-vin01t2:1082_3: asallakkhetvā vadantopi vohārato aññaṃ byākaronto nāma hotīti vuttaṃ “aññaṃ byākarontassā”ti.
tika-vin01t2:1084: Bhāyantopīti “imassa mayi natthibhāvaṃ aññepi jānantā atthi nu kho”ti bhāyantopi.
tika-vin01t2:1086: 223. Sekkhabhūmiyanti iminā jhānabhūmimpi saṅgaṇhāti. Tiṇṇaṃ vivekānanti kāyacittaupadhivivekānaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1087: Piṇḍāya caraṇassa bhojanapariyosānattā vuttaṃ “yāva bhojanapariyosāna”nti. Bhutvā āgacchantassapi puna vuttanayeneva sambhāvanicchāya cīvarasaṇṭhapanādīni karontassa dukkaṭameva.
tika-vin01t2:1088_0: 225. Ārādhanīyo, āvuso, dhammo āraddhavīriyenāti vatthudvayaṃ ekasadisampi dvīhi
tika-vin01t2:1088_1: bhikkhūhi visuṃ visuṃ ārocitattā bhagavatā vinicchinitaṃ sabbampi vinītavatthūsu
tika-vin01t2:1089_0: 226. Pasādabhaññanti kevalaṃ pasādamattena bhaṇanaṃ, na pana “sabhāvato ete arahantoyevā”ti
tika-vin01t2:1089_1: cintetvā. Tenevettha anāpatti vuttā. Yadi pana “ete sabhāvato arahantoyevā”ti maññamāno
tika-vin01t2:1090_0: 227. Padasā gamanaṃ sandhāya katikāya katattā “yānena vā”tiādimāha. Tattha vijjāmayiddhiṃ
tika-vin01t2:1090_1: sandhāya “iddhiyā”ti vuttaṃ. Aññamaññaṃ rakkhantīti “yo imamhā āvāsā paṭhamaṃ pakkamissati,
tika-vin01t2:1090_2: taṃ mayaṃ ‘arahā’ti jānissāmā”ti evaṃ katikāya katattā apubbācarimaṃ asuddhacittena
tika-vin01t2:1090_3: gacchantāpi saha nikkhantabhāvato aññamaññaṃ rakkhanti. Keci pana “hatthapāsaṃ avijahitvā
tika-vin01t2:1090_4: aññamaññassa hatthaṃ gaṇhanto viya gacchantopi ‘uṭṭhetha gacchāma, etha gacchāmā’ti
tika-vin01t2:1090_5: evaṃ saṃvidahitvā gamane pubbāparaṃ gacchantopi nāpajjatī”ti vadanti. Etaṃ pana adhammikaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1090_6: katikavattanti “idha arahantoyeva vasantūti yadi bhikkhū katikaṃ karonti, etaṃ adhammikaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1090_7: katikavatta”nti cūḷagaṇṭhipade vuttaṃ. Heṭṭhā vuttaṃ pana sabbampi katikavattaṃ sandhāya
tika-vin01t2:1090_8: etaṃ vuttanti amhākaṃ khanti, vīmaṃsitvā gahetabbaṃ. Nānāverajjakāti nānājanapadavāsino.
tika-vin01t2:1090_9: Saṅghalābhoti yathāvuḍḍhaṃ attano pāpuṇanakoṭṭhāso. Ayañca paṭikkhepo imināva nīhārena
tika-vin01t2:1090_10: bahisīmaṭṭhānaṃ avisesena saṅghalābhassa sāmibhāvāpādanaṃ sandhāya kato. Visesato
tika-vin01t2:1090_11: pana bahisīmaṭṭhānampi paricchinditvā ekekakoṭṭhāsato “ettakaṃ dātuṃ, īdisaṃ vā dātuṃ,
tika-vin01t2:1090_12: ettakānaṃ vā dātuṃ, īdisassa vā dātuṃ ruccati saṅghassā”ti apalokanakammaṃ katvā dātuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin01t2:1091_0: 228. Āyasmā ca lakkhaṇotiādīsu ko panāyasmā lakkhaṇo, kasmā cassa lakkhaṇoti nāmaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1091_1: ahosi, ko cāyasmā mahāmoggallāno, kasmā ca sitaṃ pātvākāsīti taṃ sabbaṃ pakāsetuṃ
tika-vin01t2:1091_3: brahmattabhāvasamena. Īsakaṃ hasitaṃ sitanti vuccatīti āha “mandahasita”nti. Aṭṭhikasaṅkhalikanti
tika-vin01t2:1091_4: nayidaṃ aviññāṇakaṃ aṭṭhisaṅkhalikamattaṃ, atha kho eko petoti āha “petaloke nibbattaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1091_5: satta”nti. Ete attabhāvāti petattabhāvā. Na āpāthaṃ āgacchantīti devattabhāvā viya
tika-vin01t2:1091_6: pakatiyā āpāthaṃ na āgacchanti. Tesaṃ pana ruciyā āpāthaṃ āgaccheyyuṃ. Manussānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1091_8: Attano ca sampattiṃ buddhañāṇassa ca sampattinti paccekaṃ sampatti-saddo yojetabbo.
tika-vin01t2:1091_9: Tadubhayaṃ vibhāvetuṃ “tañhī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha “attano ca sampattiṃ anussaritvā
tika-vin01t2:1091_10: sitaṃ pātvākāsī”ti padaṃ ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ. Dhammadhātūti sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ sandhāya
tika-vin01t2:1091_11: vadati, dhammadhātūti vā dhammānaṃ sabhāvo. Upapattīti jāti. Upapattisīsena hi tathārūpaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1091_12: attabhāvaṃ vadati. Dussaddhāpayā honti, tadassa tesaṃ dīgharattaṃ ahitāya dukkhāya.
tika-vin01t2:1091_13: Dussaddhāpayāti idañca na lakkhaṇattheraṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, ye pana suṇanti “evaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1091_14: kira vutta”nti, te sandhāya. Atha lakkhaṇatthero kasmā na addasa, kimassa dibbacakkhu
tika-vin01t2:1091_15: natthīti? No natthi, mahāmoggallāno pana āvajjento addasa, itaro anāvajjanena na addasa.
tika-vin01t2:1092_0: Vituḍentīti vinivijjhitvā ḍenti, asidhārūpamehi tikhiṇehi lohatuṇḍakehi vijjhitvā
tika-vin01t2:1092_1: vijjhitvā ito cito ca gacchantīti attho. Tenāha “vinivijjhitvā gacchantī”ti. “Vitudantī”ti
tika-vin01t2:1092_2: vā pāṭho. Phāsuḷantarikāhīti bhummatthe nissakkavacanaṃ. Lohatuṇḍakehīti lohasalākāsadisehi,
tika-vin01t2:1092_3: kāḷalohamayeheva vā tuṇḍakehi. Pasādussadāti iminā aṭṭhisaṅghātamattaṃ hutvā paññāyamānānampi
tika-vin01t2:1092_4: kāyappasādassa balavabhāvaṃ dasseti. Pakkagaṇḍasadisāti iminā pana ativiya mudusabhāvataṃ
tika-vin01t2:1093_0: Cakkhubhūtāti sampattadibbacakkhukā, lokassa cakkhubhūtāti evaṃ vā ettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin01t2:1093_1: Yatrāti hetuatthe nipātoti āha “yatrāti kāraṇavacana”nti. Appamāṇe sattanikāye, te
tika-vin01t2:1093_2: ca kho vibhāgena kāmabhavādibhede bhave, nirayādibhedā gatiyo, nānattakāyanānattasaññīādiviññāṇaṭṭhitiyo,
tika-vin01t2:1093_3: tathārūpe sattāvāse ca sabbaññutaññāṇañca me upanetuṃ paccakkhaṃ karontena.
tika-vin01t2:1094_0: Goghātakoti gunnaṃ abhiṇhaṃ hananako. Tenāha “vadhitvā vadhitvā”ti. Tassāti gunnaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1094_2: vipāke dīyamāne aladdhokāsaṃ aparāpariyavedanīyaṃ, tasmiṃ vipakkavipāke idāni laddhokāsaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1094_4: Ārammaṇasabhāgatāyāti ārammaṇassa sabhāgabhāvena sadisabhāvena. Yādise hi ārammaṇe
tika-vin01t2:1094_5: pubbe taṃ kammaṃ tassa ca vipāko pavatto, tādiseyeva ārammaṇe idaṃ kammaṃ imassa
tika-vin01t2:1094_6: vipāko ca pavattoti katvā vuttaṃ “tasseva kammassa vipākāvasesenā”ti. Bhavati hi
tika-vin01t2:1094_7: taṃsadisepi tabbohāro yathā so eva tittiro, tāniyeva osadhānīti. Yasmā kammasarikkhakavisaye
tika-vin01t2:1094_8: “kammaṃ vā kammanimittaṃ vā”ti dvayameva vuttaṃ, yasmā ca gatinimittaṃ viya kammaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1094_9: kammanimittañca kammato bhinnaṃ visuṃ hutvā na tiṭṭhati, tasmā sarikkhakavipākadānassa
tika-vin01t2:1094_10: kāraṇabhāvato yattha kammasarikkhakena vipākena bhavitabbaṃ, tattha kammaṃ vā kammanimittaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1094_11: vā gahetvā paṭisandhi hotīti vadanti. Tenevāha – “tassa kira…pe… nimittaṃ ahosī”ti.
tika-vin01t2:1094_12: Tattha nimittaṃ ahosīti pubbe katūpacitassa petūpapattinibbattanavasena katokāsassa
tika-vin01t2:1094_13: tassa kammassa nimittabhūtaṃ idāni tathā upaṭṭhahantaṃ tassa vipākassa nimittaṃ ārammaṇaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1094_14: ahosi. Soti goghātako. Aṭṭhikasaṅkhalikapeto jāto kammasarikkhakavipākavasena.
tika-vin01t2:1095_0: 229. Pesiyo katvāti gāviṃ vadhitvā vadhitvā gomaṃsaṃ phāletvā pesiyo katvā. Sukkhāpetvāti
tika-vin01t2:1095_1: kālantaraṃ ṭhapanatthaṃ sukkhāpetvā. Sukkhāpitamaṃsapesīnañhi vallūrasamaññāti. Nippakkhacammeti
tika-vin01t2:1095_2: vigatapakkhacamme. Urabbhe hantīti orabbhiko. Eḷaketi aje. Nivāpapuṭṭheti attanā
tika-vin01t2:1095_3: dinnanivāpena posite asinā vadhitvā vadhitvā vikkiṇanto. Ekaṃ miganti dīpakamigaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1095_4: Kāraṇāhīti yātanāhi. Ñatvāti kammaṭṭhānaṃ ñatvā. Pesuññupasaṃhāravasena ito sutaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1095_5: amutra, amutra vā sutaṃ idha sūcetīti sūcako. Anayabyasanaṃ pāpesi manusseti sambandho.
tika-vin01t2:1096_0: Vinicchayāmaccoti raññā aḍḍakaraṇe ṭhapito vinicchayamahāmatto. So hi gāmajanakāyaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1096_1: kūṭaṭṭhena vañcetīti “gāmakūṭo”ti vuccati. Keci “tādisoyeva gāmajeṭṭhako gāmakūṭo”ti
tika-vin01t2:1096_2: vadanti. Samena bhavitabbaṃ dhammaṭṭhoti vattabbato. Rahassaṅge nisīdanavasena visamā
tika-vin01t2:1097_0: 230. Anissaroti mātugāmo sasāmiko attano phasse anissaro. Dhaṃsitvāti bhassitvā apagantvā.
tika-vin01t2:1097_1: Maṅganavasena ulatīti maṅguli, virūpabībhacchabhāvena pavattatīti attho. Tenāha “virūpaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1098_0: Uddhaṃ uddhaṃ agginā pakkasarīratāya uppakkaṃ, heṭṭhato paggharaṇavasena kilinnasarīratāya
tika-vin01t2:1098_1: okilinī, ito cito ca aṅgārasamparikiṇṇatāya okirinī. Tenāha “sā kirā”tiādi. Aṅgāracitaketi
tika-vin01t2:1098_2: aṅgārasañcaye. Sarīrato paggharanti asuciduggandhajegucchāni sedagatāni. Tassa kira
tika-vin01t2:1098_3: raññoti kāliṅgassa rañño. Nāṭakinīti naccanakicce adhigatā itthī. Sedanti sedanaṃ, tāpananti attho.
tika-vin01t2:1099_0: Asīsakaṃ kabandhaṃ hutvā nibbatti kammāyūhanakāle tathā nimittaggahaṇaparicayato.
tika-vin01t2:1099_1: Lāmakabhikkhūti hīnācāratāya lāmako, bhikkhuvesatāya bhikkhāhārena jīvanato ca bhikkhu.
tika-vin01t2:1099_2: Cittakeḷinti cittaruciyaṃ taṃ taṃ kīḷanto. Ayamevāti bhikkhuvatthusmiṃ vuttanayo eva.
tika-vin01t2:1100_1: udakapiṭṭhaṃ chādetvā nibbattapaṇakena kaddamena ca virahito. Sundarehi titthehīti
tika-vin01t2:1100_2: sukhāvagāhaṇaṭṭhānatāya kaddamādidosavirahato ca sundarehi titthehi. Tato udakadahato
tika-vin01t2:1100_3: taṃhetu, taṃ upanissāyāti attho. Nāgabhavanagatopi hi so rahado tato uparimanussaloke
tika-vin01t2:1100_4: jalāsayena sambandho hoti. Tena vuttaṃ “tato ayaṃ tapodā sandatī”ti. Atha vā tatoti
tika-vin01t2:1100_5: nāgabhavane udakadahato ayaṃ tapodā sandati. Tañhi uparibhūmitalaṃ ārohati, uṇhabhāvena
tika-vin01t2:1100_6: tapanato tapaṃ udakaṃ etissāti anvatthanāmavasena tapodāti vuccati. Petalokoti petānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1100_7: āvāsaṭṭhānaṃ. Keci pana “petalokoti lohakumbhīnirayā idhādhippetā”ti vadanti, nagarassa
tika-vin01t2:1100_8: pana parito pabbatapādavanantaresu bahū petāvāsāpi santeva. Svāyamattho petavatthupāḷiyā
tika-vin01t2:1101_0: Katahatthāti thirataraṃ lakkhesu avirajjhanasarakkhepā. Īdisā pana tattha vasībhūtā
tika-vin01t2:1101_1: katahatthā nāma honti, tasmā yo sippameva uggaṇhāti, so katahattho nāma na hoti,
tika-vin01t2:1101_2: ime pana katahatthā, ciṇṇavasībhāvāti vuttaṃ hoti. Sippadassanavasena kataṃ rājakulāni
tika-vin01t2:1101_3: upecca asanaṃ sarakkhepo etehīti katupāsanā, rājakulādīsu dassitasippāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin01t2:1102_0: 232. Dosadassana pubbaka rūpa virāga bhāvanā saṅkhāta paṭipakkha bhāvanāvasena paṭighasaññānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1102_1: suppahīnattā mahatāpi saddena arūpasamāpattito na vuṭṭhāti, tathā pana na suppahīnattā
tika-vin01t2:1102_2: sabbarūpāvacarasamāpattito vuṭṭhānaṃ siyāti idha āneñjasamādhīti catutthajjhānasamāpatti
tika-vin01t2:1102_4: Aññattha pana samādhipaccanīkānaṃ atidūratāya na iñjatīti āneñjoti arūpāvacarasamādhi
tika-vin01t2:1102_5: vuccati. Samādhiparipanthake dhammeti vitakkavicārādike sandhāya vadati. Vitakkādīsu
tika-vin01t2:1102_6: ādīnavasallakkhaṇassa na suṭṭhukatabhāvaṃ sandhāyāha “na suṭṭhu parisodhetvā”ti.
tika-vin01t2:1103_0: Nanu cāyamāyasmā mahāmoggallāno bhagavato paṭhamavasseva abhinavappattaarahatto,
tika-vin01t2:1103_1: idañca uttarimanussadhammapārājikaṃ vīsatimavassato upari paññattaṃ, kathaṃ imassa
tika-vin01t2:1103_2: vatthuno imasmiṃ pārājike bhagavatā vinicchitabhāvo vuttoti? Nāyaṃ doso. Ayañhettha
tika-vin01t2:1103_3: ācariyānaṃ kathāmaggo – apaññattepi sikkhāpade therassa vacanaṃ sutvā “attano appatirūpaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1103_4: uttarimanussadhammaṃ esa vadatī”ti maññamānā bhikkhū therassa dosaṃ āropentā ujjhāyiṃsu.
tika-vin01t2:1103_5: Bhagavā ca therassa tathāvacane kāraṇaṃ dassetvā niddosabhāvaṃ karonto “anāpatti,
tika-vin01t2:1103_6: bhikkhave, moggallānassā”ti āha. Saṅgītikārakā pana uttarimanussadhammādhikārattā
tika-vin01t2:1104_0: Sāvakānaṃ uppaṭipāṭiyā anussaraṇaṃ natthīti dassetuṃ “na uppaṭipāṭiyā”ti āha. Asaññasamāpattinti
tika-vin01t2:1104_3: gaṇhātīti āha – “tatiye attabhāve cutimeva addasā”ti. Nayato sallakkhesīti vaṭṭe
tika-vin01t2:1104_4: saṃsaraṇakasattānaṃ khandhānaṃ abhāvakālo nāma natthi, asaññabhave pana acittakā
tika-vin01t2:1104_5: hutvā pañca kappasatāni pavattanti, iminā nayena sallakkhesi. Dukkaraṃ katanti khandhavikalassa
tika-vin01t2:1104_6: pubbenivāsassa anussaraṇaṃ ṭhapetvā sammāsambuddhaṃ na sakkā aññehi kātunti nayato
tika-vin01t2:1104_7: sallakkhentenapi dukkaraṃ katanti adhippāyo. Paṭividdhāti paṭividdhasadisā. Yathā
tika-vin01t2:1104_8: nāma koci dhanusippe katahattho ekaṃ kesasaṅkhātaṃ vālaṃ satakkhattuṃ vidāletvā tato
tika-vin01t2:1104_9: ekaṃ aṃsuṃ gahetvā vātiṅgaṇaphalassa majjhaṭṭhāne bandhitvā aparaṃ aṃsuṃ kaṇḍassa
tika-vin01t2:1104_10: aggakoṭiyaṃ yathā tassa aṃsussa ūkāmattaṃ vā likkhāmattaṃ vā kaṇḍassa aggakoṭito
tika-vin01t2:1104_11: adhikaṃ hutvā tiṭṭhati, evaṃ bandhitvā usabhamatte ṭhāne ṭhito kaṇḍabaddhāya vālakoṭiyā
tika-vin01t2:1104_12: vātiṅgaṇabaddhaṃ vālassa koṭiṃ paṭivijjheyya, evameva imināpi kataṃ dukkaranti vuttaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1104_13: hoti. Etadagganti eso aggo. Yadidanti yo ayaṃ. Liṅgavipallāsavasenetaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1107_0: 233. Idhāti imasmiṃ bhikkhuvibhaṅge. Uddiṭṭhāti idha pātimokkhavasena anosāritattā
tika-vin01t2:1107_1: cattāro pārājikāva uddiṭṭhā kathitāti attho gahetabbo. Yadi evaṃ heṭṭhā thullaccayadukkaṭānampi
tika-vin01t2:1107_2: vuttattā pārājikāva uddiṭṭhāti kasmā vuttāti? Pārājikādhikārattā santesupi thullaccayadukkaṭesu
tika-vin01t2:1107_3: idha pārājikāva vuttā. Yesaṃ…pe… asaṃvāsoti imamatthaṃ vā dīpetukāmo taṃsambandhena
tika-vin01t2:1107_4: “uddiṭṭhā cattāro pārājikā”ti āha. Tatthāyasmantetiādikaṃ pana anuññātapātimokkhuddesakkamopi
tika-vin01t2:1107_5: ayameva, nāññoti dassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Bhikkhunīnaṃ asādhāraṇāni cattārīti ubbhajāṇumaṇḍalikā
tika-vin01t2:1107_6: vajjapaṭicchādikā ukkhittānuvattikā aṭṭhavatthukāti imāni cattāri bhikkhunīnaṃ bhikkhūhi
tika-vin01t2:1107_7: asādhāraṇāni nāma. Etesu ubbhajāṇumaṇḍalikā nāma yā kāyasaṃsaggarāgena avassutā teneva
tika-vin01t2:1107_8: rāgena avassutassa manussapurisassa akkhakānaṃ adho jāṇumaṇḍalānaṃ kapparānañca upari
tika-vin01t2:1107_9: yena kenaci sarīrāvayavena āmasanādiṃ sādiyati, tassā adhivacanaṃ. Yā pana bhikkhunī
tika-vin01t2:1107_10: aññissā bhikkhuniyā pārājikasaṅkhātaṃ vajjaṃ jānaṃ paṭicchādeti, sā vajjapaṭicchādikā
tika-vin01t2:1107_11: nāma. Samaggena pana saṅghena ukkhittaṃ bhikkhuṃ yā bhikkhunī yaṃdiṭṭhiko so hoti,
tika-vin01t2:1107_12: tassā diṭṭhiyā gahaṇavasena anuvattati, sā ukkhittānuvattikā nāma. Yā pana kāyasaṃsaggarāgena
tika-vin01t2:1107_13: tintā tathāvidhasseva purisassa hatthaggahaṇaṃ vā saṅghāṭikaṇṇaggahaṇaṃ vā sādiyati,
tika-vin01t2:1107_14: kāyasaṃsaggasaṅkhātassa asaddhammassa paṭisevanatthāya purisassa hatthapāse santiṭṭhati
tika-vin01t2:1107_15: vā, tattha ṭhatvā sallapati vā, saṅketaṃ vā gacchati, purisassa āgamanaṃ vā sādiyati,
tika-vin01t2:1107_16: kenaci vā paṭicchannokāsaṃ pavisati, hatthapāse vā ṭhatvā kāyaṃ upasaṃharati, ayaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1108_0: Vatthuvipannāti pabbajjupasampadāya avatthubhāvato vatthuvipannā. Nesañhi “na, bhikkhave,
tika-vin01t2:1108_1: paṇḍako pabbājetabbo, yo pabbājeyya, āpatti dukkaṭassā”tiādinā pabbajjā upasampadā
tika-vin01t2:1108_2: ca paṭikkhittā. Tasmā te bhikkhubhāvāya abhabbattā pārājikāpannasadisatāya “pārājikā”ti
tika-vin01t2:1108_3: vuttā. Tabbhāvabhāvitāya bhikkhubhāvo vasati etthāti vatthu, puggalānaṃ bhikkhubhāvārahatā.
tika-vin01t2:1108_5: yesaṃ te vatthuvipannā. Ahetukapaṭisandhikāti iminā tesaṃ vipākāvaraṇena samannāgatabhāvaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1108_6: dassento maggāvaraṇe kāraṇamāha. Pārājikāpannasadisattā pārājikā. Theyyasaṃvāsakādikammaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1108_7: mātughātādikaṃ viya ānantariyaṃ na hotīti āha “imesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ saggo avārito”ti.
tika-vin01t2:1109_0: Dīghatāya lambamānaṃ aṅgajātametassāti lambī. So ettāvatā na pārājiko, atha kho yadā
tika-vin01t2:1109_1: anabhiratiyā pīḷito attano aṅgajātaṃ mukhe vā vaccamagge vā paveseti, tadā pārājiko
tika-vin01t2:1109_2: hoti. Mudu piṭṭhi etassāti mudupiṭṭhiko, kataparikammāya mudukāya piṭṭhiyā samannāgato.
tika-vin01t2:1109_3: Sopi yadā anabhiratiyā pīḷito attano aṅgajātaṃ attano mukhavaccamaggesu aññataraṃ
tika-vin01t2:1109_4: paveseti, tadā pārājiko hoti. Parassa aṅgajātaṃ attano mukhena gaṇhātīti yo anabhiratiyā
tika-vin01t2:1109_5: pīḷito parassa suttassa vā pamattassa vā aṅgajātaṃ attano mukhena gaṇhāti. Parassa
tika-vin01t2:1109_6: aṅgajāte abhinisīdatīti yo anabhiratiyā pīḷito parassa aṅgajātaṃ kammaniyaṃ disvā
tika-vin01t2:1109_7: attano vaccamaggena tassūpari nisīdati, taṃ attano vaccamaggaṃ pavesetīti attho.
tika-vin01t2:1110_1: lambīādayo cattāro paṭhamapārājikaṃ āpannā evāti kathaṃ catuvīsatīti? Vuccate – mātughātakādayo
tika-vin01t2:1110_2: hi cattāro idha anupasampannā eva adhippetā, lambīādayo cattāro kiñcāpi paṭhamapārājikena
tika-vin01t2:1110_3: saṅgahitā, yasmā pana etena pariyāyena methunaṃ dhammaṃ appaṭisevino honti, tasmā
tika-vin01t2:1110_4: visuṃ vuttāti. Etena pariyāyenāti ubhinnaṃ rāgapariyuṭṭhānasaṅkhātena pariyāyena.
tika-vin01t2:1110_5: Dutiyavikappe kaccitthāti ettha kacci atthāti padacchedo veditabbo.
tika-vin01t2:1116: Idāni pārājikasaṃvaṇṇanāsamanantarā yā terasakādisaṃvaṇṇanā samāraddhā, tassāpi –
tika-vin01t2:1119: Terasakassāti terasa sikkhāpadāni parimāṇāni assa kaṇḍassāti terasakaṃ, tassa terasakassa kaṇḍassāti attho.
tika-vin01t2:1120: 234. Anabhiratoti aññattha gihibhāvaṃ patthayamāno vuccati, idha pana kāmarāgavasena ukkaṇṭhitatāya vikkhittacittatāya samannāgato adhippetoti āha vikkhittacittotiādi.
tika-vin01t2:1121_0: 236-237. Sañcetanikāti ettha saṃ-saddo vijjamānatthatāya sātthakoti dassento āha
tika-vin01t2:1121_1: saṃvijjati cetanā assāti. Tattha cetanāti vītikkamavasappavattā pubbabhāgacetanā.
tika-vin01t2:1121_2: Assāti sukkavissaṭṭhiyā. Imasmiṃ vikappe ika-saddassa visuṃ attho natthīti āha sañcetanāva
tika-vin01t2:1121_3: sañcetanikāti. Idāni saṃ-saddassa atthaṃ anapekkhitvā ika-saddova assatthiatthaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1121_4: pakāsetīti dassento sañcetanā vā assā atthīti sañcetanikāti dutiyavikappamāha. Saṃvijjati
tika-vin01t2:1121_5: cetanā assāti padabhājane vattabbe byañjane ādaraṃ akatvā jānantotiādi vuttaṃ. Upakkamāmīti
tika-vin01t2:1122_0: Āsayabhedatoti pittādiāsayabhedato. Buddhapaccekabuddhānampi hi raññopi cakkavattissa
tika-vin01t2:1122_1: pittasemhapubbalohitāsayesu catūsu aññataro āsayo hotiyeva, mandapaññānaṃ pana cattāropi
tika-vin01t2:1122_2: āsayā honti. Dhātunānattatoti pathavīdhātuādīnaṃ catunnaṃ dhātūnaṃ, cakkhādīnaṃ vā
tika-vin01t2:1122_3: aṭṭhārasannaṃ dhātūnaṃ, rasasoṇitādīnaṃ vā dhātūnaṃ nānattato.
tika-vin01t2:1123_0: Vatthisīsanti vatthipuṭassa abbhantare matthakapassaṃ. “Rāga…pe… asakkonto”ti rāgapariyuṭṭhānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1123_1: sandhāya vuttaṃ. Rājā pana “sambhavassa sakalakāyo ṭhāna”nti sutapubbattā vīmaṃsanatthaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1123_2: evamakāsīti vadanti. Dakasotanti muttamaggaṃ, aṅgajātappadesanti vuttaṃ hoti. Dakasotorohaṇato
tika-vin01t2:1123_3: paṭṭhāya pana upādinnato vinimuttatāya sambhave utusamuṭṭhānameva rūpaṃ avasissati,
tika-vin01t2:1123_4: sesaṃ tisamuṭṭhānaṃ natthīti veditabbaṃ. Āpodhātuyā santānavasena pavattamānāya avatthāviseso
tika-vin01t2:1123_5: sambhavo, so catusamuṭṭhāniko aṭṭhakathāyaṃ catusamuṭṭhānikesu sambhavassa vuttattā.
tika-vin01t2:1123_6: So pana soḷasavassakāle uppajjati, tassa rāgavasena ṭhānācāvanaṃ hotīti vadanti,
tika-vin01t2:1123_7: tasmā yaṃ vuttaṃ kathāvatthuaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “sukkavissaṭṭhi nāma rāgasamuṭṭhānā hotī”ti,
tika-vin01t2:1123_8: taṃ sambhavassa ṭhānācāvanaṃ sandhāya vuttanti veditabbaṃ, na pana sambhavo cittasamuṭṭhānoyevāti
tika-vin01t2:1123_9: dīpetuṃ, teneva tattha vissaṭṭhiggahaṇaṃ kataṃ. “Khīṇāsavānaṃ pana brahmānañca sambhavo
tika-vin01t2:1123_10: natthī”ti ācariyadhammapālattherena vuttaṃ, tasmā yaṃ vuttaṃ kathāvatthuaṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1123_11: “tāsaṃ devatānaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhi nāma natthī”ti, tampi ṭhānācāvanaṃ sandhāya vuttanti
tika-vin01t2:1123_12: gahetabbaṃ, na pana devatānaṃ sabbaso sambhavassa abhāvaṃ sandhāya. Channampi pana
tika-vin01t2:1123_13: kāmāvacaradevatānaṃ kāmā pākatikāyeva. Manussā viya hi te dvayaṃdvayasamāpattivaseneva
tika-vin01t2:1123_14: methunaṃ paṭisevanti, kevalaṃ pana nissandābhāvo tesaṃ vattabbo. Taṅkhaṇikapariḷāhavūpasamāvahaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1123_15: samphassasukhameva hi tesaṃ kāmakiccaṃ. Keci pana “cātumahārājikatāvatiṃsānaṃyeva
tika-vin01t2:1123_16: dvayaṃdvayasamāpattiyā kāmakiccaṃ ijjhati, yāmānaṃ aññamaññaṃ āliṅganamattena, tusitānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1123_18: kāmakiccaṃ ijjhatī”ti vadanti, taṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ paṭikkhittaṃ tādisassa kāmesu virajjanassa
tika-vin01t2:1124_1: cāvanā vuccatī”ti vuttattā dakasotaṃ otiṇṇamatteti kasmā vuttanti āha dakasotorohaṇañcetthātiādi.
tika-vin01t2:1124_2: Etthāti tīsupi vādesu. Adhivāsetvāti nimitte upakkamitvā puna vippaṭisāre uppanne
tika-vin01t2:1124_3: adhivāsetvā. Antarā nivāretunti ṭhānato cutaṃ dakasotaṃ otarituṃ adatvā antarā nivāretuṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1124_4: Tenāha – ṭhānā cutañhi avassaṃ dakasotaṃ otaratīti. Ṭhānācāvanamattenevāti dakasotaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1124_5: anotiṇṇepīti adhippāyo. Ettha ca “sakalo kāyo ṭhāna”nti vāde ṭhānācāvanaṃ vadantena
tika-vin01t2:1124_6: sakalasarīrato cutassapi dakasotorohaṇato pubbe appamattakassa antarāḷassa sambhavato
tika-vin01t2:1124_7: vuttaṃ. Sakalasarīre vā tasmiṃ tasmiṃ padese ṭhitassa ṭhānā cutaṃ sandhāya “ṭhānācāvanamattenevā”ti
tika-vin01t2:1124_8: vuttaṃ. Nimitte upakkamantassevāti mocanassādena upakkamantassa. Hatthaparikammādīsu
tika-vin01t2:1124_9: satipi mocanassāde nimitte upakkamābhāvato natthi āpattīti āha “hattaparikamma…pe…
tika-vin01t2:1125_1: anatthakāmatāya vāti pasannā atthakāmatāya, kuddhā anatthakāmatāya. Atthāya vā anatthāya
tika-vin01t2:1125_2: vāti sabhāvato bhavitabbāya atthāya vā anatthāya vā. Upasaṃharantīti attano devānubhāvena
tika-vin01t2:1125_3: upanenti. Bodhisattamātā viya puttapaṭilābhanimittanti tadā kira pure puṇṇamāya sattamadivasato
tika-vin01t2:1125_5: bodhisattamātā sattame divase pātova uṭṭhāya gandhodakena nhāyitvā sabbālaṅkāravibhūsitā
tika-vin01t2:1125_6: varabhojanaṃ bhuñjitvā uposathaṅgāni adhiṭṭhāya sirigabbhaṃ pavisitvā sirisayane
tika-vin01t2:1125_7: nipannā niddaṃ okkamamānā imaṃ supinaṃ addasa – cattāro kira naṃ mahārājāno sayaneneva
tika-vin01t2:1125_8: saddhiṃ ukkhipitvā anotattadahaṃ netvā nhāpetvā dibbavatthaṃ nivāsetvā dibbagandhehi
tika-vin01t2:1125_9: vilimpetvā dibbapupphāni piḷandhitvā tato avidūre rajatapabbato, tassa anto kanakavimānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1125_10: atthi, tasmiṃ pācīnato sīsaṃ katvā nipajjāpesuṃ. Atha bodhisatto setavaravāraṇo hutvā
tika-vin01t2:1125_11: tato avidūre eko suvaṇṇapabbato, tattha caritvā tato oruyha rajatapabbataṃ abhiruhitvā
tika-vin01t2:1125_12: kanakavimānaṃ pavisitvā mātaraṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā dakkhiṇapassaṃ phāletvā kucchiṃ
tika-vin01t2:1125_13: paviṭṭhasadiso ahosi. Imaṃ supinaṃ sandhāya etaṃ vuttaṃ “bodhisattamātā viya puttapaṭilābhanimitta”nti.
tika-vin01t2:1126_0: Pañca mahāsupineti mahantehi purisehi passitabbato mahantānañca atthānaṃ nimittabhāvato
tika-vin01t2:1126_1: mahāsupine. Te pana pañca mahāsupine neva lokiyamahājano passati, na mahārājāno,
tika-vin01t2:1126_2: na cakkavattirājāno, na aggasāvakā, na paccekabuddhā, na sammāsambuddhā, eko sabbaññubodhisattoyeva
tika-vin01t2:1126_3: passati. Tena vuttaṃ “bodhisatto viya pañca mahāsupine”ti. Amhākañca pana bodhisatto
tika-vin01t2:1126_4: kadā te supine passīti? “Sve buddho bhavissāmī”ti cātuddasiyaṃ pakkhassa rattivibhāyanakāle
tika-vin01t2:1126_5: passi. Kālavasena hi divā diṭṭho supino na sameti, tathā paṭhamayāme majjhimayāme
tika-vin01t2:1126_6: ca. Pacchimayāme balavapaccūse pana asitapītasāyite sammāpariṇāmagate kāyasmiṃ ojāya
tika-vin01t2:1126_7: patiṭṭhitāya aruṇe uggacchamāne diṭṭhasupino sameti. Iṭṭhanimittaṃ supinaṃ passanto
tika-vin01t2:1126_8: iṭṭhaṃ paṭilabhati, aniṭṭhanimittaṃ passanto aniṭṭhaṃ, tasmā bodhisattopi supinaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1127_0: Ke pana te pañca mahāsupināti? Tathāgatassa arahato sammāsambuddhassa pubbeva sambodhā
tika-vin01t2:1127_1: anabhisambuddhassa bodhisattasseva sato pañca mahāsupinā pāturahesuṃ – ayaṃ mahāpathavī
tika-vin01t2:1127_2: mahāsayanaṃ ahosi, himavā pabbatarājā bimbohanaṃ ahosi, puratthime samudde vāmahattho
tika-vin01t2:1127_3: ohito ahosi, pacchime samudde dakkhiṇahattho ohito ahosi, dakkhiṇasamudde ubho pādā
tika-vin01t2:1127_4: ohitā ahesuṃ, ayaṃ paṭhamo mahāsupino pāturahosi.
tika-vin01t2:1128_0: Puna caparaṃ dabbatiṇasaṅkhātā tiriyā nāma tiṇajāti naṅgalamattena rattadaṇḍena nābhito
tika-vin01t2:1128_1: uggantvā tassa passantasseva vidatthimattaṃ ratanamattaṃ byāmamattaṃ yaṭṭhimattaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1128_2: gāvutamattaṃ aḍḍhayojanamattaṃ yojanamattanti evaṃ uggantvā anekayojanasahassaṃ nabhaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1128_3: āhacca ṭhitā ahosi, ayaṃ dutiyo mahāsupino pāturahosi.
tika-vin01t2:1129: Puna caparaṃ setā kimī kaṇhasīsā pādehi ussakkitvā yāva jāṇumaṇḍalā paṭicchādesuṃ, ayaṃ tatiyo mahāsupino pāturahosi.
tika-vin01t2:1130: Puna caparaṃ cattāro sakuṇā nānāvaṇṇā catūhi disāhi āgantvā pādamūle nipatitvā sabbasetā sampajjiṃsu, ayaṃ catuttho mahāsupino pāturahosi.
tika-vin01t2:1131: Puna caparaṃ bodhisatto mahato mīḷhapabbatassa uparūpari caṅkamati alippamāno mīḷhena, ayaṃ pañcamo mahāsupino pāturahosi. Ime pañca mahāsupinā.
tika-vin01t2:1132_0: Tattha paṭhamo anuttarāya sammāsambodhiyā pubbanimittaṃ, dutiyo ariyassa aṭṭhaṅgikassa
tika-vin01t2:1132_1: maggassa devamanussesu suppakāsitabhāvassa pubbanimittaṃ, tatiyo bahūnaṃ odātavasanānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1132_2: gihīnaṃ bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā saraṇagamanassa pubbanimittaṃ, catuttho khattiyādīnaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1132_3: catunnaṃ vaṇṇānaṃ tathāgatappavedite dhammavinaye agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajitvā
tika-vin01t2:1132_4: anuttaravimuttisacchikiriyāya pubbanimittaṃ, pañcamo catunnaṃ paccayānaṃ lābhitāya
tika-vin01t2:1133_0: Apica yaṃ so cakkavāḷamahāpathaviṃ sirisayanabhūtaṃ addasa, taṃ buddhabhāvassa pubbanimittaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1133_1: Yaṃ himavantaṃ pabbatarājānaṃ bimbohanaṃ addasa, taṃ sabbaññutaññāṇabimbohanassa
tika-vin01t2:1133_2: pubbanimittaṃ. Yaṃ cattāro hatthapāde samuddassa uparūparibhāgena gantvā cakkavāḷamatthake
tika-vin01t2:1133_3: ṭhite addasa, taṃ dhammacakkassa appaṭivattiyabhāve pubbanimittaṃ. Yaṃ attānaṃ uttānakaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1133_4: nipannaṃ addasa, taṃ tīsu bhavesu avakujjānaṃ sattānaṃ uttānamukhabhāvassa pubbanimittaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1133_5: Yaṃ akkhīni ummīletvā passanto viya ahosi, taṃ dibbacakkhupaṭilābhassa pubbanimittaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1133_6: Yaṃ yāva bhavaggā ekālokaṃ ahosi, taṃ anāvaraṇañāṇassa pubbanimittaṃ. Sesaṃ vuttanayameva.
tika-vin01t2:1133_7: Iti taṃtaṃvisesādhigamanimittabhūte pañca mahāsupine passi. Tena vuttaṃ “bodhisatto
tika-vin01t2:1142: Ime soḷasa supine passanto kosalarājā viya.
tika-vin01t2:1143_0: 1. Ekadivasaṃ kira kosalarājā rattiṃ niddūpagato pacchimayāme soḷasa supine passi.
tika-vin01t2:1143_1: Tattha cattāro añjanavaṇṇā kāḷausabhā “yujjhissāmā”ti catūhi disāhi rājaṅgaṇaṃ āgantvā
tika-vin01t2:1143_2: “usabhayuddhaṃ passissāmā”ti mahājane sannipatite yujjhanākāraṃ dassetvā naditvā
tika-vin01t2:1143_3: gajjitvā ayujjhitvāva paṭikkantā. Imaṃ paṭhamaṃ supinaṃ addasa.
tika-vin01t2:1144: 2. Khuddakā rukkhā ceva gacchā ca pathaviṃ bhinditvā vidatthimattampi ratanamattampi anuggantvāva pupphanti ceva phalanti ca. Imaṃ dutiyaṃ addasa.
tika-vin01t2:1145: 3. Gāviyo tadahujātānaṃ vacchānaṃ khīraṃ pivantiyo addasa. Ayaṃ tatiyo supino.
tika-vin01t2:1146_0: 4. Dhuravāhe ārohapariṇāhasampanne mahāgoṇe yugaparamparāya ayojetvā taruṇe godamme
tika-vin01t2:1146_1: dhure yojente addasa, te dhuraṃ vahituṃ asakkontā chaḍḍetvā aṭṭhaṃsu, sakaṭāni nappavattiṃsu.
tika-vin01t2:1147: 5. Ekaṃ ubhatomukhaṃ assaṃ addasa, tassa ubhosu passesu yavasīsaṃ denti, so dvīhipi mukhehi khādati. Ayaṃ pañcamo supino.
tika-vin01t2:1148: 6. Mahājano satasahassagghanakaṃ suvaṇṇapātiṃ sammajjitvā “idha passāvaṃ karohī”ti ekassa jarasiṅgālassa upanāmesi, taṃ tattha passāvaṃ karontaṃ addasa. Ayaṃ chaṭṭho supino.
tika-vin01t2:1149: 7. Eko puriso rajjuṃ vaṭṭetvā pādamūle nikkhipati, tena nisinnapīṭhassa heṭṭhā sayitā chātasiṅgālī tassa ajānantasseva taṃ khādati. Imaṃ sattamaṃ supinaṃ addasa.
tika-vin01t2:1150_0: 8. Rājadvāre bahūhi tucchakumbhehi parivāretvā ṭhapitaṃ ekaṃ mahantaṃ pūritakumbhaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1150_1: addasa, cattāropi pana vaṇṇā catūhi disāhi catūhi anudisāhi ca ghaṭehi udakaṃ āharitvā
tika-vin01t2:1150_2: pūritakumbhameva pūrenti, pūritapūritaṃ udakaṃ uttaritvā palāyati, tepi punappunaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1150_3: tattheva udakaṃ āsiñcanti, tucchakumbhe olokentāpi natthi. Ayaṃ aṭṭhamo supino.
tika-vin01t2:1151_0: 9. Ekaṃ pañcapadumasañchannaṃ gambhīraṃ sabbatotitthaṃ pokkharaṇiṃ addasa, samantato
tika-vin01t2:1151_1: dvipadacatuppadā otaritvā tattha pānīyaṃ pivanti, tassā majjhe gambhīraṭṭhāne udakaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1151_2: āvilaṃ, tīrappadese dvipadacatuppadānaṃ akkamanaṭṭhāne acchaṃ vippasannaṃ anāvilaṃ. Ayaṃ navamo supino.
tika-vin01t2:1152_0: 10. Ekissāyeva ca kumbhiyā paccamānaṃ odanaṃ apākaṃ addasa, “apāka”nti vicāretvā
tika-vin01t2:1152_1: vibhajitvā ṭhapitaṃ viya tīhākārehi paccamānaṃ ekasmiṃ passe atikilinno hoti, ekasmiṃ
tika-vin01t2:1152_2: uttaṇḍulo, ekasmiṃ supakkoti. Ayaṃ dasamo supino.
tika-vin01t2:1153: 11. Satasahassagghanakaṃ candanasāraṃ pūtitakkena vikkiṇante addasa. Ayaṃ ekādasamo supino.
tika-vin01t2:1154: 12. Tucchalābūni udake sīdantāni addasa. Ayaṃ dvādasamo supino.
tika-vin01t2:1155: 13. Mahantamahantā kūṭāgārappamāṇā ghanasilā nāvā viya udake plavamānā addasa. Ayaṃ terasamo supino.
tika-vin01t2:1156: 14. Khuddakamadhukapupphappamāṇā maṇḍūkiyo mahante kaṇhasappe vegena anubandhitvā uppalanāḷe viya chinditvā maṃsaṃ khāditvā gilantiyo addasa. Ayaṃ cuddasamo supino.
tika-vin01t2:1157: 15. Dasahi asaddhammehi samannāgataṃ gāmagocaraṃ kākaṃ kañcanavaṇṇavaṇṇatāya “suvaṇṇā”ti laddhanāme suvaṇṇarājahaṃse parivārente addasa. Ayaṃ pannarasamo supino.
tika-vin01t2:1158_0: 16. Pubbe dīpino eḷake khādanti, te pana eḷake dīpino anubandhitvā murāmurāti khādante
tika-vin01t2:1158_1: addasa, athaññe tasā vakā eḷake dūratova disvā tasitā tāsappattā hutvā eḷakānaṃ bhayā
tika-vin01t2:1158_2: palāyitvā gumbagahanāni pavisitvā nilīyiṃsu. Ayaṃ soḷasamo supino.
tika-vin01t2:1159_0: 1. Tattha adhammikānaṃ rājūnaṃ adhammikānañca manussānaṃ kāle loke viparivattamāne
tika-vin01t2:1159_1: kusale osanne akusale ussanne lokassa parihīnakāle devo na sammā vassissati, meghapādā
tika-vin01t2:1159_2: chijjissanti, sassāni milāyissanti, dubbhikkhaṃ bhavissati, vassitukāmā viya catūhi
tika-vin01t2:1159_3: disāhi meghā uṭṭhahitvā itthikāhi ātape patthaṭānaṃ vīhiādīnaṃ temanabhayena anto
tika-vin01t2:1159_4: pavesitakāle purisesu kudālapiṭake ādāya āḷibandhanatthāya nikkhantesu vassanākāraṃ
tika-vin01t2:1159_5: dassetvā gajjitvā vijjulatā nicchāretvā usabhā viya ayujjhitvā avassitvāva palāyissanti.
tika-vin01t2:1160_0: 2. Lokassa parihīnakāle manussānaṃ parittāyukakāle sattā tibbarāgā bhavissanti, asampattavayāva
tika-vin01t2:1160_1: kumāriyo purisantaraṃ gantvā utuniyo ceva gabbhiniyo ca hutvā puttadhītāhi vaḍḍhissanti.
tika-vin01t2:1160_2: Khuddakarukkhānaṃ pupphaṃ viya hi tāsaṃ utunibhāvo, phalaṃ viya ca puttadhītaro bhavissanti.
tika-vin01t2:1161_0: 3. Manussānaṃ jeṭṭhāpacāyikakammassa naṭṭhakāle sattā mātāpitūsu vā sassusasuresu
tika-vin01t2:1161_1: vā lajjaṃ anupaṭṭhapetvā sayameva kuṭumbaṃ saṃvidahantāva ghāsacchādanamattampi mahallakānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1161_2: dātukāmā dassanti, adātukāmā na dassanti, mahallakā anāthā hutvā asayaṃvasī dārake
tika-vin01t2:1161_3: ārādhetvā jīvissanti tadahujātānaṃ vacchānaṃ khīraṃ pivantiyo mahāgāviyo viya. Ayaṃ tatiyassa vipāko.
tika-vin01t2:1162_0: 4. Adhammikarājūnaṃ kāle adhammikarājāno paṇḍitānaṃ paveṇikusalānaṃ kammanittharaṇasamatthānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1162_1: mahāmattānaṃ yasaṃ na dassanti, dhammasabhāyaṃ vinicchayaṭṭhānepi paṇḍite vohārakusale
tika-vin01t2:1162_2: mahallake amacce na ṭhapessanti. Tabbiparītānaṃ pana taruṇataruṇānaṃ yasaṃ dassanti,
tika-vin01t2:1162_3: tathārūpe eva ca vinicchayaṭṭhāne ṭhapessanti, te rājakammāni ceva yuttāyuttañca
tika-vin01t2:1162_4: ajānantā neva taṃ yasaṃ ukkhipituṃ sakkhissanti, na rājakammāni nittharituṃ, te asakkontā
tika-vin01t2:1162_5: kammadhuraṃ chaḍḍessanti, mahallakāpi paṇḍitā amaccā yasaṃ alabhantā kiccāni nittharituṃ
tika-vin01t2:1162_6: samatthāpi “kiṃ amhākaṃ etehi, mayaṃ bāhirakā jātā, abbhantarikā taruṇadārakā jānissantī”ti
tika-vin01t2:1162_7: uppannāni kammāni na karissanti, evaṃ sabbathāpi tesaṃ rājūnaṃ hāniyeva bhavissati,
tika-vin01t2:1162_8: dhuraṃ vahituṃ asamatthānaṃ vacchadammānaṃ dhure yojitakālo viya, dhuravāhānañca
tika-vin01t2:1162_9: mahāgoṇānaṃ yugaparamparāya ayojitakālo viya bhavissati. Ayaṃ catutthassa vipāko.
tika-vin01t2:1163_0: 5. Adhammikarājakāleyeva adhammikabālarājāno adhammike lolamanusse vinicchaye ṭhapessanti,
tika-vin01t2:1163_1: te pāpapuññesu anādarā bālā sabhāyaṃ nisīditvā vinicchayaṃ dentā ubhinnampi atthapaccatthikānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1163_2: hatthato lañjaṃ gahetvā khādissanti asso viya dvīhi mukhehi yavasīsaṃ. Ayaṃ pañcamassa vipāko.
tika-vin01t2:1164_0: 6. Adhammikāyeva vijātirājāno jātisampannānaṃ kulaputtānaṃ āsaṅkāya yasaṃ na dassanti,
tika-vin01t2:1164_1: akulīne vaḍḍhessanti, evaṃ mahākulāni duggatāni bhavissanti, lāmakakulāni issarāni.
tika-vin01t2:1164_2: Te ca kulīnā purisā jīvituṃ asakkontā “ime nissāya jīvissāmā”ti akulīnānaṃ dhītaro
tika-vin01t2:1164_3: dassanti, iti tāsaṃ kuladhītānaṃ akulīnehi saddhiṃ saṃvāso jarasiṅgālassa suvaṇṇapātiyaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1165_0: 7. Gacchante gacchante kāle itthiyo purisalolā surālolā alaṅkāralolā visikhālolā
tika-vin01t2:1165_1: āmisalolā bhavissanti dussīlā durācārā. Tā sāmikehi kasigorakkhādīni kammāni katvā
tika-vin01t2:1165_2: kicchena kasirena sambhataṃ dhanaṃ jārehi saddhiṃ suraṃ pivantiyo mālāgandhavilepanaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1165_3: dhārayamānā antogehe accāyikampi kiccaṃ anoloketvā gehaparikkhepassa uparibhāgenapi
tika-vin01t2:1165_4: chiddaṭṭhānehipi jāre upadhārayamānā sve vapitabbayuttakaṃ bījampi koṭṭetvā yāgubhattakhajjakāni
tika-vin01t2:1165_5: sajjetvā khādamānā vilumpissanti heṭṭhāpīṭhakanipannakachātakasiṅgālī viya vaṭṭetvā
tika-vin01t2:1165_6: vaṭṭetvā pādamūle nikkhittarajjuṃ. Ayaṃ sattamassa vipāko.
tika-vin01t2:1166_0: 8. Gacchante gacchante kāle loko parihāyissati, raṭṭhaṃ nirojaṃ bhavissati, rājāno
tika-vin01t2:1166_1: duggatā kapaṇā bhavissanti. Yo issaro bhavissati, tassa bhaṇḍāgāre satasahassamattā
tika-vin01t2:1166_2: kahāpaṇā bhavissanti, te evaṃ duggatā sabbe janapade attano kammaṃ kārayissanti,
tika-vin01t2:1166_3: upaddutā manussā sake kammante chaḍḍetvā rājūnaṃyeva atthāya pubbaṇṇāparaṇṇāni vapantā
tika-vin01t2:1166_4: rakkhantā lāyantā maddantā pavesentā ucchukhettāni karontā yantāni vāhentā phāṇitādīni
tika-vin01t2:1166_5: pacantā pupphārāme phalārāme ca karontā tattha tattha nipphannāni pupphaphalādīni
tika-vin01t2:1166_6: āharitvā rañño koṭṭhāgārameva pūressanti, attano gehesu tucchakoṭṭhe olokentāpi na
tika-vin01t2:1167_0: 9. Gacchante gacchante kāle rājāno adhammikā bhavissanti, chandādivasena agatiṃ gacchantā
tika-vin01t2:1167_1: rajjaṃ kāressanti, dhammena vinicchayaṃ nāma na dassanti, lañjavittakā bhavissanti
tika-vin01t2:1167_2: dhanalolā, raṭṭhavāsikesu tesaṃ khantimettānuddayaṃ nāma na bhavissati, kakkhaḷā
tika-vin01t2:1167_3: pharusā ucchuyante ucchugaṇṭhikā viya manusse pīḷentā nānappakāraṃ baliṃ uppādetvā
tika-vin01t2:1167_4: dhanaṃ gaṇhissanti, manussā balipīḷitā kiñci dātuṃ asakkontā gāmanigamādayo chaḍḍetvā
tika-vin01t2:1167_5: paccantaṃ gantvā vāsaṃ kappessanti, majjhimajanapado suñño bhavissati, paccanto ghanavāso
tika-vin01t2:1167_6: seyyathāpi pokkharaṇiyā majjhe udakaṃ āvilaṃ pariyante vippasannaṃ. Ayaṃ navamassa vipāko.
tika-vin01t2:1168_0: 10. Gacchante gacchante kāle rājāno adhammikā bhavissanti, tesu adhammikesu rājayuttāpi
tika-vin01t2:1168_1: brāhmaṇagahapatikāpi negamajānapadāpīti samaṇabrāhmaṇe upādāya sabbe manussā adhammikā
tika-vin01t2:1168_2: bhavissanti, tato tesaṃ ārakkhadevatā balipaṭiggāhikadevatā rukkhadevatā ākāsaṭṭhakadevatāti
tika-vin01t2:1168_3: evaṃ devatāpi adhammikā bhavissanti, adhammikarājūnaṃ rajje vātā visamā kharā vāyissanti,
tika-vin01t2:1168_4: te ākāsaṭṭhakavimānāni kampessanti, tesu kampitesu devatā kupitā devaṃ vassituṃ na
tika-vin01t2:1168_5: dassanti, vassamānopi sakalaraṭṭhe ekappahāreneva na vassissati, vassamānopi sabbattha
tika-vin01t2:1168_6: kasikammassa vā vappakammassa vā upakāro hutvā na vassissati. Yathā ca raṭṭhe, evaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1168_7: janapadepi gāmepi ekataḷākassarepi ekappahāreneva na vassissati, taḷākassa uparibhāge
tika-vin01t2:1168_8: vassanto heṭṭhābhāge na vassissati, heṭṭhā vassanto upari na vassissati, ekasmiṃ
tika-vin01t2:1168_9: bhāge sassaṃ ativassena nassissati, ekasmiṃ avassanto milāyissati, ekasmiṃ sammā
tika-vin01t2:1168_10: vassamāno sampādessati, evaṃ ekassa rañño rajje vuttā sassā tippakārā bhavissanti
tika-vin01t2:1168_11: ekakumbhiyā odano viya. Ayaṃ dasamassa vipāko.
tika-vin01t2:1169_0: 11. Gacchante gacchante kāle sāsane parihāyante paccayalolā alajjikā bahū bhikkhū
tika-vin01t2:1169_1: bhavissanti, te bhagavatā paccayaloluppaṃ nimmathetvā kathitadhammadesanaṃ cīvarādicatupaccayahetu
tika-vin01t2:1169_2: paresaṃ desessanti, paccayehi mucchitvā niratthakapakkhe ṭhitā nibbānābhimukhaṃ katvā
tika-vin01t2:1169_3: desetuṃ na sakkhissanti, kevalaṃ “padabyañjanasampattiñceva madhurasaddañca sutvā
tika-vin01t2:1169_4: mahagghāni cīvarāni dassanti”iccevaṃ desessanti. Apare antaravīthicatukkarājadvārādīsu
tika-vin01t2:1169_5: nisīditvā kahāpaṇaaḍḍhakahāpaṇapādamāsakarūpādīnipi nissāya desessanti. Iti bhagavatā
tika-vin01t2:1169_6: nibbānagghanakaṃ katvā desitaṃ dhammaṃ catupaccayatthāya ceva kahāpaṇaaḍḍhakahāpaṇādiatthāya
tika-vin01t2:1169_7: ca vikkiṇitvā desentā satasahassagghanakaṃ candanasāraṃ pūtitakkena vikkiṇantā viya
tika-vin01t2:1170_0: 12. Adhammikarājakāle loke viparivattanteyeva rājāno jātisampannānaṃ kulaputtānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1170_1: yasaṃ na dassanti, akulīnānaññeva dassanti, te issarā bhavissanti, itare daliddā.
tika-vin01t2:1170_3: akulīnānaṃyeva kathā osīditvā ṭhitā viya niccalā suppatiṭṭhitā bhavissati, saṅghasannipātepi
tika-vin01t2:1170_5: pāpapuggalānaṃyeva kathā niyyānikā bhavissati, na lajjibhikkhūnanti evaṃ sabbathāpi
tika-vin01t2:1170_6: tucchalābūnaṃ sīdanakālo viya bhavissati. Ayaṃ dvādasamassa vipāko.
tika-vin01t2:1171_0: 13. Tādiseyeva kāle adhammikarājāno akulīnānaṃ yasaṃ dassanti, te issarā bhavissanti,
tika-vin01t2:1171_1: kulīnā duggatā. Tesu na keci gāravaṃ karissanti, itaresuyeva karissanti, rājasammukhe
tika-vin01t2:1171_2: vā amaccasammukhe vā vinicchayaṭṭhāne vā vinicchayakusalānaṃ ghanasilāsadisānaṃ kulaputtānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1171_3: kathā na ogāhitvā patiṭṭhahissati. Tesu kathentesu “kiṃ ime kathentī”ti itare parihāsameva
tika-vin01t2:1171_4: karissanti, bhikkhusannipātepi vuttappakāresu ṭhānesu neva pesale bhikkhū garukātabbe
tika-vin01t2:1171_5: maññissanti, nāpi nesaṃ kathā pariyogāhitvā patiṭṭhahissati, silānaṃ plavakālo viya
tika-vin01t2:1172_0: 14. Loke parihāyanteyeva manussā tibbarāgādijātikā kilesānuvattakā hutvā taruṇataruṇānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1172_1: attano bhariyānaṃ vase vattissanti, gehe dāsakammakarādayopi gomahiṃsādayopi hiraññasuvaṇṇampi
tika-vin01t2:1172_2: sabbaṃ tāsaṃyeva āyattaṃ bhavissati, “asukahiraññasuvaṇṇaṃ vā paricchedādijātaṃ vā
tika-vin01t2:1172_3: kaha”nti vutte “yattha vā tattha vā hotu, kiṃ tuyhiminā byāpārena, tvaṃ mayhaṃ ghare
tika-vin01t2:1172_4: santaṃ vā asantaṃ vā jānitukāmo jāto”ti vatvā nānappakārehi akkositvā mukhasattīhi
tika-vin01t2:1172_5: koṭṭetvā dāsaceṭakaṃ viya vase katvā attano issariyaṃ pavattessanti, evaṃ madhukapupphappamāṇamaṇḍūkapotikānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1172_6: āsīvise kaṇhasappe gilanakālo viya bhavissati. Ayaṃ cuddasamassa vipāko.
tika-vin01t2:1173_0: 15. Dubbalarājakāle rājāno hatthisippādīsu akusalā yuddhesu avisāradā bhavissanti,
tika-vin01t2:1173_1: te attano rājādhipaccaṃ āsaṅkamānā samānajātikānaṃ kulaputtānaṃ issariyaṃ adatvā
tika-vin01t2:1173_2: attano pādamūlikanhāpakakappakādīnaṃ dassanti, jātigottasampannā kulaputtā rājakule
tika-vin01t2:1173_3: patiṭṭhaṃ alabhamānā jīvikaṃ kappetuṃ asamatthā hutvā issariyaṭṭhāne jātigottahīne
tika-vin01t2:1173_4: akulīne upaṭṭhahantā vicarissanti, suvaṇṇarājahaṃsehi kākassa parivāritakālo viya
tika-vin01t2:1174_0: 16. Adhammikarājakāleyeva ca akulīnāva rājavallabhā issarā bhavissanti, kulīnā appaññātā
tika-vin01t2:1174_1: duggatā. Te rājavallabhā rājānaṃ attano kathaṃ gāhāpetvā vinicchayaṭṭhānādīsu balavanto
tika-vin01t2:1174_2: hutvā dubbalānaṃ paveṇiāgatāni khettavatthuādīni “amhākaṃ santakāni etānī”ti abhiyuñjitvā
tika-vin01t2:1174_3: te “na tumhākaṃ, amhāka”nti āgantvā vinicchayaṭṭhānādīsu vivadante vettalatādīhi
tika-vin01t2:1174_4: pahārāpetvā gīvāyaṃ gahetvā apakaḍḍhāpetvā “attano pamāṇaṃ na jānātha, amhehi saddhiṃ
tika-vin01t2:1174_5: vivadatha, idāni vo rañño kathetvā hatthapādacchedādīni kāressāmā”ti santajjessanti,
tika-vin01t2:1174_6: te tesaṃ bhayena attano santakāni khettavatthūni “tumhākaṃyeva tāni, gaṇhathā”ti
tika-vin01t2:1174_7: niyyātetvā attano gehāni pavisitvā bhītā nipajjissanti. Pāpabhikkhūpi pesale bhikkhū
tika-vin01t2:1174_8: yathāruci viheṭhessanti, pesalā bhikkhū paṭisaraṇaṃ alabhamānā araññaṃ pavisitvā
tika-vin01t2:1174_9: gahanaṭṭhānesu nilīyissanti, evaṃ hīnajaccehi ceva pāpabhikkhūhi ca upaddutānaṃ jātimantakulaputtānañceva
tika-vin01t2:1174_10: pesalabhikkhūnañca eḷakānaṃ bhayena tasavakānaṃ palāyanakālo viya bhavissati. Ayaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1174_11: soḷasamassa vipāko. Evaṃ tassa tassa atthassa pubbanimittabhūte soḷasa supine passi.
tika-vin01t2:1174_12: Tena vuttaṃ – “kosalarājā viya soḷasa supine”ti. Ettha ca pubbanimittato attano atthānatthanimittaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1174_13: supinaṃ passanto attano kammānubhāvena passati, kosalarājā viya lokassa atthānatthanimittaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1174_14: supinaṃ passanto pana sabbasattasādhāraṇakammānubhāvena passatīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1175_0: Kuddhā hi devatāti nāgamahāvihāre mahātherassa kuddhā devatā viya. Rohaṇe kira nāgamahāvihāre
tika-vin01t2:1175_1: mahāthero bhikkhusaṅghaṃ anapaloketvāva ekaṃ nāgarukkhaṃ chindāpesi. Rukkhe adhivatthā
tika-vin01t2:1175_2: devatā therassa kuddhā paṭhamameva naṃ saccasupinena palobhetvā pacchā “ito te sattadivasamatthake
tika-vin01t2:1175_3: upaṭṭhāko rājā marissatī”ti supine ārocesi. Thero taṃ kathaṃ āharitvā rājorodhānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1175_4: ācikkhi. Tā ekappahāreneva mahāviravaṃ viraviṃsu. Rājā “kiṃ eta”nti pucchi. Tā ‘evaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1175_5: therena vutta”nti ārocayiṃsu. Rājā divase gaṇāpetvā sattāhe vītivatte therassa hatthapāde
tika-vin01t2:1175_6: chindāpesi. Ekantasaccameva hotīti phalassa saccabhāvato vuttaṃ, dassanaṃ pana vipallatthameva.
tika-vin01t2:1175_7: Teneva pahīnavipallāsā pubbanimittabhūtampi supinaṃ na passanti, dvīhi tīhi vā kāraṇehi
tika-vin01t2:1175_8: kadāci supinaṃ passantīti āha “saṃsaggabhedato”ti. “Asekkhā na passanti pahīnavipallāsattā”ti
tika-vin01t2:1175_9: vacanato catunnampi kāraṇānaṃ vipallāso eva mūlakāraṇanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1176_0: Tanti supinakāle pavattaṃ bhavaṅgacittaṃ. Rūpanimittādiārammaṇanti kammanimittagatinimittato
tika-vin01t2:1176_1: aññaṃ rūpanimittādiārammaṇaṃ na hoti. Īdisānīti paccakkhato anubhūtapubbaparikappitarūpādiārammaṇāni
tika-vin01t2:1176_2: ceva rāgādisampayuttāni ca. Sabbohārikacittenāti pakaticittena. Dvīhi antehi muttoti
tika-vin01t2:1176_3: kusalākusalasaṅkhātehi dvīhi antehi mutto. Āvajjanatadārammaṇakkhaṇeti idaṃ yāva
tika-vin01t2:1176_4: tadārammaṇuppatti, tāva pavattaṃ cittavāraṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. “Supineneva diṭṭhaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1176_5: viya me, sutaṃ viya meti kathanakāle pana abyākatoyeva āvajjanamattasseva uppajjanato”ti
tika-vin01t2:1176_6: vadanti. Evaṃ vadantehi pañcadvāre dutiyamoghavāre viya manodvārepi āvajjanaṃ dvattikkhattuṃ
tika-vin01t2:1176_7: uppajjitvā javanaṭṭhāne ṭhatvā bhavaṅgaṃ otaratīti adhippetanti daṭṭhabbaṃ ekacittakkhaṇikassa
tika-vin01t2:1176_8: āvajjanassa uppattiyaṃ “diṭṭhaṃ viya me, sutaṃ viya me”ti kappanāya asambhavato.
tika-vin01t2:1177_0: Ettha ca “supinantepi tadārammaṇavacanato paccuppannavasena vā atītavasena vā sabhāvadhammāpi
tika-vin01t2:1177_1: supinante ārammaṇaṃ hontī”ti vadanti. “Yadipi supinante vibhūtaṃ hutvā upaṭṭhite
tika-vin01t2:1177_2: rūpādivatthumhi tadārammaṇaṃ vuttaṃ, tathāpi supinante upaṭṭhitanimittassa parikappavasena
tika-vin01t2:1177_3: gahetabbatāya dubbalabhāvato dubbalavatthukattāti vutta”nti tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1177_4: Keci pana “karajakāyassa nirussāhasantabhāvappattito tannissitaṃ hadayavatthu na
tika-vin01t2:1177_5: suppasannaṃ hoti, tato tannissitāpi cittuppatti na suppasannā asuppasannavaṭṭinissitadīpappabhā
tika-vin01t2:1177_6: viya, tasmā dubbalavatthukattāti ettha dubbalahadayavatthukattā”ti atthaṃ vadanti,
tika-vin01t2:1178_0: Supinantacetanāti manodvārikajavanavasena pavattā supinante cetanā. Supinañhi passanto
tika-vin01t2:1178_1: manodvārikeneva javanena passati, na pañcadvārikena. Paṭibujjhanto ca manodvārikeneva
tika-vin01t2:1178_2: paṭibujjhati, na pañcadvārikena. Niddāyantassa hi mahāvaṭṭiṃ jāletvā dīpe cakkhusamīpaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1178_3: upanīte paṭhamaṃ cakkhudvārikaṃ āvajjanaṃ bhavaṅgaṃ na āvaṭṭeti, manodvārikameva
tika-vin01t2:1178_4: āvaṭṭeti, atha javanaṃ javitvā bhavaṅgaṃ otarati. Dutiyavāre cakkhudvārikaṃ āvajjanaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1178_5: bhavaṅgaṃ āvaṭṭeti, tato cakkhuviññāṇādīni javanapariyosānāni pavattanti, tadanantaraṃ
tika-vin01t2:1178_6: bhavaṅgaṃ pavattati. Tatiyavāre manodvārikaāvajjanena bhavaṅge āvaṭṭite manodvārikajavanaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1178_7: javati, tena cittena “kiṃ ayaṃ imasmiṃ ṭhāne āloko”ti jānāti. Tathā niddāyantassa
tika-vin01t2:1178_8: kaṇṇasamīpe tūriyesu paggahitesu ghānasamīpe sugandhesu vā duggandhesu vā pupphesu
tika-vin01t2:1178_9: upanītesu mukhe sappimhi vā phāṇite vā pakkhitte piṭṭhiyaṃ pāṇinā pahāre dinne paṭhamaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1178_10: sotadvārikādīni āvajjanāni bhavaṅgaṃ na āvaṭṭenti, manodvārikameva āvaṭṭeti, atha
tika-vin01t2:1178_11: javanaṃ javitvā bhavaṅgaṃ otarati. Dutiyavāre sotadvārikādīni āvajjanāni bhavaṅgaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1178_12: āvaṭṭenti, tato sotaghānajivhākāyaviññāṇādīni javanapariyosānāni pavattanti, tadanantaraṃ
tika-vin01t2:1178_13: bhavaṅgaṃ pavattati. Tatiyavāre manodvārikaāvajjanena bhavaṅge āvaṭṭite manodvārikajavanaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1178_14: javati, tena cittena ñatvā “kiṃ ayaṃ imasmiṃ ṭhāne saddo, saṅkhasaddo bherisaddo”ti
tika-vin01t2:1178_15: vā “kiṃ ayaṃ imasmiṃ ṭhāne gandho, mūlagandho sāragandho”ti vā “kiṃ idaṃ mayhaṃ mukhe
tika-vin01t2:1178_16: pakkhittaṃ, sappi phāṇita”nti vā “kenamhi piṭṭhiyaṃ pahaṭo, atithaddho me pahāro”ti
tika-vin01t2:1178_17: vā vattā hoti, evaṃ manodvārikajavaneneva paṭibujjhati, na pañcadvārikena. Supinampi
tika-vin01t2:1179_0: Assāti assa āpattinikāyassa. Nanu ca ayuttoyaṃ niddeso “saṅgho ādimhi ceva sese ca
tika-vin01t2:1179_1: icchitabbo assā”ti. Na hi āpattinikāyassa ādimhi ceva sese ca saṅgho icchito, kiñcarahi
tika-vin01t2:1179_2: vuṭṭhānassāti imaṃ codanaṃ manasi sannidhāya yathā na virujjhati, tathā adhippāyaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1179_3: vivaranto “kiṃ vuttaṃ hotī”tiādimāha. Āpattito vuṭṭhānassa ādimhi ceva sese ca icchito
tika-vin01t2:1179_4: saṅgho āpattiyāva icchito nāma hotīti ayamettha adhippāyo. Āpattivuṭṭhānanti āpattito
tika-vin01t2:1179_6: vacane kāraṇaṃ. Samudāye niruḷho nikāya-saddo tadekadese pavattamānopi tāya eva ruḷhiyā
tika-vin01t2:1179_7: pavattatīti āha ruḷīsaddenāti. Atha vā kiñci nimittaṃ gahetvā satipi aññasmiṃ taṃnimittayutte
tika-vin01t2:1179_8: kismiñcideva visaye sammutiyā cirakālatāvasena nimittavirahepi pavattaniruḷho ruḷhī
tika-vin01t2:1179_9: nāma. Yathā mahiyaṃ setīti mahiṃso, gacchatīti goti, evaṃ nikāya-saddassapi ruḷhibhāvo
tika-vin01t2:1179_10: veditabbo. Ekasmimpi visiṭṭhe satipi sāmaññā viya samudāye pavattavohāro avayavepi
tika-vin01t2:1179_11: pavattatīti āha avayave samūhavohārena vāti. Navamassa adhippāyassāti vīmaṃsādhippāyassa.
tika-vin01t2:1180_0: 238-239. Lomā etesaṃ santīti lomasā, bahulomāti vuttaṃ hoti. Arogo bhavissāmīti rāgapariḷāhavūpasamato
tika-vin01t2:1180_1: nirogo bhavissāmi. Mocanenāti mocanatthāya upakkamakaraṇena. Upakkamakaraṇañhettha
tika-vin01t2:1180_2: mocananti adhippetaṃ moceti etenāti katvā. Bījaṃ bhavissatīti coḷaggahaṇādikammaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1181_0: 240. Dve āpattisahassānīti khaṇḍacakkādibhedaṃ anāmasitvā vuttaṃ, icchantena pana
tika-vin01t2:1181_1: khaṇḍacakkādibhedenapi āpattigaṇanā kātabbā. Missakacakkanti ubhatovaḍḍhanakaṃ sandhāya
tika-vin01t2:1181_2: vuttaṃ. Ettha ca nīlañca pītakañcātiādinā ekakkhaṇe anekavaṇṇānaṃ mocanādhippāyavacanaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1181_3: yathādhippāyena mocanaṃ bhavatu vā mā vā, imināpi adhippāyena upakkamitvā mocentassa
tika-vin01t2:1181_4: āpatti hotīti dassanatthaṃ. Na hi ekasmiṃ khaṇe nīlādīnaṃ sabbesampi mutti sambhavati.
tika-vin01t2:1181_5: Aññaṃ vadatīti attano dosaṃ ujuṃ vattuṃ asakkonto puna puṭṭho aññaṃ bhaṇati.
tika-vin01t2:1182_0: Mocanassādoti mocanassa pubbabhāge pavattaassādo. Teneva “mocetuṃ assādo mocanassādo”ti
tika-vin01t2:1182_1: vuttaṃ. Gehassitapemanti ettha geha-saddena gehe ṭhitā mātubhaginīādayo ajjhattikañātakā
tika-vin01t2:1182_2: gahitā. Tesu mātupemādivasena uppanno sineho gehassitapemaṃ, aññattha pana gehassitapemanti
tika-vin01t2:1183_0: Tathevāti mocanassādacetanāya eva. Pubbabhāge mocanassādavasena katappayogaṃ avijahitvāva
tika-vin01t2:1183_1: sayitattā “sace pana…pe… saṅghādiseso”ti vuttaṃ. Puna suddhacitte uppanne tassa payogassa
tika-vin01t2:1184_1: gahetvāti aṅgajātassa agge passāvaniggamanaṭṭhāne cammaṃ daḷhaṃ gahetvā. Nimitte
tika-vin01t2:1185_0: 265. “Ehi me tvaṃ, āvuso, sāmaṇerāti āṇattiyā aññena katopi payogo attanāva kato
tika-vin01t2:1185_1: nāma hotīti katvā āpatti vuttā. Yadi pana anāṇatto sayameva karoti, aṅgapāripūriyā
tika-vin01t2:1185_2: abhāvato anāpattī”ti vadanti. Suttasāmaṇeravatthusmiṃ asucimhi muttepi aṅgajātassa
tika-vin01t2:1185_3: gahaṇapaccayā dukkaṭaṃ vuttaṃ, na pana muttapaccayā.
tika-vin01t2:1186_0: 266. Kāyatthambhanavatthusmiṃ calanavasena yathā aṅgajātepi upakkamo sambhavati,
tika-vin01t2:1186_1: tathāpi vijambhitattā āpatti vuttā. “Pacchato vā”ti vacanato ubhosu passesu kaṭiyaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1186_2: ūruppadesopi gahitoyevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ, tasmā ubhosupi passesu ṭhatvā imasmiṃ okāse
tika-vin01t2:1186_3: nimittanti upanijjhāyantassapi āpattiyeva. “Aṅgajāta”nti vacanato nimittanti passāvamaggova
tika-vin01t2:1186_4: vutto. Ummīlananimīlanavasena pana na kāretabboti ummīlananimīlanappayogavasaena
tika-vin01t2:1186_5: āpattibhedo na kāretabboti attho. Anekakkhattumpi ummīletvā nimīletvā upanijjhāyantassa
tika-vin01t2:1186_6: ekameva dukkaṭanti vuttaṃ hoti. Akkhīni avipphandetvā abhimukhaṃ sampattassa mātugāmassa
tika-vin01t2:1187_0: 267. Pupphāvalīti kīḷāvisesassādhivacanaṃ. Taṃ kīḷantā nadīādīsu chinnataṭaṃ udakena
tika-vin01t2:1187_1: cikkhallaṃ katvā tattha ubho pāde pasāretvā nisinnā papatanti. “Pupphāvaliya”ntipi
tika-vin01t2:1187_2: pāṭho. Pavesentassāti dvikammakattā vālikaṃ aṅgajātanti ubhayatthāpi upayogavacanaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1187_3: kataṃ. Vālikanti vālikāyāti attho. Cetanā, upakkamo, muccananti imānettha tīṇi aṅgāni veditabbāni.
tika-vin01t2:1190_0: 269. Dutiye yesu vivaṭesu andhakāro hoti, tāni vivarantoti brāhmaṇiyā saddhiṃ kāyasaṃsaggaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1190_1: samāpajjitukāmo evamakāsi. Tena katassapi vippakārassa attani katattā “attano vippakāra”nti
tika-vin01t2:1190_2: vuttaṃ. Uḷārattatāti uḷāracittatā, paṇītādhimuttatāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin01t2:1191_0: 270. Otiṇṇoti idaṃ kammasādhanaṃ kattusādhanaṃ vā hotīti tadubhayavasena atthaṃ dassento
tika-vin01t2:1191_2: yathā te ratijanakā rūpādayo visayā aniccadukkhāsubhānattākārena avatthitā, tathā
tika-vin01t2:1192: 271. Saññamavelanti sīlamariyādaṃ. Ācāroti ācaraṇaṃ hatthagahaṇādikiriyā. Assāti “kāyasaṃsaggaṃ samāpajjeyyā”ti padassa.
tika-vin01t2:1193_0: 273. Etesaṃ padānaṃ vasenāti āmasanādipadānaṃ vasena. Ito cito ca…pe… sañcopetīti
tika-vin01t2:1193_1: attano hatthaṃ vā kāyaṃ vā tiriyaṃ ito cito ca sañcāreti. “Kāyato amocetvāvāti vacanato
tika-vin01t2:1193_2: matthakato paṭṭhāya hatthaṃ otārentassa kāyato mocetvā nivatthasāṭakūpari omasantassa
tika-vin01t2:1193_3: thullaccayaṃ, sāṭakato otāretvā jaṅghato paṭṭhāya kāyaṃ omasantassa puna saṅghādiseso”ti vadanti.
tika-vin01t2:1194_0: Dvādasasupi āmasanādippayogesu ekekasmiṃ payoge kāyato amocite ekekāva āpatti hotīti
tika-vin01t2:1194_1: āha “mūlaggahaṇameva pamāṇa”nti. Idañca ekena hatthena kāyaṃ gahetvā itarena hatthena
tika-vin01t2:1194_2: kāyaparāmasanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Ekena pana hatthena kāyapaṭibaddhaṃ gahetvā itarena
tika-vin01t2:1194_3: tattha tattha kāyaṃ parāmasato payogagaṇanāya āpatti. Ayaṃ pana saṅghādiseso na kevalaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1194_4: vatthuvaseneva, apica saññāvasenapīti āha “itthiyā itthisaññissa saṅghādiseso”ti.
tika-vin01t2:1194_5: Pāḷiyaṃ tiracchānagato ca hotīti ettha tiracchānagatitthiyā tiracchānagatapurisassa
tika-vin01t2:1195_0: Samasārāgoti kāyasaṃsaggarāgena ekasadisarāgo. Purimanayenevāti rajjuvatthādīhi parikkhipitvā
tika-vin01t2:1195_1: gahaṇe vuttanayena. Puna purimanayenevāti samasārāgo vutto. Anantaranayenevāti kāyapaṭibaddhaāmasananayena.
tika-vin01t2:1195_2: Veṇiggahaṇena lomānampi saṅgahitattā lomānaṃ phusanepi saṅghādiseso vutto. Idāni
tika-vin01t2:1196_1: Saññāya virāgitamhīti saññāya viraddhāya. Liṅgabyattayena “virāgitamhī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1196_2: Imaṃ nāma vatthunti imasmiṃ sikkhāpade āgataṃ sandhāya vadati. Aññampi yaṃ kiñci
tika-vin01t2:1196_3: vatthuṃ sandhāya vadatītipi keci. Sārattanti kāyasaṃsaggarāgena sārattaṃ. Virattanti
tika-vin01t2:1196_5: virattaṃ gaṇhi, dukkaṭanti mātupemādivasena gahaṇe dukkaṭaṃ vuttaṃ.
