tika-vin01t2:1309_0: Idañcidañcāti “pāṇātipātaṃ adinnādāna”ntiādiṃ. “Asuko ca asuko ca assamaṇo anupāsako”ti
tika-vin01t2:1309_1: akkosādhippāyena parammukhā vadantassa dukkaṭaṃ, sammukhā vadantassa pana pācittiyameva.
tika-vin01t2:1309_2: Yathā “asūriyaṃ passati kaññā”ti ettha “sūriyaṃ na passati kaññā”ti ayamattho labbhati,
tika-vin01t2:1309_3: evaṃ “anokāsaṃ kārāpetvā”ti etthāpi “okāsaṃ akārāpetvā”ti ayamattho labbhatīti āha
tika-vin01t2:1309_4: “yaṃ panā”tiādi. Yaṃ codeti, tassa upasampannoti saṅkhyūpagamanaṃ, tasmiṃ suddhasaññitā,
tika-vin01t2:1309_5: yena pārājikena codeti, tassa diṭṭhādivasena amūlakatā, cāvanādhippāyena sammukhā
tika-vin01t2:1309_6: codanā, tassa taṅkhaṇavijānananti imānettha pañca aṅgāni.
tika-vin01t2:1312_0: 391. Navame disvāti ajikāya vippaṭipajjantaṃ chagalakaṃ disvā. Mettiyaṃ bhikkhuninti
tika-vin01t2:1312_1: tassā bhikkhunikālaṃ gahetvā bhūtapubbavohārena voharanti. Veḷuvaneyevāti therassa
tika-vin01t2:1312_2: bhikkhācāravelaṃ aggahetvā tehi vuttabhattuddesavelaṃyeva sandhāya vuttaṃ. Kacci
tika-vin01t2:1312_3: noti kacci nu. Etamatthaṃ ārocesunti aññabhāgiyassa adhikaraṇassa kañcidesaṃ lesamattaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1313_0: Aññabhāgassāti aññakoṭṭhāsassa, therassa manussajātibhikkhubhāvato aññassa tiracchānajātichagalakabhāvasaṅkhātassa
tika-vin01t2:1313_1: koṭṭhāsassāti vuttaṃ hoti. Idanti sāmaññato napuṃsakaniddesena chagalakaṃ niddisati,
tika-vin01t2:1313_2: idaṃ chagalakajātanti attho, ayaṃ chagalakoti vuttaṃ hoti. Adhikaraṇasaddāpekkho
tika-vin01t2:1313_3: vā napuṃsakaniddeso, idaṃ chagalakasaṅkhātaṃ adhikaraṇanti vuttaṃ hoti. Aññabhāgoti
tika-vin01t2:1313_6: aññabhāgiya”nti dutiyaviggahassa. Dvīhipi viggahehi aññabhāgiyanti chagalakova vutto.
tika-vin01t2:1313_7: Tiracchānajātichagalakabhāvañca ṭhapetvā paramatthato visuṃ chagalake asatipi “paṭimāya
tika-vin01t2:1313_9: idaṃ, aññabhāgo vā assa atthī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1314_0: Idāni dvīhipi viggahehi vuttamatthaṃ vitthāretvā dassento “yo hi so”tiādimāha. Soti
tika-vin01t2:1314_1: so chagalako. Tassa “hotī”ti iminā sambandho. Tatoti tato manussajātito bhikkhubhāvato
tika-vin01t2:1314_2: ca. So vā aññabhāgoti yathāvuttatiracchānajātichagalakabhāvasaṅkhāto aññabhāgo. Assāti
tika-vin01t2:1314_3: chagalakassa. So chagalako aññabhāgiyasaṅkhātaṃ labhatīti yojetabbaṃ. “Adhikaraṇanti
tika-vin01t2:1314_4: ādhāro, vatthu adhiṭṭhāna”nti heṭṭhā vuttamatthaṃ sarūpato dassetuṃ “yasmā cā”tiādimāha.
tika-vin01t2:1314_5: Tesanti mettiyabhūmajakānaṃ. Imanti chagalakaṃ. Nāmakaraṇasaññāyāti nāmakaraṇasaṅkhātāya
tika-vin01t2:1314_6: saññāya so chagalako adhikaraṇanti veditabboti yojetabbaṃ. Tañhi sandhāyāti “avassaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1314_7: tumhehi leso oḍḍito, kiṃ vadatha, kiṃ passitthā”ti anuyuttehi tehi bhikkhūhi “chagalakassa
tika-vin01t2:1314_8: vippaṭipattiṃ disvā dabbassa nāmaṃ tassa karimhā”ti vuttattā tassa nāmakaraṇasaññāya
tika-vin01t2:1314_9: adhiṭṭhānabhūtaṃ taṃ chagalakaṃ sandhāya. Te bhikkhūti te anuyuñjakā bhikkhū. Āpattilesampi
tika-vin01t2:1314_10: puggalasmiṃyeva āropetvā vuttattā “puggalānaṃyeva lesā”ti vuttaṃ. Padabhājane pana…pe…
tika-vin01t2:1314_11: veditabbanti iminā nāmakaraṇasaññāya ādhārabhūtassa chagalakasaṅkhātassa adhikaraṇassa
tika-vin01t2:1315_2: nāma cattāri adhikaraṇānī”ti vuttaṃ. Atthuddhāravasena hi atthaṃ dassentena pāḷiyaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1315_3: āgatasaddapatirūpako añño saddo ubhayapadattho uddharitabbo, na ca aññaṃ uddharitvā
tika-vin01t2:1315_4: aññassa attho vattabbo, tasmā pāḷiāgataadhikaraṇasaddapatirūpako aññoyeva ubhayapadatthasādhāraṇo
tika-vin01t2:1315_5: adhikaraṇasaddo uddhaṭoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tenevāha “adhikaraṇanti vacanasāmaññato atthuddhāravasena
tika-vin01t2:1315_6: pavattāni cattāri adhikaraṇānī”ti. Yā ca sā avasāne…pe… codanā vuttāti bhikkhu saṅghādisesaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1315_7: ajjhāpajjanto diṭṭho hoti, saṅghādisese saṅghādisesadiṭṭhī hoti, tañce pārājikena
tika-vin01t2:1316_0: Methunavītikkamāpattiyo vatthuto sabhāgā, itarāsaṃ pana adinnādānādiāpattīnaṃ samānepi
tika-vin01t2:1316_3: sabhāvato sadisaṃ, dosasampayuttamanussaviggahena asadisaṃ. Nanu ca “āpattādhikaraṇaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1316_4: āpattādhikaraṇassa siyā tabbhāgiyaṃ, siyā aññabhāgiya”nti vuttattā uddesānukkamena
tika-vin01t2:1316_5: tabbhāgiyataṃ aniddisitvā aññabhāgiyatā paṭhamaṃ kasmā niddiṭṭhāti āha “ādito paṭṭhāyā”tiādi.
tika-vin01t2:1317_0: “Saṅghakammāni nissāya uppanna”nti vuttattā saṅghakammato kiccādhikaraṇaṃ visuṃ viya
tika-vin01t2:1317_2: adhivacana”nti vuttaṃ. Yadi evaṃ “saṅghakammāni nissāya uppanna”nti kasmā vuttanti
tika-vin01t2:1317_3: āha “evaṃ santepī”tiādi. Tassa tassa saṅghakammassa bhagavatā vuttaṃ itikattabbatālakkhaṇaṃyeva
tika-vin01t2:1317_4: tato saṅghakammassa nipphajjanato phalūpacārena saṅghakammanti vattabbataṃ arahatīti
tika-vin01t2:1317_5: āha “yaṃ kammalakkhaṇaṃ manasi karoti, taṃ nissāya uppajjanato”ti. Parivāsādisaṅghakammaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1317_6: nissāya mānattādīnaṃ uppajjanato ukkhepanīyakammasīmāsammutikammādīni issāya osāraṇasīmāsamūhananādikammānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1318_0: 395-400. Savatthukaṃ katvāti puggalādhiṭṭhānaṃ katvā. Dīghādinoti dīgharassakāḷaodātādino.
tika-vin01t2:1318_1: Diṭṭhādinoti diṭṭhasutādino. Lohapattasadisoti ayopattasadiso. Aṅgāni paṭhamaduṭṭhadose
tika-vin01t2:1318_2: vuttasadisāni, idha pana kañcidesaṃ lesamattaṃ upādiyanā adhikā.
tika-vin01t2:1321_0: 410. Dasame ye dubbalā honti appathāmā, na sakkonti araññakādīni sevantā dukkhassantaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1321_1: kātuṃ, te sandhāyāha “bahūnaṃ kulaputtānaṃ maggantarāyāya saṃvattantī”ti. Adhivāsanakhantisampannoti
tika-vin01t2:1321_3: Byañjanapadameva paramaṃ assāti padaparamo. Yassa hi puggalassa bahumpi suṇato bahumpi
tika-vin01t2:1321_4: bhaṇato bahumpi dhārayato bahumpi vācayato na tāya jātiyā dhammābhisamayo hoti, ayaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1321_5: “padaparamo”ti vuccati. Abhisambhuṇitvāti nipphādetvā. Nābhisambhuṇātīti na sampādeti,
tika-vin01t2:1321_6: araññavāsaṃ sampādetuṃ na sakkotīti vuttaṃ hoti. Dhammato apetaṃ uddhammaṃ. Asabbaññū
tika-vin01t2:1321_7: assāti tesaṃ anurūpassa ajānanato asabbaññū bhaveyya. “Na, bhikkhave, asenāsanikena
tika-vin01t2:1321_8: vassaṃ upagantabba”nti vacanato “cattāro pana…pe… paṭikkhittamevā”ti vuttaṃ. Idameva
tika-vin01t2:1321_9: vacanaṃ sandhāya pāḷiyampi “aṭṭha māse kho mayā devadatta rukkhamūlasenāsanaṃ anuññāta”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1322_0: Tīhi koṭīhīti tīhi ākārehi, tīhi kāraṇehīti attho. Tadubhayavimuttaparisaṅkitanti
tika-vin01t2:1322_1: diṭṭhaṃ sutanti idaṃ ubhayaṃ anissāya “kiṃ nu kho idaṃ bhikkhuṃ uddissa vadhitvā
tika-vin01t2:1322_2: sampādita”nti kevalameva parisaṅkitaṃ. Macchabandhanaṃ jālaṃ, vāgurā migabandhanī.
tika-vin01t2:1322_3: Kappatīti yadi tesaṃ vacanena āsaṅkā upacchinnā hoti, vaṭṭati. Pavattamaṃsanti vikkāyikamaṃsaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1322_4: Maṅgalādīnanti ādi-saddena āhunapāhunādike saṅgaṇhāti. Bhikkhūnaṃyeva atthāyāti ettha
tika-vin01t2:1322_5: aṭṭhānappayutto eva-saddo, bhikkhūnaṃ atthāya akatamevāti sambandhitabbaṃ. Tasmā
tika-vin01t2:1322_6: “bhikkhūnañca dassāma, maṅgalādīnañca atthāya bhavissatī”ti missetvā katampi na vaṭṭatīti
tika-vin01t2:1322_7: veditabbaṃ. Keci pana “bhikkhūnaṃyevāti avadhāraṇena bhikkhūnañca aññesañca atthāya
tika-vin01t2:1322_8: kataṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vadanti, taṃ na sundaraṃ. Yattha ca nibbematiko hotīti bhikkhūnaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1322_9: atthāya katepi sabbena sabbaṃ parisaṅkitābhāvamāha. Tamevatthaṃ āvikātuṃ “sace panā”tiādi
tika-vin01t2:1322_10: vuttaṃ. Itaresaṃ vaṭṭatīti ajānantānaṃ vaṭṭati, jānato evettha āpatti hotīti. Teyevāti
tika-vin01t2:1322_11: ye uddissa kataṃ, teyeva. Uddisakatamaṃsaparibhogato akappiyamaṃsaparibhogassa visesaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1322_12: dassetuṃ “akappiyamaṃsaṃ panā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Purimasmiṃ sacittakā āpatti, itarasmiṃ
tika-vin01t2:1322_14: pucchitvā paribhuñjissāmīti vā gahetvā pucchitvā paribhuñjitabba”nti vacanato akappiyamaṃsaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1322_15: ajānitvā gaṇhantassa paṭiggahaṇena anāpatti siyā. Ajānitvāpi bhuñjantasseva hi āpatti
tika-vin01t2:1322_16: vuttā. Vattanti vadantīti iminā āpatti natthīti dasseti.
tika-vin01t2:1323_0: Sallekhā vutti etesanti sallekhavuttino. Bāhulikoti ekassa la-kārassa lopaṃ katvā
tika-vin01t2:1323_1: vuttaṃ. Kappanti āyukappaṃ. Saṅghabhedako hi ekaṃ kappaṃ asītibhāge katvā tato ekabhāgamattaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1323_2: kālaṃ niraye tiṭṭheyyāti āyukappaṃ sandhāya “kappaṃ nirayamhi paccatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1323_3: Kappaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “saṇṭhahante hi kappe kappavemajjhe vā saṅghabhedaṃ katvā
tika-vin01t2:1323_4: kappavināseyeva muccati. Sacepi hi sve kappo vinassissatīti ajja saṅghabhedaṃ karoti,
tika-vin01t2:1323_5: sveva muccati, ekadivasameva niraye paccatī”ti vuttaṃ. Tatthāpi kappavināseyevāti
tika-vin01t2:1323_6: āyukappavināseyevāti atthe sati natthi virodho. Saṇṭhahanteti idampi “sve vinassissatī”ti
tika-vin01t2:1323_7: viya abhūtaparikappanavasena vuttaṃ. “Ekadivasameva niraye paccatī”ti etthāpi tato
tika-vin01t2:1323_8: paraṃ kappābhāve āyukappassapi abhāvatoti avirodhato atthayojanā daṭṭhabbā. Brahmaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1323_9: puññanti seṭṭhaṃ puññaṃ. Kappaṃ saggamhi modatīti etthāpi āyukappameva.
tika-vin01t2:1324_1: attho. Kammanānāsaṃvāsakenāti etthāpi eseva nayo. Aññathā nānāsaṃvāsakena sahitassa
tika-vin01t2:1324_2: samānasaṃvāsakassapi saṅghassa asamānasaṃvāsakattaṃ āpajjeyya. Tattha laddhinānāsaṃvāsako
tika-vin01t2:1324_3: nāma ukkhittānuvattako. So hi attano laddhiyā nānāsaṃvāsako jātoti “laddhinānāsaṃvāsako”ti
tika-vin01t2:1324_4: vuccati. Kammanānāsaṃvāsako nāma ukkhepanīyakammakato. So hi ukkhepanīyakammavasena
tika-vin01t2:1324_5: nānāsaṃvāsako hotīti “kammanānāsaṃvāsako”ti vuccati. Virahitoti vimutto. Kāyasāmaggīdānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1325_0: “Bhedāya parakkameyyā”ti visuṃ vuttattā bhedanasaṃvattanikassa adhikaraṇassa samādāya
tika-vin01t2:1325_1: paggaṇhato pubbepi pakkhapariyesanādivasena saṅghabhedāya parakkamantassa samanubhāsanakammaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1325_2: kātabbanti veditabbaṃ. Imāni vatthūnīti aṭṭhārasa bhedakaravatthūni. Kammenāti apalokanādīsu
tika-vin01t2:1325_3: catūsu kammesu aññatarena kammena. Uddesenāti pañcasu pātimokkhuddesesu aññatarena
tika-vin01t2:1325_5: vohārena. Anussāvanāyāti “nanu tumhe jānātha mayhaṃ uccākulā pabbajitabhāvaṃ bahussutabhāvañca,
tika-vin01t2:1325_6: mādiso nāma uddhammaṃ ubbinayaṃ satthusāsanaṃ gāheyyāti cittampi uppādetuṃ tumhākaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1325_7: yuttaṃ, kiṃ mayhaṃ avīci nīluppalavanaṃ viya sītalo, kimahaṃ apāyato na bhāyāmī”tiādinā
tika-vin01t2:1325_8: nayena kaṇṇamūle vacībhedaṃ katvā anussāvanena. Salākaggāhenāti evaṃ anussāvetvā
tika-vin01t2:1325_9: tesaṃ cittaṃ upatthambhetvā anivattidhamme katvā “gaṇhatha imaṃ salāka”nti salākaggāhena.
tika-vin01t2:1325_10: Pañcahi kāraṇehi saṅghabhedo hotīti ettha kammameva uddeso vā saṅghabhede padhānakāraṇanti
tika-vin01t2:1325_12: hi voharantena tattha rucijananatthaṃ anussāvetvā salākāya gahitāyapi abhinnova hoti
tika-vin01t2:1325_13: saṅgho. Yadā pana evaṃ cattāro vā atirekā vā salākaṃ gahetvā āveṇikakammaṃ vā uddesaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1325_14: vā karonti, tadā saṅgho bhinno nāma hoti. Abbhussitanti abbhuggataṃ. Accheyyāti vihareyya, pavatteyyāti attho.
tika-vin01t2:1326_0: “Lajjī rakkhissatī”ti vacanato āpattibhayena ārocanaṃ lajjīnaṃyeva bhāroti āha “lajjīhi
tika-vin01t2:1326_1: bhikkhūhī”ti. Alajjissapi anārocentassa āpattiyeva “ye passanti, ye suṇantī”ti vacanato.
tika-vin01t2:1326_2: Samāgacchatūti ekī bhavatu. Ekībhāvo ca samānaladdhivasena hotīti āha “ekaladdhiko
tika-vin01t2:1326_4: tassa bhikkhuno”ti vuttaṃ. Appaṭinissajjato dukkaṭanti visuṃ visuṃ vadantānaṃ gaṇanāya
tika-vin01t2:1326_5: dukkaṭaṃ. Pahontenāti gantuṃ samatthena agilānena. Saṅghabhedassa garukabhāvato avassaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1326_6: kattabbatādassanatthaṃ “dūrepi bhāroyevā”ti vuttaṃ, āpatti pana addhayojanabbhantare
tika-vin01t2:1327_1: Tatiyakammavācāya paṭinissajjanto ñattiyā dukkaṭaṃ dvīhi kammavācāhi thullaccaye
tika-vin01t2:1327_2: ca āpajjatiyevāti āha “paṭinissajjantassa saṅghādisesena anāpattī”ti. Assāti devadattassa.
tika-vin01t2:1327_3: Katena bhavitabbanti samanubhāsanakammena katena bhavitabbaṃ. Attano rucimattena
tika-vin01t2:1327_4: vadeyyātiādikammikattā appaṭinissajjantassapi anāpattīti adhippāyena vadeyya. Apaññatte
tika-vin01t2:1327_5: sikkhāpade samanubhāsanakammasseva abhāvato “na hi paññattaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ vītikkamantassā”ti
tika-vin01t2:1327_6: vuttaṃ. Sikkhāpadaṃ paññapenteneva hi samanubhāsanakammaṃ anuññātaṃ. Uddissa anuññātatoti
tika-vin01t2:1327_7: “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, romanthakassa romanthana”ntiādiṃ uddissa anuññātaṃ sandhāya
tika-vin01t2:1327_8: vadanti. Anāpattiyanti anāpattivāre. Āpattiṃ ropetabboti anissajjanapaccayā āpannapācittiyāpattiṃ
tika-vin01t2:1328_0: Āpattiyeva na jātāti saṅghādisesāpatti na jātāyevāti attho. Sā panesāti sā pana esā
tika-vin01t2:1328_1: anāpatti. Tivaṅgikanti kāyavācācittavasena tivaṅgikaṃ, kāyavācācittato samuṭṭhātīti
tika-vin01t2:1328_2: vuttaṃ hoti. “Nappaṭinissajjāmī”ti saññāya abhāvena muccanato saññāvimokkhaṃ. Sacittakanti
tika-vin01t2:1328_4: samanubhāsanaṃ, kammavācāpariyosānaṃ, appaṭinissajjananti imānettha cattāri aṅgāni.
tika-vin01t2:1331_0: 417-418. Ekādasame yaṃ vacanaṃ samaggepi vagge avayavabhūte karoti bhindati, taṃ
tika-vin01t2:1331_1: kalahakārakavacanaṃ idha vagganti vuccatīti āha “vaggaṃ asāmaggipakkhiyavacanaṃ vadantī”ti.
tika-vin01t2:1331_2: Asāmaggipakkhe bhavā asāmaggipakkhiyā, kalahakā. Tesaṃ vacanaṃ asāmaggipakkhiyavacanaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:1331_3: asāmaggipakkhe vā bhavaṃ vacanaṃ asāmaggipakkhiyavacanaṃ. Yasmā ubbāhikādikammaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1331_4: bahūnampi kātuṃ vaṭṭati, tasmā “na hi saṅgho saṅghassa kammaṃ karotī”ti idaṃ niggahavasena
tika-vin01t2:1331_5: kattabbakammaṃ sandhāya vuttanti veditabbaṃ. Aṅgāni panettha bhedāya parakkamanaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1334_0: 424. Dvādasame vambhanavacananti garahavacanaṃ. Apasādetukāmoti khipitukāmo, tajjetukāmo
tika-vin01t2:1334_1: vā, ghaṭṭetukāmoti vuttaṃ hoti. Saṭasaddo patitasaddena samānattho. Visesanassa ca
tika-vin01t2:1334_2: paranipātaṃ katvā tiṇakaṭṭhapaṇṇasaṭanti vuttanti āha “tattha tattha patitaṃ tiṇakaṭṭhapaṇṇa”nti.
tika-vin01t2:1335_0: 425-426. Vattuṃ asakkuṇeyyoti kismiñci vuccamāne asahanato ovadituṃ asakkuṇeyyo.
tika-vin01t2:1335_1: Dukkhaṃ vaco etasmiṃ vippaṭikūlaggāhe vipaccanīkavāde anādare puggaleti dubbaco.
tika-vin01t2:1335_3: Kattuatthe anīyasaddo daṭṭhabbo. Tenevāha “ye dhammā dubbacaṃ puggalaṃ karontī”tiādi.
tika-vin01t2:1335_4: Pāpikā icchā etassāti pāpiccho, tassa bhāvo pāpicchatā, asantaguṇasambhāvanatā paṭiggahaṇe
tika-vin01t2:1335_5: ca amattaññutā pāpicchatāti veditabbā. Attukkaṃsakā ca te paravambhakā cāti attukkaṃsakaparavambhakā.
tika-vin01t2:1335_6: Ye attānaṃ ukkaṃsanti ukkhipanti ucce ṭhāne ṭhapenti, parañca vambhenti garahanti
tika-vin01t2:1335_7: nīce ṭhāne ṭhapenti, tesametaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Tesaṃ bhāvo attukkaṃsakaparavambhakatā.
tika-vin01t2:1335_8: Kujjhanasīlo kodhano, tassa bhāvo kodhanatā. Kujjhanalakkhaṇassa kodhassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1336_0: Pubbakāle kodho, aparakāle upanāhoti āha “kodhahetu upanāhitā”ti. Tattha upanahanasīlo,
tika-vin01t2:1336_1: upanāho vā etassa atthīti upanāhī, tassa bhāvo upanāhitā. Punappunaṃ cittapariyonaddhalakkhaṇassa
tika-vin01t2:1336_2: kodhassevetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Sakiñhi uppanno kodho kodhoyeva, tatuttari upanāho. Abhisaṅgoti
tika-vin01t2:1336_3: dummocanīyo balavaupanāho. So assa atthīti abhisaṅgī, tassa bhāvo abhisaṅgitā. Dummocanīyassa
tika-vin01t2:1336_4: balavaupanāhassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Codakaṃ paṭippharaṇatāti codakassa paṭiviruddhena
tika-vin01t2:1336_5: paccanīkena hutvā avaṭṭhānaṃ. Codakaṃ apasādanatāti “kiṃ nu kho tuyhaṃ bālassa abyattassa
tika-vin01t2:1336_6: bhaṇitena, tvampi nāma bhaṇitabbaṃ maññissasī”ti evaṃ codakassa ghaṭṭanā. Codakassa
tika-vin01t2:1336_7: paccāropanatāti “tvampi khosi itthannāmaṃ āpattiṃ āpanno, taṃ tāva paṭikarohī”ti
tika-vin01t2:1337_0: Aññena aññaṃ paṭicaraṇatāti aññena kāraṇena, vacanena vā aññassa kāraṇassa, vacanassa
tika-vin01t2:1337_1: vā paṭicchādanavasena caraṇatā. Paṭicchādanattho eva vā carasaddo anekatthattā dhātūnanti
tika-vin01t2:1337_2: paṭicchādanatāti attho. Tāya samannāgato hi puggalo yaṃ codakena dosavibhāvanakāraṇaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:1337_3: vacanaṃ vā vuttaṃ, taṃ tato aññeneva codanāya amūlikabhāvadīpanena kāraṇena, tadatthabodhakena
tika-vin01t2:1337_4: vacanena vā paṭicchādeti. “Āpattiṃ āpannosī”ti vutte “ko āpanno, kiṃ āpanno, kismiṃ
tika-vin01t2:1337_5: āpanno, kaṃ bhaṇatha, kiṃ bhaṇathā”ti vā vatvā “evarūpaṃ kiñci tayā diṭṭha”nti vutte
tika-vin01t2:1337_6: “na suṇāmī”ti sotaṃ vā upanāmetvā vikkhepaṃ karontopi aññenaññaṃ paṭicchādeti. “Itthannāmaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1337_7: āpattiṃ āpannosī”ti puṭṭhe “pāṭaliputtaṃ gatomhī”ti vatvā puna “na tava pāṭaliputtagamanaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1337_8: pucchāma, āpattiṃ pucchāmā”ti vutte tato “rājagahaṃ gatomhī”ti vatvā “rājagahaṃ vā
tika-vin01t2:1337_9: yāhi brāhmaṇagahaṃ vā, āpattiṃ āpannosī”ti vutte “tattha me sūkaramaṃsaṃ laddha”ntiādīni
tika-vin01t2:1337_10: vatvā bahiddhā kathāvikkhipanampi atthato aññenaññaṃ paṭicaraṇamevāti visuṃ na gahitaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1338_0: Apadānenāti attano cariyāya. Apadīyanti hi dosā etena dakkhīyanti, luyanti chijjantīti
tika-vin01t2:1338_1: vā apadānaṃ, sattānaṃ sammā micchā vā vattappayogo. Na sampāyanatāti “āvuso, tvaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1338_2: kuhiṃ vasasi, kaṃ nissāya vasasī”ti vā “yaṃ tvaṃ vadesi ‘mayā esa āpattiṃ āpajjanto
tika-vin01t2:1338_3: diṭṭho’ti, tvaṃ tasmiṃ samaye kiṃ karosi, ayaṃ kiṃ karoti, kattha ca tvaṃ ahosi,
tika-vin01t2:1338_4: kattha aya”nti vā ādinā nayena cariyaṃ puṭṭhena sampādetvā akathanaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1339_0: Makkhipaḷāsitāti ettha paraguṇamakkhanalakkhaṇo makkho, so etassa atthīti makkhī.
tika-vin01t2:1339_1: Tādiso puggalo agāriyo anagāriyo vā samāno paresaṃ sukatakaraṇaṃ vināseti. Agāriyopi
tika-vin01t2:1339_2: hi kenaci anukampakena daliddo samāno uccaṭṭhāne ṭhapito, aparena samayena “kiṃ tayā
tika-vin01t2:1339_3: mayhaṃ kata”nti tassa sukatakaraṇaṃ vināseti. Anagāriyopi sāmaṇerakālato pabhuti
tika-vin01t2:1339_4: ācariyena vā upajjhāyena vā catūhi paccayehi uddesaparipucchādīhi ca anuggahetvā
tika-vin01t2:1339_6: sakkato garukato ācariyupajjhāyesu acittīkato caramāno “ayaṃ amhehi daharakāle eva
tika-vin01t2:1339_7: anuggahito saṃvaddhito ca, atha ca panidāni nissineho jāto”ti vuccamāno “kiṃ mayhaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1340_0: “Bahussutepi puggale ajjhottharitvā īdisassa ceva bahussutassa aniyatā gati, tava
tika-vin01t2:1340_1: vā mama vā ko viseso”tiādinā nayena uppajjamāno yugaggāhalakkhaṇo paḷāso. So paraguṇehi
tika-vin01t2:1340_2: attano guṇānaṃ samakaraṇaraso. Tathā hesa paresaṃ guṇe ḍaṃsitvā viya attano guṇehi
tika-vin01t2:1340_3: same karotīti paḷāsoti vuccati, so etassa atthīti paḷāsī. Makkhī ca paḷāsī ca makkhipaḷāsino,
tika-vin01t2:1340_4: tesaṃ bhāvo makkhipaḷāsitā. Atthato pana makkho ceva paḷāso ca.
tika-vin01t2:1341_0: Issati parasampattiṃ na sahatīti issukī. Maccharāyati attano sampattiṃ nigūhati,
tika-vin01t2:1341_1: paresaṃ sādhāraṇabhāvaṃ na sahati, maccheraṃ vā etassa atthīti maccharī. Saṭhayati
tika-vin01t2:1341_2: na sammā bhāsatīti saṭho, attano avijjamānaguṇappakāsanalakkhaṇena sāṭheyyena samannāgato
tika-vin01t2:1341_3: kerāṭikapuggalo. Kerāṭiko ca ānandamaccho viya hoti. Ānandamaccho nāma kira macchānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1341_4: naṅguṭṭhaṃ dasseti, sappānaṃ sīsaṃ “tumhehi sadiso aha”nti jānāpetuṃ, evameva kerāṭiko
tika-vin01t2:1341_5: puggalo yaṃ yaṃ suttantikaṃ vā ābhidhammikaṃ vā upasaṅkamati, taṃ taṃ evaṃ vadati
tika-vin01t2:1341_6: “ahaṃ tumhākaṃ antevāsī, tumhe mayhaṃ anukampakā, nāhaṃ tumhe muñcāmī”ti “evamete
tika-vin01t2:1341_7: ‘sagāravo ayaṃ amhesu sappatisso’ti maññissantī”ti. Sāṭheyyena hi samannāgatassa
tika-vin01t2:1341_9: duviññeyyattā kucchiṃ vā piṭṭhiṃ vā jānituṃ na sakkā. Yato so –
tika-vin01t2:1344: Evaṃ vuttayakkhasūkarasadiso hoti. Katapāpapaṭicchādanalakkhaṇā māyā, sā assa atthīti māyāvī.
tika-vin01t2:1345_1: thambho. Yena samannāgato puggalo gilitanaṅgalasadiso viya ajagaro, vātabharitabhastā
tika-vin01t2:1345_2: viya ca thaddho hutvā garuṭṭhāniye disvā onamitumpi na icchati, pariyanteneva carati.
tika-vin01t2:1345_3: Abbhunnatilakkhaṇo atimāno, so etassa atthīti atimānī.
tika-vin01t2:1346_0: Saṃ attano diṭṭhiṃ parāmasati sabhāvaṃ atikkamitvā parato āmasatīti sandiṭṭhiparāmāsī.
tika-vin01t2:1346_1: Ādhānaṃ gaṇhātīti ādhānaggāhī. “Ādhāna”nti daḷhaṃ vuccati, daḷhaggāhīti attho. Yuttaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1346_2: kāraṇaṃ disvāva laddhiṃ paṭinissajjatīti paṭinissaggī, dukkhena kicchena kasirena
tika-vin01t2:1346_3: bahumpi kāraṇaṃ dassetvā na sakkā paṭinissaggiṃ kātunti duppaṭinissaggī, yo attano
tika-vin01t2:1346_4: diṭṭhiṃ “idameva sacca”nti daḷhaṃ gaṇhitvā api buddhādīhi kāraṇaṃ dassetvā vuccamāno
tika-vin01t2:1346_5: na paṭinissajjati, tassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Tādiso hi puggalo yaṃ yadeva dhammaṃ vā
tika-vin01t2:1346_6: adhammaṃ vā suṇāti, taṃ sabbaṃ “evaṃ amhākaṃ ācariyehi kathitaṃ, evaṃ amhehi suta”nti
tika-vin01t2:1346_7: kummova aṅgāni sake kapāle antoyeva samodahati. Yathā hi kacchapo attano pādādike
tika-vin01t2:1346_8: aṅge kenaci ghaṭṭite sabbāni aṅgāni attano kapāleyeva samodahati, na bahi nīharati,
tika-vin01t2:1346_9: evamayampi “na sundaro tava gāho, chaḍḍehi na”nti vutto taṃ na vissajjeti, antoyeva
tika-vin01t2:1346_10: attano hadaye eva ṭhapetvā vicarati. Yathā kumbhīlā gahitaṃ na paṭinissajjanti, evaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1346_11: kumbhīlaggāhaṃ gaṇhāti, na vissajjeti. Makkhipaḷāsitādiyugaḷattayena dassite makkhapaḷāsādayo
tika-vin01t2:1346_12: cha dhamme visuṃ visuṃ gahetvā “ekūnavīsati dhammā”ti vuttaṃ. Anumānasuttaṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1346_13: pana makkhapaḷāsādayopi yugaḷavasena ekaṃ katvā “soḷasa dhammā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1347_0: Pakārehi āvahanaṃ padakkhiṇaṃ, tato padakkhiṇato gahaṇasīlo padakkhiṇaggāhī, na padakkhiṇaggāhī
tika-vin01t2:1347_1: appadakkhiṇaggāhī. Yo vuccamāno “tumhe maṃ kasmā vadatha, ahaṃ attano kappiyākappiyaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1347_2: sāvajjānavajjaṃ atthānatthaṃ jānāmī”ti vadati, ayaṃ anusāsaniṃ padakkhiṇato na gaṇhāti,
tika-vin01t2:1348_0: Uddeseti pātimokkhuddese. Atha sabbāneva sikkhāpadāni kathaṃ pātimokkhuddesapariyāpannānīti
tika-vin01t2:1348_1: āha “yassa siyā āpatti, so āvikareyyāti evaṃ saṅgahitattā”ti. “Yassa siyā āpattī”ti
tika-vin01t2:1348_2: hi iminā sabbāpi āpattiyo nidānuddese saṅgahitāyeva honti. Pañcahi sahadhammikehi
tika-vin01t2:1348_3: sikkhitabbattāti labbhamānavasena vuttaṃ. Sahadhammikena sahakāraṇenātipi attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin01t2:1348_4: “Vacanāyā”ti nissakke sampadānavacananti āha “tato mama vacanato”ti. Aṅgāni cettha
tika-vin01t2:1348_5: paṭhamasaṅghabhedasadisāni. Ayaṃ pana viseso – yathā tattha bhedāya parakkamanaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:1351_0: 431. Terasame kīṭāgirīti tassa nigamassa nāmaṃ. Tañhi sandhāya parato “na assajipunabbasukehi
tika-vin01t2:1351_1: bhikkhūhi kīṭāgirismiṃ vatthabba”nti vuttaṃ. Tena pana yogato so janapadopi “kīṭāgiri”icceva
tika-vin01t2:1351_2: saṅkhyaṃ gatoti āha “evaṃnāmake janapade”ti. Āvāse niyuttā āvāsikā, nibaddhavāsino.
tika-vin01t2:1351_3: Te akataṃ senāsanaṃ karonti, jiṇṇaṃ paṭisaṅkharonti, kate issarā honti. Tenāha “so
tika-vin01t2:1351_4: yesaṃ āyatto…pe… te āvāsikā”ti. Nivāso nivāsamattaṃ etesaṃ atthīti nevāsikāti āha
tika-vin01t2:1351_5: “ye pana kevala”ntiādi. Teti assajipunabbasukā. Cha janāti paṇḍuko lohitako mettiyo
tika-vin01t2:1351_6: bhūmajako assaji punabbasukoti ime cha janā. Sammāti ālapanavacanametaṃ. Āyamukhabhūtāti
tika-vin01t2:1351_7: āyassa mukhabhūtā. Dhuraṭṭhāneti sāvatthiyā avidūre ṭhāne. Vassāne hemante cāti dvīsu
tika-vin01t2:1351_8: utūsu vassanato “dvīhi meghehī”ti vuttaṃ. Diyaḍḍhabhikkhusahassato gaṇācariyānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1351_9: channaṃ janānaṃ adhikattā “samadhika”nti vuttaṃ, sādhikanti attho. Ma-kāro padasandhivasena
tika-vin01t2:1352_0: Kaṇikārādayo puppharukkhā, jātisumanādayo pupphagacchā. Koṭṭananti sayaṃ chindanaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1352_1: Koṭṭāpananti “imaṃ chinda bhindā”ti aññehi chedāpanaṃ. Āḷiyā bandhananti yathā gacchamūle
tika-vin01t2:1352_2: udakaṃ santiṭṭhati, tathā samantato bandhanaṃ. Udakassāti akappiyaudakassa. Kappiyaudakasiñcananti
tika-vin01t2:1352_3: imināva siñcāpanampi saṅgahitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Nanu “udakassa secanaṃ secāpana”nti
tika-vin01t2:1352_4: imināva sāmaññato kappiyākappiyaudakasiñcanādiṃ sakkā saṅgahetuṃ, tasmā kappiyaudakasiñcanādi
tika-vin01t2:1352_5: kasmā visuṃ vuttanti? “Ārāmādiatthaṃ ropite akappiyavohāresupi kappiyaudakasiñcanādi
tika-vin01t2:1352_6: vaṭṭatī”ti vakkhamānattā idhāpi vibhāgaṃ katvā kappiyaudakasiñcanādi visuṃ dassitaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1352_8: dasseti. “Akappiyavohāro”ti koṭṭanakhaṇanādivasena sayaṃ karaṇassapi kathaṃ saṅgahoti?
tika-vin01t2:1352_9: Akappiyanti voharīyatīti akappiyavohāroti akappiyabhūtaṃ karaṇakārāpanādi sabbameva
tika-vin01t2:1352_10: saṅgahitaṃ, na pana akappiyavacanamattanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Kappiyavohārepi eseva nayo.
tika-vin01t2:1352_11: Sukkhamātikāya ujukaraṇanti iminā purāṇapaṇṇādiharaṇampi saṅgahitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1352_12: Kudālādīni bhūmiyaṃ ṭhapetvā ṭhānato hatthena gahetvā ṭhānameva pākaṭataranti “obhāso”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1353_0: Mahāpaccarivādamhi patiṭṭhapetukāmo pacchā vadati. Vanatthāyāti idaṃ keci “vatatthāyā”ti
tika-vin01t2:1353_1: paṭhanti, tesaṃ vatiatthāyāti attho. Akappiyavohārepi ekaccaṃ vaṭṭatīti dassetuṃ
tika-vin01t2:1353_2: “na kevalañca sesa”ntiādimāha. Yaṃ kiñci mātikanti sukkhamātikaṃ vā asukkhamātikaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1353_3: vā. “Kappiyaudakaṃ siñcitu”nti iminā “kappiyaudakaṃ siñcathāti vattumpi vaṭṭatī”ti
tika-vin01t2:1353_4: dasseti. Sayaṃ ropetumpi vaṭṭatīti iminā “ropehīti vattuṃ vaṭṭatī”tipi siddhaṃ. Aññatthāya
tika-vin01t2:1353_5: vā karontassāti vatthupūjādiatthaṃ karontassa. Kasmā na anāpattīti vatthupūjanatthāya
tika-vin01t2:1353_6: ganthanādīsu kasmā na anāpatti. Anāpattiyevāti paṭivacanaṃ datvā idāni tameva anāpattibhāvaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1353_7: dassetuṃ “yathāhī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tatthāti ārāmādiatthāya rukkharopane. Tathā vatthupūjanatthāyapi
tika-vin01t2:1353_8: anāpattiyevāti ratanattayapūjanatthāyapi kappiyavohārena pariyāyādīhi ca ganthāpane
tika-vin01t2:1354_0: “Tathā vatthupūjanatthāyā”ti hi sāmaññato vuttepi “yathā hi tattha kappiyavohārena
tika-vin01t2:1354_1: pariyāyādīhi cā”ti vuttattā kappiyavohārādīhi ganthāpane eva anāpatti viññāyati,
tika-vin01t2:1354_2: na sayaṃ ganthane, teneva paro sayaṃ ganthanampi kasmā na vaṭṭatīti codento “nanu
tika-vin01t2:1354_3: cā”tiādimāha. Yathā ārāmādiatthaṃ kappiyapathaviyaṃ sayaṃ ropetumpi vaṭṭati, tathā
tika-vin01t2:1354_4: vatthupūjanatthāya sayaṃ ganthanepi kasmā na vaṭṭatīti codakassa adhippāyo. Vuttantiādi
tika-vin01t2:1354_5: ācariyassa parihāro. Atha “na pana mahāaṭṭhakathāya”nti kasmā vadati. Mahāpaccariādīsu
tika-vin01t2:1354_6: vuttampi hi pamāṇamevāti nāyaṃ virodho, mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ avuttampi tattheva vuttena
tika-vin01t2:1354_7: saṃsanditvā pamāṇamevāti patiṭṭhāpetuṃ vuttattā. Taṃ kathanti maññeyyāsīti sambandho.
tika-vin01t2:1354_8: Mahāaṭṭhakathāyañca kappiyaudakasecanaṃ vuttaṃ, taṃ kathanti etthāyamadhippāyo. Kiñcāpi
tika-vin01t2:1354_9: mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ ārāmādiatthāya kappiyapathaviyaṃ sayaṃ ropanaṃ na vuttaṃ, kappiyaudakassa
tika-vin01t2:1354_10: pana sayaṃ siñcanaṃ vuttameva, tasmā yathā ārāmādiatthāya kappiyaudakaṃ sayaṃ siñcitumpi
tika-vin01t2:1354_11: vaṭṭati, tathā vatthupūjanatthāya sayaṃ ganthanampi kasmā na vaṭṭatīti. Tampi na
tika-vin01t2:1354_12: virujjhatīti yadetaṃ ārāmādiatthāya sayaṃ ropanaṃ kappiyaudakasiñcanañca vuttaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:1354_13: tampi na virujjhati. Kathaṃ taṃ na virujjhatīti āha “tatrahī”tiādi. Etaṃ vuttanti
tika-vin01t2:1354_14: mālāvacchaṃ ropentipi ropāpentipi siñcantipi siñcāpentipīti etaṃ vuttaṃ. Aññatra
tika-vin01t2:1354_15: pana pariyāyo atthīti “mālāvacchaṃ ropentipi ropāpentipi siñcantipi siñcāpentipī”ti
tika-vin01t2:1354_16: kulasaṅgahatthāya ropanasiñcanaṃ sandhāya vuttattā tato aññatra ārāmādiatthāya mālāvaccharopane
tika-vin01t2:1354_17: pariyāyo atthi. Tattha pariyāyaṃ idha ca pariyāyābhāvaṃ ñatvāti tattha “mālāvacchaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1355_0: Nanu ca yathā “ganthentī”ti sāmaññato vuttattā pariyāyo na labbhatīti yassa kassaci
tika-vin01t2:1355_1: atthāya sayaṃ ganthanaṃ na vaṭṭati, evaṃ “ganthāpentī”ti sāmaññato vuttattā pariyāyena
tika-vin01t2:1355_2: ganthāpanampi na vaṭṭatīti āpajjati. Evañca sati parato “evaṃ jāna, evaṃ kate sobheyya,
tika-vin01t2:1355_3: yathā etāni pupphāni na vikiriyanti, tathā karohītiādinā kappiyavacanena kāretuṃ
tika-vin01t2:1355_4: vaṭṭatī”ti idaṃ virujjhatīti? Na virujjhati, pariyāyena hi kārāpanaṃ ganthāpanameva
tika-vin01t2:1355_5: na hoti, tasmā yathāvuttanayena pariyāyato kārāpanaṃ vaṭṭati. Sabbaṃ vuttanayeneva
tika-vin01t2:1355_6: veditabbanti heṭṭhā vuttaṃ vinicchayameva saṅkhepato nigameti. Haraṇādīsu kasmā anāpattīti
tika-vin01t2:1355_7: vatthupūjanatthāya haraṇādīsu kasmā anāpatti. Kulitthiādīnaṃ atthāya haraṇatoti kulitthiādīnaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1355_8: haraṇassa tattha vuttattāti adhippāyo. Tenevāha “haraṇādhikāre hī”tiādi. Mālanti
tika-vin01t2:1355_9: pupphadāmaṃ. Mañjarī viyāti kusumamañjarī viya. Hārasadisanti muttāhārasadisaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1356_1: dukkaṭaṃ. Akappiyavohārenāti “idaṃ khaṇa, idaṃ ropehī”tiādiakappiyavohārena. Dukkaṭamevāti
tika-vin01t2:1356_2: kulasaṅgahapaccayā dukkaṭaṃ. Ubhayatthāti kappiyākappiyapathaviyaṃ. Sabbatthāti kulasaṅgahaparibhogaārāmādiatthāya
tika-vin01t2:1356_3: ropite. Dukkaṭampīti na kevalaṃ pācittiyameva. Kappiyenāti kappiyena udakena. Tesaṃyeva
tika-vin01t2:1356_4: dvinnanti kuladūsanaparibhogānaṃ. Dukkaṭanti kulasaṅgahatthāya sayaṃ siñcane kappiyavohārena
tika-vin01t2:1356_5: akappiyavohārena vā siñcāpane ca dukkaṭaṃ, paribhogatthāya pana sayaṃ siñcane akappiyavohārena
tika-vin01t2:1356_6: siñcāpane ca dukkaṭaṃ. Āpattibahulatā veditabbāti ettha sayaṃ siñcane dhārāpacchedagaṇanāya
tika-vin01t2:1356_7: āpattigaṇanā veditabbā. Siñcāpane pana punappunaṃ āṇāpentassa vācāya vācāya āpatti,
tika-vin01t2:1357_1: Aññatthāti vatthupūjādiatthāya ocinane. Sakiṃ āṇattoti akappiyavohārena āṇatto. Pācittiyamevāti
tika-vin01t2:1357_2: akappiyavacanena āṇattattā pācittiyaṃ. Kappiyavacanena pana vatthupūjādiatthāya ocināpentassa anāpattiyeva.
tika-vin01t2:1358_0: Ganthanena nibbattaṃ gantimaṃ. Esa nayo sesesupi. Na vaṭṭatīti kulasaṅgahatthāya
tika-vin01t2:1358_1: vatthupūjādiatthāya vā vuttanayena karontassa ca kārāpentassa ca dukkaṭanti attho.
tika-vin01t2:1358_3: pupphāni vijjhitvā ṭhapentīti sambandho. Uparūpari vijjhitvā chattasadisaṃ katvā
tika-vin01t2:1358_5: sandhāya “taṃ atioḷārikamevā”ti vuttaṃ, sayaṃ karontassa akappiyavacaneneva kārāpentassa
tika-vin01t2:1358_6: ca dukkaṭamevāti attho. Pupphavijjhanatthanti vuttattā pupphāni vijjhituṃyeva kaṇṭakaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1358_7: bandhituṃ na vaṭṭati, pupphadāmādibandhanatthaṃ pana vaṭṭati. Kaṇṭakampi bandhituṃ
tika-vin01t2:1358_8: na vaṭṭatīti ca idaṃ aṭṭhakathācariyappamāṇena gahetabbaṃ. Pavesetuṃ na vaṭṭatīti
tika-vin01t2:1358_9: vuttattā pupphacchidde apavesetvā uparūpari ṭhapetuṃ vaṭṭati. Jālamayaṃ vitānaṃ jālavitānaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1358_10: Nāgadantakampi sacchiddakaṃyeva gahetabbaṃ. Pupphapaṭicchakaṃ daṇḍādīhi katapupphādhāraṇaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:1358_11: tampi sacchiddameva idha vuttaṃ. Asokapiṇḍiyāti asokapupphamañjarikāya. “Dhammarajju
tika-vin01t2:1358_12: nāma cetiyaṃ vā bodhiṃ vā pupphapavesanatthaṃ āvijjhitvā baddharajjū”ti mahāgaṇṭhipade
tika-vin01t2:1358_13: majjhimagaṇṭhipade ca vuttaṃ, tasmā tathābaddhāya rajjuyā cetiyassa ca antare pupphāni
tika-vin01t2:1358_14: pavesetuṃ vaṭṭatīti viññāyati. Gaṇṭhipade pana “dhammarajjunti sithilaṃ vaṭṭikaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1358_15: rajjuṃ katvā bodhiṃ vā cetiyaṃ vā parikkhipitvā dhammāsane vā lambitvā tattha pupphāni
tika-vin01t2:1358_16: pavesentī”ti vuttaṃ, tasmā sithilavaṭṭikāya rajjuyā antarepi pupphāni pavesetuṃ vaṭṭatīti
tika-vin01t2:1358_17: viññāyati, vīmaṃsitvā yuttataraṃ gahetabbaṃ. Ubhayatthāpi panettha nevatthi virodhoti amhākaṃ khanti.
tika-vin01t2:1359_0: Matthakadāmanti dhammāsanādimatthake lambakadāmaṃ. Pupphehi veṭhentīti pupphadāmena
tika-vin01t2:1359_1: veṭhenti. Tesaṃyevāti uppalādīnaṃyeva. Vākena vā daṇḍakena vāti visuṃ acchinnena
tika-vin01t2:1359_2: pupphasahiteneva vākena vā daṇḍakena vā. Khandhe ṭhapitakāsāvassāti khandhe ṭhapitasaṅghāṭiṃ
tika-vin01t2:1359_3: sandhāya vuttaṃ. Tañhi tathā bandhituṃ sakkā bhaveyya. Imināva aññampi tādisaṃ kāsāvaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1359_4: vā vatthaṃ vā vuttanayena bandhitvā tattha pupphāni pakkhipituṃ vaṭṭatīti siddhaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1359_5: Aṃsabhaṇḍikaṃ pasibbake pakkhittasadisattā veṭhimaṃ nāma na jātaṃ, tasmā sithilabandhassa
tika-vin01t2:1360_0: Pupphapaṭe ca daṭṭhabbanti pupphapaṭaṃ karontassa dīghato pupphadāmassa haraṇapaccāharaṇavasena
tika-vin01t2:1360_1: pūraṇaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Tiriyato haraṇaṃ pana vāyimaṃ nāma hoti, na pūrimaṃ. Purimaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1360_2: atikkāmetīti ettha “aphusāpetvāpi atikkāmentassa āpattiyevā”ti tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu
tika-vin01t2:1360_3: vuttaṃ. “Purimaṭṭhānaṃ atikkāmetī”ti avisesena vuttattā taṃ yuttaṃ. Keci pana “aññamaññaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1360_4: aphusāpetvā anekakkhattuṃ parikkhipituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vadantīti vuttaṃ, tattha kāraṇaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1360_5: na dissati. Bandhituṃ vaṭṭatīti puppharahitāya suttakoṭiyā vākakoṭiyā vā bandhituṃ
tika-vin01t2:1360_6: vaṭṭati. Ekavāraṃ haritvā vā parikkhipitvā vāti idaṃ pubbe vuttacetiyādiparikkhepaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1360_7: pupphapaṭakaraṇañca sandhāya vuttaṃ, tasmā cetiyaṃ vā bodhiṃ vā parikkhipantena ekavāraṃ
tika-vin01t2:1360_8: parikkhipitvā purimaṭṭhānaṃ sampatte aññassa dātabbaṃ, tenapi ekavāraṃ parikkhipitvā
tika-vin01t2:1360_9: tatheva kātabbaṃ. Pupphapaṭaṃ karontena ca ekavāraṃ haritvā aññassa dātabbaṃ, tenapi
tika-vin01t2:1360_10: tatheva kātabbaṃ. Sacepi dveyeva bhikkhū ubhosu passesu ṭhatvā pariyāyena haranti,
tika-vin01t2:1361_0: Pūritanti dīghato pasāraṇavasena pūritaṃ. Vāyituṃ na labhatīti dīghato pasārite tiriyato
tika-vin01t2:1361_1: haraṇaṃ vāyanaṃ nāma hotīti ekavārampi pupphaguṇaṃ tiriyato harituṃ na vaṭṭati. Pupphāni
tika-vin01t2:1361_2: ṭhapentenāti aganthitāni pākatikapupphāni ṭhapentena. Pupphadāmaṃ pana pūjanatthāya
tika-vin01t2:1361_3: bhūmiyaṃ ṭhapentena phusāpetvā vā aphusāpetvā vā diguṇaṃ katvā ṭhapetuṃ na vaṭṭatīti
tika-vin01t2:1361_4: vadanti. Ghaṭikadāmaolambakoti ante ghaṭikākārayutto yamakadāmaolambako. Ekekaṃ pana
tika-vin01t2:1361_5: dāmaṃ nikkhantasuttakoṭiyāva bandhitvā olambituṃ vaṭṭati, pupphadāmadvayaṃ saṅghaṭitukāmenapi
tika-vin01t2:1361_6: nikkhantasuttakoṭiyāva suttakoṭiṃ saṅghaṭituṃ vaṭṭati. Aḍḍhacandākārena mālāguṇaparikkhepoti
tika-vin01t2:1361_7: aḍḍhacandākārena mālāguṇassa punappunaṃ haraṇapaccāharaṇavasena pūretvā parikkhipanaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1361_8: Teneva taṃ pūrime paviṭṭhaṃ, tasmā etampi aḍḍhacandākāraṃ punappunaṃ haraṇapaccāharaṇavasena
tika-vin01t2:1361_9: pūritaṃ na vaṭṭati. Ekavāraṃ pana aḍḍhacandākārena mālāguṇaṃ harituṃ vaṭṭatīti vadanti.
tika-vin01t2:1361_10: Pupphadāmakaraṇanti ettha suttakoṭiyaṃ gahetvāpi ekato kātuṃ na vaṭṭatīti vadanti.
tika-vin01t2:1361_11: Geṇḍukakharapattadāmānaṃ paṭikkhittattā celādīhi katadāmampi na vaṭṭati akappiyānulomattāti vadanti.
tika-vin01t2:1362_0: “Lāsiyanāṭakaṃ nāṭentī”ti vatvā tameva pariyāyantarena dassetuṃ “recakaṃ dentī”ti
tika-vin01t2:1362_1: vuttaṃ, abhinayaṃ dassentīti attho, attano adhippāyaṃ pakāsetvā “evaṃ naccitabba”nti
tika-vin01t2:1362_2: paṭhamaṃ uṭṭhahitvā naccanākāraṃ dassentīti vuttaṃ hoti. Keci pana “mukhe aṅguliyo
tika-vin01t2:1362_3: pakkhipitvā saddaṃ karontā cakkamiva attānaṃ bhamayamānā recakaṃ denti nāmā”ti vadanti.
tika-vin01t2:1362_4: Ekekāya pantiyā aṭṭha aṭṭha padāni assāti aṭṭhapadaṃ. “Aṭṭhāpada”ntipi paṭhanti.
tika-vin01t2:1362_5: Dasapadepi eseva nayo. Padānīti ca sāriādīnaṃ patiṭṭhānaṭṭhānāni. Dasapadaṃ nāma
tika-vin01t2:1362_6: dvīhi pantīhi vīsatiyā padehi kīḷanajūtaṃ. Ākāseyeva kīḷantīti “ayaṃ sārī asukapadaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1362_7: mayā nītā, ayaṃ asukapada”nti kevalaṃ mukheneva vadantā ākāseyeva jūtaṃ kīḷanti.
tika-vin01t2:1362_8: Jūtaphalaketi jūtamaṇḍale. Pāsakakīḷāya kīḷantīti pāsakaṃ vuccati chasu passesu ekekaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1362_9: yāva chakkaṃ dassetvā katakīḷanaṃ, taṃ vaḍḍhetvā yathāladdhaekakādivasena sāriyo
tika-vin01t2:1362_10: apanentā upanentā ca kīḷanti. Ghaṭena kīḷā ghaṭikāti eke.
tika-vin01t2:1363_0: Mañjaṭṭhiyā vāti mañjaṭṭhirukkhasāraṃ gahetvā pakkakasāvaṃ sandhāya vadati. Salākahatthanti
tika-vin01t2:1363_1: tālahīrādīnaṃ kalāpassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Bahūsu salākāsu visesarahitaṃ ekaṃ salākaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1363_2: gahetvā tāsu pakkhipitvā puna taṃyeva uddharantā salākahatthena kīḷantīti keci. Paṇṇena
tika-vin01t2:1363_3: vaṃsākārena katā nāḷikā paṇṇanāḷikā. Tenevāha “taṃ dhamantā”ti. Pucchantassa mukhāgataṃ
tika-vin01t2:1363_4: akkharaṃ gahetvā naṭṭhamuṭṭhilābhālābhādijānanakīḷā akkharikātipi vadanti. Hatthisminti
tika-vin01t2:1363_5: nimittatthe bhummaṃ, hatthinimittasippeti attho. Assasmintiādīsupi eseva nayo. “Usseḷenti
tika-vin01t2:1363_6: apphoṭentī”ti dvinnaṃ padānaṃ attho pākaṭoyevāti na vutto. Tattha usseḷentīti mukhena
tika-vin01t2:1363_7: usseḷanasaddaṃ pamuñcanti, mahantaṃ katvā abyattasaddaṃ pavattentīti attho. “Ajānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1363_8: saññaṃ dentā ajapālakā viya mukhena vātaṃ nicchārentā sukhumaṃ abyattanādaṃ pavattentī”tipi
tika-vin01t2:1363_9: vadanti. Apphoṭentīti bhujahatthasaṅghaṭṭanasaddaṃ pavattenti, vāmahatthaṃ ure ṭhapetvā
tika-vin01t2:1363_10: dakkhiṇena pāṇinā tattha tāḷanena saddaṃ karontīti attho. Mukhaḍiṇḍimanti mukhabheriyā etaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1364_1: Paṭikkamanaṃ paṭikkantaṃ. Nivattanenāti nivattimattaṃ dasseti. Nivattetvā pana gamanaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1364_2: gamanameva. Abhimukhaṃ lokitaṃ ālokitanti āha “purato dassanenā”ti. Ito cito ca dassanenāti
tika-vin01t2:1364_3: anudisāpekkhanaṃ dasseti. Yaṃdisābhimukho gacchati tiṭṭhati nisīdati, tadabhimukhaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1364_4: pekkhanaṃ ālokitaṃ, tadanugatadisālokanaṃ “vilokita”nti hi vuccati. Aññānipi heṭṭhā
tika-vin01t2:1364_5: upari pacchato pekkhanavasena olokitaullokitāpalokitāni nāma honti. Tāni pana na
tika-vin01t2:1364_6: samaṇasāruppāni appasādāvahāni, tenevettha ālokitavilokitāneva gahitāni. Tesanti
tika-vin01t2:1364_7: samāse guṇībhūtānipi pabbāni parāmasati. “Pabbasaṅkocanenā”ti hi vuttattā pabbāni
tika-vin01t2:1364_8: tattha guṇībhūtāni saṅkocanassa padhānattā. Satisampajaññehīti sātthakatādipariggāhikāya
tika-vin01t2:1364_9: satiyā tathāpavattasampajaññena ca samantato pakārehi, pakaṭṭhaṃ vā savisesaṃ jānātīti
tika-vin01t2:1364_10: sampajāno, tassa bhāvo sampajaññaṃ. Tathāpavattañāṇassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Abhisaṅkhatattāti
tika-vin01t2:1364_11: sammā pavattitattā. Heṭṭhākhittacakkhūti khandhaṃ anāmetvāva adhokhittacakkhu. Khandhaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1364_12: nāmetvā hi heṭṭhāvalokanaṃ na samaṇasāruppaṃ. “Okkhittacakkhū”ti ca iminā yugamattadassitā vuttā.
tika-vin01t2:1365_0: Bondoti lolo mandadhātukoti attho. Bhakuṭiṃ katvāti bhamukabhedaṃ katvā. Sākhalyena
tika-vin01t2:1365_1: yuttāti “tattha katamaṃ sākhalyaṃ? Yā sā vācā nelā kaṇṇasukhā”tiādinā nayena vuttasākhalyena
tika-vin01t2:1365_2: samannāgatā, muduvacanāti attho. Nelāti elaṃ vuccati doso, nāssā elanti nelā, niddosāti
tika-vin01t2:1365_3: attho. Kaṇṇasukhāti byañjanamadhuratāya kaṇṇānaṃ sukhā, sūcinā vijjhanaṃ viya kaṇṇasūlaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1366_1: idaṃ ekasesanayena vuttanti ayamattho pākaṭoyevāti na vutto. “Sāriputtā”ti hi idaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1366_2: ekasesanayena vuttaṃ virūpekasesassapi icchitattā, tenevettha bahuvacananiddeso katoti.
tika-vin01t2:1366_3: Saddhassa pasannassāti ratanattayassa saddhāya samannāgatassa tatoyeva ca pasannassa,
tika-vin01t2:1366_4: kammaphalasaddhāya vā samannāgatattā saddhassa ratanattayappasādabahulatāya pasannassa.
tika-vin01t2:1367_0: 433. Āpattiṃ ropetabbāti kuladūsakakammena āpannāpattiṃ ropetabbā. Tasmiṃ vihāreti
tika-vin01t2:1367_1: bahigāme vihāraṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Antogāme vihāro pana “tasmiṃ gāme na vasitabba”nti
tika-vin01t2:1367_2: imināva saṅgahito gāmaggahaṇeneva gahitattā. “Tasmiṃ vihāre”ti vacanato tassa gāmassa
tika-vin01t2:1367_3: sāmantā aññasmiṃ vihāre vasituṃ vaṭṭati. Sāmantagāme piṇḍāya na caritabbanti tasmiṃ
tika-vin01t2:1367_4: vihāre vāsassa paṭikkhittattā yadi tattha vasati, tena sāmantagāmepi piṇḍāya na caritabbanti
tika-vin01t2:1367_5: adhippāyo. Tasmiṃ gāme piṇḍāya na caritabbanti yasmiṃ gāme kuladūsakakammaṃ kataṃ,
tika-vin01t2:1367_6: tasmiṃ gāme na caritabbaṃ. Yasmiñhi gāme vā nigame vā kuladūsakakammaṃ kataṃ, yasmiñca
tika-vin01t2:1367_7: vihāre vasati, neva tasmiṃ gāme vā nigame vā carituṃ labbhati, na vihāre vasituṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1367_8: Sāmantavihāre vasantena pana sāmantagāme carituṃ vaṭṭati tattha vāsassa appaṭikkhittattā.
tika-vin01t2:1368_0: 435. Aṭṭhārasa vattānīti “na upasampādetabbaṃ, na nissayo dātabbo, na sāmaṇero upaṭṭhāpetabbo,
tika-vin01t2:1368_1: na bhikkhunovādakasammuti sāditabbā, sammatena bhikkhuniyo na ovaditabbā, yāya āpattiyā
tika-vin01t2:1368_2: saṅghena pabbājanīyakammaṃ kataṃ hoti, na sā āpatti āpajjitabbā aññā vā tādisikā
tika-vin01t2:1368_3: tato vā pāpiṭṭhatarā, kammaṃ na garahitabbaṃ, kammikā na garahitabbā, na pakatattassa
tika-vin01t2:1368_4: bhikkhuno uposatho ṭhapetabbo, na pavāraṇā ṭhapetabbā, na savacanīyaṃ kātabbaṃ, na
tika-vin01t2:1368_5: anuvādo ṭhapetabbo, na okāso kāretabbo, na codetabbo, na sāretabbo, na bhikkhūhi
tika-vin01t2:1369_2: yena vattena ciṇṇena saṅgho anulomiko hoti, tasmiṃ avattanatoti vuttaṃ hoti. Na pannalomā
tika-vin01t2:1369_3: hontīti patitalomā na honti, anukūlavuttino na hontīti attho. Nittharaṇamaggaṃ na
tika-vin01t2:1369_4: paṭipajjantīti anulomavattasaṅkhātaṃ nittharaṇūpāyaṃ na paṭipajjanti, yena vattena
tika-vin01t2:1369_5: ciṇṇena sāpattikabhāvato nittiṇṇā honti, tasmiṃ nittharaṇakavattasmiṃ na vattanti,
tika-vin01t2:1369_6: āpattivuṭṭhānatthaṃ turitaturitā chandajātā na hontīti vuttaṃ hoti. Dasahi akkosavatthūhīti
tika-vin01t2:1369_8: Chandagāmitā pāpentītiādīsu ya-kāro “sayaṃ abhiññā”tiādīsu viya luttaniddiṭṭhoti
tika-vin01t2:1370_0: 436-437. Nigamassa apākaṭattā taṃ dassetuṃ “tatthā”tiādimāha. Parasantakaṃ deti,
tika-vin01t2:1370_1: dukkaṭamevāti vissāsaggāhena parasantakaṃ gahetvā dentaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Tañca kho
tika-vin01t2:1370_2: vatthupūjanatthāyāti mātāpitūnampi dentena vatthupūjanatthāya eva dātabbanti dasseti.
tika-vin01t2:1370_3: “Maṇḍanatthāya pana sivaliṅgādipūjanatthāyāti ettakameva vuttattā imaṃ vikkiṇitvā
tika-vin01t2:1370_4: jīvikampi kappessantīti mātuādīnaṃ dātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vadanti. Kassacipīti ñātakassa
tika-vin01t2:1370_5: aññātakassa vā kassacipi. Ñātisāmaṇerehevāti anucchavikattā vuttaṃ. Sampattānaṃ sāmaṇerānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1370_6: upaḍḍhabhāgaṃ dātuṃ vaṭṭatīti saṅghikassa lābhassa upacārasīmagatānaṃ sāmaṇerānampi
tika-vin01t2:1370_7: santakattā tesampi upaḍḍhabhāgo labbhatevāti katvā vuttaṃ. Cūḷakanti upaḍḍhabhāgatopi
tika-vin01t2:1371_0: “Sāmaṇerā…pe… ṭhapentī”ti idaṃ vassaggena abhājiyaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Tattha tatthāti
tika-vin01t2:1371_1: magge vā cetiyaṅgaṇe vā. Dāpetuṃ na labhantīti sāmaṇerehi dāpetuṃ ananucchavikattā
tika-vin01t2:1371_2: vuttaṃ. Na hi taṃ pupphadānaṃ nāma siyā. Yadi hi tathā āgatānaṃ tesaṃ dānaṃ pupphadānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1371_3: bhaveyya, sāmaṇerehipi dātuṃ na labbheyya. Sayamevāti sāmaṇerā sayameva. Yāgubhattādīni
tika-vin01t2:1371_4: ādāyāti idaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ atthāya yāgubhattādisampādanaṃ sandhāya vuttattā “na vaṭṭatī”ti avisesena vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1372_0: Vuttanayenevāti mātāpitūnaṃ tāva haritvāpi harāpetvāpi pakkositvāpi pakkosāpetvāpi
tika-vin01t2:1372_1: dātuṃ vaṭṭati, sesañātakānaṃ pakkosāpetvāva. Mātāpitūnañca harāpentena ñātisāmaṇereheva
tika-vin01t2:1372_2: harāpetabbaṃ, itare pana yadi sayameva icchanti, vaṭṭatīti imaṃ pupphe vuttanayaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1372_3: phalepi atidisati, tasmā phalampi mātāpitūnaṃ haraṇaharāpanādinā dātuṃ vaṭṭati, sesañātīnaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1372_4: pakkosāpetvāva. Idāni “yo haritvā vā harāpetvā vā…pe… issaravatāya dadato thullaccaya”nti
tika-vin01t2:1372_5: imaṃ pupphe vuttanayaṃ phalepi saṅkhipitvā dassento “kulasaṅgahatthāya panā”tiādimāha.
tika-vin01t2:1372_6: Khīṇaparibbayānanti āgantuke sandhāya vuttaṃ. Phalaparicchedena vāti “ettakāni phalāni
tika-vin01t2:1372_7: dātabbānī”ti evaṃ phalaparicchedena vā. Rukkhaparicchedena vāti “imehi rukkhehi dātabbānī”ti
tika-vin01t2:1372_8: evaṃ rukkhaparicchedena vā. Paricchinnesupi rukkhesu “idha phalāni sundarāni, ito
tika-vin01t2:1372_9: gaṇhathā”ti vadantena kulasaṅgaho kato nāma hotīti āha “evaṃ pana na vattabba”nti.
tika-vin01t2:1373_0: Rukkhacchallīti rukkhattaco. Tesaṃ tesaṃ gihīnaṃ gāmantaradesantarādīsu sāsanapaṭisāsanaharaṇaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1373_1: jaṅghapesanikaṃ. Tenāha “gihīnaṃ dūteyyaṃ sāsanaharaṇakamma”nti. Dūtassa kammaṃ dūteyyaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1373_2: Paṭhamaṃ sāsanaṃ aggahetvāpi…pe… pade pade dukkaṭanti idaṃ tassa sāsanaṃ ārocessāmīti
tika-vin01t2:1373_3: iminā adhippāyena gamanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, tassa pana sāsanaṃ paṭikkhipitvā sayameva
tika-vin01t2:1373_4: kāruññe ṭhito gantvā attano patirūpaṃ sāsanaṃ āroceti, anāpatti. Pubbe vuttappakāranti
tika-vin01t2:1373_5: “mama vacanena bhagavato pāde vandathā”tiādinā vuttappakāraṃ sikkhāpade paṭhamaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1373_6: vuttaṃ. Pakkamatāyasmāti idaṃ pabbājanīyakammavasena vuttaṃ. Puna pakkamatāyasmāti
tika-vin01t2:1373_7: idaṃ pana pabbājanīyakammakatassa vattavasena vuttaṃ. Paṭhamasaṅghabhedasadisānevāti
tika-vin01t2:1373_8: ettha aṅgesupi yathā tattha parakkamanaṃ, evaṃ idha chandādīhi pāpanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Sesaṃ tādisamevāti.
tika-vin01t2:1376_0: 442. Paṭhamaṃ āpatti āpajjanaṃ etesanti paṭhamāpattikā. Tattakāni ahānīti paṭicchāditadivasato
tika-vin01t2:1376_1: paṭṭhāya yāva ārocitadivaso, tāva divasapakkhamāsasaṃvaccharavasena yattako kālo
tika-vin01t2:1376_2: atikkanto, tattakaṃ kālanti attho. Akāmena avasenāti ettha appaṭikammakatāya āpattiyā
tika-vin01t2:1376_3: saggamokkhāvaraṇabhāvato anicchantenapi parivasitabbanti adhippāyo. Avhātabboti abbhānakammavasena
tika-vin01t2:1376_4: pakkositabbo. Te ca bhikkhū gārayhāti ettha ye ūnabhāvaṃ ñatvā abbhenti, te bhikkhū
tika-vin01t2:1376_5: ca garahitabbā sātisārā sadosā, dukkaṭaṃ āpajjantīti ayamattho pākaṭoyevāti na vutto. Sāmīcīti vattaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1381_0: 443. Puttasaddena sāmaññaniddesato ekasesanayena vā puttīpi gahitāti āha “bahū dhītaro
tika-vin01t2:1381_1: cā”ti. Dānappadānesūti khuddakesu ceva mahantesu ca dānesu. Chaṇaṃ nāma attano gehe
tika-vin01t2:1381_5: ettha nakkhattasaddo paccekaṃ yojetabbo. Tattha āsāḷhīnakkhattanti vassūpagamanapūjādivasaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1381_6: sandhāya vuttaṃ, pavāraṇanakkhattanti pavāraṇapūjādivasaṃ sandhāya. Ādi-saddena yasmiṃ
tika-vin01t2:1381_7: nakkhatte gāmanigamavāsino tayo satta vā divase nakkhattaghosanaṃ katvā yathāvibhavaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1381_8: alaṅkatapaṭiyattā bhoge paribhuñjantā nakkhattakīḷaṃ kīḷanti, tampi saṅgaṇhāti. Imepi
tika-vin01t2:1381_9: dārakāti attano dārake sandhāya vadanti. Tadanantaranti bhikkhūnaṃ bhojanānantaraṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1382_0: 444-445. Taṃ kammanti taṃ ajjhācārakammaṃ. Bhikkhu nisinneti ettha bhikkhūti bhummatthe
tika-vin01t2:1382_1: paccattavacanaṃ, bhummavacanassa vā lopaṃ katvā niddesoti āha “bhikkhumhi nisinne”ti.
tika-vin01t2:1382_2: Pāḷiyaṃ “sotassa raho”ti idaṃ atthuddhāravasena vuttaṃ, “paṭicchanne āsane”ti pana
tika-vin01t2:1382_3: vacanato “sakkā hoti methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevitu”nti ca vuttattā cakkhussa raho idhādhippetoti
tika-vin01t2:1382_4: dassetuṃ “kiñcāpī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Paricchedo veditabboti raho nisajjāpattiyā paricchedo
tika-vin01t2:1382_5: vavatthānaṃ veditabbaṃ. Idāni cakkhussa raheneva āpattiṃ paricchinditvā dassento
tika-vin01t2:1382_6: “sacepi hī”tiādimāha. Pihitakavāṭassāti iminā paṭicchannabhāvato cakkhussa rahosabbhāvaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1382_7: dasseti. Apihitakavāṭassāti iminā appaṭicchannabhāvaṃ dasseti. Appaṭicchanne ca dutiyasikkhāpade
tika-vin01t2:1382_8: āgatanayena sotassa rahavasenapi paricchedo veditabboti āha “antodvādasahatthepi
tika-vin01t2:1382_9: okāse”ti. “Antodvādasahatthe”ti hi idaṃ sotassa rahābhāvaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Yadi
tika-vin01t2:1382_10: hi cakkhusseva rahābhāvaṃ sandhāya vadeyya, “antodvādasahatthe”ti na vadeyya appaṭicchanne
tika-vin01t2:1382_11: tato dūratare nisinnepi cakkhussa rahāsambhavato. Yasmā nisīditvā niddāyanto kapimiddhapareto
tika-vin01t2:1382_12: kañci kālaṃ cakkhūni ummīleti, kañci kālaṃ nimīleti, na ca mahāniddaṃ okkamati, tasmā
tika-vin01t2:1382_13: “niddāyantopi anāpattiṃ karotī”ti vuttaṃ. Nipajjitvā niddāyanto pana tādiso na hotīti
tika-vin01t2:1382_14: āha “nipajjitvā niddāyanto na karotī”ti, anāpattiṃ na karotīti attho.
tika-vin01t2:1383_1: sotāpattimaggena paṭividdhacatusaccā. Tiṇṇaṃ dhammānaṃ aññatarena kāretabboti nisajjaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1383_2: paṭijānamānassa tiṇṇaṃ dhammānaṃ aññatarasamāyogo hotiyevāti vuttaṃ. Pārājikena pana
tika-vin01t2:1383_3: saṅghādisesena ca pācittiyena ca tenākārena nisajjaṃ paṭijānamānova kāretabbo. Na
tika-vin01t2:1383_4: appaṭijānamānoti alajjīpi appaṭijānamāno āpattiyā na kāretabboti avisesena vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1383_5: So hi yāva na paṭijānāti, tāva neva suddho, na asuddhoti vā vattabbo, vattānusandhinā
tika-vin01t2:1384: “Paṭiññā lajjīsu katā, alajjīsu evaṃ na vijjati;
tika-vin01t2:1386_0: Yena vā sā saddheyyavacasā upāsikā vadeyya, tena so bhikkhu kāretabboti ettha “paṭijānamāno”ti
tika-vin01t2:1386_1: avuttepi adhikārattā “paṭijānamānova tena so bhikkhu kāretabbo”ti vuttaṃ. Tathārūpāya
tika-vin01t2:1386_2: upāsikāya vacanena aññathattābhāvato diṭṭhaṃ nāma tathāpi hoti, aññathāpi hotīti
tika-vin01t2:1386_3: dassanena aññathattasambhavaṃ dasseti. Evaṃ mahiddhikā nāma…pe… vadāpethāti idaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1386_4: “evaṃ mahiddhikāpi tumhe evarūpe āsaṅkanīye ṭhāne kasmā anupaparikkhitvā nisinnattha,
tika-vin01t2:1386_5: tumhādisehi nāma antaraghare nisīdantehi upaparikkhitvā patirūpe ṭhāne nisīditabba”nti
tika-vin01t2:1386_6: theraṃ ovadanto āha, na pana asaddahanto. Thero attano anupaparikkhitvā anisinnabhāvaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1386_7: dassento “antaragharasseveso āvuso doso”ti āha. Evamakāsinti attano nigūhitabbampi
tika-vin01t2:1386_8: guṇaṃ pakāsento evaṃ viya iddhipāṭihāriyaṃ akāsiṃ. Rakkheyyāsi manti “mā maṃ aññepi
tika-vin01t2:1386_9: evaṃ jānantū”ti attano guṇaṃ ajānāpetukāmo vadati.
tika-vin01t2:1387_0: 446-451. Mātugāmassa methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevantoti ettha “magge”ti pāṭhaseso daṭṭhabboti
tika-vin01t2:1387_1: āha “mātugāmassa magge”ti. Raho nisajjassādassa asatipi methunarāgabhāve tappaṭibaddhakilesattā
tika-vin01t2:1387_3: Taṃ sandhāya agatepi asuddhacittena gatattā “assāde uppanne pācittiya”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1387_4: Rahassādo uppajjati anāpattīti suddhacittena gantvā nisinnattā cittuppādamattenettha
tika-vin01t2:1387_5: āpatti na hotīti vuttaṃ. Ayaṃ dhammo aniyatoti ettha tiṇṇaṃ āpattīnaṃ yaṃ āpattiṃ
tika-vin01t2:1387_6: vā vatthuṃ vā paṭijānāti, tassa vasena kāretabbatāya aniyatoti ayamattho pākaṭoyevāti
tika-vin01t2:1387_7: na vutto. Yaṃ āpattiṃ paṭijānāti, tassā vasenettha aṅgabhedo veditabbo.
tika-vin01t2:1390: 452. “Eko”ti vuttattā “nisajjaṃ kappetuṃ paṭikkhitta”nti iminā sambandho na ghaṭatīti āha “yaṃ eko…pe… sambandho veditabbo”ti. Etaṃ paccattavacananti “eko”ti idaṃ paccattavacanaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1391_0: 453. Bahi parikkhittanti bahi pākārādinā parikkhittaṃ. Pariveṇaṅgaṇanti pariveṇamāḷakaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1391_1: sandhāya vuttaṃ. Itthīpi purisopīti ettha paṭhame kasmā itthisatampi anāpattiṃ na
tika-vin01t2:1391_2: karoti, idha ekāpi kasmā anāpattiṃ karotīti? Vuccate – paṭhamasikkhāpadaṃ “sakkā
tika-vin01t2:1391_3: hoti methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevitu”nti vuttattā methunadhammavasena āgataṃ, na ca methunassa
tika-vin01t2:1391_4: mātugāmo dutiyo hoti. Itthiyo hi aññamaññissā vajjaṃ paṭicchādenti, teneva vesāliyaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1391_5: mahāvane dvāraṃ vivaritvā nipanne bhikkhumhi sambahulā itthiyo yāvadatthaṃ katvā
tika-vin01t2:1391_6: pakkamiṃsu, tasmā tattha “itthisatampi anāpattiṃ na karotī”ti vuttaṃ. Idaṃ pana sikkhāpadaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1391_7: duṭṭhullavācāvasena āgataṃ “alañca kho hoti mātugāmaṃ duṭṭhullāhi vācāhi obhāsitu”nti
tika-vin01t2:1391_8: vuttattā. Duṭṭhullavācañca sutvā mātugāmopi na paṭicchādeti. Teneva duṭṭhullavācāsikkhāpade
tika-vin01t2:1391_9: yā tā itthiyo hirimanā, tā nikkhamitvā bhikkhū ujjhāpesuṃ, tasmā idha “itthīpi anāpattiṃ
tika-vin01t2:1391_10: karotī”ti vuttaṃ. Idha appaṭicchannattā itthīpi anāpattiṃ karoti, tattha paṭicchannattā
tika-vin01t2:1391_11: itthisatampi anāpattiṃ na karotīti ca vadanti.
tika-vin01t2:1392_0: Kāyasaṃsaggavasena anandho vutto, duṭṭhullavācāvasena abadhiro. Antodvādasahatthe
tika-vin01t2:1392_1: okāseti sotassa rahābhāvo vutto, etena “sotassa raho dvādasahatthena paricchinditabbo”ti
tika-vin01t2:1392_2: dasseti. Tasmā dvādasahatthato bahi nisinno anāpattiṃ na karoti satipi cakkhussa
tika-vin01t2:1392_3: rahābhāve sotassa rahasabbhāvato. Imasmiñhi sikkhāpade appaṭicchannattā sotassa rahoyeva
tika-vin01t2:1392_4: adhippeto. Pāḷiyaṃ pana “cakkhussa raho”ti atthuddhāravasena vuttaṃ. Kenaci pana
tika-vin01t2:1392_5: “dvepi rahā idha adhippetā”ti vuttaṃ, taṃ na gahetabbaṃ. Na hi appaṭicchanne okāse
tika-vin01t2:1392_6: cakkhussa raho sambhavati dvādasahatthato bahi dassanavisaye dūratare nisinnassapi
tika-vin01t2:1392_7: daṭṭhuṃ sakkuṇeyyabhāvato. Niddāyantopīti iminā “nipajjitvā niddāyantopi gahitoyevā”ti
tika-vin01t2:1392_8: tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ. “Nipajjitvā niddāyantepi satipi cakkhussa rahe abadhirattā
tika-vin01t2:1392_9: sotassa raho natthī”ti gaṇṭhipadakārānaṃ adhippāyo. Yathā pana nipajjitvā niddāyanto
tika-vin01t2:1392_10: andho viya kiñci na passatīti cakkhussa raho sambhavati, tathā badhiro viya kiñci
tika-vin01t2:1392_11: saddaṃ na suṇātīti sotassa rahopi sambhavatīti sakkā vattuṃ. Aṭṭhakathāyañca ṭhito
tika-vin01t2:1392_12: vā nisinno vāti ettakameva vuttaṃ, paṭhamasikkhāpade viya “nipajjitvā niddāyantopi
tika-vin01t2:1392_13: anāpattiṃ na karotī”ti idaṃ pana na vuttaṃ, tasmā vīmaṃsitvā yathā na virujjhati, tathā gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1393_0: Sotassa rahasseva idhādhippetattā “badhiro pana cakkhumāpī”ti vuttaṃ. Andhassa appaṭicchannampi
tika-vin01t2:1393_1: paṭicchannapakkhaṃ bhajatīti paṭhamasikkhāpadassa visayattā vuttaṃ “andho vā abadhiropi
tika-vin01t2:1393_2: na karotī”ti. Yatheva hi tattha apihitakavāṭassa gabbhassa anto samīpepi ṭhito andho
tika-vin01t2:1393_3: anāpattiṃ na karoti, evamayampīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Ubhayatthāpīti dvīsupi aniyatesu. Yasmā
tika-vin01t2:1393_4: dvīhi sikkhāpadehi udāyittheraṃ ārabbha visuṃ paññattā kāci āpatti nāma natthi, tasmā
tika-vin01t2:1393_5: tassa tassa sikkhāpadassa ādikammike sandhāya ādikammikānaṃ anāpatti vuttā. Upanandattherādayo
tika-vin01t2:1393_6: hi raho nisajjādīnaṃ ādikammikā. Bhagavatā pana paṭhamaṃ paññattasikkhāpadāniyeva
tika-vin01t2:1393_7: gahetvā upanandavatthusmiṃ aniyatakkamo dassito. Yadi imehi sikkhāpadehi visuṃ paññattā
tika-vin01t2:1393_8: āpatti nāma natthi, atha kasmā bhagavatā aniyatadvayaṃ paññattanti? Evarūpāyapi upāsikāya
tika-vin01t2:1393_9: vuccamāno paṭijānamānoyeva āpattiyā kāretabbo, na appaṭijānamānoti dassentena bhagavatā
tika-vin01t2:1393_10: yāya kāyaci āpattiyā yena kenaci codite paṭiññātakaraṇaṃyeva daḷhaṃ katvā vinayavinicchayalakkhaṇaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1393_11: ṭhapitaṃ. Atha bhikkhunīnaṃ aniyataṃ kasmā na vuttanti? Idameva lakkhaṇaṃ sabbattha
tika-vin01t2:1400_0: 459. Samitāvināti samitapāpena. Gotamake cetiyeti gotamayakkhassa cetiyaṭṭhāne katavihāro
tika-vin01t2:1400_1: vuccati. Paribhuñjituṃ anuññātaṃ hotīti bhagavatā gahapaticīvare anuññāte bahūni
tika-vin01t2:1400_2: cīvarāni labhitvā bhaṇḍikaṃ katvā sīsepi khandhepi kaṭiyāpi ṭhapetvā āgacchante bhikkhū
tika-vin01t2:1400_3: disvā cīvare sīmaṃ bandhantena ticīvaraṃ paribhogatthāya anuññātaṃ, na pana adhiṭṭhānavasena.
tika-vin01t2:1401_0: 460. Eko kira brāhmaṇo cintesi “buddharatanassa ca saṅgharatanassa ca pūjā paññāyati,
tika-vin01t2:1401_1: kathaṃ nu kho dhammaratanaṃ pūjitaṃ nāma hotī”ti. So bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā etamatthaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1401_2: pucchi. Bhagavā āha “sacepi brāhmaṇa dhammaratanaṃ pūjetukāmo, ekaṃ bahussutaṃ pūjehī”ti.
tika-vin01t2:1401_3: Bahussutaṃ bhante ācikkhathāti. Bhikkhusaṅghaṃ pucchāti. So bhikkhū upasaṅkamitvā
tika-vin01t2:1401_4: “bahussutaṃ bhante ācikkhathā”ti āha. Ānandatthero brāhmaṇāti. Brāhmaṇo theraṃ sahassagghanakena
tika-vin01t2:1401_5: cīvarena pūjesi. Tena vuttaṃ “paṭilābhavasena uppanna”nti. Uppanna-saddo nipphannapariyāyopi
tika-vin01t2:1401_6: hotīti taṃ paṭikkhipanto āha “no nipphattivasenā”ti. Paṭhamameva hi taṃ tantavāyakammena nipphannaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1402_0: Therassa santike upajjhaṃ gāhāpetvā sayaṃ anussāvanakammaṃ karotīti ettha sāriputtattheropi
tika-vin01t2:1402_1: tatheva karotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Evaṃ ekamekena attano pattacīvaraṃ datvā pabbājetvā
tika-vin01t2:1402_2: upajjhaṃ gaṇhāpitāni pañca pañca bhikkhusatāni ahesuṃ. Āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ ativiya
tika-vin01t2:1402_3: mamāyatīti ānandatthero tāva mamāyatu akhīṇāsavabhāvato, sāriputtatthero kathanti?
tika-vin01t2:1402_4: Na idaṃ mamāyanaṃ gehassitapemavasena, atha kho guṇasambhāvanāvasenāti nāyaṃ doso.
tika-vin01t2:1402_5: Navamaṃ vā divasaṃ dasamaṃ vāti bhummatthe upayogavacanaṃ, navame vā dasame vā divaseti
tika-vin01t2:1402_6: attho. Sace bhaveyyāti sace kassaci evaṃ siyā. Vuttasadisamevāti ettha “vuttadivasamevā”tipi
tika-vin01t2:1403_0: 462-463. Niṭṭhitacīvarasminti bhummavacanassa lopaṃ katvā niddesoti āha “niṭṭhite
tika-vin01t2:1403_1: cīvarasmi”nti, cīvarassa karaṇapalibodhe upacchinneti vuttaṃ hoti. Pāsapaṭṭagaṇṭhikapaṭṭapariyosānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1403_2: yaṃ kiñci kātabbaṃ, taṃ katvāti yojetabbaṃ. Sūciyā paṭisāmananti idaṃ sūcikammassa
tika-vin01t2:1403_3: sammā pariniṭṭhitabhāvadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ, sūcikammaniṭṭhānamevettha pamāṇaṃ. Etesampīti
tika-vin01t2:1404_0: Kathine ca ubbhatasminti yaṃ saṅghassa kathinaṃ atthataṃ, tasmiṃ kathine ca ubbhateti
tika-vin01t2:1404_1: attho. Dutiyassa palibodhassa abhāvaṃ dassetīti āvāsapalibodhassa abhāvaṃ dasseti.
tika-vin01t2:1404_2: Ettha ca “niṭṭhitacīvarasmiṃ ubbhatasmiṃ kathine”ti imehi dvīhi padehi dvinnaṃ palibodhānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1404_3: abhāvadassanena atthatakathinassa pañcamāsabbhantare yāva cīvarapalibodho āvāsapalibodho
tika-vin01t2:1404_4: ca na upacchijjati, tāva anadhiṭṭhitaṃ avikappitaṃ atirekacīvaraṃ dasāhato parampi
tika-vin01t2:1404_5: ṭhapetuṃ vaṭṭatīti dīpeti. Atthatakathinassa hi yāva kathinassa ubbhārā anāmantacāro
tika-vin01t2:1404_6: asamādānacāro yāvadatthacīvaraṃ gaṇabhojanaṃ yo ca tattha cīvaruppādoti ime pañcānisaṃsā
tika-vin01t2:1404_7: labbhanti. Pakkamanaṃ anto assāti pakkamanantikā. Evaṃ sesāpi veditabbā. Vitthāro
tika-vin01t2:1405_0: Khomanti khomasuttehi vāyitaṃ khomapaṭacīvaraṃ, tathā sesāni. Sāṇanti sāṇavākasuttehi
tika-vin01t2:1405_1: katacīvaraṃ. Bhaṅganti khomasuttādīni sabbāni ekaccāni vā missetvā katacīvaraṃ. Bhaṅgampi
tika-vin01t2:1405_2: vākamayamevāti keci. Dukūlaṃ paṭṭuṇṇaṃ somārapaṭaṃ cīnapaṭaṃ iddhijaṃ devadinnanti
tika-vin01t2:1405_3: imāni pana cha cīvarāni etesaṃyeva anulomānīti visuṃ na vuttāni. Dukūlañhi sāṇassa
tika-vin01t2:1405_5: hi abhidhānakose vuttaṃ. Somāradese cīnadese ca jātavatthāni somāracīnapaṭāni. Paṭṭuṇṇādīni
tika-vin01t2:1405_6: tīṇi koseyyassa anulomāni pāṇakehi katasuttamayattā. Iddhijaṃ ehibhikkhūnaṃ puññiddhiyā
tika-vin01t2:1405_7: nibbattacīvaraṃ, taṃ khomādīnaṃ aññataraṃ hotīti tesaṃ eva anulomaṃ. Devatāhi dinnaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1405_8: cīvaraṃ devadinnaṃ, taṃ kapparukkhe nibbattaṃ jāliniyā devakaññāya anuruddhattherassa
tika-vin01t2:1405_9: dinnavatthasadisaṃ, tampi khomādīnaṃyeva anulomaṃ hoti tesu aññatarabhāvato.
tika-vin01t2:1406_0: Majjhimassa purisassa vidatthiṃ sandhāya “dve vidatthiyo”tiādi vuttaṃ. Iminā dīghato
tika-vin01t2:1406_1: vaḍḍhakīhatthappamāṇaṃ vitthārato tato upaḍḍhappamāṇaṃ vikappanupaganti dasseti.
tika-vin01t2:1406_2: Tathā hi “sugatavidatthi nāma idāni majjhimassa purisassa tisso vidatthiyo, vaḍḍhakīhatthena
tika-vin01t2:1406_3: diyaḍḍho hattho hotī”ti kuṭikārasikkhāpadaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ, tasmā sugataṅgulena
tika-vin01t2:1406_4: dvādasaṅgulaṃ vaḍḍhakīhatthena diyaḍḍho hatthoti siddhaṃ. Evañca katvā sugataṅgulena
tika-vin01t2:1407_0: Taṃ atikkāmayatoti ettha tanti cīvaraṃ kālaṃ vā parāmasati. Tassa yo aruṇoti tassa
tika-vin01t2:1407_1: cīvaruppādadivasassa yo atikkanto aruṇo. Cīvaruppādadivasena saddhinti cīvaruppādadivasassa
tika-vin01t2:1407_2: atikkantaaruṇena saddhinti attho. Divasasaddena hi taṃdivasanissito aruṇo vutto.
tika-vin01t2:1407_3: Bandhitvāti rajjuādīhi bandhitvā. Veṭhetvāti vatthādīti veṭhetvā.
tika-vin01t2:1408_0: Vacanīyoti saṅghaṃ apekkhitvā vuttaṃ. Aññathāpi vattabbanti ettha “yāya kāyaci bhāsāya
tika-vin01t2:1408_1: padapaṭipāṭiyā avatvāpi atthamatte vutte vaṭṭatī”ti vadanti. Tenāti āpattiṃ paṭiggaṇhantena.
tika-vin01t2:1408_2: Paṭiggāhakena “passasī”ti vutte desakena vattabbavacanaṃ dasseti “āma passāmī”ti.
tika-vin01t2:1408_3: Puna paṭiggāhakena vattabbavacanamāha “āyatiṃ saṃvareyyāsī”ti. Evaṃ vutte puna desakena
tika-vin01t2:1408_4: vattabbavacanaṃ “sādhu suṭṭhu saṃvarissāmī”ti. Iminā attano āyatiṃ saṃvare patiṭṭhitabhāvaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1408_5: dasseti. Dvīsu pana sambahulāsu vāti dvīsu sambahulāsu vā āpattīsu purimanayeneva
tika-vin01t2:1408_6: vacanabhedo veditabbo. Ñattiyaṃ āpattiṃ sarati vivaratīti ettha dve āpattiyoti vā
tika-vin01t2:1408_7: sambahulā āpattiyoti vā vattabbanti adhippāyo. Cīvaradānepīti nissaṭṭhacīvarassa
tika-vin01t2:1408_8: dānepi. Vatthuvasenāti cīvaragaṇanāya. Gaṇassa vuttā pāḷiyevettha pāḷīti dvīsu imāhaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1408_9: āyasmantānaṃ nissajjāmīti vacane visesābhāvato vuttaṃ. Evaṃ…pe… vattuṃ vaṭṭatīti
tika-vin01t2:1408_10: vatvā tattha kāraṇamāha “ito garukatarānī”tiādi. Tattha itoti ito nissaṭṭhacīvaradānato.
tika-vin01t2:1408_11: Ñattikammato ñattidutiyakammaṃ garukataranti āha “ito garukatarānī”ti. Imāhaṃ cīvaranti
tika-vin01t2:1409_0: 468. Na idha saññā rakkhatīti idaṃ vematikaṃ anatikkantasaññañca sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1409_1: Yopi evaṃsaññī, tassapīti na kevalaṃ atikkante atikkantasaññissa, atha kho vematikassa
tika-vin01t2:1409_2: anatikkantasaññissapīti attho. “Na idha saññā rakkhatī”tiādinā vuttamatthaṃ sesattikepi
tika-vin01t2:1409_3: atidisati. Esa nayo sabbatthāti esa nayo avinaṭṭhādīsupīti aññesaṃ cīvaresu upacikādīhi
tika-vin01t2:1409_4: khāyitesu “mayhampi cīvaraṃ khāyita”nti evaṃsaññī hotītiādinā yojetabbanti dasseti.
tika-vin01t2:1409_6: naṭṭhanti adhippetaṃ, pasayhāvahāravasena gahitaṃ viluttanti. Anāpatti aññena kataṃ
tika-vin01t2:1409_7: paṭilabhitvā paribhuñjatīti idaṃ nisīdanasanthataṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Yaṃ yena hi purāṇasanthatassa
tika-vin01t2:1409_8: sāmantā sugatavidatthiṃ anādiyitvā aññaṃ navaṃ nisīdanasanthataṃ kataṃ, tassa taṃ
tika-vin01t2:1409_9: nissaggiyaṃ hoti. Tasmā “anāpatti aññena kataṃ paṭilabhitvā paribhuñjatī”ti idaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1409_10: parassa nissaggiyaṃ aparassa paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭatīti imamatthaṃ sādheti. Paribhogaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1409_11: sandhāya vuttanti anatikkante atikkantasaññissa vematikassa ca paribhuñjantasseva
tika-vin01t2:1409_12: dukkaṭaṃ, na pana aparibhuñjitvā ṭhapentassāti adhippāyo.
tika-vin01t2:1410_0: 469. Ticīvaraṃ adhiṭṭhātunti nāmaṃ vatvā adhiṭṭhātuṃ. Na vikappetunti nāmaṃ vatvā
tika-vin01t2:1410_1: na vikappetuṃ. Esa nayo sabbattha. Tasmā ticīvarādīni adhiṭṭhahantena “imaṃ saṅghāṭiṃ
tika-vin01t2:1410_2: adhiṭṭhāmī”tiādinā nāmaṃ vatvā adhiṭṭhātabbaṃ. Vikappentena pana “imaṃ saṅghāṭi”ntiādinā
tika-vin01t2:1410_3: tassa tassa cīvarassa nāmaṃ aggahetvāva “imaṃ cīvaraṃ tuyhaṃ vikappemī”ti vikappetabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1410_4: Ticīvaraṃ vā hotu aññaṃ vā, yadi taṃ taṃ nāmaṃ gahetvā vikappeti, avikappitaṃ hoti,
tika-vin01t2:1410_5: atirekacīvaraṭṭhāneyeva tiṭṭhati. Tato paraṃ vikappetunti “catumāsato paraṃ vikappetvā
tika-vin01t2:1410_6: paribhuñjituṃ anuññāta”nti tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ. Keci pana “tato paraṃ vikappetvā
tika-vin01t2:1410_7: yāva āgāmisaṃvacchare vassānaṃ cātumāsaṃ, tāva ṭhapetuṃ anuññāta”ntipi vadanti. “Tato
tika-vin01t2:1410_8: paraṃ vikappetuṃ anujānāmīti ettāvatā vassikasāṭikaṃ kaṇḍuppaṭicchādiñca taṃ taṃ
tika-vin01t2:1410_9: nāmaṃ gahetvā vikappetuṃ anuññātanti evamattho na gahetabbo tato paraṃ vassikasāṭikādināmasseva
tika-vin01t2:1410_10: abhāvato. Tasmā tato paraṃ vikappentenapi nāmaṃ gahetvā na vikappetabbaṃ. Ubhinnampi
tika-vin01t2:1410_11: tato paraṃ vikappetvā paribhogassa anuññātattā tathā vikappitaṃ aññanāmena adhiṭṭhahitvā
tika-vin01t2:1411_0: Paccuddharāmīti ṭhapemi, pariccajāmīti vā attho. Imaṃ saṅghāṭiṃ adhiṭṭhāmīti ettha
tika-vin01t2:1411_1: “imaṃ cīvaraṃ saṅghāṭiṃ adhiṭṭhāmīti evampi vattuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:1411_2: tampi “imaṃ cīvaraṃ parikkhāracoḷaṃ adhiṭṭhāmī”ti iminā sameti. Kāyavikāraṃ karontenāti
tika-vin01t2:1411_3: hatthena cīvaraṃ parāmasantena vā cālentena vā. Duvidhanti sammukhaparammukhabhedesu
tika-vin01t2:1411_4: duvidhaṃ. Hatthapāseti idaṃ dvādasahatthaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, tasmā dvādasahatthabbhantare
tika-vin01t2:1411_5: ṭhitaṃ “ima”nti vatvā adhiṭṭhātabbaṃ. Tato paraṃ “eta”nti vatvā adhiṭṭhātabbanti
tika-vin01t2:1411_6: keci vadanti. Gaṇṭhipadesu panettha na kiñci vuttaṃ. Pāḷiyaṃ aṭṭhakathāyañca sabbattha
tika-vin01t2:1411_7: “hatthapāso”ti aḍḍhateyyahattho vuccati, tasmā idha visesavikappanāya kāraṇaṃ gavesitabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1411_8: Sāmantavihāro nāma yattha tadaheva gantvā nivattituṃ sakkā. “Sāmantavihāre”ti idaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1411_9: desanāsīsamattaṃ, tasmā ṭhapitaṭṭhānaṃ sallakkhetvā dūre ṭhitampi adhiṭṭhātabbanti
tika-vin01t2:1411_10: vadanti. Ṭhapitaṭṭhānaṃ sallakkhetvāti ca idaṃ ṭhapitaṭṭhānasallakkhaṇaṃ anucchavikanti
tika-vin01t2:1412_1: Adhiṭṭhānato pubbe saṅghāṭiādivohārassa abhāvato “imaṃ paccuddharāmī”ti parikkhāracoḷassa
tika-vin01t2:1412_2: visuṃ paccuddhāravidhiṃ dasseti. Parikkhāracoḷanāmena pana adhiṭṭhitattā “imaṃ parikkhāracoḷaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1412_3: paccuddharāmī”ti vuttepi nevatthi dosoti viññāyati. Paccuddharitvā puna adhiṭṭhātabbānīti
tika-vin01t2:1412_4: idañca saṅghāṭiādicīvaranāmena adhiṭṭhahitvā paribhuñjitukāmaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Parikkhāracoḷanāmeneva
tika-vin01t2:1412_5: adhiṭṭhahitvā paribhuñjantassa pana pubbekataadhiṭṭhānameva adhiṭṭhānaṃ. Adhiṭṭhānakiccaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1412_6: natthīti iminā kappabindudānakiccampi natthīti dasseti. Muṭṭhipañcakāditicīvarappamāṇayuttaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1412_7: sandhāya “ticīvaraṃ panā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Parikkhāracoḷaṃ adhiṭṭhātunti parikkhāracoḷaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1412_9: nevatthi dosoti na tattha dupparihāratāti āha “abaddhasīmāyaṃ dupparihāra”nti.
tika-vin01t2:1413_0: Anatirittappamāṇāti sugatavidatthiyā dīghaso cha vidatthiyo tiriyaṃ aḍḍhateyyavidatthiñca
tika-vin01t2:1413_1: anatikkantappamāṇāti attho. Nanu ca vassikasāṭikā vassānātikkamena, kaṇḍuppaṭicchādi
tika-vin01t2:1413_2: ābādhavūpasamena adhiṭṭhānaṃ vijahati. Teneva mātikāṭṭhakathāyaṃ “vassikasāṭikā vassānamāsātikkamenapi,
tika-vin01t2:1413_3: kaṇḍuppaṭicchādi ābādhavūpasamenapi adhiṭṭhānaṃ vijahatī”ti vuttaṃ. Tasmā “tato paraṃ
tika-vin01t2:1413_4: paccuddharitvā vikappetabbā”ti kasmā vuttaṃ. Sati hi adhiṭṭhāne paccuddhāro yuttoti?
tika-vin01t2:1413_5: Ettha tāva tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu idaṃ vuttaṃ “paccuddharitvāti idaṃ paccuddharaṇaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1413_6: sandhāya na vuttaṃ, paccuddharitvāti pana vassikasāṭikabhāvato apanetvāti evamattho
tika-vin01t2:1413_7: gahetabbo. Tasmā hemantassa paṭhamadivasato paṭṭhāya antodasāhe vassikasāṭikabhāvato
tika-vin01t2:1413_8: apanetvā vikappetabbāti imamatthaṃ dassetuṃ ‘tato paraṃ paccuddharitvā vikappetabbā’ti vutta”nti.
tika-vin01t2:1414_0: Keci pana “yathā kathinamāsabbhantare uppannacīvaraṃ kathinamāsātikkame nissaggiyaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1414_1: hoti, evamayaṃ vassikasāṭikāpi vassānamāsātikkame nissaggiyā hoti, tasmā kattikapuṇṇamadivase
tika-vin01t2:1414_2: paccuddharitvā tato paraṃ hemantassa paṭhamadivase vikappetabbāti evamattho gahetabbo.
tika-vin01t2:1414_3: Paccuddharitvā tato paraṃ vikappetabbāti padayojanā veditabbā”ti ca vadanti, taṃ
tika-vin01t2:1414_4: na yuttaṃ. Kathinamāse uppannañhi cīvaraṃ atirekacīvaraṭṭhāne ṭhitattā avasānadivase
tika-vin01t2:1414_5: anadhiṭṭhitaṃ kathinamāsātikkame nissaggiyaṃ hoti. Ayaṃ pana vassikasāṭikā adhiṭṭhahitvā
tika-vin01t2:1414_6: ṭhapitattā na tena sadisāti vassānātikkame kathaṃ nissaggiyā hoti. Anadhiṭṭhitaavikappitameva
tika-vin01t2:1414_7: hi taṃtaṃkālātikkame nissaggiyaṃ hoti, tasmā hemantepi vassikasāṭikā dasāhaṃ parihāraṃ
tika-vin01t2:1414_8: labhatiyeva. Evaṃ kaṇḍuppaṭicchādipi ābādhavūpasamena adhiṭṭhānaṃ vijahati, tasmā
tika-vin01t2:1414_9: tato paraṃ dasāhaṃ parihāraṃ labhati, dasāhaṃ pana anatikkamitvā vikappetabbāti.
tika-vin01t2:1415_1: kaṇḍuppaṭicchādi ābādhe vūpasantepi adhiṭṭhānaṃ na vijahati, tasmā ‘tato paraṃ paccuddharitvā
tika-vin01t2:1415_2: vikappetabbā’ti idaṃ vutta”nti vadanti, taṃ mātikāṭṭhakathāya na sameti, samantapāsādikāya
tika-vin01t2:1415_3: pana sameti. Tathā hi “vassikasāṭikā vassānamāsātikkamenapi, kaṇḍuppaṭicchādi ābādhavūpasamenapi
tika-vin01t2:1415_4: adhiṭṭhānaṃ vijahatī”ti idaṃ samantapāsādikāyaṃ natthi, parivāraṭṭhakathāyañca “atthāpatti
tika-vin01t2:1415_5: hemante āpajjati, no gimhe”ti ettha idaṃ vuttaṃ “kattikapuṇṇamāsiyā pacchime pāṭipadadivase
tika-vin01t2:1415_6: vikappetvā ṭhapitaṃ vassikasāṭikaṃ nivāsento hemante āpajjati. Kurundiyaṃ pana ‘kattikapuṇṇamadivase
tika-vin01t2:1415_7: apaccuddharitvā hemante āpajjatī’ti vuttaṃ, tampi suvuttaṃ. Cātumāsaṃ adhiṭṭhātuṃ,
tika-vin01t2:1416_0: Tattha mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ nivāsanapaccayā dukkaṭaṃ vuttaṃ, kurundaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana
tika-vin01t2:1416_1: apaccuddhārapaccayā. Tasmā kurundiyaṃ vuttanayeneva vassikasāṭikā vassānamāsātikkamepi
tika-vin01t2:1416_2: adhiṭṭhānaṃ na vijahatīti paññāyati. Kurundiyañhi “vassānaṃ cātumāsaṃ adhiṭṭhātuṃ,
tika-vin01t2:1416_3: tato paraṃ vikappetu”nti vacanato yadi kattikapuṇṇamāyaṃ na paccuddhareyya, avijahitādhiṭṭhānā
tika-vin01t2:1416_4: vassikasāṭikā hemantaṃ sampattā vikappanakkhette adhiṭṭhānasabbhāvato dukkaṭaṃ janeti,
tika-vin01t2:1416_5: tasmā kattikapuṇṇamāyaṃ eva paccuddharitvā hemante vikappetabbāti iminā adhippāyena
tika-vin01t2:1416_6: “kattikapuṇṇamadivase apaccuddharitvā hemante āpajjatī”ti vuttaṃ, tasmā vīmaṃsitvā
tika-vin01t2:1417_0: Nahānatthāya anuññātattā “vaṇṇabhedamattarattāpi cesā vaṭṭatī”ti vuttaṃ. Dve pana
tika-vin01t2:1417_1: na vaṭṭantīti dvinnaṃ adhiṭṭhānābhāvato vuttaṃ. “Sace vassāne aparā vassikasāṭikā
tika-vin01t2:1417_2: uppannā hoti, purimavassikasāṭikaṃ paccuddharitvā vikappetvā ca adhiṭṭhātabbā”ti
tika-vin01t2:1417_3: vadanti. Pamāṇayuttanti dīghaso sugatavidatthiyā dve vidatthiyo, vitthārato diyaḍḍhā,
tika-vin01t2:1417_4: dasā vidatthīti iminā pamāṇena yuttaṃ. Pamāṇikāti sugatavidatthiyā dīghaso catasso
tika-vin01t2:1417_5: vidatthiyo, tiriyaṃ dve vidatthiyoti evaṃ vuttappamāṇayuttā. Paccuddharitvā vikappetabbāti
tika-vin01t2:1417_6: ettha yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ heṭṭhā vuttameva. “Sakiṃ adhiṭṭhitaṃ adhiṭṭhitameva hoti,
tika-vin01t2:1417_7: puna na paccuddharīyati kālaparicchedābhāvato”ti vadanti. Apare pana “ekavacanenapi
tika-vin01t2:1417_8: vaṭṭatīti dassanatthaṃ ‘sakiṃ adhiṭṭhitaṃ adhiṭṭhitamevā’ti vutta”nti vadanti. Ubhayatthāpi
tika-vin01t2:1417_9: assa vacanassa idha vacane apubbaṃ payojanaṃ na dissati, teneva mātikāṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1417_10: imasmiṃ ṭhāne “sakiṃ adhiṭṭhitaṃ adhiṭṭhitameva hotī”ti idaṃ padaṃ na vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1418_0: “Attano santakabhāvato mocetvā ṭhapitaṃ sandhāya mahāpaccariyaṃ anāpatti vuttā”ti
tika-vin01t2:1418_1: vadanti. Iminā bhesajjaṃ cetāpessāmi, idaṃ mātuyā dassāmīti ṭhapentena adhiṭṭhātabbaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:1418_2: idaṃ bhesajjassa, idaṃ mātuyāti vissajjetvā sakasantakabhāvato mocite adhiṭṭhānakiccaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1418_4: apārupitvā ca kevalaṃ mañcapīṭhesuyeva attharitvā paribhuñjiyamānaṃ paccattharaṇaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1418_5: attano santakampi anadhiṭṭhātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vadanti. Heṭṭhā pana “paccattharaṇampi
tika-vin01t2:1418_6: adhiṭṭhātabbamevā”ti avisesena vuttattā attano santakaṃ adhiṭṭhātabbamevāti amhākaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1419_1: vuttaṃ, taṃ yuttaṃ aññassa dāne viya cīvare nirālayabhāveneva pariccattattā. Keci
tika-vin01t2:1419_3: pana vibbhamantopi yāva sikkhaṃ na paccakkhāti, tāva bhikkhuyevāti adhiṭṭhānaṃ na
tika-vin01t2:1419_4: vijahatī”ti vadanti, taṃ na gahetabbaṃ “bhikkhuniyā hīnāyāvattanenā”ti visesetvā
tika-vin01t2:1419_5: avuttattā. Bhikkhuniyā hi gihibhāvūpagamane adhiṭṭhānavijahanaṃ visuṃ vattabbaṃ natthi
tika-vin01t2:1419_6: tassā vibbhamaneneva assamaṇībhāvato. Sikkhāpaccakkhānenāti pana idaṃ sace bhikkhuliṅge
tika-vin01t2:1419_7: ṭhitova sikkhaṃ paccakkhāti, tassa kāyalaggampi cīvaraṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ vijahatīti dassanatthaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1419_9: pacchimappamāṇaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Dve cīvarāni pārupantassāti antaragharappavesanatthāya
tika-vin01t2:1419_10: suppaṭicchannasikkhāpade vuttanayena saṅghāṭiṃ uttarāsaṅgañca ekato katvā pārupantassa.
tika-vin01t2:1419_11: Saṅgharitaṭṭhāneti dvīsupi antesu saṅgharitaṭṭhāne. Esa nayoti iminā pamāṇayuttesu
tika-vin01t2:1419_12: yattha katthaci chiddaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ vijahati, mahantesu pana tato parena chiddaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1419_13: adhiṭṭhānaṃ na vijahatīti ayamattho dassito. Sabbesūti ticīvarādibhedesu sabbacīvaresu.
tika-vin01t2:1420_0: Aññaṃ pacchimappamāṇaṃ nāma natthīti sutte āgataṃ natthīti adhippāyo. Idāni tameva
tika-vin01t2:1420_1: vibhāvetuṃ “yañhī”tiādi vuttaṃ. “Taṃ atikkamayato chedanakaṃ pācittiya”nti vuttattā
tika-vin01t2:1420_2: āha “tato uttari paṭisiddhattā”ti. Taṃ na sametīti parikkhāracoḷassa vikappanupagapacchimaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1420_3: pacchimappamāṇanti gahetvā itaresaṃ ticīvarādīnaṃ muṭṭhipañcakādibhedaṃ pacchimappamāṇaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1420_4: sandhāya “esa nayo”tiādivacanaṃ na sameti tādisassa pacchimappamāṇassa sutte abhāvatoti
tika-vin01t2:1420_5: adhippāyo. Andhakaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttavacanaṃ na sametīti imināva paṭikkhepena vikappanupagapacchimassa
tika-vin01t2:1420_6: anto yattha katthaci chiddaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ vijahatīti ayampi nayo paṭikkhittoyevāti
tika-vin01t2:1420_7: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Ticīvarañhi ṭhapetvā sesacīvaresu chiddena adhiṭṭhānavijahanaṃ nāma natthi,
tika-vin01t2:1420_8: tasmā adhiṭṭhahitvā ṭhapitesu sesacīvaresu vikappanupagapacchimaṃ appahontaṃ katvā
tika-vin01t2:1420_9: khaṇḍākhaṇḍikaṃ chinnesupi adhiṭṭhānavijahanaṃ natthi. Sace pana adhiṭṭhānato pubbeyeva
tika-vin01t2:1420_10: tādisaṃ hoti, acīvarattā adhiṭṭhānakiccaṃ natthi. Khuddakaṃ cīvaranti muṭṭhipañcakādibhedappamāṇato
tika-vin01t2:1420_11: anūnameva khuddakacīvaraṃ. Mahantaṃ vā khuddakaṃ karotīti ettha tiṇṇaṃ cīvarānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1420_12: catūsu passesu yasmiṃ padese chiddaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ na vijahati, tasmiṃ padese samantato
tika-vin01t2:1420_13: chinditvā khuddakaṃ karontassa adhiṭṭhānaṃ na vijahatīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin01t2:1421_0: Sammukhāvikappanā parammukhāvikappanāti ettha sammukhena vikappanā parammukhena vikappanāti
tika-vin01t2:1421_2: ca adhiṭṭhāne vuttanayeneva veditabbo. Paribhogādayopi vaṭṭantīti ettha adhiṭṭhānassapi
tika-vin01t2:1421_3: antogadhattā sace saṅghāṭiādināmena adhiṭṭhahitvā paribhuñjitukāmo hoti, adhiṭṭhānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1421_4: kātabbaṃ. No ce, na kātabbaṃ, vikappanameva pamāṇaṃ, tasmā atirekacīvaraṃ nāma na
tika-vin01t2:1421_5: hoti. Mittoti daḷhamitto. Sandiṭṭhoti diṭṭhamitto nātidaḷhamitto. Vikappitavikappanā
tika-vin01t2:1421_6: nāmesā vaṭṭatīti adhiṭṭhitaadhiṭṭhānaṃ viyāti adhippāyo avisesena vuttavacananti
tika-vin01t2:1421_7: ticīvarādiṃ adhiṭṭheti, vassikasāṭikaṃ kaṇḍuppaṭicchādiñca vikappetīti avatvā sabbacīvarānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1421_8: avisesena vikappetīti vuttavacanaṃ. Ticīvarasaṅkhepenāti ticīvaranīhārena, saṅghāṭiādiadhiṭṭhānavasenāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin01t2:1422_0: Tuyhaṃ demītiādīsu “tasmiṃ kāle na gaṇhitukāmopi sace na paṭikkhipati, puna gaṇhitukāmatāya
tika-vin01t2:1422_1: sati gahetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vadanti. Itthannāmassāti parammukhe ṭhitaṃ sandhāya vadati.
tika-vin01t2:1422_2: “Tuyhaṃ gaṇhāhī”ti vutte “mayhaṃ gaṇhāmī”ti vadati, sudinnaṃ suggahitañcāti ettha
tika-vin01t2:1422_3: “yathā parato ‘tava santakaṃ karohī’ti vutte duddinnampi ‘sādhu, bhante, mayhaṃ gaṇhāmī’ti
tika-vin01t2:1422_4: vacanena ‘suggahitaṃ hotī’ti vuttaṃ, evamidhāpi ‘tuyhaṃ gaṇhāhī’ti vutte sudinnattā
tika-vin01t2:1422_5: ‘mayhaṃ gaṇhāmī’ti avuttepi ‘sudinnamevā”’ti vadanti. “Gaṇhāhīti ca āṇattiyā gahaṇassa
tika-vin01t2:1422_6: tappaṭibaddhatākaraṇavasena pavattattā tadā gaṇhāmīti citte anuppādite pacchā gahetuṃ
tika-vin01t2:1423_0: Taṃ na yujjatīti vinayakammassa karaṇavasena gahetvā dinnattā vuttaṃ. Sace pana paro
tika-vin01t2:1423_1: saccatoyeva vissāsaṃ gaṇhāti, puna kenaci kāraṇena tena dinnaṃ tassa na vaṭṭatīti
tika-vin01t2:1423_2: natthi. Nissaggiyaṃ pana cīvaraṃ jānitvā vā ajānitvā vā gaṇhantaṃ “mā gaṇhāhī”ti
tika-vin01t2:1423_3: nivāraṇatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Kāyavācāhi kattabbaadhiṭṭhānavikappanānaṃ akatattā hotīti āha
tika-vin01t2:1423_4: “kāyavācāto samuṭṭhātī”ti. Cīvarassa attano santakatā, jātippamāṇayuttatā, chinnapalibodhabhāvo,
tika-vin01t2:1426_0: 471-473. Dutiye athānandatthero kathaṃ okāsaṃ paṭilabhati, kiṃ karonto ca āhiṇḍatīti
tika-vin01t2:1426_1: āha “thero kirā”tiādi. Avippavāseti nimittatthe bhummaṃ, avippavāsatthanti attho,
tika-vin01t2:1426_2: vippavāsapaccayā yā āpatti, tadabhāvatthanti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin01t2:1427_0: 475-476. Evaṃ chinnapalibodhoti evaṃ imehi cīvaraniṭṭhānakathinubbhārehi chinnapalibodho.
tika-vin01t2:1427_1: Adhiṭṭhitesūti ticīvarādhiṭṭhānanayena adhiṭṭhitesu. Ticīvarena vippavuttho hotīti
tika-vin01t2:1427_2: “rukkho chinno, paṭo daḍḍho”tiādīsu viya avayavepi samudāyavohāro labbhatīti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1428_0: 477-478. Parikhāya vā parikkhittoti iminā ca samantā nadītaḷākādiudakena parikkhittopi
tika-vin01t2:1428_1: parikkhittoyevāti dasseti. Ettāvatāti “parikkhitto”ti iminā vacanena. Ākāse aruṇaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1428_2: uṭṭhāpetīti gharassa upari ākāse aḍḍhateyyaratanappamāṇaṃ atikkamitvā aruṇaṃ uṭṭhāpeti.
tika-vin01t2:1428_3: Gharaṃ nivesanudositādilakkhaṇameva, na pana pāṭiyekkaṃ gharaṃ nāma atthīti āha “ettha cā”tiādi.
tika-vin01t2:1429_1: napuṃsakaliṅgatāvibhāvanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Sabhā-saddapariyāyopi hi sabhāya-saddo napuṃsakaliṅgayutto
tika-vin01t2:1429_2: idha vuttoti imamatthaṃ dassento “liṅgabyattayena sabhā vuttā”ti āha. Cīvarahatthapāse
tika-vin01t2:1429_3: vasitabbaṃ natthīti cīvarahatthapāseyeva vasitabbanti natthi. Yaṃ tassā…pe… na vijahitabbanti
tika-vin01t2:1429_4: ettha tassā vīthiyā sammukhaṭṭhāne sabhāyadvārānaṃ gahaṇeneva tattha sabbānipi gehāni
tika-vin01t2:1429_5: sā ca antaravīthi gahitāyeva hoti. Atiharitvā ghare nikkhipatīti taṃ vīthiṃ muñcitvā
tika-vin01t2:1429_6: ṭhite aññasmiṃ ghare nikkhipati. Purato vā pacchato vā hatthapāseti gharassa hatthapāsaṃ sandhāya vadati.
tika-vin01t2:1430_0: Nivesanādīsu parikkhittatāya ekūpacāratā, aparikkhittatāya nānūpacāratā ca veditabbāti
tika-vin01t2:1430_1: dassento “etenevupāyenā”tiādimāha. Nivesanādīni gāmato bahi sanniviṭṭhāni gahitānīti
tika-vin01t2:1430_2: veditabbaṃ. Antogāme ṭhitānañhi gāmaggahaṇena gahitattā gāmaparihāroyevāti. Sabbatthāpīti
tika-vin01t2:1430_3: gāmādīsu ajjhokāsapariyantesu pannarasasu. Parikkhepādivasenāti ettha ādi-saddena
tika-vin01t2:1431: 480-487. Ovarako nāma gabbhassa abbhantare añño gabbhotipi vadanti. Muṇḍacchadanapāsādoti candikaṅgaṇayutto pāsādo.
tika-vin01t2:1432_0: 489. Satthoti jaṅghasattho sakaṭasattho vā. Pariyādiyitvāti vinivijjhitvā. Vuttamevatthaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1432_1: vibhāveti “antopaviṭṭhena…pe… ṭhito hotī”ti. Tattha antopaviṭṭhenāti gāmassa nadiyā
tika-vin01t2:1432_2: vā antopaviṭṭhena. Nadīparihāro ca labbhatīti ettha “visuṃ nadīparihārassa avuttattā
tika-vin01t2:1432_3: gāmādīhi aññattha viya cīvarahatthapāsoyeva nadīparihāro”ti tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1432_4: Vihārasīmanti avippavāsasīmaṃ sandhāyāha. Vihāraṃ gantvā vasitabbanti antosīmāya
tika-vin01t2:1432_5: yattha katthaci vasitabbaṃ. Satthasamīpeyevāti idaṃ yathāvuttaabbhantaraparicchedavasena
tika-vin01t2:1432_6: vuttaṃ. Pāḷiyaṃ nānākulassa sattho hoti, satthe cīvaraṃ nikkhipitvā hatthapāsā na
tika-vin01t2:1432_7: vijahitabbanti ettha hatthapāso nāma satthassa hatthapāsoti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1433_0: 490. Ekakulassa khetteti aparikkhittaṃ sandhāya vadati. Yasmā “nānākulassa parikkhitte
tika-vin01t2:1433_1: khette cīvaraṃ nikkhipitvā khettadvāramūle vā tassa hatthapāse vā vatthabba”nti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:1433_2: tasmā dvāramūlato aññattha antokhettepi vasantena cīvaraṃ hatthapāse katvāyeva vasitabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1434_0: 491-494. “Vihāro nāma saparikkhitto vā aparikkhitto vā sakalo āvāso”ti vadanti. Yasmiṃ
tika-vin01t2:1434_1: vihāreti ettha pana ekaṃ gehameva vuttaṃ. Ekakulanānākulasantakatā cettha kārāpakānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1434_2: vasena veditabbā. Chāyāya phuṭṭhokāsassa anto evāti yadā mahāvīthiyaṃ ujukameva gacchantaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1434_3: sūriyamaṇḍalaṃ majjhanhikaṃ pāpuṇāti, tadā yaṃ okāsaṃ chāyā pharati, taṃ sandhāya
tika-vin01t2:1434_4: vuttaṃ. Agamanapatheti yaṃ tadaheva gantvā puna āgantuṃ sakkā na hoti, tādisaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1435_0: 495. Nadiṃ otaratīti hatthapāsaṃ muñcitvā otarati. Na āpajjatīti paribhogapaccayā
