tika-vin01t2:1435_1: dukkaṭaṃ nāpajjati. Tenāha “so hī”tiādi. Aparibhogārahattāti imināva nissaggiyacīvaraṃ
tika-vin01t2:1435_2: anissajjetvā paribhuñjantassa dukkaṭaṃ acittakanti siddhaṃ. Ekaṃ pārupitvā ekaṃ aṃsakūṭe
tika-vin01t2:1435_3: ṭhapetvā gantabbanti idaṃ bahūnaṃ sañcāraṭṭhāne evaṃ akatvā gamanaṃ na sāruppanti
tika-vin01t2:1435_4: katvā vuttaṃ. Bahigāme ṭhapetvā…pe… vinayakammaṃ kātabbanti vuttattā adhiṭṭhāne viya
tika-vin01t2:1435_5: parammukhā ṭhitampi nissaggiyaṃ cīvaraṃ nissajjituṃ nissaṭṭhacīvarañca dātuṃ vaṭṭatīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1436_0: Gamane saussāhattā “nissayo pana na paṭippassambhatī”ti vuttaṃ. Muhuttaṃ sayitvā…pe…
tika-vin01t2:1436_1: nissayo ca paṭippassambhatīti ettha “ussāhe apariccattepi gamanassa upacchinnattā
tika-vin01t2:1436_2: puna uṭṭhāya saussāhaṃ gacchantānampi antarā aruṇe uṭṭhite nissayo paṭippassambhatiyevā”ti
tika-vin01t2:1436_3: vadanti. Parato muhuttaṃ ṭhatvāti etthāpi eseva nayo. Aññamaññassa vacanaṃ aggahetvā
tika-vin01t2:1436_4: gatāti ettha sace evaṃ gacchantā “purāruṇā aññamaññaṃ passissāmā”ti ussāhaṃ vināva
tika-vin01t2:1436_5: gatā honti, aruṇuggamane nissayapaṭippassaddhi na vattabbā paṭhamataraṃyeva paṭippassambhanato.
tika-vin01t2:1436_6: Atha “purāruṇā passissāmā”ti saussāhāva gacchanti, nissayapaṭippassaddhiyeva na vattabbā.
tika-vin01t2:1436_7: Evañca sati “saha aruṇuggamanā nissayo paṭippassambhatī”ti kasmā vuttaṃ? Vuccate
tika-vin01t2:1436_8: – saussahattā paṭhamataraṃ paṭippassaddhi na vuttā. Satipi ca ussāhabhāve ekato gamanassa
tika-vin01t2:1436_9: upacchinnattā “muhuttaṃ ṭhatvā”ti ettha viya saha aruṇuggamanā paṭippassaddhiyeva vuttā.
tika-vin01t2:1437_0: Antosīmāyaṃ gāmanti avippavāsasīmāsammutiyā pacchā patiṭṭhāpitagāmaṃ sandhāya vadati
tika-vin01t2:1437_1: gāmaṃ anto katvā avippavāsasīmāsammutiyā abhāvato. Neva cīvarāni nissaggiyāni hontīti
tika-vin01t2:1437_2: avippavāsasīmābhāvato vuttaṃ, na nissayo paṭippassambhatīti saussāhabhāvato. Antarāmaggeyeva
tika-vin01t2:1437_3: ca nesaṃ aruṇaṃ uggacchatīti dhammaṃ sutvā āgacchantānaṃ aruṇaṃ uggacchati. Assatiyā
tika-vin01t2:1437_4: gacchatīti assatiyā attano cīvaraṃ apaccuddharitvā therassa cīvaraṃ apaccuddharāpetvā
tika-vin01t2:1437_5: gacchati. Evaṃ gate tasmiṃ pacchā therena saritvā paṭipajjitabbavidhiṃ dasseti “attano
tika-vin01t2:1437_6: cīvaraṃ paccuddharitvā daharassa cīvaraṃ vissāsena gahetvā ṭhapetabba”nti. Gantvā
tika-vin01t2:1437_7: vattabboti āgatakiccaṃ niṭṭhapetvā vihāraṃ gatena paṭipajjitabbavidhiṃ dasseti. Anadhiṭṭhitacīvaratā,
tika-vin01t2:1437_8: anatthatakathinatā, aladdhasammutitā, rattivippavāsoti imānettha cattāri aṅgāni.
tika-vin01t2:1440_0: 497-499. Tatiye pāḷiyaṃ cīvarapaccāsā nikkhipitunti ettha cīvarapaccāsāya satiyā
tika-vin01t2:1440_1: nikkhipitunti evamattho gahetabbo. Bhaṇḍikābaddhāni bhaṇḍikabaddhānītipi paṭhanti,
tika-vin01t2:1440_2: bhaṇḍikaṃ katvā baddhānīti attho. Niṭṭhitacīvarasmiṃ bhikkhunāti ettha purimasikkhāpade
tika-vin01t2:1441_0: 500. Anatthate kathine cīvaramāse bhikkhuno uppannacīvaraṃ anadhiṭṭhitaṃ avikappitaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1441_1: tasmiṃ māse ṭhapetuṃ vaṭṭatīti āha “ekaṃ pacchimakattikamāsaṃ ṭhapetvā”ti. Keci pana
tika-vin01t2:1441_2: “kālepi ādissa dinnaṃ, etaṃ akālacīvaranti vacanato anatthate kathine pacchimakattikamāsasaṅkhāte
tika-vin01t2:1441_3: cīvaramāse uppannacīvarassapi paccāsācīvare asati dasāhaparihāroyeva, tato paraṃ
tika-vin01t2:1441_4: ṭhapetuṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti vadanti, taṃ aṭṭhakathāya na sameti. Tathā hi accekacīvarasikkhāpadaṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1441_6: ekādasadivasādhiko māso, atthate kathine ekādasadivasādhikā pañca māsā parihāro”ti
tika-vin01t2:1441_7: vuttaṃ. Tameva ca parihāraṃ sandhāya “chaṭṭhito paṭṭhāya pana uppannaṃ anaccekacīvarampi
tika-vin01t2:1441_8: paccuddharitvā ṭhapitacīvarampi etaṃ parihāraṃ labhatiyevā”ti vuttaṃ. Tasmā cīvaramāse
tika-vin01t2:1441_9: dasāhato parampi anadhiṭṭhitaṃ avikappitampi ṭhapetuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin01t2:1442_0: Yadi evaṃ “kālepi ādissa dinnaṃ, etaṃ akālacīvara”nti idaṃ kasmā vuttanti ce? Akālacīvarasāmaññato
tika-vin01t2:1442_1: atthuddhāravasena vuttaṃ paṭhamāniyate sotassa raho viya. Ekādasamāse sattamāse ca
tika-vin01t2:1442_2: uppannañhi cīvaraṃ vutthavassehi sesehi ca sammukhībhūtehi bhājetuṃ labbhatīti akālacīvaraṃ
tika-vin01t2:1442_3: nāma jātaṃ. Kāle pana “saṅghassa idaṃ akālacīvaraṃ dammī”ti anuddisitvā “saṅghassa
tika-vin01t2:1442_4: dammī”ti dinnaṃ vutthavassehiyeva bhājetabbaṃ, na aññehīti kālacīvaranti vuccati.
tika-vin01t2:1442_5: Ādissa dinnaṃ pana sammukhībhūtehi sabbehiyeva bhājetabbanti akālacīvaraṃ, tasmā
tika-vin01t2:1442_6: kālepi ādissa dinnassa vutthavassehi sesehi ca sampattehi bhājanīyattā akālacīvarasāmaññato
tika-vin01t2:1442_7: “kālepi ādissa dinnaṃ, etaṃ akālacīvara”nti atthuddhāravasena vuttaṃ. Yadi evaṃ “ekapuggalassa
tika-vin01t2:1442_8: vā idaṃ tuyhaṃ dammīti dinna”nti kasmā vuttaṃ. Na hi puggalassa ādissa dinnaṃ kenaci
tika-vin01t2:1442_9: bhājanīyaṃ hotīti? Nāyaṃ virodho ādissa vacanasāmaññato labbhamānamatthaṃ dassetuṃ tathā vuttattā.
tika-vin01t2:1443_0: Evaṃ pana avatvāti “tato ce uttari”nti imassa “māsaparamato uttari”nti padabhājanaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1443_1: avatvā. Tāva uppannaṃ paccāsācīvaranti paccattavacanaṃ “attano gatikaṃ karotī”ti
tika-vin01t2:1443_2: karaṇakiriyāya kattubhāvato. Antarā uppannañhi paccāsācīvaraṃ māsaparamaṃ mūlacīvaraṃ
tika-vin01t2:1443_3: ṭhapetuṃ adatvā attano dasāhaparamatāya eva paricchindatīti attano gatikaṃ karoti.
tika-vin01t2:1443_4: Tato uddhaṃ mūlacīvaranti ettha pana mūlacīvaranti paccattavacanaṃ. Vīsatimadivasato
tika-vin01t2:1443_5: uddhañhi uppannaṃ paccāsācīvaraṃ dasāhaparamaṃ gantuṃ adatvā mūlacīvaraṃ attanā saddhiṃ
tika-vin01t2:1443_6: karaṇasambandhatāmattena sakakālavasena paricchindatīti attano gatikaṃ karoti. Paccāsācīvare
tika-vin01t2:1443_7: pana labhitvā visuṃ ṭhapentassa dasāhaṃ anatikkante natthi tappaccayā āpatti. Pāḷiyaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1443_8: dasāhā kāretabbanti ettha dasāhāti karaṇatthe nissakkavacanaṃ, dasāhenāti attho.
tika-vin01t2:1443_9: Pañcāhuppannetiādiṃ rassaṃ katvāpi paṭhanti. Ekavīse uppanne…pe… navāhā kāretabbantiādi
tika-vin01t2:1444_0: Aññaṃ paccāsācīvaraṃ…pe… kāretabbanti idaṃ satiyā eva paccāsāya vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1444_1: Sace pana “ito paṭṭhāya cīvaraṃ na labhissāmī”ti paccāsā upacchinnā, mūlacīvarampi
tika-vin01t2:1444_2: dasāhaṃ ce sampattaṃ, tadaheva adhiṭṭhātabbaṃ. Paccāsācīvarampi parikkhāracoḷaṃ adhiṭṭhātabbanti
tika-vin01t2:1444_3: paṭhamataraṃ uppannaṃ visabhāgapaccāsācīvaraṃ sandhāya vadati. Aññamaññanti aññaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1444_4: aññaṃ, ayameva vā pāṭho. Aṅgaṃ panettha paṭhamakathine vuttasadisameva. Kevalañhi
tika-vin01t2:1444_5: tattha dasāhātikkamo, idha māsātikkamoti ayaṃ viseso.
tika-vin01t2:1447_0: 503. Catutthe bhattavissagganti pāḷipadassa bhattakiccanti attho veditabbo, “bhattasaṃvidhāna”ntipi
tika-vin01t2:1447_1: keci. Tattha nāma tvanti imassapi so nāma tvanti attho veditabbo, “tāya nāma tva”nti keci.
tika-vin01t2:1448_0: 505. Pitā ca mātā ca pitaro, pitūnaṃ pitaro pitāmahā, tesaṃyeva yugo pitāmahayugo,
tika-vin01t2:1448_1: tasmā yāva sattamā pitāmahayugā pitāmahadvandāti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo. Evañhi
tika-vin01t2:1448_2: pitāmahaggahaṇeneva mātāmahopi gahitoti. “Yāva sattamā pitāmahayugā”ti vacanato heṭṭhā
tika-vin01t2:1448_3: ca uddhañca aṭṭhamayugo ñāti nāma na hoti. Desanāmukhameva cetanti pitāmahayugāti
tika-vin01t2:1448_4: pitāmaha-ggahaṇaṃ desanāmukhaṃ pitāmahīmātāmahīādīnampi adhippetattā. Pitu mātā pitāmahī.
tika-vin01t2:1448_5: Mātu pitā mātāmaho. Mātu mātā mātāmahī. Ettha kiñcāpi pañcasatasākiyānīnaṃ vasena
tika-vin01t2:1448_6: bhikkhubhāve ṭhatvā parivattaliṅgāya bhikkhuniyā ca vasena ekatoupasampannā bhikkhunī
tika-vin01t2:1448_7: labbhati, tathāpi pakatiniyāmeneva dassetuṃ “bhikkhunī nāma ubhatosaṅghe upasampannā”ti
tika-vin01t2:1448_8: vuttaṃ. “Kappaṃ katvāti vacanato dinnakappameva pācittiyaṃ janetī”ti vadanti. “Purāṇacīvaraṃ
tika-vin01t2:1448_9: nāma sakiṃ nivatthampi sakiṃ pārutampī”ti idaṃ nidassanamattanti āha “antamaso paribhogasīsenā”tiādi.
tika-vin01t2:1448_10: “Kāyena phusitvā paribhogoyeva paribhogo nāmā”ti kurundiyaṃ adhippāyo.
tika-vin01t2:1449_0: 506. Kāyavikāraṃ katvāti idaṃ yāva “orato ṭhapetī”ti padaṃ, tāva sabbapadesu sambandhitabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1449_1: Yathā sā “dhovāpetukāmo aya”nti jānāti, evaṃ kāyavikāraṃ katvāti attho. “Kāyavikāraṃ
tika-vin01t2:1449_2: katvā”ti vacanato kāyavācāhi kañci vikāraṃ akatvā hatthena hatthe dentassapi anāpatti.
tika-vin01t2:1449_3: Antodvādasahatthe okāseti idaṃ visesanaṃ yathāsambhavaṃ yojetabbaṃ. Tathā hi hatthena
tika-vin01t2:1449_4: hatthe dentassa pādamūle ca ṭhapetvā dentassa “antodvādasahatthe okāse”ti idaṃ vattabbanti
tika-vin01t2:1449_5: natthi aññathā asambhavato. Sati hi sambhave byabhicāre ca visesanaṃ sātthakaṃ hoti.
tika-vin01t2:1449_6: Upari “khipatī”tiādīni pana sandhāya idaṃ visesanaṃ vuttaṃ, tasmā antodvādasahatthe
tika-vin01t2:1449_7: okāse ṭhatvā upari khipantassa aññassa hatthe pesentassa ca āpatti. Upacāraṃ pana
tika-vin01t2:1449_8: muñcitvā kāyavācāhi vikāraṃ katvā āṇāpentassapi anāpatti. Upacāreti antodvādasahatthameva
tika-vin01t2:1449_9: okāsaṃ vadati. Upacāraṃ muñcitvāti dvādasahatthūpacāraṃ muñcitvā.
tika-vin01t2:1450_0: Ekena vatthunāti paṭhamaṃ katvā niṭṭhāpitaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Rajane anāpattīti rajanaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1450_1: paccāsīsantassapi “dhovitvā ānehī”ti vuttattā anāpatti anāṇattiyā katattā. “Avuttā
tika-vin01t2:1450_2: dhovatī”ti iminā “avuttā rajati, avuttā ākoṭetī”ti idampi vuttameva hotīti āha –
tika-vin01t2:1450_3: “avuttā dhovatīti iminā lakkhaṇena anāpattī”ti. Sambahulā āpattiyo āpajjatīti pācittiyena
tika-vin01t2:1450_4: saddhiṃ dve dukkaṭāni āpajjati. Yathāvatthukamevāti nissaggiyamevāti attho. Pañca
tika-vin01t2:1451_0: 507. Cīvaraṃ dhovāti…pe… āṇāpentassāti ettha tāya dhovanaṃ paccāsīsantassapi anāpatti.
tika-vin01t2:1451_1: Purāṇacīvaratā, upacāre ṭhatvā aññātikāya bhikkhuniyā āṇāpanaṃ, tassā dhovanādīni
tika-vin01t2:1454_0: 508. Pañcame apaññatte sikkhāpadeti gaṇamhā ohīyanasikkhāpade apaññatte. Vihāravāranti
tika-vin01t2:1454_2: chaṭṭhassa aññacīvarassa abhāvā pañcannaṃ cīvarānaṃ ekamekaṃ sabbesaṃ pariyantanti
tika-vin01t2:1454_3: sabbapariyantaṃ. Antaravāsakādīsu hi pañcasu ekamekaṃ aññassa chaṭṭhassa abhāvā pañcannaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1454_4: antameva hoti. Athavā pañcasu cīvaresu ekamekaṃ attano aññassa dutiyassa abhāvā antameva
tika-vin01t2:1454_5: hotīti sabbameva pariyantanti sabbapariyantaṃ, sabbaso vā pariyantanti sabbapariyantaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1454_6: Tenāha – “aññaṃ…pe… natthī”ti. Yathā tassa manoratho na pūratīti “sarīrapāripūriṃ
tika-vin01t2:1454_7: passissāmī”ti tassa uppanno manoratho yathā na pūrati. Evaṃ hatthataleyeva dassetvāti
tika-vin01t2:1455_1: vuttaṃ hoti. Samabhitunnattāti pīḷitattā. Parivattetabbaṃ parivattaṃ, parivattameva
tika-vin01t2:1456_0: 512. Upacāreti dvādasahatthūpacāraṃ sandhāya vadati. Upacāraṃ vā muñcitvā khipantīti
tika-vin01t2:1456_1: dvādasahatthaṃ muñcitvā orato ṭhapenti, na purimasikkhāpade viya dvādasahatthabbhantareyevāti
tika-vin01t2:1456_2: adhippāyo. Aññatra pārivattakāti yaṃ antamaso harītakakhaṇḍampi datvā vā dassāmīti
tika-vin01t2:1456_3: ābhogaṃ katvā vā pārivattakaṃ gaṇhāti, taṃ ṭhapetvā. Acittakabhāvena na sametīti
tika-vin01t2:1456_4: yathā aññātikāya ñātikasaññissa vematikassa ca gaṇhato acittakattā āpatti, evamidhāpi
tika-vin01t2:1456_5: “bhikkhuniyā santakaṃ ida”nti ajānitvā gaṇhatopi āpattiyevāti adhippāyo. Vassāvāsikaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1456_6: detīti puggalikaṃ katvā deti. Paṃsukūlaṃ attano atthāya ṭhapitabhāvaṃ jānitvā gaṇhantenapi
tika-vin01t2:1456_7: aññassa santakaṃ gahitaṃ nāma na hotīti āha – “sace pana saṅkārakūṭādīsū”tiādi. Asāmikañhi
tika-vin01t2:1456_8: paṃsukūlanti vuccati. Paṃsukūlaṃ adhiṭṭhahitvāti “asāmikaṃ ida”nti saññaṃ uppādetvā.
tika-vin01t2:1456_9: Evaṃ pana paṃsukūlasaññaṃ anuppādetvā gaṇhituṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin01t2:1457: 513. Aññātikāya aññātikasaññīti tikapācittiyanti ettha iti-saddo ādiattho. Tīṇi parimāṇamassāti tikaṃ, tikañca taṃ pācittiyañcāti tikapācittiyaṃ, tīṇi pācittiyānīti attho.
tika-vin01t2:1458_0: 514. Pattatthavikādiṃ yaṃkiñcīti anadhiṭṭhānupagaṃ sandhāya vadati. “Cīvaraṃ nāma
tika-vin01t2:1458_1: channaṃ cīvarānaṃ aññataraṃ cīvaraṃ vikappanupagaṃ pacchima”nti hi vuttattā adhiṭṭhānupagaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1458_3: bhisicchavi mahantāpi senāsanasaṅgahitattā cīvarasaṅkhyaṃ na gacchatīti neva adhiṭṭhānupagā
tika-vin01t2:1458_4: na vikappanupagā ca, tasmā anadhiṭṭhānupagasāmaññato vuttaṃ. Sacepi mañcappamāṇā
tika-vin01t2:1458_5: bhisicchavi hoti, vaṭṭatiyevāti. Ko pana vādo pattatthavikādīsūti mahatiyāpi tāva
tika-vin01t2:1458_6: bhisicchaviyā anadhiṭṭhānupagattā anāpatti, tato khuddakataresu anadhiṭṭhānupagesu
tika-vin01t2:1458_7: pattatthavikādīsu kimeva vattabbanti adhippāyo. Paṭiggahaṇaṃ kiriyā, aparivattanaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1458_8: akiriyā. Vikappanupagacīvaratā, pārivattakābhāvo, aññātikāya hatthato gahaṇanti imānettha tīṇi aṅgāni.
tika-vin01t2:1461_0: 515. Chaṭṭhe patikiṭṭhoti nihīno, lāmakoti attho. Lolajātikoti lolasabhāvo. Paṭuyeva
tika-vin01t2:1461_1: paṭṭo. Tenāha “cheko”tiādi. Kismiṃ viyāti ettha “kismiṃ viyā”ti nipātavasena samānatthaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1461_2: “kiṃsu viyā”ti nipātapadanti āha “kiṃsu viyā”ti, kiṃ viyāti attho, dukkhaṃ viyāti
tika-vin01t2:1461_3: adhippāyo. Tenāha “kileso viyā”tiādi. Dhammavasena upacāravasena nimantanā dhammanimantanāti
tika-vin01t2:1461_4: pāḷipadassa attho veditabbo. Sace pana “vadeyyātha, bhante, yenattho”ti idaṃ saccameva
tika-vin01t2:1461_5: vuttaṃ siyā, pavāritoyeva hoti. Yasmā pana pavāretvāpi adātukāmo appavāritaṭṭhāneyeva
tika-vin01t2:1461_6: tiṭṭhati, tasmā bhagavā pavāritāpavāritabhāvaṃ avicāretvā “ñātako te, upananda, aññātako”ti
tika-vin01t2:1462_2: haritvā”ti. Saddhivihārikānaṃ tāva āgamanassa vā anāgamanassa vā ajānanatāya vuttaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1462_3: “therehi neva tāva…pe… bhañjitabba”nti. Paresampi atthāya labhantīti attano cīvaraṃ
tika-vin01t2:1462_4: dadamānā sayaṃ sākhābhaṅgena paṭicchādentīti tesaṃ atthāyapi bhañjituṃ labhanti.
tika-vin01t2:1462_5: “Tiṇena vā paṇṇena vā paṭicchādetvā āgantabba”nti vacanato īdisesu bhūtagāmapātabyatāpi
tika-vin01t2:1462_6: anuññātāyeva hotīti āha – “neva bhūtagāmapātabyatāya pācittiyaṃ hotī”ti. Na tesaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1462_7: dhāraṇe dukkaṭanti tesaṃ titthiyaddhajānaṃ dhāraṇepi dukkaṭaṃ natthi.
tika-vin01t2:1463_0: Yāni ca nesaṃ vatthāni dentīti sambandho. Therānaṃ sayameva dinnattā vuttaṃ “acchinnacīvaraṭṭhāne
tika-vin01t2:1463_1: ṭhitattā”ti. Yadi laddhiṃ gaṇhāti, titthiyapakkantako nāma hoti, tasmā vuttaṃ “laddhiṃ
tika-vin01t2:1463_2: aggahetvā”ti. “No ce hoti saṅghassa vihāracīvaraṃ vā…pe… āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti iminā
tika-vin01t2:1463_3: antarāmagge paviṭṭhavihārato nikkhamitvā aññattha attano abhirucitaṭṭhānaṃ gacchantassa
tika-vin01t2:1463_4: dukkaṭaṃ vuttaṃ. Iminā ca “yaṃ āvāsaṃ paṭhamaṃ upagacchatī”ti vuttaṃ antarāmagge
tika-vin01t2:1463_5: ṭhitavihārampi sace naggo hutvā gacchati, dukkaṭamevāti veditabbaṃ. Yadi evaṃ tattha
tika-vin01t2:1463_6: kasmā na vuttanti ce? Anokāsattā. Tattha hi “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, acchinnacīvarassa
tika-vin01t2:1463_7: vā…pe… cīvaraṃ viññāpetu”nti iminā sambandhena saṅghikampi cīvaraṃ nivāsetuṃ pārupituñca
tika-vin01t2:1463_8: anujānanto “yaṃ āvāsaṃ paṭhamaṃ…pe… gahetvā pārupitu”nti āha, tasmā tattha anokāsattā dukkaṭaṃ na vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1464_0: Vihāracīvaranti senāsanacīvaraṃ. Cimilikāhīti paṭapilotikāhi. Tassa uparīti bhūmattharaṇassa
tika-vin01t2:1464_1: upari. Videsagatenāti aññaṃ cīvaraṃ alabhitvā videsagatena. Ekasmiṃ…pe… ṭhapetabbanti
tika-vin01t2:1464_2: ettha “lesena gahetvā agatattā ṭhapentena ca saṅghikaparibhogeneva ṭhapitattā aññasmiṃ
tika-vin01t2:1464_3: senāsane niyamitampi aññattha ṭhapetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vadanti. Paribhogenevāti aññaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1465_0: 519-521. Paribhogajiṇṇanti yathā tena cīvarena sarīraṃ paṭicchādetuṃ na sakkā, evaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1465_2: imasseva atthaṃ vibhāveti “cetāpentassa parivattāpentassā”ti. Attano dhanena hi viññāpanaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1465_3: nāma parivattanamevāti adhippāyo. Saṅghavasena pavāritānaṃ viññāpane vattaṃ dasseti
tika-vin01t2:1465_4: “pamāṇameva vaṭṭatī”ti. Saṅghavasena hi pavārite sabbesaṃ sādhāraṇattā adhikaṃ viññāpetuṃ
tika-vin01t2:1465_5: na vaṭṭati. Yaṃ yaṃ pavāretīti yaṃ yaṃ cīvarādiṃ dassāmīti pavāreti. Viññāpanakiccaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1465_6: natthīti vinā viññattiyā dīyamānattā viññāpetvā kiṃ karissatīti adhippāyo. Aññassatthāyāti
tika-vin01t2:1465_7: etthāpi “ñātakānaṃ pavāritāna”nti idaṃ anuvattatiyevāti āha “attano ñātakapavārite”tiādi.
tika-vin01t2:1465_8: Vikappanupagacīvaratā, samayābhāvo, aññātakaviññatti, tāya ca paṭilābhoti imānettha cattāri aṅgāni.
tika-vin01t2:1468: 522. Sattame pāḷiyaṃ paggāhikasālanti dussavāṇijakānaṃ āpaṇaṃ. “Paggāhitasāla”ntipi paṭhanti.
tika-vin01t2:1469_0: 523-524. Abhīti upasaggoti tassa visesatthābhāvaṃ dasseti. Tenāha “haritunti attho”ti.
tika-vin01t2:1469_1: Vara-saddassa icchāyaṃ vattamānattā āha “icchāpeyyā”ti. Daṭṭhu khematoti ettha gāthābandhavasena
tika-vin01t2:1469_2: anunāsikalopo daṭṭhabbo. Saantaranti antaravāsakasahitaṃ. Uttaranti uttarāsaṅgaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1469_3: Assa cīvarassāti sāditabbacīvarassa. Acchinnasabbacīvarenāti acchinnāni sabbāni tīṇi
tika-vin01t2:1469_4: cīvarāni assāti acchinnasabbacīvaro, tenāti attho. Yassa hi acchindanasamaye tīṇi
tika-vin01t2:1469_5: cīvarāni sannihitāni honti, tāni sabbāni acchinnānīti so “acchinnasabbacīvaro”ti
tika-vin01t2:1469_6: vuccati. Teneva “acchinnasabbacīvarena ticīvarakenā”ti vuttaṃ. Ticīvarakenāti hi
tika-vin01t2:1469_7: acchindanasamaye ticīvarassa sannihitabhāvaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, na pana vinayatecīvarikabhāvaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1469_9: tena bhikkhunā tato cīvaraṃ sāditabba”nti vuttavidhinā paṭipajjitabbaṃ. Aññenāti
tika-vin01t2:1469_10: acchinnaasabbacīvarena. Yassa tīsu cīvaresu ekaṃ vā dve vā cīvarāni acchinnāni honti,
tika-vin01t2:1469_11: tenāti attho. Aññathāpīti “santaruttaraparama”nti vuttavidhānato aññathāpi. Yassa
tika-vin01t2:1469_12: hi tīsu dve cīvarāni acchinnāni honti, ekaṃ sāditabbaṃ. Ekasmiṃ acchinne na sāditabbanti
tika-vin01t2:1469_13: na tassa santaruttaraparamasādiyanaṃ sambhavati, ayameva ca attho padabhājanena vibhāvito.
tika-vin01t2:1470_0: Keci pana “ticīvarakenāti vuttattā ticīvaraṃ parikkhāracoḷavasena adhiṭṭhahitvā paribhuñjato
tika-vin01t2:1470_1: tasmiṃ naṭṭhe bahūnipi gahetuṃ labhatī”ti vadanti, taṃ na gahetabbaṃ. Padabhājanassa
tika-vin01t2:1470_2: hi adhippāyaṃ dassentena yasmā pana “acchinnasabbacīvarena…pe… taṃ vibhāgaṃ dassetu”nti
tika-vin01t2:1470_3: vuttaṃ, padabhājane ca na tādiso attho upalabbhati, tasmā taṃ na gahetabbameva. Yampi
tika-vin01t2:1470_4: mātikāṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ “yassa adhiṭṭhitacīvarassa tīṇi naṭṭhānī”ti, tatthāpi adhiṭṭhitaggahaṇaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1470_5: sarūpakathanamattanti gahetabbaṃ, na pana ticīvarādhiṭṭhānena adhiṭṭhitacīvarassevāti
tika-vin01t2:1470_6: evamattho gahetabbo pāḷiyaṃ aṭṭhakathāyañca tathā atthassa asambhavato. Na hi ticīvarādhiṭṭhānena
tika-vin01t2:1470_7: adhiṭṭhitacīvarasseva idaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññattanti sakkā viññātuṃ. Purimasikkhāpadena
tika-vin01t2:1470_8: hi acchinnacīvarassa aññātakaviññattiyā anuññātattā pamāṇaṃ ajānitvā viññāpanavatthusmiṃ
tika-vin01t2:1470_9: pamāṇato sādiyanaṃ anujānantena bhagavatā idaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ, tasmā “parikkhāracoḷikassa
tika-vin01t2:1470_10: bahumpi sādituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti ayamattho neva pāḷiyā sameti, na ca bhagavato adhippāyaṃ anulometi.
tika-vin01t2:1471_0: Yassa tīṇi naṭṭhāni, tena dve sāditabbānīti ettha yassa ticīvarato adhikampi cīvaraṃ
tika-vin01t2:1471_1: aññattha ṭhitaṃ atthi, tadātassa cīvarassa alabbhanīyabhāvato tenapi sādituṃ vaṭṭatīti
tika-vin01t2:1471_2: veditabbaṃ. Pakatiyāva santaruttarena caratīti sāsaṅkasikkhāpadavasena vā avippavāsasammutivasena
tika-vin01t2:1471_3: vā tatiyassa alābhena vā carati. “Dve naṭṭhānī”ti adhikārattā vuttaṃ “dve sāditabbānī”ti.
tika-vin01t2:1471_4: Ekaṃ sādiyanteneva samo bhavissatīti tiṇṇaṃ cīvarānaṃ dvīsu naṭṭhesu ekaṃ sādiyantena
tika-vin01t2:1471_5: samo bhavissati ubhinnampi santaruttaraparamatāya avaṭṭhānato. Yassa ekaṃyeva hotīti
tika-vin01t2:1471_6: aññena kenaci kāraṇena vinaṭṭhasesacīvaraṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1472_0: 526. “Sesakaṃ tuyheva hotūti dentī”ti vuttattā “pamāṇayuttaṃ gaṇhissāma, sesakaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1472_1: āharissāmā”ti vatvā gahetvā gamanasamayepi “sesakampi tumhākaññeva hotū”ti vadanti,
tika-vin01t2:1472_2: laddhakappiyameva. Pavāritānanti acchinnakālato pubbeyeva pavāritānaṃ. Pāḷiyā na
tika-vin01t2:1472_3: sametīti santaruttaraparamato uttari sādiyane anāpattidassanatthaṃ “anāpatti ñātakānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1472_4: pavāritāna”nti vuttattā na sameti. Santaruttaraparamaṃ sādiyantassa hi āpattippasaṅgoyeva
tika-vin01t2:1472_5: natthi, sati ca sikkhāpadena āpattippasaṅge anāpatti yuttā dassetunti adhippāyo.
tika-vin01t2:1472_6: Keci pana “pamāṇameva vaṭṭatīti idaṃ sallekhadassanatthaṃ vutta”nti vadanti.
tika-vin01t2:1473_0: Yasmā panidaṃ…pe… na vuttanti etthāyamadhippāyo – “aññassatthāyā”ti vuccamāne aññesaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1473_1: atthāya pamāṇaṃ atikkamitvāpi gaṇhituṃ vaṭṭatīti āpajjati, tañca aññassatthāya viññāpanavatthusmiṃ
tika-vin01t2:1473_2: paññattattā vatthunā saṃsandiyamānaṃ na sameti. Na hi yaṃ vatthuṃ nissāya sikkhāpadaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1473_3: paññattaṃ, tasmiṃyeva anāpattivacanaṃ yuttanti. Gaṇṭhipadesu pana tīsupi “imassa
tika-vin01t2:1473_5: okāsoyeva natthi, tasmā na vutta”nti kathitaṃ. Idha “aññassatthāyā”ti avuttattā aññesaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1473_6: atthāya ñātakapavāritesu adhikaṃ viññāpentassa āpattīti ce? Na, tattha purimasikkhāpadeneva
tika-vin01t2:1473_7: anāpattisiddhito. Tatuttaritā, acchinnādikāraṇatā, aññātakaviññatti, tāya ca paṭilābhoti
tika-vin01t2:1476: 527. Aṭṭhame api mayyāti pāṭhepi soyevattho. Ayyāti pana bahuvacanena āmantanaṃ kataṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1477_0: 528-529. Apadissāti “itthannāmassa bhikkhuno dassāmī”ti evaṃ apadisitvā. Paccayaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1477_1: katvāti kāraṇaṃ katvā. Uddissāti ettha yo kattāti “uddissā”ti iminā vuttauddisanakiriyāya
tika-vin01t2:1477_2: yo kattā. Cīvaraṃ cetāpenti parivattenti etenāti cīvaracetāpannaṃ. Na-kārāgamaṃ katvā
tika-vin01t2:1477_4: Yebhuyyavasena hi gharasāmikaṃ daṭṭhukāmā tassa gharaṃ gacchantīti tatheva bahulaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1477_5: vohāro. Byañjanamattamevāti attho netabbo natthīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin01t2:1478_0: 531. Samakepi pana anāpattīti yadagghanakaṃ so dātukāmo hoti, tadagghanake anāpatti
tika-vin01t2:1478_1: mūlaṃ vaḍḍhetvā adhikavidhānaṃ anāpannattā. Ettha ca “dātukāmomhī”ti attano santike
tika-vin01t2:1478_2: avuttepi dātukāmataṃ sutvā yadagghanakaṃ so dātukāmo hoti, tadagghanakaṃ āharāpetuṃ
tika-vin01t2:1478_3: vaṭṭati. Agghavaḍḍhanakañhi idaṃ sikkhāpadanti ettha agghavaḍḍhanaṃ etassa atthīti
tika-vin01t2:1478_4: agghavaḍḍhanakaṃ, agghavaḍḍhanaṃ sandhāya idaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññattanti adhippāyo.
tika-vin01t2:1478_5: Cīvaraṃ dehīti saṅghāṭiādīsu yaṃkiñci cīvaraṃ sandhāya vadati. Cīvare bhiyyokamyatā,
tika-vin01t2:1478_6: aññātakaviññatti, tāya ca paṭilābhoti imānettha tīṇi aṅgāni.
tika-vin01t2:1482_0: 537-539. Rājasikkhāpade pana “ajjaṇho”ti pāṭhe “ajjuṇho”tipi paṭhanti. Bhogoti bhuñjitabbo.
tika-vin01t2:1482_1: Yaṃ vuttaṃ mātikāṭṭhakathāyaṃ “iminā cīvaracetāpannena cīvaraṃ cetāpetvā itthannāmaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1482_2: bhikkhuṃ cīvarena acchādehīti idaṃ āgamanasuddhiṃ dassetuṃ vuttaṃ. Sace hi ‘idaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1482_3: itthannāmassa bhikkhuno dehī’ti peseyya, āgamanassa asuddhattā akappiyavatthuṃ ārabbha
tika-vin01t2:1482_4: bhikkhunā kappiyakārakopi niddisitabbo na bhaveyyā”ti, tattha āgamanassa suddhiyā
tika-vin01t2:1482_5: vā asuddhiyā vā visesappayojanaṃ na dissati. Satipi hi āgamanassa asuddhabhāve dūto
tika-vin01t2:1482_6: attano kusalatāya kappiyavohārena vadati, “kappiyakārako na niddisitabbo”ti idaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1482_7: natthi, na ca dūtena kappiyavohāravasena vutte dāyakena idaṃ kathaṃ pesitanti īdisī
tika-vin01t2:1482_8: vicāraṇā upalabbhati, avicāretvā ca taṃ na sakkā jānituṃ, yadi pana āgamanassa asuddhattā
tika-vin01t2:1482_9: kappiyakārako niddisitabbo na bhaveyya, cīvarānaṃ atthāya dūtassa hatthe akappiyavatthusmiṃ
tika-vin01t2:1482_10: pesite sabbattha dāyakena kathaṃ pesitanti pucchitvāva kappiyakārako niddisitabbo
tika-vin01t2:1482_11: bhaveyya. Tasmā asatipi āgamanasuddhiyaṃ sace so dūto attano kusalatāya kappiyavohāravasena
tika-vin01t2:1482_12: vadati, dūtasseva vacanaṃ gahetabbaṃ. Yadi hi āgamanasuddhiyevettha pamāṇaṃ, mūlasāmikena
tika-vin01t2:1482_13: kappiyavohāravasena pesitassa dūtassa akappiyavohāravasena vadatopi kappiyakārako
tika-vin01t2:1482_14: niddisitabbo bhaveyya, tasmā sabbattha dūtavacanameva pamāṇanti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1483_0: Iminā cīvaracetāpannenātiādinā pana imamatthaṃ dasseti – kappiya vasena āgatampi
tika-vin01t2:1483_1: cīvaramūlaṃ īdisena dūtavacanena akappiyaṃ hoti, tasmā taṃ paṭikkhipitabbanti. Tenevāha
tika-vin01t2:1483_2: – “tena bhikkhunā so dūto evamassa vacanīyo”tiādi. Suvaṇṇaṃ, rajataṃ, kahāpaṇo, māsakoti
tika-vin01t2:1483_3: imāni hi cattāri nissaggiyavatthūni, muttā, maṇi, veḷuriyo, saṅkho, silā, pavāḷaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:1483_4: lohitaṅko, masāragallaṃ, satta dhaññāni, dāsidāsaṃ, khettaṃ, vatthu, pupphārāmaphalārāmādayoti
tika-vin01t2:1483_5: imāni dukkaṭavatthūni ca attano vā cetiyasaṅghagaṇapuggalānaṃ vā atthāya sampaṭicchituṃ
tika-vin01t2:1483_6: na vaṭṭanti, tasmā taṃ sādituṃ na vaṭṭatīti dassanatthaṃ “na kho mayaṃ, āvuso, cīvaracetāpannaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1483_7: paṭiggaṇhāmā”ti vuttaṃ, “cīvarañca kho mayaṃ paṭiggaṇhāmā”ti idaṃ pana attānaṃ uddissa
tika-vin01t2:1483_8: ābhatattā vattuṃ vaṭṭati, tasmā vuttaṃ. “Veyyāvaccakaro niddisitabbo”ti idaṃ “atthi
tika-vin01t2:1483_9: panāyasmato koci veyyāvaccakaro”ti kappiyavacanena vuttattā anuññātaṃ. Sace pana
tika-vin01t2:1483_10: dūto “ko imaṃ gaṇhātī”ti vā “kassa demī”ti vā vadati, na niddisitabbo. “Ārāmiko vā
tika-vin01t2:1483_11: upāsako vā”ti idaṃ sāruppatāya vuttaṃ, ṭhapetvā pana pañca sahadhammike yo koci kappiyakārako
tika-vin01t2:1483_12: vaṭṭati. “Eso kho, āvuso, bhikkhūnaṃ veyyāvaccakaro”ti idaṃ bhikkhussa kappiyavacanadassanatthaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1483_13: vuttaṃ. Evameva hi vattabbaṃ, “etassa dehī”tiādi na vattabbaṃ. So vā cetāpessati
tika-vin01t2:1483_14: vāti ettha eko vā-saddo padapūraṇo, “saññatto so mayā”tiādi pana dūtena evaṃ ārociteyeva
tika-vin01t2:1483_15: taṃ codetuṃ vaṭṭati, nevāssa hatthe datvā gatamattakāraṇenāti dassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1484_0: Etāni hi vacanāni…pe… na vattabboti ettha “evaṃ vadanto paṭikkhittassa katattā vattabhede
tika-vin01t2:1484_1: dukkaṭaṃ āpajjati, codanā pana hotiyevā”ti mahāgaṇṭhipade majjhimagaṇṭhipade ca vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1484_3: ettha pucchiyamānenāti attho gahetabboti āha “karaṇatthe paccattavacana”nti. Āgatakāraṇaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1485_0: Ettha keci vadanti “āgatakāraṇaṃ nāma cīvaraggahaṇaṃ, taṃ bhañjatīti vuttattā puna
tika-vin01t2:1485_1: taṃ cīvaraṃ yena kenaci ākārena gahetuṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti. Keci pana “āgatakāraṇaṃ nāma
tika-vin01t2:1485_2: kāyavācāhi codanā, taṃ bhañjatīti vuttattā puna taṃ yena kenaci ākārena codetuṃ na
tika-vin01t2:1485_3: labhati. Sace sayameva deti, mūlasāmiko vā dāpeti, gahetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vadanti. Apare
tika-vin01t2:1485_4: pana “āgatakāraṇaṃ nāma ṭhānaṃ, taṃ bhañjatīti vuttattā yathā ‘attho me, āvuso, cīvarenā’ti
tika-vin01t2:1485_5: ekāya codanāya dve ṭhānāni bhañjati, evamidhāpi sace āsane nisīdati, ekāya nisajjāya
tika-vin01t2:1485_6: dve ṭhānāni bhañjati. Āmisaṃ ce paṭiggaṇhāti, ekena paṭiggahaṇena dve ṭhānāni bhañjati.
tika-vin01t2:1485_7: Dhammaṃ ce bhāsati, dhammadesanāsikkhāpade vuttaparicchedāya ekāya vācāya dve ṭhānāni
tika-vin01t2:1485_8: bhañjatī”ti vadanti. Imesaṃ pana sabbesampi vādaṃ “ayutta”nti paṭikkhipitvā tīsupi
tika-vin01t2:1485_9: gaṇṭhipadesu idaṃ vuttaṃ “āgatakāraṇaṃ nāma ṭhānameva, tasmā ‘na kattabba’nti vāritassa
tika-vin01t2:1485_10: katattā nisajjādīsu katesu chasu ṭhānesu ekaṃ ṭhānaṃ bhañjatī”ti.
tika-vin01t2:1486_0: Tatra tatra ṭhāne tiṭṭhatīti idaṃ codakassa ṭhitaṭṭhānato apakkamma tatra tatra uddissa
tika-vin01t2:1486_1: ṭhānaṃyeva sandhāya vuttaṃ. “Sāmaṃ vā gantabbaṃ, dūto vā pāhetabbo”ti idaṃ sabhāvato
tika-vin01t2:1486_2: codetuṃ anicchantenapi kātabbamevāti vadanti. Mukhaṃ vivaritvā sayameva kappiyakārakattaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1486_4: kappiyakārako”ti idaṃ “tādisaṃ karonto kappiyakārako natthī”ti iminā adhippāyena vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1487_0: “Meṇḍakasikkhāpade vuttanayena paṭipajjitabba”nti vatvā idāni taṃ meṇḍakasikkhāpadaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1487_1: dassento “vuttañheta”ntiādimāha. Idameva hi “santi, bhikkhave, saddhā pasannā”tiādivacanaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1488: “Santi, bhante, maggā kantārā appodakā appabhakkhā, na sukarā apātheyyena gantuṃ, sādhu, bhante, bhagavā bhikkhūnaṃ pātheyyaṃ anujānātū”ti –
tika-vin01t2:1490_0: “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, pātheyyaṃ pariyesituṃ. Taṇḍulo taṇḍulatthikena, muggo muggatthikena,
tika-vin01t2:1490_1: māso māsatthikena, loṇaṃ loṇatthikena, guḷo guḷatthikena, telaṃ telatthikena, sappi sappitthikenā”ti –
tika-vin01t2:1492_0: “Santi, bhikkhave, manussā saddhā pasannā, te kappiyakārakānaṃ hatthe hiraññaṃ upanikkhipanti
tika-vin01t2:1492_1: ‘iminā ayyassa yaṃ kappiyaṃ, taṃ dethā’ti. Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, yaṃ tato kappiyaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:1492_2: taṃ sādituṃ, na tvevāhaṃ bhikkhave kenaci pariyāyena jātarūparajataṃ sāditabbaṃ pariyesitabbanti vadāmī”ti.
tika-vin01t2:1493_0: Hiraññaṃ upanikkhipantīti etthāpi bhikkhussa ārocanaṃ atthiyevāti gahetabbaṃ. Aññathā
tika-vin01t2:1493_1: aniddiṭṭhakappiyakārakattaṃ bhajatīti na codetabbo siyā. Yadi mūlaṃ sandhāya codeti,
tika-vin01t2:1494_0: “Aññātakaappavāritesu viya paṭipajjitabbanti idaṃ attanā codanāṭhānañca na kātabbanti
tika-vin01t2:1494_1: dassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Aññaṃ pana kappiyakārakaṃ pesetvā lokacārittavasena anuyuñjitvāpi
tika-vin01t2:1494_2: kappiyavatthuṃ āharāpetuṃ vaṭṭati attānaṃ uddissa nikkhittassa attano santakattā”ti
tika-vin01t2:1494_3: keci vadanti, taṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “aññātakaappavāritesu viya paṭipajjitabbaṃ. Sace
tika-vin01t2:1494_4: sayameva cīvaraṃ ānetvā denti, gahetabbaṃ. No ce, kiñci na vattabbā”ti daḷhaṃ katvā
tika-vin01t2:1494_5: vuttattā na gahetabbanti amhākaṃ khanti. Na hi aññātakaappavāritaṃ sayaṃ aviññāpetvā
tika-vin01t2:1494_6: aññena viññāpetuṃ vaṭṭati, na ca yattha aññaṃ pesetvā āharāpetuṃ vaṭṭati, tattha
tika-vin01t2:1494_7: sayaṃ gantvā na āharāpetabbanti sakkā vatthuṃ. Yadi cettha aññena āharāpetuṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin01t2:1494_9: imassa byabhicāraṃ dasseti “sayaṃ āharitvāpī”ti. Dadantesūti iminā sambandho. Piṇḍapātādīnaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1494_10: atthāyāti iminā pana “cīvaracetāpanna”nti imassa byabhicāraṃ dasseti. “Eseva nayo”ti
tika-vin01t2:1494_11: vuttattā piṇḍapātādīnaṃ atthāya dinnepi ṭhānacodanādi sabbaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva kātabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1495_0: Paṭiggahaṇepi paribhogepi āpattīti paṭiggahaṇe pācittiyaṃ, paribhoge dukkaṭaṃ. Sveva
tika-vin01t2:1495_1: sāpattikoti dukkaṭāpattiṃ sandhāya vadati. Idañca aṭṭhakathāpamāṇeneva gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1495_2: “Parassa niddosabhāvadassanatthaṃ sveva sāpattiko sadosoti vuttaṃ hotī”tipi vadanti.
tika-vin01t2:1495_3: “Codetīti vuttattā pana āpattiyā codetīti katvā sveva sāpattikoti idaṃ dukkaṭaṃyeva
tika-vin01t2:1495_4: sandhāya vattuṃ yutta”nti tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ. Paṭiggahaṇepi paribhogepi āpattiyevāti
tika-vin01t2:1495_5: dukkaṭameva sandhāya vuttaṃ. Taḷākassapi khettasaṅgahitattā tassa paṭiggahaṇepi āpatti
tika-vin01t2:1495_6: vuttā. Cattāro paccaye saṅgho paribhuñjatūti detīti ettha “bhikkhusaṅgho cattāro
tika-vin01t2:1495_7: paccaye paribhuñcatu, taḷākaṃ dammī”ti vā “catupaccayaparibhogatthaṃ taḷākaṃ dammī”ti
tika-vin01t2:1495_8: vā vadati, vaṭṭatiyeva. “Ito taḷākato uppanne cattāro paccaye dammī”ti vutte pana
tika-vin01t2:1496_0: Amhākaṃ ekaṃ kappiyakārakaṃ ṭhapethāti vutteti idaṃ īdisaṃyeva sandhāya vuttaṃ. Kappiyakkamena
tika-vin01t2:1496_1: sampaṭicchitesu khettataḷākādīsu pana avuttepi kappiyakārakaṃ ṭhapetuṃ labbhatiyeva.
tika-vin01t2:1496_2: Yasmā parasantakaṃ nāsetuṃ bhikkhūnaṃ na vaṭṭati, tasmā “na sassakāle”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1496_3: “Janapadassa sāmikoti imināva yo taṃ janapadaṃ vicāreti, tenapi acchinditvā dinnaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1496_4: vaṭṭatiyevā”ti vadanti. Udakavāhakanti udakamātikaṃ. Kappiyavohārepīti ettha “vidhānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1496_5: vakkhāmā”ti pāṭhaseso. Udakavasenāti udakaparibhogatthaṃ. Suddhacittānanti kevalaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1496_6: udakaparibhogatthamevāti adhippāyo. Alajjinā kārāpite vattabbameva natthīti āha “lajjībhikkhunā”ti.
tika-vin01t2:1496_7: Pakatibhāgo nāma imasmiṃ raṭṭhe catuambaṇamattaṃ. Akaṭṭhapubbaṃ navasassaṃ nāma.
tika-vin01t2:1496_8: Aparicchinnabhāgeti “ettake bhūmibhāge ettako bhāgo dātabbo”ti evaṃ aparicchinnabhāge.
tika-vin01t2:1497_0: Rajjuyā vā daṇḍena vāti ettha “pādehipi minituṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti vadanti. Khale vā ṭhatvā
tika-vin01t2:1497_1: rakkhatīti ettha pana thenetvā gaṇhante disvā “mā gaṇhathā”ti nivārento rakkhati
tika-vin01t2:1497_2: nāma. Sace pana avicāretvā kevalaṃ tuṇhībhūtova rakkhaṇatthāya olokento tiṭṭhati,
tika-vin01t2:1497_3: vaṭṭati. Sacepi tasmiṃ tuṇhībhūte corikāya haranti, “mayaṃ bhikkhusaṅghassa ārocessāmā”ti
tika-vin01t2:1497_4: evaṃ vattuṃ vaṭṭatīti vadanti. Nīharāpeti paṭisāmetīti etthāpi “sace pariyāyena vadati,
tika-vin01t2:1497_5: vaṭṭatī”ti vadanti. Apubbassa anuppāditattā aññesaṃ vaṭṭatīti āha “tasseva taṃ akappiya”nti.
tika-vin01t2:1498_0: Nanu ca dubbicāritamattena tasseva taṃ akappiyaṃ, na sabbesaṃ rūpiyasaṃvohāre catutthapatto
tika-vin01t2:1498_1: viya. Vuttañhi tattha “yo pana rūpiyaṃ asampaṭicchitvā ‘therassa pattaṃ kiṇitvā dehī’ti
tika-vin01t2:1498_2: pahitakappiyakārakena saddhiṃ kammārakulaṃ gantvā pattaṃ disvā ‘ime kahāpaṇe gahetvā
tika-vin01t2:1498_3: imaṃ dehī’ti kahāpaṇe dāpetvā gahito, ayaṃ patto etasseva bhikkhuno na vaṭṭati dubbicāritattā,
tika-vin01t2:1498_4: aññesaṃ pana vaṭṭati mūlassa asampaṭicchitattā”ti. Tasmā yaṃ te āharanti, sabbesaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1498_5: akappiyaṃ. Kasmā? Kahāpaṇānaṃ vicāritattāti idaṃ kasmā vuttanti? Ettha keci vadanti
tika-vin01t2:1498_6: “kahāpaṇe sādiyitvā vicāritaṃ sandhāya evaṃ vutta”nti. Saṅghikattā ca nissajjituṃ
tika-vin01t2:1498_7: na sakkā, tasmā sabbesaṃ na kappatīti tesaṃ adhippāyo. Keci pana “asādiyitvāpi kahāpaṇānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1498_8: vicāritattā rūpiyasaṃvohāro kato hoti, saṅghikattā ca nissajjituṃ na sakkā, tasmā
tika-vin01t2:1498_9: sabbesaṃ na kappatī”ti vadanti. Gaṇṭhipadesu pana tīsupi idaṃ vuttaṃ “catutthapatto
tika-vin01t2:1498_10: gihisantakānaṃyeva kahāpaṇānaṃ vicāritattā aññesaṃ kappati, idha pana saṅghikānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1498_11: vicāritattā sabbesaṃ na kappatī”ti. Sabbesampi vādo tena tena pariyāyena yujjatiyeva.
tika-vin01t2:1499_0: Catusāladvāreti bhojanasālaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Pariyāyena kathitattāti “gaṇhā”ti avatvā
tika-vin01t2:1499_1: “sīmā gatā”ti pariyāyena kathitattā. Pakatibhūmikaraṇatthaṃ “heṭṭhā gahitaṃ paṃsu”ntiādi
tika-vin01t2:1499_2: vuttaṃ. Dāsaṃ dammīti ettha “manussaṃ dammīti vutte vaṭṭatī”ti vadanti. Kukkuṭasūkarā…pe…
tika-vin01t2:1499_3: vaṭṭatīti ettha kukkuṭasūkaresu dīyamānesu “imehi amhākaṃ attho natthi, sukhaṃ jīvantu,
tika-vin01t2:1499_4: araññe vissajjethā”ti vattuṃ vaṭṭati. “Khettavatthupaṭiggahaṇā paṭivirato hotī”tiādivacanato
tika-vin01t2:1499_5: khettādīnaṃ paṭiggahaṇe ayaṃ sabbo vinicchayo vutto. Kappiyakārakassa bhikkhunā niddiṭṭhabhāvo,
tika-vin01t2:1499_6: dūtena appitatā, tatuttari vāyāmo, tena vāyāmena paṭilābhoti imānettha cattāri aṅgāni.
tika-vin01t2:1504_0: 542. Pāḷiyaṃ “kosiyakārake”ti ettha kosaṃ karontīti kosakārakāti laddhavohārānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1504_1: pāṇakānaṃ kosato nibbattaṃ kosiyaṃ, taṃ karontīti kosiyakārakā, tantavāyā. Saṃhananaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1504_2: saṅghāto, vināsoti attho. Kosiyamissakanti kosiyatantunā missaṃ. “Avāyima”nti vuttattā
tika-vin01t2:1504_3: vāyitvā ce karonti, anāpatti. Anāpatti vitānaṃ vātiādinā vitānādīnaṃ atthāya karaṇepi
tika-vin01t2:1505_0: Evampi missetvā katameva hotīti iminā vātena āharitvā pātitepi acittakattā āpattiyevāti
tika-vin01t2:1505_1: dasseti. Kosiyamissakatā, attano atthāya santhatassa karaṇaṃ kārāpanaṃ, paṭilābho
tika-vin01t2:1509_0: 552. Dvebhāgasikkhāpade pana dve bhāgāti ukkaṭṭhaparicchedo kāḷakānaṃ adhikaggahaṇassa
tika-vin01t2:1509_1: paṭikkhepavasena sikkhāpadassa paññattattā. Tatiyaṃ odātānaṃ catutthaṃ gocariyānanti
tika-vin01t2:1509_2: ayaṃ heṭṭhimaparicchedo tesaṃ adhikaggahaṇe paṭikkhepābhāvato, tasmā kāḷakānaṃ bhāgadvayato
tika-vin01t2:1509_3: adhikaṃ na vaṭṭati, sesānaṃ pana vuttappamāṇato adhikampi vaṭṭati. “Kāḷakānaṃyeva
tika-vin01t2:1509_4: ca adhikaggahaṇassa paṭikkhittattā kāḷakānaṃ upaḍḍhaṃ odātānaṃ vā gocariyānaṃ vā
tika-vin01t2:1509_5: upaḍḍhaṃ gahetvāpi kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vadanti, “anāpatti bahutaraṃ odātānaṃ bahutaraṃ
tika-vin01t2:1509_6: gocariyānaṃ ādiyitvā karoti, suddhaṃ odātānaṃ suddhaṃ gocariyānaṃ ādiyitvā karotī”ti
tika-vin01t2:1509_7: iminā taṃ sameti. “Kāḷake odāte ca ṭhapetvā sesā gocariyesuyeva saṅgahaṃ gacchantī”ti
tika-vin01t2:1509_8: vadanti. Dve koṭṭhāsā kāḷakānanti ettha pana “ekassapi kāḷakalomassa atirekabhāve
tika-vin01t2:1509_9: nissaggiyaṃ hotī”ti mātikāṭṭhakathāyaṃ ttaṃ, taṃ “dhārayitvā dve tulā ādātabbā”ti
tika-vin01t2:1509_10: vacanato tulādhāraṇāya na sameti. Na hi lome gaṇetvā tulādhāraṇā karīyati, atha gaṇetvāva
tika-vin01t2:1509_11: dhārayitabbaṃ siyā, kiṃ tulādhāraṇāya, tasmā evamettha adhippāyo yutto siyā – acittakattā
tika-vin01t2:1509_12: sikkhāpadassa pubbe tulāya dhārayitvā ṭhapitesu ekampi lomaṃ tattha pateyya, nissaggiyanti.
tika-vin01t2:1509_13: Aññathā dubbiññeyyabhāvato dve tulā nādātabbā, ūnakatarāva ādātabbā siyuṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1512_0: 557. Chabbassasikkhāpade pana “yesaṃ no santhate dārakā uhadantipi ummihantipi, yesaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1512_1: no santhatā undūrehipi khajjantī”ti evaṃ pāḷipadānaṃ sambandho veditabbo. Hada karīsossagge,
tika-vin01t2:1512_2: miha secaneti panimassatthaṃ sandhāyāha “vaccampi passāvampi karontī”ti. Pavāraṇāuposathapāṭipadadivasesu
tika-vin01t2:1512_3: santhataṃ karitvā puna chaṭṭhe vasse paripuṇṇe pavāraṇāuposathapāṭipadadivasesu karonto
tika-vin01t2:1512_4: “chabbassāni karotī”ti vuccati. Dutiyadivasato paṭṭhāya karonto pana atirekachabbassāni karoti nāma.
tika-vin01t2:1515_0: 565-6. Nisīdanasanthatasikkhāpade pana paññāyissatīti sace sā katikā manāpā bhavissati,
tika-vin01t2:1515_1: manāpatāya bhikkhusaṅgho sandississati. Sace amanāpā, amanāpatāya sandississatīti
tika-vin01t2:1515_2: adhippāyo, āraññakaṅgādīni tīṇi pāḷiyaṃ padhānaṅgavasena vuttāni, sesānipi te samādiyiṃsuyevāti
tika-vin01t2:1516_1: nipannañcā”ti. Vidatthimattanti sugatavidatthiṃ sandhāya vadati. Idañca heṭṭhimaparicchedadassanatthaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1516_2: vuttaṃ. “Vitānādīnaṃyeva atthāya karaṇe anāpattivacanato sace nipajjanatthāya karonti,
tika-vin01t2:1516_3: āpattiyevā”ti tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ. Akappiyattā pana “paribhuñjituṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti
tika-vin01t2:1516_4: vuttaṃ. Idañca nisīdanasanthataṃ nāma nisīdanacīvarameva, nāññanti vadanti. Nisīdanasikkhāpadepi
tika-vin01t2:1516_5: nisīdanaṃ nāma sadasaṃ vuccatīti ca aṭṭhakathāyañcassa “santhatasadisaṃ santharitvā
tika-vin01t2:1516_6: ekasmiṃ ante sugatavidatthiyā vidatthimatte padese dvīsu ṭhānesu phāletvā tisso dasā
tika-vin01t2:1516_7: karīyanti, tāhi dasāhi sadasaṃ nāma vuccatī”ti vacanato idhāpi “nisīdanaṃ nāma sadasaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1516_8: vuccatī”ti ca “santhate catutthacīvarasaññitāyā”ti ca vacanato taṃ yuttaṃ viya dissati.
tika-vin01t2:1516_9: Keci pana “nisīdanasanthataṃ eḷakalomāni santharitvā santhataṃ viya karonti, taṃ
tika-vin01t2:1516_10: avāyimaṃ anadhiṭṭhānupagaṃ, nisīdanacīvaraṃ pana channaṃ cīvarānaṃ aññatarena karoti
tika-vin01t2:1516_11: adhiṭṭhānupagaṃ, taṃ karontā ca nantakāni santharitvā santhatasadisaṃ karontī”ti
tika-vin01t2:1519_0: 571. Eḷalomasikkhāpade pana āsumbhīti ettha “asumbhī”ti paṭhanti. Kilantāti iminā
tika-vin01t2:1519_1: kilantatāya te onamitvā pātetuṃ na sakkontīti dasseti. Addhānamaggappaṭipannassāti
tika-vin01t2:1519_2: idaṃ vatthumattadīpanavasena pāḷiyaṃ vuttaṃ. Yattha katthaci pana dhammena labhitvā
tika-vin01t2:1519_3: gaṇhituṃ vaṭṭatiyeva. Tiyojanaparamanti ca gahitaṭṭhānato tiyojanappamāṇaṃ desanti
tika-vin01t2:1520_0: 572. Sahatthāti karaṇatthe nissakkavacananti āha “sahatthenā”ti. Asante hāraketi
tika-vin01t2:1520_1: pāḷiyaṃ bhikkhuno anurūpatādassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ, na pana hārake vijjamāne tiyojanabbhantare
tika-vin01t2:1520_2: sahatthā harantassa āpattidassanatthaṃ. Tiyojanato bahi bahitiyojananti āha “tiyojanato
tika-vin01t2:1520_3: bahi pātetī”ti. Tena haritepi āpattiyevāti saussāhattā anāṇattiyā haṭattā ca. Satipi
tika-vin01t2:1520_4: hi saussāhabhāve āṇattiyā ce harati, anāpatti “aññaṃ harāpetī”ti vacanato. Añño harissatīti
tika-vin01t2:1520_6: saussāhattā. Idañca “añño harissatī”ti asuddhacittena ṭhapitaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, acittakattāti
tika-vin01t2:1520_7: idaṃ pana suddhacittena ṭhapitaṃ sandhāya. Anāpatti pāḷiyā na sametīti “tiyojanaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1520_8: haratī”tiādipāḷiyā, visesato “aññaṃ harāpetī”ti pāḷiyā ca na sameti.
tika-vin01t2:1521_0: Sace sāmikaṃ jānāpetvā ṭhapeti, āṇattiyā harāpeti nāmāti āha “sāmikassa ajānantassevā”ti.
tika-vin01t2:1521_1: Agacchantepīti gamanaṃ upacchinditvā ṭhitayānepi. Heṭṭhā vā gacchantoti bhūmiyaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1521_2: gacchanto. Aññaṃ harāpetīti ettha añña-ggahaṇena sāmaññato tiracchānagatāpi saṅgahitāti
tika-vin01t2:1521_3: āha – “aññaṃ harāpetīti vacanato anāpattī”ti. Suṅkaghāte āpatti hotīti aññaṃ harāpentassa
tika-vin01t2:1521_4: āpatti. Tattha anāpattīti aññavihitassa theyyacittābhāvato anāpatti.
tika-vin01t2:1522_0: 575. “Taṃ harantassāti puna tiyojanaṃ harantassā”ti mahāgaṇṭhipade vuttaṃ. Taṃ pana
tika-vin01t2:1522_1: mātikāṭṭhakathāyaṃ aṅgesu “paṭhamappaṭilābho sati iminā vacanena na sameti. “Paṭhamappaṭilābho”ti
tika-vin01t2:1522_2: hi idaṃ dutiyappaṭilābho āpattiyā aṅgaṃ na hotīti dīpeti, tasmā pāḷiyaṃ aṭṭhakathāyañca
tika-vin01t2:1522_3: visesābhāvato acchinnaṃ paṭilabhitvā harantassa puna tiyojanātikkamepi anāpatti vuttāti
tika-vin01t2:1522_4: amhākaṃ khanti. Aññathā acchinnaṃ paṭilabhitvā puna tiyojanaṃ haratīti vadeyya. Vīmaṃsitvā
tika-vin01t2:1522_6: Pakaticīvare laggalomāni āpattiṃ janentiyevā”ti vadanti. Tanukapattatthavikantare
tika-vin01t2:1522_7: aghaṭṭanatthaṃ pakkhipanti. Pakkhittanti kaṇṇacchidde pakkhittaṃ. Nidhānamukhaṃ nāmāti
tika-vin01t2:1522_8: iminā katabhaṇḍasaṅkhyaṃ na gacchatīti dasseti. Eḷakalomānaṃ akatabhaṇḍatā, paṭhamappaṭilābho,
tika-vin01t2:1522_9: attanā ādāya vā aññassa ajānantassa yāne pakkhipitvā vā tiyojanātikkamanaṃ, āharaṇapaccāharaṇaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:1526_0: 583-584. Rūpiyasikkhāpade pana satthuvaṇṇoti satthunā samānavaṇṇo. Satthuno vaṇṇo
tika-vin01t2:1526_1: satthuvaṇṇo, satthuvaṇṇo viya vaṇṇo assāti satthuvaṇṇoti majjhapadalopīsamāso daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin01t2:1526_2: Pākatiko nāma etarahi pakatikahāpaṇo. Rukkhaphalabījamayoti tintiṇikādirukkhānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1526_3: phalabījena kato. Iccetaṃ sabbampīti yathāvuttabhedaṃ sabbampi catubbidhaṃ nissaggiyavatthu
tika-vin01t2:1527_0: Gaṇheyyāti attano atthāya dīyamānaṃ vā katthaci ṭhitaṃ vā nippariggahaṃ disvā sayaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1527_1: gaṇheyya. “Idaṃ ayyassa hotū”ti evaṃ sammukhā vā “asukasmiṃ nāma ṭhāne mama hiraññasuvaṇṇaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1527_2: atthi, taṃ tuyhaṃ hotū”ti evaṃ parammukhā ṭhitaṃ vā kevalaṃ vācāya vā hatthamuddāya
tika-vin01t2:1527_3: vā “tuyha”nti vatvā pariccattassa kāyavācāhi appaṭikkhipitvā cittena sādiyanaṃ upanikkhittasādiyanaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1527_6: vutte “uggaṇhāpeyya vā”ti vuttalakkhaṇena nissaggiyaṃ hotīti āha – “idha nikkhipāhīti
tika-vin01t2:1527_7: na vattabba”nti. Parato “imaṃ gaṇhā”ti na vattabbanti etthāpi eseva nayo. Kappiyañca
tika-vin01t2:1527_8: akappiyañca nissāya ṭhitameva hotīti yasmā tato uppannapaccayaparibhogo kappati,
tika-vin01t2:1527_9: tasmā kappiyaṃ nissāya ṭhitaṃ. Yasmā pana dubbicāraṇāya tato uppannapaccayaparibhogopi
tika-vin01t2:1527_10: na kappati, tasmā akappiyaṃ nissāya ṭhitanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1528_0: Na tena kiñci kappiyabhaṇḍaṃ cetāpitanti ettha cetāpitaṃ ce, natthi paribhogupāyo,
tika-vin01t2:1528_1: tasmā evaṃ vuttaṃ. Akappiyañhi nissaggiyaṃ vatthuṃ uggaṇhitvā taṃ anissajjitvāva
tika-vin01t2:1528_2: cetāpitaṃ kappiyabhaṇḍaṃ saṅghassa nissaṭṭhampi sabbesaṃ na kappati. Keci pana “yasmā
tika-vin01t2:1528_3: nissaggiyaṃ vatthuṃ paṭiggahetvā cetāpitaṃ kappiyabhaṇḍaṃ saṅghassa nissajjāmīti
tika-vin01t2:1528_4: nissaṭṭhaṃ vināva upāyaṃ paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati, tasmā ‘na tena kiñci kappiyabhaṇḍaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1528_5: cetāpita’nti vutta”nti vadanti. “Ārāmikānaṃ vā pattabhāganti idaṃ gihīnaṃ hatthagatopi
tika-vin01t2:1528_6: soyeva bhāgoti katvā vuttaṃ. Sace pana tena aññaṃ parivattetvā ārāmikā denti, paribhuñjituṃ
tika-vin01t2:1528_7: vaṭṭatī”ti majjhimagaṇṭhipade cūḷagaṇṭhipade ca vuttaṃ. Tato haritvāti aññesaṃ pattabhāgato
tika-vin01t2:1528_8: haritvā. Kasiṇaparikammanti ālokakasiṇaparikammaṃ. Mañcapīṭhādīni vāti ettha “tato
tika-vin01t2:1528_9: gahitamañcapīṭhādīni parivattetvā aññaṃ ce gahitaṃ, vaṭṭatī”ti vadanti. Chāyāpīti
tika-vin01t2:1528_10: bhojanasālādīnaṃ chāyāpi. Paricchedātikkantāti gehaparicchedaṃ atikkantā, chāyāya
tika-vin01t2:1528_11: gatagataṭṭhānaṃ gehaṃ nāma na hotīti adhippāyo. Maggenapīti ettha “sace añño maggo
tika-vin01t2:1528_12: natthi, maggaṃ adhiṭṭhahitvā gantuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vadanti. Kītāyāti tena vatthunā kītāya.
tika-vin01t2:1528_13: Upanikkhepaṃ ṭhapetvā saṅgho paccaye paribhuñjatīti sace upāsako “atibahu etaṃ hiraññaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:1528_14: idaṃ, bhante, ajjeva na vināsetabba”nti vatvā sayaṃ upanikkhepaṃ ṭhapeti, aññena
tika-vin01t2:1528_15: vā ṭhapāpeti, etaṃ upanikkhepaṃ ṭhapetvā tato udayaṃ paribhuñjanto saṅgho paccaye
tika-vin01t2:1529_1: veditabbaṃ, tasmā patitaṭṭhāne ñātepissa gūthaṃ chaḍḍentassa viya nirapekkhabhāvoyevettha
tika-vin01t2:1529_3: sandhāya vuttaṃ. Theyyaparibhogo nāma anarahassa paribhogo. Bhagavatā hi attano sāsane
tika-vin01t2:1529_4: sīlavato paccayā anuññātā, na dussīlassa. Dāyakānampi sīlavato eva pariccāgo, na
tika-vin01t2:1529_5: dussīlassa attano kārānaṃ mahapphalabhāvassa paccāsīsanato. Iti satthārā ananuññātattā
tika-vin01t2:1529_6: dāyakehi ca apariccattattā dussīlassa paribhogo theyyaparibhogo. Iṇavasena paribhogo
tika-vin01t2:1529_7: iṇaparibhogo, paṭiggāhakato dakkhiṇāvisuddhiyā abhāvato iṇaṃ gahetvā paribhogo viyāti
tika-vin01t2:1529_8: attho. Tasmāti “sīlavato”tiādinā vuttamevatthaṃ kāraṇabhāvena paccāmasati. Cīvaraṃ
tika-vin01t2:1529_9: paribhoge paribhogeti kāyato mocetvā mocetvā paribhoge. Purebhatta…pe… pacchimayāmesu
tika-vin01t2:1529_10: paccavekkhitabbanti sambandho. Tathā asakkontena yathāvuttakālavisesavasena ekasmiṃ
tika-vin01t2:1529_11: divase catukkhattuṃ tikkhattuṃ dvikkhattuṃ sakiṃyeva vā paccavekkhitabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1530_0: Sacassa apaccavekkhatova aruṇo uggacchati, iṇaparibhogaṭṭhāne tiṭṭhatīti ettha “hiyyo
tika-vin01t2:1530_1: yaṃ mayā cīvaraṃ paribhuttaṃ, taṃ yāvadeva sītassa paṭighātāya…pe… hirikopīnappaṭicchādanatthaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:1530_2: hiyyo yo mayā piṇḍapāto paribhutto, so neva davāyātiādinā sace atītaparibhogapaccavekkhaṇaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1530_3: na kareyya, iṇaparibhogaṭṭhāne tiṭṭhatī”ti vadanti, vīmaṃsitabbaṃ. Senāsanampi paribhoge
tika-vin01t2:1530_4: paribhogeti pavese pavese. Evaṃ pana asakkontena purebhattādīsu paccavekkhitabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1530_5: Taṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva sakkā viññātunti idha visuṃ na vuttaṃ. Satipaccayatāti satiyā
tika-vin01t2:1530_6: paccayabhāvo, paṭiggahaṇassa paribhogassa ca paccavekkhaṇasatiyā paccayabhāvo yujjati,
tika-vin01t2:1530_7: paccavekkhitvāva paṭiggahetabbaṃ paribhuñjitabbañcāti attho. Tenevāha “satiṃ katvā”tiādi.
tika-vin01t2:1530_8: Evaṃ santepīti yadipi dvīsupi ṭhānesu paccavekkhaṇā yuttā, evaṃ santepi. Apare panāhu
tika-vin01t2:1530_9: “satipaccayatāti satibhesajjaparibhogassa paccayabhāve paccayeti attho. Evaṃ santepīti
tika-vin01t2:1530_10: paccaye satipī”ti, taṃ tesaṃ matimattaṃ. Tathā hi paccayasannissitasīlaṃ paccavekkhaṇāya
tika-vin01t2:1531_0: Nanu ca “paribhoge karontassa anāpattī”ti iminā pātimokkhasaṃvarasīlaṃ vuttaṃ, tasmā
tika-vin01t2:1531_1: paccayasannissitasīlassa pātimokkhasaṃvarasīlassa ca ko visesoti? Vuccate – purimesu
tika-vin01t2:1531_2: tāva tīsu paccayesu viseso pākaṭoyeva, gilānapaccaye pana yathā vatiṃ katvā rukkhamūle
tika-vin01t2:1531_3: gopite tassa phalānipi rakkhitāniyeva honti, evameva paccavekkhaṇāya paccayasannissitasīle
tika-vin01t2:1531_4: rakkhite tappaṭibaddhaṃ pātimokkhasaṃvarasīlampi nipphannaṃ nāma hoti. Gilānapaccayaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1531_5: apaccavekkhitvā paribhuñjantassa sīlaṃ bhijjamānaṃ pātimokkhasaṃvarasīlameva bhijjati,
tika-vin01t2:1531_6: paccayasannissitasīlaṃ pana pacchābhattapurimayāmādīsu yāva aruṇuggamanā apaccavekkhantasseva
tika-vin01t2:1531_7: bhijjati. Purebhattañhi apaccavekkhitvāpi gilānapaccayaṃ paribhuñjantassa anāpatti,
tika-vin01t2:1532_0: Evaṃ paccayasannissitasīlassa visuddhiṃ dassetvā teneva pasaṅgena sabbāpi suddhiyo
tika-vin01t2:1532_1: dassetuṃ “catubbidhā hi suddhī”tiādimāha. Tattha sujjhati etāyāti suddhi, yathādhammaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1532_2: desanāva suddhi desanāsuddhi. Vuṭṭhānassapi cettha desanāya eva saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin01t2:1532_3: Chinnamūlāpattīnaṃ pana abhikkhutāpaṭiññāva desanā. Adhiṭṭhānavisiṭṭho saṃvarova
tika-vin01t2:1532_4: suddhi saṃvarasuddhi. Dhammena samena paccayānaṃ pariyeṭṭhi eva suddhi pariyeṭṭhisuddhi.
tika-vin01t2:1532_5: Catūsu paccayesu vuttavidhinā paccavekkhaṇāva suddhi paccavekkhaṇasuddhi. Esa tāva
tika-vin01t2:1532_6: suddhīsu samāsanayo. Suddhimantesu sīlesu desanā suddhi etassāti desanāsuddhi. Sesesupi
tika-vin01t2:1532_7: eseva nayo. Na puna evaṃ karissāmīti ettha evanti saṃvarabhedaṃ sandhāyāha. Pahāyāti
tika-vin01t2:1532_8: vajjetvā, akatvāti attho. Dātabbaṭṭhena dāyaṃ, taṃ ādiyantīti dāyādā, ananuññātesu
tika-vin01t2:1532_9: sabbena sabbaṃ paribhogābhāvato anuññātesuyeva ca paribhogasabbhāvabhāvato bhikkhūhi
tika-vin01t2:1533: “Dhammadāyādā me, bhikkhave, bhavatha, mā āmisadāyādā. Atthi me tumhesu anukampā, ‘kinti me sāvakā dhammadāyādā bhaveyyuṃ, no āmisadāyādā”’ti –
tika-vin01t2:1534: Evaṃ pavattaṃ dhammadāyādasuttañca ettha etasmiṃ atthe sādhakaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1535_0: Avītarāgānaṃ taṇhāparavasatāya paccayaparibhoge sāmibhāvo natthi, tadabhāvena vītarāgānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1535_1: tattha sāmibhāvo yathāruci paribhogasabbhāvato. Tathā hi te paṭikūlampi appaṭikūlākārena
tika-vin01t2:1535_2: appaṭikūlampi paṭikūlākārena tadubhayampi vajjetvā ajjhupekkhanākārena paccaye paribhuñjanti,
tika-vin01t2:1535_3: dāyakānañca manorathaṃ paripūrenti. Tenāha – “te hi taṇhāya dāsabyaṃ atītattā sāmino
tika-vin01t2:1535_4: hutvā paribhuñjantī”ti. Yo panāyaṃ sīlavato paccavekkhitaparibhogo, so iṇaparibhogassa
tika-vin01t2:1535_5: paccanīkattā āṇaṇyaparibhogo nāma hoti. Yathā hi iṇāyiko attano ruciyā icchitadesaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1535_6: gantuṃ na labhati, evaṃ iṇaparibhogayutto lokato nissarituṃ na labhatīti tappaṭipakkhattā
tika-vin01t2:1535_7: sīlavato paccavekkhitaparibhogo āṇaṇyaparibhogoti vuccati, tasmā nippariyāyato catuparibhogavinimutto
tika-vin01t2:1535_8: visuṃyevāyaṃ paribhogoti veditabbo. So idha visuṃ na vutto, dāyajjaparibhogeyeva
tika-vin01t2:1535_9: vā saṅgahaṃ gacchatīti. Sīlavāpi hi imāya sikkhāya samannāgatattā sekkhotveva vuccati.
tika-vin01t2:1536_0: Kathaṃ puthujjanānaṃ ime paribhogā sambhavantīti? Upacāravasena. Yo hi puthujjanassapi
tika-vin01t2:1536_1: sallekhappaṭipattiyaṃ ṭhitassa paccayagedhaṃ pahāya tattha anupalittena cittena paribhogo,
tika-vin01t2:1536_2: so sāmiparibhogo viya hoti. Sīlavato pana paccavekkhitaparibhogo dāyajjaparibhogo
tika-vin01t2:1536_3: viya hoti dāyakānaṃ manorathassa avirādhanato. Teneva vuttaṃ “dāyajjaparibhogeyeva
tika-vin01t2:1536_4: vā saṅgahaṃ gacchatī”ti. Kalyāṇaputhujjanassa paribhoge vattabbameva natthi tassa
tika-vin01t2:1537_0: Lajjinā saddhiṃ paribhogo nāma lajjissa santakaṃ gahetvā paribhogo. Alajjinā saddhinti
tika-vin01t2:1537_1: etthāpi eseva nayo. Ādito paṭṭhāya hi alajjī nāma natthīti iminā diṭṭhadiṭṭhesuyeva
tika-vin01t2:1537_2: āsaṅkā na kātabbāti dasseti. Attano bhārabhūtā saddhivihārikādayo. Sopi nivāretabboti
tika-vin01t2:1537_3: yo passati, tena nivāretabbo. Yasmā alajjīparibhogo nāma lajjino vuccati, tasmā āpatti
tika-vin01t2:1537_4: nāma natthi ubhinnampi alajjībhāvato, “alajjīparibhogo”ti idaṃ nāmamattameva na labbhatīti
tika-vin01t2:1537_5: vuttaṃ hoti. “Āpatti pana atthiyevāti vadantī”ti tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1538_0: Adhammiyoti anesanādīhi uppanno. Dhammiyoti bhikkhācariyādīhi uppanno. Saṅghasseva
tika-vin01t2:1538_1: detīti bhattaṃ aggahetvā attanā laddhasalākaṃyeva deti. Sace pana lajjī alajjiṃ paggaṇhāti…pe…
tika-vin01t2:1538_2: antaradhāpetīti ettha kevalaṃ paggaṇhitukāmatāya evaṃ kātuṃ na vaṭṭati, dhammassa
tika-vin01t2:1538_3: pana sāsanassa sotūnañca anuggahatthāya vaṭṭatīti veditabbaṃ. Purimanayena “so āpattiyā
tika-vin01t2:1538_4: kāretabbo”ti vuttattā imassa āpattiyevāti vadanti. Uddesaggahaṇādinā dhammassa paribhogo
tika-vin01t2:1538_5: dhammaparibhogo. Dhammānuggahena gaṇhantassa āpattiyā abhāvepi thero tassa alajjibhāvaṃyeva
tika-vin01t2:1538_6: sandhāya “pāpo kirāya”ntiādimāha. Tassa pana santiketi mahārakkhitattherassa santike.
tika-vin01t2:1539_1: dinnanti ettha assatiyā dinnaṃ nāma apariccattaṃ hoti, tasmā dasante baddhakahāpaṇādi
tika-vin01t2:1539_2: assatiyā dinnaṃ bhikkhunā vatthasaññāya paṭiggahitañca, tato neva rūpiyaṃ dinnaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:1539_3: nāpi paṭiggahitañca hotīti ettha āpattidesanākiccaṃ natthi, taṃ pana dāyakānameva
tika-vin01t2:1539_4: paṭidātabbaṃ. Tena akappiyavatthunā te ce dāyakā sappiādīni kiṇitvāna saṅghassa tassa
tika-vin01t2:1539_5: ca bhikkhuno denti, sabbesaṃ kappati dāyakānaṃyeva santakattā. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana
tika-vin01t2:1539_6: puññakāmehi pariccajitvā dinnameva sandhāya “puññakāmā…pe… rūpiye arūpiyasaññī rūpiyaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1539_7: paṭiggaṇhātīti veditabbo”ti vuttaṃ, tasmā pariccajitvā dinnaṃ vatthasaññāya gaṇhatopi
tika-vin01t2:1539_8: nissaggiyameva. Tena yadi te dāyakā no āgantvā gaṇhanti, dāyake pucchitvā attano
tika-vin01t2:1539_9: atthāya ce pariccattaṃ, saṅghe nissajjitvā āpatti desetabbā. Tava coḷakaṃ passāhīhi
tika-vin01t2:1539_10: iminā gihisantakepi “idaṃ gaṇhathā”tiādiakappiyavohārena vidhānaṃ bhikkhuno na kappatīti
tika-vin01t2:1539_12: attuddesikatā, kahāpaṇādīsu aññatarabhāvoti imānettha tīṇi aṅgāni.
tika-vin01t2:1542_2: parivattane, asādiyitvā vā kappiyena gāhena paṭiggahitarūpiyaparivattane.
tika-vin01t2:1543_0: 589. Ga-kārassa ka-kāraṃ katvā “sīsūpaka”nti likhitaṃ, padabhājane ghanakatanti piṇḍaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1543_1: kataṃ. Satthuvaṇṇotiādīsu “satthuvaṇṇo ca kahāpaṇo ca…pe… ye ca vohāraṃ gacchantī”ti
tika-vin01t2:1543_2: evaṃ sabbattha samuccayo veditabbo. Rūpiye rūpiyasaññīti sakasantakaṃ vadati. Rūpiyaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1543_3: cetāpetīti parasantakaṃ vadati. “Nissaggiyavatthunā dukkaṭavatthuṃ vā kappiyavatthuṃ
tika-vin01t2:1543_4: vā cetāpentassapi eseva nayo”ti idaṃ kasmā vuttaṃ. Na hi “rūpiye rūpiyasaññī arūpiyaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1543_5: cetāpeti, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiya”ntiādittiko pāḷiyaṃ vuttoti āha “yo hī”tiādi. Tassānulomattāti
tika-vin01t2:1543_6: etthāyamadhippāyo – rūpiyasaṃvohāro nāma na kevalaṃ rūpiyena rūpiyaparivattanameva,
tika-vin01t2:1543_7: atha kho “arūpiye rūpiyasaññī rūpiyaṃ cetāpetī”ti vuttattā arūpiyena rūpiyacetāpanampi
tika-vin01t2:1543_8: rūpiyasaṃvohāro nāma hotīti etasmiṃ pakkhepi rūpiye sati rūpiyasaṃvohāroyeva hotīti
tika-vin01t2:1543_9: ayamattho avuttopi viññāyatīti. Arūpiyaṃ nāma dukkaṭavatthukappiyavatthūni. Ekantena
tika-vin01t2:1543_10: rūpiyapakkheti ekena antena rūpiyapakkheti ayaṃ attho gahetabbo. “Ekato rūpiyapakkhe”ti
tika-vin01t2:1543_11: vā pāṭho veditabbo. “Ekarūpiyapakkhe”tipi paṭhanti, tatthāpi ekato rūpiyapakkheti
tika-vin01t2:1544_0: Kappiyavatthunā kappiyavatthuno kayavikkayepi tāva nissaggiyaṃ hoti, dukkaṭavatthunā
tika-vin01t2:1544_1: dukkaṭavatthuno kayavikkaye kasmā na hotīti andhakaṭṭhakathāya adhippāyo. Idaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ…pe…
tika-vin01t2:1544_2: arūpiyena ca rūpiyacetāpanaṃ sandhāya vuttanti sambandho. Idhāti imasmiṃ rūpiyasaṃvohārasikkhāpade.
tika-vin01t2:1545_0: Puna kappiyabhāvaṃ netuṃ asakkuṇeyyattā “mahāakappiyo nāmā”ti vuttaṃ. “Na sakkā kenaci
tika-vin01t2:1545_1: upāyena kappiyo kātunti idaṃ pañcannaṃyeva sahadhammikānaṃ antare parivattanaṃ sandhāya
tika-vin01t2:1545_2: vuttaṃ, gihīhi pana gahetvā attano santakaṃ katvā dinnaṃ sabbesaṃ kappatī”ti vadanti.
tika-vin01t2:1545_3: “Na sakkā kenaci upāyena kappiyo kātu”nti pana imināva paṭiggahitarūpiyaṃ anissajjitvāva
tika-vin01t2:1545_4: tena cetāpitaṃ kappiyabhaṇḍampi saṅghassa nissaṭṭhaṃ paribhuñjituṃ na vaṭṭatīti siddhaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1546_0: Ye pana “paṭiggahitarūpiyaṃ anissajjitvāpi tena parivattitaṃ kappiyabhaṇḍaṃ saṅghassa
tika-vin01t2:1546_1: nissaṭṭhaṃ paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vadanti, tesaṃ “na sakkā kenaci upāyena kappiyo
tika-vin01t2:1546_2: kātu”nti idaṃ na yujjati. Te panettha evaṃ vadanti “yasmā nissajjitabbavatthuṃ anissajjitvāva
tika-vin01t2:1546_3: uparūpari aññaṃ aññaṃyeva kataṃ, tasmā paricchedābhāvato idha nissajjituṃ avatvā
tika-vin01t2:1546_4: ‘na sakkā kenaci upāyena kappiyo kātu’nti vuttaṃ, paricchedābhāvatoyeva ‘mūle mūlasāmikānaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:1546_5: patte ca pattasāmikānaṃ dinne kappiyo hotī’ti ca na vutta”nti. Yadi paṭiggahitarūpiyaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1546_6: anissajjitvā cetāpitaṃ kappiyabhaṇḍampi saṅghassa nissaṭṭhaṃ paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin01t2:1546_7: evaṃ sante idhāpi avasānavatthuṃ gahetvā saṅghassa nissaṭṭhaṃ kasmā na vaṭṭati, “yo
tika-vin01t2:1546_8: pana rūpiyaṃ uggaṇhitvā…pe… patte ca pattasāmikānaṃ dinne kappiyo hotī”ti imināpi
tika-vin01t2:1546_9: paṭiggahitarūpiyaṃ anissajjitvā cetāpitaṃ kappiyabhaṇḍampi saṅghassa nissaṭṭhaṃ paribhuñjituṃ
tika-vin01t2:1546_10: na vaṭṭatīti siddhaṃ. Yadi taṃ nissaṭṭhaṃ paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭeyya, “mūle mūlasāmikānaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:1546_11: patte ca pattasāmikānaṃ dinne kappiyo hotī”ti na vadeyya. Apare panettha evaṃ vadanti
tika-vin01t2:1546_12: “yadi saṅghassa nissaṭṭhaṃ hoti, rūpiyapaṭiggāhakassa na vaṭṭati, tasmā tassapi yathā
tika-vin01t2:1547_0: Dutiyapattasadisoyevāti iminā pañcannampi sahadhammikānaṃ na kappatīti dasseti. Tattha
tika-vin01t2:1547_1: kāraṇamāha “mūlassa sampaṭicchitattā”ti. Atha mūlassa sampaṭicchitattā rūpiyapaṭiggāhakassa
tika-vin01t2:1547_2: tāva akappiyo hotu, sesānaṃ pana kasmā na kappatīti maññamāno pucchati “kasmā sesānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1547_3: na kappatī”ti. Kāraṇamāha “mūlassa anissaṭṭhattā”ti. Pattassa kappiyabhāvepi sampaṭicchitamūlassa
tika-vin01t2:1547_4: nissajjitabbassa anissaṭṭhattā tena gahitapatto sesānampi na kappati. Yadi hi tena
tika-vin01t2:1547_5: sampaṭicchitamūlaṃ saṅghamajjhe nissaṭṭhaṃ siyā, tena kappiyena kammena ārāmikādīhi
tika-vin01t2:1547_6: gahetvā dinnapatto rūpiyapaṭiggāhakaṃ ṭhapetvā sesānaṃ vaṭṭati. Apare pana “mūlaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1547_7: sampaṭicchitvā gahitapattopi yadi saṅghassa nissaṭṭho, sesānaṃ kappatī”ti vadanti.
tika-vin01t2:1547_8: Evaṃ sante “mūlassa anissaṭṭhattā”ti na vattabbaṃ, “saṅghassa anissaṭṭhattā”ti evameva vattabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1548_0: Dubbicāritattāti iminā rūpiyasaṃvohāro anena katoti dasseti. Aññesaṃ pana vaṭṭatīti
tika-vin01t2:1548_1: yasmānena rūpiyasaṃvohāramattameva kataṃ, na mūlaṃ sampaṭicchitaṃ, tasmā vinayakammavasena
tika-vin01t2:1548_2: saṅghassa nissaṭṭhakālato paṭṭhāya aññesaṃ vaṭṭati. Imasmiṃyeva ca atthe pamāṇaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1548_3: dassento “mahāsumattherassa kirā”tiādimāha. Apare pana “dubbicāritattāti iminā kevalaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1548_4: gihisantakabhāvena ṭhite dubbicāritamattaṃ vuttaṃ, na rūpiyasaṃvohārāpajjanaṃ, tasmā
tika-vin01t2:1548_5: rūpiyasaṃvohārābhāvato so patto nissajjituṃ na sakkāti tassa na kappati, anissaṭṭhopi
tika-vin01t2:1548_6: aññesaṃ kappati. Anissaṭṭhasseva ca aññesaṃ kappiyabhāvadassanatthaṃ ‘mahāsumattherassa
tika-vin01t2:1548_7: kirā’tiādivatthūni udāhaṭāni. Saṅghassa nissajjīti idañca aññesaṃ kappiyattā kevalaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1548_8: saṅghassa pariccattabhāvaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, na pana vinayakammavasena saṅghassa nissaṭṭhabhāvaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1548_9: Imassa ca atthassa sappissa pūretvāti idaṃ vacanaṃ sādhaka”nti vadanti.
tika-vin01t2:1549_0: 591. Rūpiyapaṭiggahaṇarūpiyasaṃvohāresu yena ekekameva kataṃ, tena tattha tattha
tika-vin01t2:1549_1: vuttanayeneva nissajjitabbaṃ. Yena pana paṭiggahitarūpiyeneva saṃvohāro kato, tena
tika-vin01t2:1549_2: kathaṃ nissajjitabbanti? Nayidaṃ dukkaraṃ, “ahaṃ, bhante, nānappakārakaṃ rūpiyasaṃvohāraṃ
tika-vin01t2:1549_4: āpatti dukkaṭassā’tiādittikassa avasānapade anāpattiyā vuttattā kappiyavatthuvaseneva
tika-vin01t2:1549_5: idaṃ tikaṃ vutta”nti tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ. Keci pana “arūpiyaggahaṇena kappiyavatthudukkaṭavatthūnaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1549_6: saṅgahoti purimapadadvayaṃ kappiyavatthudukkaṭavatthūnaṃ vasena vuttaṃ, avasānapadameva
tika-vin01t2:1549_7: kappiyavatthuvasena vutta”nti vadanti, taṃ na yujjati anāpattimissite avasānattike
tika-vin01t2:1549_8: saññānānattaṃ ṭhapetvā vatthunānattassa abhāvato. Dukkaṭavatthunā pana dukkaṭavatthuno
tika-vin01t2:1549_9: cetāpanaṃ neva idha, na tattha pāḷiyaṃ vuttanti vacanamettha sādhakaṃ. Yaṃ attano
tika-vin01t2:1549_10: dhanena parivattati, tassa vā dhanassa vā rūpiyabhāvo ceva, parivattanañcāti imānettha dve aṅgāni.
tika-vin01t2:1552: 593. Kayavikkayasikkhāpade pāḷiyaṃ jānāhīti ettha upadhārehīti attho, suṭṭhu upadhāretvā gaṇha, idaṃ na manāpanti puna dātuṃ na sakkhissasīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin01t2:1553_0: 594-595. Kayanti parabhaṇḍassa gahaṇaṃ. Vikkayanti attano bhaṇḍassa dānaṃ. Tenāha
tika-vin01t2:1553_1: “iminā imaṃ dehī”tiādi. Yasmā kayitaṃ nāma parassa hatthato gahitaṃ vuccati, vikkītañca
tika-vin01t2:1553_2: parassa hatthe dinnaṃ, tasmā “kayitañca hoti parabhaṇḍaṃ attano hatthagataṃ karontena,
tika-vin01t2:1553_3: vikkītañca attano bhaṇḍaṃ parahatthagataṃ karontenā”ti vuttaṃ. Yadi evaṃ pāḷiyaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1553_4: parato “kayitañca hoti vikkayitañcā”ti vatvā “attano bhaṇḍaṃ parahatthagataṃ parabhaṇḍaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1553_5: attano hatthagata”nti kasmā vuttanti āha “iminā imantiādivacanānurūpato panā”tiādi.
tika-vin01t2:1553_6: Imināti hi sakasantakaṃ vuttaṃ. Tadanurūpato pāḷiyaṃ paṭhamaṃ attano bhaṇḍaṃ dassitaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:1553_7: na kayavikkayapadānurūpato. Tañhi viparītato parasantakaggahaṇaṃ purakkhatvā ṭhitaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1554_0: Kāmaṃ sesañātakepi “imaṃ dehī”ti vadato viññatti na hoti, saddhādeyyavinipātanassapi
tika-vin01t2:1554_1: pana abhāvaṃ dassetukāmo “mātaraṃ pana pitaraṃ vā”ti āha. Viññatti na hotīti idaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1554_2: visuṃ viññāpanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Aññaṃ kiñci avatvā evaṃ vadanto aññātakaṃ viññāpeti
tika-vin01t2:1554_3: nāmāti āha – “aññātakaṃ ‘imaṃ dehī’ti vadato viññattī”ti. Aññaṃ kiñci avatvā “imaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1554_4: gaṇhāhī”ti dinnaṃ aññātakassa dinnaṃ nāma hotīti vuttaṃ “saddhādeyyavinipātana”nti.
tika-vin01t2:1555_0: Imaṃ nāma karohīti vadati, vaṭṭatīti ettha bhuttosi, idāni kasmā na karosīti vatthumpi
tika-vin01t2:1555_1: vaṭṭati. “Nissaggiyaṃ pācittiya”nti kiñcāpi satiyeva nissaggiyavatthumhi pācittiyaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1555_2: vuttaṃ, asatipi pana tasmiṃ pācittiyanti idaṃ aṭṭhakathāpamāṇena gahetabbanti dassetuṃ
tika-vin01t2:1555_3: “kiñcāpī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Paribhutteti sappiādiṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Yaṃ attano dhanena
tika-vin01t2:1555_4: parivatteti, yena ca parivatteti, tesaṃ kappiyavatthutā, asahadhammikatā, kayavikkayāpajjanañcāti
tika-vin01t2:1560_0: 598-602. Pattavaggassa paṭhame bhaṇḍanti vikketabbabhaṇḍaṃ. Yasmā vaṇṇasaddo saṇṭhānajātirūpāyatanakāraṇapamāṇaguṇapasaṃsādīsu
tika-vin01t2:1560_1: dissati. “Mahantaṃ sapparājavaṇṇaṃ abhinimminitvā”tiādīsu hi saṇṭhānaṃ vuccati. “Brāhmaṇova
tika-vin01t2:1560_2: seṭṭho vaṇṇo, hīno añño vaṇṇo”tiādīsu jāti. “Paramāya vaṇṇapokkharatāya samannāgato”tiādīsu rūpāyatanaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1561: “Na harāmi na bhañjāmi, ārā siṅghāmi vārijaṃ;
tika-vin01t2:1562: Atha kena nu vaṇṇena, gandhatthenoti vuccatī”ti. –
tika-vin01t2:1563_0: Ādīsu kāraṇaṃ. “Tayo pattassa vaṇṇā”tiādīsu pamāṇaṃ. “Kadā saññuḷhā pana te gahapati
tika-vin01t2:1563_1: ime samaṇassa gotamassa vaṇṇā”tiādīsu guṇo. “Vaṇṇārahassa vaṇṇaṃ bhāsatī”tiādīsu
tika-vin01t2:1563_2: pasaṃsā. Tasmā vuttaṃ “tayo pattassa vaṇṇāti tīṇi pattassa pamāṇānī”ti.
tika-vin01t2:1564_0: Aḍḍhaterasapalā hotīti ettha “māsānaṃ aḍḍhaterasapalāni gaṇhātī”ti vadanti. “Magadhanāḷi
tika-vin01t2:1564_1: nāma chapasatā nāḷī”ti keci. “Aṭṭhapasatā”ti apare. Tattha purimānaṃ matena tipasatāya
tika-vin01t2:1564_2: nāḷiyā dve nāḷiyo ekā magadhanāḷi hoti, pacchimānaṃ catupasatāya nāḷiyā dve nāḷiyo
tika-vin01t2:1564_3: ekā magadhanāḷi. Ācariyadhammapālattherena pana “pakatiyā catumuṭṭhikaṃ kuḍuvaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:1564_4: catukuḍuvaṃ nāḷikaṃ, tāya nāḷiyā soḷasa nāḷiyo doṇaṃ, taṃ pana magadhanāḷiyā dvādasa
tika-vin01t2:1564_5: nāḷiyo hontī”ti vuttaṃ, tasmā tena nayena “magadhanāḷi nāma pañca kuḍuvāni ekañca
tika-vin01t2:1564_6: muṭṭhiṃ ekāya muṭṭhiyā tatiyañca bhāgaṃ gaṇhātī”ti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1565_0: Sabbasambhārasaṅkhatoti jīrakādisabbasambhārehi saṅkhato. Ālopassa ālopassa anurūpanti
tika-vin01t2:1565_1: ettha “byañjanassa mattā nāma odanacatuttho bhāgo”ti brahmāyusuttassa aṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1565_2: vuttattā ālopassa catutthabhāgappamāṇaṃ byañjanaṃ ālopassa anurūpanti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1565_3: Idha pana sūpasseva odanacatutthabhāgappamāṇataṃ dassetvā etassa lakkhaṇe dassite
tika-vin01t2:1565_4: itarassapi dassitameva hotīti byañjanassa tathā visesetvā pamāṇaṃ na dassitaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1566_0: Magadhanāḷiyā upaḍḍhappamāṇo idha patthoti āha “patthodananti magadhanāḷiyā upaḍḍhanāḷikodana”nti.
tika-vin01t2:1566_1: Iminā ca “patthadvayaṃ magadhanāḷī”ti dassitaṃ hoti. Pattho ca “catupalo kuḍuvo,
tika-vin01t2:1566_2: catukuḍuvo pattho”ti iminā lokiyavohārena veditabbo. Bhājanaparibhogenāti udakāharaṇādinā bhājanaparibhogena.
tika-vin01t2:1567: 607. Dhoteti paribhogāvasānadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ, na pana dhoteyeva dukkaṭaṃ āpajjati tato puretaraṃ paribhogakāleyeva āpajjanato.
tika-vin01t2:1568_0: 608. Pañcahi dvīhīti idaṃ “ettāvatā kāḷavaṇṇatā sampajjatī”ti dassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1568_1: “Yadi pana ekenapi pākena kāḷavaṇṇo hoti, adhiṭṭhānupagoyevā”ti vadanti. Hatthānāgatassapi
tika-vin01t2:1568_2: adhiṭṭhātabbabhāvadassanatthaṃ “yadihī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Iminā ca dūre ṭhitampi adhiṭṭhātuṃ
tika-vin01t2:1568_3: vikappetuñca labhati, ṭhapitaṭṭhānasallakkhaṇañca na pamāṇanti veditabbaṃ. Sutvā
tika-vin01t2:1568_4: vāti pattakārakena pesitabhikkhunā anāṇatto kevalaṃ tassa kathentassa vacanamattaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1568_5: sutvā. Na pamāṇanti tena apesitattā. Sāmantavihāreti idaṃ upacāramattaṃ, tato dūre
tika-vin01t2:1568_6: ṭhitampi adhiṭṭhātuṃ vaṭṭatiyeva. Ṭhapitaṭṭhānaṃ sallakkhetvāti idampi upacāramattaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:1568_7: pattasallakkhaṇamevettha pamāṇaṃ. Patte vā chiddaṃ hotīti mukhavaṭṭito heṭṭhā dvaṅgulamattokāsato
tika-vin01t2:1568_8: paṭṭhāya yattha katthaci chiddaṃ hoti. Sesamettha paṭhamakathine vuttanayameva.
tika-vin01t2:1571: 610. Dutiyasikkhāpade hatthesu piṇḍāya caratīti pāḷipadassa hatthesu labhitabbapiṇḍatthāya caratīti attho veditabbo.
tika-vin01t2:1572_0: 612-613. “Tassa so apattoti vacanato so patto adhiṭṭhānampi vijahati apattattā. Apattabhāvatoyeva
tika-vin01t2:1572_1: hi ‘pañcabandhanaṃ pattaṃ cetāpetī’ti pāḷiyaṃ na vutta”nti tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1572_2: Keci pana “apattoti idaṃ ‘aññaṃ pattaṃ viññāpetuṃ vaṭṭatī’ti dassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:1572_3: so pana patto adhiṭṭhānaṃ na vijahatī”ti vadanti, taṃ yuttaṃ viya dissati “yassa
tika-vin01t2:1572_4: pañca ekāyeva vā dasaṅgulā, so baddhopi abaddhopi apattoyevā”ti vakkhamānattā. Na
tika-vin01t2:1572_5: hi mukhavaṭṭiyā pañcasu ṭhānesu dvaṅgulamattāhi rājīhi adhiṭṭhānaṃ vijahatīti sakkā
tika-vin01t2:1572_6: vattuṃ, ekāya pana rājiyā dasaṅgulāya sace tattha vuttappamāṇo chiddo paññāyati,
tika-vin01t2:1572_7: chiddeneva adhiṭṭhānavijahanaṃ siyāti yuttaṃ vattuṃ. Bandhanokāse sati asati vā bandhanavirahito
tika-vin01t2:1572_8: patto abandhanoti vutto, bandhanokāsavirahitoyeva pana abandhanokāsoti vutto.
tika-vin01t2:1573_0: Tipusuttakena vā bandhitvāti ettha “bandhitabbo”ti pāṭho gahetabbo. Purāṇapotthakepi
tika-vin01t2:1573_1: hi ayameva pāṭho dissati. Suddhehi…pe… na vaṭṭatīti idaṃ uṇhabhojane pakkhitte vilīyamānattā
tika-vin01t2:1573_2: vuttaṃ. Phāṇitaṃ jhāpetvā pāsāṇacuṇṇena bandhituṃ vaṭṭatīti pāsāṇacuṇṇena saddhiṃ
tika-vin01t2:1573_3: phāṇitaṃ pacitvā tathāpakkena pāsāṇacuṇṇena bandhituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin01t2:1574_0: 615. Anukampāya na gaṇhantassa dukkaṭanti vuttattā yassa so patto na ruccati, tassapi
tika-vin01t2:1574_1: agaṇhantassa anāpatti. Teneva mātikāṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ “sace therassa patto na ruccati,
tika-vin01t2:1574_2: appicchatāya vā na gaṇhāti, vaṭṭatī”ti. Pattapariyantoti pariyantapatto, avasānapattoti
tika-vin01t2:1574_3: attho. “Saṅghamajjhe pattaṃ gāhāpentena alajjiṃ agāhāpetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vadanti. “Anujānāmi
tika-vin01t2:1574_4: bhikkhave ādhārakanti vuttattā pīṭhādīsu yattha katthaci ādhāraṃ ṭhapetvā tattha
tika-vin01t2:1574_5: pattaṃ ṭhapetuṃ vaṭṭati ādhāraṭhapanokāsassa aniyamitattā”ti vadanti. Aparibhogenāti ayuttaparibhogena.
tika-vin01t2:1575_0: 616. Pāḷiyaṃ “abandhanena pattena abandhanaṃ pattaṃ. Ekabandhanaṃ pattaṃ… dvibandhanaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1575_1: pattaṃ… tibandhanaṃ… catubandhanaṃ… abandhanokāsaṃ… eka… dvi… ti… catubandhanokāsaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1575_2: pattaṃ cetāpetī”ti evaṃ ekekena pattena dasadhā dasavidhaṃ pattaṃ cetāpanavasena
tika-vin01t2:1575_3: ekanissaggiyapācittiyasataṃ vuttaṃ. Imasmiṃ sikkhāpade pamāṇayuttaṃ aggahitakāḷavaṇṇampi
tika-vin01t2:1575_4: pattaṃ viññāpentassa āpattiyevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Adhiṭṭhānupagapattassa ūnapañcabandhanatā,
tika-vin01t2:1575_5: attuddesikatā, akataviññatti, tāya ca paṭilābhoti imānettha cattāri aṅgāni.
tika-vin01t2:1578_0: 622. Tatiyasikkhāpade yesaṃ maṃsaṃ kappatīti idaṃ nissaggiyavatthudassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:1578_1: na pana yesaṃ maṃsaṃ na kappati, tesaṃ sappiādīni na kappantīti dassanatthaṃ. Manussakhīrādīnipi
tika-vin01t2:1578_2: hi no na kappanti, kuto sasassa sappīti āha “yesañhi khīraṃ atthi, sappipi tesaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1578_3: atthiyevā”ti. “Idañca yebhuyyena vutta”nti vadanti. Uggahitakaṃ katvā nikkhittanti
tika-vin01t2:1578_4: appaṭiggahitaṃ sayameva gahetvā nikkhittaṃ. Sayaṃkataṃ nirāmisameva vaṭṭatīti tadahupurebhattameva
tika-vin01t2:1578_5: sandhāya vuttaṃ. Atha sayaṃkataṃ nirāmisaṃ bhuñjantassa kasmā sāmaṃpāko na hotīti
tika-vin01t2:1578_6: āha – “navanītaṃ tāpentassa hi sāmaṃpāko na hotī”ti. Savatthukapaṭiggahitassa vatthugatikattā
tika-vin01t2:1578_8: paṭiggahitakhīradadhīhi. Purebhattampi ca uggahitakehi kataṃ abbhañjanādīsu upanetabbanti
tika-vin01t2:1578_9: sambandho. Ubhayesampīti pacchābhattaṃ paṭiggahitakhīradadhīhi ca purebhattaṃ uggahitakehi
tika-vin01t2:1578_10: ca katānaṃ. Eseva nayoti nissaggiyaṃ hotīti attho. Akappiyamaṃsasappimhīti akappiyamaṃsasattānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1578_11: sappimhi. Kāraṇapatirūpakaṃ vatvāti sajātiyānaṃ sappibhāvatoti kāraṇapatirūpakaṃ vatvā.
tika-vin01t2:1579_0: Sappinayeneva veditabbanti nirāmisameva sattāhaṃ vaṭṭatīti attho. Etthāti navanīte.
tika-vin01t2:1579_1: Dhotaṃ vaṭṭatīti adhotaṃ ce, savatthukapaṭiggahitaṃ hoti, tasmā dhotaṃ paṭiggahetvā
tika-vin01t2:1579_2: sattāhaṃ nikkhipituṃ vaṭṭatīti therānaṃ adhippāyo. Takkato uddhaṭamattameva khādiṃsūti
tika-vin01t2:1579_3: ettha takkato uddhaṭamattaṃ adhotampi paṭiggahetvā paribhuñjantā dhovitvā pacitvā
tika-vin01t2:1579_4: vā paribhuñjiṃsūti evamattho gahetabbo. Therassa hi dadhiguḷikādisahitampi paṭiggahitaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1579_5: pacchā dhovitvā pacitvā vā paribhuñjantassa savatthukapaṭiggahaṇe doso natthīti adhippāyo,
tika-vin01t2:1579_6: teneva therassa adhippāyaṃ dassentena “tasmā navanītaṃ paribhuñjantena…pe… ayamettha
tika-vin01t2:1579_7: adhippāyo”ti vuttaṃ. Keci pana “takkato uddhaṭamattameva khādiṃsū”ti vacanassa adhippāyaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1579_8: ajānantā “takkato uddhaṭamattaṃ adhotampi dadhiguḷikādisahitaṃ vikālepi paribhuñjituṃ
tika-vin01t2:1579_9: vaṭṭatī”ti vadanti, taṃ na gahetabbaṃ. Na hi dadhiguḷikādiāmisena saṃsaṭṭharasaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1579_10: navanītaṃ paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭatīti sakkā vattuṃ. Navanītaṃ paribhuñjantenāti adhovitvā
tika-vin01t2:1579_11: paṭiggahitanavanītaṃ paribhuñjantena. Dadhi eva dadhigataṃ yathā “gūthagataṃ muttagata”nti.
tika-vin01t2:1579_12: Khayaṃ gamissatīti vacanato khīraṃ pakkhipitvā pakkasappiādipi vikāle kappatīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1579_13: Kukkuccāyanti kukkuccakāti iminā attanāpi tattha kukkuccasabbhāvaṃ dīpeti. Teneva
tika-vin01t2:1579_14: mātikāṭṭhakathāyaṃ “nibbaṭṭitasappi vā navanītaṃ vā pacituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vuttaṃ. Tāni
tika-vin01t2:1580_1: yathā taṇḍulādīni na paccanti, tathā lajjīyeva sampādetvā detīti lajjīsāmaṇeraggahaṇaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:1580_2: apica alajjinā ajjhoharitabbaṃ yaṃ kiñci abhisaṅkharāpetuṃ na vaṭṭati, tasmāpi evamāha.
tika-vin01t2:1580_3: Tile paṭiggahetvā katatelanti attanā bhajjanādīni akatvā gahitatelaṃ. Teneva “sāmisampi
tika-vin01t2:1580_4: vaṭṭatī”ti vuttaṃ. Nibbaṭṭitattāti yāvakālikavatthuto vivecitattā. Ubhayampīti attanā
tika-vin01t2:1580_5: ca parena ca kataṃ. Yāva aruṇassa uggamanā tiṭṭhati, nissaggiyanti sattamadivase
tika-vin01t2:1580_6: katatelaṃ sace yāva aruṇuggamanā tiṭṭhati, nissaggiyaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1581_0: 623. Acchavasanti dukkaṭavatthuno vasāya anuññātattā taṃsadisānaṃ dukkaṭavatthūnaṃyeva
tika-vin01t2:1581_1: akappiyamaṃsasattānaṃ vasā anuññātā, na thullaccayavatthūnaṃ manussānaṃ vasāti āha
tika-vin01t2:1581_2: “ṭhapetvā manussavasa”nti. Saṃsaṭṭhanti parissāvitaṃ. “Kāle paṭiggahitaṃ vikāle anupasampannenapi
tika-vin01t2:1581_3: nippakkaṃ saṃsaṭṭhañca paribhuñjantassa dvepi dukkaṭāni hontiyevā”ti vadanti. Yasmā
tika-vin01t2:1581_4: khīradadhiādīni pakkhipitvā telaṃ pacanti, tasmā kasaṭaṃ na vaṭṭati, telameva vaṭṭati.
tika-vin01t2:1581_5: Tena vuttaṃ “pakkatelakasaṭe viya kukkuccāyatī”ti. “Sace vasāya saddhiṃ pakkattā
tika-vin01t2:1581_6: na vaṭṭati, idaṃ kasmā vaṭṭatī”ti pucchantā “bhante”tiādimāhaṃsu. Etaṃ vaṭṭatīti
tika-vin01t2:1581_7: nanu etaṃ dadhiguḷikādīhi pakkaṃ navanītaṃ vaṭṭatīti attho.
tika-vin01t2:1582_1: sāmaññaniddeso”ti tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ. Keci pana “daṇḍakesu madhukarā madhukarī
tika-vin01t2:1582_2: makkhikā nāmā”ti vatvā “tāhi madhukarīādīhi tīhi makkhikāhi kataṃ madhu nāmā”ti vadanti.
tika-vin01t2:1582_3: Bhamaramakkhikāhīti mahābhamaramakkhikāhi. Silesasadisanti ghanapakkaṃ vuttaṃ. Itaranti
tika-vin01t2:1582_4: tanukamadhu. Madhupaṭalanti madhurahitaṃ kevalaṃ madhupaṭalaṃ. “Sace madhusahitaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1582_5: paṭalaṃ paṭiggahetvā nikkhipanti, paṭalassa bhājanaṭṭhāniyattā madhuno vasena sattāhātikkame
tika-vin01t2:1582_6: nissaggiyaṃ hotī”ti vadanti, “madhumakkhitaṃ pana madhugatikamevā”ti iminā taṃ na sameti.
tika-vin01t2:1583_0: “Phāṇitaṃ nāma ucchumhā nibbatta”nti pāḷiyaṃ avisesena vuttattā aṭṭhakathāyañca “ucchurasaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1583_1: upādāya…pe… avatthukā ucchuvikati ‘phāṇita’nti veditabbā”ti vacanato ucchurasopi
tika-vin01t2:1583_2: nikkasaṭo sattāhakālikoti veditabbo. Kenaci pana “madhumhi cattāro kālikā yathāsambhavaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1583_3: yojetabbā, ucchumhi cā”ti vatvā “samakkhikaṇḍaseḷakaṃ yāvakālikaṃ, aneḷakaṃ udakasambhinnaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1583_4: yāmakālikaṃ, asambhinnaṃ sattāhakālikaṃ, madhusitthaṃ parisuddhaṃ yāvajīvikaṃ, tathā
tika-vin01t2:1583_5: ucchu vā raso vā sakasaṭo yāvakāliko, nikkasaṭo udakasambhinno yāmakāliko, asambhinno
tika-vin01t2:1583_6: sattāhakāliko, suddhakasaṭaṃ yāvajīvika”nti ca vatvā uttaripi bahudhā papañcitaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1583_7: Tattha “udakasambhinnaṃ madhu vā ucchuraso vā udakasambhinno yāmakāliko”ti idaṃ neva
tika-vin01t2:1583_8: pāḷiyaṃ, na aṭṭhakathāyaṃ dissati. “Yāvakālikaṃ samānaṃ garutarampi muddikājātirasaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1583_9: attanā saṃsaṭṭhaṃ lahukaṃ yāmakālikabhāvaṃ upanentaṃ udakaṃ lahutaraṃ sattāhakālikaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1583_10: attanā saṃsaṭṭhaṃ garutaraṃ yāmakālikabhāvaṃ upanetī”ti ettha kāraṇaṃ soyeva pucchitabbo,
tika-vin01t2:1583_11: sabbattha pāḷiyaṃ aṭṭhakathāyañca udakasambhedena garutarassapi lahubhāvopagamanaṃyeva
tika-vin01t2:1583_12: dassitaṃ. Pāḷiyampi hi “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, gilānassa guḷaṃ, agilānassa guḷodaka”nti
tika-vin01t2:1583_13: vadantena agilānena paribhuñjituṃ ayuttopi guḷo udakasambhinno agilānassapi vaṭṭatīti anuññāto.
tika-vin01t2:1584_0: Yampi ca “ucchu ce yāvakāliko, ucchuraso ce yāmakāliko, phāṇitaṃ ce sattāhakālikaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:1584_1: taco ce yāvajīviko”ti aṭṭhakathāvacanaṃ dassetvā “ucchuraso udakasambhinno yāmakāliko”ti
tika-vin01t2:1584_2: aññena kenaci vuttaṃ, tampi tathāvidhassa aṭṭhakathāvacanassa imissā samantapāsādikāya
tika-vin01t2:1584_3: vinayaṭṭhakathāya abhāvato na sārato paccetabbaṃ. Tatoyeva ca “ucchuraso udakena
tika-vin01t2:1584_4: sambhinnopi asambhinnopi sattāhakālikoyevā”ti keci ācariyā vadanti. Bhesajjakkhandhake
tika-vin01t2:1584_5: ca “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, ucchurasa”nti ettha tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu avisesena vuttaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1585_0: Sayaṃkataṃ nirāmisameva vaṭṭatīti ettha aparissāvitaṃ paṭiggahitampi karaṇasamaye
tika-vin01t2:1585_1: parissāvetvā kasaṭaṃ apanetvāva attanā katanti gahetabbaṃ. Jhāmaucchuphāṇitanti agginā
tika-vin01t2:1585_2: daḍḍhe ucchukhette jhāmaucchunā kataphāṇitaṃ. Koṭṭitaucchuphāṇitanti khuddānukhuddakaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1585_3: chinditvā koṭṭetvā nippīḷetvā pakkaṃ yebhuyyena ca sakasaṭaṃ phāṇitaṃ. Tādisassa
tika-vin01t2:1585_4: ca kasaṭassa abbohārikattā “taṃ yutta”nti vuttaṃ. Sītudakena katanti madhukapupphāni
tika-vin01t2:1585_5: sītodake pakkhipitvā madditvā puppharase udakagate sati taṃ udakaṃ gahetvā pacitvā
tika-vin01t2:1585_6: kataphāṇitaṃ. Khīraṃ pakkhipitvā kataṃ madhukaphāṇitaṃ yāvakālikanti ettha khīraṃ
tika-vin01t2:1585_7: pakkhipitvā pakkatelaṃ kasmā vikāle vaṭṭatīti ce? Tele pakkhittakhīraṃ telameva hoti,
tika-vin01t2:1585_8: aññaṃ pana khīraṃ pakkhipitvā kataṃ khīrabhāvaṃ gaṇhātīti idamettha kāraṇaṃ. Yadi
tika-vin01t2:1585_9: evaṃ khaṇḍasakkharampi khīraṃ pakkhipitvā karonti, taṃ kasmā vaṭṭatīti āha “khaṇḍasakkharaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1586_0: Bhesajjodissaṃ dassentena “sattavidhañhi odissaṃ nāmā”tiādinā itarānipi atthuddhāravasena
tika-vin01t2:1586_1: vuttāni. Vikaṭānīti apakatibhesajjattā vikaṭāni, virūpānīti attho. Dukkaṭavatthūnampi
tika-vin01t2:1586_2: akappiyamaṃsānaṃ vasāya anuññātattā “vasodissa”nti vuttaṃ. Oḷārikānampi āhāratthaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1586_3: pharituṃ samatthānaṃ sappiādīnaṃ bhesajjanāmena anuññātattā “bhesajjodissa”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1586_4: “Pacchābhattato paṭṭhāya sati paccayeti vuttattā paṭiggahitabhesajjāni dutiyadivasato
tika-vin01t2:1586_5: paṭṭhāya purebhattampi sati paccaye paribhuñjitabbāni, na āhāratthaṃ bhesajjatthāya
tika-vin01t2:1587_0: 624. Dvāravātapānakavāṭesūti mahādvārassa vātapānānañca kavāṭaphalakesu. Kasāve pakkhittāni
tika-vin01t2:1587_1: tāni attano sabhāvaṃ pariccajanti, tasmā “makkhetabbānī”ti vuttaṃ, ghuṇapāṇakādiparihāratthaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1587_2: makkhetabbānīti attho. Adhiṭṭhetīti “idāni mayhaṃ ajjhoharaṇīyaṃ na bhavissati, bāhiraparibhogatthāya
tika-vin01t2:1587_3: gamissatī”ti cittaṃ uppādetīti attho. Tenevāha – “sappiñca telañca vasañca muddhani
tika-vin01t2:1587_4: telaṃ vā abbhañjanaṃ vā”tiādi. “Evaṃ adhiṭṭhitañca paṭiggahaṇaṃ vijahatī”ti vadanti.
tika-vin01t2:1588_0: 625. Sace dvinnaṃ santakaṃ ekena paṭiggahitaṃ avibhattaṃ hoti, paribhuñjituṃ pana
tika-vin01t2:1588_1: na vaṭṭatīti ettha majjhe pāṭho parihīno, evaṃ panettha pāṭho veditabbo “sace dvinnaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1588_2: santakaṃ ekena paṭiggahitaṃ avibhattaṃ hoti, sattāhātikkame dvinnampi anāpatti, paribhuñjituṃ
tika-vin01t2:1588_3: pana na vaṭṭatī”ti. Aññathā pana saddappayogopi na saṅgacchati. Gaṇṭhipadepi ca ayameva
tika-vin01t2:1588_4: pāṭho dassito. Tattha dvinnampi anāpattīti yathā aññassa santakaṃ ekena paṭiggahitaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1588_5: sattāhātikkamena nissaggiyaṃ na hoti parasantakabhāvato, evamidampi avibhattattā
tika-vin01t2:1588_6: ubhayasādhāraṇampi avinibbhogabhāvato nissaggiyaṃ na hotīti adhippāyo. Paribhuñjituṃ
tika-vin01t2:1588_7: pana na vaṭṭatīti bhikkhunā paṭiggahitattā sattāhātikkame yassa kassaci bhikkhuno
tika-vin01t2:1588_8: paribhuñjituṃ na vaṭṭati paṭiggahitasappiādīnaṃ paribhogassa sattāheneva paricchinnattā.
tika-vin01t2:1588_9: “Tāni paṭiggahetvā sattāhaparamaṃ sannidhikārakaṃ paribhuñjitabbānī”ti hi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1588_10: Gaṇṭhipadesu pana tīsupi idha pāṭhassa parihīnabhāvaṃ asallakkhetvā “paribhuñjituṃ
tika-vin01t2:1588_11: pana na vaṭṭatīti idaṃ antosattāhe paribhogaṃ sandhāya vuttanti saññāya vissāsaggāhābhāvato
tika-vin01t2:1588_12: paribhuñjituṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti evamattho vutto, so na gahetabbo.
tika-vin01t2:1589_0: Āvuso, imaṃ telaṃ sattāhamattaṃ paribhuñja tvanti iminā yena paṭiggahitaṃ, tena antosattāheyeva
tika-vin01t2:1589_1: parassa vissajjitabhāvaṃ dasseti. Kassa āpattīti paṭhamaṃ tāva ubhinnaṃ sādhāraṇattā
