tika-vin01t2:1589_2: anāpatti vuttā. Idāni pana ekena itarassa vissaṭṭhabhāvato ubhayasādhāraṇatā natthīti
tika-vin01t2:1589_3: vibhattasadisaṃ hutvā ṭhitaṃ, tasmā ettha paṭiggahitassa sattāhātikkame ekassa āpattiyā
tika-vin01t2:1589_4: bhavitabbanti maññamāno “kiṃ paṭiggahaṇapaccayā paṭiggāhakassa āpatti, udāhu yassa
tika-vin01t2:1589_5: santakaṃ jātaṃ, tassā”ti pucchati. Nissaṭṭhabhāvatoyeva ca idha “avibhattabhāvato”ti
tika-vin01t2:1589_6: kāraṇaṃ avatvā “yena paṭiggahitaṃ, tena vissajjitattā”ti vuttaṃ. Idañca vissaṭṭhabhāvato
tika-vin01t2:1589_7: ubhayasādhāraṇataṃ pahāya ekassa santakaṃ hontampi yena paṭiggahitaṃ, tato aññassa
tika-vin01t2:1589_8: santakaṃ jātaṃ, tasmā parasantakapaṭiggahaṇe viya paṭiggāhakassa paṭiggahaṇapaccayā
tika-vin01t2:1589_9: natthi āpattīti dassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ, na pana “yena paṭiggahitaṃ, tena vissajjitattā”ti
tika-vin01t2:1589_10: vacanato avissajjite sati avibhattepi sattāhātikkame āpattīti dassanatthaṃ avissajjite
tika-vin01t2:1589_11: avibhattabhāvatoyeva anāpattiyā siddhattā. Sace pana itaro yena paṭiggahitaṃ, tasseva
tika-vin01t2:1589_12: antosattāhe attano bhāgampi vissajjeti, sattāhātikkame siyā āpatti yena paṭiggahitaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:1589_13: tasseva santakabhāvamāpannattā itarassa appaṭiggahitattā. Iminā tassa santakabhāvepi
tika-vin01t2:1589_14: aññena paṭiggahitasakasantake viya tena appaṭiggahitabhāvato anāpattīti dīpeti. Idaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1589_15: pana adhippāyaṃ ajānitvā ito aññathā gaṇṭhipadakārādīhi papañcitaṃ, na taṃ sārato paccetabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1590_0: Aparibhogaṃ hotīti kassaci amanuññassa patitattā paribhogārahaṃ na hoti. Yena cittenāti
tika-vin01t2:1590_2: datvā paṭilabhitvā paribhuñjatī”ti imaṃ sambandhaṃ sandhāya mahāsumattherena “evaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1590_3: antosattāhe datvā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Mahāpadumatthero pana yadi evaṃ “vissajjetī”ti imināva
tika-vin01t2:1590_4: taṃ siddhaṃ, sattāhātikkantaṃ pana nissaṭṭhaṃ paṭilabhitvā paribhuñjituṃ na vaṭṭati,
tika-vin01t2:1590_5: tasmā tassa paribhogamukhadassanamidanti āha – “nayidaṃ yācitabba”ntiādi. Aññena
tika-vin01t2:1590_6: bhikkhunāti ettha suddhacittena dinnattā sayampi āharāpetvā paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭatiyeva.
tika-vin01t2:1590_7: Sappiādīnaṃ paṭiggahitabhāvo, attano santakatā, sattāhātikkamoti imānettha tīṇi aṅgāni.
tika-vin01t2:1593: 627. Catutthe sibbanarajanakappapariyosānena niṭṭhāpetvāti sūcikammaniṭṭhānena sakimpi vaṇṇabhedamattarajanena kappabindukaraṇena ca niṭṭhāpetvā. Samayeti vassānasamaye.
tika-vin01t2:1594_1: Etasmiñhi antare vassikasāṭikaṃ aladdhaṃ pariyesituṃ laddhaṃ kātuñca vaṭṭati, nivāsetuṃ
tika-vin01t2:1594_2: adhiṭṭhātuñca na vaṭṭatī”ti potthakesu pāṭho dissati, so apāṭho. Evaṃ panettha pāṭhena
tika-vin01t2:1594_3: bhavitabbaṃ “ayameko aḍḍhamāso pariyesanakkhettaṃ. Etasmiñhi antare vassikasāṭikaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1594_4: aladdhaṃ pariyesituṃ vaṭṭati, laddhaṃ kātuṃ nivāsetuṃ adhiṭṭhātuñca na vaṭṭatī”ti.
tika-vin01t2:1594_5: Na hi gimhānaṃ pacchimamāsassa paṭhamo aḍḍhamāso karaṇakkhettaṃ hoti. “Aḍḍhamāso
tika-vin01t2:1594_6: seso gimhānanti katvā nivāsetabba”nti vacanato pana gimhānaṃ pacchimamāsassa pacchimo
tika-vin01t2:1594_7: aḍḍhamāso karaṇakkhettañceva nivāsanakkhettañca hoti. Teneva mātikāṭṭhakathāyaṃ “gimhānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1594_8: pacchimo māso pariyesanakkhettaṃ, pacchimo aḍḍhamāso karaṇanivāsanakkhettampī”ti
tika-vin01t2:1594_9: vuttaṃ. Tasmā pāḷiyā mātikāṭṭhakathāya ca avirodhaṃ icchantena vuttanayeneva pāṭho gahetabbo.
tika-vin01t2:1595_1: “piṭṭhisamayattā iminā sikkhāpadena āpattī”ti dīpitā hoti. Na hi ñātakapavāritaṭṭhānato
tika-vin01t2:1595_2: piṭṭhisamaye satuppādakaraṇamattenapi sambhavantī āpatti tato garukatarāya viññattiyā
tika-vin01t2:1595_3: na hotīti sakkā vattuṃ. Teneva bhadantabuddhadattācariyena vuttaṃ –
tika-vin01t2:1599: Tesuyeva ca viññattiṃ, katvā nipphādane tathā”ti.
tika-vin01t2:1600_0: Kenassa hoti āpattīti assa mātaraṃ cīvaraṃ yācantassa kena sikkhāpadena āpattīti
tika-vin01t2:1600_2: dasseti no ca saṅghe pariṇatanti. Atha aññātakaviññattisikkhāpadenāti ce, etampi
tika-vin01t2:1600_3: natthīti āha “anāpatti ca ñātake”ti. “Ñātake viññāpentassā”ti pāṭhaseso. Imamatthaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1601_0: Aññātakaappavāritaṭṭhānato…pe… dukkaṭanti idaṃ vassikasāṭikaṃ adinnapubbe sandhāya
tika-vin01t2:1601_1: vuttaṃ. Tenevettha vattabhede dukkaṭaṃ vuttaṃ, dinnapubbesu pana vattabhedo natthi.
tika-vin01t2:1601_2: Tenevāha – “ye manussā…pe… vattabhedo natthī”ti. Idanti yathāvuttanissaggiyapācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1601_3: Viññattiṃ katvā nipphādentassāti aññātakaappavāritaṭṭhānato viññattiṃ katvā nipphādentassa.
tika-vin01t2:1601_4: Pakatiyā vassikasāṭikadāyakā nāma saṅghavasena vā puggalavasena vā apavāretvā anusaṃvaccharaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1601_5: vassikasāṭikānaṃ dāyakā. Aññātakaviññattisikkhāpadena anāpattīti ettha imināpi sikkhāpadena
tika-vin01t2:1601_6: anāpattīti veditabbaṃ. Kucchisamaye hi attano ñātakapavāritaṭṭhānato “detha me vassikasāṭika”ntiādinā
tika-vin01t2:1601_7: viññāpentassapi anāpatti. Tenevāha – “na vattabbā detha meti idañhi pariyesanakāle
tika-vin01t2:1601_8: aññātakaappavārite eva sandhāya vutta”nti. Mātikāṭṭhakathāyañhi vuttaṃ “attano ñātakapavāritaṭṭhānato
tika-vin01t2:1602: 629. “Ākāsato patitaudakenevāti vacanato chadanakoṭiyā patitaudakena nahāyantassa anāpattī”ti tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1603_0: 630. Cha māse parihāraṃ labhatīti etena antovassepi yāva vassānassa pacchimadivasā
tika-vin01t2:1603_1: akatā parihāraṃ labhatīti dīpitaṃ hoti. Yasmā mūlacīvaraṃ karontena hemantassa pacchimuposathadivaseyeva
tika-vin01t2:1603_2: kātabbaṃ, tasmā gimhānato ekūnatiṃsadivase parihāraṃ labhati, evaṃ santepi appakaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1603_3: ūnamadhikaṃ vā gaṇanūpagaṃ na hotīti katvā “tato parampi…pe… ekamāsa”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1603_4: Ekāhadvīhādivasena…pe… laddhā ceva niṭṭhitā cāti iminā ekāhānāgatāya vassūpanāyikāya
tika-vin01t2:1603_5: laddhā ceva niṭṭhitā ca, dvīhānāgatāya…pe… dasāhānāgatāya vassūpanāyikāya laddhā
tika-vin01t2:1603_6: ceva niṭṭhitā ca, antovasse vā laddhā ceva niṭṭhitā cāti ayamattho dassito. Tattha
tika-vin01t2:1603_7: āsāḷhimāsassa juṇhapakkhapuṇṇamiyaṃ laddhā ceva niṭṭhitā ca vassikasāṭikā “ekāhānāgatāya
tika-vin01t2:1603_8: vassūpanāyikāya laddhā ceva niṭṭhitā cā”ti vuccati. Eteneva nayena juṇhapakkhassa
tika-vin01t2:1603_9: chaṭṭhiyaṃ laddhā ceva niṭṭhitā ca “dasāhānāgatāya vassūpanāyikāya laddhā ceva niṭṭhitā
tika-vin01t2:1603_10: cā”ti vuccati. Yāva paṭhamakattikatemāsapuṇṇamī, tāva antotemāse laddhā ceva niṭṭhitā
tika-vin01t2:1603_11: ca “antovasse laddhā ceva niṭṭhitā cā”ti vuccati. Paṭhamakattikatemāsapuṇṇamito parañhi
tika-vin01t2:1603_12: laddhā ceva niṭṭhitā ca yāva cīvarakālo nātikkamati, tāva anadhiṭṭhahitvā ṭhapetuṃ
tika-vin01t2:1604_0: Tasmiṃyeva antodasāhe adhiṭṭhātabbāti avisesena vuttepi vassānato pubbe ekāhadvīhādivasena
tika-vin01t2:1604_1: anāgatāya vassūpanāyikāya laddhā tehi divasehi saddhiṃ dasāhaṃ anatikkamantena vassūpanāyikadivasato
tika-vin01t2:1604_2: paṭṭhāya adhiṭṭhānakkhettaṃ sampattāyeva adhiṭṭhātabbā, na tato pubbe adhiṭṭhānassa
tika-vin01t2:1604_3: akhettattā. Antovasse pana laddhā tasmiṃyeva antovasse laddhadivasato paṭṭhāya dasāhaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1605_0: Nanu ca vassānato pubbe anadhiṭṭhahitvā dasāhaṃ atikkāmetuṃ vaṭṭatiyeva, tasmā adhiṭṭhānassa
tika-vin01t2:1605_1: akhettabhūtepi divase gahetvā “antodasāhe adhiṭṭhātabba”nti kasmā vuttaṃ? Yathā “antovasse
tika-vin01t2:1605_2: laddhāpi yāva na niṭṭhāti, tāva anadhiṭṭhahitvā dasāhaṃ atikkāmetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti akatāya
tika-vin01t2:1605_3: anadhiṭṭhānakkhettasadisāpi atikkantadivasā dasāhaṃ atikkāmetvā niṭṭhitāya gaṇanūpagā
tika-vin01t2:1605_4: hontīti niṭṭhitadivaseyeva adhiṭṭhātabbā, evamidhāpi vassānato pubbe anadhiṭṭhānakkhettabhūtāpi
tika-vin01t2:1605_5: divasā laddhadivasato paṭṭhāya gaṇanūpagā hontīti dassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Yadi evaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1605_6: “tasmiṃyeva antodasāhe”ti avisesena vuttattā dasāhānāgatāya vassūpanāyikāya chaṭṭhiyaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1605_7: laddhā puṇṇamiyaṃ adhiṭṭhātabbāti āpajjatīti? Nāpajjati “cātumāsaṃ adhiṭṭhātu”nti
tika-vin01t2:1605_8: vacaneneva paṭikkhittattā. Evaṃ sante “dasāhānāgatāyā”ti iminā kiṃ payojananti ce?
tika-vin01t2:1605_9: Vassānato pubbeyeva dasāhe atikkante vassūpanāyikadivase niṭṭhitā tadaheva adhiṭṭhātabbāti
tika-vin01t2:1605_10: dassanatthaṃ vuttanti idamettha payojanaṃ. Tenevāha – “dasāhātikkame niṭṭhitā tadaheva adhiṭṭhātabbā”ti.
tika-vin01t2:1606_0: Dasāhe appahonte cīvarakālaṃ nātikkametabbāti temāsabbhantare dasāhe appahonte laddhā
tika-vin01t2:1606_1: ceva niṭṭhitā ca cīvarakālaṃ nātikkametabbāti attho. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti “paṭhamakattikatemāsapuṇṇamito
tika-vin01t2:1606_2: pubbe sattamito paṭṭhāya laddhā ceva niṭṭhitā ca vassikasāṭikā dasāhe anatikkanteyeva
tika-vin01t2:1606_3: cīvarakālaṃ otiṇṇattā tattha anadhiṭṭhahitvāpi ṭhapetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti. Iminā ca imaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1606_4: dīpeti – akatā ce vassikasāṭikā, vassānaṃ cātumāsaṃ akatattāyeva parihāraṃ labhati,
tika-vin01t2:1606_5: katāya pana dasāhaparamasikkhāpadaṃ avikopetvā parihāro vattabboti.
tika-vin01t2:1607_0: Yadā vā tadā vā adhiṭṭhātuṃ vaṭṭatīti cātumāsabbhantare dasāhe atikkantepi natthi
tika-vin01t2:1607_1: dosoti adhippāyo. “Kadā adhiṭṭhātabbā…pe… yadi nappahoti, yāva kattikapuṇṇamā parihāraṃ
tika-vin01t2:1607_2: labhatī”ti imināpi kurundivacanena akatāya vassikasāṭikāya cātumāsaṃ parihāro, katāya
tika-vin01t2:1608_0: Pāḷiyaṃ acchinnacīvarassa naṭṭhacīvarassātiādinā nissaggiyena anāpatti vuttā, udāhu
tika-vin01t2:1608_1: naggassa nahāyato dukkaṭena anāpatti vuttāti? Kimettha pucchitabbaṃ. Sabbasikkhāpadesu
tika-vin01t2:1608_2: hi yattha yattha mūlasikkhāpadena āpattippasaṅgo, tattha tattha anāpattidassanatthaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1608_3: anāpattivāro ārabhīyatīti idhāpi nissaggiyena anāpattidassanatthanti yuttaṃ vattuṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1608_4: Na hi mūlāpattiyā anāpattiṃ adassetvā antarā vuttāya eva āpattiyā anāpattidassanatthaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1608_5: anāpattivāro ārabhīyatīti. Teneva tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu idaṃ vuttaṃ “acchinnacīvarassa
tika-vin01t2:1608_6: naṭṭhacīvarassa cāti ettha acchinnasesacīvarassa naṭṭhasesacīvarassa ca asamaye nivāsentassa
tika-vin01t2:1608_7: pariyesantassa ca anāpatti. Āpadāsūti ettha anivatthaṃ corā harantīti asamaye nivāsentassa
tika-vin01t2:1608_8: anāpattī”ti. Mātikāṭṭhakathāyampi vuttaṃ “acchinnacīvarassa vā naṭṭhacīvarassa vā
tika-vin01t2:1608_9: anivatthaṃ corā harantīti evaṃ āpadāsu vā nivāsayato ummattakādīnañca anāpattī”ti.
tika-vin01t2:1608_10: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana naggassa nahāyato dukkaṭeneva anāpattiṃ sandhāya “acchinnacīvarassāti
tika-vin01t2:1608_11: etaṃ vassikasāṭikameva sandhāya vuttaṃ. Tesañhi naggānaṃ kāyovassāpane anāpatti.
tika-vin01t2:1608_12: Ettha ca mahagghavassikasāṭikaṃ nivāsetvā nahāyantassa corupaddavo āpadā nāmā”ti
tika-vin01t2:1609_1: siyā, evampi “acchinnacīvarassāti etaṃ vassikasāṭikameva sandhāya vutta”ntiādinā
tika-vin01t2:1609_2: visesetvā na vattabbaṃ. Evañhi vattabbaṃ siyā “acchinnasesacīvarassa naṭṭhasesacīvarassa
tika-vin01t2:1609_3: vā asamaye nivāsentassa pariyesantassa ca nissaggiyena anāpatti, acchinnavassikasāṭikassa
tika-vin01t2:1609_4: naṭṭhavassikasāṭikassa vā naggassa nahāyato dukkaṭena anāpatti, āpadāsu anivatthaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1609_5: corā harantīti asamaye nivāsayato nissaggiyena anāpatti, mahagghavassikasāṭikaṃ nivāsetvā
tika-vin01t2:1609_6: nahāyantassa corā haranti, naggassa nahāyato dukkaṭena anāpattī”ti. Sesamettha uttānameva.
tika-vin01t2:1610_0: Aṅgesu pana vassikasāṭikāya attuddesikatā, asamaye pariyesanatā, tāya ca paṭilābhoti
tika-vin01t2:1610_1: imāni tāva pariyesanāpattiyā tīṇi aṅgāni. Sacīvaratā, āpadābhāvo, vassikasāṭikāya
tika-vin01t2:1610_2: sakabhāvo, asamaye nivāsananti imāni nivāsanāpattiyā cattāri aṅgāni.
tika-vin01t2:1613_0: 631. Pañcame yampi tyāhanti ettha yanti kāraṇavacanaṃ, tasmā evamettha sambandho
tika-vin01t2:1613_1: veditabbo – mayā saddhiṃ janapadacārikaṃ pakkamissatīti yaṃ kāraṇaṃ nissāya ahaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1613_2: te, āvuso, cīvaraṃ adāsiṃ, taṃ na karosīti kupito anattamano acchindīti. Yanti vā
tika-vin01t2:1613_3: cīvaraṃ parāmasati, tattha “mayā saddhiṃ janapadacārikaṃ pakkamissatīti yampi te
tika-vin01t2:1613_4: ahaṃ cīvaraṃ adāsiṃ, taṃ cīvaraṃ gaṇhissāmīti kupito anattamano acchindī”ti sambandhitabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1614_0: 633. Āṇatto bahūni gaṇhāti, ekaṃ pācittiyanti “cīvaraṃ gaṇhā”ti āṇattiyā ekacīvaravisayattā
tika-vin01t2:1614_1: ekameva pācittiyaṃ. Vācāya vācāya dukkaṭanti ettha acchinnesu vatthugaṇanāya pācittiyāni.
tika-vin01t2:1614_2: Ekavācāya sambahulā āpattiyoti idaṃ acchinnesu vatthugaṇanāya āpajjitabbaṃ pācittiyāpattiṃ
tika-vin01t2:1614_3: sandhāya vuttaṃ. Āṇattiyā āpajjitabbaṃ pana dukkaṭaṃ ekameva.
tika-vin01t2:1615: 634. Evanti iminā “vatthugaṇanāya dukkaṭānī”ti idaṃ parāmasati. Eseva nayoti sithilaṃ gāḷhañca pakkhittāsu āpattiyā bahuttaṃ ekattañca atidissati.
tika-vin01t2:1616_0: 635. Āvuso, mayantiādīsu gaṇhitukāmatāya evaṃ vuttepi teneva dinnattā anāpatti. Amhākaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1616_1: santike upajjhaṃ gaṇhissatīti idaṃ sāmaṇerassapi dānaṃ dīpeti. Tasmā kiñcāpi pāḷiyaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1616_2: “bhikkhussa sāmaṃ cīvaraṃ datvā”ti vuttaṃ, tathāpi anupasampannakāle datvāpi upasampannakāle
tika-vin01t2:1616_4: hettha pamāṇaṃ. Detīti tuṭṭho vā kupito vā deti. Rundhathāti nivāretha. Evaṃ pana
tika-vin01t2:1616_5: dātuṃ na vaṭṭatīti ettha evaṃ dinnaṃ na tāva tassa santakanti anadhiṭṭhahitvāva paribhuñjitabbanti
tika-vin01t2:1616_6: veditabbaṃ. Āharāpetuṃ pana vaṭṭatīti evaṃ dinnaṃ bhatisadisattā āharāpetuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin01t2:1616_7: Cajitvā dinnanti vuttanayena adatvā anapekkhena hutvā tasseva dinnaṃ. Bhaṇḍagghena
tika-vin01t2:1616_8: kāretabboti sakasaññāya vinā gaṇhanto bhaṇḍaṃ agghāpetvā āpattiyā kāretabbo. Vikappanupagapacchimacīvaratā,
tika-vin01t2:1616_9: sāmaṃ dinnatā, sakasaññitā, upasampannatā, kodhavasena acchindanaṃ acchindāpanaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1619: 636. Chaṭṭhe pāḷiyaṃ cīvarakārasamayeti iminā vassaṃvutthabhikkhūnaṃ cīvarakammasamayattā cīvaramāso vutto, athaññopi pana cīvarakammakālo cīvarakārasamayoti vattuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin01t2:1620_0: 638. Pañcahipi missetvāti khomādīhi pañcahi missetvā. Vītavītaṭṭhānaṃ yattha saṃharitvā
tika-vin01t2:1620_1: ṭhapenti, tassa turīti adhivacanaṃ. Suttaṃ pavesetvā yena ākoṭentā ghanabhāvaṃ sampādenti,
tika-vin01t2:1620_2: taṃ vemanti vuccati. Yaṃ yanti yaṃ yaṃ payogaṃ. Tantūnaṃ attano santakattā vītavītaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1620_3: paṭiladdhameva hotīti āha “dīghato…pe… vīte nissaggiyaṃ pācittiya”nti. Pāḷiyampi
tika-vin01t2:1620_4: hi imināva adhippāyena “paṭilābhena nissaggiya”nti vuttaṃ, tasmā yāva cīvaraṃ vaḍḍhati,
tika-vin01t2:1621_0: Seso kappiyoti ettha hatthakammayācanavasena. Pubbe vuttanayena nissaggiyanti dīghaso
tika-vin01t2:1621_1: vidatthimatte tiriyaṃ hatthamatte ca vīte nissaggiyaṃ. Tenevāti akappiyatantavāyena.
tika-vin01t2:1621_2: Tatheva dukkaṭanti paricchede paricchede dukkaṭaṃ. Kedārabaddhādīhīti ādi-saddena
tika-vin01t2:1621_3: acchimaṇḍalabaddhādi gahitaṃ. Tante ṭhitaṃyeva adhiṭṭhātabbanti ettha “pacchā vītaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1621_4: adhiṭṭhitagatikameva hoti, puna adhiṭṭhānakiccaṃ natthi. Sace pana paricchedaṃ dassetvā
tika-vin01t2:1621_5: antarantarā avītaṃ hoti, puna adhiṭṭhātabba”nti vadanti. Eseva nayoti vikappanupagappamāṇamatte
tika-vin01t2:1621_6: vīte tante ṭhitaṃyeva adhiṭṭhātabbanti attho. Cīvaratthāya viññāpitasuttaṃ, attuddesikatā,
tika-vin01t2:1622_0: Mātikāṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana vāyāpeyyāti ettha “cīvaraṃ me, āvuso, vāyathāti akappiyaviññattiyā
tika-vin01t2:1622_1: vāyāpeyyā”ti atthaṃ vatvā aṅgesupi “akappiyatantavāyena akappiyaviññattiyā vāyāpana”nti
tika-vin01t2:1622_2: visesetvā vuttaṃ, tathāvidhaṃ pana visesavacanaṃ neva pāḷiyaṃ, na aṭṭhakathāyaṃ upalabbhati.
tika-vin01t2:1622_3: Pāḷiyampi “ñātakānaṃ pavāritāna”nti ettakameva anāpattivāre vuttaṃ, aṭṭhakathāyañca
tika-vin01t2:1622_4: suttatantavāyānameva kappiyākappiyabhāvena bahudhā nayo dassito, na kappiyākappiyaviññattivasenāti.
tika-vin01t2:1622_5: “Akappiyaviññattiyā vāyāpeyyā”ti ca visesetvā vadantena ayaṃ nāma kappiyaviññattīti
tika-vin01t2:1622_6: visuṃ na dassitaṃ, tasmā vīmaṃsitvā gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1625_0: 642. Sattame kiñcimattaṃ anupadajjeyyāti idaṃ tassa kattabbākāramattadassanaṃ, dānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1625_1: panettha aṅgaṃ na hoti suttavaḍḍhanavaseneva āpajjitabbattā. Teneva padabhājanepi
tika-vin01t2:1625_2: “tassa vacanena āyataṃ vā vitthataṃ vā appitaṃ vā karoti, payoge dukkaṭaṃ, paṭilābhena
tika-vin01t2:1625_3: nissaggiya”nti suttavaḍḍhanākārameva dassetvā āpatti vuttā. Mātikāṭṭhakathāyampi
tika-vin01t2:1625_4: vuttaṃ “na bhikkhuno piṇḍapātadānamattena taṃ nissaggiyaṃ hoti. Sace pana te tassa
tika-vin01t2:1625_5: vacanena cīvarasāmikānaṃ hatthato suttaṃ gahetvā īsakampi āyataṃ vā vitthataṃ vā
tika-vin01t2:1625_6: appitaṃ vā karonti, atha tesaṃ payoge bhikkhuno dukkaṭaṃ, paṭilābhena nissaggiyaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1625_7: hotī”ti. Āyatādīsu sattasu ākāresu ādimhi tayo ākāre suttavaḍḍhanena vinā na sakkā
tika-vin01t2:1625_8: kātunti āha “suttavaḍḍhanaākārameva dassetī”ti. Suvītādayo hi ākāre vināpi suttavaḍḍhanena
tika-vin01t2:1625_9: sakkā kātuṃ. Sesamettha uttānameva. Aññātakaappavāritānaṃ tantavāye upasaṅkamitvā
tika-vin01t2:1625_10: vikappamāpajjanatā, cīvarassa attuddesikatā, tassa vacanena suttavaḍḍhanaṃ, cīvarassa
tika-vin01t2:1628_0: 646. Aṭṭhame asammohatthanti dasāhānāgatapade asammohatthaṃ. Paṭhamapadassāti dasāhānāgatapadassa.
tika-vin01t2:1628_1: Tāni divasānīti tesu divasesu. Uppajjeyyāti saṅghato vā gaṇato vā ujukaṃ attanoyeva
tika-vin01t2:1628_2: vā uppajjeyya. Pañcamitoti ettha vassaṃ vasantassa saṅghassa pañcamito pubbe uppannaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1628_3: accekacīvaraṃ pañcamiyaṃ vibhajitvā gahitaṃ accekacīvaraparihārameva labhati. Ujukaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1628_4: attanoyeva uppannaṃ ce, pañcamiyaṃ uppannameva accekacīvaraparihāraṃ labhati, na
tika-vin01t2:1629_0: Saddhāmattakanti dhammassavanādīhi taṅkhaṇuppannaṃ saddhāmattakaṃ. Ārocitaṃ cīvaranti
tika-vin01t2:1629_1: ārocetvā dinnacīvaraṃ. Chaṭṭhiyaṃ uppannacīvarassa ekādasamo aruṇo cīvarakāle uṭṭhātīti
tika-vin01t2:1629_3: atirekacīvaraṃ vuttaṃ. Atha “cīvaramāsepi atirekacīvaraṃ nikkhipituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti idaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1629_4: kuto laddhanti ce? “Visuṃ ananuññātepi imasmiṃ sikkhāpade ‘cīvarakālasamayo nāma
tika-vin01t2:1629_5: anatthate kathine vassānassa pacchimo māso, atthate kathine pañca māsā’ti vadantena
tika-vin01t2:1629_6: tatiyakathinasikkhāpade ‘akālacīvaraṃ nāma anatthate kathine ekādasamāse uppannaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:1629_7: atthate kathine sattamāse uppanna’nti vadantena ca anuññātameva hotī”ti vadanti.
tika-vin01t2:1630_0: 650. Idāni paṭhamakathinādisikkhāpadehi tassa tassa cīvarassa labbhamānaṃ parihāraṃ
tika-vin01t2:1630_1: idheva upasaṃharitvā dassento “iti atirekacīvarassa dasāhaṃ parihāro”tiādimāha. “Anatthate
tika-vin01t2:1630_2: kathine ekādasadivasādhiko māso, atthate kathine ekādasadivasādhikā pañca māsā”ti
tika-vin01t2:1630_3: ayameva pāṭho gahetabbo. Keci panettha “kāmañcesa ‘dasāhaparamaṃ atirekacīvaraṃ dhāretabba’nti
tika-vin01t2:1630_4: imināva siddho, aṭṭhuppattivasena pana apubbaṃ viya atthaṃ dassetvā sikkhāpadaṃ ṭhapita”nti
tika-vin01t2:1630_5: pāṭhaṃ vatvā “dasadivasādhiko māso, dasadivasādhikā pañca māsāti pāṭhena bhavitabba”nti
tika-vin01t2:1630_6: vadanti, taṃ na gahetabbaṃ tassa pamādapāṭhattā. Na hi dasāhena asampattāya kattikatemāsikapuṇṇamāya
tika-vin01t2:1630_7: cīvarakālato pubbe dasa divasā adhikā honti. Evañhi sati “navāhānāgataṃ kattikatemāsikapuṇṇama”nti vattabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1631_1: nidhānakālo dassito hotī”ti vatvā “kāmañcesa ‘dasāhaparamaṃ atirekacīvaraṃ dhāretabba’nti
tika-vin01t2:1631_2: imināva siddho, aṭṭhuppattivasena pana apubbaṃ viya atthaṃ dassetvā sikkhāpadaṃ ṭhapita”nti
tika-vin01t2:1631_3: pāṭho dassito, sopi pamādapāṭhoyeva. “Juṇhapakkhapañcamito paṭṭhāyā”ti ca vuttattā
tika-vin01t2:1631_4: tattheva pubbāparavirodhopi siyā, chaṭṭhito paṭṭhāyāti vattabbaṃ. Evañhi sati “dasāhaparamasikkhāpadeneva
tika-vin01t2:1631_5: siddha”nti sakkā vattuṃ. Imameva ca pamādapāṭhaṃ gahetvā bhadantabuddhadattācariyena ca –
tika-vin01t2:1637_1: dasāhaṃ atikkāmayato cīvarakālato pubbeyeva āpatti hoti, na cīvarakālātikkame, tasmā
tika-vin01t2:1637_2: cīvarakālātikkame puna āpajjitabbāya āpattiyā abhāvaṃ sandhāya ‘anaccekacīvare anaccekacīvarasaññī
tika-vin01t2:1637_3: anāpattī’ti vutta”nti tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ. Vikappanupagapacchimappamāṇassa
tika-vin01t2:1637_4: accekacīvarassa attano santakatā, dasāhānāgatāya kattikatemāsikapuṇṇamāya uppannabhāvo,
tika-vin01t2:1640_0: 652. Navame antaraghareti antare gharāni ettha, etassāti vā antaragharanti laddhavohāre
tika-vin01t2:1640_1: gocaragāme. Tenāha “antogāme”ti. Pāḷiyaṃ vippavasantīti idaṃ yasmiṃ vihāre vasantā
tika-vin01t2:1640_2: antaraghare cīvaraṃ nikkhipiṃsu, tato aññattha vasante sandhāya vuttaṃ. Tasmiñhi
tika-vin01t2:1640_3: vihāre antaraghare cīvaraṃ nikkhipitvā vasituṃ anuññātattā tattha vāso vippavāso
tika-vin01t2:1640_4: nāma na hoti. Dubbalacoḷā duccoḷā virūpacoḷā vā, duccoḷattā eva lūkhacīvarā.
tika-vin01t2:1641_0: 653. “Paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharatī”ti imassa vibhaṅge “upasampajjā”ti uddharitabbe
tika-vin01t2:1641_1: “upasampajja”nti uddharitvā “yo paṭhamassa jhānassa lābho paṭilābho”tiādi vuttaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:1641_2: taṃ sandhāyāha “upasampajjantiādīsu viyā”ti. Ādi-saddena “anāpucchaṃ vā pakkameyyā”tiādīnaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1641_3: saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. Upagantvāti upa-saddassa atthamāha. Vasitvāti akhaṇḍaṃ vasitvā.
tika-vin01t2:1641_4: “Yena yassa hi sambandho, dūraṭṭhampi ca tassa ta”nti vacanato “imassa…pe… iminā
tika-vin01t2:1641_5: sambandho”ti vuttaṃ. Tattha imassāti “upavassa”nti padassa. Nikkhipeyyāti ṭhapeyya.
tika-vin01t2:1642_0: Ettāvatā ca purimikāya upagantvā akhaṇḍaṃ katvā vutthavassena āraññakesu senāsanesu
tika-vin01t2:1642_1: viharantena sakalaṃ kattikamāsaṃ ticīvarena vippavasituṃ anuññātaṃ hoti. Anatthatakathinassa
tika-vin01t2:1642_2: hi cīvaramāse vippavāso na vaṭṭati atthatakathinānaṃyeva asamādānacārassa anuññātattā.
tika-vin01t2:1642_3: Keci pana “anatthatakathinānaṃ cīvaramāsepi asamādānacāro labbhatī”ti vatvā bahudhā
tika-vin01t2:1642_4: papañcenti, taṃ na gahetabbaṃ. Byañjanavicāraṇanti “upavassa upavassitvā”tiādivicāraṇaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1642_5: Tassapīti “vutthavassāna”nti vibhaṅgapadassa. Vutthavassānanti ca niddhāraṇe sāmivacanaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1642_6: Tenāha – “evarūpānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ abbhantare”ti. Senāsanesūti ettha tathārūpesūti sambandhitabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1643_0: Parikkhepārahaṭṭhānatoti ettha “parikkhepārahaṭṭhānaṃ nāma dve leḍḍupātā”ti vadanti,
tika-vin01t2:1643_1: taṃ na gahetabbaṃ. Aparikkhittassa pana gāmassa pariyante ṭhitagharūpacārato paṭṭhāya
tika-vin01t2:1643_2: eko leḍḍupāto parikkhepārahaṭṭhānanti idamettha sanniṭṭhānaṃ. Teneva visuddhimaggepi
tika-vin01t2:1643_4: sabbapaṭhamaṃ. Taṃ paricchedaṃ katvāti taṃ paṭhamasenāsanādiṃ paricchedaṃ katvā.
tika-vin01t2:1643_5: Idañca vinayadharānaṃ matena vuttaṃ, majjhimabhāṇakānaṃ matena pana “senāsanādīnaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1643_6: upacāre ṭhitassa ekaleḍḍupātaṃ muñcitvā minitabba”nti majjhimabhāṇakā vadanti. Teneva
tika-vin01t2:1643_7: majjhimanikāyaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “vihārassapi gāmasseva upacāraṃ nīharitvā ubhinnaṃ leḍḍupātānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1643_8: antarā minitabba”nti vuttaṃ. Pañcadhanusatikanti āropitena ācariyadhanunā pañcadhanusatappamāṇaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1643_9: Tato tato maggaṃ pidahatīti tattha tattha khuddakamaggaṃ pidahati. Dhutaṅgacoroti
tika-vin01t2:1643_10: iminā imassapi sikkhāpadassa aṅgasampattiyā abhāvaṃ dīpeti.
tika-vin01t2:1644_2: attho. Sace pacchimikāyātiādinā vuttamevatthaṃ byatirekamukhena vibhāveti. Yatra
tika-vin01t2:1644_3: hi piṇḍāyātiādinā vuttappamāṇameva visesetvā dasseti. Sāsaṅkasappaṭibhayamevāti ettha
tika-vin01t2:1644_4: sāsaṅkaṃ vā sappaṭibhayaṃ vā hotu, vaṭṭatiyeva.
tika-vin01t2:1645_0: Pāḷiyaṃ “siyā ca tassa bhikkhuno kocideva paccayo tena cīvarena vippavāsāya, chārattaparamaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1645_1: tena bhikkhunā tena cīvarena vippavasitabba”nti iminā antaraghare cīvaraṃ nikkhipitvā
tika-vin01t2:1645_2: tasmiṃ vihāre vasantassa aññattha gamanakicce sati vihārato bahi chārattaṃ vippavāso
tika-vin01t2:1645_3: anuññāto. Vasanaṭṭhānato hi aññattha chārattaṃ vippavāso vutto, na tasmiṃ vihāre
tika-vin01t2:1645_4: vasantassa. Tena ca “puna gāmasīmaṃ okkamitvāti ettha sace gocaragāmato puratthimāya
tika-vin01t2:1645_5: disāya senāsanaṃ, ayañca pacchimadisaṃ gato hotī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tatoyeva ca mātikāṭṭhakathāyampi
tika-vin01t2:1645_6: “tato ce uttari vippavaseyyā”ti ettha “chārattato uttari tasmiṃ senāsane sattamaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1645_7: aruṇaṃ uṭṭhāpeyyā”ti attho vutto. Bhadantabuddhadattācariyena pana pākaṭataraṃ katvā
tika-vin01t2:1646: “Yaṃ gāmaṃ gocaraṃ katvā, bhikkhu āraññake vase;
tika-vin01t2:1647: Tasmiṃ gāme ṭhapetuṃ taṃ, māsamekantu vaṭṭati.
tika-vin01t2:1650_0: “Kosambiyaṃ aññataro bhikkhu gilāno hotī”ti āgatattā “kosambakasammuti anuññātā”ti
tika-vin01t2:1650_1: vuttaṃ. Kosambakassa bhikkhuno sammuti kosambakasammuti. Senāsanaṃ āgantvāti vusitavihārasseva
tika-vin01t2:1650_2: sandhāya vuttattā tasmiṃ gāmūpacārepi aññasmiṃ vihāre aruṇaṃ uṭṭhāpetuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin01t2:1650_3: Vasitvāti aruṇaṃ uṭṭhāpetvā. Gataṭṭhānassa atidūrattā “evaṃ asakkontenā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1653_0: 657-659. Dasame uddissa ṭhapitabhāgeti attano gharepi uddisitvā visuṃ ṭhapitakoṭṭhāse.
tika-vin01t2:1653_1: “Ekaṃ mayhaṃ, ekaṃ imassa dehī”ti evaṃ ekavācāya āpajjitabbattā “āpajjeyya ekato”ti
tika-vin01t2:1653_2: vuttaṃ. Tumhākaṃ sappiādīni ābhatānīti tumhākaṃ atthāya ābhatāni sappiādīni. Pariṇatabhāvaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1653_3: jānitvāpi vuttavidhinā viññāpentena tesaṃ santakameva viññāpitaṃ nāma hotīti āha
tika-vin01t2:1654_0: 660. Pupphampi āropetuṃ na vaṭṭatīti idaṃ pariṇataṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Sace pana ekasmiṃ
tika-vin01t2:1654_1: cetiye pūjitaṃ pupphaṃ gahetvā aññasmiṃ cetiye pūjeti, vaṭṭati. Ṭhitaṃ disvāti sesakaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1654_2: gahetvā ṭhitaṃ disvā. Imassa sunakhassa mā dehi, etassa dehīti idaṃ pariṇateyeva.
tika-vin01t2:1654_3: Tiracchānagatassa pariccajitvā dinne pana taṃ palāpetvā aññaṃ bhuñjāpetuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin01t2:1654_4: “Kattha demātiādinā ekenākārena pāḷiyaṃ anāpatti dassitā, evaṃ pana apucchitepi apariṇataṃ
tika-vin01t2:1654_5: idanti jānantena attano ruciyā yattha icchati, tattha dāpetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu
tika-vin01t2:1654_6: vuttaṃ. Yattha icchatha, tattha dethāti etthāpi “tumhākaṃ ruciyā”ti vuttattā yattha
tika-vin01t2:1654_7: icchati, tattha dāpetuṃ labhati. Pāḷiyaṃ āgatanayenevāti “yattha tumhākaṃ deyyadhammo”tiādinā
tika-vin01t2:1654_8: nayena. Saṅghapariṇatabhāvo, taṃ ñatvā attano pariṇāmanaṃ, paṭilābhoti imānettha tīṇi aṅgāni.
